<h1> ׳•׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳©׳׳ </h1>
׳”׳¨׳‘ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨ ׳•׳•׳™׳™׳ 
<h2> ׳”׳§׳“׳׳”</h2>
׳׳׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳™ ׳׳ ׳—׳¨׳‘׳” ׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳׳׳• ׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳׳¨ '׳•׳׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳׳•' (׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳˜:). ׳׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳”׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳ (׳‘׳—׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™ ׳׳’׳“׳•׳×) ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳¨׳‘׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳“׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¢׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳׳•, ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳¢׳•׳•׳ ׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳¢׳׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳”׳¢׳.
׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳: ׳. ׳׳“׳•׳¢ ׳—׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳•׳¨׳‘׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳×. ׳‘. ׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¨׳‘׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳×, ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳•׳¢ ׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳“׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×.
׳•׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳׳•׳™ (׳₪' ׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳™׳×) ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳“׳׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳¨׳© (׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳™׳× ׳¨׳‘׳” ׳™ ׳˜) '׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳—׳” ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳” ׳׳ ׳•׳—׳”'. ׳•׳×׳׳•׳”, ׳׳”׳• '׳׳ ׳•׳—׳”' ׳”׳—׳¡׳¨׳”, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¢׳“׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳—׳”, ׳•׳׳”׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”'׳׳ ׳•׳—׳”' ׳”׳—׳¡׳¨׳”.
׳•׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳׳•׳™, ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳©׳” ׳™׳׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳§׳‘"׳” ׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳•׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳‘ ׳©׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¨׳" ׳׳׳¦׳‘ ׳©׳ "׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳”", ׳•׳׳׳– ׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳”׳׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳”׳§׳‘"׳” '׳׳—׳“׳© ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳™׳×', ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳”׳§׳‘"׳” ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳”׳׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳¢׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳—׳׳” ׳•׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳” ׳•׳’׳‘׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¦׳׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳™ ׳”׳§׳‘"׳” ׳”׳׳×׳—׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳. ׳•׳–׳” ׳”׳×׳—׳“׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳”׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳”'׳׳ ׳•׳—׳”' ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳”׳§׳‘"׳” ׳׳—׳“׳© ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳™׳×. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳‘"׳” ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳× ׳”׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳.
׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳׳” ׳©׳”׳§׳‘"׳” ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳׳׳× ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳× ׳”׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳ ׳© ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳–׳׳–׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳”׳§׳‘"׳” ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳›׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳–׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳•׳¨׳‘׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳™׳‘׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳”׳¨׳” ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•.
***
׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳–׳¨׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳™"׳× ׳‘׳—׳¡׳“׳• ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳§׳•׳ ׳˜׳¨׳¡׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¢׳–׳¨׳× ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳×׳׳׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳—׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳ ׳×׳§׳‘׳׳• ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡"׳“, ׳ ׳™׳’׳©׳×׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳׳ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳•׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳׳׳™ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳”׳“׳•׳¨׳” ׳—׳“׳©׳” ׳¢׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳•׳×.
׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳×׳”׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳׳™׳™׳“׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨, ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳©׳×׳–׳“׳׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳ ׳— ׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳’׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳×. ׳›׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳×׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳•׳׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳”׳׳›׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳׳” ׳©׳”׳–׳“׳׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳“׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳”׳׳›׳” ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳™ ׳›׳׳¨׳׳™ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨.
׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳×׳™ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳•, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳”׳•׳¨׳׳”, ׳©׳‘׳—׳׳§׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳” ׳•׳—׳׳§׳ ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳” ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨׳”. ׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳×׳™ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳₪׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳—׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳₪׳¡׳§׳™ ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳•׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳×׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳™׳¢׳׳“׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳¢׳–׳¨׳™׳׳ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳¨' ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳׳–׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨׳”"׳’ ׳¨' ׳׳¨׳™׳” ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳¡׳™׳™׳¢׳•׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳–׳”.
׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳“ ׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳׳©׳” ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳¢׳–׳¨׳™׳׳ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳¢׳‘׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳”׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳× ׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳×׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳“׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳”׳›׳”׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳™׳–׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳¢׳‘׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨, ׳•׳׳× ׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¢׳–׳¨ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳׳׳׳•"׳¨ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳•׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳–׳ ׳’׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳׳ ׳—׳ ׳׳ ׳“׳ ׳׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳¢׳‘׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳ ׳¢׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳×"׳— ׳©׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳ ׳˜׳¨׳¡׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳׳“׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳׳–׳›׳™ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳.
׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳¢׳–׳¨׳×׳™ ׳‘׳’׳¨"׳™ ׳”׳•׳₪׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳”׳׳¨׳›׳– ׳”׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™ "׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳™׳©׳•׳¢׳”" ׳•׳‘׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳׳–׳™׳ ׳’׳¨ ׳¨׳׳© ׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳× ׳׳¢׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳—׳” ׳•׳™׳•"׳¨ "׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳". ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳‘ ׳“"׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳‘׳“"׳¨ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳•׳¡׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳•"׳¨ "׳׳₪׳¨׳×" ׳•׳‘׳“"׳¨ ׳™׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳׳”׳¨׳“, ׳•׳”׳ ׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳“׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳׳–׳”.
׳׳–׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳“׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳‘׳™ ׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳—"׳¡ "׳–׳׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳¥" ׳•׳׳׳׳™ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳ ׳™׳× ׳×׳—׳™', ׳©׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳¨׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳”, ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳׳׳“׳×׳™ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳×׳›׳׳™׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳.
׳©׳׳׳™ ׳×׳•׳“׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳—׳׳™ ׳”׳¨׳‘ ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳“׳׳×׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳₪׳×׳•׳—׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳”׳™׳” ׳׳™ ׳׳¢׳–׳¨ ׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳×׳™׳”׳, ׳•׳׳—׳׳•׳×׳™ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳ ׳™׳× ׳×׳—׳™', ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳¨ ׳§׳‘׳׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳.
׳§׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳‘ ׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳§׳¡׳˜׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳¨, ׳׳©׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳›׳•׳× ׳₪׳•׳¢׳׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳¨׳’׳•׳ "׳•׳”׳’׳™׳×" ׳‘׳׳¨׳”"׳§.
׳¢׳ ׳׳£ ׳”׳¢׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳”׳•׳©׳§׳¢ ׳‘׳“׳™׳•׳§ ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳”׳׳›׳•׳×, ׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”. ׳•׳™׳”"׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳¦׳ ׳×׳§׳׳” ׳׳×׳—׳× ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳—"׳•.
׳•׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳©׳™"׳× ׳©׳™׳–׳›׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳ ׳™ ׳•׳–׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳•׳–׳¨׳¢ ׳–׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳¢׳“ ׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳©׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ '׳•׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳™׳¢׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™׳ ׳₪׳©' (׳©׳׳•׳× ׳׳, ׳™׳–), ׳•׳“׳¨׳©׳• ׳—׳–"׳ (׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳˜׳–.) ׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳“׳” ׳ ׳₪׳©, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳ ׳©׳׳” ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳¢ ׳ ׳“׳¨׳© ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳”׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳“׳× ׳”׳ ׳©׳׳” ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳•׳׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳ ׳©׳׳” ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳•׳‘׳“׳× ׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳¦׳׳” ׳›׳¨׳׳•׳™. ׳•׳׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳׳׳•׳“ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳׳” ׳”׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳™׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳›׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳¡׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳¨ ׳ ׳×׳ ׳”.
׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨ ׳•׳•׳™׳™׳
׳‘׳ ׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳
<small>* ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳”׳׳›׳×׳” ׳¦׳•׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳׳”׳“׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳—׳“׳©׳”.</small>
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳</h2>
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳‘׳©׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳§׳“׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳׳–׳¨׳™׳¢׳”- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ [׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳–].</small></small> ׳‘׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳׳“׳•׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨.  ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳—׳׳£ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳’׳–׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳׳™׳•.</small></small>. [׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳›"׳‘ ׳”"׳™ ׳•׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™ ׳©׳›"׳, ׳’'] ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳׳×׳™ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳” ׳•׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳”׳—׳›׳"׳ ׳•׳’׳¨"׳– ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–- '׳׳¢"׳’ ׳“׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳×׳•׳׳“׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨', ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳‘׳© ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳›׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳•׳׳“׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳׳ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳‘], ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳—׳•׳§ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳ ׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳’"׳› ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳׳׳ ׳“׳›׳‘׳•׳© ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳•׳׳“׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳×׳•׳׳“׳× ׳—׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳›׳, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳ ׳•׳‘׳™"׳× ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳— ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳–׳ ׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳׳™ ׳˜׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳•׳₪׳” ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳.
׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳›׳›׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳”׳§׳©׳”, ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳•׳"׳› ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳”׳ "׳. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳"׳˜] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ "׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳" ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳§׳¨׳•׳’׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳©׳׳. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳.
<h3> ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳×׳›׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳—׳׳‘ ׳•׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳×׳›׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳×׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳’׳—׳׳×, ׳©׳›׳ ׳¨׳™׳₪׳•׳™ ׳’׳•׳£ ׳§׳©׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳©׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¨׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳¨׳›׳ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳׳• <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳˜ ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”"׳•, ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“, ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳”"׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳’׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳©׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳—"׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳™' ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳”׳§׳©׳׳× ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳׳"׳” ׳”׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳”"׳  ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳׳§׳©׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¨׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳, ׳•׳׳¡׳×׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳”׳§׳©׳׳×׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳×׳¨׳›׳ ׳×׳—׳™׳׳”]. </small></small>. [׳•׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳©׳§׳” ׳™׳© ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳”׳§׳©׳׳” ׳׳• ׳¨׳™׳₪׳•׳™, ׳©׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳—׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳–׳” ׳”׳׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳׳• <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳×, ׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳¨׳×׳™׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳©׳׳” ׳•׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳”׳©׳‘׳—׳× ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳‘׳”׳›׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳–׳”׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳›׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¡׳׳™ ׳©׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳•׳¦׳׳™׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳×׳§׳©׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳–׳׳, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳“׳׳™ ׳ ׳™׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳•׳¦׳׳™׳” ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳© ׳”׳ ׳“׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳’. ׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳₪׳× ׳‘׳×׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳¨׳“׳•׳×׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳×׳™׳׳₪׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳’׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳׳”: ׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳—׳× ׳׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳— ׳§׳•׳׳™׳™׳¡ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳™ ׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳•.</small></small>].
׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳, ׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳׳• ׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳× ׳§׳©׳™׳—׳™׳ [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳—׳™׳] ׳׳ <b>׳•׳“׳׳™</b> ׳”׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳׳• ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳™׳×׳¨׳›׳›׳• ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳¨׳›׳›׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳— ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›' ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳’'. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳•׳£ ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳׳ ׳’׳•׳£ ׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳—׳™׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳—׳•׳×] ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳“׳“ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳’׳ ׳׳§׳׳§׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“, ׳•׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳—"׳ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“].</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳›׳׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳¨׳›׳›׳• <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳›׳’׳¨׳•׳’׳¨׳×, ׳•׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳›׳’׳¨׳•׳’׳¨׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”"׳”. ׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>.
׳”׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳”׳×׳›׳” ׳׳• ׳׳’׳—׳׳×, ׳•׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳™׳§׳— ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳©׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳’׳—׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳. </small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳¡׳§"׳˜.</small></small>. ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳›׳× ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳”׳×׳›׳” ׳׳• ׳׳’׳—׳׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳–׳• <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳–, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳’ ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳‘"׳¦ ׳₪׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳—׳–׳¨׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'] ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳”׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨- ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳›׳—׳ ׳• ׳©׳ <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳™"׳‘, ׳™"׳“, ׳˜"׳•.</small></small>.  ׳”׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¡׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳¨׳׳© ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳–׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳›"׳‘ ׳”"׳— ׳•׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳¡׳§׳ "׳˜. ׳‘׳¨׳׳© ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”"׳” ׳©׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳›׳׳׳‘"׳“ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳“ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳׳‘"׳“, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳–׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳׳׳‘"׳“ ׳•׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳™ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳›׳•׳×. ׳•׳׳”׳׳›׳”, ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳›׳׳׳‘"׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳‘׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳ [׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳] ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳‘ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳ [׳•׳‘׳—"׳ ׳•׳‘׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳‘׳© ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳— ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳×׳›׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘.</small></small>- ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¡׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳׳£ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳›׳—׳ ׳• ׳©׳ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳™"׳“, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'.</small></small> [׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ "׳‘׳ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¡׳׳™" ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳‘' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳•'- ׳—'].
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳—׳× ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳׳—׳ ׳“' ׳׳• ׳”' ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳—׳“, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳— ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳›׳•׳‘׳© ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳, ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳©׳ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳˜' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳›׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳§׳©׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳¨׳›׳™׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳’'.
<h3> ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳“׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳©</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳”׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳—׳׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳©, ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳×׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳•׳“, ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳׳“׳× ׳—׳׳”.  ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳׳• ׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳—׳׳׳• ׳׳”"׳§׳•׳׳˜׳™׳", ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳”׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™ [׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳—] ׳•׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳¢׳–׳¨ [׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“].</small></small> ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳׳“׳× ׳—׳׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“] ׳•׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳“].</small></small>, ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳׳” ׳›׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳. </small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳–׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳×׳•׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳” ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳•׳“׳” ׳§׳׳” ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳.
׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳¨׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳—׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳© [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘"׳‘׳•׳™׳׳¨" !] ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳׳“׳× ׳—׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳’', ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳§׳˜׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™"׳–, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–.</small></small>, ׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳.
<h3> ׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳×׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳¨׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳×׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳•, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳©׳ ׳׳×׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳• <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳×׳•׳׳“׳•׳× ׳—׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳© ׳©׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳] ׳•׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳] ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳] ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–],  ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” [׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳¢׳] ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳© ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳"׳› ׳”"׳  ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳™׳¡׳‘׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳›׳], ׳•׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳–׳׳× ׳”׳•׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳], ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳© ׳©׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳›׳.  ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳—׳׳׳• ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳₪׳×׳—׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳¡׳₪׳™׳§׳• ׳׳”׳×׳—׳׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳›׳— ׳•׳™׳‘׳©׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳’, ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨. [׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳×׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳×׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳×׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜ ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳©׳ "׳׳׳׳›׳”"].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¡׳׳™, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳’׳׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳׳• <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳•. ׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¨׳×׳—׳• ׳׳׳© ׳©׳–׳”׳• ׳’׳׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳׳ <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ [׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳×׳• ׳׳”׳' ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳— ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¦"׳ ׳“׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳•], ׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳— ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳›׳“, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳”].  ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ '׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ ׳׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳•׳×׳—' ׳•׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳”׳׳›׳”, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ ׳"׳› ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳×׳—׳• ׳"׳› ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳׳ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ ׳׳¨׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳’׳׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳×׳™׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜', ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳× ׳›׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ ׳‘׳׳— ׳›׳׳׳‘"׳“ ׳‘׳™׳‘׳©, ׳•׳׳׳‘"׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳’׳׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳׳•.</small></small>].
׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳”] ׳”׳•׳ ׳›-45- 43 ׳׳¢׳׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳₪׳—׳•׳×.  ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳×׳—׳• ׳•׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'] ׳”׳•׳ ׳›- 71-79 ׳׳¢׳׳•׳× <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©- 71 ׳׳¢׳׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳ "׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳- 79 ׳׳¢׳׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ <b>׳™׳‘׳©</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳©׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳•׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳‘ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳• ׳×׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳— ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳.</small></small> [׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×].  ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ <b>׳׳—</b> ׳™׳© ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ (׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳• "׳׳’׳׳¨׳™")] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳×׳™׳—׳- ׳׳¨׳"׳. ׳•׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳×׳™׳—׳ <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳˜"׳•. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳— ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳’׳¨"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳©, ׳"׳ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳— ׳ ׳§׳˜׳• ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳›׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ [׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™]. </small></small>.
׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳•׳’׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳"׳›, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳§׳¨׳•׳’׳ ׳₪"׳“] ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳‘, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳׳•׳׳™ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳׳•׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳”׳• "׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—"</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳–׳׳™, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳‘׳— ׳‘׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳¡׳×׳™׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳“ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>.
׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳” [׳›׳׳• "׳§׳˜׳©׳•׳₪" ׳׳• "׳¨׳™׳‘׳”"] ׳׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™, ׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳”.</small></small> ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳–, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳—׳™׳׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳׳, ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳— ׳™׳© ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳‘׳— ׳‘׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳›׳׳ ׳ ׳§׳˜׳• ׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳–׳• ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳”.</small></small>.
׳§׳¨׳— ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳•׳© ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳₪׳©׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳—"׳› ׳•׳™׳”׳₪׳›׳• ׳׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳§. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¡'.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳©׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳˜"׳–.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳’׳•׳© ׳§׳¨׳— ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳•׳§׳₪׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳˜'.</small></small>. [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳§׳¨׳— ׳”׳׳¦׳˜׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳§׳¨׳— ׳©׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳©׳׳•].
<h3> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳—׳™׳× ׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳©, ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳—׳׳•׳—׳™׳× ׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳× <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳׳–׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳•׳‘, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳׳•. ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳¢׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¢׳•׳˜ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳•׳’׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳—, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳, ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“, ׳•׳‘׳"׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳“ ׳¡' ׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳– ׳©׳’"׳› ׳“׳—׳” ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨] ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳— ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’.</small></small> [׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳׳™׳], ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳©, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ! <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¢׳' ׳§׳₪׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳¢׳' ׳¡ ׳©׳‘׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳] ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳¦׳— ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳׳˜ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳׳׳•׳”"׳© ׳©׳].</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳—׳׳•׳—׳™׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳” ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“- ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳©׳].</small></small>.
׳›׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢׳™׳× ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳•׳—׳™׳× ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳” ׳©׳”׳¦׳˜׳‘׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” [׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳׳˜. ׳•׳”׳©׳•׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳•׳‘׳” ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳׳™׳׳˜׳¨ ׳•׳”׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳• ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳–׳”], ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳ "׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳™׳© ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳”. ['׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳'- ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳×׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳©, '׳׳₪׳™׳”'- ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳™׳.]</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳• ׳×׳₪׳•"׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳—׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ "׳׳₪׳™׳”" ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳• ׳“"׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳.</small></small>. ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ [׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ "׳—׳–׳¨׳”" ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×], ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳§׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳‘׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.
׳•׳©׳•׳¨׳© ׳”׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳×, ׳”׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳™׳©], ׳•׳ "׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳©׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳"׳› ׳¢׳×׳” ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳©׳‘׳— ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳©׳‘׳— ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳₪׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳‘׳— ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳₪׳•׳×.
׳•׳ "׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳‘׳— ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳©׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳×׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳— ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳, ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳–׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳™׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜.</small></small>.
׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳ "׳‘, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳¨׳™"׳’] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳™׳.
׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳©׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳”' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳™׳©, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>.  ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳×, ׳©׳׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳©׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳¡׳•׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳§׳“׳™ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳•׳׳‘׳§׳•׳× ׳§׳₪׳” ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳–׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳—' ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳–׳׳× ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳‘׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳•.
- ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳™׳ ["׳˜׳©׳•׳׳ ׳˜"] ׳©׳”׳¦׳˜׳׳§ ׳•׳”׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳© [׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳©׳• ׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳׳], ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘.
<h3> ׳¦׳׳™׳” ׳•׳˜׳™׳’׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳–. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳¦׳׳™׳”, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳, ׳׳ ׳™"׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳“ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳”׳©׳‘׳—׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳©׳‘׳—׳” ׳‘׳¦׳׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳׳“ ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳“ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳•׳¦׳׳™׳” ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳™׳” ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳™׳”.
['׳¦׳׳™׳”' ׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳© ׳׳• ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳, ׳•'׳׳₪׳™׳”' ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳׳׳™ ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳©].</small></small>.
׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳˜׳™׳’׳•׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳' ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳— ׳¡׳§׳ "׳•] ׳ ׳•׳˜׳” ׳©׳˜׳™׳’׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳“׳׳•׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳©׳™"׳ ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳”׳©׳‘׳—׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳•׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳’ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small> ׳׳•׳׳ ׳˜׳™׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳§ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳©׳׳• <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳¡"׳] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳—' ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳•'] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳’].</small></small>. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳©׳§׳“׳™ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳–׳׳, ׳•׳”׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳× ׳©׳§׳“׳™ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳©׳׳–׳’׳• ׳׳×׳•׳›׳” ׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳¦׳§׳× <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜ ׳©׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳׳¨׳§ ׳©׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳×׳•׳›׳” ׳׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳›׳׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳”׳ ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳, ׳•׳”׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳˜׳™׳’׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳˜׳™׳’׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳©׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳©׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›'.
<h3> ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳¨׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳.
׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳”׳׳›׳™׳ ׳×׳” ׳׳• ׳§׳₪׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳©׳§׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳” ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳₪׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ [׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳‘׳•] ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳•׳₪׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳“׳¨ "׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳"</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳• ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳©, ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳׳© ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©.
׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳•, ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳– ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small>.
׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳׳— ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳.</small></small> ׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳—׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳• <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳“.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳—׳–׳¨׳× ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳©׳ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳“׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ [׳׳¨׳"׳, ׳•׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳• <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳.</small></small>] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳׳• ׳”׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳•׳™׳×׳‘׳©׳׳•, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳׳×׳—׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳, [׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳”].</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ [׳׳¨׳"׳] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳׳¡׳™׳¨ [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳–׳¨׳” <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳׳™׳—׳–׳™ ׳›׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳×׳” ׳‘׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳‘׳•׳“׳“׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳–׳¨׳”.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳™</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳§׳— ׳׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳¨׳§ ׳©׳‘׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ [׳׳¨׳"׳] ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳×׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳׳• ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳•, ׳•׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳— ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™. ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳•, ׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳ "׳–], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳˜, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳¦׳— ׳•׳‘׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳' ׳×׳׳’ ׳•׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳•], ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡' ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳›׳¢׳™"׳–.</small></small>.  ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳—׳•׳× ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳¦"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳–, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳•׳₪׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳“ ׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳—׳•׳× ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳× ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳” [׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳” ׳•׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨] ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳”׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳ "׳•] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳•׳׳—׳׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳›׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳•׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— ׳¦׳•׳ ׳, ׳©׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳” <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳˜.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›'.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳— ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳”׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳ <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳ [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳×׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§"׳§ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳©׳׳×׳¨׳›׳ ׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳— ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳¢׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳‘׳©, ׳׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳ ׳©׳₪׳›׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳— ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳‘׳©׳™׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳—</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳— [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳§׳™׳׳•׳— ׳¨׳¦׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳] <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳“׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳׳” ׳©׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳׳—׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳™׳© ׳—׳™׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳׳¦׳ ׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳” ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“], ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳—׳•׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳”׳׳’"׳˜ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳•׳₪׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳•׳© ׳•׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳— ׳©׳‘׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳•׳¢ ׳׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳¢׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳•׳© ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ [׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳¡"׳”] ׳"׳› ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳— ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳.
׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳©"׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳¨׳•׳˜׳‘ ׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳§׳™׳׳•׳—, ׳"׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳©׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜' ׳¡׳§"׳” [׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳×׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©"׳ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¢׳× ׳•׳₪׳׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳•׳׳¢ ׳•׳₪׳•׳׳˜]. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳§׳¢"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳— <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳“.</small></small>.
׳”׳׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳•׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳” ׳©׳‘׳¦׳׳—׳×, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳— ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳©׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳¨׳"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳©"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳× <b>׳׳׳¦׳§׳×</b> [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳›׳׳™] ׳¢׳ ׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳¦׳׳—׳× [׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳•] ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳—"׳› ׳™׳©׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳§ ׳”׳¨׳•׳×׳— ׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳©׳§׳“׳™ ׳”׳׳¨׳§ ׳©׳‘׳¦׳׳—׳×, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳—- ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳£ ׳׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳¦׳׳—׳× [׳©׳™׳©׳₪׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳©׳₪׳ ׳‘׳׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳×] <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳—׳©׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳, ׳"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳©׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳×׳•׳›׳” ׳׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳§׳×</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳§׳× [׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳©׳׳‘׳• ׳‘׳• ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳] <b>׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳,</b> ׳•׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ <b>׳¨׳׳©׳•׳</b>, ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳›׳©׳׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ <b>׳©׳׳™׳©׳™</b> ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳–.</small></small>,  ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳–] ׳•׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘]. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳.</small></small> ׳©׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳§׳× ׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳₪׳™׳¨׳©׳•, ׳©׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳” [׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳׳׳¦׳§׳×] ׳™׳© ׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳₪׳× ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳“׳”"׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳¢"׳› ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳₪׳™' ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳.
׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳—׳™׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©, ׳•׳’׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ [׳›׳׳• ׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳׳×׳•׳¡' ׳¢"׳– ׳׳’: ׳•׳׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳: ׳•׳”׳×׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳›"׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©].
׳•׳‘׳”׳’׳“׳” ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳— ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳”׳–׳”׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳¨׳§ ׳©׳‘׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳׳׳¦׳§׳×, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳“, ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳©׳׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳£, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳£].</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳”׳׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳©׳§׳“׳™ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳•׳׳׳— ׳׳׳¨׳§. ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳” ׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳”׳¢׳׳” ׳¨׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳©׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳•׳׳‘ ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳•׳”׳—׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳‘, ׳•׳”׳©"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳₪"׳– ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳’"׳›, ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳©׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳×׳•׳›׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳׳” ׳¨׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×. </small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳•׳×.  ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“"׳” ׳׳, ׳©׳›׳©׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳"׳› ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘, ׳•׳"׳› ׳›׳©׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳©׳₪׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳׳— ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳— ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳׳×׳•׳›׳•, ׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳”׳©׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳™׳¨׳’׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳§׳¨׳¨׳• ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳—׳™׳׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ <b>׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳— ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳: ׳•׳“׳£ ׳׳‘: ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳: ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳“׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳©׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳: 
BB׳. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳׳‘׳©׳ <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳׳˜. ׳“"׳” ׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳•׳×׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳—׳–׳™ ׳›׳׳‘׳©׳ <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳×׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳—׳–׳™ ׳›׳׳‘׳©׳. ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳“. ׳•׳×׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳×׳§ ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ [׳×׳•׳¡' ׳׳˜. ׳“"׳” ׳›׳]. </small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳•׳׳”׳ "׳×׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳" <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳‘׳׳™׳ [׳•׳׳"׳‘ ׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳—׳©׳© ׳§׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳], ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳¢"׳“] ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳×׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳–׳ ׳’׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳₪׳₪׳¨׳™׳§׳” ׳©׳§׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ [׳‘׳”׳¢' ׳§׳¢"׳‘] ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳‘׳׳™׳. ׳‘׳¦׳ ׳•׳©׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳™׳, ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳˜.</small></small> [׳׳׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™].
׳‘. ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳§׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳”.</small></small> ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳‘׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳§׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳§׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳×׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳”׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳§׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳—. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.</small></small> ׳©׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳₪׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳ ׳•׳—׳” ׳׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳©׳ ׳•׳—׳” ׳׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳—׳©׳© ׳§׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳—׳©׳© ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ [׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳].
׳’. ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳• <sup>׳¢׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳¢׳' ׳¦׳—] ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳™׳“׳• ׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳•, ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳”׳™׳“ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳” ׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳•. </small></small>, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳×׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳• <sup>׳¢׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳— ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳›׳‘ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳‘׳˜׳™ ׳©׳׳‘׳©׳׳× ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳™"׳]. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘"׳™ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳• <sup>׳₪</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳•. ׳•׳©׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳— ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳•׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳]. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳• <sup>׳₪׳</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳• ׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳–׳• ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳× ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳×׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳’.
׳“. ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳§׳™׳׳•׳— ׳¨׳¦׳•׳£ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ [׳›׳’׳•׳: ׳§׳™׳׳•׳— ׳¨׳¦׳•׳£ ׳׳׳™׳—׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡]- ׳™׳© ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ <sup>׳₪׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳‘׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳™"׳‘ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳— ׳”׳¨׳¦׳•׳£ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳₪׳’</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳“׳§׳¨׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳. [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳— ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳¡׳׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳’.</small></small>.EE
<b>׳”׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”:</b> ׳׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳›׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ <b>׳¡׳•׳׳“׳×</b> ׳‘׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳•׳×׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ <b>׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳×</b> ׳‘׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳•.  ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ <b>׳¡׳•׳׳“׳×</b> ׳‘׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳•׳×׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ <b>׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳×</b> ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳§׳™׳׳•׳— ׳¨׳¦׳•׳£ ׳׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳¢"׳’ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳×׳—׳• ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ [׳׳¨׳"׳].
<h3> ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳₪׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳”] ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™, ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳”׳׳׳•.  ׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳—׳™׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳”׳׳׳” ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™׳•.</small></small>.  ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™ ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳”.
׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳©׳, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳—׳–׳™ ׳›׳׳‘׳©׳, ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳§׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳₪׳”</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳–. ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳§׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳— ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™.</small></small>.  ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳§׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳₪׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳˜, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳›"׳— ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳¡"׳˜] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳×׳” ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳§׳× ׳§׳₪׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳§׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳×׳‘׳©׳׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳₪׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳ ׳•׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳¡"׳˜ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. [׳•׳׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳§׳¦׳× ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳•׳›׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳‘׳™׳¦׳”].</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳₪׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳“ ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳– ׳©׳’"׳› ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳].</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳₪׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳‘׳”׳' ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¦׳— ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳.</small></small>.
׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳•׳© ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳¦</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳– ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“, ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳¢"׳’.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳×׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳™׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳™׳—׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳™׳‘׳©׳” ׳•׳™׳×׳ ׳׳×׳•׳›׳” ׳×׳׳¦׳™׳× <b>׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”</b> ׳©׳ ׳×׳” [׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳× <sup>׳¦׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳•׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳.</small></small>]. ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳×׳׳¦׳™׳× ׳—׳׳”, ׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳¢׳׳™ ׳×׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© <sup>׳¦׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳, ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›"׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳›"׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳©. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳.  ׳¢׳׳™ ׳×׳” ׳”׳ ׳§׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳™׳—׳.
׳׳—׳–׳•"׳- ׳™׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳™׳—׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳™׳‘׳©׳” ׳•׳׳׳ ׳” ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳™׳‘׳©׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳•׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳×׳׳¦׳™׳× ׳×׳” ׳•׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳׳¦׳™׳× ׳”׳×׳”, ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳¦׳” <sup>׳¦׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳“׳§׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳•. ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳™׳© ׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳§׳™׳׳•׳— ׳¨׳¦׳•׳£ ׳׳”׳׳™׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳©׳©׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳•, ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ [׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™] ׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳›׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳×׳׳¦׳™׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳¦׳ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳•׳©</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳•׳© <sup>׳¦׳“</sup><small><small>׳’׳¨׳’׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳¨׳– ׳”׳¦׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳›׳™׳ ׳›׳¨׳•׳˜׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳•׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳›"׳›, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳“׳‘׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳•׳© [׳©"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳” ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳—. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™].</small></small> ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ <sup>׳¦׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳”, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳— ׳•׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳׳•׳×׳•. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳©"׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳—, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳“ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ [׳•׳›׳ "׳] ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳×׳₪׳•"׳ ׳—׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳—׳ ׳‘׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳• ׳¨׳•׳˜׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ <sup>׳¦׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™, ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳ ׳—׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳˜׳‘ ׳׳• ׳”׳׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳‘׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳׳— ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳•׳© ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”"׳§׳•׳’׳" ׳׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¥ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳’׳ ׳—׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳– ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳¦׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳™ ׳₪׳™׳©׳¨ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–], ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” [׳©׳].  ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳”׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¥ ׳”׳™׳” "׳›׳‘׳•׳©", ׳•׳›׳‘׳•׳© ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳©׳, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— [׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳•] ׳“׳›׳‘׳•׳© ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳ ׳•׳‘׳™"׳× ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡'.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳•׳©.
׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• <sup>׳¦׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳— ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳§"׳–. [׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳ ׳›׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳’׳™׳¡</h3>
<b>׳›׳”</b>. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳‘</b> ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ <b>׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳׳©</b> ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳• <sup>׳¦׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳©׳™"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳’׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳¢"׳’ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳—׳˜׳׳× ׳•׳”׳§׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ [׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳—] ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳—׳˜׳׳× ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳”׳׳’׳™׳¡, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳©׳׳’׳™׳¡ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳’ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳§׳¦׳× ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳”"׳  ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳’׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳¡׳•׳’ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳‘ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ <b>׳©׳”׳•׳¡׳¨</b> ׳׳”׳׳© ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳• [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳•, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳] <sup>׳§</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳™"׳— ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳‘׳›׳£ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“׳× ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳¡׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳׳© ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳• <sup>׳§׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳™"׳–.</small></small>.
׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳›׳£ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳¢"׳’ ׳”׳׳© ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳—׳׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳¢"׳’ ׳”׳׳© ׳™׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳׳© ׳׳• ׳™׳–׳™׳– ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳₪׳׳˜׳× ׳₪׳— ["׳‘׳׳¢׳"] ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳׳© ׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳© [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳–] ׳•׳©׳ ׳™׳§׳— ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳™׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳” ׳׳׳© ׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳—׳–׳¨׳”. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳§׳™׳׳• <sup>׳§׳‘</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small> ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳’׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳• ׳§׳˜׳•׳׳” ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳©, ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳£ <b>׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳×</b> ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳• [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳‘׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳•׳×׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳§׳×, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳§׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳.</small></small>].
[׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳’׳•, ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳›׳•׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳•, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳© ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ <sup>׳§׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳– ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳›׳©׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳’׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳, ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳›"׳“ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘' ׳™׳׳™ ׳™׳•"׳› ׳›׳©׳—׳ ׳™׳•"׳› ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”'.
׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳’׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳™"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳“׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳׳׳‘"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨"׳› ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ [׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳×׳‘׳©׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳×׳¨׳›׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳‘' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘']. ׳•׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳’"׳› ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳¡׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳׳’׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳§</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳£ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳—׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳׳© <sup>׳§׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳– ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ [׳•׳‘׳“׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳₪׳©"׳ ׳“׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳׳©], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳–׳¨ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳˜ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳"׳‘]. </small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳׳¨׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳×. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳£ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳™׳¡ <sup>׳§׳•</sup><small><small>׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳™׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳×, ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳¨׳§ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳׳©.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳—׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳©׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳–</b>. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳׳›׳ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ <sup>׳§׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™, ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳˜"׳•].</small></small> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳© ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳×׳—׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳—׳׳׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳×׳‘׳©׳׳• <sup>׳§׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳™"׳“, ׳˜"׳•.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳• [׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳׳©] ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¡׳׳™ <sup>׳§׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳—׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳™׳—׳ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™</h3>
<b>׳›׳—</b>. ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳—׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳׳˜׳× ׳₪׳— ["׳‘׳׳¢׳"] ׳•׳‘׳׳™׳—׳ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™:
BB׳. ׳׳™׳—׳ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳¨׳•׳§׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳—׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳×׳• ׳׳§׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳—׳ ׳•׳™׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳§׳™</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳§׳™"׳—, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> [׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳—׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳׳˜׳× ׳₪׳— ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳©, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳§׳™׳׳§׳•׳], ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳”׳׳™׳—׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳“׳™ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳§׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳׳¢׳˜׳• ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳×׳” ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳—׳.</small></small>.
׳‘. ׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳—׳ ׳׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳›׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳—׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳™׳× ׳¨׳×׳—׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳׳¨׳"׳] ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳—׳ ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳™׳× ׳™׳›׳ ׳¡׳• ׳׳׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳¨׳×׳—׳• ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳¨׳×׳—׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳×׳—׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳• ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳—"׳›, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳™׳× ׳›׳©׳™׳›׳ ׳¡׳• ׳׳׳™׳—׳ <sup>׳§׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳—, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳¢׳“].</small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘' ׳”׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳—׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨.
׳’. ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳, ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳—׳ <b>׳—׳©׳׳׳™</b> ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳© ׳’׳׳•׳™׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ <sup>׳§׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳‘"׳¦ ׳₪׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳ ׳×׳׳₪׳™׳•׳× ׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳©׳ ׳” ׳×׳©׳¡"׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳—׳ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳›׳’׳¨׳•׳£ ׳•׳§׳˜׳•׳ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳‘' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'].
׳“. ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳—׳ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™ <sup>׳§׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳›׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ [׳”׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳™׳—׳] ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳—׳ ׳•׳¢"׳™ ׳›׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳—׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳×׳™ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳.</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”] ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳×׳—׳• ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© <sup>׳§׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳¢"׳’ ׳׳© ׳’׳׳•׳™׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’, ׳'], ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳‘' ׳¡"׳’].</small></small>, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ <sup>׳§׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨"׳×, ׳•׳›' ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳©׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›"׳›.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳—׳ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳© ׳’׳׳•׳™׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳׳© ׳’׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳•׳§׳˜׳•׳׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳׳§ ׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳׳•.EE
