<h3> ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳–, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳—.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— <b>׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳•׳© <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳•׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳’"׳› ׳׳‘׳©׳, ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳•, ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳– ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳”] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳•, ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳×׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳•.</small></small></b> ׳©׳”׳•׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳’׳' [׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳.] ׳₪׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳׳™׳—׳ ׳׳׳™׳—׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳¦׳ ׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳. [׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ (׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳’) ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳• ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳¨׳×׳™׳— ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳ ׳ ׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳ [׳•׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳׳•׳¡ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘] ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳’ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳˜׳¨׳׳•׳¡ (׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳” ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳–׳• ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳׳ ׳›׳)].</small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳© <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳— ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜.</small></small> ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳•.
[ <b>׳׳</b> ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳×, ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳– ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳›׳™ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳¨׳“ ׳׳—׳•׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳¨׳×׳™׳— ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳™ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘ ׳›׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›"׳› ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳”.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳˜׳¨׳×׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” [׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳•׳×] ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳”, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳–, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳•, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” [׳¨׳ "׳–, ׳”'] ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳˜׳¨׳׳•׳¡.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¦׳×</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳–.</small></small> ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳’׳•׳׳” [׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¦׳×], ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳”׳™׳׳•׳× <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳“] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳—, ׳ "׳˜, ׳§׳¦"׳”] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳©׳‘׳•"׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳•׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳›' ׳׳•׳× ׳‘]. ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ [׳—"׳‘ ׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳•׳× ׳™] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳”׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¦׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳•.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.</small></small>.
׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳—׳× ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳© ׳׳’׳•׳׳” ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳׳˜׳” ׳—׳©׳׳׳™׳× [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳׳§ ׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳׳•, ׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳›׳©׳‘׳׳• ׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳™׳” ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’, ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳•, ׳•׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳ ׳§׳˜ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¡׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳”׳•׳×. ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳‘' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small>], ׳׳£ ׳׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳’- ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳–, ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳–- ׳•׳׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳’׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳™׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¦׳×</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳’׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳—׳׳§ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳•׳׳” <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳•׳׳” <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳”׳’׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳’׳“׳• ׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳›׳– ׳‘׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳©׳ ׳׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™], ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳•׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¦׳× <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳“] ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳•׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¦׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳–, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳¢׳ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳¨׳—׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳•׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳× ׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ [׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳׳” ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳× ׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳”- ׳׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¦׳×], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳×׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳”׳™׳”, ׳¢׳™' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳‘' ׳¡"׳’].
׳”׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳”׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳©׳ ׳™].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳×׳₪׳•׳’ ׳¦׳™׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳–, ׳•'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳× ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳× ׳™׳—׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳× ׳•׳׳”׳¦׳׳™׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳× ׳•׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳× ׳×׳×׳—׳׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳—׳•׳ ׳—׳“׳© ׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳× ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳• ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳× ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳–׳• ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳× ׳©׳×׳×׳—׳׳ ׳©׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳.</small></small> [׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳× ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨].
<h3> ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳—׳</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳— ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳—׳ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳—׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳, ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳–, ׳•', ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳—׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳¢"׳₪ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳–, ׳•' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳©׳׳™׳.</small></small> ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳•. [׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳– ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳].</small></small>, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ <b>׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×</b>. [׳•׳׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳’׳•׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'].
׳•׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳₪׳™׳’ ׳¦׳™׳ ׳×׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳׳׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳–.</small></small>.
׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳׳›׳ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳£ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳׳ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳•, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳×׳ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳§׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳”.</small></small>.
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳›׳׳• ׳›׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳¨׳•׳ "׳§׳•׳’׳" ׳׳• "׳§׳™׳©׳§׳¢" ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳׳×׳—׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳׳™׳ <b>׳׳£ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×</b> ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳•׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ (׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×׳• ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳˜׳•׳£ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“).</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳›׳¨׳™׳›׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳’׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳₪׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳׳• <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳¡"׳’, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳₪׳™"׳– ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳¢׳™"׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳׳• ׳’׳™׳׳”׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳•׳‘.</small></small> ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳’׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳–׳• [׳”׳׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳× ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨] ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳¡׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳–, ׳“' ׳•׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘"׳˜׳¨׳׳•׳¡" ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳—׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳˜׳¨׳׳•׳¡ ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳”׳˜׳¨׳׳•׳¡, ׳׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳–] ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'], ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳›׳‘] ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™"׳ [׳—׳™"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳˜] ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™, ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳”] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳¦׳ ׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¨׳׳•׳¡ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™], ׳›׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘', ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳¡׳”׳• ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳׳›׳׳.
׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳’] ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳”׳˜׳¨׳׳•׳¡ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳– ׳©׳₪׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳׳•׳¡, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨׳©"׳™ [׳•׳›׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳], ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ "׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳—'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳׳׳›׳ ׳¢׳˜׳•׳£ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳—׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳˜׳•׳£ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳›׳¡׳£ [׳׳• ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳] ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳™׳—׳ [׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳׳˜׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳™׳—׳ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'.</small></small>] ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳¢׳˜׳™׳₪׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳—׳•׳׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳] ׳׳•׳¡׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳׳›׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ [׳‘׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳”], ׳׳‘׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳” ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳”. ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳–, ׳”'] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳׳›׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳₪׳•׳¨׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳™</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳’׳•׳£ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳ ׳—׳× ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”"׳¡׳™׳¨", ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳ "׳©׳”׳™׳”" ׳‘׳• <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳© ׳’׳׳•׳™׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳‘' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™', ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳© ׳’׳׳•׳™׳” ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small>, ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳. ׳•׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¨׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¨׳•׳•׳— ׳§׳˜׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳₪׳ ׳™׳׳™׳×, ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳•׳. ׳׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳. ׳׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳× ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™׳¨, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳×׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳‘׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ [׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’] ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳™׳”׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳– ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¦׳× [׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳׳×׳•׳›׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳₪׳— ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳™׳¨].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳׳׳׳™׳•</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳׳׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳•׳₪׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳”׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳” ׳׳׳׳™׳” ׳•׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳”], ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳׳׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ [׳•׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳ ׳—׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳©], ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” [׳•׳’׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳], ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳׳׳׳™׳• <b>׳‘׳’׳—׳׳™׳</b> ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳×׳” ׳‘׳’׳—׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳‘' ׳©׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳—׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳’׳—׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳—׳×׳” ׳‘׳”׳, ׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳׳× ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳×׳• ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳•׳™׳¨׳×׳™׳—׳ ׳”, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳©׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳× ׳‘׳’׳—׳׳™׳. ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳“"׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳• ׳׳¡׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳׳׳׳™׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜- ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳—׳•׳]. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳’ ׳׳©"׳› ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳—׳–׳¨׳”. (׳•׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳’׳– ׳•׳”׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳׳׳׳™׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳—׳©׳© ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳—׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳—׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳”׳׳©).</small></small>.
׳•׳"׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳™׳× ׳¢׳™׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳¦׳–].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ <b>׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×</b> ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳•׳”׳×׳—׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳, ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’, ׳•׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“, ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳–, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳™׳©. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳’' ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ "׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳".</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳—׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳—׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small>.
׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ <b>׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</b> ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳•׳”׳×׳—׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳, ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳‘׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳₪׳׳©"׳› ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¨׳׳¥ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳׳¥ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘ ׳©׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳×.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳—׳, ׳¦"׳¢ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳– ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>.
׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳, ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳, ׳•׳׳׳›׳ ׳—׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳—׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ [׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—].</small></small>.
׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳•׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳©׳‘׳—׳” ׳׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳•. [׳•׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳] <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳×׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳’' ׳”׳¢' ׳¢"׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳¢׳“ 11 ׳“׳§' ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>13.5 ׳“׳§' ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳¦׳׳”"׳› ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳” ׳•׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜.</small></small> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳–, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳¨׳•׳×׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳›"׳› ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳×׳• ׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳” ׳•׳™׳¨׳×׳™׳—׳ ׳”.</small></small>. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳›.</small></small>, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳” ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳.
RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳” - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨</h2>
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ <sup>׳</sup><small><small> ׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳–׳” ׳™׳×׳•׳§׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳”, ׳"׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳. [׳•׳‘׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳]. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳×׳• ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× [׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™', ׳•׳›׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳׳˜: ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳™׳], ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳“׳£ ׳§׳•.] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳׳™׳׳” ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳© ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳”׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳”"׳” ׳׳–׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳“׳׳”׳׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳”, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳×׳•׳§׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳•׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳ ׳‘׳”׳›׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳¦׳"׳’.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳׳™ [׳”׳•׳‘׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳׳§׳˜] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳׳§׳˜ ׳¦׳¨׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳˜ ׳׳× ׳”׳¦׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳, ׳•׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ [׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳”׳׳’"׳˜- ׳–׳•׳¨׳” ׳¡׳§"׳].
׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳›׳ [׳׳™׳•׳] ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳•׳” ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳“"׳” ׳”׳™׳• [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳], ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳“"׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ "׳— ׳׳•׳¡׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳•׳’׳¨׳× ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳•, ׳©׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳×׳™׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳©׳׳¨.
׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳¦׳“ ׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳ ׳§׳˜ ׳–׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳ ׳“׳׳™׳׳×׳ ׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳•׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳‘׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳”׳™׳• ׳©׳›׳©׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳“׳׳£ ׳©׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳׳,  ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳›׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳” ׳›׳™ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳•׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳©׳"׳› ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳”׳™׳• [׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳].  ׳•׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳.</small></small> ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•. (׳•׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳—"׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳˜"׳– ׳¡"׳ ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳׳×׳•׳¡' ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳” ׳׳”׳׳›׳”. ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳”׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨).</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× [׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳• <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳“. ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳•׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’'.</small></small>] ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳' ׳•׳”׳§׳“׳׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳”׳• "׳›׳׳™"</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳’׳“׳¨ "׳›׳׳™" - ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳׳›׳׳›׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳“ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small> ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳§׳™׳—׳” ׳‘׳›׳£ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳¡"׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳¦"׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳”׳›׳£ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳™׳“׳• ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳– ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳›׳™׳“׳ ׳׳¨׳™׳›׳×׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳£ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳§׳׳× ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ (׳•׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳©׳§׳”, ׳©׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳”. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳§׳ "׳— ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳—׳׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳”), ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳“ (׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳›׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•' ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳”"׳” ׳׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳). ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳• ׳•׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳”.  ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳—׳™׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳£ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳© ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳£ ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳–׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳—׳™׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳£ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳›׳£ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳” ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳× ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×׳• ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.  [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳, ׳™"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳©׳–׳” ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳”]. </small></small> [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳— ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳×׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳›׳™׳].
׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™- ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳™׳“, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳₪׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳׳× ׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” [׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳×] ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳•׳¡׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳—, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳˜.</small></small>.
׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳¨׳§ "׳™׳“׳ ׳׳¨׳™׳›׳×׳" ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳. ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¢׳' ׳§׳ ׳˜ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. </small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¦׳׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” [׳©׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×, ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳’].
<h3> ׳׳”׳• "׳׳™׳“"</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳’׳“׳¨ "׳׳™׳“" - ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳• ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳” <sup>׳—</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳“, ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳, ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳—׳˜׳׳× ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” '׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•'.
׳•׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ "׳׳™׳“" ׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳”- ׳›׳ ׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§"׳•, ׳׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳›׳¨׳’׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳.  </small></small>. ׳•׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳–׳•, ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳’׳•׳“׳׳” <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳˜, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳’, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳₪"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳›׳× ׳׳׳©׳₪׳—׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳• ׳׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳׳©׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳›׳–׳׳×. ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• [׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳]. [׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳׳–'׳, ׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳׳× ׳׳׳™׳”׳• ׳‘׳—׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳’.</small></small> ׳©׳‘׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳”׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳™׳—׳“, ׳׳׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳׳•׳¦׳¢׳× ׳©׳”׳–׳׳ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳¢׳” <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳“׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳×. ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ !] <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳‘׳׳©׳₪׳—׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” [׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“, ׳׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳•׳›׳•'], ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳©׳₪׳—׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳›׳–׳׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳"׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©" ׳•׳©׳׳•׳ ׳–׳›׳¨</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”.
׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳× ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳₪׳™׳ ׳—׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳“׳™ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ [׳›׳׳• ׳‘"׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™׳" ׳©׳¢׳•׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳׳• ׳‘"׳©׳׳•׳ ׳–׳›׳¨"], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¡׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¡׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.

<h3> ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳₪׳•׳’ ׳׳× ׳”׳˜׳¢׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳–׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳£ ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳‘׳©׳׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳× <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳× ׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳¨' [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳—' ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳§׳©׳” ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ [׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳”"׳§ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳•׳¢׳“ ׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳' ׳”"׳—] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳׳×׳¨.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳—' ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳”׳• "׳׳•׳›׳"</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳’׳“׳¨ "׳׳•׳›׳" - ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳•. ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳•.
׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳›׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳–׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳™׳׳›׳׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳“, ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¨׳×׳• ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘, ׳•׳–"׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳׳×׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳׳×"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳׳© ׳”׳•׳”, ׳׳₪׳™' ׳”׳›׳™ ׳›׳ ׳©׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳“׳™׳“׳™׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳–׳›׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳™"׳ ׳“׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳׳×׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳׳§ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳•. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small> ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳•׳׳™׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳• ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳•.
׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳’"׳› ׳׳—׳“׳© ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳ ׳©׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳“׳™׳“׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳׳×׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳¢׳•׳£ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ (׳׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“) ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ (׳•׳›׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳), ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳“׳™׳“׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳׳›׳. ׳•׳"׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳¦"׳¢ ׳“׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳›׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳–׳”. ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’.</small></small>, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳™' ׳‘׳¨׳"׳. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳' ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳˜: ׳“׳‘׳׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™ ׳׳™׳©׳×׳×׳™. ׳•׳‘׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©.</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳ <b>׳›׳</b> ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ <b>׳¨׳•׳‘</b> ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳–׳• ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘"׳— ׳•׳‘׳׳׳™׳” ׳¨׳‘׳” ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳›׳׳•׳”׳• [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•] ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳“, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳×׳™׳”. ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳¦׳׳×׳™ ׳‘׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×] ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳›׳¡׳ ׳™׳£ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳”׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©.</small></small>].
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳<b>:</b> ׳׳™׳¥ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™, ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳׳™׳© ׳”׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳¥ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳‘ ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳–׳”.</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×.
׳׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳– ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳•׳×. <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small> ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳"׳¦ ׳—"׳‘ ׳₪׳"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳—.</small></small> [׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳¥ ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳— ׳•׳”׳¢׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™, ׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳“].
<h3> ׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× "׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×"</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ <b>׳”׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“</b>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳ "׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×" <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳’'. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳’ ׳“"׳” ׳˜"׳– ׳•׳׳’"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳.</small></small>. <b>׳׳׳ ׳ ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ [׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳×׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳™] ׳׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳›׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳™׳—׳“, <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small> ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡' ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× [׳—"׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳₪׳˜] ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳׳—׳“ ׳©׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳’׳“׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳•׳— ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳›׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳•. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳' ׳×׳₪׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×.</small></small> ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳•׳×, ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳”׳§׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳”</b>.
׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳‘ <b>׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳×</b>, ׳•׳׳׳©׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ <b>׳׳¡׳•׳“׳¨׳×</b> ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨.

<h3> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳"׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×" ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ "׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×"</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b>
BB<b>׳.</b> ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳—׳× ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳× ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳›׳•"׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳§׳™"׳“] ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳’׳“׳™׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘"׳§׳‘׳•׳¦׳”" ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×.</small></small>.
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳•׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥. <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small> ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳₪"׳› ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨׳ ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×, ׳”׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳§׳•׳ ' ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳’ [׳”׳•׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳׳’].</small></small>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳—׳•׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳‘׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×, ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× [׳׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳–׳”] <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small> ׳’׳“׳¨ ׳¡׳׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳•׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳× ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳× ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳"׳¦ ׳—"׳‘ ׳₪׳"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳.  ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ [׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳] ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳•׳¡׳—׳׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳—׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳›׳©׳׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳• ׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳•.
׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳—׳•׳׳© ׳•׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳, ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× [׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•] <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×.</small></small>.
<b>׳“.</b> ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” !], ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳× [׳›׳׳• ׳׳₪׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳ ׳¡] ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳¡׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳”, ׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“, ׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳.  ׳•׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳׳© ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳‘׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¥] ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳₪׳׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ [׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳₪"׳• ׳”׳¢' ׳¢׳¨"׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳] ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳’ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘ ׳©׳¦׳£ ׳¢"׳’ ׳”׳׳™׳.  ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳© ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳’], ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™.
׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳” ׳©׳׳™׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳×, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳•׳“׳“׳•׳× ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳׳™׳§׳— ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳™׳“׳, ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳•׳“׳“׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳™׳“׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳, ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳’׳ ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×].
<b>׳”.</b> ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳˜׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ "׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳”" ׳׳• "׳׳‘׳" ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳•׳׳©׳•׳₪׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳•] ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳•׳׳ ׳׳— ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳‘, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×׳• ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳₪׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳•׳‘׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳›' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳¦׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨].</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳׳‘׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳•.
<b>׳•.</b> ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳× ׳’׳–׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳§׳¦׳™׳¦׳× ׳“׳’ ["׳’׳₪׳™׳׳˜׳¢ ׳₪׳™׳©"] ׳׳• ׳“׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳¡׳׳˜ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×, ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”"׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×" ג€“ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳”  <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small> ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™, ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳•׳׳ ׳©׳¦׳£ ׳¢"׳’ ׳”׳—׳׳‘, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳§׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳©׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳§׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳’׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳’׳©׳×׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×.</small></small>.
<b>׳–.</b> ׳×׳•׳׳¢׳× ׳©׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳. <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small> ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳×׳•׳׳¢׳× ׳׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™- ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳©"׳› ׳‘׳”׳¢' ׳§׳˜"׳– ׳©׳”"׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳׳•׳× [׳׳£ ׳©׳׳›׳׳•' ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳§]. ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳›׳ ׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ (׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳ ׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳×).</small></small>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳’׳‘׳™׳¢׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳¦׳₪׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳׳•׳× ׳¡׳׳˜׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳›׳•׳× ׳–׳• ׳׳–׳• ׳•׳׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳׳™׳“, <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small> ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳—' ׳׳•׳× ׳’] ׳©׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×, ׳׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳׳•׳× ׳¡׳׳˜׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳“׳₪׳™ ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳•.</small></small> ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¦׳₪׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳' ׳•׳׳•׳× ׳’' .EE
<h3> ׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× "׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳"</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳—׳§. <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•. ׳•׳›׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§"׳› (׳•׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳) ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳"׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳"׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳“"׳” ׳”׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳›׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳“׳—׳§. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳׳©׳‘"׳– ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>
׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“, ׳׳™ ׳©׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳™׳ [׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳¢׳•׳£ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳׳–׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳•׳‘] ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳’׳‘׳™׳• ׳׳” ׳©׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small> ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ [׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳›] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳“׳™׳“׳• ׳ ׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳“׳—׳§. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳›׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳×׳™׳§ ׳—׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳–׳” ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳¡"׳ ׳”׳›׳™, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳“׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳˜׳׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳’׳‘׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳¡"׳ ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳›׳”"׳— ׳”׳¢׳×׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳׳”׳׳›׳”. ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳›׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳¦׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳”׳›׳™, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳× ׳— ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳ ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳©׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘' ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳© ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳”, ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘.
׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳¡׳×׳׳×׳™ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳×׳™ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳•. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳׳§׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’].
׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳— ׳‘׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳©׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳"׳‘.</small></small>. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳–׳”].
BB׳. ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳“׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳©׳ ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳©׳×׳™ ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳—׳× ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳× ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳×׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small>.
׳‘. ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳¢׳•׳£ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳, ׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳™', ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳”, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳₪׳™"׳’ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡' ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳'].</small></small>. [׳•׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳£ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳”].
׳’. ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳. <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳™.</small></small> ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳”, ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§׳™ ׳©׳×׳™׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳“׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳׳ [׳”׳’׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳×׳™ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“] ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳, ׳•׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳›׳–׳” ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳“. ׳—׳׳׳•׳ ׳•׳—׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳”, ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳— ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳“"׳” ׳”׳™׳•.</small></small>.EE
<h3> ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳™׳×׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳</b>. ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳• ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳•׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” [׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳] ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ "׳›׳₪׳•׳׳•׳×" ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳§ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” [׳•׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳• ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳™׳¨׳—׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳₪׳¨"׳— ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳§ ׳©׳], ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨"׳— ׳©׳ ׳•׳”׳׳ "׳— ׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳×׳• ׳•׳”׳׳’׳׳™ ׳˜׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳¡׳§"׳›, ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳₪׳™ ׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳— ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳–׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳© ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳”׳¢׳“׳₪׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” (׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳¡׳•- ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—' ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”) [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳‘. ׳•׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡"׳’ ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳]. 
׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳× ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳˜"׳– ׳׳•׳× ׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳×׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳, ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳×׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¢' ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§'.</small></small>. [׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳—, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳“ ׳׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳—, ׳׳™ ׳©׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳¡׳ ׳, ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳“׳‘׳׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™ ׳׳™׳©׳×׳×׳™ ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳”. ׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳, ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳”"׳” ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳. ׳•׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳׳™׳×׳™ ׳׳—׳׳¥ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳¦׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳¦׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳¥ ׳™׳–׳¨׳•׳§ ׳”׳›׳ [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳”] ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳¦׳ ׳—׳׳¥ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳׳•׳, ׳•׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳–׳• ׳׳¦׳׳ ׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ (׳¢׳' ׳¨׳¡׳•) ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳‘׳’׳' ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳“׳£ ׳ . ׳׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳“׳ ׳¡׳ ׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳’׳•׳׳” ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳¡׳›׳• ׳‘׳׳–׳‘׳—, ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳, ׳•׳׳‘׳•' ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳™׳׳¦׳ ׳׳¨׳¡ ׳™׳–׳¨׳•׳§ ׳”׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳¦׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳›׳׳.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘</b>. ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳™׳“ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳× ׳¢׳©׳•׳¨ ׳₪"׳ ׳”"׳™ ׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳, ׳©׳—׳׳׳•׳ ׳•׳—׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳‘׳™׳‘׳©.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¥ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳•׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳ ׳©׳¦׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳‘ [׳׳• ׳”׳׳¨׳§] ׳׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳¨׳™ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳•׳¦׳§׳™׳ [׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳”, ׳׳©׳, ׳׳‘׳].
<h3> ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳¦׳§׳× [׳׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¨]</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳›׳©׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳”, ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳•׳¨׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳₪׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small> ׳›׳©׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳׳¨׳×, ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳“"׳” ׳׳©׳׳¨׳× ׳“׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳¨׳“ ׳׳׳˜׳” ׳•׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳× ׳׳׳¢׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳©׳©׳₪׳™׳›׳× ׳©׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳˜׳‘ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳׳•׳›׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳“. ׳“׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳“"׳” ׳‘׳§׳ ׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳₪׳ ׳•׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳× ׳•׳‘׳“"׳” ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™׳׳” [׳©׳“׳¢׳× ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™׳׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳“- ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳“' ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳” ׳׳”׳' ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨].  ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳¦"׳¢ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳×׳• ׳׳”׳' ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳§׳‘׳™ ׳”׳›׳‘׳¨׳” ׳“׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳¡ [׳•׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳ ׳•׳₪׳׳×] ׳•׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳•׳, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×, ׳•׳‘׳“׳•׳—׳§ ׳™"׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳׳– ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× [׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨׳× ׳׳ ׳₪׳” ׳•׳›׳‘׳¨׳”]. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳׳׳•׳ ׳•׳—׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳˜"׳¡ ׳•׳׳›׳"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–. ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳׳™ ׳˜׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳”׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨׳× ׳׳ ׳₪׳”, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳” ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳” ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳׳¨׳× ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳•׳¨׳“ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¨, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳ ׳›׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳£ ׳׳• ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳§, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¢׳•׳£ ׳׳• ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳‘׳”׳, ׳©׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳₪׳›׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳§׳× ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘'.
<h3> ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳©׳›׳‘׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳˜׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳¢׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳׳©׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳©] ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳©׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳׳˜׳”. <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small>
׳•׳‘׳©׳׳©׳” ׳×׳ ׳׳™׳: 
BB׳. ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳׳˜׳”.
׳‘. ׳׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳‘׳•׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳, ׳›׳׳” ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳׳‘ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳₪׳ ׳™׳׳™].
׳’. ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ "׳׳•׳›׳" ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳× ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳, ׳–׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳” ׳©׳׳׳˜׳”. ׳•׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳ ׳“׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳׳©, ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳›׳‘׳•׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳“' ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¢"׳– ׳׳©"׳› ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳.</small></small>. EE
<h3> ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳• ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳›.</small></small>. ׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳©׳—׳׳§׳• ׳¨׳§׳•׳‘, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳¨׳§׳•׳‘ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨, <sup>׳ </sup><small><small> ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳¨׳§׳•׳‘ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘, ׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳“"׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳¨׳§׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳•׳˜׳£ ׳׳× ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳§׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳©׳׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳™' ׳‘' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳•.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳”׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§׳× ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳”, <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small> ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳׳•׳× ׳• ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘ ׳©׳¦׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳”׳׳™׳ [׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳׳•, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳×׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳‘׳˜׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ [׳׳׳ ׳©׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡ ׳׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳—׳™׳¦׳×׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳׳•׳¡ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳”׳›׳•׳¡].</small></small>], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳¨׳™ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳₪׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳”"׳׳‘׳".
׳›׳׳• ׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳, <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘ [׳•׳”׳©׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳, ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳׳” ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳©׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳§׳— ׳•׳›׳•' ׳¢׳™"׳©].</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳”׳׳•׳›׳, <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small> ׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳“׳›׳ ׳”׳ "׳, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘.

׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳’׳© ׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳¦׳¨׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳’׳© ׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘.</small></small> ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳’׳© ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× [׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳]. <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small> ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳© ׳‘׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳×.</small></small>
׳‘׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳•, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳’׳© ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳“ <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳›, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳.</small></small>.
׳׳׳ ׳, ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳׳• ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳–׳‘׳•׳‘ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳. <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small> ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳’. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳–׳‘׳•׳‘ ׳׳‘׳“׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳¢׳׳•, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ [׳•׳’׳ ׳׳"׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳”] ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳.</small></small>.
׳׳£ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳–׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳¢׳ <b>׳”׳¨׳‘׳”</b> ׳׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳¢׳™׳׳• ׳›׳׳.
<h3> ׳¡׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳¦׳“ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳× ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳—׳× ׳”׳¦׳₪׳” ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳׳¨׳§, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¦׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳§׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳‘׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳§׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳©׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ "׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳”" <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨׳•. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳‘׳—׳×׳™׳›׳× ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳—׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳”׳–׳–׳×׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× [׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳] ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳×׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳ ׳•׳—׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳₪׳© ׳–׳•׳’ ׳’׳¨׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳–׳•׳’׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳§ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳”.
׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳¨׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳‘׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳’׳‘׳™׳”׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳—׳×׳• ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–', ׳•׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳“׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳– ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳׳” ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳–׳–׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳× "׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳”".
<h3> ׳—׳™׳₪׳•׳© ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳× ׳—׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳× ׳—׳׳™׳ ["׳˜׳©׳•׳׳ ׳˜"] ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳₪׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× [׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×], ׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳—׳₪׳© ׳”׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳”׳‘׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳׳¦׳׳ ׳• ׳™׳§׳— ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳” ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳”׳›׳™ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳™׳₪׳•׳© ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳׳¦׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳™׳׳›׳׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳•.</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳× ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳–׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳–, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳£ ׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳™׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳£ ׳•׳×׳›׳•׳׳×׳” ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳›׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳‘׳›׳£. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳›׳£. ׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳–׳• ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳–׳” ׳׳׳™׳”׳• [׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳§׳™׳—׳× ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳•׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳¨׳™׳›׳×׳. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳£ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳”, ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳”, ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳”.
׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳• ׳©׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳’׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳’׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳”"׳” ׳”׳›׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳™׳’׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳”׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳ (׳‘׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳•) ׳›׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳' ׳•׳”׳¢' ׳"׳ ׳•׳₪"׳” ׳”׳¢' ׳›"׳“ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳‘׳–׳”.  [׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳’ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– [׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳˜ ׳׳•׳× ׳— ׳›׳¡׳ ׳™׳£ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳“] ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳—׳“׳© ׳‘׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ [׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳“׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳“׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¡׳’׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳”] ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳›׳™׳׳• ׳׳•].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳₪׳•׳© ׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳—׳₪׳© ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳–׳™׳– ׳׳× ׳©׳׳¨ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳“, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳‘׳“׳§׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳—׳₪׳© ׳™׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¦׳“, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳–. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳“׳¨׳ ׳—׳™׳₪׳•׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳–׳”.
<h3> ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× : <b>׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳'</b> - ׳™׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× <b>׳”׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳</b> ׳׳• ׳™׳׳›׳ ׳׳× <b>׳”׳‘׳©׳¨</b> ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳. <b>׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳‘'</b> - ׳™׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳”. <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small> ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳© ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• [׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳—׳× - ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳×׳₪׳׳¨"׳™ ׳“׳׳׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳–' ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘' ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳–׳”], ׳•׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳˜ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳‘'] ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳׳ ׳׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> <b>׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳’'</b> - ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳›׳”׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× [׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳• ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳™׳©"׳© ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳™ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳׳’׳•׳–׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™, ׳•׳–׳” ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳׳¢׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• "׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨" ׳•׳›׳•', ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳™׳© ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳‘׳¢׳•׳“׳ ׳“׳‘׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳”׳“׳’ ׳׳• ׳”׳¢׳•׳£ ׳׳‘׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨- ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳’ ׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ "׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×" ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳׳ ׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳”׳' ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳.
