׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳“"׳” ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳›׳•', ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳‘׳“"׳” ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× . </small></small>] ׳׳׳© ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” [׳׳”׳™׳“ ׳׳₪׳” ׳׳׳©] <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳“' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳×׳•׳. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ ׳©׳”׳–׳›׳¨׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳›׳, ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳©.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× [׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ "׳] ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” [׳‘׳’׳“׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small> ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳”. ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳•׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳.</small></small>. (׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small> ׳”׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳© ׳׳£ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳”׳™׳“ ׳׳₪׳”, ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳”, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳×, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳×׳™׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳˜"׳–] ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳© ׳׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳©, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳×׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§ ׳›׳׳•׳”׳• ׳©׳, ׳•׳"׳› ׳”"׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• [׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳×׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’] ׳"׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳×. ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳¦׳׳×׳™ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳– ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ [׳”׳ "׳] ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳‘׳˜׳™׳— ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’, ׳•׳"׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳§׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’.</small></small>). <b>׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳“'-</b> ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳© ׳™׳§׳— ׳›׳ ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳•׳™׳׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳׳•׳—׳™׳× ׳•׳”׳©׳•׳׳ ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳” <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳“"׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘. ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳.
[׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’.</small></small>].
׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳˜׳—׳•׳ ׳™׳ [-"׳’׳₪׳™׳׳˜׳¢ ׳₪׳™׳©"], ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳—׳©׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳” <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳›, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳›׳׳” ׳׳’׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳“׳•׳¨׳•׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ : <b>׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳'</b> - ׳™׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳•. <b>׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳‘'</b> - ׳™׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳”. <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small> ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳” ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳©.</small></small> <b>׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳’'</b> - ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳© ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¡"׳• ׳©׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳©׳›"׳ ׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’, ׳׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳׳•׳”׳• ׳‘׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳©׳›"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳. <b>׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳“'</b> - ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳×׳” ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳’׳“׳¨׳™ "׳׳™׳“" ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’', <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small> ׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳×׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¢׳–"׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¢"׳— [׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳” ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳׳׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳"׳  ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳"׳› ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳].</small></small> ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳.
<h3> ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳‘׳˜׳™׳— ׳•׳׳׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳₪׳•׳–</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳‘׳˜׳™׳— ׳©׳•׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳©׳׳¨ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× [׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢ ׳”׳׳‘׳˜׳™׳— ׳׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“] <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳–, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳"׳— ׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘' ׳₪' ׳‘׳©׳׳— ׳׳•׳× ׳–, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳¡׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳• "׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™" ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×] <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small>.  ׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳"׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳•׳“׳” ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨. ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳×׳₪׳•׳– ׳•׳§׳׳׳ ׳˜׳™׳ ׳” ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡. ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳ ׳•׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳‘׳˜׳™׳— ׳•׳׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳” ׳׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳•.</small></small>.
׳›׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳ [׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢׳• ׳¢׳™׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳£ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳• [׳‘׳’׳“׳¨׳™ "׳׳™׳“" ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’', ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳”׳™׳“ ׳׳₪׳” ׳׳׳©], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳§׳׳•׳£ ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳¢׳—</sup><small><small> ׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳’ ׳‘׳™' ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜.
׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳×׳׳•׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳“׳׳"׳  ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳"׳› ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳’"׳› ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳׳– ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳“"׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¡׳™׳‘׳•׳×: ׳. ׳©׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™. ׳‘. ׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳›׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ (׳׳׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳”) ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳×, ׳•׳–׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳•׳׳£ ׳•׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳"׳› ׳׳×׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳›׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳§׳׳₪׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ [׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳] ׳•׳׳– ׳”׳•׳™ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳•׳׳£ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳›"׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×" ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳§׳™׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳. <sup>׳¢׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳©׳›"׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳“, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳– ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳×׳׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳׳’"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳—. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ [׳•׳–׳”׳• ׳©׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳£ ׳’' ׳“׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳”׳›׳™].
׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳₪׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳§׳•׳׳₪׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'.</small></small>
׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳§׳׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳›׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳£ <sup>׳₪</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳, ׳™"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳₪׳™׳ ["׳§׳‘׳•׳§׳™׳"] ׳׳• ׳׳’׳•׳–׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳§׳•׳׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘"׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳™" ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳׳’׳•׳–׳™׳ <sup>׳₪׳</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¢"׳— ׳©׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳•׳¡׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳©׳§׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ [׳•׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳§׳•׳׳£ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳©׳ "׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×" ׳׳§׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳›׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳×] ׳׳• ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳• ׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳, ׳׳©׳"׳› ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳™. </small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳‘׳•׳˜׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳׳’׳•׳– ׳©׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳™, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳₪׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳©׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳˜׳”, ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•. ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳•. </small></small>.

<h3> ׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳‘׳•׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳’׳•׳–׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳™׳¨׳•׳§׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳’׳•׳–׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳–׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳£ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳©, <sup>׳₪׳’</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳•'.</small></small> ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳”׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳‘׳•׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳₪׳” ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳• <sup>׳₪׳“</sup><small><small> ׳¢"׳₪ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳™׳’: ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳‘׳•׳˜׳ ׳™׳, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳© <sup>׳₪׳”</sup><small><small> ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳₪', ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳׳™ ׳˜׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳© ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳˜"׳•.</small></small>].
׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳” <b>׳”׳׳“׳•׳׳”</b> ׳”׳₪׳ ׳™׳׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳•׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘. <sup>׳₪׳•</sup><small><small> ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ "׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳• ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>

<h3> ׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳£ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳•׳£ ׳׳• ׳“׳’ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳• ׳›׳§׳׳™׳₪׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳£ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳•. <sup>׳₪׳–</sup><small><small> ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳£ ׳׳• ׳”׳“׳’, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳§׳׳•׳£ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳™׳—׳“ [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳] ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ "׳©׳•׳ ׳" ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳׳×׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' [׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳‘׳׳×׳™ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳›"׳› ׳׳₪׳"׳’ ׳׳׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳ ׳›׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳–׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳•, ׳"׳› ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’].</small></small>

<h3> ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳›׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.
<h3> ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳¢׳•׳§׳¥ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳¢׳•׳§׳¥ ׳§׳˜׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™, ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›'.

<h3> ׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳£ <sup>׳₪׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳×׳™׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳×׳¦׳•׳£.
׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳•׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳©׳™׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳—׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ <sup>׳₪׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳“, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳—׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ <sup>׳¦</sup><small><small> ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳— [׳•׳›' ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳© ׳¦"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨] ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳©׳™ ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’, ׳˜'] ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳ ׳§׳™׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳§׳™׳•׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳—׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” [׳‘׳’׳“׳¨׳™ "׳׳™׳“" ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’'] <sup>׳¦׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳¨׳§ ׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ [׳×׳—׳× ׳‘׳¨׳– ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳”] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳‘] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳₪׳˜"׳• ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™'] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳›"׳˜]. ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳¢׳–׳¨ [׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳–] ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳"׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳“׳—׳× ׳”׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳¨.</small></small>.
׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳‘׳§ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ [׳©׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨] ׳׳• ׳׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳¡ <sup>׳¦׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳– ׳”׳׳‘׳§ ׳•׳”׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×, ׳•׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳‘׳§ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳’. ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳— ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳©׳•׳×.</small></small>.

<h3> ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳×׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳׳—׳™׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳—.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳×׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳¦׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳×׳” ׳©׳©׳•׳§׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳׳˜׳”, ׳•׳›׳©׳׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳˜׳” ׳׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳, ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳× ׳”׳×׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳¦׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳™׳™׳“׳™, ׳•׳”׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› [׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳] ׳•׳‘׳¡' ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘' [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳™, ׳“' ׳“"׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨], ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳’ ׳“"׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳ ׳ ׳§׳˜ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™. <sup>׳¦׳“</sup><small><small> ׳›׳£ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳§׳™"׳’, ׳©׳‘׳™׳”"׳© ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳— ׳–׳•׳ ׳ ׳₪׳׳“ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¦׳“׳“ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨], ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳₪׳"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳, ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳“, ׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.
׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳”, ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳—.</small></small>
׳׳׳—׳™׳” ׳©׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳’׳¨׳’׳™׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳¨׳–, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“, ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳¦׳”</sup><small><small> ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡' ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘', ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳¨' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳"׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳׳•׳”"׳© ג€“ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳™׳™׳“׳™ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳›"׳”] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳”׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳¡' ׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳₪"׳• ׳”׳¢' ׳—' ׳•׳‘׳¡' ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳₪"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳™] ׳•׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳§׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳— ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳ ׳— ׳‘׳׳׳— ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ [׳•׳׳›׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳×׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳×׳”]. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳׳×׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳–׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳”.</small></small>.

<h3> ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳˜.</b> ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳©, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳”, ׳©׳›׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳. <sup>׳¦׳•</sup><small><small> ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳“"׳” ׳”׳™׳•, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳’ ׳•׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳“ ׳•׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳—.</small></small>
׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳× ׳©׳‘׳›׳™׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳₪׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳–׳•׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳’׳“׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳•׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.

<h3> ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¦׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳›׳•"׳</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳’׳ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ "׳׳•׳›׳" ׳•"׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×" ׳׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳•׳”, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳” ׳›׳–׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳• <sup>׳¦׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳’' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳™׳• ׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳›׳•"׳, ׳¦׳¢׳¦׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳¡׳•׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳.
<h3> ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳“</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳›׳•"׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘׳• ׳•׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳’׳‘׳• ׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” <sup>׳¦׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳ ׳’׳‘׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ <sup>׳¦׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳”׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳¨׳"׳’], ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳”׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳•׳™ ׳—׳׳§ ׳•'].</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳— ׳•׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳§׳— ׳•׳™׳©׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳• <sup>׳§</sup><small><small> ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳”׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳–׳” ׳׳׳™׳”׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜].</small></small> [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¡"׳].

<h3> ׳₪׳™׳–׳•׳¨ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳™׳™׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳×, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳–׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× [׳‘׳–׳¨׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳×] ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳”׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨, <sup>׳§׳</sup><small><small> ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳] ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡' ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳¢' ׳₪"׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳’׳' [׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳“.] ׳“׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳‘׳™ ׳©׳“׳ ׳§׳׳™׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳׳׳™ ׳•׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳׳¡׳™ ׳›׳׳›׳׳” ׳“׳₪׳™׳¨׳™, ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳˜׳—׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳— ׳–׳” ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳© ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳•׳˜׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳•'].  ׳•׳‘׳¡' ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳₪"׳” ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳›׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳”, ׳•׳”׳ ׳“׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳’׳' ׳”׳×׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳©׳©׳˜׳— ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳– ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳–׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ <sup>׳§׳‘</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳–׳§׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳›׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳–׳§׳ ׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨. <sup>׳§׳’</sup><small><small> ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳–], ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳׳”׳׳•׳§׳˜ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳‘'] ׳•׳׳׳₪׳׳” ׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳•׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳˜'] ׳•׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ [׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳›׳’. ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳›"׳’, ׳'] ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳–׳›׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳”"׳  ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳§׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳׳¦׳“ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’, ׳˜'] ׳׳”׳׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳©׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳ "׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×" ׳׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳¡׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳׳– ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨.  ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ [׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳™׳]. ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳” ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“, ׳•׳¦"׳¢ ׳“׳”׳×׳•׳¡' ׳•׳”׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳™׳›׳• ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳—׳˜ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳׳›׳׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ (׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳) ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ "׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳×" ׳‘׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳׳“.</b> ׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳׳–׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦"׳©. <sup>׳§׳“</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳©׳׳£ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳”׳’׳¢׳׳” [׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳].</small></small>
׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’, ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳</b> ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳•׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳”. <sup>׳§׳”</sup><small><small> ׳©׳. ׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳“׳‘׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳׳•׳×׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳׳. ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’.</small></small>
׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳™, ׳”׳׳׳›׳ <b>׳”׳©׳ ׳™</b> [׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳”. <sup>׳§׳•</sup><small><small> ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳”׳' ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳–׳” ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳"׳› ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳×׳™׳™׳—׳¡׳× ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳”. ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>
׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¨׳—׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳– ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳׳›׳׳, ׳•׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—' ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳.

RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳• - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳©</h2>
XX ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳© <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳© ׳”׳™׳ ׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳—׳“׳© ׳¢"׳™ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§׳• ׳׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¢׳×׳”, ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ [׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•] ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳×׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳™׳“׳• [׳•׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳•] ׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳׳™"׳”. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳”׳' ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳. ׳‘׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳© ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳"׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳§׳׳™׳₪׳×׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳”׳›׳ "׳׳•׳›׳" ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳”. </small></small> ׳‘׳™׳¡׳•׳“׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳©׳× ׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳×׳‘׳•׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¥ ׳׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳×׳‘׳•׳׳”, ׳ ׳׳©׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳–׳• ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳, ׳›׳׳• ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×, ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳×, ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳, ׳₪׳™׳¦׳•׳— ׳׳’׳•׳–׳™׳, ׳—׳׳™׳‘׳”, [׳•׳‘׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳–׳” - ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳§׳¨׳— ׳•׳”׳§׳₪׳׳×׳•. ׳•׳”׳׳¡׳× ׳©׳•׳׳] ׳•׳¢׳•׳“. 
(׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳₪׳™׳¦׳•׳— ׳׳’׳•׳–׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳™׳₪׳×׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳•׳”׳₪׳ ׳™׳׳™׳× ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳”' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳’.) GG

<h3> ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳©׳›׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳: ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳“׳©.
׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳. <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small> ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳¡׳×׳™׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳™' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ [׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™׳] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳ "׳— ׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳© ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳”׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨.</small></small> [׳•׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”].
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳© ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳׳”׳׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ <sup>׳’</sup><small><small> ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳¡׳×׳™׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳© ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳“׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳“׳©, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳¢׳’: ׳“"׳” ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳×׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳©, ׳"׳ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳ ׳›׳׳•׳”׳•, ׳׳׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳©׳₪׳™' ׳©׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳”׳×׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳™׳₪׳×׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳ ׳£, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™' ׳”׳׳ "׳— [׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳© ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘'] ׳©׳×׳׳” ׳׳׳׳™ ׳”׳×׳¢׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨׳©"׳™, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×.  ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳¨׳×׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳©׳ "׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳“׳”" ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳©, ׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳–׳” ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳“׳” ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳׳© ׳׳”׳׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳“׳” ׳•׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳׳›׳”. ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳ ׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳¦ ׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳].</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳©׳™׳׳›׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳›׳•׳]. <sup>׳“</sup><small><small> ׳›"׳› ׳”׳׳’"׳˜ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳©, ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳©׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳×׳•׳׳©׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳™׳׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳×׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳“׳© ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳ ׳£, ׳•׳›׳¨׳©"׳™, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳×׳•׳׳© ׳•׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳.
׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳×׳•׳׳©׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳”׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳, ׳׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳"׳› ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳§ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳£, ׳•׳¦"׳¢.</small></small>
׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳×׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳©׳׳”׳, ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳™׳“.
׳“׳™׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳“׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳©׳׳”׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳“׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳ ׳•׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳™׳©׳”.</small></small>.
׳¢׳’׳‘׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳× ["׳©׳¨׳™"] ׳”׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢׳’׳‘׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳›׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳“׳™׳©׳” ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳›׳©׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳“׳” ׳”׳ ׳”׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳™׳©׳”. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳:
BB<b>׳.</b>׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ - ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳–׳™׳×׳™׳ - ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳׳“׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳© <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ [׳›׳×׳₪׳•׳–׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘] ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳™׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳©׳§׳™׳”׳ - ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳–' ׳׳©׳§׳™׳, ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳•׳¡׳×׳׳™׳™׳”׳• ׳׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳, ׳•׳ "׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳©׳•׳™׳ ׳׳–׳™׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳×׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳"׳› ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳©׳§׳”.
׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳” ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳×׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳¨"׳ ׳×׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳©׳§׳”, ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳” ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳“׳×׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳›׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳–׳™׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳’"׳› ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™'. [׳•׳׳₪׳"׳’ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—' ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳¨"׳].</small></small>.
 <b>׳‘.</b> ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ [׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳] ׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳, <b>׳׳•</b> ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ <b>׳׳•</b> ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳’"׳› ׳”׳™׳• ׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳, ׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳, ׳’׳–׳¨ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘].
 <b>׳’.</b> ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳, ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳”׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳©׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳'. ׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳. [׳•׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨׳™׳˜׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳¦׳:].</small></small>.
 <b>׳“.</b> ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳ [׳›׳׳• ׳׳‘׳˜׳™׳— ׳•׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳] ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“, ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§"׳›. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳§׳”"׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×. ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳ [׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'] ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳׳§׳•׳×, ׳”׳×׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ [׳•׳׳”"׳˜ ׳‘׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳™"׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳© ׳•׳™"׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜׳™׳, ׳•׳”"׳  ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳׳™׳‘׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳—׳׳‘ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜].</small></small>. (׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳—׳˜ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳×׳§ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳˜׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¥ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳, ׳©׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘"׳— ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§"׳—. ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳¡׳•׳—׳˜ ׳׳׳×׳§ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳›׳׳.</small></small>).EE
<h3> ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳•׳¡׳¨</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳•׳¡׳¨ <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨, ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§"׳›. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳“"׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳© ׳"׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨. ׳•׳׳£ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳© ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳“׳”׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳“׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳׳׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™, ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳© ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small> ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳׳™׳“ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳—׳§.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳”</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¡׳—׳˜׳” <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳™"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳“׳™, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳™, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>], ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳£ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳. ׳•׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳×׳‘׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳›׳©׳¡׳•׳—׳˜ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳’׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳”׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜ ׳›׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳•"׳ ׳›׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳” ׳—׳“׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳•׳׳™"׳– ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳© ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳” ׳—׳“׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳”׳•.</small></small>.
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳“' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳‘׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'.
<h3> ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳׳•׳ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳•'] ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳: ׳. ׳©׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•. ׳‘. ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳‘', ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳׳•׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘'- ׳“׳¨׳’׳” ׳‘.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'] <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳• ׳¡׳§"׳–] ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳–.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳•׳× ׳™׳‘, ׳‘] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳’׳ ׳‘׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳˜ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳© ׳¡׳˜"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳˜׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¥ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳¢׳׳•. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳•] ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳×"׳¡ [׳‘׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳’], ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ [׳׳×׳•׳ ׳“׳’ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”], ׳•׳”׳׳•׳‘׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳×׳” ׳•׳׳×׳•׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳×׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ <b>׳¡׳•׳›׳¨</b> ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>[׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳]. ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘.</small></small> [׳•׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳×׳¢"׳‘ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>]. ׳•׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳• ׳¡׳§"׳–. ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳•׳—׳˜ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳—"׳› ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳¡׳•׳—׳˜ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳‘׳•׳©׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳׳׳• ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳•׳×׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘', ׳¡׳•׳’׳™׳ ׳‘ ׳•-׳’.</small></small> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳”׳ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳“. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× ׳©׳ "׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×" ׳¢׳ "׳׳•׳›׳" ׳׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳”' ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳“.</small></small>. ׳׳׳©׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¥ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳ ׳¡ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜׳™׳. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨.  [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳”' ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›"׳˜, ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳₪׳׳™ ׳”׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨.]
׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳© <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳“׳”׳›׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳• ׳‘׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳×׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜].
׳•׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳§׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳. ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ [-"׳§׳¢׳¨׳”" ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳' ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳׳”.].</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× <b>׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ [׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳] </b> ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳×, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ! <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳•. ׳“"׳” ׳”׳׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳“׳׳™׳₪׳¨׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳” ׳¡׳§"׳“] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳–' ׳׳©׳§׳™׳, ׳›׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳¢׳” ׳׳©׳§׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳¡׳—׳˜׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢ ׳›"׳׳©׳§׳”" ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳™׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳¡׳—׳˜׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×׳•.
׳•׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳׳”. ׳“"׳” ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳™׳. ׳“׳™׳׳• ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳¡׳‘׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳“׳¡"׳ ׳“׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳¢׳’: ׳“"׳” ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳”׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳–׳™׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳– ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳§׳” ׳”׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’. ׳•׳”׳¨"׳ ׳©׳ [׳‘׳“׳£ ׳׳. ׳‘׳“׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™"׳£] ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳—׳™׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“.
׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§"׳˜] ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳§׳›"׳“] ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳§׳˜׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳× ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨"׳ [׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳™׳©, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳], ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳‘׳–׳™׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳•׳׳¨׳©"׳™] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳’׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳”"׳” ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳׳¨"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳¦׳™׳¦׳× ׳׳™׳¥ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳₪׳” ׳׳™׳¥ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳–׳™׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳¦׳™׳¦׳× ׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳‘׳©׳¨</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳—׳ ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳¥ ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳¦׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜</b> ׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳—׳. [׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳- ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳™"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳™׳©. ׳•׳›׳ ׳—׳׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘], ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳×׳”׳•׳•׳×׳•.</small></small> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳׳—׳ ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳.</small></small> - ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳ ׳׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳• ׳‘׳•].
<h3> ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳¨׳›׳›׳• ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳ ׳×׳׳¢׳›׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳•׳— ׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳—׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳‘. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳© ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳•׳—׳˜ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳˜׳—׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳–' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'.</small></small>. [׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳™׳¨׳§ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ - ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳–' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'].
<h3> ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳©׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳•׳× <b>׳©׳•׳׳</b> [׳׳ ׳©׳׳] ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳”׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳›"׳”. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳•׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳•׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳–׳‘׳• ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳‘׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ <b>׳©׳–׳‘׳• ׳׳׳׳™׳”׳</b> ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× [׳•׳”׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”].  ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™, ׳©׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” - ׳–׳™׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ - ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳–׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳×׳™׳” ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•. ׳“"׳” ׳›׳ ׳“׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳•, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳•"׳ ׳׳”׳“׳•׳¨׳ ׳' ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳— ׳©׳‘׳™' ׳©׳”׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳§׳•׳“׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳•׳—׳©׳© ׳׳•.</small></small> [׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳], ׳•׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• - ׳›׳×׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ - ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳•, ׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• <b>׳׳׳›׳•׳</b> ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• <b>׳׳׳©׳§׳”</b> ׳©׳‘׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳–׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™. ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳', ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳• ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳”, ׳“'.</small></small><b>.</b>
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳₪׳׳— ׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡ ׳×׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳₪׳׳— ׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳×׳” ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” <b>׳©׳§׳•׳¢</b> ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳׳•׳ <b>׳׳¢׳</b> ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•], ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳׳›׳׳•' ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳•׳, ׳"׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” [׳‘׳׳”"׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“]. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳׳™׳¥ ׳”׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™׳×׳¨׳‘׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳™ ׳×׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳™׳™׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳×׳™׳”, ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳ ׳×׳¨׳‘׳” ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›' ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳’׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳“׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳ ׳×׳¨׳‘׳” ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨,  ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳ ׳₪׳™' ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳¡׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳×׳¨׳‘׳” ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳–׳‘׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ [׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳“ ׳•׳©"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—, ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳‘׳›׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳›׳•:] ׳“׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳“׳ ׳×׳¨׳‘׳” ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.  [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳–: ׳×׳•׳“"׳” ׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳]. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳©׳›׳•׳׳™׳× ׳‘׳›׳₪׳™׳× ׳•׳©׳×׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳׳™׳× ׳‘׳›׳₪׳™׳× ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳• ׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳©׳›׳•׳׳™׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳,  ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳ ׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳“׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•: ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳”׳—׳•׳¨׳© ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳§׳׳§׳ ׳•׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳•׳׳¢׳₪"׳› ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳¨"׳© ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ [׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳' ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳׳¢׳₪"׳› ׳“׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳¢"׳’ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳§׳׳§׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ - ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳], ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳¡׳•׳§ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳׳™׳× ׳‘׳›׳₪׳™׳×.</small></small> (׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”), ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜ ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳•׳׳©׳×׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳–׳‘׳• <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳©׳›׳•׳׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳• ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳×׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳×׳” ׳—׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳–׳‘׳•, ׳•׳›׳ "׳. [׳•׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¥].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳¡׳׳˜ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳¡׳׳˜ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳–׳‘׳•, ׳•׳›׳ "׳.
<h3> ׳¨׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳׳’׳•׳– ׳§׳•׳§׳•׳¡</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳’׳•׳– ׳§׳•׳§׳•׳¡ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳׳‘׳¢׳“ ׳׳¡׳“׳§ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳×׳—׳׳§ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳: ׳. ׳”׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳© ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳” ׳”׳›׳ ׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳•. ׳‘. ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳, ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳× ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳”.
׳”׳׳ "׳— [׳“׳© ׳׳•׳× ׳’] ׳”׳§׳©׳” ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳₪"׳— ׳”"׳–] ׳©׳—׳•׳‘׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§, ׳“׳‘׳’׳' ׳‘׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳”: ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳’: ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳§׳™׳“ ׳•׳¢׳§׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳‘׳ ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳©, ׳•׳׳™׳׳• ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¦׳”. ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳“׳© ׳’׳ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳™׳“ ׳•׳¢׳§׳™׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳“׳£ ׳¢׳”. ׳“"׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳₪׳§׳“ ׳₪׳§׳™׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳©, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳™׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳₪׳§׳™׳“ ׳•׳¢׳§׳™׳¨ [׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳׳’:], ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” [׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳׳”׳' ׳“׳©], ׳•׳×׳™' ׳“׳”׳ ׳™ ׳¡׳•׳’׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳“׳¡"׳ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳©׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳™׳“׳•"׳§, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳“׳™׳“׳ ׳“׳׳™׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳©׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳™׳“׳•"׳§ ׳"׳› ׳׳£ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳™׳“ ׳•׳¢׳§׳™׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳“׳™׳©׳” [׳•׳¦"׳ ׳“׳’׳ ׳׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳“׳©, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳“׳™׳©׳” - ׳•׳׳¦׳׳ ׳• ׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳˜׳—׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳™׳“׳•"׳§, ׳"׳ ׳‘׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳—׳™ ׳™׳© ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳"׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳ ׳˜׳—׳™׳ ׳”, ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳•׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™]. ׳•׳”׳§' ׳”׳׳ "׳— ׳“׳×׳™' ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳“׳¡"׳ ׳“׳׳“׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳’׳™׳“׳•"׳§ ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¦"׳‘ [׳•׳”׳™׳” ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳“׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳, ׳“׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳’׳™׳“׳•"׳§ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™ ׳₪׳§׳™׳“ ׳•׳¢׳§׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳™׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳’׳™׳“׳•"׳§].
׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳˜ [׳“׳© ׳׳•׳× ׳˜׳•] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳—׳›"׳ ׳׳×׳¨׳¥ ׳”׳§׳•' ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳₪׳§׳“ ׳₪׳§׳™׳“ ׳"׳› ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳₪׳§׳“ ׳₪׳§׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳§׳”. ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳”׳§' ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳×׳™' ׳“׳‘׳“"׳‘ ׳¨׳§ ׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳“׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳—׳™׳׳–׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳“׳“ ׳•׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳–׳•׳.
׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳”"׳© [׳“׳© ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳˜] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳‘' ׳×׳™' ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳•'. ׳' ׳“׳‘׳“"׳‘ ׳”׳›׳ ׳ ׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳—׳™׳׳–׳•׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳›׳™׳¡׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳©׳” ׳‘׳”׳•׳¦׳׳×׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳₪׳•"׳¢, ׳‘' ׳“׳‘׳“"׳‘ ׳׳™"׳¦ ׳˜׳™׳¨׳—׳” ׳•׳׳•׳׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳ ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳׳׳׳™׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳—׳™׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳—׳•׳׳‘ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳˜׳™׳¨׳—׳” ׳•׳׳•׳׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳₪׳§׳™׳“ ׳•׳¢׳§׳™׳¨.
׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳–, ׳׳”׳׳ "׳— ׳•׳׳”׳—׳›"׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳’"׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳“"׳‘ ׳׳—׳•׳׳‘, ׳•׳”"׳  ׳‘׳׳’׳•׳– ׳§׳•׳§׳•׳¡ ׳™׳© ׳“׳© ׳׳£ ׳©׳₪׳§׳™׳“ ׳•׳¢׳§׳™׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳”׳׳’"׳˜ ׳•׳׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳—׳׳•׳§ ׳“"׳‘ ׳׳—׳•׳׳‘ ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳’׳•׳– ׳§׳•׳§׳•׳¡ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨. [׳•׳‘׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳© ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳’"׳› ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳”׳׳’"׳˜ ׳•׳”׳©׳‘׳”"׳©].
׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳¨ ׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳”: ׳©׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳—׳–׳” ׳׳׳™׳”׳• ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳¨.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳˜׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳’׳•׳– ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳©׳₪׳›׳™׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳™"׳ ׳“׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳“׳™׳©׳”, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳׳ ׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳’׳׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳×׳™׳”, ׳•׳©׳₪׳™׳›׳× ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳“׳© ׳›׳׳.</small></small>.

<h3> ׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳× ׳•׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳™׳] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳©, ׳•׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳© <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳™"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳™׳©. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳ ׳§׳” ׳‘׳”׳, [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳©׳™"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳™׳™׳. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳™׳: ׳•׳”׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳׳. ׳‘׳“׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™"׳£)], ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳“׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“.
׳•׳׳£ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨"׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳׳× ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳, ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳© ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳•׳›׳“׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳¨"׳ [׳©׳] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳™׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳§׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳™׳×׳¡׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳•׳׳•׳›׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳–'] ׳•׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳©׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳—, ׳©׳”׳×׳•׳¡' ׳“׳£ ׳¢׳’: ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳“׳™׳©׳” ׳‘׳›׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳׳”. ׳“"׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳—׳•׳׳‘ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳“׳™׳©׳” ׳‘׳›׳ [׳•׳ "׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•] ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳׳‘ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳•׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳“׳© ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳£ ׳“׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ [׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳™' ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳“׳—׳•׳׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥] ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳©׳ "׳×.
[׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳“׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™ ׳›׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳“׳׳™׳₪׳¨׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“, ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳“׳׳™׳₪׳¨׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨"׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™ ׳“׳© ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢' ׳›"׳•].</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳™׳] ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳ "׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳•.</small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳•.
<h3> ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳׳•׳× ׳׳–׳ ׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳©׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>"׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨" ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳” [׳”׳•׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳׳’], ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳–] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳׳£ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳™׳¡׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳"׳– ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳׳׳—׳˜׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳•׳× ׳§׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳™ ׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳¡׳—׳˜׳• [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳™׳].</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳•׳× ׳׳–׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳“ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” [׳•׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳–׳׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳‘].

<h3> ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘"׳¡׳§׳•׳˜׳©"</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘"׳¡׳§׳•׳˜׳©" ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳”׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳•׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳¨, ׳•׳”׳, ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳׳™׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳—, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳”.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳ ׳™׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳’'.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳—׳¦׳— ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳”.
<h3> ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳׳¡׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳× [׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳׳” ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳–׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳˜"׳•], ׳•׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳¦׳₪׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳׳™׳”׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳•׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳”, ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳™׳“׳™׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳–׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳¨׳™׳§ ׳¦׳׳•׳—׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳™"׳–]. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳—׳¦׳— ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳—׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳¦׳₪׳•׳₪׳•׳× [׳•׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳, ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳׳“׳].</small></small>], ׳•׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳›׳—. (׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳¦׳—׳¦׳— ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳”׳ "׳. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳¡׳׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳§׳©׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳¡׳™׳‘׳™׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™׳.</small></small>). ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳”׳–׳¨׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳”"׳ ׳™׳׳’׳¨׳”" ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳•׳”׳•"׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—"׳, ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳™"׳— ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳”. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳™׳© ׳”׳¢׳×׳™׳§ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳“׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳– ׳’׳ ׳׳"׳“ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳—"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳”׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳¨׳™, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•"׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳” ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳—"׳ ׳׳ ׳¡׳’׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳˜"׳– - ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳—"׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳–׳”, ׳׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳‘׳₪׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳׳” ׳™׳‘׳©׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳—׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳©׳™׳© ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳׳” ׳™׳‘׳©׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳ ' ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳©׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳₪׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳¨׳›׳›׳• [׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’'], ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳׳©׳₪׳©׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳‘׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳×, ׳›׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳, ׳™׳§׳— ׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳‘׳¢׳׳× ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳§׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¦׳₪׳•׳₪׳•׳× <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. ׳׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳¨׳™׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™. [׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¦׳₪׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳›׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳©׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳“׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳‘׳¢׳׳× ׳¡׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳].</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳–׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳”׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳×.
XX ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳׳• [׳›"׳- ׳"׳] ׳¢׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ <b>׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳”</b> ׳©׳ ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳•׳”׳₪׳©׳¨׳× ׳§׳¨׳— ׳•׳©׳•׳׳. ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳©׳™׳¨׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳‘.  GG
<h3> ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳•׳”׳₪׳©׳¨׳× ׳§׳¨׳—</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳¡׳§ ׳©׳׳’ ׳׳• ׳§׳¨׳— ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳–׳•׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳׳™׳”׳ <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳˜'. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨: ׳. ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳‘. ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳§׳™׳. ׳’. ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳×׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳©׳™׳•׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳–׳• ׳׳—' ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳˜"׳–] ׳©׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳׳™׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳‘ ׳§׳¨׳— ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳© ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳₪׳©׳™׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳‘ ׳§׳¨׳— ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳׳ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳₪׳©׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳“ [׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳§׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳©׳¨, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳‘].</small></small>. ׳•׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳©׳™׳¨ ׳§׳¨׳— ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳×׳• ׳׳׳© ׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳© <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳˜"׳–. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳™׳“ [׳•׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳×, ׳›׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳׳“׳× ׳¨׳™׳— [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’] ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳© ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ [׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳].
׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨"׳ [׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳™"׳£ ׳“׳£ ׳›׳“.] ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳¡׳”"׳×, ׳©׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳”׳₪׳©׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳”׳ ׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳§׳¨׳— ׳™׳₪׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳×׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳©׳™׳¨ ׳•׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳—׳“׳© ׳׳—"׳› ׳•׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜, ׳©׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳”׳¡׳”"׳×. ׳•׳”׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳• ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳™׳׳¦׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳— ׳׳£ ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳׳© ׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳© [׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳§׳₪׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳—] ׳©׳׳—׳׳‘ ׳§׳₪׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳§׳”, [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳ ׳׳”׳' ׳˜׳•׳׳׳× ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳
