<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳˜ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳</h2>
XX[׳•׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳¢׳–"׳” ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳•]GG
<h3> ׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳׳™ ׳׳׳— ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳—</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳™ ׳׳׳— ׳‘׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳, ׳‘'. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳‘׳•׳“.
׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳–׳” ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳˜, ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳: ׳. ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳׳™׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¡׳‘׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳. ׳‘. ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳©׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳׳— ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳›׳׳” ׳׳׳— ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ [׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳× ׳©׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳¨׳“׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳₪׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳—׳›׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳’: ׳“"׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•], ׳”׳™׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳™׳©׳× ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳×. ׳•׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¢׳™׳‘׳•׳“, ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳ ׳›׳‘׳™׳©׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳×׳•׳¡' ׳׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳.
׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳§׳¦׳× ׳¦"׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳—׳× ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳× ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳›׳•׳‘׳© ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳© ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳× ׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳‘׳‘׳™' ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¥ ׳‘׳׳׳— ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳— ׳׳ ׳׳›׳™׳ ׳›׳׳•׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳™׳—׳“ <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳© ׳׳׳— ׳׳• ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¢׳˜. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳׳— ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳¨׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳‘׳׳׳—, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>.</b>
<h3> ׳©׳₪׳™׳›׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¥</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳—׳•׳׳¥ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳¢׳¨׳‘׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¥ ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳—׳•׳׳¥, ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳© ׳›׳— ׳”׳—׳•׳׳¥, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳‘׳™׳©׳× ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳© ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳™ ׳׳׳—. ׳•׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳ ׳׳™׳›׳‘׳© ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¥ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¥ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¥ ׳•׳׳”׳™׳₪׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳¥ ׳׳—׳׳™׳© ׳›׳— ׳”׳׳׳— ׳•׳׳•׳ ׳¢ ׳”׳¢׳™׳‘׳•׳“, ׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳ ׳׳™׳›׳‘׳© ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¥ ׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳© ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳©׳, ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’. ׳•׳‘׳›׳‘׳™׳©׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’'.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳¦׳ ׳¦׳ ׳× ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳›׳‘׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳‘׳©׳• ׳׳£ ׳”׳ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small> [׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳¦׳ ׳¦׳ ׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨].
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳—׳× ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳׳•׳— ׳‘׳™׳—׳“ ׳›׳׳” ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳ ׳•׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳׳׳™׳—׳” [׳•׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳׳׳• ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳”], ׳•׳׳”׳©׳”׳•׳×׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳— ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳” ׳׳—׳×. <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳— ׳›׳׳” ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳—׳× ׳׳•׳ ׳—׳× ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳“, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳›׳׳, ׳›"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§"׳›, ׳•׳"׳› ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳•׳— ׳›׳ ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳” ׳•׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“.
׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›' ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳›׳•׳‘׳© ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳© ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳©׳, ׳•׳¨׳©"׳™ [׳§׳—: ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳˜׳•׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳”׳¨׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳. ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small> ׳•׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳•׳—׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳–׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳׳׳ ׳׳˜׳‘׳ ׳׳—׳× ׳׳—׳× ׳‘׳׳׳— ׳•׳׳•׳›׳ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳›.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳”׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¡׳׳˜ ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳•׳׳¥ ׳׳׳׳—, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳׳— ׳׳‘׳“.
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳—׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳™׳¦׳”</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳— ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳× ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳ ׳•׳׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳™׳¦׳”], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳׳•׳— ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳]. ׳•׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳” [׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳˜"׳– ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨].</small></small>. ׳•׳™"׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳©׳</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳׳—׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳׳— ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳׳׳— ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳× ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳ ׳•׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳— ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳˜׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳©׳. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳—׳•׳׳•׳¡, ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳×׳™׳¨׳¡ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳—, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳׳— ׳¨׳§ ׳׳˜׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳›׳‘׳™׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳׳— <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳—׳”</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳©׳, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳˜׳™׳‘׳¢׳ ׳•׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳׳׳— ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳׳—׳ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'.
׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳ ׳•׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳׳׳— ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳׳—׳. <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳–׳™׳×׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳›"׳› ׳˜׳™׳‘׳¢׳ ׳•׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳›׳‘׳™׳©׳”, ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳׳—, ׳׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¦"׳¢, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳©׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳—׳× ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳›׳©׳©׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳׳•׳— ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳™׳© ׳›׳— ׳”׳׳׳—. <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳˜"׳–.</small></small>
<h3> ׳©׳₪׳™׳›׳× ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳–׳•׳§ ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳•׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳™׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳× ׳˜׳™׳‘׳¢׳ ׳•׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳¡׳§, ׳©׳–׳™׳£ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”. <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳ ׳”׳' ׳'].</small></small>
<h3> ׳˜׳¨׳™׳₪׳× [׳¢׳¨׳‘׳•׳‘] ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳§׳¢׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¨׳•׳£ [׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳‘] ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳§׳¢׳¨׳”, ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳׳›׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳”. ׳•׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳“׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳₪׳•׳׳₪׳™׳” [׳׳’׳¨׳“׳×] ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳×׳›׳ ׳“׳§ ׳“׳§ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳—׳™׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳, ׳™' ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳“׳™.</small></small>. ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳“] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳• ׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳‘].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳×׳¨׳•"׳ ׳•׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳×׳¨׳•"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜, ׳“'.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳' ׳׳¢׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”"׳— ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳“׳׳׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜' ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳‘׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳”׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳×. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳ ׳”"׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳”׳×׳¨׳•"׳].</small></small> ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳×׳™׳“ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳×׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳•׳›׳•' [׳”׳ ׳‘׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳”׳׳¨׳•׳, ׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳”׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳×׳™׳“ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳׳—׳¨], ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳.

<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳˜* - ׳"׳˜ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳</h2>
<h3> ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳×׳™׳¨ - ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳” [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳], ׳•׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳ ׳–: ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳’׳׳™ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳™׳© ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳” [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¨׳©"׳© ׳“׳£ ׳§׳ ׳”.], ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢' ׳—' ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳• ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”.
<h3> ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳•׳׳©׳¨׳˜׳˜ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳• ׳—׳׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳™׳“׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳ ׳—׳¨׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳•׳– ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳” <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘. ׳•׳׳©׳¨׳˜׳˜ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳›׳׳•' ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳, ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳”.</small></small>.
׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳©׳¨׳˜׳˜ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳”׳׳©׳¨׳˜׳˜ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜ ׳©׳×׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳—׳׳§ ׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜ ׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ [׳“׳£ ׳¢׳”:] ׳₪׳™' ׳׳©׳¨׳˜׳˜ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳”, ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳™"׳ ׳”׳™"׳– ׳₪׳™' ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜ ׳©׳×׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳¨׳˜׳˜ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳׳“׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳¨׳˜׳˜, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘] ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳“] ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳”׳©׳×׳, ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳©׳™׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳©׳™׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳” ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳¢׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ [׳׳׳™׳—׳× ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳©׳¨]
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳’-׳“. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳׳•׳— ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳—׳× ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× [׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳] ׳™"׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳‘׳“.</small></small>
<h3> ׳”׳—׳׳§׳× ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳™׳© ׳׳׳¨׳— ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳• ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳—, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳— ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳¨׳— ׳•׳׳—׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳©׳•׳” ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳₪׳•׳×׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳— ׳•׳׳׳—׳§, <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳, ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳.
׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳׳׳—׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳ ׳–׳” [׳›׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳] ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳×׳¢"׳‘, ׳•׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳›׳©׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨], ׳•׳׳׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳—׳•׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳ ׳˜׳—׳™׳ ׳” [׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳׳’"׳], ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳ ׳’׳׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳–׳¢׳™׳¨׳™ [׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳˜.]. ׳•׳”׳ ׳¨׳׳”, ׳©׳—׳׳•׳§ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳׳• ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳©׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳׳¢׳׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™, ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳₪׳•׳™ ׳©׳‘׳• ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳¨׳— ׳©׳׳– ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›"׳› ׳™׳™׳₪׳•׳™ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳.</small></small> ׳•׳‘׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳§׳ ׳•׳׳™׳₪׳•׳×׳ ׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳§׳ ׳×׳‘׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳¨׳›׳”. <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳§׳• ׳•׳׳™׳₪׳•׳×׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳׳׳“ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳¡׳׳˜ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳•׳×׳¢"׳‘.</small></small>
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳•׳— ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳•׳¢׳›׳™׳ ["׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳˜׳•׳¨׳”"] ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳— ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳§׳ ׳•׳׳™׳₪׳•׳×׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳” ׳‘׳׳׳¨׳—.
׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳׳׳¨׳—׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳• ׳׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™], ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳—׳• ׳•׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳§׳•. <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳×׳‘׳•׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳™׳© ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳‘׳ ׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳׳‘, <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳– ׳”"׳•, ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳× ׳•׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”. <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'. ׳•׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳©׳›"׳ ׳”׳§' ׳¢"׳– ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳"׳› ׳›"׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳“׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ [׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳¡׳™"׳—], ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳¢׳׳“׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳× ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳§ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¦׳ ׳•׳›׳‘׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳׳× ׳•׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳×. <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳—"׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳›׳׳›׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳”׳§׳¦׳•׳©"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪' ׳¡׳›"׳”.</small></small>
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳™׳’׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳¡׳׳˜ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ [׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳”׳¡׳׳˜ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳‘׳•׳‘, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳—' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳™׳§׳— ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳₪׳•׳×]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳™׳’׳•׳׳™ ׳’׳׳™׳“׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳’ ׳׳—׳“ ׳©׳ ׳’׳׳™׳“׳” ׳•׳™׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳×. <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳₪"׳– ׳”"׳•] ׳©׳׳“׳‘׳§ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳’׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”, ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳—׳™׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳§ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳©׳׳ ׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”.</small></small>
<h3> ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳™׳© ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳•׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳¦׳™׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳¢, <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳§ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¦׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳׳•׳× ׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳•׳×׳‘. <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳•- ׳˜"׳– [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳”], ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳×׳” ׳¢׳ ׳§׳׳£ ׳׳• ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳©׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳"׳› ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳›׳” ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳—׳×׳•׳›׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳”.</small></small>
<h3> ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳›׳©׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳—׳“׳© ׳•׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳¨׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳¡׳׳”]. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳— ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳.
<h3> ׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳›׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳, <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳•׳”׳“׳—׳×׳ ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳™׳™ ׳׳•׳›׳׳ [׳•׳›׳×"׳§ ׳©׳].</small></small> ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳• ׳׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳”. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳™"׳“].
<h3> ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳׳׳‘׳ - ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳× ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳‘׳.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳“׳§ ׳“׳§</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳˜׳•׳—׳ - ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳™׳© ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳: ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ [׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳×]- ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳×׳›׳ ׳“׳§ ׳“׳§ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳]- ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳“׳§ ׳“׳§ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳™׳¨׳§ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳“. ׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳"׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳˜' ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳×׳›׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳•׳—׳, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳.</small></small> [׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳•׳‘].
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳•׳§ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳™׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳• ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳’׳•׳–׳– - ׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳£ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳£ ׳¢׳•׳£ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'.</small></small>.

<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳¡׳•׳×׳¨</h2>
<h3> ׳”׳§׳“׳׳”</h3>
XX ׳׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳¨׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳©׳” ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳©׳׳•׳© ׳׳”׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳×: ׳”׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳™ ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳”׳™"׳“ ׳•׳”׳˜"׳•. </small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳•׳©׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳•׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳' [׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳˜'] ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• [׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳×׳•׳¡' ׳•׳׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©AMP], ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳•' ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳—.
JJ ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳׳ ׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳‘: ׳“"׳” ׳”׳׳™ ׳›׳׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳›׳׳•' ׳’׳ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳–׳” ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳¢׳“: ׳“"׳” ׳—׳‘׳™׳×׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• ׳™׳© ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳’׳‘׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳›׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳“׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§.</small></small> [׳•׳–׳”׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ "׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳”" ׳•"׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§" ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”]. 
׳•׳‘׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳–׳” ׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”: 
<b>׳.</b> ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳§ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳ ׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳”, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳™"׳’, ׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳§ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ <b>׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳×</b>, ׳׳– ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳“׳‘׳™׳׳•׳× ׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳§ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳‘׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳× <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳', ׳§׳¦׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳”' ׳¡׳›"׳”. [׳•׳‘׳“׳¢"׳× ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳”"׳ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳˜].</small></small> [׳•׳–׳”׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”"׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳•׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳" ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”].
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳•׳”׳, ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”, ׳•׳”׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳™"׳’, ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳'.</small></small> [׳•׳–׳”׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ "׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳” ׳”׳‘׳™׳×" ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”].
׳•׳›׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳—׳–"׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳—׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳™׳©׳•׳׳‘׳• ׳—׳׳§׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳×. GG
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳”׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳” ׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳, ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ [׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” <sup>׳•</sup><small><small> ׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳×׳™׳¨. </small></small>], ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳׳” ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳“׳׳× ׳׳• ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳˜. </small></small> [׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳”], ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳§׳¢ ׳׳¡׳׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳™׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳ [׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳•׳×׳ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢].</small></small>.
׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× <b>׳ ׳•׳™</b> ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳׳©׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'.
<h3> ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳”</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•- ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳×׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳—, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳— ׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳™׳•׳‘.</small></small>.
׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“, ׳•׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳›׳, ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳×׳¨׳• <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳”׳•׳“׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳×׳§׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”] ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳™ ׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳¨׳•׳§ ׳‘׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳¨׳™׳§׳×׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳×׳׳• ׳׳–׳׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳׳—"׳› ׳›׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳×׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§ ׳”׳—׳׳•׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳•׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳]. ׳•׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳’. </small></small> [׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳].
׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳—׳•׳©׳‘ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨, ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small> ׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳׳™ [׳₪' ׳›׳׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳₪' ׳”׳‘׳•׳ ׳”] ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳•׳”׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳¨׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳©׳›׳. ׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳׳™ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳©׳‘׳—׳×"׳¡ [׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳‘] ׳•׳‘׳×׳₪׳׳¨"׳™ [׳‘׳›׳׳›׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳”׳] ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳ "׳– [׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳™ ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳’] ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳”׳‘׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳§׳™׳"׳ ׳›׳”׳‘׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•"׳© ׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳' ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳׳× ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳ ׳•׳‘"׳™ ׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™׳׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨AMP.
JJ ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳§׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳›׳•. ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳ ׳’׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”, ׳•׳”׳§' ׳”׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳¨׳™׳˜׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳׳—"׳›, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳, ׳"׳› ׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳”׳•׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳׳×׳•׳¡' ׳•׳¨׳™׳˜׳‘"׳ ׳•׳¨׳"׳© ׳”׳•׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳׳ JJ
׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳—' ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳“"׳” ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳©׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳” ׳׳–׳׳. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳”׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳– ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳§ [׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳– ׳׳‘׳™׳•׳‘] ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳₪׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳×, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳•׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳•, [׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳©׳, ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳"׳’ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”].</small></small>], ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳™׳“׳™׳× [׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳–׳”] ׳©׳‘׳¢׳–׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳¦׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳•׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳•׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳‘. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳× ׳©׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳§׳§ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳‘׳˜׳™׳”</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳× ׳©׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳” <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳˜׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳–׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’], ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳™׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳’ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳"׳•] ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳•׳׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳×׳— ׳•׳׳”׳™׳¡׳’׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳–׳” [׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳×׳©׳׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢].</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳” ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳” <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨.</small></small>.
׳₪׳§׳§ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳‘׳˜׳™׳”, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳–׳” [׳—׳׳§ ׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳•] ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•- ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ [׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳•׳×], ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳• ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳–׳”- ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳•׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳’].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳—׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳×׳׳•</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳§׳¨׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳© ׳׳• ׳׳”׳’׳©׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳—"׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳’, </small></small>.
׳׳‘׳, ׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳“ [׳׳• ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ "׳˜׳™׳©׳™׳•"] ׳‘׳—׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳×׳׳• [׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳׳• ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳¨], ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¢׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳—"׳ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳ "׳, ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳׳£ ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳” ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳¡׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳• ׳×׳׳™׳“, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§ ׳”׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳×׳׳• ׳×׳׳™׳“AMP.
JJ ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳׳™ ׳˜׳•׳‘׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳¢"׳© ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳₪׳¨׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§ ׳”׳—׳׳•׳, ׳"׳› ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳“׳•׳’׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳×׳™׳׳× ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ [׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳] ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›'.</small></small> [׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳].
<h3> ׳”׳—׳–׳¨׳× ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳‘׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳” ׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳׳˜׳‘׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳” ׳‘׳§׳™׳¨ [׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳], ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳‘׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳” ׳‘׳“׳׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳• ׳©׳׳—׳–׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳ ׳•׳¢׳׳• ׳•׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳•] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳‘׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳” ׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳, <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small> ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳‘׳©׳×׳™ ׳”׳˜׳‘׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳”׳, ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳×, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳§׳ ׳” ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳– ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”] ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨"׳× ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳‘׳•, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳ ׳’׳¨ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳™ ׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳×׳“ ׳¢׳¥ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ [׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳] ׳׳‘׳ ׳§׳ ׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳›׳׳•' ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳§׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳’׳¨AMP.
JJ ׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳׳¦׳ ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¨"׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳, ׳×׳׳•׳”, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳—׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳›׳¨"׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¨"׳× ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳” ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳×׳•"׳©, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™ ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›' ׳•׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳© ׳›׳¨"׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳¨׳™׳•׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳›'] ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳¨"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳₪' ׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨׳•, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–. ׳•׳‘׳“׳•׳—׳§ ׳¦"׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳¨"׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳›"׳› ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳§׳ ׳” ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳›"׳], ׳׳‘׳ ׳—׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳”, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳׳—׳׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳₪' ׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳™.  ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳׳¨"׳× ׳¡׳’׳™ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨׳©"׳™, ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳¨"׳× ׳׳” ׳“׳¡׳’׳™ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳™' ׳”׳¡׳•׳’׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¡׳’׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳₪׳™' ׳“׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳¨"׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨׳©"׳™, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳׳© ׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¢ ׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳¡׳’׳™ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳”׳§' ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳§"׳’, ׳•׳‘׳“׳•׳—׳§ ׳™"׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳§׳ ׳” ׳¡"׳ ׳׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳— ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢.  ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳׳.
׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳× ׳"׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳•, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳™"׳—, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳§׳ ׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¨׳©"׳™, ׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳‘׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳×׳™ ׳›׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳’' ׳“"׳” ׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳©׳׳× ׳׳“׳.
׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳›׳•׳×׳, ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳§׳׳– ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳—׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳×׳•׳§׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳˜׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘.  </small></small>.       
<h3> ׳©׳₪׳™׳›׳× ׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳×׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳§׳¨׳—</h3>
׳–. ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳• ׳§׳¨׳— ׳•׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳¨׳‘׳™׳, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳©, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳׳™׳§׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳• <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳˜׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳§׳“. ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳“׳© ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳‘׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳׳— ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳׳™׳§׳• ׳•׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳–׳™׳§׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳™׳ [׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“].
׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳₪׳™׳–׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳”] ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢. </small></small>. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳– ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳• - ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳– ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳”.  [׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳₪׳™׳–׳•׳¨ ׳×׳‘׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳”׳׳₪׳–׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳•׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳•׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳׳™׳™׳× ׳׳×׳׳” ׳‘׳•׳•׳׳§׳•׳</h3>
׳—. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¦׳׳™׳“ ׳׳×׳׳” ׳‘׳׳—׳¥ ׳׳•׳™׳¨ [׳•׳׳§׳•׳] ׳׳§׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳©׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳˜׳׳• ׳׳§׳™׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳"׳˜, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳׳¦׳׳™׳“׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳• ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳׳™׳™׳× ׳•׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳—׳™׳¦׳”</h3>
׳˜. ׳•׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳׳—׳™׳¦׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳׳”׳“׳§׳• ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳•׳•׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳׳˜׳” <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳' ׳‘׳¨׳"׳, ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳•, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳—"׳ ׳•׳”׳›׳׳›׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳׳ ׳×׳•׳׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳•׳™׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳×׳•׳׳”׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳˜ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳˜ ׳׳•׳ ׳— ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳§׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳—׳•׳–׳§ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳•.
׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢ ׳•׳ ׳“ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳— ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳”.</small></small>.
[׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳•׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳×׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳</h3>
׳™. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳”]. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳•׳™׳׳•׳ <b>׳ ׳•׳™</b> ׳¢׳ ׳§׳™׳¨ [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“] ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘׳¢׳• ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳׳˜׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳₪׳¨׳•׳›׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳•׳׳§׳•׳‘׳¢׳• ׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳§׳™׳¨. <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳–. ׳׳׳, ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳•׳¨׳’ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳”׳•׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳•, ׳•׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳•׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳•׳¨׳’ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳˜ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳•׳™׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>. [׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳׳•׳× ׳™׳§׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳–׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳‘׳¨׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡ <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳™׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳™׳©׳‘׳¨׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳. ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small> ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳›׳׳].
<h3> ׳׳©׳•׳” ׳’׳•׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳¨׳¦׳₪׳•׳× ׳—׳“׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳₪׳™׳–׳¨׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳—׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳”׳׳©׳•׳” ׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢- ׳׳©׳•׳” ׳’׳•׳׳•׳×- ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳׳ ׳—׳¨׳™׳¥ ׳©׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳• ׳”׳©׳₪׳™׳ ׳×׳, ׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳“׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳¨׳© <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳’:, ׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳— ׳”"׳ ׳•׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳™"׳‘, ׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳–.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳” ׳’׳•׳׳•׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳–, ׳‘'. ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳™׳¦׳₪׳• ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳₪׳›׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳—׳•׳, ׳›׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¦׳₪׳™׳, ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¦׳₪׳•׳× ׳™׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳• ׳‘׳”׳׳™׳›׳×׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳¨׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¦׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳—׳–׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳¦׳™׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜ ׳”׳׳¨׳›׳ ׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳׳×׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳”.  ׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳’׳•׳¨׳™׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳›׳₪׳× ׳׳™׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳”.  ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳›׳— ׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳' ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳™. ׳•׳“׳£ ׳™׳: ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳˜׳™׳—׳× ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳‘׳•׳“, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳˜׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳˜׳— ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳— ׳׳ ׳׳•׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨, ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳›׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳’׳•׳¨׳™׳• <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳’׳•׳¨׳™׳• ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳‘׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳•׳” ׳’׳•׳׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳•׳›׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳—׳–"׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ "׳׳©׳•׳™׳™ ׳’׳•׳׳•׳×", ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳ ׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”:
BB ׳. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳×׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳×׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳–, ׳‘' ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳™׳©. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳’׳–׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£ ׳׳˜׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£. ׳•׳׳¨׳•׳•׳— ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¦׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳׳׳•׳“, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™ ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'. ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳¦׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¦׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳¨׳¦׳₪׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘, ׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳×׳׳׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¦׳₪׳•׳× [׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳׳¨׳¦׳₪׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳].
׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳™"׳— ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¢"׳’ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳—׳¦׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› [׳₪׳›"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳™'] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳¦׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳×. </small></small> [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”].
׳‘. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳¨׳™׳¦׳₪׳”, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳×, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳©׳•׳” ׳’׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳× <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳–, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳•׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳×. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¦׳”. ׳“"׳” ׳©׳¨׳]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›' ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ [׳“"׳” ׳•׳™׳©] ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳.  ׳•׳׳•׳׳ ׳“׳׳¡׳×׳₪׳™׳ ׳ ׳”׳•׳” ׳׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳”׳“׳—׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳"׳“ ׳©׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£ [׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳], ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳—׳” ׳•׳׳¢׳₪"׳› ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳§׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳“׳—׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳¨׳•׳›׳” ׳¢׳' ׳¦׳’ ׳©׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳›׳¢׳™"׳–, ׳•׳"׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳¨׳™׳¦׳₪׳” ׳›׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳¨׳™׳¦׳₪׳” ׳׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳×׳”.
׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳¨׳‘׳™׳ [׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳—׳™׳“ !] ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳“. ׳•׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳§׳™׳׳• ׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳©׳© ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳–. </small></small>.
׳׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳• ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳₪׳” [׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳×׳•], ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳— ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳₪׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳¢"׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳•. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳“, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳×׳• [׳•׳”"׳” ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳×׳•], ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳–׳• ׳׳¦׳׳×׳™ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳”]. ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳—׳–"׳, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳׳–׳” ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳’ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳'] ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳₪׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳“׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳¨׳₪׳• ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳×׳•. </small></small> [׳׳ ׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳’׳‘ ׳¡׳₪׳•׳’׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” !].
׳’. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳£ ׳¨׳•׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳—׳” ׳©׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳×, ׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳₪׳™ ׳×׳•׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳—׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳₪׳” ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳£ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳”׳׳™׳›׳×׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳“׳•׳¨׳¡ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳—׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳₪׳™ ׳×׳•׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳¡׳× [׳׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳×׳•׳׳•].
׳•׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳§ ׳•׳”׳׳™׳—׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳×׳•׳׳•, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳™"׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. </small></small>.
׳“. ׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳ ׳¢׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳ ׳—׳• ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳—. </small></small> [׳•׳‘׳›׳•׳×׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨], ׳•׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳‘׳׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳×, ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳×׳‘׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”. </small></small>.
׳”. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳’׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳•׳” ׳’׳•׳׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳¦׳“ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳—, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳›. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳ "׳—.</small></small>. ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳—׳•׳¨׳© [׳¡׳›"׳—] ׳•׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳¡], ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳¦׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× [׳’׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳], ׳•׳‘׳§׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›"׳› ׳›׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£. ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›' ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳§׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳— ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳.
׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳¦׳₪׳” ׳‘׳›׳“׳•׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳©׳•׳” ׳’׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳׳’ ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳” ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳›׳“׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳˜.</small></small>. ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳ <b>׳׳</b> ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳§׳‘׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳• <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳’, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳¢׳•׳˜ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳©׳•׳’׳’׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™.</small></small>, ׳“׳׳•׳˜׳‘ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳©׳•׳’׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳׳–׳™׳“׳™׳.
׳•. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>.
׳–. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳©׳™׳‘ ׳™׳₪׳” ׳—׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳©׳×׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳©׳•׳” ׳’׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳–, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳›,</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳.EE
<h3> ׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳‘׳“ ׳™׳—׳“</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳—׳׳§ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳‘׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§ ׳•׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳’׳•׳© ׳׳—׳“.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳›׳ ׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳×, ׳©׳”׳׳’׳‘׳ ׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳¢׳¦׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳׳”׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳§ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳¦׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳§ ׳“׳‘׳™׳׳•׳× ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳§׳‘׳¦׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳§׳‘׳¦׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small> ׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳', ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳”, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳׳”׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳“׳‘׳§׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳×. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳•׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳¢׳™׳¡׳•׳× ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳§ ׳•׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳‘׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳× ׳•׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳©׳ "׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳”. [׳•׳‘׳“׳¢"׳× ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳©׳›"׳ ׳”׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳“'].</small></small>. ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳§ ׳•׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳‘׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳× ׳•׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳§׳• ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ <b>׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¡׳”</b> ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳•׳×,  ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳׳—׳×׳•׳</b> ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¡׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳” ׳•׳׳”׳—׳×׳™׳›׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳›׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳¦׳“ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§ ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳׳“׳‘׳§ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳×. ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¡׳” ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳•׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳§ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳׳‘׳ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳.  ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳¡׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳¢"׳’ ׳§׳׳£ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳™׳§׳×׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨, ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” [׳•׳¢׳×׳” ׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳©׳¢׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳” [׳™'] ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳•׳×׳¨],  ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳—"׳ ׳‘׳”׳' ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳›׳׳ ׳¦"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’', ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳—׳§׳™׳§׳” ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳₪׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳”, ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳', ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©.</small></small>. ׳•׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳• ׳×׳‘׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳— ׳•׳׳׳—׳§, ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳, ׳™"׳˜.</small></small>. [׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳© ׳‘׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳¡׳׳˜, ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳©].
<h3> ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳’׳׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳›׳£ ׳¢׳’׳•׳׳” </h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢׳•׳× ׳›׳£ ׳¢׳’׳•׳׳” ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳’׳•׳׳•׳× ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳•׳× <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳׳ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳—. </small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳¨׳›׳‘׳× ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳–.
<h3> ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳’</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳’ ׳׳• ׳‘׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳’ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳׳’ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳× <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳ ׳©׳׳× ׳׳“׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳˜ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳•׳× ׳™׳׳™׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳§׳¨׳— ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳׳’ ׳׳×׳¨׳¡׳§ ׳•׳ ׳׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳•, ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳˜'. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳, ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳™׳:
BB ׳. ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ <b>׳’׳׳•׳¨</b> ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ [׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳•] ׳•׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳” <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳'. ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳₪"׳™ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳׳•. ׳•׳“׳£ ׳¢׳“: ׳•׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳“: ׳©׳‘׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• ׳™׳© ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳”׳—׳–׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳•', ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳, ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳.  </small></small>.
׳‘. ׳›׳׳™ <b>׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§</b> ׳׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳• [׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳©׳•׳‘], ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳• ׳‘׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ [׳•׳’׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳•׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳•'.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡"׳“.EE
׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ <b>׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳×</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ [׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳], ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳™"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳©, ׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ [׳©׳™"׳“, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳•׳"׳¨ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳]. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳™. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳—׳₪׳– ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”. ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳"׳•.</small></small>. 
׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳' ׳¡׳׳” ׳׳• ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳•׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳” ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ [׳›׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳- ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳].
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳.</small></small> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳¡׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘', ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳‘:, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳: ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳˜׳™׳˜ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳"׳© ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳"׳¨ ׳–׳™׳¨׳], ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ [׳›׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳™׳- ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳‘: ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• ׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳¢"׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳×׳•׳¡ ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳. ׳•׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•' ׳©׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳™׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳¨׳™׳›׳× ׳ ׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳’, ׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳].  ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳— ׳•׳׳’׳¡׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳× ׳׳’׳“׳ ׳•׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳›׳“׳׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨.  ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳×׳§׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳'], ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§ ׳—׳׳© ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳§׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳—׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳×׳§׳™ ׳—׳–׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳›׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳’׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳’ ׳©׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳•׳¡׳×׳§׳™, ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳§׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳×׳. </small></small> [׳•׳׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳ ׳™׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ ׳•׳×׳§׳•׳¢ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳§׳™׳™׳.
׳•׳׳›׳, ׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ [׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳] ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳”׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ <b>׳׳‘׳ ׳”</b> ׳©׳׳ [׳׳‘׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳׳’׳“׳ <b>׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳•׳”׳</b> ] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳” ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳§׳× ׳‘׳ ׳’׳™׳¢׳” ׳§׳׳”, [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳¡׳×׳•׳¨] <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small> ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳”. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳•׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨, ׳•׳₪׳©׳™׳˜׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©] ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳‘׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳•׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳©׳"׳› ׳›׳©׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳™׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨, ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳•׳׳¨׳›׳™׳‘ ׳׳‘׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳ ׳•׳™ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• [׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳–].
׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳” ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳§׳× ׳‘׳ ׳’׳™׳¢׳” ׳§׳׳” [׳›׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳’׳“׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳•׳×]. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.  
׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳׳© ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳"׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳’׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳‘׳ ׳™׳” ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳ ׳™׳” ׳›׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. </small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳” <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳–], ׳•׳"׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳“ ׳’׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× [׳•׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳›׳•']. ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™"׳ [׳—׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳'] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳§׳׳” ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳ ׳” ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳“, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small> ׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
- ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳•, ׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘.
<h3> ׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳× ׳׳–׳¨׳§ ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳× "׳₪׳×׳™׳ ׳¦׳£"</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ [׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜] ׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳¢׳™׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳׳ [׳₪׳×׳™׳ ׳¦׳£], ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳›׳™׳‘ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳׳–׳¨׳§ [׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳] ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small> ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳” ׳”׳¢' ׳¡"׳–] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳ ׳–׳¨׳§, ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳” ׳–׳• ׳›׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳—׳“׳© ׳׳׳ ׳›׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳•׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳’׳׳•׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳–׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳–׳¨׳§ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳©׳×׳׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳¨׳›׳™׳‘ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳× <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳”׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳¢. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳’׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small> ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳“׳¨׳›׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳• ׳‘׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳•'. ׳“׳—׳™׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳“׳§ ׳׳• ׳™׳×׳§׳¢. ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳, ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”. ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳¦׳“׳“ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘] ׳׳©"׳› ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳×].
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳¨׳›׳™׳‘ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳¢ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small> ׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳•'. ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳¡׳§"׳™] ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>.
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳¨׳›׳™׳‘ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳”.
<h3> ׳’׳“׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ ׳•׳×׳§׳•׳¢, ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳’׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳’׳“׳¨ <b>׳¨׳₪׳•׳™</b>, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳‘׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳¦׳™׳‘ ׳•׳—׳–׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳¢׳¢׳• ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳¨ <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small> ׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳“׳¨׳›׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳‘׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳•׳׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™. <b>׳׳”׳•׳“׳§</b>, ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳™׳¦׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳¨. ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳‘׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳‘.</small></small>. <b>׳•׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳”</b>, ׳”׳™׳ ׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳–׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳¡׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳×׳§׳¢ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small> ׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”', ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳™"׳’.</small></small>.
׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳’ [׳”׳‘׳¨׳’׳”] ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small> ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳•', ׳•׳¢"׳™ ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘, ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳›׳”׳׳’"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘.</small></small>. [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢"׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™ (׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳”׳׳”׳“׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳©׳•׳׳—׳- ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳×) ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳¨׳’׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳™׳¡׳‘׳¨׳• ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§, ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳• ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘] ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳’</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳›׳¢׳× ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳”׳• [׳›׳©׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×], ׳•׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳× ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳˜"׳–. ׳•׳׳– ׳’׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™ [׳©׳, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳”]. ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳” ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” [׳₪"׳“ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳ "׳—] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳—׳©׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳—.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳¡׳₪׳¡׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳• ׳¨׳’׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•.
׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳’ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳•׳¨׳’ <b>׳ ׳׳‘׳“</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳“׳™׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳” ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳•׳¨׳’, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small> ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳’ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳”׳‘׳¨׳’׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳›׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳•׳™, ׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳•׳¨׳’ ׳ ׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳›"׳› ׳©׳™׳×׳§׳¢ ׳•׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳¨׳’׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳–. </small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳•׳¨׳’ <b>׳ ׳׳¦׳</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳– ׳’׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳™׳“׳™׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small> ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳˜"׳–, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳“׳©. ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳׳ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳•, ׳¢׳™' ׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” [׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳“' ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳•] ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• [׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’]. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳§׳ ׳” ׳‘׳•׳©׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳˜] ׳©׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳—׳¨ [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳׳] ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>. [׳•׳׳ ׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳˜"׳–.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳“׳©׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳¢׳“׳©׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳“׳©׳” ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small> ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳¢ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳׳©. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳×׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳’׳¨׳× ׳”׳×׳¨׳—׳‘׳” ׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳¡׳“׳¨׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳•׳׳- ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳›׳¢׳× ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳¢ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ "׳. [׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳×׳™ ׳׳–׳” ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨, ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳’׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳™׳ ׳¨׳’׳ ׳—׳“׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳׳–׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳"׳¢]. </small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳“׳©׳” ׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¢׳“׳©׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ [׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳ "׳].
<h3> ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳‘׳¨׳’׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small> ׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳˜"׳– ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳₪׳¡׳§׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”.</small></small>.  ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳, ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳׳›׳×׳‘׳™׳• ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳–׳¨׳ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ [׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳”], ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳¢׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳ [׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™] ׳•׳׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳—׳¨ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳•׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ <b>׳•׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“</b>, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳•׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ [׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳–׳• ׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small> ׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳”׳]. ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳׳׳•׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳•׳׳”׳¨׳›׳™׳‘׳• [׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳–.] ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳×׳׳™׳“׳•׳×, ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳§׳ ׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳ ׳•׳"׳› ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™. ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳–׳¨׳ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳›׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳›׳‘׳”׳• ׳•׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳• ׳×׳׳™׳“, ׳"׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“, ׳›׳‘׳—׳©׳׳, ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨. [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳₪' ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳©׳׳]. </small></small>].
<h3> ׳”׳’׳‘׳”׳× ׳¡׳˜׳ ׳“׳¨ ׳׳×׳‘׳¨׳’</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳¡׳˜׳ ׳“׳¨ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳”׳• ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳׳™׳›׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳• ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳™ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳• ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳ <sup>׳¢׳—</sup><small><small> ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳—], ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳˜׳ ׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳• ׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳× ׳’׳•׳‘׳”׳• ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳™׳¨.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ <sup>׳¢׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘], ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳˜׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳"׳› ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳׳ ׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳§׳ ׳” ׳©׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳”׳›׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳׳ ׳׳•׳, ׳™"׳ ׳“׳”׳×׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳” ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳©׳"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳˜׳ ׳“׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳׳ ׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™], ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳"׳‘- ׳’'], ׳׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳ ׳§׳¦׳× ׳¦"׳¢ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳•׳¡׳•׳’׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳, ׳•׳§׳©׳” ׳“׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳׳§׳ ׳” ׳©׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳©׳ ׳˜׳¨׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳©׳׳“׳™ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳‘׳¨׳’׳× ׳₪׳§׳§ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳׳—׳™׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳’ ׳₪׳§׳§ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳¨׳׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳׳—׳™׳” ׳׳׳׳—׳™׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳¨׳’׳” <sup>׳₪</sup><small><small> ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳—׳™׳” ׳•׳‘׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“, ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳, ׳׳׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳©׳×׳׳©׳•׳×׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳”׳›׳׳™ [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳—׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳–׳׳, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳•׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳] ׳•׳"׳› ׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳” ׳›׳©׳׳•׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳©׳ ׳”׳”׳©׳×׳׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡' ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.  ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳‘׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳–׳¨׳ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳§׳¦׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳•, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳§׳• ׳׳—"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳•׳ ׳×׳©׳׳•׳׳™׳ [׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳], ׳"׳› ׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳• ׳›׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳©׳ ׳¦׳ ׳¦׳ ׳× ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¨׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ [׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“].
<h3> ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳™׳˜׳׳” ׳׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳×</h3>
