<b>׳›׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳₪׳™׳˜׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳₪׳§׳§ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳™׳˜׳׳” ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§׳× ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳₪׳</sup><small><small> ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳™׳˜׳׳” ׳׳₪׳§׳§ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§. </small></small>.
׳₪׳™׳˜׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳•׳׳©׳•׳˜׳₪׳ ׳•׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳ ׳׳₪׳§׳§ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳•׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“. 
<h3> ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳© ׳׳›׳¡׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳—.</b> ׳›׳™׳¡׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳׳¨׳›׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳’׳© ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳•׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“] ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨. (׳•׳™׳© ׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳•׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×) <sup>׳₪׳‘</sup><small><small> ׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳× ׳–׳¨׳ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳•, ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳•׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™׳×- ׳›׳׳• ׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳•, ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳›׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ ׳•׳׳’׳¨"׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳” ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳›׳¡׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳•׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳§ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳¡׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳‘"׳¦ ׳₪׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳, ׳”׳›׳¡׳ ׳•׳”׳׳’׳© ׳”׳׳©׳׳© ׳›׳©׳•׳׳—׳, ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›"׳› ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳©׳•׳×׳£ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳. [׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳×׳™, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳•"׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳˜׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳›׳׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳–׳ ׳׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳׳•׳˜</h3>
<b>׳›׳˜.</b> ׳׳‘׳–׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳˜ ׳׳”׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳”, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳₪׳’</sup><small><small> ׳©׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§, ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳£ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳–׳§.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” [׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳–׳] ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳ <sup>׳₪׳“</sup><small><small> ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘.</small></small> ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳.
׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳”׳׳§׳ ׳׳׳ ׳•, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳’׳• ׳׳• ׳׳×׳•׳§׳¢׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳׳§׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.
<h3> ׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳—׳׳§ ["׳₪׳׳˜׳”"] ׳׳©׳•׳׳—׳</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳—׳׳§ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ["׳₪׳׳˜׳”"] ׳׳©׳•׳׳—׳, ׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳“׳§ ׳׳• ׳™׳×׳§׳¢ <sup>׳₪׳”</sup><small><small> ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳”.  ׳•׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳ ׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳"׳¦ ׳”׳›׳”׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳׳ ׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳©׳‘׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳׳˜׳• ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> [׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳¡׳§ <b>׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳</b> ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢׳•׳× ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳׳©׳—׳§, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳—, ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳©׳ ׳™].
׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳×׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳.
׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§׳× ׳׳• ׳×׳§׳•׳¢׳” ׳–׳” ׳‘׳–׳” [׳›׳׳• "׳׳’׳•" ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•"׳§׳׳™׳§׳¡", ׳•"׳׳’׳•" ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ (׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳) ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳× ׳™׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳× ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳” ׳•׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳–׳׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳”], ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳ <sup>׳₪׳•</sup><small><small> ׳׳£ ׳©׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳” ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳×׳׳™׳“׳™׳™׳, ׳"׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳›׳–] ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡' ׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” [׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳”' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'] ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳•׳”׳“׳’׳™׳© ׳©׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ "׳§׳׳™׳§׳¡" ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳–׳”׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ ׳׳׳•׳“.</small></small>, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳§׳׳™׳¢׳× ׳•׳¡׳™׳׳¡׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳¡׳ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳§׳׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳”׳¡׳׳¡׳•׳, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳™׳׳¡׳•׳ ׳₪׳׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳׳¡׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳₪׳¨׳§׳• <sup>׳₪׳–</sup><small><small> ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳׳›׳×׳‘ [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳"׳‘]. ׳•׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳¡׳™׳׳¡׳•׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳. ׳•׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳ ׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>].  ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳•׳¢ ׳•׳׳¡׳×׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳× ׳×׳׳•׳©׳”, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳’ ׳•׳₪׳•׳¦׳¢ <sup>׳₪׳—</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳›"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳‘. ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳¡׳׳¡׳•׳ ׳₪׳׳•׳×, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳×׳₪׳׳¨"׳™ ׳‘׳›׳׳›׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳¢"׳™ ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪'. ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳›"׳˜ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳‘׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳× ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳”׳׳•׳–׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™ ׳•׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳×׳§׳¢</h3>
<b>׳׳’.</b> ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳–׳¨׳ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™, ׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ [׳•׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨], ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳¡׳‘׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳”׳—׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳×׳׳“׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳”׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳“׳׳§ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ <sup>׳₪׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳¡׳§"׳˜] ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳׳“׳× ׳›׳— ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳×׳׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳”׳•׳׳“׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳© ג€“ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳. ׳׳›׳×׳‘׳™׳• ׳”׳׳׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳׳•"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳].</small></small>.
׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳–׳¨׳ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳×׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳¢׳, ׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳§׳¢ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳¢ <sup>׳¦</sup><small><small> ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳›"׳— ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§"׳.</small></small> [׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳•- ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• <sup>׳¦׳</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•]. </small></small>], ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” <sup>׳¦׳‘</sup><small><small> ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳•] ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳ ׳×׳ [׳₪"׳• ׳׳•׳× ׳“] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳©׳׳¢ ׳›׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳–׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳×׳§ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳, ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳ ׳›׳].</small></small>.
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™* - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳•׳”׳</h2>
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳•׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳”׳</h3>
<b>׳׳“.</b> ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳” ׳”׳׳•׳”׳.
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳×׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳’ ׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳“, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳“ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳’ <sup>׳¦׳’</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳• ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳•, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳’' ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳”.
׳•׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳©-׳—' ׳•׳˜' ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳“׳•׳₪׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢. ׳•׳¦׳¢"׳’ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳”: ׳“"׳” ׳”׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳©׳• ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳׳“׳× ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳׳“. ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳"׳› ׳׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳”, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳—׳™׳¦׳× ׳׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨. ׳’׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢, ׳•׳¦"׳¢, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳“׳•׳₪׳ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳—׳’ ׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳•׳× ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ "׳›׳׳” ׳™׳׳™׳", ׳•׳“׳•׳—׳§. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳– ׳“"׳” ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳©׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳›"׳• ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳”.  [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳’' ׳“"׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳•׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳• ׳×׳“׳™׳¨, ׳©׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳×׳“׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳– ׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳“׳׳× ׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳” (׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳—), ׳•׳׳×׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳×׳“׳™׳¨]. </small></small>. ׳•׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ "׳§׳‘׳•׳¢" ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳’׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳¨׳•׳—׳‘ ׳׳•׳”׳</h3>
<b>׳׳”.</b> ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳™׳© <b>׳‘׳’׳•׳‘׳”׳•</b> ׳˜׳₪׳— [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳׳׳”׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳ ׳˜׳₪׳—] <sup>׳¦׳“</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳™"׳’.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ <b>׳‘׳¨׳•׳—׳‘׳•</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳—׳‘׳• ׳˜׳₪׳— <sup>׳¦׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳©׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳—׳‘׳• ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳•׳– ׳׳–׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳’ ׳”׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳׳•.</b> ׳“׳׳× ׳׳• ׳’׳’ ׳”׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¡׳’׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¦׳•</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳›"׳•, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳›. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳–. </small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳’׳’ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳•׳ ׳¡׳’׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳’ ׳‘׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳¦׳–</sup><small><small> ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳“"׳” ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳‘׳©׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©.</small></small> [׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ ! ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳– ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳’׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳’׳׳× ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳×].
<h3> ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳× ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ [׳‘׳׳™ ׳’׳’]</h3>
<b>׳׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳• ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳× ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ <sup>׳¦׳—</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’.</small></small> [׳‘׳׳‘׳“, ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳’׳’], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” <b>׳”׳׳×׳¨׳×</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¢׳¨׳׳™, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳׳© ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳׳•׳”׳• ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳” [׳“׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳×] ׳׳• ׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳• ׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳×׳©׳”"׳ [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”] <sup>׳¦׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳×׳- ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳”׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳- ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳.</small></small>.
׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳˜׳₪׳—, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡׳”, ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ <sup>׳§</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳'.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳” ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳›׳¨׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳™׳—׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳₪׳¨׳™׳¡׳×׳” <sup>׳§׳</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳™׳—׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳›׳₪׳•׳׳” [׳©׳, ׳™'], ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳™׳—׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳§׳‘</sup><small><small>׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜] ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜.</small></small>.
׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳’׳•׳׳’׳׳× ׳‘׳¨׳•׳—׳‘ ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳” ׳˜׳₪׳— <sup>׳§׳’</sup><small><small> ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small> ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳”.
<h3> ׳“׳׳× ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳—.</b> ׳“׳׳× ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳”׳׳©׳׳©׳× ׳›׳“׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳•׳›׳©׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳•׳›׳©׳¡׳•׳’׳¨ ׳ ׳›׳©׳¨׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳”, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ [׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳©׳¨ ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳×] ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳“׳•׳₪׳ ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳”׳“׳׳× <sup>׳§׳“</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨׳¦"׳₪ ׳₪׳¨׳׳ ׳§ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳׳™ ׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳¡׳•׳›׳•׳× [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™'] ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳–׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳›"׳, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳©׳¨׳™, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳©׳׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳“׳™׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳“׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ [׳©׳©"׳› ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳›"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳›"׳• ׳•׳©׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳"׳“, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳”׳׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳–' ׳”׳¢' 69]. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• [׳—"׳‘ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳™׳˜] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳×׳¨׳™׳¡׳™׳ ׳”׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳”.
׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳: ׳. ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳‘. ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳’׳¨ ׳’׳’ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳’׳©׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳©׳”׳’׳’ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳”, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳©׳ "׳¡׳•׳›׳”" ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳×, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳', ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳”, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳×׳™' ׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳₪' ׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳•׳”׳§' ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳”, ׳•׳×׳™' ׳”׳§"׳  [׳׳•׳× ׳›] ׳©׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳’ ׳׳׳•׳”׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳”, ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳׳’"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•] ׳•׳"׳‘ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜] ׳©׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳™׳—׳” ׳׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳¢׳¨׳׳™, ׳"׳› ׳—׳–׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳₪׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳˜ ׳•׳׳©׳™׳—׳” ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳’"׳› ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳©׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨.
[׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳×׳¢׳©׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳›׳©׳¨׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳›"׳•, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜].</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳”</sup><small><small> ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳•׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳׳™ ׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳©׳ ׳’"׳› ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳×].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™</h3>
<b>׳׳˜.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳×׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢, ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳” ׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™:
BB<b>׳</b>. ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳˜׳₪׳— [׳•׳׳•׳”׳ ׳׳’׳•׳׳’׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳—׳‘ ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <sup>׳§׳•</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small>] ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳©׳˜׳• ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳¢׳¨׳׳™.
[׳׳•׳”׳ <b>׳׳‘׳•׳“</b> ׳˜׳₪׳—, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳§׳–</sup><small><small>[׳›׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳˜׳₪׳— ׳•׳™׳© ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳’' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳] ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“, ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¡׳×׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳׳”׳׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳׳, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“, ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳“.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳”].
<b>׳‘</b>. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳’ ׳•׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™, ׳©׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• <sup>׳§׳—</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳’', ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.</small></small>.
<b>׳’</b>. ׳׳ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳§׳™׳™׳׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳’׳’ ׳׳• ׳©׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡ ׳¨׳§ ׳’׳’ ׳׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳›׳׳, ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™. ׳•׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳™׳.
׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳—׳“׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳”׳ ׳’׳’ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ <sup>׳§׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳—.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳—׳“׳©׳•׳× <sup>׳§׳™</sup><small><small> ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“. </small></small>. EE
XX ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳׳× ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳'- ׳"׳, ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳§׳“׳׳•׳×.
<b>׳”׳׳—׳“</b>- ׳™׳© ׳’' ׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳•׳”׳:
BB׳. ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳’׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳©׳׳©.
׳‘. ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳•׳׳˜׳¨׳×׳• ׳‘׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳”׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•.
׳’. ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳•׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•.EE
<b>׳”׳©׳ ׳™</b>- ׳™׳© ׳’' ׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳•׳”׳:
BB׳.  ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳’׳’ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳§׳™׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳’׳’ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳›׳׳.
׳‘. ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳—׳“׳©׳•׳× [׳׳• ׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳].
׳’. ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳—׳“׳©׳•׳× [׳׳• ׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳] ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳’׳’ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳.EE
׳•׳׳¢׳×׳” ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳ ׳§׳ ׳‘׳¢׳–׳”"׳™.  GG
<h3> ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳’ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× <b>׳”׳§׳™׳™׳׳•׳×</b> ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳’׳’ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™, ׳׳• ׳©׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡ ׳¨׳§ ׳’׳’ ׳׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳׳™, ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳’ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ <b>׳׳”׳’׳</b> ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳’׳©׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳§׳™׳</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§"׳› ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳ "׳‘. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳•׳›׳׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳”׳’׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳’׳’ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳’׳©׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳• <sup>׳§׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳“' ׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳¨׳§ ׳’׳’ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳—׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” [׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳• ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘], ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳“' ׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳’ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•, ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳›"׳“.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳ <b>׳׳©׳×׳׳©</b> ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳’׳’ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳• ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ [׳•׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳’׳’ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” <sup>׳§׳™׳’</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳˜׳•׳×. [׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳• ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳¦׳, ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳”׳’׳].  </small></small>].
׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ "׳₪׳׳˜׳”" ׳©׳ ׳¢׳¥ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳”׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™׳× <sup>׳§׳™׳“</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳–.</small></small> [׳•׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ <sup>׳§׳˜׳•</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳•', ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳©"׳› ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳”׳¢' ׳₪"׳”.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳’׳’ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳—׳“׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× <b>׳—׳“׳©׳•׳×</b> [׳׳• ׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ <sup>׳§׳˜׳–</sup><small><small> ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳˜ ׳׳•׳× ׳’.</small></small>] ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳’׳’ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™, ׳׳– ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳×, ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•. ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳• <sup>׳§׳™׳–</sup><small><small> ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ [׳•׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳– ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨׳•, ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳•, ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳• ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨]. ׳•׳׳•׳›׳— ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳§׳׳× ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳’ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•, ׳׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳©׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳’ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳›׳©׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳‘׳” ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳”׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳§׳™׳—</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳–'.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳¨׳–׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳§׳¨׳© ׳׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳§׳¨׳© ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•.
<h3> ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳•׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳˜׳₪׳— ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳•׳— ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳’' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳™׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳‘. ׳“"׳” ׳׳, ׳•׳”׳§' ׳”׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳׳׳× ׳—׳׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳™׳©׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳׳” ׳©׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳©׳™׳™׳×׳•, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳˜. [׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳’׳’ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳™׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳’׳’ ׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳’׳’ ׳•׳”׳¢׳׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¢׳׳™׳“׳ ׳›׳›׳™׳¡׳ ׳˜׳¨׳¡׳§׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳”'].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳׳–׳¨׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳˜׳” ׳׳×׳§׳₪׳׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳’.</b> ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳×׳§׳₪׳׳× ׳©׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳•׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳© ׳•׳׳–׳¨׳•׳ [׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ! <sup>׳§׳›</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳•', ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳.</small></small>], ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳–׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳’' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳§׳¨׳© ׳•׳׳–׳¨׳•׳ <sup>׳§׳›׳</sup><small><small> ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳”' ׳“"׳” ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳“׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳¨׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳’' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳’׳’ ׳׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳—] ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳˜׳•׳×.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳’' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ <sup>׳§׳›׳‘</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳’' ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳˜׳•׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳§׳¨׳© ׳׳• ׳׳–׳¨׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳× ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§</h3>
<b>׳׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳™׳˜׳× ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳• ׳¢׳¨׳™׳¡׳” ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— <b>׳‘׳×׳—׳×׳™׳×</b> ׳”׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳§׳¨׳© ׳׳• ׳”׳׳–׳¨׳•׳ [׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳ !], ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳© ׳׳• ׳”׳׳–׳¨׳•׳ <sup>׳§׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳§׳¨׳© ׳׳• ׳׳–׳¨׳•׳ <b>׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢</b> ׳”׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳¢׳¨׳™׳¡׳” <sup>׳§׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳’׳’ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳’׳’ ׳¢׳ ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× [׳©׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳•׳“ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳©׳™׳, (׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳“ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳¨׳¥- ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳’' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳׳×׳—׳×׳™׳× ׳”׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳׳׳¨׳¥)], ׳•׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳“"׳” ׳׳˜׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•, ׳¦"׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳“' ׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳™"׳‘AMP.
JJ ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳— ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳×, ׳“׳”׳×׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳•׳ ׳¡׳×׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳ ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳¡׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨- ׳’׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳, ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳§׳”"׳™ ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ג€“ ׳™׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳©.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳§׳¨׳© ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳</h3>
<b>׳׳”.</b> ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳¨׳’׳׳™׳™׳ [׳‘׳׳™ ׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳×] ׳•׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳§׳¨׳©, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳›׳™׳‘׳ ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳- ׳”׳¨׳’׳׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳”׳§׳¨׳©. [׳•׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳§׳¨׳© ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳×׳—׳×׳™׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳’׳׳™׳™׳] <sup>׳§׳›׳”</sup><small><small> ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳׳˜׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳©׳, ׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳• ׳›׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳ ׳™׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳׳× ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳”׳¦׳ ׳™׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳׳× ׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳“"׳” ׳׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳”׳, ׳׳©׳"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳”׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳¡׳×׳ [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳¨׳™׳•׳— ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳’׳’ ׳׳¢׳׳™׳”׳]. ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳¡"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳•׳¢ ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•. ׳•׳"׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳§׳¨׳© ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳¨׳’׳׳™׳™׳ ׳׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳’׳• ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳‘׳” ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳’. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳׳©׳׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳§׳™׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳–׳™׳–׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳, ׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳• <sup>׳§׳›׳•</sup><small><small> ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ "׳׳”׳’׳" ׳›׳׳• ׳—׳•׳₪׳”, ׳׳ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳›׳ ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳×׳™׳• ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳× ׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳–.</b> ׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳× ׳•׳ ׳¡׳’׳¨׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳›׳–</sup><small><small> ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™ ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳—' ׳“"׳” ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¡ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳’ ׳‘׳׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳”׳׳—׳–׳™׳§׳• [׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳•׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳•׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳• ׳׳©׳ ׳׳•׳”׳, ׳׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳’׳’ ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳©׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨ ׳•׳©׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳’׳©׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳¨׳™׳¡׳× ׳—׳•׳₪׳” ׳”׳§׳©׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳•׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳₪׳” ׳•׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳”׳’׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳]. [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳ ׳•׳‘"׳™ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳×׳•, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳”, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳].
׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳•] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳•׳ ׳¡׳’׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳×׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳ [׳•׳’׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳×׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳, ׳¢׳™"׳©].</small></small>, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳× ׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳” ׳”׳₪׳×׳•׳—׳” ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳§׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳” ׳₪׳×׳•׳—׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳‘׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳˜' ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳•׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳’׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳’׳׳” ׳•׳₪׳¨׳™׳¡׳× ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳׳™׳•</h3>
<b>׳׳—.</b> ׳’׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳’׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¢׳’׳׳” <sup>׳§׳›׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳•', ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳.</small></small> [׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳×. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳›׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳—׳‘ ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳§׳</sup><small><small> ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳˜׳₪׳—, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small>].
׳’׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳§׳ ׳‘׳¢׳’׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳•׳ ׳¡׳’׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳• <sup>׳§׳׳</sup><small><small> ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳• ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳›"׳–, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳–׳• ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳” ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳©׳׳™׳ ׳"׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳–׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳’ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳‘׳• [׳•׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳› ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳‘׳™"׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳', ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳”׳' ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳•׳›׳ "׳], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳“. ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳₪׳›"׳— ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘' ׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳’׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳˜ ׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳₪׳™׳¥ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳§׳׳‘</sup><small><small> ׳›׳׳• ׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳” ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳˜׳₪׳—, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳”.</small></small>.                                  
׳’׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳×׳—׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳ ׳™׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳’׳’׳•׳. [׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§׳• ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳§׳׳’</sup><small><small> ׳”׳‘׳׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳˜ ׳׳•׳× ׳] ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳•׳›' ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳”׳׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™], ׳׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳”׳׳׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨. ׳•׳"׳› ׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳’׳•׳ ׳¢׳’׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳׳"׳‘ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳], ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› [׳₪׳›"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳“] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳“׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳₪ײ¸׳×׳•׳— ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳©, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳“] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳›׳׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™׳”׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳’׳•׳‘׳” ׳˜׳₪׳— <sup>׳§׳׳“</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳–׳•׳™ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’.</small></small>. [׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳’׳•׳‘׳” ׳˜׳₪׳— <sup>׳§׳׳”</sup><small><small> ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳’ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳× ׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳¨׳—׳‘ ׳©׳•׳׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳ .</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳©׳•׳׳™׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳©׳˜׳™׳ ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳¨׳׳©׳•, [׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”] <sup>׳§׳׳•</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳ "׳‘. ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳' ׳§׳׳” ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳- 9.6 ׳¡"׳, ׳׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳˜׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳”׳§׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳•׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳ ׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” <b>׳’׳“׳•׳׳”</b> ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ <sup>׳§׳׳–</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—.</small></small>.
׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” <b>׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳”</b> ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳×׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳×׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳–׳–׳× ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳›׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” <sup>׳§׳׳—</sup><small><small> ׳©׳, ׳•׳”׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳"׳‘ ׳”׳–׳–׳× ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳›׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳§׳׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“] ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳–׳–׳× ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳›׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳•׳"׳› ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳’׳’ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳, ׳׳ ׳›' ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ "׳’׳“׳•׳" ׳•"׳§׳˜׳" ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳׳§׳׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳ ׳‘.</b> ׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳”:
BB׳. ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳ ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳›׳•׳׳× ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ <sup>׳§׳</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳™"׳’.</small></small>.
׳‘. ׳׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳× ׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” <sup>׳§׳׳</sup><small><small> ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳”׳›׳₪׳™׳₪׳”.</small></small>.
׳’. ׳׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” <sup>׳§׳׳‘</sup><small><small> ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳׳׳“ ׳‘׳§"׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™']. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳¢"׳‘.</small></small>.
׳“. ׳׳ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳§׳׳’</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳•', ׳•׳”"׳” ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>.
׳”. ׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ <sup>׳§׳׳“</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳˜.</small></small>.EE
<h3> ׳”׳—׳–׳¨׳× ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳</h3>
<b>׳ ׳’.</b> ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳• ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳˜׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳׳™׳˜׳”, ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳₪׳×׳•׳—׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳× ׳‘׳׳¡׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳™׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳”׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳׳” ׳‘׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳§ ׳”׳—׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ <sup>׳§׳׳”</sup><small><small> ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳—, ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳• ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳’׳’ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳“ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳₪"׳˜ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳’].</small></small>. ׳•׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” <sup>׳§׳׳•</sup><small><small> ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳’׳’ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳•׳׳—׳™׳¦׳× ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳×׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳¨׳™׳¡׳× ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳•</h3>
<b>׳ ׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳” <sup>׳§׳׳–</sup><small><small> ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳’: ׳•׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳–׳”. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳–, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳‘׳©׳׳—׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳׳.
RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳©</h2>
[׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳•׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳׳•׳×- ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™"׳’ ׳‘׳¡"׳“]
<h3> ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳©</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳”׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳׳• ׳©׳׳©׳₪׳¥ ׳•׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳§׳™׳™׳, ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳©. ׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳”׳×׳•׳§׳¢ ׳׳¡׳׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ [׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳' ׳¡׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳¡׳׳¨ ׳‘׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳”.</small></small>] ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳©, ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳ ׳§׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ [׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳׳”] ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small>.
[׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ <b>׳‘׳•׳ ׳” <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳”, ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳ "׳“.</small></small>.</b> ׳•׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳”׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳©׳׳׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳• <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳“: ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳‘"׳₪ ׳‘׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳”׳©׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳• ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳× ׳•׳”׳©׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳›׳‘"׳₪ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳©׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳”׳©׳׳׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳‘"׳₪ ׳׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¨, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳§ ׳”׳—׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘, ׳©׳”׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳‘׳™׳©׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳‘"׳₪, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳¢׳“: ׳©׳”׳×׳§׳©׳• ׳׳׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳₪׳— ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳–׳›׳•׳›׳™׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳©. ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳–׳ ׳₪"׳™ ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳. </small></small>].
<h3> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳©</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳”׳§׳•׳˜׳ ׳§׳™׳¡׳ ׳׳—׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ [׳•׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳›׳©׳§׳•׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳].</small></small>. ׳”׳׳•׳§׳˜ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳•׳× [׳¡׳•׳₪׳™ ׳—׳•׳˜׳™ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳”] ׳©׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳‘׳™׳©׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>. ׳”׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳™"׳‘ ׳”"׳‘.</small></small>. ׳”׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳—'.</small></small>. ׳”׳¦׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳”- ׳—׳•׳§׳§ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳”- ׳‘׳›׳׳™, ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳˜"׳–. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳].</small></small>. ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳›׳©׳¨׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳¦׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©.
<h3> ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳§׳׳§׳</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳§׳׳§׳ ׳׳• ׳ ׳׳ ׳¢ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳• ׳׳׳™׳–׳” ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳—' ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳”׳׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳”׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳‘'], ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳“׳©, ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳‘' ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳§׳‘׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳˜׳•׳¨׳— ׳”׳•׳™ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳˜׳• ׳”׳¨׳¦׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳—׳™׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“.  ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳›׳©׳ ׳©׳׳˜׳• ׳”׳¨׳¦׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳”׳׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳©׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳×׳× ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳—׳׳§׳™׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™׳™׳, ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳˜׳•׳¨׳— ׳"׳› ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§׳• ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳›׳™׳‘׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳× ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳—׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳©׳™׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳© ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳ ׳˜׳•׳¨׳— ׳"׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳“"׳” ׳•׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳“, ׳‘'. </small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳©.
<h3> ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳•׳”׳¨׳—׳‘׳× ׳ ׳§׳‘ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳˜׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳•׳‘׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳”</h3>
׳“. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳˜׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳—׳™׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳˜׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ [׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳] <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§"׳˜.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¡׳“׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳׳—׳•׳¨, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳–׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳×׳¨׳—׳‘ ׳”׳—׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳.
<h3> ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳§׳™׳¡׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳§׳™׳¡׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳•. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳ ׳— ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳’.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳‘׳¨׳ ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ "׳׳©׳—׳§" ׳‘׳”׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳§׳׳§׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.
<h3> ׳”׳©׳—׳׳× ׳©׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳•׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳“׳©׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳ ׳—׳“׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳˜ ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳˜ ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳”׳ ׳§׳‘׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳˜׳•׳¨׳— ׳‘׳”׳—׳–׳¨׳× ׳”׳©׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳—׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“׳© ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳˜׳•׳¨׳— ׳‘׳”׳©׳—׳׳×׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳—׳™׳ ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” <b>׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳”</b> ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ [׳›׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳¢׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳©׳¨׳•׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳”׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳˜׳•׳¨׳— ׳‘׳”׳—׳–׳¨׳×׳”.
׳©׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳›׳©׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨- ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳§׳©׳•׳¨ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳‘' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳©׳—׳™׳ ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳‘ ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳׳“׳™ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳‘ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳©׳‘׳×׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳–׳׳ ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳©׳‘׳×׳•.
[׳•׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳¢׳¨׳›׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳׳›׳×, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¢׳¨׳™׳›׳• ׳‘׳¢׳•׳“׳• ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳—, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳׳”.</small></small>.
׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳•׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳“ ׳•׳×׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳“ ׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳ [׳¢"׳™ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳” ׳׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳], ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳“׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳•׳“ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳” <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳’׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳×׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳• ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳×׳•׳׳¢׳× ׳׳©׳™, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜, ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳•׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳˜]. ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳–] ׳¦׳™׳“׳“ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳›׳— ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳ 24 ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳×׳–׳•׳–׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳“׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳—׳•׳’׳™׳ <b>׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™</b> ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳×׳ ׳•׳¢׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳×׳ ׳•׳¢׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳• <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳— ׳¡׳›"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳§׳₪׳™׳¥ ׳©׳ ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳׳©׳—׳§</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳§׳₪׳™׳¥ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¦׳•׳¢׳™׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳¥ ׳”׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳•׳×] <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳’ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜' ׳”׳¢' 6 ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳¢׳¨׳™׳›׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳¡׳§"׳˜] ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¢׳' ׳¡׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳— ׳‘׳׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳₪׳— ׳‘׳׳•׳ ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳—, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳•׳™׳¦׳ ׳”׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳₪׳— ׳‘׳”׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ [׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨] <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳” [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳].  ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳׳© ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳׳•, ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳'.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳¨׳–׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳›׳™׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳¨׳–׳‘ ׳©׳”׳×׳׳׳ ׳‘׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳¢׳›׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳ ׳¢׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳׳• <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳˜'.</small></small>].
׳›׳™׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×, ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ "׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳ ׳¢׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳”׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳§׳׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳§׳•׳¨׳” ׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳›׳–׳׳×, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳”׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳§׳׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳™׳•׳§ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳–׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳׳• ׳‘׳• ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳׳•׳× ׳˜] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳©׳§׳•׳¨׳” ׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳”׳›׳™׳•׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳›׳™׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳•׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¡׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳–׳‘ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳•׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳₪׳§׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳”] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳§׳׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳׳¢׳׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨- ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳ ׳§׳‘ ׳—׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳¡׳×׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳‘'] ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳˜׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳›׳™ ׳׳– ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳׳¢׳׳™׳™׳×׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳™׳™׳©׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳¢׳§׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳©׳˜׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳• ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳׳” <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¡ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳¢׳•׳£ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳— ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳₪׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳§׳₪׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳›׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳], ׳•׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳₪׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳׳”׳§׳].</small></small>. ׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳׳, ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.</small></small>.
׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳—׳“׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳₪׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳’' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳”׳×׳•׳׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳׳‘ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳¡׳, ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳¨ ׳׳× ׳©׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢"׳™ ׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳–׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳•׳׳” ׳”׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳•׳• ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳×׳§׳₪׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳™׳”׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ [׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳• ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳¡ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳™"׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳×׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳–׳”].</small></small>.
׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¡׳¨׳™׳’ ׳׳• ׳ ׳™׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™ ׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳₪׳׳• <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳¡׳×׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳"׳˜.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳™׳™׳©׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳‘׳¢׳× ׳©׳”׳×׳§׳׳˜׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳¨ ׳׳’׳‘׳¢׳× ׳¨׳›׳” ׳©׳”׳×׳§׳׳˜׳” <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳• ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳¡"׳• ׳•׳‘׳¡' ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳™"׳], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡' ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳™"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳"׳• ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡' ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳™׳’ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” 17 ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳§׳©׳” ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳¨׳” ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳’׳‘׳¢׳× ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨, ׳•׳™׳™׳©׳•׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳™׳©׳¨׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳”׳׳§׳₪׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳“׳₪׳•׳¡, ׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳׳§׳₪׳׳• ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳“׳•׳™׳§׳× ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳“׳•׳™׳§׳× ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳׳˜ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳ ׳¢ ׳§׳™׳׳§׳•׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳™׳’], ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳™׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳- ׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳•]. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳–- ׳•׳©׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳•׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳’׳•׳“׳׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳׳• ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳ ׳— ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳• ׳׳›׳™׳¡ ׳•׳›׳“׳•', ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳“׳•׳™׳§.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳₪׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳׳™ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳₪׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•' ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳—׳׳© ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳׳§׳₪׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳'], ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳¡"׳ ׳•׳₪׳™"׳ ׳¡׳"׳].</small></small>.
׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳•׳× ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” [׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳₪׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳×] <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳¢׳׳“ ׳•׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳–׳›׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳ ׳™, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳•׳× ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳׳</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳₪׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳¨׳¡׳</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳”׳׳‘׳§׳¢ ׳₪׳¦׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳•׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳”׳¨׳—׳™׳‘ ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳₪׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳©. ׳•׳׳”׳¨׳—׳™׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳—׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳›"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§"׳¦ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳›׳“׳™. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳•׳¨׳“׳× ׳›׳¡׳₪׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳“ ׳›׳¡׳₪׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳׳• ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳‘׳• ׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳–'] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳'] ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳¢׳–׳¨ [׳—׳™"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳—] ׳•׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• [׳—׳™"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳” ׳•׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳”].</small></small>.
[׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳“׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳׳• ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳‘׳• ׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’] ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳ ׳×׳ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳˜]. ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳•.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§׳™ ׳׳•׳–׳ ׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳₪׳§׳§׳™ ׳׳•׳–׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳×׳• ׳׳₪׳™ ׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳׳•׳–׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳¨׳—.</small></small>.
׳₪׳§׳§׳™ ׳׳•׳–׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳•׳’ ׳§׳©׳” ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳•׳¦׳• ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳¥ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳• ׳•׳׳’׳•׳“׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳, ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳׳•, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳—׳™׳“ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳¦׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳×׳׳™׳׳• ׳׳׳–׳ ׳• [׳•׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳–׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳×׳¨׳—׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳™׳”׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳×׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳–׳ ׳™׳™׳], ׳•׳”׳›׳™׳•׳•׳¥ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳¢׳׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳›׳™׳•׳•׳¦׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳™׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳• ׳–׳׳ ׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”. </small></small>.
׳₪׳§׳§׳™ ׳׳•׳–׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳×׳™׳™׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳–׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳׳“ ׳‘׳›׳™׳•׳•׳¦׳ ׳›׳׳ [׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳₪׳§׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳‘׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳•׳’ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳§׳©׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨]. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳˜׳‘׳׳× ׳›׳׳™</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳—׳“׳© ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳˜׳‘׳׳×׳• ׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳× ׳›׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳•, ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¨׳• <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳’׳•׳™, ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳׳”. ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳’׳׳¨׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳₪׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳–: ׳“׳׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¨ ׳ ׳›׳¡׳™׳” ׳•׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳: ׳”׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¨׳, ׳•׳׳׳™׳¨׳™ ׳©׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ [׳©׳•"׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳—'], ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳˜ ׳¡׳›"׳’.</small></small> ׳׳• ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳×׳ ׳” [׳•׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳™׳©׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳׳ ׳•], ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳•, ׳™׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳׳׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳§׳•׳” ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳” <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’, ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳× ׳׳“׳</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳׳×׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳”׳˜׳•׳‘׳, ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳•, ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳“׳. ׳•׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳˜׳‘׳•׳ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳›׳’ ׳׳•"׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳’׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳₪׳ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳]. ׳•׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¨׳‘ ׳›' ׳©׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳˜׳‘׳•׳ ׳›׳׳.</small></small>. ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳.
<h3> ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳×׳¨׳•"׳ ׳•׳—׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳×׳¨׳•׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳¢׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳×׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳ [׳•׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳¨ <b>׳“׳׳׳™</b> ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳], ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳×׳™׳“ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳×׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳•׳›׳•' ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳—׳׳•׳× <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳“׳׳׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳–' ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳', ׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳' ׳׳¢׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”"׳—. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳“׳׳׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜' ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳‘׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳”׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳ ׳”"׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳”׳×׳¨׳•"׳].</small></small>.
<b>-</b> ׳“׳™׳ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳¡׳¨׳˜ ׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳¨ ׳•׳˜׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'.
- ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳§ ׳”׳—׳•׳˜ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳©׳•׳× ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜'.
- ׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳׳¢׳× ׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳¨ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳—], ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• [׳”׳₪׳™׳›׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”] ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳§׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳•׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳”׳›׳׳™ [׳׳• ׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳™] [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳”], ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳§׳¨׳— ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›], ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•.

RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳‘ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳׳—׳×׳</h2>
<h3> ׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× "׳×׳•׳₪׳¨" "׳§׳•׳¨׳¢" ׳•"׳׳—׳×׳"</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ [׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§], ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳×׳”׳™׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳§׳׳§׳•׳. ׳•׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳©׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳™"׳’ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳.</small></small>, ׳”׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳”׳‘׳“׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ "׳§׳•׳¨׳¢", "׳׳×׳™׳¨" ׳•׳׳—׳×׳" <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳¡׳™"׳—] ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳“] [׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳] ׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳–׳§׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳¨׳× ׳”׳§׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳§׳׳§׳•׳, ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳¨. [׳•׳׳—׳×׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳—׳“ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳×׳].
׳•׳‘׳”׳' ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳×׳™׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳–] ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳’׳“׳¨ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳•׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳”׳—׳•׳˜ ׳¢"׳™ ׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳×׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳׳© ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳'.</small></small>.
׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨- ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳§׳©׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳–׳™׳§׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳© ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳–׳™׳§׳ ׳׳• ׳×׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳™ ׳”"׳˜ ׳•׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳™"׳— ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳”׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳—׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳©׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳§׳¨׳¢׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳”׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳, ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳, ׳©׳›׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳™׳•׳‘. ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳×׳‘׳›׳• ׳”׳©׳¨׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳¨׳¢׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™ ׳•׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× "׳¡׳§׳•׳˜׳©"</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢"׳™ "׳¡׳§׳•׳˜׳©" ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ "׳¡׳‘׳•׳›׳™׳" ׳–׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳׳•׳›׳— ׳›׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳×׳‘׳›׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳§׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳׳”׳§׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳—׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳—׳™׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™׳›׳× ׳‘׳™׳˜׳—׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳—׳˜ ׳׳• ׳¡׳™׳›׳× ׳‘׳™׳˜׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳–. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳›׳× ׳‘׳™׳˜׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳×׳₪׳•׳¡׳” ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳™׳₪׳¨׳ ׳•׳”"׳  ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small> [׳•׳×׳—׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¦׳“ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳×׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳—׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳×].
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳×׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳—׳˜ ׳׳• ׳¡׳™׳›׳× ׳‘׳™׳˜׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳×׳—׳•׳‘ <b>׳׳—׳˜</b> ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳×׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“. ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ <b>׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳ ׳•׳™</b> ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳—׳˜. <b>׳•׳¡׳™׳›׳× ׳‘׳™׳˜׳—׳•׳</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳—׳‘׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳×׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳–׳• <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳׳›׳×׳‘, ׳•׳¢׳×׳” ׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ [׳‘׳”׳©׳׳˜׳•׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳•], ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳¢׳”, ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘] ׳›' ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳˜ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳¡׳™׳›׳× ׳‘׳™׳˜׳—׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ [׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•] [׳•׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳׳], ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳›׳.
׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™] ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳—׳˜ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳§׳™׳©׳•׳˜ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳˜ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.
׳•׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳“] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳’"׳› ׳׳—׳׳•׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘, ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳¦׳™׳“׳“׳• ׳›׳”׳"׳‘- ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘] ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳”] ׳•׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳ [׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳‘], ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳‘] ׳©׳”׳¨׳¢׳™׳© ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨.
׳•׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳˜, ׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳“׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳–׳׳, ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳× "׳˜׳™׳˜׳•׳׳™׳"</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <b>׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢</b> ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳×׳₪׳¨׳” ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ [׳¢׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳¨ ׳×׳₪׳¨׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳”׳§׳•׳ ׳” ׳™׳§׳—׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳₪׳×׳—׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳.</small></small>], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨</b> ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ [׳¢׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“] ׳©׳–׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳–', ׳•׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨, ׳•׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳•׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳•׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳•׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’] ׳•׳”׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳ '] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳׳›׳×׳‘׳•, ׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳”׳©׳׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳•] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳׳•׳¨׳™׳” ׳©׳ ׳” ׳™"׳‘ ׳’׳׳™׳•׳ ׳™'- ׳™"׳‘].</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ [׳¢׳“ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“].
׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳׳™׳ ["׳˜׳™׳˜׳•׳׳™׳"], ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳—׳˜׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳§׳“׳™ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳˜׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳™׳×׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳©׳, ׳•׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳—] ׳•׳›׳ ׳›' ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳ ׳×׳ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’].</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳׳£ ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳•׳›׳—׳× ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳ ׳•׳¡׳£, ׳’׳ ׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§׳•, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳§ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜] ׳•׳›' ׳©׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳™ ׳׳‘׳¨׳׳¡׳§׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳›׳©׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳”, ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳©׳×׳׳©׳• ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳—׳™׳×׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳•, ׳•׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳•.</small></small>. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳§ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳"׳” ׳”׳¢' ׳¡"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳¡"׳–] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳§׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳' ׳§׳ ׳“ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” 117, ׳•׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳¡׳™׳™׳- ׳•׳¦"׳¢] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳‘׳—׳™׳×׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳×׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳¢"׳™ "׳¡׳§׳•׳˜׳©" ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳‘׳¡׳§׳•׳˜׳© ׳•׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§׳”, ׳•׳™׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”"׳¡׳§׳•׳˜׳©" ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳×׳“׳™׳¨</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“, ׳•׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳” ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳–׳׳. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳§׳“׳™ ׳׳¨׳§, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳×׳׳•׳© "׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×" [׳©׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳] ׳”׳ ׳“׳‘׳§׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳ ׳›׳“׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳” ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳×׳— ׳•׳׳”׳™׳¡׳’׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳¡׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳× "׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳¨"</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳’׳“- ׳׳“׳‘׳§ ["׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳¨"] ׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”', ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳×׳• ׳¢׳ ׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™׳” ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳, ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳×׳• ׳¢׳ ׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳—׳™׳×׳•׳׳™׳ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳‘ ׳•׳׳’] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“] ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳׳“׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳×׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ [׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳×׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳¨׳™׳˜׳” ׳§׳˜׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳×׳ ׳׳׳©.</small></small>] ׳‘׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳׳‘] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳.
