׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳£ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“] ׳•׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ [׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳• ׳¡׳§"׳“] ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×.  ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳׳—׳•׳™ ׳׳• ׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™] ׳•׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳§׳™׳¡׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳›׳©׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳§׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳§׳•׳˜׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳₪׳§׳• ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳•' ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§]  ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳›׳©׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“] ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳©׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ [׳•׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳׳”׳™׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳“׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘'], ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳×׳•׳¡' [׳‘׳‘׳›׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳›׳”. ׳“"׳” ׳“׳”׳•׳”] ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“, ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™, ׳•׳"׳› ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™.</small></small>. [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”].
<h3> ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳׳׳˜</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳׳׳˜ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ [׳•׳׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳×׳], ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×. ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳ ׳— ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢. ׳•׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳©׳™׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳—׳×׳. </small></small>. ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ <b>׳׳˜׳׳˜׳</b> ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳׳׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳×׳•׳ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳׳׳˜ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳] ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳“] ׳ ׳•׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳–.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳’ ׳׳–׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳‘׳, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳’ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳:.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳×׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳’׳¨׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳₪׳•׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳×׳§ ׳×׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥] <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¢׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳’'. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳• ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—' ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳•׳”׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳™׳§׳—׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳•, ׳•׳¦׳™׳“׳“ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳”׳§׳•׳ ׳” ׳™׳§׳—׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳"׳› ׳”׳×׳₪׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳©׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳”׳§׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳—' ׳“"׳” ׳—׳•׳×׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳¢"׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ [׳•׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳¢"׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨].</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳–׳•׳’ ׳’׳¨׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳₪׳₪׳•׳× ׳—׳“׳©׳•׳× <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small> ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳¡"׳– ׳•׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳¢' ׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.  [׳”׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳׳—׳“׳© ׳©׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳ ׳׳׳‘׳™׳©׳” ׳׳׳ ׳©׳×׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳‘׳™׳©׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳₪׳×׳—׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳¨׳"׳, ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳” ׳˜׳•׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳¡׳×׳™׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•]. </small></small> ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳ ׳§׳ ׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳ ׳§׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳₪׳•׳×׳—, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳›׳׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳§׳׳¡׳¨, ׳׳–׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳•׳›׳¡׳</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳§׳׳¡׳¨ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳¡׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳–׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳׳–׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡' ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳ ׳©׳׳× ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳׳”׳“׳•"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳— 2 ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ "׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨׳™׳" ׳©׳ ׳¦׳׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳–, ׳©׳”׳ ׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳"׳¡׳§׳•׳˜׳©" ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ "׳×׳₪׳™׳¡׳”". ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳‘׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨.</small></small>.
׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳•׳›׳¡׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small> ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳], ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳• ׳”׳¢' ׳¨׳"׳‘] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳¨׳•׳›׳¡׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳•׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ [׳•׳§׳•׳¨׳¢] <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳™ ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳™"׳“. ׳•׳”׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳™׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳¢׳¥ [׳“׳§׳•׳×, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”] ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳¥ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳”"׳–, ׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳›׳׳• ׳“׳™׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳¥ ׳’׳“׳•׳׳•׳× ׳•׳¢׳‘׳•׳×, ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳¢׳¥ ׳™׳×׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳™׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳§׳•׳¨׳¢, ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳•׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳’׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳”׳§׳™׳¨ ׳•׳’׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳§׳• ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳•׳×, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳•׳”׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳©׳ ׳•׳’׳¨׳ ׳׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢, ׳׳ ׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳× <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”, ׳•׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳©׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳’׳׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳×׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳“׳‘׳§׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳“׳‘׳§ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳‘׳© ׳•׳׳¡׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳¢׳.
׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳• ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳›׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳׳”׳‘"׳™, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳¢"׳ ׳׳×׳§׳, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳‘׳›׳• ׳‘׳§׳•׳¦׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳‘׳›׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳§׳•׳¦׳™׳, ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳ ׳¢׳” ׳•׳‘׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳¢, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳§׳¨׳¢- ׳ ׳§׳¨׳¢, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳›׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳¢׳•- ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ "׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳" <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™ ׳©׳¨׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¡׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳₪׳׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳₪׳׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳ ׳×׳׳© ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳–׳” ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳’׳•׳–׳– [׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳₪׳•׳¦׳¢ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳“] ׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢, ׳•׳¦"׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳’ ׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳—' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳¢"׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨, ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳—׳“ ׳©׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¨׳• ׳©׳•׳‘.  ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳× ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳₪׳׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳× ׳›׳©׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳׳•׳© ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳×, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪' ׳¡׳§׳§׳™"׳–, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳“׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳© ׳•׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳—׳×׳</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳”׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳¢׳¥ ׳׳• ׳׳×׳›׳× ׳׳• ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳“׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳×, ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳×׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳™"׳ ׳”"׳– ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳—׳“.</small></small>.
׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘.
׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳— ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳, ׳׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳, ׳•׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳©׳, ׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳— ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳•</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳”׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳- ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳“׳”, ׳™׳© ׳©׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳×׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳×׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳— ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳, ׳׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳, ׳•׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳©׳, ׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳.</small></small> [׳׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳©].
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳׳׳˜ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳›׳™ ׳©׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ [׳•׳׳ ׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳™ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳×׳], ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳§׳§ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳’׳‘׳™׳¢׳™ ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳–׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳ [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'- ׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳].
RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳’ - ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h2>
XX ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× <b>׳›׳</b> ׳”׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§׳•׳× ׳—"׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳—׳׳•׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳—׳׳§׳ ׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳—׳©׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳–׳” "׳׳•׳×׳¨" ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳•׳׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳™' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪' ׳¡׳§׳§׳¡"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳"׳—. ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳‘, ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳•׳“.</small></small>.
[׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳˜, ׳™', ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳“' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳¦׳”. ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳•׳”׳¨׳•׳“׳” ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳₪"׳ ׳”"׳“] ׳©׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳¢"׳“.</small></small>]. <h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳¨׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳¨׳™׳, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳” ׳׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳, ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳›׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳•׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳×׳›׳•׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ [׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳›׳׳•׳¡׳×׳§׳™ ׳•׳—׳•׳×׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳- ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳', ׳—'], ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳“'.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳–׳¨׳•׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳” ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”, ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳–' ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™']. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳•׳¡׳×׳§׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳¢׳•׳¢ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳×׳¨׳• [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳'] ׳•׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳¢׳•׳¢ [׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳—׳•׳×׳׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¢, ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳- ׳©׳, ׳—'] ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳ ׳™׳©׳•׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳›׳•"׳, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳×"׳—, ׳•׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”. ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳‘] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳•׳—׳–׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳•' ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳•׳‘׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳– ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳—׳׳‘ ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳¡׳×׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳, ׳׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳‘׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳– ׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¦׳“ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•- ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳¡ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘- ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳ ׳׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> [׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳׳₪׳₪׳•׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¥ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳₪׳¨׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳¡], ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳” [׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳–׳׳’ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘], ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¨׳¡׳§ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳›׳¨׳¡׳§ ׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳‘׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳‘] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”], ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳—׳™׳× ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳ ׳‘׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳× <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳' ׳§׳׳– ׳‘׳©׳׳•, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳—׳׳‘</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳—׳׳‘, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳‘׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳׳” <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳׳” ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳', ׳•׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳׳” ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ [׳•׳׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳›׳•׳׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳’׳•׳“׳׳•]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳©׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳׳• ׳›׳].  ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳‘׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳׳”, ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳” ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¨׳§׳— ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳, ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳•׳׳©׳₪׳¥ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳—׳×׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳¥ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳¡׳×׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™- ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳×׳×׳× ׳•׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳•׳×׳›׳” ׳׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳– ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳“, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳"׳› ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳•׳›׳©׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳“ ׳‘׳׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳• ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳›׳- ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳•], ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳“׳•׳™׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳— ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳'].</small></small>]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳” <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳× ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳¢׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳™ [׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳•׳’ ׳©׳”׳•׳], ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳׳” ׳׳ ׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳‘׳›׳׳™.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳•׳׳”׳©׳—׳™׳×׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳“׳׳£ ׳׳”׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳׳¡׳×׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳¡׳×׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳”, ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳“"׳” ׳—׳•׳×׳׳•׳×] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨, ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳•׳–׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳׳ ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳׳©׳₪׳”, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳” [׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳׳•׳¡ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳× ׳—׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳”]. ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳˜'] ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳˜׳™׳₪׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳§׳׳™׳₪׳× ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳” [׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳¢׳˜׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£], ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢. ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ [׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳], ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'.  ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳¢׳˜׳₪׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳’׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳], ׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳˜׳₪׳” ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳©׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’] ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳׳¢׳˜׳₪׳” ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳’׳¨׳× ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳¡׳•׳§ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳׳•׳¡ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳×׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ "׳.
[׳—׳•׳×׳׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳¨׳™׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳—'] ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳×׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳™ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳™׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳¨׳•׳₪׳™׳× ׳•׳‘׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳©׳×׳™׳”</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳©׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳©׳×׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳˜׳¨׳•׳₪׳™׳× ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳”׳§׳©׳™׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳׳” <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳' [׳•׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳׳” ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳–׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳¡׳§ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳”] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘ ׳¦׳™׳“׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳•, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳×׳§׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳׳” ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳›׳‘. ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳, ׳"׳› ׳׳׳” ׳’׳¨׳¢ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳•, ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳• ׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳—׳™׳× ׳©׳×׳™׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳§׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳§׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳©׳"׳› ׳‘׳˜׳¨׳•׳₪׳™׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳—׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳•׳§׳‘, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳£ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳™׳׳¡׳•׳¨].</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳§׳‘׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳“׳•׳™׳§ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳§׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳×׳™׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳”׳ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳—׳×׳” ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳“׳•׳™׳§, ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳”. ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳©׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ "׳§׳•׳¨׳¢"- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳’.</small></small> [׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳–׳”].
<h3> ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳‘"׳׳™׳’׳׳•"</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳•׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ [׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳•- ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳’'] ׳‘׳©׳§׳™׳× "׳׳™׳’׳׳•"- ׳§׳¨׳— <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳’, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳“׳•׳™׳§, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳£ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳‘׳• ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳˜׳™׳₪׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳׳›׳׳›׳• ׳™׳“׳™׳•. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳—׳§, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳× [׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳×], ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– [׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳]. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ [׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳× ׳—- ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳›׳•']. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳˜"׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳©׳§׳™׳•׳× ׳׳׳×׳§׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳©׳§׳™׳•׳× ׳׳׳×׳§׳™׳, ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳—׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨׳¢׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ [׳•׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× <b>׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×</b> !], ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳ ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳.  ׳•׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ [׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜] ׳׳ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳§׳™׳•׳× ׳׳׳×׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳"׳› ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳–׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳©׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳×, ׳׳ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳•׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳ ׳׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳ ׳"׳› ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳”׳–׳›׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳—׳׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳‘׳•׳§׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳˜׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳© ׳›׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳¨׳™׳, ׳™"׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳‘׳§ ׳—׳–׳§ ׳›"׳› ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳›׳ ׳×׳›׳•׳׳× ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳"׳› ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳›׳¡׳×׳™׳׳” ׳׳¢׳׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳›׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳‘'. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳¢׳˜׳™׳₪׳× "׳׳¨׳˜׳™׳§" - ׳§׳¨׳—׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳•׳˜׳£ ׳׳× ׳”"׳׳¨׳˜׳™׳§"- ׳§׳¨׳—׳•׳ [׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳¢׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳›׳¡׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳ "׳׳‘׳" ׳”׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳× ׳”׳׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳ ׳™׳׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳–׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳× <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§ ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳˜׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳•. ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳’.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <b>׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳•׳׳”׳©׳—׳™׳×</b> ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳“׳’ ׳׳¢׳•׳©׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳•׳׳”׳©׳—׳™׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨׳™׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳—׳™׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳™׳–׳” ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢, ׳•׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳” ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳” ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳¡׳•׳§ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳׳•׳¡ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳©׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳©׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳™׳₪׳× ׳”׳׳•׳›׳.  [׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳׳™׳’׳¨׳×, ׳•׳׳™׳”׳• ׳™"׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳’׳¨׳× ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳” ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳•׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳]. </small></small>, [׳•׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ "׳].
׳•׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳× ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳”, ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳—׳׳‘, ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳”, ׳•׳”"׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳”׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳׳©׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳˜׳¨׳™׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳©׳§׳“׳™ ׳׳¨׳§ ׳•׳—׳˜׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳˜׳¨׳™׳•׳×, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳§׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳—׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§׳” ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ [׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'], ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳×, ׳•׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§׳× ׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳” [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” !] <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳’, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳˜'] ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§. [׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳•׳“׳™׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳׳™׳’׳¨׳×, ׳•׳׳¢׳ "׳“ ׳׳ ׳“׳׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳ ׳—׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳×׳׳•׳× ׳›׳ "׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳™׳’׳¨׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳¢"׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳׳•׳¡ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳. ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳׳•׳¡ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳ ׳— ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳’ ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳, ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳×׳›׳× ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳×׳›׳× [׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§׳™ ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳‘, ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¡"׳•, ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳¢׳–] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳“ ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳©׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳™׳¦׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• "׳₪׳§׳§" ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳–׳׳ "׳”׳׳‘׳©׳×׳•" ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳¨׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳₪׳§׳§]. ׳׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳×׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳–].</small></small>.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳– ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳ ׳§׳‘ ׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳, ׳"׳ ׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳ ׳§׳‘ ׳‘׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳©׳§׳” ׳©׳‘׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳•'], ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳–׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳•׳©׳•׳‘ ׳”׳“׳’׳™׳© ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳”], ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳›׳– ׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳•׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›' ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳›"׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳§׳‘ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳ ׳§׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳₪׳§׳§. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳™"׳‘ ׳”׳¢' ׳'].</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳•׳‘ <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¡׳™׳‘׳•׳×: ׳. ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›"׳”, ׳•׳›׳©׳׳©׳׳™׳›׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳]. ׳‘. ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳"׳ , ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳"׳› ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳›׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳”׳• ׳›׳׳™, ׳©׳׳ ׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳•׳¢׳¨׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳›׳§׳•׳˜׳ ׳§׳™׳¡׳ ׳׳—׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳• [׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳’: ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘, ׳“'] ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳—- ׳©׳™׳– ׳׳׳׳¨ ׳׳׳׳•"׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳’׳ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘"׳₪ ׳›׳™ ׳’׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳× ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™, ׳"׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳§׳§ ׳”׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳•'].</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳, ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ (׳•׳×׳›׳•׳׳×׳•) ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳•׳›׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳׳© ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳” ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳•'], ׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳©׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×׳• ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳— ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳].</small></small>].
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳§׳§ ׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳§ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳₪׳§׳§ ׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳§ [׳”׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳§׳׳•׳× ׳§׳׳™׳] <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳×׳, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›"׳“, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§, ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳© ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ "׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳×׳›׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳¨, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳ ׳¡׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳§׳§ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳•, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳¨׳¦׳•׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳§ ׳©׳׳×׳—׳× ׳׳₪׳§׳§ ׳›׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳₪׳§׳§, ׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™, ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™"׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳—׳•׳×׳׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¢׳” ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳].</small></small> [׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳•׳¨], ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳₪׳§׳§ ׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳©׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳§׳§ ׳”׳׳×׳›׳× <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳¢׳– ׳•׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳˜ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳׳” ׳©׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§ ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳— ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” [׳•׳¦"׳¢ ׳§׳¦׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳•׳"׳› ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳§] ׳׳ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>.
׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳˜ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳” [׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳×] ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳§׳§ ׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳§, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳£ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳–׳§ ׳•׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳§׳§ ׳©׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳‘׳ ׳’׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳§׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳‘׳“, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳§׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳•.</small></small>. [׳׳× ׳¢׳˜׳™׳₪׳× ׳”׳׳׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳ ׳™׳׳™׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢].
<h3> ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳•</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳• [׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¢׳™׳] <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳ ׳¦׳ ׳× ׳¨׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳—׳™׳× ׳©׳×׳™׳” ׳•׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳’׳‘׳™׳¢׳™ ׳׳‘׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳₪׳—׳™׳× ׳©׳×׳™׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳’׳‘׳™׳¢׳™ ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳”, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳›׳ "׳, ׳•׳׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ [׳•׳‘׳₪׳—׳™׳× ׳©׳×׳™׳” ׳ ׳•׳˜׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳—׳™׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳×׳§׳™ ׳”׳©׳×׳׳©׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳—׳•׳–׳¨].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳¨׳—׳‘׳× ׳—׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳˜׳׳× ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳—׳™׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳§׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳'. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳©׳ ׳¦׳ ׳¦׳ ׳× "׳¨׳™׳‘׳”" ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳©׳ ׳¦׳ ׳¦׳ ׳× ׳§׳¦׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳“׳’ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳•׳¡׳×׳§׳™ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳× ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™, ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳', ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳’.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳₪׳•׳£ ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳₪׳£ ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳₪׳£ ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳’׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳₪"׳™ ׳”"׳—], ׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳“, ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳×׳ ׳—׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳•׳”׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨, ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳₪׳£ ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳•׳¡׳¨׳˜ ׳׳׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡' ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳' ׳¦׳ ׳©׳›' ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳—׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳]. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳” ׳•׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳, ׳•׳׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳×׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳₪׳•׳£ ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳].  </small></small>. (׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨) <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳˜.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳ <b>׳׳—׳׳™׳¨</b> ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳”, ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳—׳• [׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳•] <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳“' ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳"׳”].</small></small>. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© <b>׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳”</b> ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳”׳•׳, ׳׳– ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳›"׳“ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳” ׳‘' ׳™׳׳™ ׳™׳•"׳› ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳ ׳™׳•"׳› ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”' ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”' ׳•׳•' ׳™׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳” ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳׳• ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× [׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳“׳™׳‘׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳•"׳› ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳–׳™׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳"׳› ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™, ׳׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—"׳› ׳"׳› ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦"׳©].
׳•׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳¢׳₪"׳™ ׳–׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳“׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳”׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳– ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳—' ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳’ ׳׳•׳× ׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§, ׳•׳׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”]. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳™"׳— ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.
׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳™' ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳×- ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘- ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳’׳•׳™ ׳©׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ [׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©- ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—], ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’.
[׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳–׳׳× ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳¨׳¨ (׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜), ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳™׳©׳¨׳׳].</small></small>, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× [׳—"׳‘ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳"׳, ׳‘'] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳—׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳— <b>׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• [</b>׳›׳”׳“׳¢׳” ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳”] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳–׳”.
׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳§׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳, ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ "׳ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳” [׳•׳’׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳§׳¦׳× ׳׳”׳‘׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™']. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳’׳¨׳× ׳©׳₪׳×׳—׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳’׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳׳— ׳׳•, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳₪׳™ ׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•, ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™ ׳©׳¨׳“ ׳•׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳. [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳ "׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳’"׳› ׳×׳™׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳–׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳׳ ׳¡׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳™' ׳–׳” ׳׳‘׳“ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳×׳§׳™"׳— ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• (׳•׳§׳¦׳× ׳¦"׳¢ ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳• ׳׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳— ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“) ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳×] [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳׳—׳×].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳§׳˜ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳•׳×] ׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳₪׳×׳—׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳©׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳ "׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳–.</small></small> ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳§׳¨׳¢׳• ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳₪׳©׳•׳˜, ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳— ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳¡׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳ ׳₪׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§. ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳ ׳•׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳, ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.
׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳×׳›׳× ׳©׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳"׳› ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳׳’׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳©׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• [׳›׳׳• ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳›׳™ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™, ׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳•], ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳ ׳§׳•׳˜ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›"׳– ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳‘"׳¦ ׳₪׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳§׳§ ׳™׳© ׳©ײµ׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳×׳—.</small></small>.
