<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳“ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳•׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢</h2>
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳›׳•׳×׳‘</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳”׳›׳•׳×׳‘ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳§׳”"׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳‘׳׳”׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳•׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢. ׳©׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳§׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳•׳, ׳”׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳ ׳׳”׳©׳‘׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢.  ׳׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳© ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳‘׳×׳—׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳‘׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳‘׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳•׳₪׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳”׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳"׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳” ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳§' ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳™׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳×׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳¦׳™׳™׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳™׳™׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳× ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘, ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳§׳™׳©׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳׳– ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢.</small></small> ׳”׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳•׳”׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳, ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳”. <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳“] ׳©׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™', ׳•׳›"׳› ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§"׳’. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳¢׳ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳ "׳— ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳©, ׳•׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳ ׳™׳¨׳™׳, ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳ ׳•׳”׳׳•׳¨׳’, ׳׳©"׳› ׳¢"׳–].</small></small> ׳•׳¦׳™׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳”׳•׳. <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ [׳—]. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳• ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¦׳™׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳¦׳™׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳×.</small></small>
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳] ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳•׳], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳›׳׳. <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳‘'.</small></small>
<h3> ׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳• ׳׳¡׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳’׳©׳” ׳׳• ׳׳—׳™׳§׳”</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳§׳• ׳׳¡׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳’׳©׳” ׳׳• ׳׳—׳™׳§׳”, ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳”׳›׳×׳‘ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳•׳] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳• ׳›׳–׳”, ׳•׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“.  ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨' ׳™׳•׳¡׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳©׳ [׳¡׳™׳׳•׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳§׳•] ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘, ׳•׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳•׳”׳• ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳©׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳™׳¨"׳© ׳™׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳¨' ׳™׳•׳¡׳™, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳.
׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ "׳׳¨׳©׳•׳" ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳§, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳–. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳• ׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳• ׳׳• ׳§׳©׳§׳•׳© ׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳. <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳—׳™׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¨' ׳™׳•׳¡׳™ ׳©׳’׳ ׳¨׳•׳©׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘, ׳׳‘׳ ׳§׳• ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳׳• ׳§׳©׳§׳•׳© ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳× ׳•׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳׳•׳× [׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳”], ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳§׳• ׳׳• ׳§׳©׳§׳•׳© ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘׳¢׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳‘׳§, [׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, (׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳©׳™׳¡׳•׳“׳• ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳×׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ "׳)]. </small></small> ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳“׳₪׳™׳•</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳, <b>׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨</b> ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳–׳” <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳“׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¡׳’׳¨׳× ׳•׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳× ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳”.</small></small> [׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳§׳— ׳׳•׳×׳•], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳]. <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳.</small></small> ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳–׳” ׳›׳׳.
׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳§׳•׳™׳ ׳—׳¡׳¨׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”. <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳—'].</small></small>
<h3> ׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳“׳£ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳“׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ [׳•׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™], ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳׳© ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳¦׳“ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳§׳¨׳¢ - ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨, <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳’׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨ [׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳§׳™"׳˜] ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳•׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳“׳“׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳›׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“, ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ [׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳•׳׳׳™׳” ׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳” ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳₪׳™' ׳“׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳•׳¨׳™׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×].  ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳—׳׳§ ׳׳¡׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳”׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳¨׳—׳™׳§ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳›׳ "׳, ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳•׳¨׳™׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×. ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳•׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳•׳¨׳™׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•, (׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳, ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳–), ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¨׳§ ׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳–׳• - ׳©׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“ - ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳. ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳•, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳. ׳•׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ [׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳ ׳•] ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳•׳¨׳™׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳× ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳]. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳”׳¨׳—׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳“׳£ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳“׳£ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳•׳× ׳–'.</small></small> ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳× ׳‘׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳”׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× [׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳§׳¨׳¢], ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳£ ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳¢.
׳׳ ׳”׳“׳£ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ <b>׳׳’׳׳¨׳™</b> ׳•׳”׳§׳¨׳¢ <b>׳‘׳™׳</b> ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳× ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳”׳“׳£ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳”. <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳׳•׳× ׳›׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•', ׳©׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳›׳×, ׳•׳‘׳—"׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳—׳˜ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳›"׳© ׳›׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳‘׳• ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳¢ <b>׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢</b> ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳× ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳”׳“׳£ ׳›׳©׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ <b>׳׳’׳׳¨׳™</b> [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳£ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×]. <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳•׳× ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” [׳©׳׳ ׳›׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳¨׳׳™׳”, ׳©׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×], ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳ ׳©׳. ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨.</small></small>
<h3> ׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳“׳£ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳“׳£ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ [׳•׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™], ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳• ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳₪׳¨׳“׳• ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳–׳” [׳•׳™׳§׳₪׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳£ ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨]. <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳˜] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳™"׳¦ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳›׳–׳• ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳›׳׳• ׳—׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳”׳—׳₪׳™׳¨׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳×, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳ ׳₪׳˜, ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳—׳₪׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳×, ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’. ׳•׳”"׳  ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳“׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨, ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’].
׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳›׳”"׳’ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ [׳•׳¡"׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳”׳›׳×׳‘ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘], ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳”׳•׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– - ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳“׳¦׳™׳¨׳£ ׳׳–׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× - ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳–׳” [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”], ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳', ׳’׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳’׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•: ׳“׳—׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳”׳•׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳§׳׳§׳ ׳•׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ [׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳“׳•׳׳§ - ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳“׳”׳×׳ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳™׳›׳ ׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“. ׳•׳׳§׳׳§׳ ׳•׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’], ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳¢׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳”׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳– ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘"׳₪׳–׳" ׳•׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™ ׳§׳׳₪׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™ ׳§׳׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳‘׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ [׳•׳׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳‘׳—׳¦׳™ ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨].
׳§׳׳₪׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳• ׳”׳ ׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳’׳¨׳× ׳׳• "׳₪׳–׳" ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳—׳׳§׳™׳• "׳×׳₪׳•׳¡׳™׳" ׳–׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳›"׳“ ׳•׳”׳¢' ׳¡"׳– ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳” ׳©׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳™׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳׳×׳—׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.  ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳—׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳•׳”׳“׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳–׳”].</small></small>, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×.
<h3> ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳׳׳×׳§׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳©׳§׳™׳•׳× ׳׳׳×׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳×, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳£ <b>׳‘׳™׳</b> ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ "׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳¢. ׳•׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳ [׳‘׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳] ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳•׳׳¨׳—׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× [׳•׳׳£ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳• ׳•׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳“׳׳×, ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳” ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳§׳¨׳‘].
׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ [׳©׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳× [׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳“׳₪׳™׳•, ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳×׳•, ׳•׳"׳› ׳×׳׳•׳” ׳©׳”׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳‘' ׳•׳”׳¢' ׳•' ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳ ׳“׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳׳"׳¨ ׳”׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳™ ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳”׳–׳” ׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳•׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳–׳” ׳“׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳§׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳›׳׳₪׳•' ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳]. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳›׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳•׳—׳§. ׳•׳”"׳” ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳×.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳.
[׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳›׳–׳• ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• [׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳—'] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳§׳׳§׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘], ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳“ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳•׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳“׳£ ׳¨׳™׳§</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳׳£ ׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳£ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳”, <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳’. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳“׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—, ׳•׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— ׳•׳›"׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳, ׳¢׳™"׳©. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§ ׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳ ׳— ׳׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§ ׳׳׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳£ [׳›׳׳• ׳˜׳—׳™׳ ׳” ׳™׳‘׳©׳”] ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳£ ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳§ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳£ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳”.
<h3> ׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳£ ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳§ ׳”׳׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳©׳”׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳™׳’׳׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳×׳×׳¨׳•׳× <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳©׳¢׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳׳© ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳ "׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳§ ׳”׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳— ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×. ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳•׳“׳‘׳§ ׳™׳‘׳©.
JJ ׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳”׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳”׳׳›׳©׳¨׳× ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳–׳” ׳׳”׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳•׳—׳§, ׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳©׳•׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳׳”׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳•׳—׳§. ׳•׳”׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳©׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳•., ׳”׳׳—׳“ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳™׳• ׳•׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳’׳–׳™׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳×׳׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳’׳–׳– ׳•׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳©׳•׳” ׳‘׳©׳×׳™׳”׳ - ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳”׳’׳–׳™׳–׳”, ׳•׳”"׳  ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳©׳•׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳”. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× [׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳™"׳’] ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳© ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ [׳©׳] ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”, ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳¥ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳™׳¦׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳•׳”׳, ׳•׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳×, ׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳”׳. [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳”, ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳, ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳•׳׳›׳"׳ ׳‘׳–׳”] ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳©׳×׳™ ׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳‘ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳ ׳©׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳‘ ׳׳—׳“].</small></small>AMP, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳£ ׳›׳¨׳˜׳™׳¡׳™ ׳’׳™׳¨׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳×׳—׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳.
<h3> ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳§׳• ׳׳׳׳™׳”׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳§׳• <b>׳׳׳׳™׳”׳</b> ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳“׳‘׳§ [׳‘׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§׳], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳׳׳—׳™׳§׳×׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳§ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©"׳, ׳’' ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳©׳¢׳.  ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳“׳’׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳׳• ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳¢"׳™ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳“׳‘׳§ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳§׳¨׳¢׳• ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×. ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳©׳¢׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳× ׳•׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” - ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳, ׳’'. ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small> ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳—"׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳"׳– ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳›׳×.</small></small> ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳₪׳” ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨. <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳“ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳.</small></small> [׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”].
׳§׳˜׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳•׳׳׳•׳›׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳¨׳¢׳‘. <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳§׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™. ׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳¦"׳¢ ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳§' ׳”׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳“׳”׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳׳–׳”.
׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳¡׳׳›׳• ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨"׳ [׳”׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳’] ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳•, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳›׳׳ ׳¡׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™. ׳•׳¦"׳¢. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳¨׳¢׳‘ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳˜ ׳“׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳•׳×׳•. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳›׳©׳₪׳¨׳¡׳•׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳׳™׳”, ׳׳ ׳—׳×׳›׳• ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳”, ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ <b>׳‘׳™׳</b> ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳”׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¢׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳—"׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¨׳•׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳₪׳•׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳“׳”׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳™׳₪׳•׳, ׳"׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳׳•׳× ׳›׳‘] ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳“׳”"׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳ [׳•׳“׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¢׳׳™׳“׳ ׳•׳׳©׳™׳™׳›׳ ׳™׳—׳“], ׳׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳—׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳•׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳•׳‘׳“׳¢"׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳×. [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳׳"׳¨ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳”׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳™ ׳׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳"׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳” ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳¢"׳› ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳›׳׳•׳”׳• ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳”].
׳™׳—. ׳•׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳ ׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳•׳’׳•׳× ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳–׳• ׳‘׳–׳• ׳•׳"׳› ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳›׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳×׳›׳”. </small></small> ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ <b>׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢</b> ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳–׳• ׳׳–׳• [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×]. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳׳• ׳¢׳•׳’׳™׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” <b>׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×</b> ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳•׳׳׳•׳›׳׳”, ׳•׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳” ׳•׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳”. <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•. ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¢"׳” ׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳¦׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳›׳©׳©׳•׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳—׳§, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳’"׳› ׳‘׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳¦׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳‘׳™׳“, ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳₪׳” ׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳• ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¨. <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳.</small></small> [׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳×׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳׳₪׳™׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳’׳™׳” - ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳’׳™׳•׳×, ׳•׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¢"׳’ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳™׳ ׳"׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨, ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳• [׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” (׳¢׳™' ׳§׳”"׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳‘'), ׳׳• ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳™׳© ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳”] ׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳‘׳§׳¦׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳' ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳¡׳™׳’׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳’׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳"׳› ׳’׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳“ ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ "׳׳׳׳›׳”".</small></small>].  ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© <b>׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳</b> ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳×. <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳ [׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳׳ ׳] ׳©׳—׳™׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳¢׳•׳’׳™׳” ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳׳• ׳¢׳•׳’׳™׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳×׳›׳” ׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳”. <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳”. ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳₪"׳™ ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳˜"׳–] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳¦׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳‘"׳₪ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘, ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ [׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳] ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳•׳™׳¦׳¨ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳¨׳•׳©׳, ׳׳©׳"׳› ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳₪׳™"׳ ׳”׳™"׳–] ׳”׳¦׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳•׳¨׳©׳ ׳¨׳•׳©׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳”. (׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳'). ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳©׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” [׳•׳׳ ׳—׳•׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳”] ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¦׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳¨׳›׳”.
׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳¦׳׳×׳™ ׳©׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳©׳¢׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳” [׳™'] [׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳“׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳] ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳‘׳• ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳¦׳–. ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳×׳—׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳™׳, ׳©׳”׳’׳' ׳©׳ ׳“׳ ׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳•׳¦׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”"׳˜ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳¡׳›׳•"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳•׳§׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳›׳•"׳.
[׳•׳‘׳—"׳ ׳‘׳”׳' ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳›׳׳ ׳¦"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¡׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¡׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳”׳§׳™׳¦׳•׳©"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳— ׳¡׳›"׳’ ׳•׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳§ ׳¡׳§"׳›, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳™׳—׳• ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳—׳§׳™׳§׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¡׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“ - ׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳“׳™׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳—׳§׳™׳§׳× ׳’׳˜. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—׳•"׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳׳•׳× ׳’ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”].
׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳“׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳¡׳¨׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳— [׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳׳–.], ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳”׳"׳ ׳‘׳”׳' ׳—׳׳¥ ׳•׳׳¦׳” ׳₪"׳” ׳”׳˜"׳• ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳× ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳“׳’ ׳׳• ׳—׳™׳”.
[׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳”, ׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳¨׳— ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳”].</small></small>
<h3> ׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¦׳§</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¦׳§ [׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¦׳§ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳₪׳•׳×.</small></small>] ׳׳• ׳׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳¨׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳•׳’ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¡׳”. ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳ ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×.</small></small> [׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”].
[׳™׳© ׳׳”׳“׳’׳™׳©, ׳©׳׳ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¨׳›׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”, <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳•׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳”׳' ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”, ׳•׳×׳₪׳׳¨"׳™ ׳‘׳›׳׳›׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳¦׳§, ׳•׳׳– ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳”׳‘׳¦׳§ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳×].
<h3> ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳ ׳§׳‘ ׳׳₪׳•׳׳© ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳‘׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳¢׳™׳’׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳§ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳“"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’', ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳”׳™ "׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳×", ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳™׳’׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳’׳ ׳“׳•׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳×׳‘. ׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘, ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳’׳' ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳›׳—., ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳• ׳¢׳™׳’׳•׳ [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳›׳׳™], [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳”].</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳—׳׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳¦׳” ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×. <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳§׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳§׳׳£ ׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳”.</small></small>
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳£ ׳¢׳’׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳™׳“׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳£ ׳‘׳¢׳׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳•׳׳•׳¨׳›׳‘׳×.
<h3> ׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳׳•׳“׳’׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳“׳™׳“׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳׳•׳“׳’׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× - ׳׳¡׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳‘׳• ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘. <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳ ׳¡"׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳'. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳©׳’׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳¡׳×׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘.</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳׳•' ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳• ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳, ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳– ׳׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ [׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳©׳•׳‘]. ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•, ׳“׳”׳›׳™ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳’׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳׳©, ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳×׳• [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳˜], ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳×׳™׳§׳• ׳׳× ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳–׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳• ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳, ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳, ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳•׳¨׳™׳—׳•׳§ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×.
׳›׳—. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳”׳‘׳׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳˜"׳• ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳™׳™׳¢׳•׳“׳• ׳•׳×׳©׳׳™׳©׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳–׳” ׳©׳׳•׳“׳“ ׳—׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳“׳× ׳—׳•׳׳• ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳”׳“׳’׳©׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× [׳©׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳×׳] ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳׳“׳׳× ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×.</small></small>]. [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×].
<h3> ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘"׳›׳•׳¡ ׳”׳₪׳׳"</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳ ׳¡׳×׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳›׳”׳” ׳•׳›׳©׳©׳•׳₪׳›׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳—׳§ ׳”׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳•׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳, <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳—׳•׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳׳•׳ ׳”, ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳], ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳›׳. ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳×׳‘ ׳•׳׳”׳™׳׳—׳§ ׳×׳׳™׳“, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳׳•׳× ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳ [׳׳£ ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳© ׳’"׳› ׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳•׳¨׳™׳—׳•׳§ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳”], ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳˜"׳•.</small></small> .

<b>׳¡׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳•׳¨׳™׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳›׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳›׳“׳£ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨. [׳•׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳“׳ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳©׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳×].</small></small></b>
