<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳¨׳•׳›׳× ׳©׳¨׳§׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳₪׳¨׳•׳›׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳§׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳•׳›׳× ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳•׳›׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳” ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳—׳׳™׳˜ ׳”׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳•׳”׳¡׳•׳’׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳©׳׳׳× ׳”׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳•׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳‘׳“. <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳׳׳× ׳”׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳"׳› ׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳’׳¨ ׳™׳—׳׳™׳˜ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳׳׳¢׳׳”. [׳•׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨]. ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳׳•׳× ׳›׳‘] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳• ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳©׳›׳—׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨. </small></small> ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” !. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳×׳—׳‘׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳§׳— ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳—׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳•׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×. <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳˜"׳–.</small></small>
<h3> ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳¡׳™׳׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳ "׳§׳•׳™׳" ׳¢׳ ׳×׳₪׳•׳– ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳¡׳׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¨׳˜׳˜ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳™׳“׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳, ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small> [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳¨׳˜׳˜ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳].
<h3> ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”], ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳©׳•׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳™׳׳—׳§׳• ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳׳•' ׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳§׳׳§׳ - ׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“, ׳•׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—"׳ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳"׳‘, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳›׳¢"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳“׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳].
׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳¨׳• ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳—׳•׳©׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳£ ׳׳—׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× [׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳™׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳© ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳׳—׳™׳§׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨"׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳׳— ׳•׳—׳׳§ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳–, ׳‘', ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳©׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳. ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳–׳” ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜.
׳׳ ׳‘׳§׳¦׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳‘ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳ ׳¡׳™׳’׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳× ׳¢׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳• ׳ ׳׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳׳”׳ "׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳›׳×"׳¡ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳– ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳¦"׳¢. ׳•׳‘׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳ [׳‘׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳–' ׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳¡] ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳’׳¨׳™׳”. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“] ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳˜׳׳‘׳"׳§ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳. [׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳×׳™ ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳¢׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳¡׳™׳’׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳›׳™׳•׳, ׳©׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳•׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳©].</small></small> [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳].
<h3> "׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳" ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘׳¢׳• ׳‘׳¨׳™׳₪׳•׳“</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳¡׳₪׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳₪׳“׳× ׳©׳›׳©׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳¦׳‘׳¢׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳₪׳•׳“ ׳ ׳•׳×׳¨ "׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳" ׳׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳—׳׳§ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢. <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳›׳©׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳”׳׳¨׳׳” ׳׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳›"׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳׳ ׳¨׳§ "׳׳¨׳׳”" ׳©׳•׳ ׳”, ׳•׳’׳¨׳¢ ׳˜׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳•׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“.</small></small>
<h3> ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳—׳׳™׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳›׳×׳‘ [׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳™"׳ ׳”׳˜"׳–].</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳₪׳, ׳›׳•׳›׳‘ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳׳—׳§׳• ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳”.
<h3> ׳׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳׳™׳₪׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢, ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳›"׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳׳—׳§ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳™׳₪׳•׳¨, <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳“׳™׳• ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳×׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳’'], ׳•׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳”׳' ׳ ׳˜"׳™ ׳›׳׳ ׳' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳›׳×׳‘ '׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳×׳₪׳—׳׳” ׳™׳“׳• ׳׳©׳—׳¨׳•׳¨׳™׳× ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳™׳׳×׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳×׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳”׳™׳“ ׳׳׳׳™׳•', ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳‘׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× [׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳‘׳׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳¦׳‘׳¢, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳] ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳§ ׳”׳¦׳‘׳¢ [׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© - ׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳”׳˜׳¢׳] ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳‘ ׳™׳׳—׳§ ׳”׳¦׳‘׳¢, ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳₪' ׳¡׳§׳§׳¦"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳§׳•"׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳¢׳' ׳¨׳¡׳•].
׳׳˜. ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳”׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳₪"׳’ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳•׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳¢"׳˜ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳¦׳‘׳•׳¢, ׳•׳‘׳§׳•׳ ׳˜׳¨׳¡ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳¨׳” ׳—"׳‘ ׳₪"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨] ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” [׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳׳¨׳©"׳ (׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳) ׳—׳›׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳§׳] ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳”׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳•׳×, ׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳ [׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳•׳× ׳™] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳”׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳˜].</small></small> ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳›׳׳›׳• ׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳׳• ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳׳˜ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”]. (׳•׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>).
׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳¢׳׳× ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳”, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳”.
- ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳¦׳׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳¨׳™׳˜׳•׳×, ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳”׳¢' ׳¡"׳– ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳’.
<h3> ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳×׳¨׳›׳™׳– ׳׳׳•׳×׳§</h3>
<b>׳›׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳›׳™׳– ׳׳׳•׳×׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳™׳, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳, <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳• ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳“.  [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳§׳™"׳’ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳× ׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳’"׳› ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳₪׳"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳”].</small></small> ׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¨׳›׳™׳– ׳•׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳. <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳”, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳“׳§׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳.</small></small>
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳›׳™׳– ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳ <b>׳”׳¦׳‘׳¢</b> ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳“ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳—׳׳¨׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¦׳‘׳¢] ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳׳” ׳׳“׳•׳, ׳•׳׳”׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳. <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳ "׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳”׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳, ׳•׳׳”׳—"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳"׳’ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳• ׳¦׳‘׳•׳¢ [׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳׳›׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳›׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳₪׳” ׳•׳¨׳¦׳•׳™ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳”], ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’.</small></small>  ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳•׳₪׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳×׳¨׳›׳™׳– ׳•׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨.
<h3> ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳—.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳׳•׳›׳¨׳•. <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›"׳“ ׳‘׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳”, ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳•. [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳“׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳›׳¨׳•, ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳•׳›׳¨׳• ׳"׳› ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳”].</small></small>
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳©׳×׳™׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳¡׳׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳].
<h3> ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ [׳“׳ ׳•׳¦׳‘׳¢]</h3>
<b>׳›׳˜.</b> ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳׳›׳, <b>׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳—׳§</b> ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳§׳ ׳— ׳“׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§, ׳׳‘׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳¢׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳ ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘׳¢׳• ׳׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳‘׳’׳“, ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”. <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳ "׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳•. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳§"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳”׳“׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜. ׳•׳‘׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳ "׳—. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳— ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳§"׳—.</small></small>
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳”׳׳׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳” ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘, ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳ ׳— ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳. <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳¢׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳ "׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳™ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× 5-7 ׳©׳, ׳•׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳¡׳›׳™׳׳• ׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳"׳¦ ׳”׳›׳”׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢.
<h3> ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳™׳’׳× ׳“׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳• ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨׳•׳× "׳˜׳™׳©׳•" ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳© ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳׳׳• ׳‘׳¦׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳• ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳˜.</small></small> ׳•׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“, ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳₪׳•׳’ ׳‘׳• ׳“׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳“:] ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳׳©׳” ׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳×׳”, ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– [׳§׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘] ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳›׳©׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢, ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳ "׳– [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳”] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳›׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳•. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳”׳’׳ ׳©׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳“׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳¡"׳ ׳”׳›׳™, ׳"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳×׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳¢"׳– [׳׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳”׳ "׳ ׳“׳—׳” ׳”׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳“׳×׳”, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳ "׳˜, ׳“׳¡"׳ ׳©׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳].</small></small> [׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳• <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢'] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳×׳• ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳™׳™׳¡׳—׳˜, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳™"׳’ ׳•׳”׳¢' ׳"׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳.</small></small>]. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨׳•׳× "׳˜׳™׳©׳•".
׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳˜׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳, ׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳ ׳•׳™׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳–׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ "׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨. <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳–׳” ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳“׳׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳׳©׳” ׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳×׳”, ׳׳ ׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳ ׳¢׳×׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳‘׳¨׳’׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳“׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳–: ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳©׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳“׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳’׳¨׳׳.
׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳‘׳˜׳”׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳¢׳“, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳”׳¢׳“ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳—"׳› ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳“׳© ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳“׳ [׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¡"׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳©׳™׳© ׳“׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳“׳ ׳™׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳“ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳”], ׳•׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳ [׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›] ׳×׳™' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳˜׳"׳§ ׳‘׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳”: ׳“"׳” ׳“׳ ׳“׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳ ׳˜׳•׳¨׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳“ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—׳™"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳©׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳›׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳₪׳” ׳׳“"׳‘.</small></small>
<h3> ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳¡׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳׳” ׳”׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳. <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳”׳׳¨׳›׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳• ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢. ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳© ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳–] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳–] ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳—, ׳•׳¦"׳¢], ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳™׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳™׳”. ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—׳™"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳—׳™׳˜׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳”, ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳ ׳— ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳.</small></small> ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳•' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳˜ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳׳—׳§ ׳•׳׳׳¨׳— ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳׳™׳.
<h3> ׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳©</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳©, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳¢׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢. <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳¨׳׳™׳×׳•. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳©׳’"׳› ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨. [׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™"׳ ׳“׳“׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳”"׳  ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳’׳¨׳¢ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳].</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳. <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳×׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳•"׳§׳¨׳—׳•׳" ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳•׳ ׳™</h3>
<b>׳׳’.</b> ׳׳׳™׳© ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳•׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳ <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳ "׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳˜. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳¢׳׳, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳‘׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳”.  ׳•׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳₪׳™' ׳§׳•' ׳”׳’׳' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳”: '׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳׳׳™ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”' ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳›׳, ׳׳£ ׳“׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳ ׳‘׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳”"׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳›׳.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳¥ "׳§׳¨׳—׳•׳" ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳©׳” ׳×׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳‘׳¢׳• ׳₪׳ ׳™׳” ׳•׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳×׳™׳ [׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳™׳] ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳× ׳׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳© ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢. <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳ "׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳•׳™׳“׳™׳•, ׳•׳”׳§' ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳›"׳” ׳“׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢׳×, ׳•׳×׳™' ׳׳©׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳₪׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳” ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳” ׳‘׳›׳. ׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳ ׳׳”׳™׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳“ (׳§׳‘) ׳•׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳™׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳"׳‘.
׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳¦׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳”, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳§ ׳§׳¦׳× ׳׳₪׳™"׳–, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› [׳”׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳”׳ "׳]. ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳” ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳™׳© ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳©׳” ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳₪׳ ׳™׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳× ׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳” ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳•׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—, ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳]. ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢. [׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳׳•׳›׳׳•׳× "׳§׳¨׳—׳•׳" ׳•׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳• ׳”׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳™׳ - ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳™׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳׳©׳”, ׳©׳™׳׳“׳•׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳× ׳’"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳ ׳‘׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳].</small></small> ׳•׳™׳׳“׳” ׳§׳˜׳ ׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳™׳©.
<h3> ׳׳¨׳™׳—׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳–׳׳™</h3>
<b>׳׳“.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳—׳¦׳— ׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳©׳—׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳ ׳©׳§׳•׳£ ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳“׳’׳©׳× ׳•׳׳”׳©׳—׳¨׳× ׳”׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳©׳—׳•׳¨, <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳•׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳“׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳“׳•׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳•׳— ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢"׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳©׳×׳—׳¨ [׳›׳¦"׳] ׳•׳׳©׳—׳™׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳–.</small></small> ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳•׳— ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳–׳׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢. <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳¦׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳’׳•׳£, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳×׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳×׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳“׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳×׳™׳™׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳׳“׳’׳™׳© ׳׳× ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳. ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳ "׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳”׳‘׳¨׳§׳× ׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳, ׳׳ ׳׳›׳׳•' ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳’׳©׳× ׳”׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳’׳™׳© ׳׳× ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳’׳•׳£, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳›"׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳¦׳§ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳×׳• ׳׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳¨, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳—׳“׳© ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳’׳™׳© ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳¢"׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘. [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳× ׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳–׳” ׳§׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳’׳¨׳¢ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳].</small></small> [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳“׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”].
<h3> ׳”׳‘׳¨׳§׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳¡׳£</h3>
<b>׳׳”.</b> ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳§ ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳©׳”׳©׳—׳™׳¨׳•- ׳”׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢, <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳“׳’׳™׳© ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳§׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳“׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳ ׳•׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳—׳“׳©׳” [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳£ ׳ ׳˜׳™׳₪׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢"׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳×׳’׳׳” ׳”׳׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳¢"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳׳•׳×- ׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳׳”׳™׳₪׳, ׳׳•׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳”׳‘"׳— ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳›׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳’׳׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳×׳¨׳× ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳].</small></small> ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳”׳¨׳™"׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳£ ׳•׳׳”׳¦׳”׳™׳¨ ׳–׳›׳•׳›׳™׳× <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳—. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳©׳×׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•, ׳׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳׳•׳”׳•. ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳›׳.</small></small> [׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳¦"׳¢].
RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳˜׳• - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳™׳</h2>
<h3> ׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“ ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳¥</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳. ׳•׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳© ׳—׳׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳‘׳:
BB׳. ׳‘׳“ ׳¨׳’׳™׳- ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳˜׳₪׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳¨׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳ [׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘׳•] ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳” ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳• [׳•׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ "׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳•" ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳–"׳”].
׳‘. ׳ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳¢׳•׳¨ [׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳©׳¨׳•׳›׳™׳]- ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳¨׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳”׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳₪׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ [׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'].
׳’. ׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳¥- ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳•׳׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳›׳׳. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳¨׳”׳™׳˜׳™ ׳¢׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳₪׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳˜' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.EE
<h3> ׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× [׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳£] ׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳¥ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳§׳©׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳. ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¨ <b>׳”׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳§</b> ׳׳× ׳”׳–׳›׳•׳›׳™׳× <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳— [׳•׳׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ "׳•׳“׳•׳—׳§" ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳”׳¨׳™"׳, ׳׳ ׳׳× ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳].</small></small>.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳¢׳“׳©׳•׳× ׳׳’׳¢ ׳§׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳₪׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳¥, ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳“׳©׳”] <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢׳“׳©׳•׳× ׳׳’׳¢ ׳§׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳›׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳.</small></small>.
׳¢׳“׳©׳•׳× ׳׳’׳¢ ׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳ ׳§׳™׳•׳× [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳×׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳×], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳¨׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ [׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳׳§׳׳•] ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳₪׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳©, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳©׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳¦׳¥ ׳•׳׳₪׳× ׳ ׳™׳™׳׳•׳ ׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳¨</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳¥ ׳’׳•׳׳™ ׳׳• "׳¡׳™׳׳™׳§׳•׳" ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳™׳˜׳׳× ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳₪׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳•׳¦׳¥ ׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳•׳’ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳•׳₪׳™׳˜׳׳× ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳¨׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳₪׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳. ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳¥ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳” ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳™׳׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳× ׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳§ ׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳˜׳•׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳, ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳¢׳•׳¨ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳™׳•"׳“ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳•] ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳–] ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§.</small></small>.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢'] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳× ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳˜' ׳•׳—׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’].</small></small>. ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳’.
<h3> ׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳‘׳§</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳—׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳§ ׳׳ "׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳•", ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× "׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳•" <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳›׳–׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳—"׳ ׳•׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳‘׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>, ׳׳›׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳›׳”׳”, ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳• <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳' ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳—׳•׳©. </small></small>.  ׳•׳׳©׳₪׳©׳£ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳§ ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳™"׳ ׳“׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳‘׳§ <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ [׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳™׳]</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳›׳׳›׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳•׳¨׳₪׳©, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨׳©"׳™ [׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳–. ׳“"׳” ׳”׳׳ ׳¢׳¨] ׳•׳›׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳' ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳§ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳§׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳, ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳“׳”׳•׳™. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¡' ׳•׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳, ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳.</small></small>] ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳×׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳§׳” ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳”. ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳›׳¡׳×׳™׳׳× ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳™ ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳×׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“, ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳—, ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ <b>׳™׳‘׳©</b> ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳•׳—׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳•׳¢׳₪׳¨] <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳–'. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳•׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳—׳. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳–' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳׳׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳• ׳˜׳—׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳—׳].</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳× ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳¡׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳–' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳¨׳›׳ ׳•׳׳”׳×׳׳¢׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳—׳™׳ ׳”.</small></small>, ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ <b>׳׳—</b>, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳©׳£ ׳׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳ [׳©׳׳•׳—׳– ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳•׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳©׳₪׳©׳₪׳• ׳–׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳ ׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳˜׳™׳˜], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳’׳¨׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳’׳¨׳¨׳• ׳‘׳’׳‘ ׳”׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳×׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳’׳¨׳“ ׳׳× ׳׳׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳×׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳“ ׳”׳¡׳›׳™׳.</small></small>.
<b>׳•.</b> ׳ ׳“׳‘׳§ ׳׳• ׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳•, ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳§׳” ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳×׳• [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳—׳], ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳—׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳• <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳”. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳¢׳׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳•׳¨׳₪׳©, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳§׳” ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳›׳׳›׳• ׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳•׳¨׳₪׳©, ׳׳ ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳•׳—׳ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳‘׳’׳“, ׳•׳›׳ "׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳—, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳›׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'.</small></small> ׳‘׳©׳₪׳©׳•׳£ ׳‘׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳’׳¨׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¢׳ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳—' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳§.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳©׳׳§׳ ׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳¢׳׳•, ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳ ׳—׳• ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳×׳ <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳•' ׳•׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳—.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳ ׳— ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳× ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘, ׳“'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳‘׳’׳“</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳¡׳₪׳•׳’ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳‘׳ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳׳˜׳™ ׳’׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳‘. ׳׳•׳× ׳“ ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™ ׳©׳¨׳“ ׳•׳‘׳"׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳• ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳– ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳‘׳ [׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳™"׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳”׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳’׳¡׳” ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳] ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳×׳ [׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳ ׳§׳™ ׳‘׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳’׳׳•׳¨, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳• ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳ ׳§׳™ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜'].  ׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳•], ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳‘׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘. 
׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳“׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“. ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨"׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳׳× ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳, ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳© ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳•׳›׳“׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳¨"׳ [׳©׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳™׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳§׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳™׳×׳¡׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳•׳׳•׳›׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳ [׳©"׳›, ׳–'] ׳•׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳©׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳—, ׳©׳”׳×׳•׳¡' ׳“׳£ ׳¢׳’: ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳“׳™׳©׳” ׳‘׳›׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳׳”. ׳“"׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›' ׳©׳”׳—׳•׳׳‘ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳•׳׳ ׳›' ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳“׳™׳©׳” ׳‘׳›׳ [׳•׳ "׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•] ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳׳‘ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳•׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳“׳© ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳£ ׳“׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ [׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳™' ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳“׳—׳•׳׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥] ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳©׳ "׳×.
[׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳“׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™ ׳›׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳“׳׳™׳₪׳¨׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“, ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳“׳׳™׳₪׳¨׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨"׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™ ׳“׳© ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳”׳¢' ׳›"׳•].</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳¡׳₪׳•׳’ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳© <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳׳›׳™׳. ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳™"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳™׳© ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳ "׳”. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳ ׳§׳” ׳‘׳”׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳“׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳—׳˜ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳™"׳— ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳™׳©. </small></small>.
׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳' ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳”' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§"׳“] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳”׳™׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳”, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳•׳‘׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳׳¨׳™׳›׳• ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳׳›׳׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳. ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳§׳“׳׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¦"׳¢ ׳©׳—׳©׳© ׳׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳‘׳’׳“. ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳©׳›' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳”׳•׳, ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¥ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳”׳•׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳“׳©. ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳×׳• [׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳©], ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳. ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳— ׳¡׳×׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳— ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳"׳— ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳©׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳"׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳™׳¨׳“׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳’׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¡׳₪׳•׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’. ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳.</small></small>.
׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¡׳₪׳•׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳—׳•׳¨ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳’.</small></small> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳”׳™׳¨, ׳׳•׳×׳¨.
XX ׳‘׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳: ׳. ׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳•. ׳‘. ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜. ׳’. ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ [׳‘׳׳©׳§׳” ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳•׳ ׳™]. ׳“. ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• [׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳• ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳”׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”]. ׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡"׳“.  GG
<h3> ׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ג€“ ׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳•</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳•, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳ ׳§׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳–].</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳” <b>׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳™'.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳׳• ׳‘׳¦׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳§׳ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳, ׳˜' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳“׳׳. [׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳"׳“ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳ ׳§׳™ ׳”׳׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳]. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳ "׳’ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳׳”.</small></small>.
׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳×, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ .</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳׳• ׳¦׳•׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳‘׳” ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳§׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳‘׳” ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳˜׳₪׳—׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘׳• ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳–׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳“׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳׳”. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳ "׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳₪׳” ׳”׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳¦׳•׳׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳” ׳”׳¦׳•׳׳”.  ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¢׳˜, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳ ׳§׳” ׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¢׳˜. ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳– ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳©׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳×׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳×].
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳’׳©׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳™׳×׳¨׳˜׳‘׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳’׳©׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳–׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳’׳©׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳˜"׳– [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳× ׳“"׳ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳›׳©׳׳˜׳¨ ׳¡׳•׳—׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳‘׳’׳©׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• [׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’], ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳• ׳™"׳ ׳›׳ (׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳” ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“). ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳₪׳™׳¨׳©׳• [׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳§׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×] ׳©׳”׳’׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳, ׳•׳׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳¨׳•׳—׳¥ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳™׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳›׳•׳—׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳§׳ ׳—׳ ׳‘׳׳₪׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳ ׳§׳™ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨.  ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜, ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳¡"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳˜׳‘׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳•. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ג€“ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳’', ׳"׳• ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳™"׳–, ׳™"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“', ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳“ [׳˜׳•׳₪׳— ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳˜׳₪׳™׳—] ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳•׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳• ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’ [׳•׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳“׳׳ ׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”]. [׳˜׳•׳₪׳— ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳˜׳₪׳™׳— ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳• ׳׳×׳¨׳˜׳‘ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳×׳¨׳˜׳‘ ׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳].</small></small>.
[׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¢׳¡׳§׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳©, ׳›׳׳• ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳, ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳¡׳§׳•׳˜׳©, ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳× ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳© (׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳™"׳—- ׳›')].
<h3> ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘׳ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳:
BB׳. ׳‘׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳”. <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳—.</small></small>
׳‘. ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘׳•׳×׳• <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳¢"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳–. ׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳. ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small> <b> [׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳•].</b>
׳’. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <b>׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘</b> ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜</b> ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳׳›׳׳›׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳: ׳•׳‘׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•. ׳“"׳” ׳”׳׳™ ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜. ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳©׳‘׳•, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳”.</small></small>.
׳“. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳™׳ <b>׳׳׳•׳“</b> ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳ ׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳ ׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳›׳”׳” ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳׳×׳ ׳§׳” ׳”׳‘׳’׳“. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳” ׳•׳¨׳™׳— ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳¨׳™׳—׳• ׳•׳—׳–׳•׳×׳• ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳¢, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳׳©.</small></small>. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <b>׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳• ׳׳‘׳’׳“ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳׳›׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳© ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳×׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“, ׳׳‘׳ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™' ׳©׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳© ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“, ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳¡׳•׳—׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'] ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳¨ ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳™׳©, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” [׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳×׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳] ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳”.</small></small>.EE
<h3> ׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳₪׳›׳•</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳₪׳ <b>׳׳™׳</b> ׳¢׳ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳, ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳₪׳›׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳ ׳§׳™׳” [׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳× <b>׳׳¢׳˜</b> ] <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳• ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳ ׳§׳™, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳. ׳•׳‘׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳₪׳›׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ "׳˜׳™׳©׳•" [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”] <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳”׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳‘׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢']. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳• ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳₪׳•׳’ ׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳¡׳—׳˜ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳›׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢' ׳™"׳“]. ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳¨׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳¡׳—׳˜׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳×׳•׳׳“׳” ׳“׳“׳© ׳©׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›"׳“ ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“. [׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳•"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳•׳׳׳‘׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳].</small></small>.  [׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ [׳•׳ ׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳] ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜, ׳•׳›׳ "׳].
<h3> ׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳‘ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳₪׳›׳• [׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ג€“ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢]</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›"׳– ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳©, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™"׳ ׳©׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳. ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜.</small></small> ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳'.</small></small>. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳’׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢</b>, ׳•׳¨׳§ <b>׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳—׳§</b> ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ [׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳¨ ׳©׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ "׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳" ׳‘׳•]. <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳ "׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳• ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳"׳¦ ׳”׳›׳”׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳•, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳•"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳”׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳•, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳×׳™ ׳׳™ ׳©׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳₪׳™' ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳×׳” ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳ ׳–׳•׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳”׳•׳™ ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳–׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳׳•׳. ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳×׳׳›׳׳›׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ג€“ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳•</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳׳›׳׳•׳›׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳‘׳™׳©׳” ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳•, ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳׳›׳׳- ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§, ׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳× ׳¡׳׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜ (׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳“) ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳•, ׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳ ׳§׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳™׳, ׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“] ׳™׳© ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳ ׳“: ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳”׳׳׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• [׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’', ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳— ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳•], ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳•, ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳”, ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳˜.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳‘ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳™', ׳•׳׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳×׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳‘, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳•.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ [׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳•] <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳¢"׳” ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳’' ׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳×, ׳׳׳’"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳—׳¥ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳׳"׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳”- ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳’׳¨"׳ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳•׳©׳¨׳™, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳›׳”׳"׳¨ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜. [׳•׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳™ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳•].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳©׳‘׳›׳™׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳©׳‘׳›׳™׳•׳¨, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳• <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳× ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳. ׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳™' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜.
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳•׳’׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘] ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜</b> ׳’׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳›׳–׳”. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳˜׳׳™׳× (׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳”) ׳”׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳¡׳₪׳•׳’׳” ׳›׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳™׳¡׳—׳˜׳• ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳›׳׳™ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳›׳£] ׳׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘׳¢׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳™׳¡׳—׳˜׳• ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳ [׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳™׳¡׳—׳˜׳•, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳¡׳—׳˜׳•] <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—. ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳¡׳—׳˜׳• ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳›׳–׳”. [׳•׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳¢"׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳˜׳׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳©׳¨׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳׳™׳, ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳¡׳•׳’ ׳׳˜׳׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳׳׳• ׳©׳©׳¨׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳¨׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¢׳× ׳©׳¨׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳›׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¡׳—׳˜ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳˜].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳©׳¨׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳‘׳’׳“ [׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳] ׳”׳©׳¨׳•׳™ ׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳. <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳”.</small></small>
<h3> ׳”׳”׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳•׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳ ׳¨׳˜׳‘׳•</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳”׳”׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳•׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¨׳˜׳‘׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¨׳˜׳‘׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳¨׳“׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳’׳©׳׳™׳ [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳”׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳¡"׳‘.</small></small>.
׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳׳• ׳©׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳– ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳‘׳™׳©׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“', ׳¢׳™"׳©.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳‘ ׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳•׳¦׳׳—׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳¨׳—׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳¦׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳×. ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳”. ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳—.</small></small> ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘׳•׳×׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳”. <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳©׳•׳. ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳.</small></small>
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳¦׳¨ [׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳׳—׳×] ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳•]. <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳— ׳•׳¡׳§"׳¡ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳©׳•׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳©׳˜׳™׳—׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜</b> ׳‘׳’׳“ <b>׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳</b> ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ <b>׳׳©׳˜׳•׳—</b> ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳¨׳׳™׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳—׳©׳“׳•׳”׳• ׳©׳›׳™׳‘׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨׳™ ׳—׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳—. <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳¡"׳’.</small></small> ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳–׳™׳¢׳”. <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳¡"׳’. ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳’"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳§׳ "׳”] ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳¨"׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳˜׳™׳—׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳‘׳©׳™׳. ׳•׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳– ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳™׳¢׳”, ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳–׳™׳¢׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳™׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small> ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳— ׳׳• ׳׳×׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳© ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳× ׳׳’׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳©, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳× ׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳•׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳’׳©׳ ׳¢׳ ׳•׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳×׳׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳’׳©׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳׳‘ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳׳§׳, <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳• ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳›], ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳—] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳• ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳›"׳–] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> [׳•׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳¡׳•׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳’׳©׳, ׳›׳׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳’׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳₪׳” ׳’׳•׳׳™ ׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳’׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳׳¨ ׳•׳§׳©׳׳™׳¨].
<h3> ׳”׳©׳׳¨׳× ׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™׳” ׳¢׳ ׳—׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳×׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳™׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳‘׳׳™׳, ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳×׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳”, <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳¡"׳–.</small></small> ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳₪׳™׳¨׳¡׳׳• ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳‘׳, ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”', ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳”׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.  ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳‘׳©׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳¢׳™' ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳–.</small></small>
<h3> ׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳‘ ׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳׳• ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳›׳׳›׳” ׳™׳“׳• ׳‘׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳ ׳— ׳׳× ׳™׳“׳• ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳™׳“׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳•׳™׳§׳ ׳— ׳׳× ׳™׳“׳• ׳‘׳¡׳׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜ ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳, ׳׳• ׳™׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳‘׳׳₪׳” ׳§׳©׳” [׳›׳׳• ׳©׳˜׳™׳—] <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳–. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳”׳׳₪׳”. ׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳§׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳—׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳¨׳˜׳‘׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳© ׳׳• ׳¨׳“׳™׳׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳”׳¡׳§׳” <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳¡"׳˜, ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳×׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“, ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳˜׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳’׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳˜׳—׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳×׳™׳‘׳©׳•, <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳˜׳™׳—׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ "׳.</small></small> ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳’׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳•.
<h3> ׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳‘׳’׳¨׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳˜׳‘׳• ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳’׳¨׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜׳•׳× ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳›׳×׳• ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳. <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪' ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳ ׳•׳‘׳§׳•"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳‘] ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—׳™"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳•׳—׳˜ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳›׳• ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳“. </small></small>
<h3> ׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳•׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳©׳₪׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳–.</b>  ׳׳“׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳—׳¥ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡. ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳‘׳. <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳˜' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳×׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳₪׳™' ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳‘׳]. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ "׳— ׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× [׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳"׳‘ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳‘׳] ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳• ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳–. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳’] ׳•׳”׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳”] ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ [׳×׳•׳׳“׳” ׳“׳“׳©].</small></small> [׳•׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳© ׳׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳] <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳‘׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳˜' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳™׳©.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳© ׳—׳™. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡' ׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳¨׳• ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳‘. ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳×׳ ׳’׳‘ ׳׳׳©.</small></small>. (׳•׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳).
׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳©׳₪׳׳• <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳׳—׳¦׳™׳× ׳”׳©׳§׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳—: ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳§׳ "׳”] ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ "׳, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳•. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡' ׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small> ׳׳‘׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳• ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳• ׳‘׳©׳₪׳׳• <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘. ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳”"׳” ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•"׳“. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡' ׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳. ׳•׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳”׳–׳§׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. [׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳’ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳”׳–׳§׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¦"׳˜ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳©׳¢׳¨׳• ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜, ׳׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳™' ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•].</small></small>. [׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳—'- ׳™"׳].
