<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳˜׳– - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳¦׳“ ׳•׳—׳•׳‘׳</h2>
<center><b>[׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳]</b></center>
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳¦׳“</h3>
 <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳¦׳“ ׳”׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳׳× ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳”׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳— ׳׳©׳׳•׳˜ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳׳. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳—׳• ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳•, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳׳× ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳©׳×׳׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳—.
׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳–׳” ׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ "׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳—׳“ ׳©׳—׳™׳" ׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳׳×׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳© ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳©׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳×, ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳‘׳—׳“ ׳©׳—׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳© ׳׳©׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳›׳ [׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳›׳•׳—׳• ׳•׳–׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳×׳•, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳×׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳© ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳•׳›׳׳•׳]. ׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳×׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳” ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳“, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳׳× ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳—, ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳›׳™ ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ [׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳×׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳•׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳“׳].  ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳•, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳© ׳׳©׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳›׳©׳›׳•׳¢׳¡ ׳׳©׳—׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳׳•׳‘ ׳•׳”׳•׳׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳©׳׳• ׳׳– ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳•׳›׳׳•׳ [׳•׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳₪׳™' ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳”, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳©׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳×׳׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳”׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“, ׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳™׳₪׳×׳— ׳”׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳™׳‘׳¨׳—׳• ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳¨׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳×׳׳˜׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳•].
׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳–׳”, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳§׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳• [׳›׳׳• ׳ ׳׳׳” ׳׳• ׳¦׳‘] ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳”׳©׳×׳׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳׳× ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳§׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¢׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳©׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳§׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¢׳×, ׳•׳¦"׳ ׳©׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳›׳–׳” ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳•.</small></small>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳¦׳“ ׳•׳×׳•׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳¡׳•׳’׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳›׳–׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳—׳“׳¨ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¡ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳”׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳™׳ ׳₪׳© ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳• <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳', ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳• ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳•׳— ׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳™׳. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳₪׳— ׳”׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘ ׳׳• ׳—׳×׳•׳] ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳— ׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳©׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳¢׳ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳₪׳— ׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳×׳•׳׳™׳ [׳•׳—׳×׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“, ׳•׳¦"׳¢].</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳©׳—׳™׳” ׳׳—׳×, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳©׳, ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.  ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳©׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳”׳ ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳— ׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘], ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳—׳“ ׳©׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“, ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳×׳•׳׳™׳- ׳¦"׳¢], ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳“ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳©׳™׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳©׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳—׳×׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳], ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳×׳›׳׳™׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳“׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”. </small></small>.
׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳” ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳“׳× ׳׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—. ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳–: ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳“׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳“׳” ׳ ׳×׳₪׳¡ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳–.
JJ ׳•׳‘׳׳ "׳— [׳׳•׳¡׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳¦׳“] ׳”׳§׳©׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳׳׳™׳• ׳"׳› ׳׳“׳•׳¢ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳ ׳×׳₪׳¡ ׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳’׳¨׳׳. ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳–׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’, ׳•׳›׳—׳•׳¨׳© ׳©׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳©׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳¨׳© ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳׳™׳›׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳–׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”.
׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳”׳׳‘׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳”׳›׳׳‘ ׳•׳×׳₪׳¡׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳• ׳•׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨׳™׳, ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳–׳” ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¦"׳• ׳•׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳׳©"׳› ׳¢"׳–. ׳¢"׳›</small></small>AMP, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳׳›׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳™׳×׳₪׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘, ׳', ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳“׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳¦׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳• ׳“׳‘׳©. ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’.</small></small>, [׳•׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳].
׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“.
׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳' ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳ ׳§׳˜׳• ׳‘׳₪׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳ ׳¦׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳“׳’׳™׳.  ׳•׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳–׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳©׳•׳¨׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳˜׳₪׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳§׳—׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳”׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳©׳™׳¨׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳"׳› ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ '׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“'.</small></small>.
׳›׳׳‘ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“.
<h3> ׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳”׳׳“׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳”׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳©׳׳”׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳׳× ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳—, ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳‘"׳— ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•] ׳‘׳‘׳™' ׳”׳׳—'.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳” ׳׳• ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳›׳©׳™׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳” ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳—׳• ׳›׳ ׳”׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳׳’׳“׳¨ ׳–׳”.
<h3> ׳”׳—׳׳©׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳© ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳¦׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳— [׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳•׳₪׳¡ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳›׳׳]. <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳‘' ׳“"׳” ׳׳•] ׳׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳” ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¦"׳¢, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳. [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳׳× ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳¨׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳׳× ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳× ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨].</small></small> ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳‘׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳₪׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳™׳—׳׳©׳• ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳£. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳– ׳×׳¨׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳“׳‘׳§׳• ׳›׳ ׳₪׳™׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳£. <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>
׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳© ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳•. <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳˜. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳–׳”, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳§׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳• ׳"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳—׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳×׳₪׳¡׳ ׳• ׳•׳›׳₪׳™ ׳”׳׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳'] ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳׳× ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳—.</small></small>
<h3> ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ - ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳•, ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳• ׳‘׳©׳—׳™׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳ ׳₪׳©- ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳.
׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨. <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳”. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳× ׳׳“׳ [׳›׳׳ ׳' ׳¡׳§"׳] ׳׳¦׳“ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳׳¦׳¢׳¨׳• ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳”׳¦׳™׳“׳”. ׳•׳׳§׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳”׳׳¦׳¢׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳• [׳׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨׳•] ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳›׳–׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ [׳©׳, ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳–].</small></small>
[׳‘׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ (׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳—') ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳—׳“ - ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳›׳“ ׳‘׳©׳—׳™׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳"׳› ׳׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳- ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳©׳—׳™׳” ׳׳—׳×, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—. ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳™"׳“ ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”.</small></small>].
׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳×׳™ ׳¡׳™׳‘׳•׳×, ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳×׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳—׳™׳” ׳׳—׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳× ׳׳• ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳׳ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳›׳–׳”. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¨׳׳©׳™׳ ["׳׳§׳§׳™׳"] ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳× ׳׳• ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳“. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”. <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳‘, ׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳“, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>
<h3> ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳§׳˜׳</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳›"׳‘]. ׳•׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳׳§׳˜ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳‘׳׳׳§׳˜ ׳©׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳×, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳×, ׳•׳"׳› ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳§׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳.  ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– [׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳©׳”׳] ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳₪׳×׳•׳— [׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳§׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳“׳”, ׳•׳"׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳”׳—׳׳•׳] ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳× ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳• ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳₪׳×׳•׳— [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳§׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳“׳”], ׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳₪׳×׳•׳—.  ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳׳¦׳™׳“׳× ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳×׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳¦"׳¢ ׳¢׳•׳“.  ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›' ׳”׳¢' ׳’' ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳©׳” ׳׳§׳¦׳×׳” ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳×׳™׳×׳׳© ׳¨׳•׳‘׳”.</small></small> ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳×׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳—׳™׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳×׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳—׳™׳” ׳׳—׳×. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳–׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳• "׳׳§׳§" ׳׳ ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳”׳—׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳¡׳×׳₪׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” !.
<h3> ׳¦׳™׳“׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳¢׳•׳§׳¥ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳—׳™׳“</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨׳• ׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳§׳¥ ׳•׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳•׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳• ׳׳׳¨׳¥, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳•. ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳• ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳•׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳• ׳׳׳¨׳¥ [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳]. <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳– ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳§׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳׳×׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳׳×׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• [׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳"׳¦ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳”]. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“, ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳• ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳§׳•׳¨.  ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳׳™׳׳×׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳׳×׳™ ׳׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳¢׳§׳™׳¦׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•, ׳•׳’׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳•׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳׳©׳›׳‘ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳׳©׳›׳‘ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳—׳׳” ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳”' [׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳, ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳׳›׳”], ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳₪׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳¨׳¡׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳›"׳—] ׳›' ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳“ ׳׳™׳׳×׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨.</small></small>
׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳§׳¥, ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳©׳׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳׳׳¨׳¥ ׳׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳• ׳׳׳¨׳¥ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳•׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳™׳›׳• ׳׳׳¨׳¥.
׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳•, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×] <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳§׳•׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳§ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳—, ׳•׳›׳©׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳§ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳•'. ׳"׳  ׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳”׳ ׳›׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•. ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¨׳"׳© ׳¨׳™׳© ׳₪' ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳¨׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—.</small></small>.
׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳§ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳• ׳׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳”׳—׳•׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳“ ׳•׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©"׳׳§׳§" ׳§׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳©, ׳©׳‘׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳©׳© ׳¢׳§׳™׳¦׳” ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳•, ׳׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳™׳׳¦׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳–׳™׳§׳ ׳•. ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• [׳—"׳ ׳¢׳' ׳§׳׳—] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳”׳¨׳•׳’ ׳׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳™׳ [׳׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳“׳ ׳©׳¢׳§׳™׳¦׳×׳• ׳›׳•׳׳‘׳×] ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳₪׳—׳“ ׳”׳™׳׳“׳™׳, ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳— ׳©׳“׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳¡׳’׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳׳“ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¦׳” ׳©׳₪׳—׳“ ׳”׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳§׳•"׳ .</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¦׳™׳“׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳§׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳•</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¢׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳¦׳‘ ׳׳• ׳—׳™׳׳–׳•׳], ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳•׳—׳׳© ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳–׳•׳– ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• [׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳˜], ׳"׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳׳׳¥ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳§׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳•, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳. ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳—׳¨׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳§׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳•, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳“׳×׳• [׳¢׳™' ׳×׳•׳¨׳™"׳“ ׳—׳’׳™׳’׳” ׳™׳.] ׳"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳•׳׳ ׳׳× ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™. ׳•׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳₪׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳›׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ [׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳‘.] ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳—, ׳“׳”׳×׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¨׳” ׳•׳¨׳‘׳”, ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳.  ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ [׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳'] ׳©׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳™׳¡׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳׳× ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳§׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳—׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳×׳₪׳¡׳•׳”׳•, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳“׳—׳•׳§ ׳©׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳• ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳×׳׳™׳“. ׳•׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳© ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳—׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳§׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳•.
׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳• ׳ ׳׳׳™׳, ׳׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳ ׳™׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳“ ׳”׳¡׳•׳£ ׳•׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳–׳׳ ׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳™׳¡׳’׳¨׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳”׳ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜'.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳›׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳ ׳׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳•׳§׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳. ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳, ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳ ׳” ׳”׳׳•׳–׳›׳¨׳× ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢, ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳•׳”׳×׳”׳"׳“ [׳¡׳§׳™"׳] ׳¦׳™׳“׳“ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳’׳©"׳¨. ׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳§, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳ ׳” ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳–׳™׳§׳™׳. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳’׳™׳¨׳”, ׳™׳ ׳₪׳ ׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳™׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳’׳™׳¨׳”, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳™׳¨׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳™׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳›׳.</small></small>.</b>
<h3> ׳¦׳™׳“׳× ׳×׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™ ׳”׳˜׳‘׳¢׳×</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳×׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™ ׳”׳˜׳‘׳¢׳× ׳•׳׳¦׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳‘׳׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'] ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¨׳” ׳•׳¨׳‘׳”, ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳, ׳•׳"׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳’׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳”׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳ ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¦׳™׳“׳× ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳×׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳—׳™׳” ׳•׳¢׳•׳£ ׳‘׳™׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳§׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳׳•׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳—׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳”׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳›׳׳׳• ׳•׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳‘ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳—׳• ׳”׳׳׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳—׳–׳¨׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳.  ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳×׳™׳™׳ [׳©׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳›׳•' ׳›׳ "׳] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳©׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳׳›׳׳•׳‘ ׳׳• ׳׳¨׳“׳•׳£ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳ ׳¡׳• ׳׳›׳׳•׳‘ [׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”]. <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳–׳™׳§׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳—, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳“.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳—׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳•׳‘ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳©׳—׳™׳” ׳׳—׳× [׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳— ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳ ׳‘׳“׳—׳™׳” ׳׳›׳׳•׳‘ ׳׳• ׳׳¨׳“׳•׳£ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳ ׳¡׳• ׳׳›׳׳•׳‘.
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳—׳™׳” ׳•׳¢׳•׳£ ׳‘׳™׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳׳›׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳™׳×׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳. <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳“.</small></small>
<h3> ׳¦׳™׳“׳× ׳׳“׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳”. [׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳¡׳× ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“. ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳׳] <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳›"׳‘] ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳“׳ [׳•׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳”׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳•׳× ׳¡׳“. ׳₪׳¨׳¡ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳׳•׳× ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¢׳׳” ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳•׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳˜׳¨ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳₪׳˜׳¨ ׳”׳“׳’׳™׳, ׳•׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜׳¨ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳₪׳˜׳¨ ׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×], ׳•׳›' ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳”׳׳×׳‘׳•׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳.
׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳“׳× ׳׳“׳, ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¡ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳”.
׳•׳׳×׳₪׳™׳¡׳× ׳”׳׳§׳•׳©׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳“׳, ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳×׳₪׳¡׳•׳”׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© [׳¢׳™' ׳ ׳—׳ ׳§׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳“"׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳], ׳"׳  ׳׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳‘׳¨- ׳•׳¦׳™׳“׳× ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳§׳₪׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳™׳‘׳©׳™׳¥ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳‘׳¨, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳§׳•׳‘"׳© ׳‘׳‘"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳©׳¡׳— ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳“׳׳‘׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳- ׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳”׳' ׳׳‘׳™׳׳•׳×].</small></small>.</b>
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳˜׳–* - ׳—׳‘׳׳” ׳•׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳ ׳©׳׳”</h2>
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳—׳‘׳׳” ׳•׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳ ׳©׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳•׳’ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳•׳—׳˜ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳‘ ׳׳׳׳›׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™, ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳“׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳©׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳”׳—׳•׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳×׳•׳׳“׳” ׳“׳“׳©, ׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳”׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳“׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳׳×׳ ׳™' ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳¨׳¦׳™׳ [׳§׳–.] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳’"׳› ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳•׳.
׳•׳׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨׳• ׳“׳¨׳ ׳ ׳§׳׳”, ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳× ׳“׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳™׳–׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨ [׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'], ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳“׳ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳’׳׳“ ׳•׳׳¦׳™׳¦׳× ׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳£ ׳’׳׳“ ׳©׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳×׳¦׳ ׳˜׳™׳₪׳× ׳“׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳•׳׳›׳•׳•׳¥ ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳×׳¦׳ ׳˜׳™׳₪׳× ׳“׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳׳©׳—׳” ׳׳• ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳”׳©׳•׳׳‘׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳”. <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳‘׳. ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳¦ ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳˜.</small></small>
<h3> ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳§׳•׳¥ ׳•׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳’׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳×׳§׳•׳¢ ׳׳• ׳§׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳‘׳©׳¨׳• ׳•׳”׳§׳•׳¥ ׳׳›׳׳™׳‘ ׳׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳.
׳•׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳, ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳”׳§׳•׳¥ ׳×׳§׳•׳¢ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳— ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳§׳•׳¥ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳™"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳¥ ׳©׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳“ ׳׳©׳” ׳©׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™.</small></small>.
׳׳•׳’׳׳” ׳”׳׳›׳׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳•׳§׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳’׳׳” ׳×׳¦׳ ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™ײµ׳¦׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳“׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳’׳׳”. <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳›"׳—. ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳“׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳“׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳¦].</small></small> ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳“׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳¢ ׳•׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳’׳׳”. <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳˜.</small></small> [׳•׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳•׳’׳׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳§׳‘׳”].
<h3> ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳“׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳‘׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¦׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳“׳ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small> [׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳¦׳”]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳–׳”.
<h3> ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¨׳” ׳•׳¨׳‘׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳•׳’ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳•׳’ ׳›׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¨׳” ׳•׳¨׳‘׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳• <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳, ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳×׳”׳•׳• ׳׳–׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳¦׳¢׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳×׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳×׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳”׳•׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×.
׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳‘. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳™"׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¨׳” ׳•׳¨׳‘׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳• [׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳× ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳¦׳™׳“׳×׳• ׳•׳׳“׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳¨׳•׳’ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¨׳” ׳•׳¨׳‘׳” ׳"׳› ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳•]. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳. </small></small>, ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳–׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳' ׳•׳‘׳˜׳•׳©"׳¢ ׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳›׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳™ ׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳׳’] ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳׳׳™׳”׳• ׳—"׳“ ׳¢׳' 355 ׳”׳¢' 4.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳‘׳¨׳– ׳•׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳׳™׳×׳× ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳¨׳– ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ [׳ ׳׳׳™׳, ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳] ׳›׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳׳•׳×׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳›׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳–, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳¨׳•׳’ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳›׳•.  ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳× ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜ ׳©׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳×׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳×׳• ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳‘׳›׳™׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳¡׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳©׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳›׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳×׳• ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳—, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳”׳•׳¨׳“׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳× ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳•׳׳¢׳©׳™׳• ׳׳•׳›׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳–].  ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳•׳“׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳›׳×׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳×׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳— ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳•׳’ ׳ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳™׳›׳×׳•, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳™׳›׳×׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳”] ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳×׳׳™׳©׳×׳ ׳›׳™ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳¥. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”.  ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳׳§ ׳”׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳– ׳׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳¡ ׳§׳•׳˜׳ ׳—׳¨׳§׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳¡׳¡ ׳§׳•׳˜׳ ׳—׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳×׳• ׳”׳—׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳•. <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳—׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¡"׳¨.
׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ [׳׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳• ׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳¨׳§׳™׳], ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳¡ ׳׳•׳ ׳¢ ׳׳”׳—׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳׳×׳™׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳’׳¨׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳׳×׳™׳, ׳•׳—׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳•׳׳×׳™׳, ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳¨׳—׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳¡׳¡, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳¡ [׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳–: ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳] ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳™׳×׳₪׳¡ ׳—׳™׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳₪׳¨׳™׳¡׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳“׳” [׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳“׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳§"׳˜], ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳×׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳¨׳—׳§׳×׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small> [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¡׳׳§׳ ׳׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳¨׳¡׳¡ ׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳—׳׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳׳™׳×.</b> ׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳—׳–׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳¡׳¡ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳•׳ ׳₪׳×׳•׳—. ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.  ׳•׳“׳¢ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳׳•׳£ ׳”׳—׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳¨׳“׳׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳•׳•׳¨׳•׳ ׳, ׳׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™<b>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳“׳™׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳•].</b>
<h3> ׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳× ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳ ׳•׳©׳›׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳©׳›׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳×: ׳. ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳×׳ ׳׳›׳׳™׳‘׳” ׳§׳¦׳×- ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳©׳™׳- ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' [׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨׳• (׳•׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳•)] ׳‘. ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳×׳ ׳׳›׳׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳ ׳×- ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳© ׳׳ ׳׳¨׳¡׳™- ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳›׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳›׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳’׳׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳׳₪׳™ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳©׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳× ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳¨׳¡׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘׳• [׳©׳•׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳¢׳¡] ׳׳• ׳׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳’׳” ׳' ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳§׳™׳¦׳×׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳›"׳›.</small></small>, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”. ׳’. ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳×׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳ ׳× ׳•׳¢׳׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳׳™׳×- ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳© ׳׳¨׳¡׳™ ׳•׳›׳׳‘ ׳©׳•׳˜׳”- ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳• ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘׳• [׳©׳•׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳¢׳¡] ׳׳• ׳׳. ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳‘ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳₪׳© ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>.</b>
<h3> ׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳”׳׳¦׳¢׳¨׳• [׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳], ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳•׳’ ׳×׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™ ׳”׳˜׳‘׳¢׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¦׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳׳•׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳•׳’ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳–׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳“ ׳›׳׳׳• ׳•׳׳¦׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“. ׳׳ ׳‘׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳× ׳׳§׳§ ׳”׳׳₪׳—׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳"׳¦ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳"׳› ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳” ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳—, ׳•׳׳׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¡׳•׳“׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳” ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳• ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ [׳•׳”׳¨׳™׳’׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳]. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳"׳“ ׳׳×׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨.</small></small>.
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳˜׳–** - ׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h2>
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•, ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'. ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳— ׳•׳”׳₪׳¡׳“. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳—׳–"׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳’. ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳‘.
<h3> ׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳× ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳׳“׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳” ׳¢׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳× ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳׳• ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳× ׳׳"׳˜ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳• [׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳”] ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳•, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳”׳׳×׳•. ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳” ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳–.</small></small> ׳׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳•׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳‘׳”׳׳×׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳“׳” ׳©׳×׳׳›׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳§׳•׳¦׳¨ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳“, ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳’. ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳¨ "׳׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳—" ׳•׳›׳•', ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳“׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳— ׳׳׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳”׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳¢׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳”, ׳™"׳—.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳’ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳©׳׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳’׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨. <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳•, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small> [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳”׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳¢׳’׳׳” ׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳§׳•׳׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳”, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳— ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳׳¢׳˜, ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳—׳׳¨ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳”׳׳›׳׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™</h3>
<b>׳›׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳™׳’ ׳׳× ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳׳‘׳“, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳–׳§׳§ ׳׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳™׳’ ׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳–׳•׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳¡׳•׳’ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳™׳’׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳™׳’ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳] ׳©׳”׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳“.</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳׳‘ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳©׳” ׳׳• ׳׳”׳©׳™׳’ ׳׳–׳•׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳׳‘ ׳¨׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳–׳•׳. <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳“, ׳™"׳‘, ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>
׳•׳׳›׳, ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¢׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳™׳׳›׳׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳•.</small></small>
׳•׳›׳©׳׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳‘׳›׳׳•׳‘, ׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳•׳‘ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳™׳¡׳’׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳“ <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳™"׳‘ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳“׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳•׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳•׳’׳¨ ׳׳—"׳›, ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>.</b>
<h3> ׳”׳¢׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳—.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳”׳׳×׳• ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳×׳׳›׳ ׳׳©׳. ׳•׳¡׳×׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳›׳™׳— ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳™׳׳›׳׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳©׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳“, ׳™"׳’, ׳•׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳”׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳”׳׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳. <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳›"׳› ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳©׳—׳•׳§ ׳¡׳׳׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳›"׳› ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳¨׳¦׳•׳¢׳”</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳¨׳¦׳•׳¢׳”, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳—׳‘׳ ׳׳¨׳¦׳•׳¢׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳™׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳”׳—׳‘׳ ׳׳×׳—׳× ׳™׳“׳• ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳’׳™׳¢ ׳”׳—׳‘׳ ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳¨׳¥, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳—׳‘׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳׳¨׳•. <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳”, ׳', ׳”' ׳•׳˜"׳– ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small></b>
<h3> ׳›׳׳‘ ׳ ׳—׳™׳” [׳׳¡׳•׳׳]</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳”, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳‘ ׳ ׳—׳™׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳™׳›׳”, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳¨. <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳¨׳©׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳¨, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳©׳, ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳”, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳©׳¨׳©׳¨׳× ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳” ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳¡׳•׳׳. ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳׳‘ ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¢׳' ׳™׳— ׳•׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳× ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘, ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳¡"׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” (׳”׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳” ׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳‘ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳¡׳×)].  ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” (׳©׳”׳›׳׳‘ ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¨׳©׳¨׳×) ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳.</small></small>
RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳– - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳×׳™׳¨</h2>
 <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳”׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳•׳¢׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳• ׳”׳—׳‘׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” [׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨, ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳” ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳], ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳׳© ׳—׳•׳˜ [׳”׳׳•׳–׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳'] ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳–׳§ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳§׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳’"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳›] ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳©׳¨ ׳§׳™׳™׳ [׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳× ׳©׳›׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳§׳©׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳׳” ׳§׳©׳¨׳™׳], ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳’׳“׳¨ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳§׳©׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳–׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳˜. ׳•׳’׳ ׳₪׳•׳×׳ ׳—׳‘׳׳™׳ [׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–] ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳•׳¢׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳—׳‘׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳₪׳™׳×׳•׳ [׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳×׳ ׳—׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳”׳—׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳¡׳™׳‘׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳–׳”]. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳§׳©׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•, ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳, ׳—' ׳©׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳’' ׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳¨׳’׳” ׳”׳©׳ ׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳“׳¨׳’׳” ׳”׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳×.</small></small>
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳”׳×׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×: ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳™"׳£ ׳•׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ [׳׳׳ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¢] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳.
׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ (׳׳• ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¢) ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳׳ <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳ ׳›׳, ׳׳¨׳™"׳£ ׳•׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳’׳ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳¨׳"׳© ׳›׳ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</b> ׳•׳׳”׳׳›׳” <b>׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳</b> <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳'.</small></small> .
<h3> ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳’׳“׳¨׳™ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•. ׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳™ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳: 
BB׳. <b>׳§׳©׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜</b> - ׳׳‘׳ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳׳© ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• [׳›׳׳• ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳₪׳— <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳׳© ׳—׳•׳˜׳™ ׳”׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳× ׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳׳™. ׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—.</small></small>] ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨. <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳'.</small></small>
׳‘. <b>׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“</b> - ׳׳‘׳ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ [׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›"׳“ ׳©׳¢׳•׳×] ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳©׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳©׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳“' ׳“"׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳.  ׳•׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›"׳“ ׳©׳¢׳•׳×- ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜ ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳“"׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳.</small></small>.  ׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳׳₪׳™ <b>׳¨׳¦׳•׳</b> ׳”׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳•׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ <b>׳”׳“׳¨׳</b> ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳›׳–׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳©׳¨, ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳˜"׳–. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>.EE
<h3> ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳”</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳”- ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳׳׳™׳• ׳›׳©׳׳•׳©׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳™ ׳”׳§׳©׳¨ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳”'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ [׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨׳•׳›׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳™׳] ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜.</small></small> [׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘'].
<h3> ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳•</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• - ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳©׳¨ ׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳׳©׳™׳›׳× ׳—׳•׳˜׳™ ׳”׳§׳©׳¨, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳”' ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳”. ׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳- ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳׳•, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳›׳–׳”].</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳׳©׳™׳›׳× ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳”׳§׳©׳¨, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳•׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳©׳¨, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳”׳™׳•׳. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳‘׳ ׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳•׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳”׳¡׳×׳‘׳›׳” ׳׳§׳©׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳§׳©׳¨ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™׳• <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳ ׳‘׳§׳©׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™׳• ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳›׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× (׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳” <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳•׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳›׳–׳”, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳• ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳•׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳•. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳‘׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳•׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳• ׳׳›׳׳” ׳™׳׳™׳.</small></small>) ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™׳• <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“', ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪' ׳¡׳§׳§׳ "׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳˜.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳›׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳˜׳™׳¨׳—׳” ׳׳—׳₪׳© ׳¡"׳× ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳– ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳›׳§׳©׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳©׳‘׳¢׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳“' ׳“"׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳• ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳₪"׳— ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¡"׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳₪׳—׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳© ׳‘׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¡'] ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳"׳¦ ׳—"׳‘ ׳₪׳›"׳˜ [׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳™ ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢"׳× ׳¡׳§"׳].</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳× ׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳•׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳—׳•׳˜׳™ ׳”׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳—׳•׳˜׳™ ׳”׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳× ׳©׳”׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳£, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳§׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳–׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳©׳¨, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳‘, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡' ׳©׳™"׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳•׳׳–׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ "׳׳–׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳" ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ "׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨׳™׳" ׳©׳ ׳¦׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳– <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡' ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳ ׳©׳׳× ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳׳”׳“׳•"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳— 2 ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ "׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨׳™׳" ׳©׳ ׳¦׳׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳–, ׳©׳”׳ ׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳"׳¡׳§׳•׳˜׳©" ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ "׳×׳₪׳™׳¡׳”". ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳‘׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳× ׳‘׳׳©׳™׳›׳× ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¨׳׳©׳™ ׳”׳§׳©׳¨ <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳©. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳₪׳•׳£ ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳”׳₪׳•׳×׳ ׳—׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳•׳”׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳§׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳™ ׳”"׳— ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳₪׳£ ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳׳• ׳¡׳¨׳˜ ׳׳׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳ [׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳—׳‘׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳¢׳•׳’׳™׳•׳×] ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳׳•׳₪׳£ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳׳׳₪׳₪׳• ׳‘׳₪׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳”], ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳• ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳¢"׳“.</small></small>.
RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳— - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳—׳•׳¨׳© ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳§׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳•׳׳¢׳׳¨ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳׳</h2>
<b>׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳—׳•׳¨׳©</b>  <b>*</b><small><small>׳‘׳׳ "׳— [׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳"׳— ׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳”׳—׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳•] ׳”׳§׳©׳” ׳”׳™׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳•׳–׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳׳™׳—, ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳—: ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳• ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¦׳׳™׳—׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳©׳”׳¡׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳•׳–׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳™׳–׳” ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳¨׳©׳• ׳•׳–׳¨׳¢׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳׳™׳—׳, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳×׳™' ׳‘׳₪׳ "׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳”:, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳“: ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳–׳¨׳¢׳• ׳‘׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳×׳ ׳׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳—׳•׳¨׳©</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳•׳׳”׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳–׳¨׳™׳¢׳”, ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳¨׳©. ׳›׳’׳•׳, ׳”׳׳©׳•׳” ׳’׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳“׳” [׳”׳׳©׳•׳” ׳’׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”] ׳׳• ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳¨׳™׳¥ ׳‘׳׳“׳׳” ׳׳–׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳˜׳ ׳’׳‘׳©׳•׳©׳™׳× ׳׳”׳©׳•׳•׳× ׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳“׳׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳׳©׳§׳” ׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳–׳¨׳•׳¢׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳–׳¨׳•׳¢׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳¢׳’: ׳“"׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳—׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳™׳₪׳•׳™ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢, ׳•׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳₪"׳— ׳”"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳₪׳•׳™ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳•׳”׳©׳‘׳—׳×׳” ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳×׳” ׳׳–׳¨׳™׳¢׳”, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳” ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”.
׳׳—. ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳–׳¨׳•׳¢׳”, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳©׳”, ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳—׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳©׳•׳” ׳’׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳•׳” ׳’׳•׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳¨׳•׳‘׳ [׳׳•׳×׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×] ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘], ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳”׳©׳•׳•׳׳× ׳’׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳‘׳™׳×. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳§׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳—. ׳“"׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳™׳—׳•׳— ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳¨׳©.</small></small>.
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳—׳¨׳™׳©׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳•׳×׳™׳—׳•׳— ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳›׳©׳—׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳₪׳¨, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¦"׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳™׳™׳—׳“׳•׳”׳• ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳›׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳¨׳’׳–׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳™׳ ׳× ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳‘׳”׳' ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›"׳] ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳›׳“׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳©׳₪׳× ׳”׳™׳. [׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘׳•׳×׳• ׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳׳• ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳• ׳׳• ׳׳™׳™׳©׳¨׳•].</small></small>].
<h3> ׳”׳¡׳¢׳× ׳¢׳’׳׳× ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳₪׳¨</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¢ ׳¢׳’׳׳× ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳—׳¨׳™׳¥ ׳‘׳׳“׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ <b>׳›׳•׳‘׳©</b> ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳’׳׳’׳׳™׳ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳›׳’:, ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳¨׳™׳¥ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳¡׳›׳× ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳©׳], ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳“.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳– ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳’׳׳” ׳׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳₪׳¨ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳©"׳› [׳₪׳›"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳’] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳§׳׳§׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳׳™ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× [׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“] ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳—"׳ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳‘׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳’׳׳” ׳׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳₪׳™׳¨׳× ׳—׳¨׳™׳¥ ׳›׳’׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳™׳©׳×׳• ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳"׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳™׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳¢׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳–׳¨׳™׳¢׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳™׳ ׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳’׳™׳ ׳” ׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳–׳¨׳™׳¢׳”. ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳™׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳”׳‘׳• <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜. ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳–׳›׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳’׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳“׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳‘׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳™ ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳×׳׳” ׳“׳׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳•׳"׳› ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳×׳™' ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳•׳™ ׳¢"׳™ ׳"׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳™׳₪׳•׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳—׳” ׳•׳›׳©׳׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳©׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳× ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™׳” ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳—׳” ׳”׳׳—׳•׳× ׳׳–׳™׳§׳” ׳׳¦׳׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¨׳™׳₪׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳—׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳¨׳™׳©׳”, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳×׳™' ׳–׳”, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳™ ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳©׳׳• <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳"׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳•׳¨׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” [׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳¦׳׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¦׳¨, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳• ׳”׳¢' ׳¦"׳•].</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳™׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳©׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳’׳™׳ ׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳¨׳ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳¨׳”׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳₪׳¡׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳¨׳™׳¥, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳¨׳™׳¥ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳’׳•׳¨׳¨׳ <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳–, ׳'. ׳“׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¡"׳¨, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳×׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳×׳—׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳׳“׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳׳“׳׳” [׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳›׳ "׳], ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳× ׳’׳•׳׳ [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳˜׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨] <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳—, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳×׳—׳™׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳˜ ׳׳• ׳›׳•׳© ׳‘׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳•, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳– ׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳₪׳¨.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳§׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳׳“׳׳” ׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳׳˜ ׳׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳× ׳’׳•׳׳ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳’. ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¢׳׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳’׳•׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›"׳› ׳›׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳•׳׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢. ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳•׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳‘ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳— ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳. ׳•׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳¢׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳§׳׳§׳] ׳•׳‘׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳“׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳™׳—׳•׳— ׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘'].
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳‘ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳׳“׳׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳׳ [׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳™׳—׳•׳— ׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨] <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳– ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳’"׳˜ ׳—׳•׳¨׳© ׳¡׳§׳"׳. </small></small>.

<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳—* - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳§׳•׳¦׳¨</h2>
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳”׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳™׳ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳“׳׳” [׳›׳׳“׳׳” ׳׳—׳”] ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳¨׳” ׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳©׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳©׳, ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳”׳©׳¨׳©׳” ׳×׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳”׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳׳” ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳© ׳©׳, ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳ "׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳•. ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳—"׳› ׳”׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘, ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳ "׳— ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳"׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳׳•"׳© ׳₪"׳’ ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳˜ ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳¡׳§"׳—. [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¨׳©"׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳’. ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳¡׳×׳™׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳”׳”׳©׳¨׳©׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳”׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳©׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳•׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳“. ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳•׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳•׳¡׳•׳₪׳• ׳‘׳–׳“׳•׳ ׳"׳› ׳›׳ ׳×׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳›׳•׳׳׳× ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳•׳ ׳•׳˜׳” ׳©׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨].</small></small>.
׳”׳×׳•׳—׳‘ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳׳§׳׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳›׳©׳‘׳•׳׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ! <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳•׳׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳¨׳© ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳.</small></small>] ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳©׳ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳•. </small></small>.
׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳¨׳¢׳ ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳©׳ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳•׳”׳—׳–׳¨׳× ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳•׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳“.</small></small> ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳™׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳“, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>.
׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ !], ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳—.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳₪׳×׳—׳• ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ "׳.
<h3> ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳•׳”׳—׳–׳¨׳× ׳”׳“׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳“׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳©׳• [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” !] <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳–. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳‘׳©׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳ ׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳, ׳”׳”׳“׳¡ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳™׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳©׳• ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳“׳•׳׳“׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳˜׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳›׳©׳׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳¢׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳”׳“׳¡ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳“׳§׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳׳“׳׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳›׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳˜׳” ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳¢׳׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳¦׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳”׳׳›׳×׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳•׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳ ׳•׳˜׳” ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨].</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳™׳•"׳˜, ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳‘׳׳™׳.
[׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳•׳”׳"׳¡ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳•׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳—, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳’.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳—׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳”׳“׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.]
<h3> ׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳•׳¨׳™׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳‘׳©׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳‘׳©׳™׳, ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳–.</small></small> ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳×׳• <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳‘ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳₪׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳×׳•. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳ "׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳×׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳×׳׳™׳©׳×׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳•׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳‘׳”׳.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳”׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳×׳׳©׳• <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳•׳׳© ׳©׳›׳‘׳× ׳™׳¨׳•׳§׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳©׳›׳‘׳× ׳™׳¨׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳˜׳‘׳¨׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳— ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳, ׳”'. ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳• ׳”׳˜׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳§׳•׳‘. ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳¨׳¥ ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳¢׳׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳×׳¨׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳×׳¨׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳›׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳”׳¦׳׳— ׳©׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳׳© ׳׳• ׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳— ׳”׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥, ׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳×׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳׳—, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳׳¦׳׳— [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳×׳¨׳™׳¡ ׳”׳™׳• ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳”׳¦׳׳— <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳׳˜׳™ ׳’׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ [׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›. ׳‘׳¨׳™"׳£ ׳“׳£ ׳׳”.] ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳”׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳’] ׳›' ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳™ [׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¦"׳“], ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳׳•׳× ׳—] ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳©׳’׳ ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳“׳•׳׳§ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳×׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'] ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳
