׳©׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳’׳’ ׳”׳׳©׳×׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳›׳©׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳—׳™׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳’ ׳׳©"׳› ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”].  ׳•׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜] ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳”.  ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳' ׳§׳¡׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳׳— ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳×׳¨׳™׳¡ ׳׳• ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳“׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳¨׳™׳¡ ׳׳• ׳”׳—׳׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳×׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳׳—׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳׳¦׳׳—׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳×׳¨׳™׳¡ ׳›׳ ׳’׳“׳. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳– ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳•׳¢׳©׳׳” ׳”׳׳“׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳™].</small></small>.
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳¦׳׳— [׳›׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳‘׳× ׳¨׳•׳— ׳¢׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳•, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳¦׳׳—׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳•׳׳’׳¨׳˜׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳© ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳–'.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳“׳׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳‘, ׳’' ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳–' ׳“"׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳•], ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳: ׳. ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™"׳ ׳©׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳¥ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳—׳¨׳¡ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳™׳ [׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳]. ׳‘. ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳™׳•׳ ׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥ ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘׳•׳׳˜׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳¦׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ [׳׳©׳"׳ ׳₪"׳‘ ׳׳‘׳™׳›׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”"׳˜, ׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™"׳‘ ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳‘', ׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡"׳’, ׳׳’"׳˜ ׳§׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳—, ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳].  ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳™׳§׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳© ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳™׳§׳”, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳–.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳“׳׳” ׳׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳—׳©׳©׳•׳× <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳§׳•׳׳” ׳׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳™׳§׳” [׳׳‘׳ ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳™׳×, ׳׳×׳›׳×, ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳§ ׳§׳©׳™׳— ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳₪׳˜׳™ ׳׳¨׳¥ ׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳₪"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳‘] ׳"׳› ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳§׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳׳—׳™׳“׳•׳©׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳•׳׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳×׳§׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳×׳¨׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥ ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳ ׳’"׳› ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳• ׳”׳’׳‘׳”׳× ׳•׳”׳•׳¨׳“׳× ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳×.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳׳“׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳¡׳§"׳“ [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳§׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳¡׳§"׳”] ׳•׳›׳ ׳›' ׳‘׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳₪"׳’ ׳׳•׳× ׳™ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳˜ ׳׳–׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳ "׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳§׳× ׳™׳ ׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳—׳™׳“׳•׳©׳”, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•. ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳™ ׳“׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳§׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳™׳§׳” ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳× ׳™׳ ׳™׳§׳” ׳—׳“׳©׳”, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳×׳”׳"׳“, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©.  ׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳—, ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪' ׳¡׳§׳§׳¦"׳“ ׳›' ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small>.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳– ׳•׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳’׳¨׳˜׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳“׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳§׳•׳¦׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳×׳— ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳¨׳•׳׳׳• ׳•׳™׳’׳¨׳׳• ׳׳׳”׳¨ ׳׳× ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳§׳•׳¦׳¨, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳׳“ ׳©׳§׳•׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳•׳™׳ ׳–׳§ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳•. ׳•׳׳‘׳•' ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳“ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳׳"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳׳™׳©׳× ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳×׳׳•׳©</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳© ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳© ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¦׳¨ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳—'.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳© ׳׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳×׳׳•׳© ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳×׳•׳׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳×׳•׳׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳£ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳׳“׳” ׳“׳“׳©, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳“׳™׳™׳× ׳—׳׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳© ׳׳›׳•׳•׳¨׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳—׳׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳© ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳¨׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳×׳׳©׳ ׳׳”׳›׳•׳•׳¨׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳, ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳¡׳§ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳© ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳” <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳, ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳ ׳˜׳™׳¢׳” ׳©׳ ׳–׳¨׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳”׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳׳• ׳ ׳•׳˜׳¢ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳˜׳™׳¢׳” ׳¢׳•׳׳׳™׳× ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳¢׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳˜׳™׳¢׳”, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳׳—׳×. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳–] ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳¨' ׳׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳"׳› ׳”׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳›' ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’, ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳” ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳”.</small></small>.
XX ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳׳•׳©: ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳— ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×, ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳׳, ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳©׳¨׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳ ׳•׳׳¨׳›׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳”׳׳”.  GG
<h3> ׳”׳¨׳—׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳— ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳׳•׳© ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳•, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳— ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳×׳׳©׳. <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—.</small></small>
<h3> ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳™׳—</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳₪׳¡ ׳•׳׳¢׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳— ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳‘׳©, ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳•׳¥ ׳׳• ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳, ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳. ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳›׳“׳•׳¨ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳“׳• ׳׳׳ ׳• [׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳˜׳₪׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳].
׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳, ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳׳™׳׳ ׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘.</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳•: ׳. ׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳׳™׳׳ ׳©׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳’׳•׳‘׳” ׳’' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳, ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳׳• ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳’׳•׳‘׳” ׳’' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢, ׳׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳’' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢. ׳‘. ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™׳ ׳¨׳›׳™׳ [׳©׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳×׳™׳“] ׳›׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳', ׳‘', ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳• ׳ ׳¢׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳• ׳ ׳¢׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳¡׳] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳•׳¥ ׳׳• ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳ ׳“׳ ׳“׳” ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳ ׳“׳ ׳“ ׳‘׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳×׳“ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳•. <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳, ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>
׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳” ׳¢׳ ׳—׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¦׳™׳ [׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳’׳׳’׳׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳ ׳¢׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳™׳], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳“׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳‘׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳’׳׳’׳׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳¢׳•׳¦׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›"׳— ׳׳•׳× ׳] ׳•׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳"׳—.</small></small>.
׳›׳©׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳, ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳“׳™ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳”׳™׳©׳¢׳ ׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳. ׳¢׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳, ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳“׳×, ׳•׳‘׳׳–׳™׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳“׳× ׳׳"׳› ׳¢׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳”׳™׳©׳¢׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳, ׳׳׳“׳ ׳—׳׳© ׳•׳×׳©׳•׳© ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳›׳•׳—׳•, ׳•׳׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳¢׳ ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳–׳™׳–׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳˜, ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳©׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳©׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳™׳×׳׳•׳©, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳”׳©׳"׳© ׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳›׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳•׳׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳–. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳’. ׳“"׳” ׳’׳–׳¨׳” ׳׳׳” ׳”׳•׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳›׳™׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳”׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳’׳׳” ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳× ׳׳‘׳”׳׳”, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳’׳” <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳”, ׳™"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳—** - ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳¢׳׳¨</h2>
<h3> ׳׳¢׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳¢׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳©׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳] ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳ ׳©׳’׳“׳׳• ׳©׳ <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳“׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳•׳¢׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳, ׳¦"׳¢.
׳‘׳׳’׳׳™ ׳˜׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳¢׳׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳׳™׳¨׳™ ׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳›׳”"׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳×׳“׳‘׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“, ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳£ ׳׳׳— ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳”, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳¢׳׳¨ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳"׳– ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳—׳“ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳—׳˜׳׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§ [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳“׳‘׳™׳׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳¡׳™׳] ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳”. [׳•׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™"׳’ ׳‘׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳›' ׳©׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳¨׳™׳].</small></small>, ׳•׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳£ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳‘׳¦׳• ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳• [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳׳— ׳׳©׳₪׳× ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳—] <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳• [׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳•"׳– ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳¨׳ ׳•׳”].</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳₪׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳“ [׳©׳›"׳‘, ׳'] ׳•׳’׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳׳§׳‘׳¦׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳™׳—׳“ ׳•׳›׳“׳§׳׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜, ׳•׳‘׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳£ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳×׳₪׳–׳¨׳•</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳ ׳×׳₪׳–׳¨׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳₪׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳¢׳׳¨, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳₪׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ "׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳" ג€“ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳₪׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳§׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳”, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳–.</small></small>.
׳ ׳×׳₪׳–׳¨׳• ׳׳• ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳׳׳•׳¡׳₪׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳©׳™׳© ׳’' ׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳, ׳”׳׳—׳“ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳‘׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳™׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳”׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳˜׳™׳¨׳—׳ ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳”. ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳¨ ׳' ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳–׳” ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳₪׳›"׳ ׳”׳™"׳] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳‘׳©׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳¨׳—׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳•׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ [׳›׳׳ ׳™"׳’] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳™׳¨׳—׳ ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳© ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳¢׳׳¨.  ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳₪׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳§׳˜ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳¡׳ ׳׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳§׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳™׳¨׳—׳ ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳§׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳§׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳”. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳•׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§ ׳×׳׳ ׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳‘׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳§׳ ׳™׳—׳“ [׳׳£ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳•], ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳•׳§׳‘ ׳×׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳©׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳•׳˜, ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳׳¨ <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳•, ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳™', ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳©׳—׳§׳™ ׳¢׳¥</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳—׳§׳™ ׳¢׳¥ <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳’׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳׳•׳¨, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳¢׳׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳—, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ "׳— [׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳¢׳׳¨] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳™׳ [׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳”׳§' ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¦׳•: ׳©׳™"׳ ׳©׳”׳׳§׳•׳©׳© ׳׳¢׳׳¨ ׳”׳™׳”].</small></small> ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳¢׳׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳ ׳“׳‘׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳—׳™׳ ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™ ׳¢׳¥ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳˜, ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳ <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡"׳’ ׳•׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳׳¢׳׳¨ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳—, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¢׳׳¨ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳©׳—׳§׳™ ׳¢׳¥ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳׳¨. ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳₪' ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳˜] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳§׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳™׳“׳•׳׳ [׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳ "׳— ׳©׳”׳§׳©׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳™׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳׳¨"׳™ (׳›׳׳›׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳›׳•׳×׳‘), ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳¢׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳”׳׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳₪׳•׳¡ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳׳¨ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳©׳×׳ ׳• ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳׳¨].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳•׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳§ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳‘׳©׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳•׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳‘׳©׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳“ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳§׳ ׳™׳—׳“ <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—.</small></small>. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳‘ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳™׳₪׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳˜"׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜] <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳§׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳™׳₪׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™. ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳’. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳’"׳˜ ׳׳¢׳׳¨ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳•׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>, ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳›׳©׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳“׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ [׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳“׳© (׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳')].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳–׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳—.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳–׳¨ <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>.

RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳˜ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳‘׳”</h2>
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳‘׳”</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳© ׳׳• ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳”׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳₪׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳›׳‘׳” ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳—׳׳™׳, ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳•., ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳—. ׳•׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳¨׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳” ׳‘׳§׳•"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳–׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳ ׳©׳¨׳£ ׳׳• ׳”׳¢׳׳“׳× ׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳×.</small></small>. 
<h3> ׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳•׳׳§׳™׳—׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¨</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳׳• ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳‘׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳׳˜׳₪׳˜׳£ ׳׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳”, ׳', ׳‘' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. [׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ '׳•׳™׳×׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳”', ׳”׳ ׳”׳•"׳ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳§ (׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—') ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳’׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ - ׳•׳›׳ ׳’׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳×- ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳’׳¨׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳£ ׳“׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳“׳, ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳“׳’׳¨׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳›׳©׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳ ׳¨. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳•׳ ׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¨ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳©׳׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳“׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳–׳–׳” ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳’׳•׳“׳׳× ׳׳• ׳׳×׳§׳˜׳ ׳× ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳”׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳¦׳×׳• [׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳ ׳¨ !], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳“׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳–׳– ׳•׳׳×׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳׳• ׳׳×׳¨׳—׳§ ׳׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳’', ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳—, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳] ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳׳• ׳™׳×׳¨׳—׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” ׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳‘׳–׳” [׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”]. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳–׳–׳× ׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¢׳˜ ׳’׳•׳“׳׳× ׳׳• ׳§׳•׳˜׳ ׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳©׳׳</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—].</small></small> ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳”, ׳“'. </small></small>, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳›׳©׳™׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ [׳•׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳”]. <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳’׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>
<h3> ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳’׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳—׳– ׳‘׳• ׳“׳׳™׳§׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳“׳• ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳›׳©׳×׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳¦׳“ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳ ׳©׳¨׳£ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳‘׳§׳¢ ׳׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳₪׳›׳• ׳•׳™׳›׳‘׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳›"׳‘. ׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¨, ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳©׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳“ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳• ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳ ׳©׳¨׳£ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳×׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳×׳‘׳§׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳”, ׳•׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳”׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳• ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳™׳.  ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳—׳–׳” ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳“, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳“׳• ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“, ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳˜' ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳›׳׳•׳, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳¦׳“ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳¦׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ [׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×] ׳›׳׳™ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳¦׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳₪׳׳• ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳₪׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳”, ׳“' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳• ׳’׳¨׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small> ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳™׳•"׳“ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳׳•׳× ׳“] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳™ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳“׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳•׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳׳©. ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳›׳‘"׳₪ ׳•׳’׳׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳›"׳”.  ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳—ײµ׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳× ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¨׳•׳— ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’"׳› ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳₪׳›"׳˜ ׳”׳¢' ׳›"׳•] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢' ׳™' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×.  (׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡'] ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳™׳׳•׳×׳ ׳“׳©׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳•׳×׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳×׳§׳‘׳ ׳•׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳).</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳” ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳–׳’׳</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•׳ ׳׳™׳© [׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳] ׳•׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳—] ׳•׳”׳”׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳] ׳•׳”׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳– ׳•׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳–] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳› ׳•׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳₪] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™'] ׳•׳׳¦׳™"׳ [׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳¢׳.</small></small> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›. ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳' ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳“׳•׳׳§ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳’׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™, ׳•׳›' ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳™ [׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’] ׳©׳׳₪׳™' ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳׳ ׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳₪׳×׳׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳•׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ [׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳— ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳×׳—׳“׳© ׳¨׳•׳—, ׳׳©׳"׳› ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¦׳‘ ׳”׳×׳¨׳׳•׳¡׳˜׳˜], ׳•׳”"׳  ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳’׳¢ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳™׳“׳׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳×׳¨׳׳•׳¡׳˜׳˜ ׳•׳™׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳.
׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳’' [׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳›׳] ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳₪׳ ׳£ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳׳¢׳™׳₪׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳›׳׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ [׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳] ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳×׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳–׳׳–׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳–].
׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳•׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳§׳׳” ׳›׳–׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳“׳׳§ ׳•׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳×׳׳™׳“. ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳‘׳™' ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳×׳—׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳™׳—׳“, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜.</small></small> [׳•׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳. ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳©׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳™׳׳™׳• ׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳”׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¨׳‘׳™׳. ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳›׳©׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳. [׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳˜׳• ׳©׳™׳₪׳×׳—׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳›׳— ׳׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳–׳•׳¨ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳•׳×.]</small></small>]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳׳§ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳¢ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳™׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳–׳”, ׳•׳›׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳— ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳‘׳”׳׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳•׳ ׳¨׳•׳— ׳•׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ [׳•׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳‘׳¨׳• ׳©׳"׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳©׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳×׳‘׳•׳ ׳¨׳•׳— ׳•׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨, ׳¢׳™' ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳¨׳•׳—]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳§׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>.  [׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳§׳₪׳™׳׳™׳ ׳—׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳—׳©׳©׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳“׳׳×, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳•].
- ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'.
- ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳©׳›׳—׳• ׳‘׳• ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳“׳•׳׳§׳×, ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳™"׳‘, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳’׳™׳׳” ׳©׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳“׳•׳׳§׳×.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳•׳–׳’ ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳–׳’׳ ׳׳£ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳–׳’׳ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳¢׳×׳” <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳©׳₪׳¢׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳™׳“׳׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳”׳‘׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳–׳’׳, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳”׳‘׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ "׳׳׳׳›׳”", ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜.</small></small>.
׳׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ <b> [׳‘׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳™׳›׳ ׳™] </b> ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳•׳‘׳‘ ׳׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳™"׳–].</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳“].</small></small>.
- ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳₪׳׳˜׳× ׳₪׳— ["׳‘׳׳¢׳"] ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳•׳—׳–׳¨׳” [׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳¡"׳’].

RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳› - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳’׳•׳–׳–</h2>
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳’׳•׳–׳–</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳”׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳¦׳׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳•׳–׳–, ׳•׳”׳×׳•׳׳© ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”"׳–, ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳” [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳×׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳—׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳׳‘ ׳׳•].</small></small>.
׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳¦׳׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳’׳–׳–, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳™׳₪׳•׳×׳• ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳–׳™׳–׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳¦׳׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳’׳–׳– ׳׳• ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨, ׳•׳©׳•׳¨׳© ׳”׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳›׳ ׳’׳–׳–׳• ׳׳× ׳¢׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳™׳₪׳•׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳• ׳›׳, ׳©׳׳ ׳’׳–׳–׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳”׳׳©׳›׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳× ׳”׳’׳–׳™׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨, ׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳•. ׳•׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳¨׳™׳‘"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¦"׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳©׳×׳׳” ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳’׳–׳–׳• ׳׳× ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳—׳©׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳×׳׳” ׳‘׳¡׳“׳¨׳™ ׳˜׳”׳¨׳” [׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¦"׳— ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳˜] ׳•׳‘׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳₪"׳™ ׳׳•׳× ׳˜], ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳©׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳’. ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳’׳–׳–׳• ׳׳× ׳¢׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳₪׳™' ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳§ ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳•׳–׳–, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳—׳›׳"׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳׳× ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳™׳‘"׳©, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳”׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ [׳›׳׳• ׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜'] ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳₪"׳™ ׳׳™"׳’].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳–׳™׳–׳× ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳–׳•׳– ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳© ׳§׳™׳׳•׳₪׳™ ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳•׳–׳– <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳‘, ׳–', ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳•, ׳˜'. 
׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳©׳” ׳׳§׳¦׳×׳” ׳—׳•׳¦׳¦׳× ׳‘׳ ׳˜"׳™ [׳¢׳™' ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¦"׳—, ׳›"׳ ׳•׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳, ׳'], ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳”׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳×׳׳™׳©׳× ׳”׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳™׳¢׳•׳˜׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳˜"׳– ׳©׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳“׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳‘' ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳׳ ׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳].
<h3> ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳¡׳¨׳§</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳₪׳•׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳• ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳׳“׳•׳׳“׳׳•׳× <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳©׳™׳¨ ׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳“׳•׳׳“׳׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳•׳§, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¡"׳¨. ׳©"׳’, ׳›"׳•, ׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳™. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳— ׳©׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳¡׳¨׳™׳§׳× ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳—.  ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳›׳©׳׳¡׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳×׳₪׳¡׳ ׳‘׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¡׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳×׳׳™׳©׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳×.</small></small> [׳’׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳¨׳•׳§ ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳׳•׳© ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳׳” ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳×׳׳™׳©׳× ׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳“׳•׳׳“׳׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¦׳•׳׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳×׳׳•׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳¨׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳” ׳׳”׳©׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳” ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳—׳“׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳” <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳©׳׳™׳, ׳©׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳×׳׳•׳© ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳–׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳₪׳›"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳™].</small></small> [׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳¨׳׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳•, ׳‘' ׳©׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳”].
<h3> ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳•׳§׳™׳׳•׳₪׳™ ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳©׳• ׳׳§׳¦׳×׳</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳§׳™׳׳•׳₪׳™ ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳׳©׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳–׳” ׳¦׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›' ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳™׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳׳©׳”, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳© ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳₪׳™׳¨׳©׳” ׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳” ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳׳›׳׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳•׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳©"׳¢ ׳›׳׳ ׳₪' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳ "׳” ׳•׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳•, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳’׳•׳–׳–. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳‘׳׳×</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳‘׳׳× ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™. ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳™׳‘׳©׳” ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳”, ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳׳™׳©׳× ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳•׳”</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳© ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳•׳” ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳–׳™׳–׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳£ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳© ׳ ׳•׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳•׳£ ׳׳£ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳ "׳— ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳׳•׳× ׳— ׳׳¦׳“׳“ ׳©׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳—׳“׳©׳” ׳‘׳”׳©׳׳˜׳” ׳׳¡׳™ ׳₪' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳–׳™׳× ׳¨׳¢׳ ׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳‘] ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳›'. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳˜], ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳›׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳¨- ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳•׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳–׳™׳–׳× ׳¦׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳¦׳¦׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳©׳” ׳©׳©׳›׳—׳” ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™ ׳™׳“׳™׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳˜׳‘׳•׳, ׳×׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳×׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳×׳ ׳§׳” ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳•׳×׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳›׳—׳” ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™ ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳” ׳×׳ ׳§׳” ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳•׳×׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘, ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳™׳‘"׳© ׳•׳"׳› ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳¦׳₪׳¨׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”.  ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳˜"׳– ׳•׳ ׳§׳”"׳› ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¦"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳’׳׳“ ׳©׳ ׳׳›׳”</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳’׳׳“ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳׳›׳” ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳”׳×׳¨׳₪׳, ׳׳ ׳§ײ¸׳¨׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳’׳׳“ ׳•׳”׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳‘׳¢׳™ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳›"׳‘. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳•, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳“ [׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳×].</small></small>.

<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›׳ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳×</h2>
<h3> ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳” ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳—׳™׳“, ׳•׳׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳. ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳” ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳•׳׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳•׳׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳•׳׳¨׳”"׳™. ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳•׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳©׳•׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳'.</small></small>.
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨. ׳•׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜, ׳'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳‘׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳”, ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳•׳§׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳•, ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳• ׳׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳—׳• <sup>׳’</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳–, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳. </small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳•.  ׳•׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳•׳§׳¨ ׳•׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳—, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¢׳§׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳§׳“׳© ׳׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳’' ׳¡׳™' ׳”' ׳•׳׳¨׳›׳”"׳ ׳₪׳™"׳’ ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™"׳‘. [׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳›׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳§׳¦׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳ ׳¢׳§׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳—׳”- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳›׳”"׳ ׳©׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳’׳׳™ ׳˜׳ ׳—׳•׳¨׳© ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳ ׳›׳].</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳¢׳§׳¨ ׳׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳•׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳•׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳—׳–׳¨ ׳׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳•׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳©׳ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳׳•׳× ׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳—.</small></small>.
׳”׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳—׳₪׳¥, ׳•׳¢׳•׳§׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•- ׳”׳•׳׳- ׳•׳¢׳•׳¦׳¨, ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¢׳§׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳”׳ ׳—׳”, ׳©׳¢׳§׳™׳¨׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳›׳¢׳§׳™׳¨׳× ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳•׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳›׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳—׳₪׳¥ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳–׳¨׳™׳§׳” ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳–׳¨׳•׳§ ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'. ׳”׳–׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳•׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢, ׳׳ ׳–׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳˜׳” ׳׳™' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳–׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳׳™' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳—׳¦׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳‘׳×׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳—׳“ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳ "׳’, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳¢׳¨׳‘׳• ׳©׳”׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳’׳©׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳™׳—׳“ [׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳–׳•׳¨- ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳¦׳”, ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳•׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳™' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳×. ׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳›׳׳” ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳× ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳©׳•׳× <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜, ׳', ׳’', ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳—׳™׳“</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳£ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳•׳× ׳¢׳©׳¨׳” ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳—׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳—׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢׳” ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢׳” ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳”, ׳‘'.</small></small> [׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳—׳‘ ׳’' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳” ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳”"׳™ <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳'.</small></small>].  ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳׳ ׳“' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳“' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳”"׳™, ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳’] ׳ ׳§׳˜ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳—׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳₪׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳¨׳”"׳™, ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳“׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳₪׳™׳. ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳¨׳”"׳™.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳™' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳—׳‘ ׳“' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳”"׳™. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳¡׳•׳, ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳’׳•׳‘׳” ׳™' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳”, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳₪׳— ׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳”"׳™, ׳×׳™׳‘׳× ׳“׳•׳׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳¨׳”"׳™ [׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳¢׳׳™׳”].
׳”׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳—׳‘ ׳“' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳”, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳—. ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳™׳§׳£ ׳©׳׳”׳ ׳§"׳• ׳©׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳“׳™׳ ׳¨׳”"׳™.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¨׳•׳—׳‘ ׳˜"׳– ׳׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳×׳§׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳”, ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳” ׳•׳”׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳₪׳×׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳•׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳׳©׳¢׳¨ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳”, ׳–' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small> [׳•׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳›. ׳•׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳¢׳˜ ׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¨' ׳׳• ׳“' ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳“ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳¡׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳•׳׳© ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳¦׳“, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳¢׳§׳׳•׳׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳” ׳‘׳“׳™׳•׳§ ׳׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳¦׳™׳׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¨' ׳׳• ׳“' ׳©׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳•׳׳©.
׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳—] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳§׳˜׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳—׳‘׳™׳ ׳˜"׳– ׳׳׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳•׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳₪׳•׳׳© ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳›"׳— ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳] ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”.</small></small>]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳©׳™׳¢׳‘׳¨׳• ׳©׳ ׳©׳©׳™׳ ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳- ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¡' ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳”׳ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳”, ׳–'.</small></small>.
׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳, ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳™׳- ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¡' ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳–׳• <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳“"׳” ׳©׳׳™׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳—׳‘ ׳˜"׳– ׳׳׳” [׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¨׳—׳‘ ׳˜"׳– ׳׳׳” ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡' ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳] <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳”, ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳—.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳” ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳’׳“׳¨, ׳¢׳׳•׳“, ׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳£ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳©׳™׳˜׳—׳ ׳“' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳’׳•׳‘׳”׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳’' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳™' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳- ׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳”׳ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳”, ׳™"׳“, ׳™"׳— ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳›׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨.
<h3> ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ [׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳¨׳×׳™ ׳“׳¡׳×׳¨׳™, ׳’׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳§׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳—, ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳×- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¨׳"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳”, ׳™"׳˜] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳•׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳×, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳™׳© ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳, ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨. ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳™׳•׳×.</small></small>] ׳©׳©׳˜׳—׳• ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳“' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳•׳‘׳”׳• ׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳׳’' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳©׳˜׳—׳• ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳“' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳§׳• ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳’' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳”, ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳•</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳”׳©׳׳›׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳•׳×, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳¨׳—׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¡' ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳, ׳•׳”׳©׳׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳• ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳×, ׳•׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳• ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¢׳ [-׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳¢"׳™ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳׳×׳•׳× <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳“, ׳‘'.</small></small>], ׳•׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳—. ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳™ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’'] ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳•], ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳›׳₪׳₪׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘].
<b>׳׳”׳׳›׳”</b> - ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳”, ׳–' ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small> ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳¨׳•׳—׳‘ ׳˜"׳– ׳׳׳” ׳׳”׳™׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨, ׳•׳”׳׳’"׳ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™ ׳©׳"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳•, ׳•׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳©׳.</small></small> ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡' ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳•, ׳•׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳  ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳” ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳”"׳¨.  ׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳¦׳™׳¨׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳¢׳” ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳•׳›׳”׳”׳™׳ ׳“׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳ "׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳ "׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳“ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’.  ׳•׳›׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳× ׳‘׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳׳™ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳ "׳, ׳•׳׳”׳•׳•׳›׳— ׳•׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳” ׳•׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳.   </small></small> ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳™׳© ׳“׳™׳ ׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳¢"׳™ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳¢"׳™ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳™׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•.
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘׳• ׳‘׳ ׳•׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳•׳™, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳•׳×׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳₪׳’׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳• [׳‘׳¦׳׳×׳™׳], ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳›׳¡׳×׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” [׳©׳›׳ ׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳›׳–׳” (׳¦׳™׳•׳¨ 1)   ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳¡׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳” (׳¦׳™׳•׳¨ 2)  ] ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳— ׳›׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳׳”׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§"׳–. ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳— ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳×׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£, ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳¡׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳©ײµ׳ ׳“' ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳×׳• ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳˜׳׳™ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳×׳ ׳•׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳¦׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳™' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳• ׳•׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳׳×׳•׳×]. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳’׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳׳’ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳' ׳©׳‘.</small></small>.

<h3> ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳, ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳™׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳׳” ׳¡׳™׳‘׳•׳×: 
BB׳. ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳—׳׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳”׳ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳₪"׳”, ׳', ׳‘', ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳₪"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳׳”׳׳©׳˜׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳©׳˜׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¦׳• ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳©׳₪׳˜. ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳™׳§׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳©׳˜׳¨׳”.</small></small>.
׳‘. ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳˜׳— ׳¨׳™׳§ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳¡׳׳×׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›- 40(40 ׳׳˜׳¨, ׳•׳׳’׳¨"׳— ׳ ׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳›- 34(34 ׳׳˜׳¨. </small></small> ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳§׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳–׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳“׳•׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳׳§׳׳, ׳™׳© ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳©׳˜׳— ׳›׳–׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳ "׳—, ׳˜' ׳“"׳” ׳׳‘׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳’. ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• [׳׳£ ׳©׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳] ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳×׳’׳׳™׳ ׳§׳׳§׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳¢׳׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳§׳•׳׳™׳, ׳—׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳₪׳₪׳™׳, ׳’׳“׳¨׳•׳× ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳˜, ׳₪׳¨׳¦׳•׳×, ׳¢׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳׳™׳ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”"׳׳—׳™" ׳•׳׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳׳—׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳”׳—׳•׳˜. [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳©׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳- 120 ׳§"׳ ! ׳•׳§׳©׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¢]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳©׳” ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳•׳׳ ׳–׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳¨׳¦׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳•׳¥ [׳”׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳¡׳×׳•׳]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳×, ׳©׳׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳—׳× ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳” [׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳×׳§׳׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘] ׳₪׳•׳¡׳׳× ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳—׳–׳§׳” ׳‘׳–׳”. EE
׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳—׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳™׳¨׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳” ׳׳›׳©׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳§׳™׳™׳׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳׳ ׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳—׳‘׳™׳ ׳˜"׳– ׳׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ "׳.
<h3> ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳—׳–"׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳—׳¦׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳×] ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳¨׳•׳×, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>. [׳”׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳×׳™ ׳׳• ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳₪"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳©׳•׳×׳£ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳•׳£.</small></small>].
׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘: [׳׳•׳§׳—׳™׳ ׳₪׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳•] ׳׳•׳§׳—׳™׳ ׳₪׳× [׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳›׳’׳¨׳•׳’׳¨׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“- ׳¢׳“ ׳™"׳— ׳’׳¨׳•׳’׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳©׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳×׳©׳¢׳” ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳—, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§' ׳¡׳§"׳–. [׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳₪׳— ׳©׳ 800 ׳׳• 900 ׳¡׳"׳§- ׳›׳©׳׳™׳© ׳›׳›׳¨ ׳׳—׳, ׳•׳׳’׳¨"׳— ׳ ׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳₪׳— ׳©׳ ׳›- 460 ׳׳• 518 ׳¡׳"׳§- ׳›׳©׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳›׳›׳¨ ׳׳—׳]. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳- ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳₪"׳•, ׳•', ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳™"׳— ׳’׳¨׳•׳’׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ! <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳•, ׳™"׳“ ׳“"׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•, ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳– ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳§׳— ׳™"׳— ׳’׳¨׳•׳’׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨.</small></small>] ׳•׳׳–׳›׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳” [׳¢"׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™ײ°׳–ײ·׳›׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳×׳• ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳–׳™׳›׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳• ׳•׳‘׳×׳• ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™. ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small> ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳ ׳׳©׳₪׳—׳×׳• ׳”׳׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳× ׳•׳׳–׳›׳” ׳׳•׳×׳”] ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’', ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳¨׳›׳• ׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳—׳‘׳• ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳—׳‘׳• ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×. [׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ 2.31(2.31 ׳׳˜׳¨ ׳•׳׳’׳¨"׳— ׳ ׳׳” 1.92(1.92 ׳׳˜׳¨].</small></small>, [׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳‘"׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳•, ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳˜.</small></small>. ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳›׳׳], ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨ "׳‘׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳₪׳•׳§׳™ ׳•׳׳¢׳™׳•׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳×׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¦׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳—׳¦׳¨ ׳׳‘׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳—׳¦׳¨ ׳׳—׳¦׳¨ ׳•׳׳’׳’ ׳׳’׳’, ׳•׳׳‘׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳—׳¦׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳‘׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳—׳¦׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳”׳–׳•, ׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳”׳–׳׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳×׳•׳•׳¡׳£ ׳‘׳”" [׳›׳©׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳— ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳”, ׳™׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳•׳™׳׳׳¨: "׳׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘׳™׳"] <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳–׳” ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳“, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳˜, ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳• ׳™"׳“ ׳“"׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳, ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳– ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¦"׳‘. ׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳–׳׳× ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳™׳׳׳¨ "׳©׳‘׳׳‘׳•׳™ ׳–׳”" ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ "׳©׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳”׳–׳׳×" ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳•׳™ ׳–׳”.
׳•׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¦' ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“] ׳™׳׳׳¨: "׳‘׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳•׳₪׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳™׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳, ׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳›׳•'". </small></small>.  ׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳— ׳¢׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳× ׳”׳×׳¢׳₪׳©׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳×׳¢׳₪׳©׳× ׳›"׳› ׳׳”׳¨, ׳•׳–׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳›׳— ׳׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳—, ׳”' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳–׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¦"׳“, ׳‘', ׳’'.</small></small>. 
׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳•, ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳—.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳, ׳”׳ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘, ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳¨׳©׳•׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳₪"׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳₪"׳‘, ׳', ׳™"׳‘, ׳˜"׳• ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡' ׳₪"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¦' ׳¡׳§׳"׳’. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳₪"׳‘ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¢׳©׳• ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳” [׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳—] ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳–׳›׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳₪׳• ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳©, ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳×׳™׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳—׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳¦׳˜׳¨׳₪׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳•, ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳˜. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳“׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳—"׳› ׳"׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳₪ ׳׳‘ ׳‘׳™"׳“ ׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳׳• ׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳׳• ׳׳—"׳›.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳™׳×׳•׳₪׳™ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳, ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳• ׳—׳–"׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳×׳•׳₪׳™ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳¦׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳™ [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳‘] <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳₪"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳•׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳•׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳₪"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳•׳£.</small></small>. ׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳©׳׳–׳›׳™׳ ׳₪׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳™ [׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨] ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳— [׳”׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳׳©׳•׳×׳£ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳©׳™׳×׳•׳₪׳™ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳•׳×. ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳‘׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳•׳₪׳™ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳.</small></small>].
׳›׳©׳”׳׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳™׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳™ [׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘] ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳— ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳©, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳¨ ׳•׳“׳׳×׳•׳× <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳“, ׳‘'.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳ ׳¨׳”"׳¨ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳™'- ׳™"׳‘] ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳—.
׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳×׳•׳₪׳™ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳›׳— ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳• ׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¦"׳”, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳¨׳— ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳' ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳׳¨׳— ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳׳§׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳׳§׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳¢, ׳”' ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳₪"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳”. ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¦' ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳׳§׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳¨, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳׳§׳•.</small></small> [׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳”.</small></small>].
- ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× <b>׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳</b>, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“', ׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳” ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘.  ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳—׳¦׳¨׳•׳× <b>׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳׳•׳</b> ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳” ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘׳ ׳”׳•׳–׳›׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳: ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳×׳׳¨׳— ׳' ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳™׳—׳“, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳×׳׳¨׳—׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳™"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳™"׳–, ׳™"׳—, ׳"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳</h3>
 <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳”׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳’׳•׳© ׳“׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳˜׳™׳, ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳›׳- ׳×׳§׳ ׳”.</small></small>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳‘׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳”׳–׳׳× <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¦"׳•, ׳'.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳•׳— ׳©׳ ׳§׳"׳ ׳׳׳” ׳•׳©׳׳™׳© ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳›׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳× <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¦"׳—, ׳'. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳‘"׳¢׳™׳¨" [׳¢׳™׳¨׳™׳™׳”] ׳׳—׳× ׳›׳׳” ׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™ ׳”׳”׳׳›׳”. </small></small>, ׳•׳”׳׳“׳™׳“׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ [׳¢"׳™ ׳׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳§׳• ׳“׳׳™׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳©׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳“ ׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨].
<h3> ׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳–׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳•׳—׳–׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳£ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳–׳¨ ׳‘׳׳–׳™׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳”, ׳”', ׳•', ׳–', ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳• ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳’׳’ [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳“׳™׳ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳–׳™׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳×.</small></small>.
׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳•׳— ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳–, ׳', ׳‘'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳×׳•, ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳₪׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳‘' ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳‘' ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× [׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳• ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”].</small></small> [׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳׳׳• ׳©׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳- ׳•׳™׳§׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳ ׳׳©׳₪׳—׳×׳• <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳–׳›׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳• ׳׳• ׳•׳‘׳×׳• ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳–׳™׳›׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳• ׳•׳‘׳×׳• ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™. ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳—, ׳™' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small> ׳©׳™׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳] ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳©׳×׳׳¨ <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×, ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳˜, ׳•'.</small></small> ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳˜, ׳’', ׳“', ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¦"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘', ׳’', ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳׳׳¨, ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳™׳” [׳׳• ׳™׳”׳™׳”] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳•׳—׳•׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳• ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳˜, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small>.  [׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳›׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳•׳, ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨].
׳”׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳• ׳׳‘"׳‘ ׳׳‘׳™"׳— ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳™׳© ׳׳™׳™׳׳•׳.</small></small>, ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳–׳›׳” ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳•׳™׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳™"׳’, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳™"׳“, ׳'. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳- ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳”, ׳©׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳–׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘. ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳‘.  ׳׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳. ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳.</small></small>.
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳” [׳•׳˜׳™׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳—׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳”], ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳‘ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳• ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳˜"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳‘ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳׳” <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳’.</small></small>.

RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›׳‘ - ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳×</h2>
<h3> ׳׳©׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳׳© ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳—׳©׳™׳›׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳–׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳• <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘, ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳•], ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” [׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳¢׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•' ׳“"׳” ׳¡׳׳•׳.</small></small>] ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳›׳— ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳×, ׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳“"׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳”. ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳×.</small></small>. [׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”].
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳›׳׳• ׳›׳, ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳׳ ׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳ ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳×], ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳—׳™׳“ [׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳×], ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳›׳— ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳׳”׳• ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳•. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳— ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›"׳—,  ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳›"׳• ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳ "׳• ׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳›׳ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–', ׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳– ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” [׳•׳׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–', ׳׳׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”]. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳— ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳₪"׳˜.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳›׳“׳¨׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘. ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳›׳.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ [׳›׳’׳•׳, ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳•] ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳™׳‘׳׳•׳× ׳׳“. ׳“"׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳•.</small></small>.

<h3> ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳•׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳• ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜, ׳•׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳• ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳׳• ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳“׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳¢׳’׳• ׳׳• ׳•׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳• ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳•, ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳–׳“׳׳ ׳׳• ׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳™׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳. 
<h3> ׳©׳›׳— ׳•׳™׳¦׳ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¦׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳©׳›׳— ׳•׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” <b>׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳</b>, ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳׳•׳›׳•, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳™׳“ ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳›׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× [׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳“' ׳¢׳ ׳“' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳™' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳׳” <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳”׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳™' ׳˜׳₪׳—׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›"׳’. ׳•׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳•- ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳-38 ( 38 ׳¡"׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳‘׳” 96 ׳¡"׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳׳”, ׳׳’׳¨"׳— ׳ ׳׳” ׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳-32 ( 32 ׳¡"׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳‘׳” 80 ׳¡"׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳§׳” ׳•׳×׳׳¨׳•׳¨].</small></small>], ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳™׳©׳׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳•׳™׳©׳׳™׳¨׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦"׳© <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳•, ׳™"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳™׳§׳¨ ׳•׳׳×׳™׳™׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳’׳ ׳‘׳•׳”׳• ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳–.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳• ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳™׳–׳¨׳•׳§ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳—, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳©׳‘ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×.</small></small>.
׳©׳›׳— ׳•׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” <b>׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</b> [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳›׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳׳× ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›' ׳”׳₪׳"׳’, ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳•.</small></small>.  ׳•׳‘׳¢׳–"׳” ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳“"׳” ׳›׳.</small></small>.
XX ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳“ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳™׳™׳, ׳—׳™׳׳§׳×׳™ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳:
