<b>׳’.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳׳“׳. 
<b>׳“.</b> ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳.EE
׳›׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳×׳™ ׳‘׳׳₪׳×׳—׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳©׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳-׳‘ [׳‘׳¢׳¨׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” (׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳)].   GG
<h3> ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳™׳–׳¨׳™׳”׳</h3>
<h3> ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳×׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳׳•׳‘׳©׳•, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳•׳‘׳© ׳—׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳¨׳’׳׳• <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳: ׳. ׳”׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©. ׳‘. ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳¢׳’׳• ׳׳• ׳•׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳• ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳• ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×.  ׳. ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©- ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳© ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’׳׳•׳¨ [׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳§׳©׳” ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳”׳’׳' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳‘. ׳©׳׳“׳׳” ׳©׳§ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳§ ׳™׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳—׳׳™׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳•׳×׳₪׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’׳׳•׳¨, ׳™"׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳©׳§ ׳™׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳—׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’׳׳•׳¨].  ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳× ׳©׳§ ׳™׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳—׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳”׳¨׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳•׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ [׳©׳ ׳‘׳’׳' ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳›"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳’], ׳•׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳™"׳— ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ [׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'], ׳׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳‘׳©׳.
׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳˜ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳”׳—׳׳•׳§ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳™ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳ ׳”], ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×1 ׳ ׳˜: ׳“"׳” ׳×׳¨׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳”׳׳•׳‘׳© ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳” ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳”׳§׳•׳¨, ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳©׳—׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳’׳ ׳׳”׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳”׳§׳•׳¨.
׳‘. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳‘׳©׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳”. ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› [׳₪׳™"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳˜, ׳›'] ׳“׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳׳׳ ׳׳—׳™׳™׳›׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳•׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳• ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳• ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳™׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳“׳™׳׳׳ ׳׳—׳™׳™׳›׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’׳׳•׳¨, ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳–. ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳׳” ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳©׳‘׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳•׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳™׳¦׳—׳§׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳ ׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳—׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳© ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳” ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳• ׳—׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳‘׳©׳”, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳›׳” ׳׳• ׳§׳¦׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳’׳׳•, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳₪׳₪׳•׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳–] ׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳™׳ (׳‘׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳™׳) [׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳’] ׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳¢׳’׳• ׳׳•. ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳“׳ ׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳¢׳’׳• ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳¢׳’׳• ׳׳• ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳–׳”.  [׳•׳‘׳©׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳›׳׳׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳—׳“׳©׳•׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳ ׳©׳”׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳§׳™׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳•׳–׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳™׳׳¢׳’׳• ׳׳• (׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳₪). ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ (׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳') ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳¨׳£ ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳׳¢׳’׳• ׳׳•]. </small></small>. ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳” ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳‘׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳§׳ "׳— ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—' ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳¦׳×- ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’׳׳•׳¨, ׳›׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳.
׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳‘׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳”, ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳“ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>.  ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳›׳׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳¨׳£, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳§׳™׳¥ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳‘׳©, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳¢׳’׳• ׳׳• ׳•׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳• ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳• ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×.
<h3> ׳—׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳×׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳¨׳•׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳₪׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳” ׳¢׳ ׳›׳×׳₪׳™׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨׳•׳•׳׳™׳ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳›"׳–].  ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳׳¢׳’׳• ׳׳• ׳•׳™׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳–׳¨.</small></small>.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¦׳” ׳©׳©׳¨׳•׳•׳׳™׳” ׳׳§׳•׳₪׳׳™׳ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©. [׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳— ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳˜ ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳₪׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳”׳›׳×׳£ ׳•׳₪׳§׳¢ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳›׳׳• ׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳©׳§׳™׳₪׳׳” ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™]. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ [׳›׳—׳•׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳—׳׳™׳₪׳•׳×] ׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳” <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳˜: ׳“"׳” ׳×׳¨׳™. ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳ ׳©׳¨׳™, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳•'׳’׳¨׳˜׳'</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ["׳‘׳¢׳§׳™׳˜׳©׳¢" ג€“"׳—׳׳׳˜"] ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳©׳׳©׳× ׳›׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳₪׳×׳•׳—׳” <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳— ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳—.</small></small>.
"׳’׳¨׳˜׳" ׳”׳—׳’׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× [׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳ ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳™׳ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳©׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳™׳ "׳”׳₪׳¡׳§" ׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳•׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳˜: [׳“"׳” ׳×׳¨׳™] '׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳×׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳™׳ ׳™ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳׳™ ׳׳›׳׳” ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳׳“׳ ׳׳•׳‘׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳×׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳’׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳©׳•׳™ ׳”׳•׳', ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳©׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳–] '׳•׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳¨"׳™ ׳“׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳›׳©׳—׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳•׳§ ׳•׳—׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳˜"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳—׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳', ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳–׳¨׳•׳¢ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳•] '׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳©׳• ׳¨׳‘׳•׳×׳™ ׳“׳”׳ ׳“׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳×׳™ ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳–׳• ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳• ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳×׳™ ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳–׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳'AMP.  ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳‘׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳• ׳•׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳”] ׳•׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳• ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳˜] ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳–] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳] ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳—׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳’׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳ ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”.
JJ ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳” ׳“׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳׳•׳§ ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳©׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™, ׳׳‘׳ ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳©׳׳©׳× ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳™׳₪׳” ׳•׳›׳•׳‘׳¢</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳₪׳” ׳•׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳©׳• <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳ "׳’, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳™׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳•, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™׳₪׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳›"׳’. ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳‘׳¥ ׳׳•׳× ׳¡׳˜ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳׳”׳¨"׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳˜׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳’ [׳•׳›"׳› ׳×׳׳׳™׳“׳•- ׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳§׳—].</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳₪׳” ׳•׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳¨׳£ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳¥ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳₪׳×׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳•׳—׳•׳×. ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳¢׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳×׳—׳× ׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳׳¨׳׳©׳•. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳“׳§ ׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳¨׳׳©׳•, ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳™׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳ ׳— ׳›׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳”. ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳— ׳׳¢׳™׳₪׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳›׳•׳‘׳¢.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳₪׳₪׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳›׳₪׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’׳׳•׳¨, ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳”"׳¨ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›"׳— ׳©׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳¨׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳], ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳¢׳ ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳. [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳’ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳“׳™׳׳׳ ׳׳—׳™׳™׳›׳™ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’׳׳•׳¨].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¢׳¨׳“׳׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳“׳׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳• ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ [׳׳ ׳™׳›׳ ׳¡׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳’׳׳™׳™׳] <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳—] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳’׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳₪׳›"׳— ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¨׳"׳] ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳• ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳˜ ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳‘׳™׳× <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×: ׳. ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳׳‘׳•׳©. ׳‘. ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨.  ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳' ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳ײ´׳ ײ°׳¢ײ¸׳, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳˜"׳–] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳¢׳¥ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳™"׳“, ׳‘' ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳˜, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳×׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© [׳•׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“׳“ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳’"׳› ׳©׳¨׳™, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳×׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳', ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”].
׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳‘' ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳׳• ׳•׳׳×׳™ ׳׳׳×׳•׳™׳™ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳˜"׳– ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳׳ ׳™׳—׳£ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳§׳¦׳× ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•, ׳•׳”׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳×׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳׳׳• ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳£ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳₪׳׳•׳’ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳•׳׳, ׳•׳›׳”׳ ׳“׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳‘' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳™׳¨׳” ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳×׳§׳©׳˜׳•׳× ׳‘׳”׳, ׳•׳"׳› ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳¨. </small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳¦׳“ ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳' ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳‘׳™׳•"׳› ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳™׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳ ׳“׳ ׳"׳› ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳׳•׳×׳• ׳™׳•׳. ׳×׳¨׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳—. ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳‘', ׳‘׳™׳•"׳› ׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳ ׳₪׳׳•׳’ ׳›׳”׳×׳•"׳© ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“. ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳™׳׳›׳• ׳™׳—׳£ ׳•׳›׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳’׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳›"׳’]. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳›"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳¨"׳•] ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳› ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳¢׳׳™ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳׳›׳• ׳™׳—׳£ [׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳ ׳₪׳׳•׳’ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳£ ׳‘׳˜׳׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“]. ׳•׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳”] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳. [׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳׳” ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳׳×׳™ ׳׳׳×׳•׳™׳™].  </small></small>.</b>
<h3> ׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳× ׳•׳˜׳׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳¦׳× ׳›׳”׳׳›׳×׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳׳” ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳£ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳” [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳× ׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳‘׳× ׳“' ׳›׳ ׳₪׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳×], ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳£ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳” <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’, ׳', ׳‘' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳•]. ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳–.</small></small> [׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳× <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳™, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small>].
׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳×, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳• <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳• <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳’' ׳¡׳§׳›"׳—</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳׳” ׳”׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳×׳‘׳™׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳׳– ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳”, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¦׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳”׳¦׳•׳׳¨</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳¢׳™׳£ ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳”׳§׳•׳¨ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳× ׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳˜.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳‘׳• ׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳•׳¨׳•׳‘׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳˜׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳: ׳¦׳¢׳™׳£ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳׳¨, ׳›׳₪׳₪׳•׳×, ׳’׳¨׳‘׳™׳™׳, ׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳”], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳‘׳©׳• <b>׳›׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳£</b>  [׳›׳“׳•׳’׳׳× "׳©ײ·׳" ׳©׳׳×׳¢׳˜׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳”׳›׳×׳₪׳™׳™׳] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳‘׳• ׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳•׳¨׳•׳‘׳• <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳₪׳™"׳˜ ׳”׳™"׳˜] ׳©׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳׳•׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳£ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳¨׳—׳¥, ׳•׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳£ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳•׳‘׳© ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳•׳¨׳•׳‘׳• ׳‘׳›׳₪׳₪׳•׳×] ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳•׳’׳¨ ׳׳׳˜׳” ׳׳›׳×׳™׳₪׳• ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳‘׳ ׳˜, ׳•׳§׳©׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳•׳‘׳©׳• ׳׳׳˜׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳•׳¨׳•׳‘׳• <b>׳•׳’׳</b> ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳׳© [׳©׳׳×׳¢׳˜׳£ ׳‘׳” ׳›׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳], ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳˜ <h3> ׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳“׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳™ ׳–׳”׳‘</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳“׳©, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳–׳”׳‘ ׳‘׳₪׳” <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳™"׳‘, ׳™"׳’] ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳•׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳–׳”.</small></small>.

<h3> ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳‘׳’׳“</h3>
 <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–׳” ׳”׳¢׳•׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳•, ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳›'- ׳›"׳” ׳”׳¢׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳׳™׳•. </small></small> [׳›׳™׳¡׳™׳, ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”]
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜ ׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳• ׳©׳×׳₪׳™׳¡׳×׳• ׳—׳–׳§׳” ׳׳׳•׳“, ׳׳‘׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳”׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳×׳™׳₪׳×׳— ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳›"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳₪. ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳×׳”׳™׳” ׳×׳₪׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳—׳©׳‘ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜ ׳©׳‘׳›׳™׳¡ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳׳×׳™ ׳׳׳×׳•׳™׳™ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳׳‘׳’׳“.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳×׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¦׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳›׳™ ׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳₪׳×׳•׳—׳”- ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳×׳₪׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳׳‘׳–׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳׳•׳× <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳›"׳˜.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳×׳₪׳•׳¨- ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳‘׳©׳• ׳¢׳×׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳¡׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳’ ׳“"׳” ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳•.</small></small> ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳×׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳—׳ ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳”, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳‘׳’׳“, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳›׳™׳¡ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳₪׳™' ׳›׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳‘׳’׳“. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳”, ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ [׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳“] ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳"׳› ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨. [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ "׳¨׳–׳¨׳‘׳”" ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳•, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳™׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳×׳ ׳•׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳”׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳›"׳’, ׳“"׳” ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳•]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳×׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳—׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳™ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳’׳“.
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳”׳₪׳›׳× ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳‘׳’׳“, ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳›"׳’, ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳“, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳™"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳’"׳› ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳—׳˜׳׳×.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳™׳›׳” ׳׳•׳–׳”׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳™׳©׳•׳˜ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳₪, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›"׳› ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳˜׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳×׳”, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳” ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳“"׳. ׳•׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳‘ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳§׳©׳˜ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳˜׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳•׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳‘׳¨ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳§׳™׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳›׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳•׳× ׳ ׳׳•׳•׳× ׳•׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳’׳“</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳• <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳—, ׳"׳˜. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳’"׳ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳‘"׳— ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳“ ׳™׳—׳¡׳™׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳׳¢׳™׳.</small></small>, ׳›׳’׳•׳: ׳—׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳׳“׳׳™׳, ׳₪׳×׳§ ׳׳”׳׳›׳‘׳¡׳”, ׳׳×׳׳” ׳₪׳ ׳™׳׳™, ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳”.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ["׳¨׳–׳¨׳‘׳”"] ׳׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳ ׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¦׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳¨׳‘׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳–] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ [׳—"׳‘ ׳₪׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜'].
׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• [׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳§׳ ׳™׳] ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳•. ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳£.</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳׳×׳׳” ׳•׳׳‘׳–׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳™</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳׳×׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳–׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳£ ׳‘׳—׳׳§׳• ׳•׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳•, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳™׳×׳ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳§"׳ . ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨, ׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳‘׳’׳“, ׳•׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢׳™׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳₪׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳•</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳₪׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“, ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳•׳׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ <b>׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳•׳׳×׳ ׳’׳“</b> ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳‘׳© ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳•, ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳– ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳׳• <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳¦׳—: ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳£ ׳¨׳•׳§׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳₪׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳¨׳•׳§, ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳׳׳™׳©׳“׳™׳™׳” ׳§׳׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳™ ׳”׳•׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ , ׳’', ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳‘׳™' ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳©"׳™. ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳’׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳˜׳₪׳ ׳•׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£, ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳™. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳˜ ׳•׳׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳›׳©׳ ׳˜׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳˜׳‘׳ ׳•׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳.
׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳§׳¨׳¢׳• ׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳£ ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳“׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳—׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳¡׳×׳™׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳•׳©׳¢׳ ׳ ׳¢׳׳• ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳›׳׳›׳” ׳™׳“׳• ׳‘׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳–׳›׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳”, ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳•].
׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳’׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳’׳׳ ׳₪׳—׳™׳×׳•׳×׳• ׳™׳—׳¡׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳׳™׳•. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳—׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳×׳ ׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳“׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳™׳‘׳©׳ [׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳’׳׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•] ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳×׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳—׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳•. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳©׳] ׳•׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳ ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳×׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳–׳ ׳©׳ ׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳‘׳—׳׳§׳• ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳¢׳• ׳•׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳₪׳• ׳‘׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳˜׳™ ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳‘׳¨׳” ׳”׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳§, ׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳™׳×׳.
<h3> ׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳˜׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳” ׳•׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳©׳¢׳¨׳• ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳™׳, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳•׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨ <b>׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨</b> ׳׳׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨ <b>׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢</b>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳©׳• ׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳•, ׳–'.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳”׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳˜׳¨ ׳¡׳•׳—׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳¢׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳× ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳•, ׳–'. ׳•׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳- ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳”, ׳•׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳׳“׳ ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳•׳₪׳×׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳׳˜׳¨ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳“׳× ׳’׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳—׳” ׳©׳‘׳₪׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳™׳—׳” ׳‘׳₪׳™׳•, ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳© ׳”׳¨׳•׳§ ׳•׳ ׳×׳”׳₪׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳• ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳•, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳× ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳• <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ , ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳•׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳¢׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳•׳¥ ׳׳• ׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳§׳• ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳• ׳׳’׳•׳£, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳™׳•, ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳™׳×׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ <b>׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳™׳</b> ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳׳™׳›׳×׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳× ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳• ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳§׳•׳ ׳˜׳¨׳¡ ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳— ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳—' ׳•׳”׳¢' ׳§׳₪"׳’, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳©׳˜׳•׳× ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳™׳•, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳’׳“, ׳•׳׳×׳ ׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳•, ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳.
<h3> ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳ <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳™"׳—.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳ <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳–׳” [׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳] ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳•׳˜׳‘ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳©׳•׳’׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳׳–׳™׳“׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳–׳”׳™׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳§׳™׳©׳•׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳™׳©׳׳¢׳• ׳׳ ׳•, ׳•׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳, ׳׳׳ [׳׳¦׳¨׳₪׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳] ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳”׳ ׳“׳׳•׳˜׳‘ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳©׳•׳’׳’׳™׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• [׳—"׳ ׳¢׳' ׳§׳׳–] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳’׳ ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳׳”׳• ׳¨׳”"׳¨] ׳‘׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳- ׳›׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳₪ײ°׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳ ׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳, ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳‘׳•׳¡׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳”"׳¨ [׳•׳’׳ ׳¦׳“׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳–׳”]. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳”׳ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳•׳™׳¨׳׳• ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳׳¦׳׳ [׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳”- ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳• ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳™׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•]. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳¡׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¡׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳׳˜׳₪׳—׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳׳—׳–׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳˜׳₪׳—׳× <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳’׳“. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳—׳•׳¦׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳–׳“׳׳ ׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳'], ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™׳” ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳¡. ׳“"׳” ׳”׳•׳¢׳™׳.
׳¡׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳™. ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¡׳™׳›׳” ׳•׳׳—׳˜ ׳‘׳˜׳—׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳—.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳© ׳•׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳˜ ׳׳• ׳¡׳™׳›׳× ׳‘׳™׳˜׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳™׳₪׳×׳— <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳˜'. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¦"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳׳—׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳§׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳§׳™׳©׳•׳¨׳™׳, ׳”׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳׳‘׳™׳©׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳¡׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜ ׳•׳›׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳˜"׳– ׳©׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳’"׳› ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳‘׳’׳“, ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳’׳ ׳׳׳™׳© ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳׳—׳˜ ׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™׳›׳× ׳‘׳™׳˜׳—׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳×׳—.</small></small>.

<h3> ׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£</h3>
<b>׳›׳˜.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳§׳•׳₪׳” ׳•׳׳—׳¦׳׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳›"׳] ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳’׳©׳׳™׳. ׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳© [׳‘׳׳™ ׳›׳•׳‘׳¢] ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳’׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳¢' 33 ׳•׳¢׳' ׳×׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢' 16.</small></small>, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳›׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳–׳׳ <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳’׳ ׳׳”׳™׳–׳§ ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳×׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§׳• ׳‘׳™׳“ <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳׳“׳ ׳•׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳“׳•׳׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳•] ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳© ׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳©׳ <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳“.</small></small> [׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ <b>׳׳׳›׳׳•׳</b> ׳”׳’׳•׳£ <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳£, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳׳© ׳׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳” ׳•׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳”.  ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳§, ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳•׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳— ׳•׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳–׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳–׳ ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳”׳§׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ "׳˜׳™׳©׳™׳•" ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳—׳¦׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳׳‘, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳§׳” ׳׳• "׳§׳˜׳˜׳¨" ׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳ ׳¦׳ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ [׳©׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨׳• ׳•׳™׳¦׳¢׳¨׳•], ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ <b>׳׳׳›׳׳•׳</b>, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳×׳™׳, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ [׳‘׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¨׳, ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”. ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳§"׳—.</small></small>] ׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳™׳¡׳¨׳˜, ׳׳£ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”] <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳§׳¢"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳§"׳—] ׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳›"׳‘, ׳›"׳—] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”. [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳–׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳™׳¡׳¨׳˜׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ (׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳”, ׳™"׳), ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳©׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳©׳׳”׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“]. </small></small>, ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳›׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳•׳¡׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳›׳× ׳‘׳™׳˜׳—׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳× ׳׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳× [׳”׳׳©׳׳©׳× ׳׳׳™׳—׳•׳™ ׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳׳• ׳ ׳§׳¢] <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳ ׳•׳׳§׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳—׳•׳™, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳¨׳₪׳׳×.</small></small>. 
<h3> ׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳“׳©׳•׳× ׳׳’׳¢ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳׳•. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳׳• [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳×׳₪׳¡׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳£] ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳”׳. ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳׳• ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳׳›׳×׳‘׳• [׳‘׳›׳×"׳™], ׳•׳”׳™׳• ׳©׳©׳׳¢׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳׳“׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳׳׳× ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¨׳“ ׳’׳©׳ <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳™׳›׳×׳•, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳–׳“׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳•׳“׳¢׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳•' ׳׳– ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳”׳, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ </small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳© ׳•׳›׳“׳§׳׳׳.
<h3> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¨׳₪׳</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¨׳₪׳ <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳›׳׳‘׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳], ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¡׳׳׳ ׳™׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳¡׳: ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳¡׳’׳•׳׳™׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳’׳™׳“ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳₪׳™"׳˜ ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™"׳’.</small></small> ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳“׳ <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳›"׳‘, ׳›"׳“, ׳›"׳”, ׳›"׳–, ׳›"׳—.</small></small>, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳”׳׳™׳™׳©׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳‘, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳• ׳¡׳’׳•׳׳” ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳¦׳׳™׳—׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳© ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳ ׳©׳׳© ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳›"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳¦"׳“. </small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ "׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳“׳•׳" ׳׳§׳‘׳¨ ׳¨׳—׳ [׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜ ׳‘׳׳׳×].
׳׳׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳˜, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳© <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳©.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳× ׳׳• "׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳¨" ׳׳• ׳’׳‘׳¡</h3>
<b>׳׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳’׳“ ׳׳“׳‘׳§ ["׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳¨"] ׳©׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳”, ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¨׳×׳ ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳×׳™׳ <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳”, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳§"׳— ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳— ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¨׳₪׳ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳¦׳׳×.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳“׳§׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳›׳” ׳׳• ׳׳—׳˜ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳§׳©׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳•׳¢׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜׳™׳ <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳–. ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳’׳‘׳¡ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨ <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳–׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳¡׳ ׳’׳׳’׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳›׳¡׳ ׳’׳׳’׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳• <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳˜׳¢ ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘ ׳©׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳• [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳˜"׳•], ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳׳×׳™ ׳׳׳×׳•׳™׳™ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳–׳”, ׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳ "׳• ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳ "׳˜, ׳•׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳•. ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¨"׳™ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳¡׳”: ׳“"׳” ׳”׳§׳™׳˜׳¢, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳™. ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳‘׳›׳¡׳ ׳’׳׳’׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳• ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨. ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳”׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳¡׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳‘׳™׳ <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳—׳™ ׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳"׳› ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳”׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳—׳™ ׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳•. ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” <sup>׳¢׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”. ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳”'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳§׳ ׳¢׳–׳¨ ׳•׳§׳‘׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳׳”.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳§׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳§׳‘׳™׳™׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳™׳×׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳§׳©׳” ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳•, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳™׳×׳ <sup>׳¢׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳™"׳–, ׳™"׳—, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳• ׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳₪׳׳• ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳– ׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳©׳׳•׳™, ׳•׳©׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳•׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳•. ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳¡׳”: ׳“"׳” ׳”׳§׳˜׳¢ [׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¢"׳•].  ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳• ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳§׳™׳˜׳¢ ׳™׳•׳©׳‘ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳— ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳•, ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳™ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳׳×׳™ ׳׳׳×׳•׳™׳™ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳• ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳’׳ ׳×׳•׳×׳‘׳×, ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳”, ׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳’׳•׳‘׳¡׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳’׳ ׳×׳•׳×׳‘׳× <sup>׳₪</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳™׳˜׳¢ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳§׳‘ ׳©׳׳•, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳׳• ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳©׳׳•׳™, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳–׳§ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳’׳•׳‘׳¡׳× ["׳¡׳“"] <sup>׳₪׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳—׳–׳™׳§׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳•. ׳•׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘"׳¡׳“" ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳™׳×׳” ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳•׳–׳™׳” ׳•׳׳•׳“׳“ ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨</h3>
<b>׳׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ "׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳•׳–׳™׳”" ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳× ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ [׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨׳×] <sup>׳₪׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™. ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳›׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳”׳–׳׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳ ׳׳•׳˜׳‘ ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳, ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× <sup>׳₪׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳§׳•"׳  ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳—.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳–׳ ׳• <sup>׳₪׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳”׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳’, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳–׳׳, ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳§׳™׳˜׳¢ ׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘ ׳©׳׳• ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳§׳‘ ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳”׳§׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳¡׳“׳™׳¨ [׳•׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳–׳›׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳˜ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©]. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳•׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ <sup>׳₪׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳¦׳™׳“׳“ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳• ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳, ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳’"׳› ׳¦׳™׳“׳“ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳•׳׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¦"׳₪ ׳₪׳¨׳׳ ׳§ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳–׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳”, ׳•׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳• <sup>׳₪׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳”] ׳©׳׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳›׳. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳×׳׳“׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳׳›׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳ ׳•׳‘׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳– ׳•׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳— ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳™, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳•׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳‘. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳¡׳›"׳—.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳—׳–׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳“׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳₪׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳›׳׳׳™.]</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳›׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳§׳¨׳”"׳×, ׳׳ ׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨.]
<h3> ׳§׳•׳¦׳‘ ׳׳‘</h3>
<b>׳׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳• ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• <sup>׳₪׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳¦׳‘ ׳׳‘ <sup>׳₪׳˜</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳© ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳›׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳˜׳‘׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳’׳£ ׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳› ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳—, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳©׳, ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳§׳•׳¦׳‘ ׳׳‘ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳”׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳‘ ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¢׳ ׳›׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳›׳”׳’׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£. ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳ ׳”, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳׳׳¢׳׳”.</small></small> ׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘ ׳”׳׳•׳©׳×׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳׳¢ ׳’׳•׳£ ׳–׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳׳• ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳×.

<h3> ׳©׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© <sup>׳¦</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳™"׳’, ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳•׳׳’׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳”׳’׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ <sup>׳¦׳</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳: ׳. ׳”׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©, ׳‘. ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳™׳™׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳’׳©׳. ׳•׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©, ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳—, ׳§"׳˜, ׳§"׳™] ׳•׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳•] ׳•׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ [׳₪׳›"׳’ ׳׳•׳× ׳’] ׳•׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳‘] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› [׳₪׳™"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳] ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳¢.  ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳™׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳’׳©׳, ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳”׳’׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ <sup>׳¦׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳¢׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳•׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳“ <sup>׳¦׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳” ׳”׳©׳¢׳” ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳׳•. ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳‘׳›׳×"׳™] ׳•׳”׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳] ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳•׳¢׳ ׳•׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳“ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©, ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳›׳ ׳׳˜׳‘׳¢׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳•׳׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳’׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳×׳©׳׳™׳© ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©.  ׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳©׳™׳‘, ׳©׳˜׳‘׳¢׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜ ׳׳׳™׳© ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳˜׳‘׳¢׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳•׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜ ׳׳”׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳׳˜ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳§׳ ׳— ׳₪׳™׳• ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳™׳©׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳×׳©׳׳™׳©, ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳›׳.  ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳— ׳¡׳›"׳– ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳’׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™׳¨׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳–׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳™׳×׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳›"׳’] ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳׳© ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳“׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳׳™׳• [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳™"׳˜] ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳•׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳׳™׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳ ׳–׳”, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳ ׳•׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳§׳™׳¡׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳–׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳’׳™׳׳™׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳›'], ׳•׳₪׳¨׳©"׳™ [׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳”. ׳“"׳” ׳”׳‘׳ ׳•׳×] ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳¨׳—׳ ׳‘׳”׳›׳™ ׳•׳׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳•׳™ ׳”׳•׳, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳׳•׳™, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳–׳” ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳.</small></small>].  ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳© ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳–׳”׳‘ ׳׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳׳§׳ ׳™׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳“׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳”׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳”, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳•. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳–׳”׳‘ ׳•׳׳׳™׳© ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳§׳•׳‘׳׳× <sup>׳¦׳”</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳™"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳–׳”- ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳©׳, ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳“, ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳— <h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳•׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳—, ׳”׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳™׳§׳— ׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳•׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜ ׳¢"׳™ ׳©׳™׳¦׳₪׳” ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳›׳¡׳£ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳™׳×׳׳”׳• ׳‘׳¦׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳›׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜ <sup>׳¦׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳‘.</small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳”׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳¢׳׳™׳• <sup>׳¦׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳”.</small></small>.
׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳₪׳×׳—, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳›׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳ ׳˜׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨, ׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳: ׳. ׳™׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳—׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳”׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳™׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” <sup>׳¦׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳×׳™׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” [׳©׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳×׳׳- ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘], ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜, ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳›׳™ ׳׳©׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳׳©׳›׳ ׳– ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳›׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳™׳©׳—׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳׳× ׳¡׳•׳₪׳” ׳‘׳ ׳§׳‘ ׳”׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳•׳™׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳§׳‘</sup><small><small>׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳©׳¨׳• ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¨׳—׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳–׳• ׳¢"׳’ ׳–׳•.</small></small>.  ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳
