<h3> ׳“׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳× ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳—</h3>
<b>׳׳’.</b> ׳“׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳× ׳׳¦׳“ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳•׳”׳—׳•׳¥ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳¨׳”"׳¨ [׳׳• ׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳×- ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳• ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳×], ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳›׳©׳”׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳—׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳, ׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳׳₪׳×׳— <sup>׳§׳”</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳—.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳˜׳₪׳—׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳“.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳׳˜׳₪׳—׳× ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳”׳¦׳•׳׳¨ <sup>׳§׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳›"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳˜"׳•], ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳•׳¨׳•׳‘׳•, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳“ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳¢׳•׳˜׳£ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳•׳¨׳•׳‘׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳‘׳©׳• ׳›׳.</small></small> ׳׳• ׳›׳¨׳•׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ <sup>׳§׳–</sup><small><small>׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳ ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳©׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳”׳›׳™ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳˜׳₪׳—׳× ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¦׳”. ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳"׳—] ׳׳¦׳“׳“ ׳©׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳¦׳” ׳‘׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳›׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳× ׳”׳¢׳¨׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳©׳ ׳‘׳₪׳©׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¡ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳¢׳’׳• ׳׳•.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ <sup>׳§׳—</sup><small><small>׳¨׳"׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳— ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳. ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳׳¢׳§׳¨׳ ׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳˜׳₪׳—׳× ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳₪׳×׳— [׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳׳˜׳₪׳—׳× ׳‘׳˜׳™׳׳” ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳›׳×׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳• ׳›׳”׳•׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™, ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳—׳‘׳” ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳׳©׳× ׳׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳©׳¨׳•׳•׳].</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳›׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” "׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§".
<h3> ׳™׳¨׳™׳§׳” ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳”.</b> ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳©׳×׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳׳• ׳׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳•׳™׳©׳×׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳׳׳¨׳—׳§ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“' ׳׳׳•׳×.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳×׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳•׳׳×׳’׳׳’׳׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳•׳׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳›׳©׳׳×׳’׳׳’׳׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ , ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳×.</small></small>.
- ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳¢׳” ׳•׳©׳¨׳©׳¨׳× ג€“ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳.
RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›׳’ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” - ׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳</h2>
<h3> ׳”׳§׳“׳׳”</h3>
XX ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳©׳” ׳—׳׳§׳™׳. ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ - ׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ [׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡, ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳©, ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” (׳•׳׳—׳׳× ׳׳™׳׳•׳¡), ׳ ׳•׳׳“], ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳•, ׳•׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™.
׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ - ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳— ׳‘׳₪׳™׳•, ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“, ׳ ׳’׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳•, ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™, ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳§, ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳, ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳˜׳₪׳ ׳•׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳].
׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ - ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳ [׳©׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§׳•, ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳, ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳×, ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳×׳—׳× ׳׳™ ׳׳–׳’׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳˜׳₪׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“], ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢, ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.  GG
<h3> ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳™׳§׳¨ ׳©׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳•, ׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳ ׳—׳›׳׳™׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳” ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳’׳ ׳‘ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳§. ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳: ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳“׳•׳“ ׳”׳׳׳, ׳•׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳›׳’: ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ [׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨] ׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳‘׳™׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳ ׳—׳›׳׳™׳”. [׳•׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳׳×׳™ ׳ ׳×׳§׳, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳’: ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳•׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™׳].
׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳₪׳›"׳“ ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳’' ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳: ׳. ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳‘. ׳©׳×׳”׳™׳” ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳˜׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¢. ׳’. ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳×׳‘׳˜׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳•׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳”׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳, ׳•׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” "׳׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳—". ׳•׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳“ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳™' ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× [׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳™׳‘. ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳₪׳׳’׳•]. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳“ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳' ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳›׳’: ׳•׳©׳ ׳׳“׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳.
׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳׳•. ׳“"׳” ׳”׳ ׳¨' ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳, ׳“׳׳£ ׳¨"׳© ׳“׳׳™׳× ׳׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•"׳, ׳•׳׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳"׳© ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™׳” ׳•׳׳£ ׳¨"׳© ׳“׳׳™׳× ׳׳™׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳׳•׳“׳” ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳–׳•. ׳•׳ "׳ ׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳›׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳–"׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡</h3>
 <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡"׳› ׳•׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳—׳׳™׳˜ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳׳™׳–׳” ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳, ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳׳—׳¡"׳›, ׳“׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳©"׳ ׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳›׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳•׳׳.
׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳•׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳•- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'.</small></small>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡: <b>׳—׳׳§ ׳'</b> ג€“ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳•]. (׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳). ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳” ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳•׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“.</small></small> ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳׳׳ ׳•, ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳', ׳‘'. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳׳™׳¨. ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳‘"׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳׳›׳™׳¨׳” [׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨] ׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¡׳—׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳–׳§ ׳•׳׳ ׳×׳™׳₪׳’׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡"׳› <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳‘', ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳” [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳’׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳™׳§׳— ׳׳”׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳”, ׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳“׳׳™, ׳©׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳×׳“׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳§׳— ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳©׳׳“׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳•"׳© ׳₪׳›"׳” ׳”"׳˜ ׳©׳›' ׳›׳¢׳™"׳–].</small></small>.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳׳¦׳׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳”, "׳˜׳™׳™׳₪" ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨, ׳₪׳ ׳§׳¡ ׳¦'׳§׳™׳, ׳©׳˜׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳¡׳£, ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳•׳׳ ׳•׳× ׳™׳§׳¨׳™׳ [׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳”, ׳§׳•׳׳׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘] ׳‘׳•׳׳™׳, ׳‘׳׳•׳§ ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳×׳ ׳” [׳¢׳ ׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳¨ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”].
׳“׳₪׳™ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳”, ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳›, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳‘, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳”, ׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳–׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳”].  ׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳•׳§ ׳¦׳™׳•׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¡"׳›.
׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳•׳—׳׳§׳” ׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳¨׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ [׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨</h3>
<b>׳’.</b>  ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• <b>׳›׳׳</b> ׳׳—׳׳× ׳™׳•׳§׳¨׳• ׳•׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳§ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳•, ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳©׳”׳׳™׳’׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳›. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳¡"׳” ׳₪׳ ׳–', ׳•׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳•׳§׳¦׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳— ׳¡׳¢"׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳ [׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–']. ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳”.</small></small>. ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳ ׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™׳ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡"׳“ ׳•׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳׳”׳' ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳©׳•"׳× ׳§׳ ׳” ׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳—.
׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳’׳‘׳™׳¢ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳›׳™ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳•׳›׳ ׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳›׳™ ׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳¨׳© ׳’׳‘׳™׳¢ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳×׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳™׳¢׳• ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳›. ׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳×׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳× ׳×׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳›, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳ ׳•׳™, ׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¡"׳”.</small></small>.
׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨: ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳“׳™׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨ ׳©׳׳—׳׳× ׳™׳•׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳›׳׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳— ׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳” <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳”. ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ [׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”- ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳' ׳׳•׳× ׳’] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳— ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳›. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳› ׳”׳¢' ׳¢"׳– ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•</h3>
<b>׳“. ׳—׳׳§ ׳‘'</b> ג€“ ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳©׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• <b>׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳§ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳‘׳“ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳•׳’ ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳›׳©׳ ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳—׳•׳©׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳׳§׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳–׳” ׳©׳—׳•׳©׳©׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳§ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.  ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳™׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳“׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨- ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳¦׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳‘׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳™׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳•׳×, ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳' ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳©׳”׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small></b> ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳. <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳© ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•. ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’.</small></small>
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳, <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small> ׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳§׳¨׳” <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳¢׳™' ׳©׳׳"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳' ׳™׳–.</small></small>, ׳›׳׳™ ׳ ׳•׳™ ׳’׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳§׳•׳.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳›</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•. <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳'. ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small>
<h3> ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳”׳׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“, ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳”׳₪׳ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳›׳’׳•׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳¦׳” ׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳›. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳–' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳›. ׳•׳₪׳™' ׳”׳¨"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨"׳™ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳”. ׳©׳™׳© ׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳׳• ׳”׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳×׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳ ׳•׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳• [׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•], ׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳—, ׳‘' ׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳•׳׳” ׳ ׳•׳™ ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳•׳× ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳¦׳•׳•׳×׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳§׳•׳‘"׳© [׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳—] ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳ ׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳•׳›׳ "׳], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳×׳”׳"׳“ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳˜].
׳™. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳©׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳׳”, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳ ׳§׳”"׳› ׳©׳]. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–] ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳•׳—׳™׳“׳© ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳–׳™׳– ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳׳£ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳"׳’. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳“׳׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳¡', ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳›׳. </small></small> ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳“׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•.  ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳•. <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳–'. ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳ "׳›׳׳™". ׳•׳”׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳׳‘: [׳“"׳” ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳. ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳›׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳¦"׳“.</small></small>
׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳—. ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳“׳’ ׳©׳“׳’ ׳—׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳, ׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳‘, ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳• ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳›"׳–, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳§׳׳’. ׳“"׳” ׳₪׳¨׳¡׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳©׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳×׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳”׳׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳™׳‘: ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳”.</small></small>] ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳•׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳¡׳‘׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳–.
<h3> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•: ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳•, ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳“. ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳¢׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳.</small></small> [׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳ ׳©׳׳•], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳× ׳¢׳¥, <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small> ׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳׳•׳¨׳– ׳׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳ ׳• [׳׳‘׳§׳× ׳׳¨׳§ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”], ׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳©׳₪׳× ׳”׳™׳ [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” !] <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳¨׳’׳– ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§, ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳”׳›׳“׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳.
׳•׳—׳•׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳• ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳™׳—׳“׳•׳”׳• ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳¨׳© ׳©׳׳©׳•׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳׳•׳×. ׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳— ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳₪׳¨׳• ׳‘׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳™׳¨׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳’, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳— ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳˜, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳”' ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳’ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳], ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳₪"׳› ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳” ׳©׳•׳” ׳׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳’׳•׳׳ ׳•׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.
׳•׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳—׳•׳₪׳™ ׳¨׳—׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳–׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳”׳, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳”׳• ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳›' ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳§"׳•. ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳—׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳—׳–׳™ ׳׳׳•׳׳¦׳ [׳׳›׳•׳¡׳¡׳•] ׳•׳›׳ ׳›' ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳§׳›"׳”. ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳×׳ ׳×׳” ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳—׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳›' ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›' ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳’. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳˜] ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳”, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳§׳׳§׳ ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳—׳™ ׳׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• [׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•] ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳•. ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳§׳•׳ ׳˜׳¨׳¡ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳—׳–׳™ ׳׳׳•׳׳¦׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳₪"׳› ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.
׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳›׳¡׳™׳¡׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳‘].</small></small>, ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳›׳׳• ׳˜׳‘׳, ׳¢׳¨׳׳” ׳•׳—׳׳¥ ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳— <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳•: ׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳•׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳›"׳” ׳”׳™"׳˜, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳•, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳˜׳‘׳.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳×׳¨׳•׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳¢׳©׳¨׳•׳× <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳›׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳˜׳׳׳™׳. ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳—. ׳•׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳ ׳¢.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳¢׳˜׳ ׳– ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”, <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳¡"׳. ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳] <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™, ׳•׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ [׳׳• ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•] ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳©׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳’׳“׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳‘׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¦׳•׳™, ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳‘ ׳”׳¢' ׳¦"׳• ׳›' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳–׳” ׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳•׳ "׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨, ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳“ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳“׳׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨. ׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳׳“׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳— ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳›׳™׳׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳׳¨"׳™ ׳‘׳›׳׳›׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳§׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”', ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳¢׳׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳˜ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳׳”"׳˜].</small></small>, [׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳“ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳‘׳™׳©׳”] <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳, ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳˜: ׳“"׳” ׳”׳ ׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳׳™׳׳•׳¡ ׳•׳§׳™׳™׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳' ׳©׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳׳™׳׳•׳¡ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳©׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳—׳–"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳"׳’ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳×׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳›׳׳ [׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳“].</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳—׳׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳•׳—׳׳¨׳™ ׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– ׳”׳‘׳׳ ׳• ׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳™"׳ ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳¢ ׳˜׳₪׳™ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳›׳™׳׳•׳™׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ [׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢]. ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳› ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– ׳•׳©׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small>.
׳¢׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, <b>׳•׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™, ׳•׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¡, ׳׳ ׳¢׳˜׳™׳₪׳” ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨׳™׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¡ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳—, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳–׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳¢׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳‘׳˜׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳•, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳׳– ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳˜ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.  ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳—׳•׳–׳¨, ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×. </small></small>.</b>
׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳§׳׳™׳₪׳×׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳, <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳“׳×׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳׳•׳›׳׳×׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳"׳› ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™.</small></small> ׳׳• ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳”׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳§"׳™.</small></small> [׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳”]. <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳” ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳˜. ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳›׳׳.</small></small>
׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳—׳™׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳‘' ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳×׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳— ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳’׳׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳—׳™׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“: ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳׳™, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™׳” ׳׳™׳׳›׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳"׳› ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳.</small></small> ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳” ׳›׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳•.
- ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳¨׳˜׳™׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘"׳׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳ ׳™׳" ׳•׳‘׳—׳‘׳¨׳× ׳×׳”׳׳™׳, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳˜ ׳”׳¢' ׳˜"׳–.
<h3> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳¨, ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳”. ׳“"׳” ׳׳ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳ "׳•.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ [׳›׳©׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳‘׳“] ׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳¢׳©׳™׳¨] ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳‘. ׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳•, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳ "׳›׳׳™" ׳©׳׳• ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳×, ׳׳– ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳©׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳•׳©׳‘ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳׳׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳›׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳”׳׳•׳×, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™ ׳׳¢׳₪"׳› ׳”׳׳˜׳׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳”׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳—׳׳˜ ׳©׳ "׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳”" ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳”׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳—׳“.</small></small>
׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• [׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳׳• ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳], ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳–: ׳“"׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§"׳¢, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳– ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ [׳›׳©׳¢׳˜׳ ׳– ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳“׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳] ׳׳– ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳•׳”׳˜</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳•׳”׳˜ [׳”׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳×] ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳×׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™, ׳₪׳׳˜׳” ׳—׳©׳׳׳™׳×, ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳¦׳”׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•. <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳–. ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¨ ׳“׳•׳׳§ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳•׳¢ ׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳•׳”׳˜ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳"׳’, ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳• ׳׳•׳× ׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳“] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳' ׳§׳¢׳“] ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳“׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳” ׳׳£ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳™ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳›׳׳•' ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳₪׳׳•׳’ ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳•׳”׳˜ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ["׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳₪"] ׳©׳׳–׳™׳–׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳›׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳– ׳׳× <b>׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™</b> ׳•׳׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳•׳”׳˜ [׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳].
<h3> ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳›׳׳™</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳. <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›', ׳›"׳, ׳›"׳‘.</small></small>  ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳“׳¢׳× ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳”׳¨"׳— ׳׳•"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳‘. ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳™] ׳•׳‘׳›׳£ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¨׳"׳”] ׳•׳©׳©"׳› [׳₪׳›"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small>.
<b>׳•׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳™׳—׳•׳“</b> ג€“ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© <b>׳׳¢׳•׳׳ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™. ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳›' ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳§"׳’.</small></small></b> ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“׳• ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳—׳©׳‘׳” [׳©׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳] ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳×. ׳׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳¨׳§ <b>׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳×</b> [׳׳• ׳׳×׳§׳•׳₪׳” ׳§׳¦׳¨׳”] <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳×. ׳•׳"׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳×׳‘׳׳” ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳›׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳.</small></small> ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳—׳©׳‘׳”. <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳›', ׳›"׳, ׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¦"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¦"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>
׳׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“.
׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳—׳©׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳—׳•׳“, ׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳§׳˜׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳×׳• <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳›׳•׳׳׳× ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳׳”׳' ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳—"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳•, ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” [׳׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳] ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳"׳–.</small></small>, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳' ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ [׳™׳’.] ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳•׳׳—׳©׳‘׳” ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳. ׳•׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳© ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳”- ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳© ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳, ׳•׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳₪׳¡׳•׳”"׳ ׳₪"׳ ׳”"׳• ׳•׳˜׳•׳׳׳× ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳™"׳“ ׳”"׳‘] ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳.  ׳•׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳›׳×׳•׳¡', ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳×׳• ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳–׳• ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳×׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳- ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳©׳—׳§</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳©׳—׳§, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳˜׳™׳§ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳™׳—׳“׳• ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳•׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳×. <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳›׳“׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨, ׳•׳₪׳™' ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳›׳“׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’, ׳©׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ ׳•׳§׳׳•׳© ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳“׳•׳׳” ׳§׳¦׳× ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳‘.
׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳׳׳•"׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳×׳©׳׳™׳© ׳–׳” ׳©׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳× ׳׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳” ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳׳£ ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳₪׳™' ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳›׳“׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳©׳׳– ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳£ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳×. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“׳• ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳× ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“׳•, ׳•׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘ - ׳•׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳” ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“׳• ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳×.  ׳•׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨, ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳” ׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳”׳•, ׳•׳›"׳ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳‘, ׳•׳"׳› ׳”׳›׳™ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳™׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳©׳‘׳”. </small></small>  ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
׳׳£ ׳׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨, ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳©׳—׳§, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳"׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳"׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳• ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳—.</small></small>.
׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§, ׳׳•׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘' ׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳: 
BB׳. ׳©׳”׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳—׳•׳“, <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳”׳©׳"׳© ׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳›׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳”]. </small></small> ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳©׳׳›׳׳•׳”׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳˜׳™׳§ ׳©׳׳›׳׳•׳”׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳"׳› ׳׳“׳•׳¢ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳©׳—׳§, ׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳™׳” ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳‘׳™׳”׳©׳"׳© ׳"׳› ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳’׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™, ׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳"׳’. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳§׳•׳‘"׳© ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳— ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳"׳› ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳©׳×׳ ׳×׳” ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'.</small></small>. ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳”׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳§׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳׳£ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳™׳™׳¢׳•׳“׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§, [׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳׳˜׳׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳˜׳×׳•]. ׳›׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, [׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳]. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳™׳—׳׳™׳˜ [׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳˜׳] ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§.</small></small>.
׳‘. ׳©׳”׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳—׳•׳“, ׳•׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳׳© <b>׳׳£ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×</b> ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳™׳—׳“׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳, ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳•׳₪׳›׳ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§. <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳–.</small></small>EE
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳׳× ׳©׳”׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳¦׳•׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¢׳, ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳•. <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳—, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳¡"׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳, ׳”׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳§׳¦׳• ׳׳׳¦׳•׳•׳×׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳.</small></small>
[׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳¢׳˜׳ ׳– ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳¨׳׳”].
׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳”: ׳ ׳•׳™ ׳¡׳•׳›׳” [׳•׳‘׳›׳׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳”] ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳•׳”"׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳—׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¡"׳–, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘. ׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳׳•: ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳‘. ׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small> [׳•׳‘׳—׳•"׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳—"׳×], ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳•׳×, <b>׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳ <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳’ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳” ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’].</small></small></b> [׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳× !], ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳×׳׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳©׳ ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳׳¨ "׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳•׳“׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳× ׳™׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳’" ׳©׳׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.
׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳”׳“׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳•׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳•׳×, <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳—, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳— ׳©׳”׳׳×׳¨׳•׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.</small></small> ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳—׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳”׳“׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¡"׳”, ׳', ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳׳׳×׳¨׳•׳’ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳×.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳×׳¨׳•׳’ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡"׳› <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳ ׳–׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳׳• ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳׳§׳. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. </small></small> [׳•׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳”. ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳"׳’. ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳”"׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳•׳×. ׳•׳”׳“׳¡׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳”׳.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳• ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳”׳™׳×׳¨, <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳׳”: ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳—׳¦׳•׳¦׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳›׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳›, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳˜. </small></small> ׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳• ׳”׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”], <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳“"׳” ׳§׳•׳¨׳“׳•׳] ׳×׳׳” ׳׳“׳•׳¢ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳• ׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳©׳׳"׳, ׳׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳.</small></small> ׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳•.
׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳• <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘, [׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳”, ׳•׳׳–׳” ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳׳§׳׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳׳§׳׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳] ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳₪"׳”. [׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳ "׳– ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳˜ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳₪׳•׳¡ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳׳•׳˜ ׳”׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳§׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨]. </small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ [׳‘׳§׳׳•׳×] ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•.
<h3> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© [׳¨׳™׳© ׳₪' ׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™׳] ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳₪׳˜׳™׳©, ׳׳‘׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳, ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳׳•׳”׳• [׳•׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳›' ׳©׳׳¦׳¨׳₪׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳].  ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳₪׳׳•׳˜ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳"׳’ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳ ׳›׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳ ׳•׳™ ׳"׳› ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳§׳•׳, ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳›, ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳›׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳’׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳–׳™׳§׳• ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳ <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳•׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳• [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳›"׳–], ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•
