׳–׳• ׳׳–׳•]. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳™׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳₪׳•׳£. ׳•׳‘׳׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳₪׳•׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳¨׳§ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳©׳™׳—׳“׳•׳”׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳– ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳“, ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳™].</small></small> ׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳”, <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳×׳”׳׳” ׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳”׳ [׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳“"׳” ׳˜׳₪׳—, ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳•׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳×׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳•׳”׳]. ׳•׳"׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳’׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳×׳׳™׳›׳” ׳׳–׳§׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳™׳›׳×׳•.</small></small> ׳¦׳¢׳¦׳•׳¢׳™ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳• ׳׳”׳©׳׳¢׳× ׳§׳•׳, <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳¨׳¢׳©׳ ׳׳• "׳§׳©׳§׳©׳" ׳׳• ׳₪׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘. ׳׳‘׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¦׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳•׳”׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳’׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳׳’׳“׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳¨׳¢׳™׳©׳™׳] ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¢ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳§׳•׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳—, ׳'] ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳—' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳"׳™ ׳₪"׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳™"׳’ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.
׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳ ׳’׳™׳ ׳” [׳›׳׳• ׳׳©׳¨׳•׳§׳™׳×] ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳›.</small></small> ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳× ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳•. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳•. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳§׳•׳¨׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳–׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳©׳׳™׳© ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳–. ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¡׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳׳©׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳‘"׳™ ׳–׳™׳׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳₪"׳• ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳‘].</small></small> [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳׳׳›׳ <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳” ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳”.</small></small>], ׳׳’׳‘ ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳×, ׳׳˜׳‘׳™ ׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳”, <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜. ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳›׳׳•' ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳“ ׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳.</small></small> ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳˜׳׳₪׳•׳ ׳™׳. <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳©׳׳™׳©׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳”׳˜׳׳₪׳•׳, ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳× ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳•. ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§, ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳—׳•׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¢׳' ׳₪׳”].</small></small>
׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳¢׳, ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳– ׳׳•׳× ׳”'], ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳], ׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ [׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳] ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳—׳©׳׳ [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳×׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨] ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• [׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳‘' ׳”׳¢' ׳’']. ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳§ [׳•׳™׳"׳¢, ׳“׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳×׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳]. </small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳¢׳].
׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳™ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳¡׳™ ׳׳–׳’׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳”. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳, ׳׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳•. <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳”׳‘"׳™ [׳‘׳”׳׳©׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳׳] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳“, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳©׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳׳™׳•. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳” ׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳׳"׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳׳•׳× ׳”' ׳©׳×׳׳” ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳—' ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳•׳‘׳¢׳”"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳₪' ׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™׳. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳•׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳•׳›' ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳].</small></small> ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳©׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳׳–. ׳•׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳¢׳” ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— [׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“] ׳•׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳” ׳•׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳›"׳’ ׳•׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨] ׳•׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳₪"׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳׳–׳•׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨], ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•.
׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳›׳׳™, ׳׳‘׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳’׳ ׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳•, ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳§ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳. <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small>
׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× <b>׳›׳׳</b> ׳׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳¢׳—</sup><small><small>׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ [׳¢׳‘׳•׳”"׳§ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳•׳¢׳“ ׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳‘' ׳“׳™׳ ׳˜'], ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳› ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™', ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳“ ׳™׳©׳©׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳×׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“׳¨׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳×׳©׳”"׳ [׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¡׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳•] ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳› ׳”׳¢' ׳›"׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳§׳¦׳× ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳›׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•.  ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳•׳׳—׳׳×׳ ׳׳×׳‘׳™׳™׳© ׳׳”׳–׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•. <sup>׳¢׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳–. ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳• ׳›' ׳׳ ׳›׳.</small></small> ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳“ ׳—׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳• ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¡׳‘׳‘׳• ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ [׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳ ׳¢ ׳׳—׳׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳], ׳₪׳˜׳™׳© ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳¡׳“׳¨, ׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳•׳“׳•׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•. ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳׳¦׳׳¦׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ <b>׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¢</b> ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ <sup>׳₪</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳§׳•׳ ׳˜׳¨׳¡ ׳‘׳ ׳×׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳”׳׳›׳” ׳’׳׳™׳•׳ 3- ׳¡׳™׳•׳ ׳×׳©׳¡"׳—].  ׳˜׳׳₪׳•׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳׳¨׳™ ["׳₪׳׳׳₪׳•׳"] ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳”׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×- ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳” ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳” ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳—׳¦׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳©׳”׳•, ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳–.  ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳™"׳˜.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳•</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳©׳׳™׳©׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳’׳ ׳‘ <sup>׳₪׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳“'.</small></small> ׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ <sup>׳₪׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× <sup>׳₪׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”], ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳¢ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳•׳’ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳₪"׳• ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳§׳¦׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨.</small></small> [׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳™׳–׳•׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳“׳¨], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳×׳©׳׳™׳©׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳₪׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳.</small></small>.
׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳” ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳₪׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘.  ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳“. ׳©׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳¦׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ [׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳”], ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳“׳™׳“׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨׳‘׳” ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• [׳•׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳”׳¢׳“׳₪׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳” ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨׳• ׳›׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳™' ׳›׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳¦׳ ׳"׳› ׳"׳©]. ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳§׳׳•׳× ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳¢׳ ׳¨"׳ ׳•׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳₪׳©׳™׳˜ ׳¢׳ ׳׳§׳׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳ ׳׳”׳' ׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¡׳— ׳”׳™"׳“ ׳•׳”׳˜"׳–, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳₪׳©׳™׳˜ ׳›׳‘׳© ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳.
׳•׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳”׳' ׳×׳׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳₪"׳” ׳”׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳ ׳”׳₪׳ ׳™׳, ׳”׳§' ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©׳ "׳×, ׳•׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳׳‘: ׳©׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©. ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳“׳© ׳“׳•׳“ ׳§׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳‘ ׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳¡׳•׳×׳¨.
׳•׳‘׳¨׳“׳‘"׳– ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳©׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳©. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳™׳˜׳‘"׳ ׳•׳”׳׳׳™׳¨׳™ ׳©׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳™' ׳”׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳‘׳—׳™' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳. ׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳” ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳. ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳›׳ "׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¢׳¨׳"׳  ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳׳‘: ׳•׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳˜.</small></small>].
׳”"׳׳©׳—׳§" ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳¡׳˜׳ ׳“׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳•׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳׳ "׳׳©׳—׳§" ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳’׳‘ ׳©׳™׳—׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳”, ׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳₪׳•</sup><small><small>׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳•׳’ ׳׳¡׳×׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳˜"׳•] ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳•. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳¢ ׳¡׳˜׳ ׳“׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳׳•׳“׳• ׳׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳›׳׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳×׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳™׳“׳•, ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳© ׳—׳™ ׳₪' ׳׳§׳¥ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳¡׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳. ׳•׳“׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳¢׳™' ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳— ׳׳•׳× ׳ "׳’ ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨: ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳“, <sup>׳₪׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳ "׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳׳“׳™׳“׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳§׳¡"׳— ׳›' ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳©׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜ ׳•׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳“׳™׳“׳”.</small></small> ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ <sup>׳₪׳—</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳×. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳’׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳”, ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳׳“׳™׳“׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳¡׳“׳™׳¨ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳” ׳”׳©׳¢׳” ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳“׳™׳“׳” ׳׳׳ ׳›׳—׳׳§ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳” ׳”׳©׳¢׳”. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳׳© ׳₪"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳™"׳‘.
׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳’׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳” ׳”׳©׳¢׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳×׳©׳׳™׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳”, ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ - ׳׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳•.</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳×], ׳׳׳›׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳₪׳˜</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳–' ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳™"׳ ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳‘"׳™ ׳–׳™׳׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳¦"׳- ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳׳”׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳₪׳§׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳׳“׳™׳“׳ ׳׳•׳“׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳§׳•׳©׳™ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳"׳‘ ׳›׳©׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’, ׳¢׳›"׳“].
׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳“׳’ ׳—׳™ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳—.</small></small> [׳“׳’׳™׳, ׳¢׳•׳₪׳•׳×, ׳‘׳”׳׳•׳×], ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳•׳›׳£ ׳׳©׳₪׳” <sup>׳¦</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£, ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳.</small></small>, ׳§׳ ׳§׳•׳׳˜ <sup>׳¦׳</sup><small><small>׳’׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳—׳׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳§׳ ׳§׳•׳׳˜ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳• ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳—׳׳‘, ׳•׳›׳©׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳“ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳›׳.</small></small>, ׳׳’׳¨׳˜׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳, <sup>׳¦׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• [׳׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳¨׳—׳™׳], ׳׳‘׳ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳׳“׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳₪"׳’ ׳׳•׳× ׳™'. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳“׳¡׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳”"׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳¡׳™׳].</small></small> ׳˜׳¨׳׳•׳¡, ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳˜׳”, ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™ ׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, [׳›׳™׳¡׳׳•׳×, <sup>׳¦׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳׳•' ׳”׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳”. ׳׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳₪"׳• ׳”׳¢' ׳’' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳×׳“׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳׳. </small></small> ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”]. ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¡׳›׳•"׳ ׳•׳§׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳©׳” ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳.
׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¢׳“ ׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳”, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”. <sup>׳¦׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢׳“ ׳©׳‘׳“׳§׳• ׳‘׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳׳™׳׳•׳“ - ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.
׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳ ׳"׳› ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳”׳• ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳”, ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳‘׳•׳“׳§׳™׳ ׳¡׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳˜׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳—׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ '׳¡׳₪׳§', ׳•׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳ ׳•: ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳“׳§׳• ׳¡׳₪׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳—׳§ ׳™׳¢׳§׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳׳•׳× ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳˜ ׳‘׳©"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳“׳§׳• ׳¡׳₪׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳©׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳׳׳” ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” [׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳׳‘: ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳¨׳"׳  ׳©׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳׳: ׳׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳׳™׳©׳¨׳™ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳–] ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳“׳¢ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳¢׳“ ׳"׳› ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳•׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳“ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨.</small></small>
<h3> ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×, ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× <sup>׳¦׳”</sup><small><small>׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳§׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳₪׳©׳™׳˜ ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳©׳—׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” [׳₪"׳™ ׳¡׳˜"׳•] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳•׳–׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳™. ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳–. [׳“"׳” ׳”׳›׳] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳₪ ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳—׳˜׳” ׳׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¡׳—. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¡׳— ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳₪ ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. </small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳¦׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ [׳׳ ׳׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳•] ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳“׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×. ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳— ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–. ׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳ "׳—.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳. ׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳’׳"׳— ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.
<h3> ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳•׳¡׳›׳•"׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳¦׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳“'.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳›׳•"׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳§׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳©׳” ׳•׳”׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳×׳“׳™׳¨, ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <sup>׳¦׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳’, ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳©׳›' ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳”]. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳’: ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳” ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳×׳©׳׳™׳©׳” ׳×׳“׳™׳¨ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳”"׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳×׳©׳׳™׳©׳• ׳×׳“׳™׳¨.</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳¡׳›׳•"׳ ׳•׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳©׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳ ׳×׳“׳™׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳×׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”] <sup>׳¦׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§]. ׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” [׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳₪"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳'], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳–. ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳•׳—׳™"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳™ ׳“׳£ ׳§׳›׳“. ׳©׳›' ׳©׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳–׳›׳¨׳• ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳©׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳’ ׳׳•׳× ׳'.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳”. <sup>׳§</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳• ׳×׳©׳¨׳™ ׳×׳©׳ "׳” ׳¢׳' ׳׳•].</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳–"׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳•.
׳•׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳–׳”: 
BB<b>׳</b>. ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳§, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳§ ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳•׳, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳§ <sup>׳§׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳˜"׳–. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” [׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳׳’׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳§, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳”].</small></small>. [׳”׳¨׳—׳‘׳” ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳×׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳”].
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳¡׳₪׳¡׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳˜ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳¨׳’׳, ׳׳‘׳–׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳˜ ׳׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳” <sup>׳§׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳“׳§ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳], ׳•׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳‘׳¨.</small></small>, ׳•׳”׳¨׳’׳ ׳•׳”׳׳‘׳–׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳•׳. [׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¢׳’׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳˜ ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳’׳׳’׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳’׳׳’׳׳™׳, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳§׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳׳•' ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳׳•, ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳’׳׳’׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳’׳׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳” ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳׳’׳, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¡' ׳ ׳—׳׳× ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ [׳¢׳' ׳¨׳׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳’׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳˜ ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳’׳׳’׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳” ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳¢"׳™ ׳“׳—׳™׳₪׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™ ׳‘׳”׳›׳™ ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳˜׳• ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳’׳׳’׳׳™׳ [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳•׳] ׳׳– ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.</small></small>].
׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳”: ׳”׳׳—׳“, ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¡׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ <b>׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×</b> ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳× [׳©׳׳– ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳×׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¡׳]. ׳”׳©׳ ׳™, ׳׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳©׳‘ ׳׳“׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¡׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳• ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳•׳׳”׳©׳¢׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¡׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳•. <sup>׳§׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳ ׳•׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳‘' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳“׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳§. ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘].</small></small>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳˜׳•׳₪׳— ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳˜׳₪׳™׳—. ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳ "׳˜, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳. </small></small> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ [׳•׳¡׳׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳§׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳"׳•. ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳¡׳§׳§׳¢"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳§"׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳׳¨׳˜׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳].
<b>׳’</b>. ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳™׳ [׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“] ׳•׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳™׳×׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳•, <sup>׳§׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”.</small></small> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳•׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳™׳—׳‘׳¨׳ ׳•. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳§׳™׳ <b>׳“׳¨׳›׳</b> ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳¨. <sup>׳§׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜, ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘.</small></small> EE
<h3> ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳׳™׳׳•׳¡</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• <b>׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨</b> ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡ <b>׳׳ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©,</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨. <sup>׳§׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.</small></small> [׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ <sup>׳§׳™</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳” ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small>].
׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• <b>׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨</b> ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳₪׳— ׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳¨׳™׳§] ׳׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳§׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳§ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳’׳ ׳‘ [׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨], ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”. <sup>׳§׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳¨"׳ ׳•׳‘׳¢׳”"׳ ׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳¦׳ [׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳”], ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳§׳¦׳× ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳” ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>
<h3> ׳ ׳•׳׳“</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. <sup>׳§׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ [׳›׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳× ׳”׳’׳' ׳¨׳™׳© ׳‘׳™׳¦׳”] ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳˜׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳’, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>
׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳”׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳™׳™׳¢׳•׳“׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, <sup>׳§׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳” ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳. ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘] ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳•'. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'], ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳¨׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“, ׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳‘"׳— ׳•׳˜"׳– ׳•׳"׳¨ ׳•׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳£ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳•׳׳“</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳•׳׳“ [׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×]: ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳“׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, <sup>׳§׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘, ׳'. </small></small> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳¨׳£ ׳׳₪׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳“, <sup>׳§׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳•.</small></small> ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳–׳’׳, <sup>׳§׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳₪׳©׳•׳˜, ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳—׳“׳©, ׳•׳׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳©׳ ׳“׳ ׳” ׳”׳’׳' [׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•.] ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳›"׳© ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳׳™ ׳ ׳™׳¡׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳“. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> ׳׳™׳- ׳©׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨- ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳ ׳•׳×. <sup>׳§׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘. ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳–׳” ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳.</small></small>
׳׳ ׳’׳©׳ <sup>׳§׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•. ׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳›׳•׳׳׳× ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳׳”׳' ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳•׳× ׳›"׳˜ ׳©׳׳”׳•"׳ ׳‘׳’׳' ׳’׳©׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘]. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳¢׳ ׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳“׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳’׳׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳’׳×׳™׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳›׳’׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳¨׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳ ׳™׳. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳’ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳©׳•׳׳˜׳× ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳— ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳’׳× ׳”׳׳“׳.</small></small> [׳•׳©׳׳’ <sup>׳§׳›</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳›, ׳™', ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳’. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳™"׳— ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. (׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳©׳׳’ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳¦"׳¢, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳“׳™׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳¦"׳¢- ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§"׳– ׳©׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳©׳©׳׳’ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”).</small></small>] ׳•׳˜׳ <sup>׳§׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳', ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳, ׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳ "׳.</small></small> ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳“׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳§׳¨׳— ׳•׳©׳•׳׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳₪׳©׳¨׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳§׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳˜"׳–. ׳•׳‘׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳©׳¨׳× ׳§׳¨׳— ׳•׳©׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳‘.</small></small> [׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳©׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” <sup>׳§׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§"׳–. ׳•׳›' ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳¢' ׳™' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳©׳¨׳• ׳•׳ ׳•׳׳“׳• [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳"׳”], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>].

<h3> ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨</h3>
**INDEX_WRITE=</b>
<b> <sup>׳§׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡: ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳˜׳₪׳ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳• [׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳׳–. ׳“"׳” ׳”׳], ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳”, ׳“׳׳£ ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳›׳©׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳™׳—׳¡ ׳’׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨.  ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳] ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳˜׳₪׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—].  ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳‘"׳— ׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳˜"׳– ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳”׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳˜׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳ ׳— ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳‘"׳— ׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳׳• ׳׳.</small></small></b>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳•׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ <sup>׳§׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳₪׳ "׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳”: ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳“"׳” ׳“׳׳™׳× ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳"׳› ׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳–׳‘׳• ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳§׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳' ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳"׳› ׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳, ׳•׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳¡׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•. [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳˜׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳›׳™ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•"׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳׳].
׳׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳§׳˜׳• ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳, ׳›"׳› ׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜'] ׳•׳”׳×׳”׳׳” ׳׳“׳•׳“ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'] ׳•׳›׳ ׳›' ׳‘׳₪׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳“"׳” ׳׳‘׳]. ׳’׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳™׳¢׳§׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• [׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳›' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳'], ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳¦׳“׳“ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳׳© ׳₪"׳‘ ׳“׳£ ׳׳•].</small></small>], ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳— ׳¢"׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• <sup>׳§׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳—.</small></small>- ׳׳• ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳›׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳” <sup>׳§׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳–. </small></small>- ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳, ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×, <sup>׳§׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳“'. ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳׳•׳× ׳'.</small></small> ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳™׳©׳׳© ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳§׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳׳•׳× ׳’' ׳•׳׳•׳× ׳“'. </small></small>, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳ ׳”׳₪׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. <sup>׳§׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small> [׳•׳‘׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳•].
<h3> ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳–.</b> ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ <b>׳™׳•׳×׳¨</b> ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ <sup>׳§׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳—'. ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳•׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small> [׳•׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“']. ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳’׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳˜׳‘׳— ׳•׳׳’׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳™׳“׳”.
׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳ ׳׳“׳“׳× ׳׳₪׳™ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨. <sup>׳§׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳’.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳“׳× ׳׳₪׳™ ׳¢׳¨׳›׳• ׳”׳׳׳™׳×׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• <sup>׳§׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳’"׳ ׳׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳×׳• ׳•׳׳–׳” ׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳’', ׳¢׳™"׳©. ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳›' ׳©׳›׳™׳›׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳™׳§׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳’', ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳”׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳¡' ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳¡' ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳”].</small></small>. ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳“׳“ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ <b>׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳•</b> ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳¢׳¨׳›׳• ׳”׳׳׳™׳×׳™ <sup>׳§׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¡"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳”׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×] ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘.</small></small>.
[׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳‘׳׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳¢"׳’].
<h3> ׳׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥</h3>
<b>׳›׳—.</b> ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳©׳• ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳”׳, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳’׳ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳”׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ <sup>׳§׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳“', ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ '׳©׳׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳×׳•' ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳”׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¡"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳“'.</small></small> [׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳׳ ׳¨׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳].
׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳§׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳¨׳× ׳›׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳—׳׳” ׳›׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳× ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳•׳›׳׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳, ׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘].
׳•׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳׳¡׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳•׳”׳׳©׳” ׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳× ׳‘׳¢׳׳”, ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡.</small></small>, ׳©׳”׳׳©׳” ׳›׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳ ׳™׳• ׳•׳‘׳ ׳•׳×׳™׳• <sup>׳§׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳׳×, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳×׳. ׳׳ ׳‘׳§׳˜׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳©׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳¡׳’׳™ ׳‘׳׳—׳©׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳•׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳–]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳–' ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳§׳˜׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳×.
׳’׳•׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳׳• ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ <sup>׳§׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳‘' ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳©׳.</small></small> [׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳˜׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳’׳•׳™ <sup>׳§׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳˜.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳— ׳‘׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳×׳• ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <b>׳™׳©׳׳©</b> ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳©׳ ׳›׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• [׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳’׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳׳˜׳‘׳— ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳©׳™׳“׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳—׳׳§׳ ׳׳, ׳•׳׳—׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳§׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳›׳׳.</small></small>] ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡. <sup>׳§׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—. ׳•׳‘׳׳₪׳” ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“, ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳˜.</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳™׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳].
**INDEX_WRITE=<b>
<h3> ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨</h3>
**INDEX_WRITE=</b>
<b>׳.</b> ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡: 
BB׳. <b>׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“</b> ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳ <b>׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×</b> ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳• ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ <sup>׳§׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳“'.</small></small>.
׳‘. ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳©׳›׳— ׳׳¡׳׳§׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡. [׳•׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳©׳›׳— ׳׳¡׳׳§׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳•] <sup>׳§׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳›.</small></small>. ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳©׳›׳—׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡.
׳’. ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳©׳׳© ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳™׳©׳׳© ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. <sup>׳§׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜.</small></small>
׳“. ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳”׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳׳•׳ ׳— ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡. <sup>׳§׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳”׳‘"׳— ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳¦"׳¢ ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳§' ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“, ׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳” ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳׳•׳× ׳“ ׳•׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳“׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳—׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡, ׳•׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” [׳׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳] ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳˜"׳– ׳›' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳— ׳¡׳§׳ "׳‘.  [׳•׳™׳© ׳§׳¦׳× ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' '׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳‘׳׳™׳' ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳—׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡].  ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳– ׳’׳ ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡, ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳›׳©׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳– ׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳ ׳— ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳•.</small></small> ׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳׳˜׳‘׳™ ׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” ׳”׳׳—׳–׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳”.
׳”. ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳¢׳¨׳ [׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳׳•׳“], ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳ ׳”׳₪׳ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. <sup>׳§׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳–. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳"׳, ׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳’׳¨׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳‘׳•. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳›׳ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳׳™׳•.</small></small> EE
<h3> ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳¢׳׳™׳•</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳• ׳•׳™׳™׳¢׳•׳“׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳, ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳“. <sup>׳§׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳— ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳¡"׳—. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳›׳©׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳. ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳ ׳§ ׳׳׳¢׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳©׳׳•, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳•׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳•].</small></small> ׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳•׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨.
׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢' ׳§׳¡"׳—.
׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳’׳© ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳‘׳“, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳— ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳¡"׳—.
<h3> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨: ׳׳’׳© ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳ ׳•׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× <sup>׳§׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳›' ׳©׳”׳›׳ [׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳©׳׳] ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳›' ׳©׳”׳׳—׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳•"׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳ ׳›' ׳©׳”׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳•׳"׳› ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳×]. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳– ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳¡"׳“.</small></small>, ׳׳¨׳ ׳§ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳›׳¡׳£ <sup>׳§׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳–'.</small></small>, ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳× ׳©׳ ׳₪׳— ׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳©׳₪׳” <sup>׳§׳ </sup><small><small>׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳׳˜׳‘׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳× ׳׳׳©׳₪׳”, ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳— ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© [׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳•׳¢׳×׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳”׳₪׳— ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™, ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳£ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳•, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳׳•׳–׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳“ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳"׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳].</small></small> [׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳§׳¡׳¨ <sup>׳§׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳” ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳.</small></small>, <b>׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳×</b> ׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨׳™׳].
<h3> ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳¢׳×׳•</h3>
<b>׳׳’.</b> ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <sup>׳§׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳׳“: ׳“"׳” ׳™׳© ׳”׳§' ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳™"׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳©׳›׳— ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳—׳©׳™׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™"׳‘] ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳©׳. </small></small>, ׳׳• ׳©׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳• ׳§׳˜׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳, ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳ ׳— ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳ <sup>׳§׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳  ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳›' ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳–' ׳“"׳” ׳׳˜׳”. ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳–, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳—, ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳• ׳©׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ [׳•׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳”, ׳©׳”׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳— ׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”].
׳•׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <b>׳׳ ׳¢׳¨</b> ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳.
<b>׳ ׳₪׳</b> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡</h3>
<b>׳׳“.</b> ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡, ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•, <sup>׳§׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–. ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳› ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳₪"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳“׳”"׳” ׳׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳™׳’׳ ׳‘ ׳׳• ׳™׳×׳§׳׳§׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳™׳’׳ ׳‘ ׳׳• ׳™׳×׳§׳׳§׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small> ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳×׳’׳׳’׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳₪׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳™׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳•׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳§׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳—'. </small></small>, <b>׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•</b>.
[׳׳™׳׳×׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ - ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳• ׳©׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳™׳©׳‘׳¨׳• ׳‘׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳™׳©׳‘׳¨׳ ׳• <sup>׳§׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳‘"׳— [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳– ׳™׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳’']. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳”׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳’׳׳™׳•׳ [׳‘׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳—׳“׳©׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳¡׳•׳”׳• ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳¡׳•׳”׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™].</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'].
<b>׳׳”.</b> ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳›׳, <b>׳©׳›׳—</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ <sup>׳§׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳‘"׳™ ׳•׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳”'. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳  ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳‘.
׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳–׳›׳¨׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳– [׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳¡"׳”] ׳©׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳×, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳©׳•׳›׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳׳• ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳] ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•.</small></small>.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, <b>׳©׳›׳—</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳›׳¡׳, ׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳ ׳•׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳ ׳•׳₪׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳¡׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳›׳¡׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳¡׳ <sup>׳§׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳“'. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳™׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳׳• ׳™׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳•, ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small>.
׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳” [׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ "׳].
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳“׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳“׳׳× ׳׳§׳¨׳¨</h3>
<b>׳׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳— ׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳— ׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳׳× ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳׳˜׳‘׳—, ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳׳׳¨׳•׳, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳• <sup>׳§׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳׳׳¢׳׳”, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳”"׳” ׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳©׳׳©׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳©׳›' ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳–׳”. [׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¦"׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”].</small></small>. [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×].
<h3> ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳×, ׳‘׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳×, ׳‘׳׳’׳© ׳•׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳</h3>
<b>׳׳–.</b> ׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳§׳¡</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳–. ׳©׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳“׳©׳׳”׳‘׳×.</small></small>, ׳•׳”׳©׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳§׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳’׳ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™׳• [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳”, ׳' ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳©׳”׳©׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”].</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳“׳•׳׳§ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳§׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳"׳’. [׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳§ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳–].</small></small>, ׳•׳"׳› ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳×׳—׳×׳ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳›׳‘׳• ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ [׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳§׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳• ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¡"׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳].
׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳₪׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ <b> [׳”׳©׳׳ ׳•]׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× <sup>׳§׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳׳• ׳¡׳’׳™ ׳©׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳"׳› ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳’׳© [׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳× ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳•, <sup>׳§׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳"׳› ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳׳™׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳’׳© ׳¢׳¦׳׳•. <sup>׳§׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳. ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨
