׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” <b>׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•</b>, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳§׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳— ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳©׳₪׳׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳©׳׳ ׳•׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳׳™׳”׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳™׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳. ׳•׳”"׳  ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳’׳© ׳©׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ [׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.
׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳’׳©׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× "׳™׳”׳™ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳" ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡.
[׳•׳”׳©׳×׳ ׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳–׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳, ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳©׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳•׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳].
׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳©׳‘׳×׳™ ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡.  ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳©׳›' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳›׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳”. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳” ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳"׳ ׳׳§׳¦׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳–׳”. ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡.  ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳×׳™׳’׳ ׳‘, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small>].
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳”׳׳’׳© ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ <b>׳׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳×</b> ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ <sup>׳§׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳• [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳§׳¢</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢"׳₪ ׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• [׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳• ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¡"׳”] ׳©׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳×׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳₪׳׳•׳˜ ׳׳§׳™׳©׳•׳˜ ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳"׳› ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•.</small></small>] ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ <b>׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳×</b> ׳¢׳¦׳׳ [׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳–׳”׳‘ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] <sup>׳§׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳”] ׳”׳§' ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳—׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡, ׳•׳›' ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•- '׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’''. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳ ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳ ׳׳“׳“ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳׳™׳×׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳’. [׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳“׳’׳© ׳©׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳”]. ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳"׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳– ׳‘׳—׳‘׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳§׳¦׳•׳×׳™׳•, ׳•׳׳"׳  ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳™׳×׳™׳× ׳"׳› ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳"׳› ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳—׳. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳• ׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳׳™׳×׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳•].</small></small>, ׳•׳׳– ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨ <sup>׳§׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳×׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳• ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳—'.</small></small> ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳›׳ "׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨.
׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳× ׳©׳™׳×׳™׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳ <sup>׳§׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¡"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘. [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳ "׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳"׳ ׳™׳© ׳ "׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳׳™׳–׳” ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳¦׳].
׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳, ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳•׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳• ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳¢׳¨׳›׳• ׳”׳׳׳™׳×׳™.
׳׳׳ ׳, ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳§׳•׳׳ ׳–׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨׳›׳• ׳”׳׳׳™׳×׳™ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳” ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳©׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳— ׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳©׳‘ ׳•׳”׳’׳“׳” ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳— ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳’׳“׳”, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳•׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳”׳׳•׳“׳“ ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳›׳׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳–׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳].</small></small>. ׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳× ׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳—׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳× ׳–׳• ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ <sup>׳§׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ "׳ ׳¦׳¨׳" ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳“ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨.</small></small>.
׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳¡"׳— ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳”.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳</h3>
<b>׳׳—.</b> ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳”׳₪׳× [׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳©׳׳] ׳׳• ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳–׳”׳‘ [׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳×], ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳¢׳ <b>׳”׳׳’׳© <sup>׳§׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳¡"׳—.</small></small></b> ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ [׳׳• ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳• <sup>׳§׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳›׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳™׳©׳‘׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳•.</small></small>] ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳—׳׳§׳™ <b>׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳</b> ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳׳›׳׳” ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳ ׳×׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳”׳׳›׳” [׳¡׳™׳•׳ ׳×׳©׳¡"׳—] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳’׳׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜'] ׳׳ ׳›׳.</small></small> [׳•׳׳– ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”], ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳—׳×׳ ׳¢׳ <b>׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜</b> ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳× <b>׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜</b> ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•, ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳×׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳ <sup>׳§׳¢׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳©׳׳• ׳•׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳׳, ׳׳’"׳ ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳”׳׳₪׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳˜.</b> ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳ ׳•׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳×, ׳’׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳• <sup>׳§׳¢׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳. ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳“.</small></small> ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳×, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳׳₪׳” <b>׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳×</b> ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳.
׳”׳׳₪׳” ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨. <sup>׳§׳₪</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳˜׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳, ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳].</small></small> ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳”׳–׳™׳– ׳׳× ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳₪׳” ׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× <sup>׳§׳₪׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳- ׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳”׳׳₪׳” [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™ ׳©׳¨׳“ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳˜"׳–], ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳©׳׳¨ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳”׳׳₪׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳” ׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳.</small></small>.
׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳׳’׳© ׳•׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× [׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳×] ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳”׳¢' ׳¡"׳” !].
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳›׳‘׳• ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳׳•׳</h3>

<b>׳.</b> ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳™׳©׳‘׳¨׳• ׳׳• ׳™׳’׳ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳£ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ <b>׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳›׳‘׳•</b>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳”׳׳₪׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳ ׳¨ <sup>׳§׳₪׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳’, ׳©׳›׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨' ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ [׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳”.] ׳•׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳¨' ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳¢׳×׳™׳“ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳” [׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳§׳₪׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳— ׳©׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳× ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳, ׳•׳׳¡׳™׳™׳- '׳•׳¦"׳¢'.</small></small>] ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳”׳•׳₪׳›׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳›׳•׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳‘׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” <sup>׳§׳₪׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳"׳.</small></small> [׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳‘׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳©׳•׳׳—׳ <sup>׳§׳₪׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳˜׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳”׳•׳₪׳›׳× ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡. ׳©׳.</small></small>], ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳׳’׳™׳¨׳”. [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ <b>׳”׳׳’׳™׳¨׳”</b> ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘ ׳–׳” <sup>׳§׳₪׳•</sup><small><small>׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳›' ׳•׳¦"׳¢, ׳•׳”׳¢׳×׳™׳§׳• ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳—, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳’׳“</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳’׳“ [׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳©׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳”], ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳¡ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳• [׳›׳׳• ׳›׳™׳¡ ׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳] ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳”׳›׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ [׳•׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳›׳¡׳£ ׳׳׳ ׳• <sup>׳§׳₪׳–</sup><small><small>׳•׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡.  ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳ "׳’ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳›׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳§׳₪׳—</sup><small><small>׳“׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳”׳©׳"׳© ׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳›׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳•׳׳, ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳™׳“׳• ׳׳›׳™׳¡ ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜].</small></small>], ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳© ׳׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳›׳™׳¡ [׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡ ׳—׳•׳׳¦׳”] ׳׳– ׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳¢׳•׳× <sup>׳§׳₪׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳‘׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳‘׳’׳“, ׳©׳׳˜׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳—׳׳™׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳.
׳׳ <b>׳©׳›׳—</b> ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳¡׳£ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳™׳¡ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡, ׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳›׳¡׳£ ׳׳™׳“, ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳›׳¡׳£ ׳™׳׳‘׳“ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳›׳¡׳£ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳©׳×׳׳¨ ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳• ׳©׳ <sup>׳§׳¦</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ [׳¢׳™' ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳], ׳׳ ׳›' ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳׳× ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳×׳™׳׳× ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳©׳×׳׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳•׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.  ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” [׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳“׳©׳•׳×, ׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳¡׳•׳”׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳¡׳•׳”׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳] ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨.  ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳•, ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳™, ׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡ ׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳“׳]. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™</h3>
<b>׳׳’.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳ <sup>׳§׳¦׳</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™, ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳›׳•׳׳׳×- ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳׳”׳' ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳—׳׳§ ׳‘' ׳׳•׳× ׳” [׳¢׳™"׳© ׳©׳׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳¦"׳¢] ׳•׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'] ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¢׳' ׳₪-׳₪׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳•. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳“׳•׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳’. ׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳“: ׳“"׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳›' ׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳’׳׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'.
׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳¦׳׳”"׳› ׳”׳•׳ 13.5 ׳“׳§' ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳”, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳¢"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳’'.</small></small> ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×, ׳׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳˜׳׳” ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳§׳¦׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳‘', ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜, ׳', ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳—, ׳‘' ׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳•׳׳” ׳ ׳•׳™ ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳”"׳ ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳‘׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳.</small></small> ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.
[׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'].
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳’׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳’׳©], ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ <sup>׳§׳¦׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳"׳–, ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳˜.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳˜׳₪׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× <sup>׳§׳¦׳“</sup><small><small>׳•׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳™׳×׳׳•׳© ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳’. ׳•׳‘׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“. ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳. ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¨ <sup>׳§׳¦׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳˜.</small></small>.
- ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳” ׳•׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳”׳×׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳. - ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™ײ´׳™׳—׳“ ׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'.
<h3> ׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™</h3>
<b>׳׳“.</b> ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳•׳’׳ ׳“׳—׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳™׳, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳©"׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳’"׳› ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳׳ [׳©׳¢׳¦׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳“׳—׳™׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳¦׳•</sup><small><small>׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳›׳“: ׳“"׳” ׳׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳“׳§׳“׳§, ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳™׳×׳׳•׳©, ׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳”׳¢' ׳¨'.</small></small>], ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳×׳ ׳׳™׳- ׳׳• ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳“׳—׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ <sup>׳§׳¦׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳‘', ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳§׳¦׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳˜׳׳”, ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳×׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳ ׳“׳—׳™׳™׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¨"׳• ׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳.</small></small>].
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳”׳×׳¨׳›׳›׳• ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳×׳¨׳›׳›׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳§׳¦׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳‘'.</small></small> [׳׳£ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳¨׳›׳›׳•, ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢' ׳¨"׳•], ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳—׳˜׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳—׳˜׳” <sup>׳¨</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳—. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¥ ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳“׳—׳™׳”- ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳§.</small></small>, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳“׳—׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ <sup>׳¨׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳¢"׳₪ ׳–׳” ׳§׳¦׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳‘׳™׳¨׳“׳• ׳’׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳×׳₪׳—׳• ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳ ׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳©׳• ׳”׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳”׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳“׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳“׳—׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳–׳¨׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳§׳‘׳• <b>׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳₪׳¨</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳“׳—׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳™׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳•׳“׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳׳” <sup>׳¨׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳‘'. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳•׳©׳¨׳©. ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳•.  ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳“׳—׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳–׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©] ׳׳£ ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳˜׳‘׳</h3>
<b>׳׳”.</b> ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳˜׳‘׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳׳£ ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳×׳¨׳•"׳, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”] ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳×׳¨׳•"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¨׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳” [׳“׳׳׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳–' ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳'], ׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳' ׳׳¢׳©׳¨ ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”"׳— ׳•׳”"׳˜, ׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳”׳' ׳“׳׳׳™ [׳¡׳™' ׳˜' ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳‘׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳”׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳×], ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳×׳¨׳•"׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳×׳ ׳׳™.</small></small>.
׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳˜׳‘׳ ׳©׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳×׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳’׳• ׳“׳׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¨׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳׳’., ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳”.</small></small>. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳–׳™׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳×.
<h3> ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳ [׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×]</h3>
<b>׳׳•.</b> ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳—׳™׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨, ׳•׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳™׳— ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳׳ ׳• <sup>׳¨׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ [׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳›׳•:].</small></small>.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳×׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳¡׳₪׳’׳• ׳”׳×׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ [׳׳£ ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¨׳•</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳' ׳׳¢׳©׳¨ ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”"׳—, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©. ׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© [׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•] ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳›׳™׳•"׳‘].  ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳₪׳™' [׳‘׳©׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳:] ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳"׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳“׳—׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳¦"׳¢, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳"׳› ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳×׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳“׳—׳™׳™׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳– ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳. [׳׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳™].</small></small>], ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳™׳— ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳–׳”.
[׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳” "׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳" ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳’׳׳¨ ׳׳׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳§׳¨׳” ׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳•׳™׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳›׳׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¨׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™' [׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”, ׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–].</small></small>].
<h3> ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳–.</b> ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¢׳“׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳‘׳ ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳—׳–"׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳× ׳׳× ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳, ׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳›׳׳ ׳“׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳©"׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¨׳—</sup><small><small>׳§׳•׳‘"׳© ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳•', ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳”'. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳©׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳›׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ "׳›׳׳™" ׳׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳¢׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳•׳›׳ "׳, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳—׳–"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳× ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳©׳"׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳"׳› ׳׳” ׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳–׳” ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳›"׳• ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳ ׳›׳, ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳©׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳—׳–"׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳©׳ "׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳" <sup>׳¨׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™'] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳‘ ׳•׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’].</small></small> [׳׳ ׳›׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳˜׳׳” ׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳”].
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” "׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™", ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳© <sup>׳¨׳™</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳›׳™׳‘׳¡׳• ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× - ׳˜׳•׳₪׳— ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳˜׳₪׳™׳— - ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳§׳•׳‘"׳© ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳™׳© ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”. ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳™׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳©׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳›׳.  ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳™' ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳¢׳׳, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳“׳¨׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¢ ׳׳”׳§׳¦׳׳×׳•. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳ ׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳—.</b> ׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡׳• [׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳] ׳©׳“׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳›׳‘׳•, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳“ "׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳" [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳›׳‘׳• ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳], ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ <sup>׳¨׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳§' ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳"׳› ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳, ׳›׳ ׳”׳§' ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™ ׳©׳¨׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳–׳” ׳›׳׳” ׳™׳©׳•׳‘׳™׳: ׳. ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳’: ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳¢׳•׳“׳ (׳”׳©׳ ׳™) ׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳™ ׳¡׳ ׳©׳”׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ [׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳—], ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳™׳¨׳“׳• ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳©׳"׳© ׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳×׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳”. ׳•׳"׳› ׳”"׳  ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳©׳"׳© ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳“׳׳§׳• ׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳—"׳› ׳™׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳׳“. ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳©׳‘׳ ׳¨ [׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳•׳›' ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳• ׳›׳™ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳•׳‘׳”]. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–] ׳©׳”׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳. ׳‘. ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™"׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳– ׳©׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳×׳׳©׳•׳× ["׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•"], ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳ ׳•׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳“׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳™׳•׳“׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳•. [׳•׳‘׳‘"׳— ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳ ׳“׳—׳™׳™׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™, ׳¢׳™"׳©]. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳§׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳˜.</b> ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳¨, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳“׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳×׳ ׳×׳§ ׳–׳¨׳ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳“׳׳×׳• [׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§], ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳” ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳¨׳”, <sup>׳¨׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳: ׳‘׳™׳× ׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳×- ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳“׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§, ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳©׳•׳ "׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™" ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¨׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳׳•׳× ׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳׳©׳"׳› ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” [׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳–], ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳›׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳, ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™, ׳"׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳׳׳ ׳©׳§׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™׳× [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳“׳—׳™׳™׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳“׳¨ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳—׳™׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳]. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳—.  ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳™׳© ׳©׳׳¡׳¨׳•, ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘, ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™.</small></small> [׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳– ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳×].
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳׳§׳¨׳¨</h3>
<b>׳ .</b> ׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ <sup>׳¨׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•׳ ׳׳™׳© [׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳] ׳•׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳—] ׳•׳”׳”׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳] ׳•׳”׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳– ׳•׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳–] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳› ׳•׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳₪] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™'] ׳•׳׳¦׳™"׳ [׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳¢׳.</small></small> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳, ׳•׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• <b>׳׳™׳“</b> ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳׳§ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳¢ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• <sup>׳¨׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳˜׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳• ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜'].</small></small>.  [׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳§׳₪׳™׳׳™׳ ׳—׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳—׳©׳©׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳“׳׳×, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳•].
׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ <b>׳›׳</b> ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳×, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳–, ׳›׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳¨׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳•׳™׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳”, ׳•׳”׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳ [׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¡׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳•].</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳ ׳.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳©׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳” ׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳˜׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳”׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳©, ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳© ׳•׳‘׳˜׳׳” ׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×. <sup>׳¨׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳"׳–.</small></small>
<h3> ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳•</h3>
<b>׳ ׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ [׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳¨׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳”, ׳' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™.</small></small>] ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳• ׳׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳•, ׳•׳–׳”׳• ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• <sup>׳¨׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳”, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳ . ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳‘׳˜׳׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ [׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳ ׳“: ׳“"׳” ׳•׳”׳, ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳׳’. ׳“"׳” ׳“׳׳‘׳˜׳, ׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳›"׳’ ׳”"׳”, ׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳›], ׳•׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳׳‘: ׳“"׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳§׳•׳‘׳¢׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳•׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳• ׳‘׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳‘' ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳ "׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳]. ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳›' ׳©׳™׳© ׳’' ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳’. ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳™׳"׳¢, ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳”. ׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳˜׳‘"׳ ׳›' ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳. 
׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳™"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳’ ׳×׳׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳¦"׳ ׳“׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳¢׳•׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳, ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳—, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳¨, ׳¢׳™' ׳׳•׳¨ ׳–׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳˜ ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳¨.  [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳•, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳’׳׳™׳•׳].</small></small>.  [׳•׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¨׳›</sup><small><small>׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳ ׳“: ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’.</small></small>].
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳×׳—׳×׳™׳• ׳ ׳”׳₪׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© <sup>׳¨׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳ ׳“: ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳›׳—: ׳©׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳"׳” ׳‘׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳¡׳×׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳×׳—׳×׳ [׳•׳‘׳₪׳©׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳˜׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳] ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. </small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳¨׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳”, ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳˜.</small></small> [׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ <sup>׳¨׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘׳”׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳™"׳‘.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨</h3>
<b>׳ ׳’.</b> ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳• ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ [׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡- ׳¢׳™' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳‘], ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ <b>׳׳™׳“</b> ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳›׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳ ׳©׳׳˜ ׳׳׳׳™׳• <sup>׳¨׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'. [׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳’'].</small></small>], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ <b>׳™׳›׳•׳</b> ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳¨׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳“"׳” ׳׳˜׳”.</small></small> [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¢׳]. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳׳׳” ׳™׳§׳¨׳”] ׳׳• ׳׳— ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳™ ׳׳– ׳™׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳׳• ׳™׳׳׳¡ ׳•׳™׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳• ׳׳׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳˜׳•׳—, ׳׳–׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳×׳ ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ <sup>׳¨׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳–.</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳¨׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳©׳׳™׳©׳•. ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳¨׳™"׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳ ׳“: ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳¡׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳’].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳”</h3>
<b>׳ ׳“.</b> ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜, ׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ <b>׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳”</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ <sup>׳¨׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳©׳׳˜׳.</small></small> [׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨].
<h3> ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳ ׳”.</b> ׳¢׳ ׳׳£ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳©׳׳™׳©׳• ׳•׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳™׳, ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳• ׳©׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳›׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• <sup>׳¨׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳—׳•׳–׳¨. ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳•, ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• [׳¢׳™' ׳׳’"׳ (׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳ "׳•) ׳©׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳—׳™ ׳׳£ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳©׳׳™׳›׳• ׳׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳×, ׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳— ׳•׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'].</small></small> [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ("׳˜׳©׳•׳׳ ׳˜") ׳‘׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳×] <sup>׳¨׳</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳™׳™׳¢׳•׳“׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳׳–׳”, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳”"׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳•" ׳©׳׳”׳ ׳•׳׳–׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳. ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳‘ ׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳׳©׳₪׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳₪׳— ׳׳©׳₪׳”] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢׳•׳©׳”׳• ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳•].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™</h3>
<b>׳ ׳•.</b> ׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳›׳©׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳¨׳׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳—, ׳—' ׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳¨׳¢׳” ׳”׳©׳•׳¨׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳˜׳₪׳˜׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳‘"׳— ׳•׳”׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳—.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳׳×׳”</h3>
<b>׳ ׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳§׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳—׳׳‘ ׳¢׳“ ׳”׳¡׳•׳£, ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳¨׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳“, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳"׳” ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳ ׳”׳₪׳›׳× ׳׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳× ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳›׳׳™׳ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳׳–].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢"׳—</h3>
<b>׳ ׳—.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳¨׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳”, ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳˜. ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢"׳—, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳¢. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳’ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳—.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳©׳</h3>
<b>׳ ׳˜.</b> ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳•׳™׳—׳׳™׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳– ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳• ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳”׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™ ׳×׳—׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳–׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳•. ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳’ ׳›׳™׳¦׳“ ׳™׳ ׳”׳’ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳•.

<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›׳“ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” - ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”</h2>
<b> <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”- ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳™"׳’ ׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳•׳ ׳•׳˜׳” ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳₪"׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳¢ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳.  ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳- ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳’.  ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳›׳‘׳” ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳׳•׳- ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳.  ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳›׳™׳›׳¨ ׳׳• ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ [׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨] ׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳”- ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳• ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳™׳›׳¨ ׳׳• ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳₪׳™' ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳›׳, ׳›"׳› ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳’׳׳™׳•׳ [׳׳ ׳‘׳—׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©"׳¡ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳ ׳›׳] ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳, ׳•׳›' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳₪׳¨׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳₪׳›"׳• ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳“'. ׳•׳׳”׳׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳"׳’ ׳•׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳—׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳×׳ ׳›׳™ ׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳¢"׳™ ׳›׳™׳›׳¨ ׳׳• ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small></b>
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•</h3>
 <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳’׳“׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ "׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳" ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳•, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›' ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳›׳–. ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳¨׳’׳׳•, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳”׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳, ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™, ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳—׳“ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳•׳¨׳™ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳”׳׳™׳›׳×׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳›׳™׳‘׳×׳• ׳©׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳' ׳“׳£ ׳§׳›׳–. ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳“׳£ ׳§׳׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳ "׳— ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ "׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“".</small></small>
<b>׳.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳' ג€“ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳‘, ׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳–׳™׳–׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳×׳•, ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳׳” ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳×׳•].</small></small> ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳×׳™׳₪׳• [׳׳• ׳‘׳׳¨׳₪׳§׳• <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳– ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳©׳×׳×׳₪׳•׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™ ׳©׳¨׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳”׳—"׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¡"׳– ׳¡׳™"׳“ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳©׳×׳×׳₪׳•׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡"׳—] ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳™ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳¨׳₪׳§ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳•׳׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳© ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• [׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳"׳© ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳— ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡"׳™. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳™ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳•׳¨׳™ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳•׳ "׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“", ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“, ׳׳• ׳©׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳‘׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳₪׳§׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳₪׳§׳• ׳•׳‘׳–׳¨׳•׳¢׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•.
׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳׳©׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳₪׳§׳•, ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.
׳•׳‘׳©׳׳׳׳• ׳•׳‘׳’׳‘ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳›"׳› ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ [׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳׳׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳“׳™׳•׳§]. </small></small>], ׳•׳–׳”׳• ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•. ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳§ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳›׳ [׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳ "׳]. ׳"׳‘ ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳”. [׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“, ׳׳•׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳×׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳. ׳•׳™׳"׳¢].</small></small>. ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳‘], ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳₪׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳×.</small></small>.
׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳‘׳] ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳‘. ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳–׳” ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳׳"׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳–׳” ׳¦"׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜.</small></small>.
׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳– ׳׳× ׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳ ׳¢׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳ ׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳–׳™׳– ׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’, ׳•׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳"׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©.</small></small>.
׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡, ׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳›' ׳©׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳“ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— [׳‘׳”׳' ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳•׳‘׳”׳' ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳©׳] ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳§׳¦׳׳×׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳¢׳“׳¨ ׳™׳—׳•׳“׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳"׳’ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳©"׳˜ ׳©׳›' ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳¦"׳¢], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳–, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•' ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“. ׳׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳•׳”׳—"׳ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳×׳׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳‘׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳׳™׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳›' ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳›. ׳•׳‘׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳¡׳™׳™׳- '׳•׳¦"׳¢'.
׳•׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳. ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳ ׳•"׳› ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜, ׳' ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳™׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“. ׳’׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳ ׳“׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨.
׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳ ׳“׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳© ׳—׳™ ׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘' ׳₪' ׳׳§׳¥ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'.</small></small>.
[׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳‘'].
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘' ג€“ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“</b>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳, ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳׳—׳“, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <b>׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨</b> ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”- ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳׳© ׳׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳, ׳—'. ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳’'. ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“<b>.</b>
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳•׳× ׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳™׳–׳•׳– ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.</small></small>.
׳’׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳™׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳—'].
<h3> ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“</h3>
[׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× [׳©׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”] ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳©׳’׳•׳¨׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳‘׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ <b>׳•׳”׳©׳×׳׳©׳•׳×</b> ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™׳• ׳©׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳˜"׳•. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳•, ׳’' ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳׳™׳¦׳• ׳©׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳’׳’׳• ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳“׳•׳—׳₪׳• ׳‘׳§׳ ׳”, ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳•׳₪׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳•׳›' ׳”׳"׳‘ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳] ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳” ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳“׳•׳—׳₪׳• ׳‘׳§׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳×׳׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳"׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳–, ׳•׳׳•׳›׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳—׳™׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳§׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“.  ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳“׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>. [׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳•׳₪׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™].
׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘.</small></small> ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳”׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳›׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳›׳ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™, ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳™׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳›׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳§׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳’ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳×׳׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳•.
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳”׳•׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳— ׳׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳›׳— ׳©׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”- ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳- ׳׳]. ׳•׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳• <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳—'. ׳•׳©׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>. ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ <b>׳׳ ׳¢׳¨</b> ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳ ׳• <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘] ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳™׳—׳¡ ׳’׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳“ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳™׳—׳¡ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨. [׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨- ׳”׳¨׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”]. </small></small> [׳•׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳• <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳׳” ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳–׳”. </small></small>], ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¡׳“, ׳¢׳™' ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳.</small></small> [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳›"׳–, ׳'].
׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳™׳™׳©׳‘׳¨ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳, ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳‘"׳— [׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”]. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳ "׳•.</small></small> ׳׳• ׳™׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳×׳—׳×׳™׳•, ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳‘׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳•, ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳• <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳"׳•.</small></small>.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: <b>׳©׳›׳—</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳•׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳—'] ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳›׳¡׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳, ׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳•׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳ ׳•׳₪׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.
<h3> ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳•׳—׳– ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳•׳—׳– ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳™׳“׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“׳• ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳™׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳×׳¢׳¡׳§׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳• ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳— ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳“׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳× ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳›׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳— ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• [׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳“']. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳'. ׳•׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳©׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳•, ׳•׳׳׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳׳™, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ [׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳—׳–׳§׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳×׳™׳™׳—׳¡ ׳’׳ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳© ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”].</small></small> ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳™׳“ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳”׳©׳ ׳™׳” ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳. ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳×׳
