׳׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳•, ׳•׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¨׳].
<h3> ׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳— ׳‘׳₪׳™׳•</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’' ג€“ ׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳— ׳‘׳₪׳™׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳— ׳‘׳₪׳™׳•. <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳’', ׳"׳’. ׳•׳›' ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>
׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳— ׳‘׳₪׳™׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•. <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳¢׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳"׳› ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳"׳› ׳’׳ ׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳— ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳”], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳¡"׳— [׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳₪׳— ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳] ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳‘׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳‘.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳— ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳•. <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳¨"׳ ׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳’. ׳•׳©׳ ׳׳“׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ [׳•׳׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•] ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›' ׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ [׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳§' ׳©׳‘׳׳”׳¨׳™"׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•], ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳"׳› ׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳‘׳“. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳’: ׳©׳₪׳™' ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ - ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“].</small></small>
<h3> ׳ ׳’׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳“' - ׳ ׳’׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”</b>. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳•׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>. ׳•׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ [׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳©׳ ׳“׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳× ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳©׳].</small></small>. (׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳’׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳₪׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳©׳•׳׳¨׳•] <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳’"׳, ׳•׳›' ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳•׳“׳”"׳— ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’. ׳•׳™׳"׳¢, ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳’׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳›׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•.  ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳”׳׳ ׳§׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳§׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳‘׳“ ׳׳׳‘׳§] ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳ ׳’׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳ ׳§׳™. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›'.</small></small>). ׳•׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳’׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳’׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳• ׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳׳• ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳›׳׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”' ג€“ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳“׳•</b>. ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨</b> [׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•] ׳•׳¢׳×׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• [׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳™׳ !] ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳” <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳• ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘, ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳’' [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳“׳¢"׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳•], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳—׳›׳׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳‘׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳• ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳” ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳•׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳–.</small></small>].
׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳›׳— ׳©׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳“׳¢ ׳©׳–׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨], ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳¢׳•׳–׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™], ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳¢׳•׳–׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳’׳׳¨ ׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ! <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳¨"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳©׳•׳₪׳¨ [׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳”:] ׳׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳§׳¢ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳ ׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳׳™׳›׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳•, ׳©׳׳©׳×׳§׳¢ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳©׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳— ׳¡׳§"׳“.  ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳₪׳™' ׳ ׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳”, ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳׳©׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳©׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳¢׳₪"׳› ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳§׳¢ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•.</small></small>]. ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳–׳‘׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¨׳¢׳§"׳. ׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳׳¨"׳™ ׳“׳׳׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳–' ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳', ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳¨׳™׳§׳” ׳׳™׳“׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘] ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳׳™׳“ [׳›׳©׳™׳’׳׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳׳™׳“], ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳–׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳•׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳₪׳¡׳§׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳›"׳“ [׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”]. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳§׳¡ ׳¨׳׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳׳”׳¨׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳’. [׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳•, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©]. ׳׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳"׳’ ׳•׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳׳ ׳ ׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳”. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳©׳›"׳› ׳”׳©"׳ ׳•׳”׳˜"׳–].
׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¦"׳¢ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳׳"׳’ ׳•׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳”, ׳•׳‘׳×׳•"׳© ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳“׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳.  ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳• ׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳§' ׳׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳"׳’ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳”, ׳¦"׳ ׳©׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳‘׳׳"׳’ ׳•׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳™' ׳ ׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨.
׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳—׳׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳“׳¨׳›׳™ ׳׳©׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳×׳ "׳– ׳׳•׳× ׳”] ׳©׳›׳©׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳—׳׳” ׳•׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳”, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” [׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳¢"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳§׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™], ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳§׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳–׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳×׳™׳¨׳•׳¦׳• ׳©׳—׳™׳׳§ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨. ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳¡׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳] ׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳•, ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• [׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳™׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳׳¨"׳™ ׳“׳׳׳™ ׳₪"׳– ׳"׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳—׳“׳©. ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳’"׳]. </small></small>. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
׳”׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳’׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳—׳¨], ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳”׳׳•׳”׳ ׳׳׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ [׳•׳”׳•׳–׳›׳¨ ׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳• [׳›׳”׳¨׳"׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳”'.</small></small>] ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× "׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳×", ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳’׳׳¨ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”', ׳•׳׳£ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳ ׳™"׳ ׳©׳—׳©׳© ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳–׳• ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳”׳©׳ ׳™׳” ׳©׳”׳§׳‘׳׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳‘' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳×׳™ ׳›׳ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳¢"׳˜ ׳׳©"׳› ׳¢"׳– ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳¨׳₪׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳’' ׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳–׳•׳‘ ׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳” ׳׳׳¨׳¥. <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳™'.</small></small> ׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳™׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳×׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳, ׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳׳¨"׳™ ׳“׳׳׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳–' ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳', ׳©׳”׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳¨׳™׳§׳” ׳׳™׳“׳•.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨.
׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳•׳™׳˜׳¨׳™׳ ׳” ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳‘׳” ׳ ׳¨׳•׳×, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳›' ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳©׳™׳× ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳“׳”"׳” ׳׳“׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳•׳™׳˜׳¨׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳×. ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳¢׳” ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳–׳–׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳, ׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳“׳™׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳”׳–׳–׳”, ׳׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳” [׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳“׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳] ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳›׳ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳. [׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”].
׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳™׳˜׳¨׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳”׳‘׳×, ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳©׳”׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳” ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳׳₪׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳“׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳₪׳”, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳›' ׳”׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳› ׳”׳¢' ׳¨"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•' ג€“ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™</b>. ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳׳¦׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳ײ·׳©ײ°׳”׳•ײ¼׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳” <b>׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’, ׳—', ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳ ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small></b> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ! <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳• ׳’׳“׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¡ ׳•׳“׳•׳—׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳“׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡' ׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳]. ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳›"׳‘ ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¡, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳‘׳¨׳"׳© ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳–. ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳”׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳•׳׳£ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳›' ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳’׳׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳’׳•׳£]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳׳×׳§׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™], ׳•׳›׳ ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳‘׳•׳“׳“׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨.</small></small>], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳•׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳“.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳’׳“׳¨ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳“׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳׳” ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳•׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳–׳” <b>׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳</b>, ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <b>׳׳׳•׳¡</b> ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ <b>׳—׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳“׳¨</b> ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™], ׳•׳׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡ [׳©׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳›' ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳ ׳™, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳˜׳ ׳™׳¡.</small></small>] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜, ׳‘'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™: ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳, <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small> ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳׳•׳›׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳›׳, <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳“' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳›׳׳™.</small></small> ׳׳™ ׳ ׳˜"׳™ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳×, <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳—, ׳—' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small> ׳˜׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳§׳™, ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳§׳™׳¡׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳”, <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳—, ׳‘' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜.</small></small> ׳¢׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳• "׳׳§׳§" ׳—׳™׳™׳ [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳”] ׳׳• ׳׳×׳™׳ <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳•: ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¢׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳×, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳›' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳—׳™. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳• "׳׳§׳§" ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨. ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ [׳•׳׳ ׳₪׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ - ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳¦׳™׳“׳” (׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–')].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨ [׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'] ׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨, <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳¡'. ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳₪׳™׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳].</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳' ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳•: ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳“ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳›׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳›' ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨.</small></small> [׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳•׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• [׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”] ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳©"׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳•] ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳›׳ ׳×׳¦׳ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳™׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳§׳•׳“׳, ׳•׳›"׳© ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” [׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳£ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨].</small></small>].
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳— ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳׳©׳ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳¦׳•׳׳” ׳׳• ׳¨׳•׳§ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• [׳׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳‘ ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳™ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳©׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳׳” ׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¦"׳¢], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳ ׳¦׳™"׳‘ ׳‘׳׳¨׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳“׳” ׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳“: ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳¢"׳™ ׳“׳—׳™׳₪׳×׳• ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳”׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¦"׳•. </small></small>, ׳׳ ׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳‘׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳¨׳¦׳• ׳׳”׳§׳. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳“׳—׳™׳₪׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳¡׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳׳” [׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳™׳׳•׳©] ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¨׳“׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳׳¡׳׳”. ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳– ׳’׳– ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳¨׳¢ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳– ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳¨׳™׳— ׳”׳’׳–, ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳‘׳¨׳– ׳’׳– ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨.
׳›׳. ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳“׳•׳׳§׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳”׳‘׳” ׳”׳©׳ ׳™׳”, ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳¢"׳•, ׳¢׳™"׳©.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳£ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳›׳׳” ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳—׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳׳₪׳ ׳” ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳— ׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” [׳‘׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳—׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] ׳™׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳” ׳•׳™׳×׳§׳“׳ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳“׳ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳׳™ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳•׳§׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳™׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×.  ׳¢׳ ׳׳£ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨, ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×, ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳›׳– ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳¨׳›׳– ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳©׳ <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ג€“ ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳• ׳׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳×׳™׳“ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳—"׳› ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨. <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳•. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳—׳׳© ׳•׳§׳׳•׳© ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›"׳› ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ "׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“", ׳•׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳“ ׳¡׳™"׳’ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳• ׳©׳“׳™׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳•׳¢׳“].</small></small> ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳•׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳. ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳.</small></small> ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳• ׳׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳×׳™׳“ ׳׳”׳™׳׳׳¡. <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳–. ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳, ׳©׳–׳” ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>
- ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳•, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳.
<h3> ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳›׳©׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ [׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“] ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” [׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳•] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳£ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨, ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳£.</small></small> [׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳ "׳ ׳•׳׳§׳‘׳¦׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳׳—"׳› ׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨], ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳•׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳™׳©׳׳™׳¨׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳ ׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳. <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳•.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳¡׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ["׳˜׳©׳•׳׳ ׳˜"] ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳×׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳•׳¡׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”. <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳‘׳”׳©׳׳›׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳›׳’׳¨׳£, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳’׳' ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳׳’. ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳£ ׳•׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳¢"׳™ ׳©׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳• ׳©׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”.</small></small>
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳§ ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ["׳¡׳™׳¨"] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳™׳§ ׳‘׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳›׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳—׳¨׳¡] ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳׳™׳׳•׳¡ ׳©׳”׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳.  ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳£ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳• ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳, ׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳׳™ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ [׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳©׳], ׳•׳”"׳  ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳’׳¨׳£ ׳׳™׳™׳¢׳•׳“׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳™. <h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳˜׳₪׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–' ג€“ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳˜׳₪׳ ׳•׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳</b>. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’, ׳•' ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳“׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳—׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳' ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳•, ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳™׳©׳‘ ׳׳• ׳–׳¨׳¢ ׳₪׳©׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳₪׳•, ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳–׳¨׳¢ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳”. [׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳›׳™׳¡ ׳©׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳•, ׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳–].  ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¦׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳” ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳¡"׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”.</small></small> [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳- ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳”'- ׳•'].
<b>׳•׳©׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳—׳׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”:</b>
BB<b>׳</b>. ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳‘׳•׳§ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳׳™׳• ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ <b>׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳•</b> ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳ ׳•. 
<b>׳‘</b>. ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳• ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳‘: ׳“"׳” ׳©׳׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳“׳£ ׳§׳׳‘. ׳“"׳” ׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳•, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳‘׳”׳' ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳˜׳₪׳ ׳׳׳™׳• ׳›"׳› ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.
׳•׳‘׳¨׳"׳© ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳–. ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳”׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳• ׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳• ׳ ׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳© ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳• ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ [׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳׳™׳” ׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳׳˜׳™ ׳’׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳•׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•], ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“] ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳›׳™ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳›"׳› ׳׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳•. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳›"׳› ׳׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳“׳ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳•].
׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳¢׳₪׳™"׳– ׳"׳© ׳ ׳׳™ ׳”׳“׳—׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳ ׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳‘׳’׳“׳•. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳¦"׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳¨׳™׳© ׳₪' ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳¨׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳”׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳• ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ [׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳§׳•׳¥ ׳”׳׳–׳™׳§], ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳₪׳¡׳• ׳‘׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• [׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳¦"׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳›"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”]. ׳’׳ ׳™׳"׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳™׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳] ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳₪' ׳”׳׳¦׳ ׳™׳¢ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳›׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳׳׳—׳׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳׳—: ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨- ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳–], ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§ ׳׳¨׳¦׳₪׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳”]. [׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳ ׳¡׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳’. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ [׳•׳׳•׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳] ׳©׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳” [׳׳• ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳] ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳©׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳’׳׳™׳•, ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳•].</small></small>.EE
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳§</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳—' ג€“ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳§</b>. ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳–׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳–׳™׳§ ׳‘׳• <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳–, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳“׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳— ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳.</small></small> [׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳” <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©׳ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’] ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' [׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳”].</small></small>], ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳.</small></small>.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳–׳›׳•׳›׳™׳× ׳©׳”׳×׳ ׳₪׳¦׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳” <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳§׳•׳‘׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ [׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳”].</small></small> ׳׳₪׳•׳–׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳©׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳™׳×׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨׳• ׳•׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• [׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳- ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳–'] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳׳ ׳•. <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳¨׳"׳© ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳–. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small>
׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳–׳™׳§׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳›"׳› ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳. </small></small> [׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳•׳›׳ "׳].
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜' ג€“ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ [׳¡׳™׳•׳¢ ׳׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳] </b>. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳ "׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳¢. [׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳“׳”׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳“׳“׳•׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳—, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡' ׳©"׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳—].</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ <sup>׳¢׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳', ׳•׳©׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳“׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳×׳”, ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳’׳¨׳™׳“׳. ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳ "׳‘. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳—.</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳§׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳— ׳•׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ <sup>׳¢׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳"׳¨, ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–. ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳—, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’.</small></small>].
׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳§׳₪׳¥ ׳“׳’ ׳׳”׳׳§׳•׳•׳¨׳™׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳׳§׳•׳•׳¨׳™׳•׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳“׳’ ׳׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳•׳¨׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳“׳‘׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳—׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳׳© ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳—. [׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳§׳™׳׳•].
׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳₪</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳¢. ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳¡"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳™' - ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×</b>. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳₪׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳‘, ׳'.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳’׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳׳׳˜ ׳׳ ׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ <sup>׳₪׳‘</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'.</small></small>].
׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳— ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳₪׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳, ׳'. ׳׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳₪׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳– ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“, ׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨׳• ׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳: [׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳], ׳•׳"׳› ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳–׳•.</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” !].
<h3> ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳׳׳” ׳׳•׳›׳ [׳•׳›׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳–׳”]</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳™"׳ - </b> ׳›׳׳™ [׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨] ׳©׳׳©׳׳© ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳•, ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳• <sup>׳₪׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳•. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳•׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳”] ׳¢"׳₪ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳’: ׳©׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳©׳× ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳”. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳.</small></small>.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳”, ׳•׳›׳ "׳׳™׳§׳¡׳¨" ׳•"׳‘׳׳ ׳“׳¨" ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳ <sup>׳₪׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳§׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳›, ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳¨׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳©, ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳‘׳” ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳₪׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳” ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳׳"׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳’׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳©׳›"׳› [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳“"׳” ׳›׳].  ׳׳™׳”׳• ׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳' ׳•׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳›׳›׳¨ ׳׳• ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳£ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳¡׳×׳™׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳׳• ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳›׳¨ ׳׳• ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳™׳¨׳¦׳• ׳›׳”׳¨"׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳›׳™׳›׳¨ ׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳›׳™׳›׳¨ ׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳›׳ ׳©׳¦׳™׳¨׳£ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳›׳¨ ׳׳• ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳׳©׳׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘"׳™ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ '׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳'.</small></small>.

<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›׳” - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” - ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳]</h2>

׳™׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳•, ׳•׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳’. ׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳•, ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳”׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ [׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳”, ׳™"׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳, 1. ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™ ׳©׳¨׳“ ׳©׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳’. 2. ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳×
