<h3> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳•</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§, ׳׳• ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳ (׳׳• ׳©׳§׳©׳” ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳•), ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳£ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <b>׳׳</b> ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳׳›׳׳™ [׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳›׳׳], ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳•', ׳–', ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳’. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳×.</small></small>.
[׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳׳©׳” ׳×׳ ׳׳™׳: 1. ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨. 2. ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¨. 3. ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳™].
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳“׳׳× ׳©׳™׳“׳” ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§׳” ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳“׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳“׳” ׳•׳”׳“׳׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳×׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¡׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳• ׳¨׳’׳], ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳£ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳˜"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳˜. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳'. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳•, ׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• [׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳©׳ ׳•׳₪׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳’ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳•], ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳₪"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳§׳ ׳” ׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳. ׳•׳›' ׳”׳©׳׳"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳₪"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳‘׳׳× ׳¨׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳¦"׳¢. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳›"׳‘- ׳›"׳’.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§׳•</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳“׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ [׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳›] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳•, ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳, ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳”, ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳׳ ׳׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳×, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳ "׳• ג€“ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳›"׳– ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• - ׳©׳“׳’ ׳׳׳•׳— ׳—׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳™ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ [׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳‘. ׳‘׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳ ׳“׳ ׳©׳ ׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳™ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳¨. ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¨׳׳™׳•׳× ׳׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳‘׳׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳’ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳—.</small></small>.
׳“׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳×׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™ [׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳] ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳”, ׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”'.
׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳”, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”. <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳” ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳¨׳¨, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳›׳™ ׳§׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳–׳™׳–׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳•׳"׳› ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳׳—׳¡"׳›, ׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳•׳"׳› ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳•׳§׳©׳” ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳”, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳’'.</small></small>
<h3> ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳–׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳–׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳”, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳”. <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳×׳׳•׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳“׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳’׳¨׳”, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳' ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳™׳©׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳–׳”, ׳. ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳. ׳‘. ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳”. ׳•׳ "׳ ׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳”׳–׳–׳” ׳©׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨ [׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳”, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳” ׳‘׳›׳•׳×׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳”׳¢' ׳’'], ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳¦"׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳”׳׳¨׳•׳, ׳•׳”׳“׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳, ׳׳• ׳›׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳× ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳™׳—׳•׳“ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳©׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳×.</small></small>
<h3> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™, ׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ג€“ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳¨ <b> [׳׳ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳• ׳”׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳“' ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳— ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳•.</small></small>] </b>, ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳•', ׳–'.</small></small>.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨.
[׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳–׳¨׳§׳• ׳׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳–' ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘.</small></small>].
׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•. [׳•׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳. ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳•'. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘].
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨.
׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <b>׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡</b> ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳¡ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳©׳"׳© ׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳›׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳•׳׳, ׳›׳ ׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳•׳”׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™ ׳©׳¨׳“ [׳•׳›׳׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳“׳© ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳” ׳›׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳§׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳׳׳“ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳"׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳×, ׳•׳”"׳  ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳› ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳"׳› ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳©׳"׳© ׳“׳׳£ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳•</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳׳׳• ׳”׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳•׳‘, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳–׳¨׳§׳ ׳• ׳׳׳©׳₪׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳× ׳©׳׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳” ׳—׳׳™׳ ("׳˜׳©׳•׳׳ ׳˜") ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] ׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳• <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳“'] ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳"׳› ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳׳• ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳•׳¢"׳₪ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳›׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“, ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›' ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘. ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳•׳™׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳‘׳™׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳ ׳”׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳•, ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳× ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳–׳™׳¨, ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳˜"׳–.
׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ "׳‘׳ ׳×׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳”׳׳›׳”" ׳’׳׳™׳•׳ 4 ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small> [׳׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳• <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳—׳™׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳§׳—׳™׳ ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“.</small></small>], ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳©"׳› [׳₪' ׳˜"׳• ׳”׳¢' ׳¨׳"׳“] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳’׳“. </small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳׳‘׳™׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳ ׳”׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.
<h3> ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳§ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳₪׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳§ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳× ׳‘׳™׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳₪׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳× [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳–׳”] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳• ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•. <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳‘. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳¨.</small></small>
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳£ ׳›׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¦׳₪׳™׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳§ ׳•׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¨"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳₪' ׳”׳׳¦׳ ׳™׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳ ׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳₪׳” ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳›׳׳. ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳›' ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳ ׳§׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳•׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳"׳› ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳“׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳ ׳§׳™] ׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—: ׳‘׳׳׳—׳׳•׳× ׳©׳›' ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳©׳×׳”׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳ ׳׳” ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳“ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¢'].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳×, ׳•׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳£ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳, ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳–׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳£ ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳×, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳׳• ׳¢׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳×׳• ׳•׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳›"׳˜. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳•׳׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›"׳—].
׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ [׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™] ׳©׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳×׳₪׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳˜׳™׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳ ׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳•׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™, ׳©׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳ ׳” ׳”׳’׳' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳×׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳׳•׳›׳׳×׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ [׳‘"׳™ ׳©׳].</small></small>.
BB׳. ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳׳׳ ׳™׳–׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•. <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳’. ׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳©׳× ׳”׳•׳” ׳–׳¨׳™׳§ ׳׳”׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳©׳ ׳™׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳ "׳] ׳•׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳ ׳•׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳  ׳•׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳¡"׳– ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳›"׳“ ׳•׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳˜' ׳׳•׳× ׳”], ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• <b>׳׳™׳“</b> ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳•. <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳•׳¦׳¦׳ [׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨] ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳¦׳¦׳, ׳•׳”"׳  ׳›׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳• ׳•׳׳•׳¦׳¦׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳׳– ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳, ׳•׳”׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳ ׳›׳–׳¨׳™׳§׳” ׳׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳×׳₪׳׳¨"׳™ ׳‘׳“׳׳׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳–' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳. ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳™׳“׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” [׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’].</small></small> ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳• ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳’׳׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳•׳₪׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳©׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.</small></small>.
׳‘. ׳™׳©׳×׳“׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳¨ ׳׳₪׳— ׳׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳›׳, ׳׳• ׳™׳©׳׳™׳›׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳¡׳׳§׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ [׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳˜"׳•] ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘] ׳›' ׳©׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳•׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳–׳”, ׳"׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳§׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳›׳, ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>], ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳™׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳‘׳¨׳• ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳’. ׳”׳ ׳™ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳“׳×׳׳¨׳™ [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳”] ׳¨׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘ ׳™׳”׳•׳©׳¢ ׳¢׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳”׳• ׳›׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ [׳¨׳©"׳™- ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳•׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳›׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™], ׳"׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳׳©׳™ ׳׳׳׳™׳׳¨ ׳•׳›׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳©׳× ׳–׳¨׳™׳§ ׳׳”׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳©׳ ׳™׳” ׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳₪׳ ׳–׳¨׳™׳§ ׳׳”׳• ׳׳—׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳•׳›׳•', ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳™׳–׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳¨׳™׳•. [׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳• ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳]. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳ "׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳¡"׳– [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳§ ׳©׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳–׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™] ׳•׳‘׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳˜ ׳•׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳–.
׳’. [׳•׳—׳›"׳ ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳"׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳›׳: ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳–׳”׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳ [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳›׳] ׳׳ ׳׳¨׳‘ ׳׳©׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳’׳' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳”׳ "׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳‘׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©].
׳“. ׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¨׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳—"׳› ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳, ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ [׳•׳”׳¦׳׳—׳×] ׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨. </small></small> [׳•׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳ ׳›׳ "׳ <b>׳׳¡׳•׳¨</b> ׳׳• ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳‘׳¨׳• ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳—׳•׳©׳‘ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳—׳•׳©׳‘ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳—׳•׳©׳‘ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳©׳"׳— [׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳]. </small></small>], ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• <b>׳׳</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳©׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳¨, ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳™׳£]. ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳©"׳ ׳•׳˜"׳– ׳©׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳“׳‘׳© ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳¢׳™"׳– ׳™׳×׳¨׳¡׳§׳• ׳•׳™׳׳•׳—׳• ׳”׳ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳©, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳×׳•׳׳• ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨.  ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨.
׳”. ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¡׳• [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳™׳©׳¨ ׳׳₪׳— ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳¦׳”] ׳"׳› ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳© ׳›׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳˜"׳– [׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳–] ׳©׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳›׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨.
׳•. ׳׳׳ ׳©׳§׳¦׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳ ׳˜"׳™ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳•׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳×׳•׳׳• ׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳¨׳¢׳” ׳©׳©׳•׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳₪׳›׳• ׳”׳׳™׳.</small></small>.  ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳¥ ׳•׳׳¦׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳™׳—׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳₪׳›׳ ׳׳’׳©"׳¨ <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳–׳” ׳׳׳© ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳.</small></small>.
׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳× ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳©׳–׳” ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳' ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳׳׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳›׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳ "׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳¢"׳™ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳“' ׳“"׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳• ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™.
׳–. ׳”׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳₪׳× <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳›"׳–, ׳•׳›' ׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳× ׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳©׳ '׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳™ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳× ׳₪׳× ׳‘׳§׳¢׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳§׳׳•׳£ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳§׳׳™׳₪׳™ ׳”׳׳’׳•׳–׳™׳', ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳, ׳•׳׳– ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳”׳›׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳₪׳× ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×.</small></small> [׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳₪׳×.</small></small>], ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳¨׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳“ [׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳–]. </small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳•׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳ ׳₪׳• ׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳¨׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳₪׳× ׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¦׳׳—׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳•׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳“׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳›' ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳"׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳“׳•. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳›׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳×׳• ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ [׳׳׳ ׳©׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳], ׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨"׳› ׳”׳§׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳”׳’׳©"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳׳–׳׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ [׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳•]. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳•׳"׳› ׳”"׳  ׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳™׳“, ׳׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳"׳› ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳"׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•.</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”].
׳—. ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳¦׳˜׳‘׳¨׳• ׳׳• ׳’׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™, ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ <b> [׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™] </b>, ׳׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳׳׳™׳” ׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳' ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳•: ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳"׳“.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳©"׳¨ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳¡' ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳].</small></small>.EE
<h3> ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳׳’׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳˜׳‘׳— ׳•׳׳“׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳©׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳©׳” ׳×׳ ׳׳™׳: 1. ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. 2. ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡. 3. ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡. <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>
׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡, ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳“ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳’. ׳“"׳” ׳”׳׳™.</small></small>.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳¡׳›׳•"׳ ׳‘׳׳˜׳‘׳—, ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳“׳”, ׳“׳׳× ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳–׳“׳§׳§ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳×׳—׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳–׳’׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳–׳’׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳“, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™ ׳×׳—׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳₪׳™׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳—, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳×׳×׳¨׳˜׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳¦׳₪׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳• ׳•׳"׳› ׳‘׳™׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳©׳¢׳” ׳׳—׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳¢ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳–׳›׳•׳›׳™׳× ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳׳׳˜ ׳׳׳˜ ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳‘׳¨׳• ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳©׳¢׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳©׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳–].</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳›׳׳” ׳¢׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳–׳”:
BB׳. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳©׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳§׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳•, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳›׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳”, ׳’'.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳"׳“ ׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›"׳  ׳•׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳‘׳™׳”׳"׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳‘׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳›׳©׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳• <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳×׳—׳× ׳׳™ ׳”׳׳–׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳.
׳‘. ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳—׳¨ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳׳‘] ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳§׳׳ ׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳•. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳•׳¢׳׳×, ׳“׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳׳£, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘. ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳¨ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“] ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳›׳™ ׳׳©׳”.</small></small> ׳׳×׳—׳× ׳׳™ ׳”׳׳–׳’׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳˜׳₪׳™׳. ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳¨׳‘׳• ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳˜׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳§׳׳ ׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳¨׳‘׳” ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ "׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨" ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳¢׳™' ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳“, ׳’' ׳•׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—], ׳›׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳›"׳› ׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•, ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳›' ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•.  [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳–: ׳×׳•׳“"׳” ׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳].</small></small>.
׳’. ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳•, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳’׳‘ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳˜"׳–, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>.
׳“. ׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳₪׳™׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™ ׳×׳—׳× ׳“׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳‘"׳— ׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳׳›׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳×, ׳•׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳©׳׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳’׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳™.  ׳•׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳˜׳•׳¨, ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>.EE
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳“׳׳§ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳×׳•</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳’׳¢׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•. [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳×] <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–.
׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳’"׳ '׳”׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳'- ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳¦׳•׳×׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳•. ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳׳¨"׳™ ׳‘׳›׳׳›׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳” ׳¡׳§׳›"׳–] ׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳׳’"׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳©"׳— ׳•׳”׳×׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳”׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳‘׳§׳•"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳™׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳’׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳”׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ [׳׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳•]. ׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳×.
׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳¦"׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳“׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳׳’"׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ "׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳“׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳" ׳׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳“׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳© ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳§׳“׳© ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳“׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳×׳• [׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳"׳ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳‘׳˜׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳“׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳], ׳•׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳“׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳×. [׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳’׳‘׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©׳ "׳× ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”].
׳•׳‘׳"׳¨ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳™' ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳”׳§' ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳™׳“ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳™׳§׳¨</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳× ׳™׳“ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳”׳©׳ ׳™׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳™׳§׳¨ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳'. ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳¨׳™׳׳ ׳•. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳¡׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳×׳™׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳—׳©׳© ׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•.</small></small> [׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™].
<h3> ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳§׳§ ׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳•</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§׳™׳. ׳׳ <b>׳©׳›׳—</b> ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳×׳›׳× [׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳] ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§ ׳•׳™׳©׳—׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳₪׳×׳—׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™. <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳™"׳—] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳©׳›׳— ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳¢' ׳' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳¢׳™"׳–]. ׳•׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳¢"׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳₪׳§׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳× ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳›׳™ ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳§׳•׳׳§׳ ׳•׳׳—׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳•. ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳•' ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢"׳™ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳›׳׳™, ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳•' ׳”׳—׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳•׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘ ׳–׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳׳©׳—׳™׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳§׳§, ׳•׳׳– ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳•׳‘, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳’׳™׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§. <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳"׳› ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳©׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳©׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳”׳• ׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳׳׳׳•"׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳— ג€“ ׳©׳™׳–, ׳¢׳™"׳©. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳ ׳§׳‘ ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§ ׳•׳©׳•׳₪׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳•׳×׳•.</small></small> [׳•׳™׳© ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳›׳©׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳ ׳— ׳׳—׳™׳×׳•׳, ׳•׳׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳–׳” ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§ ׳›׳™ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳‘׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳—׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳• ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳•׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳•׳“׳׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢.</small></small>].
׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳–׳” <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳‘"׳¦ ׳₪׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳”׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳©, ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳₪׳§׳§ ׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'.
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢, ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳, ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳•׳›׳׳›׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳' ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳•׳§׳™׳¦׳•׳©"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳¡' ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳”, ׳’' ׳“"׳” ׳₪׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳’' ׳“"׳” ׳”׳•׳׳™׳.</small></small>. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳₪ ׳•׳‘"׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳“׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳×.</small></small>.
׳¢׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳ <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳•, ׳'.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳—, ׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳–׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳׳©׳ <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳‘, ׳•', ׳•׳"׳¨ ׳•׳×׳•"׳© ׳•׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳, ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳›' ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳, ׳•׳₪׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” (׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”) ׳©׳”׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘. ׳•׳׳•׳›׳— ׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳˜׳•׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳™׳–׳™ ׳¦׳׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜, ׳’'] ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳”׳’׳™׳–׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳׳”׳–׳™׳– ׳׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳×׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳] ׳׳• ׳׳”׳©׳¢׳ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳–׳• [׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳, ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳™׳×]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳¢׳¨"׳©. <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳›׳˜., ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳“׳™׳׳” ׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳׳™׳›׳× ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳׳“׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳‘׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳¦׳•׳”׳• ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳• ׳׳ [׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳• ׳׳] ׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳©, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳©׳׳•׳”׳• ׳›׳©׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨. <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘, [׳•׳™׳© ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳ "׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳׳§׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨׳×׳•, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳], ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳–' ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳—' [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳] ׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳©׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳§׳•"׳  ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“.  ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳” - ׳™' [׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳“׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳] ׳¢׳' ׳׳“.</small></small> ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳™׳×׳§׳׳§׳ <b>׳׳’׳׳¨׳™</b> ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•׳”׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳– ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳™. ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳™׳×׳§׳׳§׳ ׳׳¢׳˜, ׳›' ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳׳¦׳‘ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳₪׳§ <b>׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳•</b> ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ ׳›' ׳©׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳• ׳׳ [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳• ׳׳], ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳₪׳¨"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳– ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳׳”׳' ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳—׳׳§ ׳‘' ׳₪"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳” ׳•׳׳•׳× ׳›׳–.  ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳₪׳© ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳׳™ ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳•׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳—׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳”׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳™"׳¦ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳›׳•׳׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳© ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳×׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳©׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳• ׳׳ [׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳–׳•׳›׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳‘׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳–׳– ׳‘׳ ׳’׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ [׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳˜"׳– ׳©׳ ׳©׳›' ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”] ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’. [׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳™׳”׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳”׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨].</small></small> [׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳’׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳– ׳׳–׳™׳–׳• ׳׳¢׳˜] <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’. [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©] ׳•׳”׳×׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳©], ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™׳• <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–, ׳•׳¦"׳¢.</small></small> ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳—, ׳’' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳‘ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳“ [׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳©׳”׳¢׳×׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’].</small></small>.
׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳×׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’] ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳›"׳‘ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳• ׳•׳”׳¢' ׳"׳–], ׳•׳¦"׳¢ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳׳”׳ "׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳’׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳¦׳™׳׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳•׳©׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳™׳, ׳•׳"׳ ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳›׳™ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳’׳¨׳•׳’׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳¦׳׳×׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳©׳• ׳•׳׳¦׳₪׳” ׳©׳™׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳©׳• ׳•׳"׳› ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳× ׳”׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳©׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳” ׳”׳§׳¦׳׳×׳•, ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘, ׳׳©׳"׳› ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳›׳׳•' ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳”׳׳‘׳•׳©, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳—׳×׳™׳›׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¢׳©׳¨ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳¢׳• ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳¦׳׳×׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳×׳™׳™׳‘׳©׳• ׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳” ׳׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳•׳”׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳¢׳• ׳׳–׳”.</small></small> ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”.
RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›׳• - ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™</h2>
<h3> ׳”׳§׳“׳׳”</h3>
XX ׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™: <b>׳.</b> ׳”׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳”]. <b>׳‘.</b> ׳”׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳”]. <b>׳’.</b> ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳”].
׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳× <b>׳›׳</b> ׳©׳׳©׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳, ׳©׳׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳׳. ׳•׳‘׳¢׳–"׳” ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳˜׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳, ׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳, ׳•׳”׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨׳• ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•׳©׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳©׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳™׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳•׳•׳”"׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳—׳™׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳× ׳©׳׳©׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳.  GG
<h3> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™</h3>
<b>׳.</b> <b>׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ - ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳”׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳˜׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ [׳›׳×׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳“׳ ׳”׳¨׳], ׳"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳©׳”׳‘׳§׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳–׳• ׳©׳”׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦ ׳‘׳™׳§׳© ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨. ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳‘׳§׳”"׳™ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳–' ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳ ׳• ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳. </small></small> ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳ ׳’. ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳©׳׳•׳—׳• [׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳›׳”"׳’ ׳™׳© ׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳‘ ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳׳׳™׳“ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳׳™ ׳©׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳›׳•"׳ (׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳׳’:), ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳‘׳§׳•"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳”"׳ ׳‘׳₪"׳• ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳× ׳‘ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳’׳”"׳ ׳₪"׳• ׳׳•׳× ׳‘), ׳•׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳¢"׳– ׳“׳£ ׳˜׳•. ׳“"׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ "׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨" ׳•׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¡' ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳•׳‘׳§׳¦׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦' ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳–׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳“׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳©׳׳•׳—׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’.
׳•׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳• ׳”"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳”׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳.
׳•׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳¢׳”"׳× ׳₪' ׳‘׳ [׳™׳‘, ׳˜׳–] ׳₪׳™' '׳›׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳”׳'- ׳׳₪׳™' ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳•׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳׳›׳×׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳”׳•׳. ׳•׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳˜"׳– ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳’ ׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳׳›׳×׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳”׳•׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳–. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳§׳”"׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳].</small></small> ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.  ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <b>׳׳¨׳׳•׳–</b> ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™ [׳•׳”׳¨׳׳– ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ "׳׳׳” ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳¢׳‘׳¨׳”"].</small></small> [׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳. ׳•׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳§׳™׳™׳.</small></small>]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <b>׳׳¨׳׳•׳–</b> ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳—. ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳– ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳׳™׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳©׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳׳– ׳©׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™ [׳›׳’׳•׳, ׳׳•׳׳¨: ׳׳ ׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳¡׳™׳“, ׳׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨: ׳×׳¢׳©׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳׳] ׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳” ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳”, ׳"׳› ׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳¢׳×׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳– ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳™׳—] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳©׳•׳” ׳׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳׳” ׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳•.  ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳•: "׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳©׳". ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳¨׳׳– ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳•׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳¨׳׳– ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨: "׳›׳׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳׳"] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳– ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳•] <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳”, ׳•׳¢׳¢"׳© ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳“. ׳•׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳–"׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘ ׳׳“׳•׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'- ׳‘'.
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳§׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳§׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳• ׳•׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳›"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳’.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> <b>׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™- ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳§׳© ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳• ׳¨׳׳– ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳›׳“: ׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™׳•"׳˜, ׳•׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳›"׳— ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳¡'. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳’׳׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳"׳  ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳•׳׳×׳•׳¡' ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™, ׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳˜"׳•, ׳'. ׳•׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳˜"׳• ׳”׳¨׳—׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳’' ׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”: ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳§׳© ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳׳•׳¨] ׳׳– ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’. ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳¨, ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳—׳׳” ׳©׳™׳©, ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳©׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨ "׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨" ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›"׳› ׳›׳©׳׳•׳—׳• ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›"׳›, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳©׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳˜׳™׳‘ ׳¢׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳
