׳—׳©׳•׳.</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• [׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳—׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳•, ׳׳£ ׳©׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜- ׳›'] ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳¨ [׳•׳׳™׳“׳× ׳—׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳] <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“. ׳•׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳ ׳¨, ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳—׳” ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ [׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳׳” !], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳• <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳•</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳”׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳˜"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘, ׳“' ׳“"׳” ׳©׳”׳"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳ [׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳ "׳‘, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳”׳˜׳¢׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨.</small></small>.  ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳×, ׳©׳׳©׳×׳• ׳•׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳•׳”׳• ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳–׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳"׳—.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳›׳ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳— ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳₪׳×׳— ׳“׳׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳—׳“׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳׳—׳×, ׳•׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳•]. ׳•׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳™׳’׳¨׳× ׳©׳₪׳×׳—׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳×׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳' ׳”׳¢' ׳¨׳›"׳”] ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳, ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳ "׳• ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©, ׳•׳”"׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢.</small></small> ׳׳• ׳₪׳×׳— ׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳–׳”. [׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳×׳—׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳©׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳’].
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳˜׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳•׳— ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳×׳” ׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳¢׳™׳¨׳‘׳‘ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”], ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳˜׳ ׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳§׳ ׳¡ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™. ׳׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳₪"׳‘ ׳¡"׳’ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¢׳©׳׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳˜׳׳” ׳”׳”׳©׳‘׳—׳” <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳¦"׳• ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳”׳—׳. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳”׳• ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳›׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳¢׳›׳•"׳. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳›׳•"׳ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳‘. ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳›׳™׳‘׳” ׳“׳׳™׳§׳”, ׳•׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳“׳”"׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¡׳׳§ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¡׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳©׳׳•׳—׳• ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳”׳—׳•׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳©׳׳•׳—׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳”, ׳•׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳–׳”"׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜.  </small></small>. ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳•׳׳£ ׳™׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'.
<h3> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳˜, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳’. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ "׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳‘׳”" ׳‘׳—׳™׳׳•׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳“׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳”׳׳“׳•׳¨׳” ׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳. </small></small> ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳–.</small></small> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳'.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳˜"׳•, ׳•' ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳.</small></small>.
׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳’׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳׳™׳- ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¦׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨ [׳’׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳©׳], ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¢׳•׳˜ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳—׳•׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¢׳•׳˜ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳‘' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳. ׳•׳¢׳¢"׳© ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳—׳¦׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳©׳ ׳׳” ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳׳–׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳.</small></small>.  ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ "׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳•׳¨ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳₪׳” ׳₪׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳“'.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳’׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳₪׳×] ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳“' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ [׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳‘' ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳–׳›׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”]. ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳™' ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”- ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¦׳“ ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳׳• ׳§׳˜׳£ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¦׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳§׳˜׳£ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳”' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳§׳˜׳•׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¢ ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳’׳“׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳™׳×׳׳•׳© ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳§׳˜׳₪׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳¢׳›׳•"׳- ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳‘׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳’</b>. ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳• ׳׳׳¨׳׳” [׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳], ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳©׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳• ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳“. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡"׳’ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳, ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳, ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳”׳‘׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳›"׳› ׳”׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳˜"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳©׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small> ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳›' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳•', ׳–', ׳—'. </small></small>, ׳•׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳›׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳˜"׳•, ׳', ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳›׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳£ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳׳™׳, ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳׳¢׳× ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳¢׳׳• <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳¡׳׳§ ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳“.
׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳”, ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳ ׳”׳’ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'.</small></small> [׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳”׳׳•׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳¡, ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜.</small></small>],  ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳×׳—׳–׳™׳× ׳׳–׳’ ׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳—׳–׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳—׳–׳™׳× <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳׳™׳“׳¢ ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳§׳˜׳£ ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳“׳•' ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳©׳“׳” ׳׳§׳˜׳•׳£ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳¨.
׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳₪׳×׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳§׳˜׳•׳£ ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ [׳׳• ׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳] ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳׳ ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳×׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳׳” ׳ ׳’׳“ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳׳ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳"׳› ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳•. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¨׳׳”, ׳׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¢׳’ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳₪׳¨"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¡"׳– ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳ "׳”]. </small></small>, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×.  ׳•׳׳ ׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳, ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳•] ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳•, ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳›׳׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳• ׳׳§׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳×.  ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳ ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳“ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳¨׳‘׳” ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳—. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳™"׳“.</small></small>.
׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳” ׳‘׳™׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳¨ ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳₪׳™ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳× <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳› [׳•׳¢"׳₪ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳’ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳].</small></small>.
׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳—׳₪׳¨ ׳§׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳’, ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳”׳™׳§׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳•.</small></small>.
׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¢׳©׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳• ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳“ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳׳׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'.</small></small>] ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳˜׳¨׳”, ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'] ׳©׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳” [׳׳• ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•] ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳›׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•' ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳— ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳˜"׳•] ׳©׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳׳– ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳].  ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳“׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳” ׳׳”׳¢׳׳•׳× ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳˜׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳ ׳”׳¨ ׳•׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳“׳’׳™׳] ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳‘׳” ׳‘׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳— ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳ ׳” ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳‘], ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘, ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳, ׳׳£ ׳©׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ [׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©], ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳– ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’], ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳× ׳׳©׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–, ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳—׳©׳׳.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ [׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳] ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳• ׳‘׳₪׳¢׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳¨׳‘׳” ׳‘׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳×׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳׳¨׳‘׳” ׳‘׳₪׳¢׳™׳׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳, ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳’׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳•׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳©׳–׳§׳•׳§ ׳׳—׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳—׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳˜׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳”׳׳×׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳§׳׳” ׳©׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳• ׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳•׳׳, ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳‘׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳, ׳׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳׳×׳§׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳.
׳•׳”"׳” ׳׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢"׳™ ׳—׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳- ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳—׳©׳׳ ׳©׳׳”׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳” ׳•׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¡׳•׳ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳”׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳×׳₪׳•׳§׳” ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳™"׳×.</small></small>.
׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳ ׳¨׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳›׳‘׳” ׳‘׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳” ׳§׳˜׳ ׳” ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳”, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳׳• ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'.</small></small>], ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳—׳©׳׳, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳×׳§׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳“ ׳•׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳’, ׳•׳¦"׳¢].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳‘' ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳: ׳. ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳”. ׳‘. ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳” <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳™"׳— ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳”. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳• ׳“׳—׳–׳§׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳—׳•׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳˜׳•.]. </small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦ ׳¨׳—"׳, ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳• ׳׳ <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳©׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳• ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ [׳•׳‘׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳—׳•׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•] ׳•׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳©׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ [׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›' ׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳©׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳"׳› ׳©׳•׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¨׳×׳” ׳׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨, ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳”׳”׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳“׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×] ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳” ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳— ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¡"׳•*] ׳•׳”׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳¢׳–׳¨ [׳‘׳—׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳—], ׳׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ [׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜] ׳•׳”׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳“] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳•, ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳—׳•׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•.  [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳›׳×"׳¡ ׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳©׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳–' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳ ׳™׳” ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳—׳׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳›׳©׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¦׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳×׳׳’׳“׳• ׳׳ ׳׳§׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳—׳׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳™׳¦׳¨׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳׳’׳“׳•׳× ׳›׳–׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳’"׳› ׳”׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳—׳•׳×, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳¢׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳¡׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳—׳׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳×׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳׳’׳“׳•׳× ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨].</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳’׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• [׳›׳׳• ׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳§׳˜׳₪׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳׳—׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳”׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳¦׳™"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳©, ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳¡׳˜"׳•].
׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨</b> ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳–׳•, ׳©׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• <b>׳׳¢׳•׳׳</b> ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©. ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• [׳›׳ "׳] ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳–׳™׳“, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳”, ׳•׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳•, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳“׳׳™׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳’. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳×"׳¡ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳•׳‘׳§׳”"׳™ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳–' ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳ ׳§׳•׳˜ ׳©׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳• ׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳•׳׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳•. ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳׳׳¢׳׳”. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> <b>׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ג€“ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳”.</b> ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳©׳×׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳›׳”׳¡׳›׳׳” ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳•׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ [׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳—׳” ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳™׳˜. ׳׳•׳× ׳×׳ ׳‘].</small></small>.
׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳©׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳¢׳׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳¡׳™׳׳•׳§׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳“׳“ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳© ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳¡׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳ ׳–׳§׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳© ׳›׳¡׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳’׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳׳– ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳¨׳•׳™׳— ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳© ׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳ ׳–׳§׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘.
<h3> ׳׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳“׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳₪׳—׳×׳•</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳‘׳“׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳₪׳—׳×׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳•׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳“׳”׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳“׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳₪׳—׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳. [׳•׳¢׳¢"׳© ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”].</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳•׳’׳‘׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳–׳׳× ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳•] <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳ "׳¢׳‘׳“" ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳•׳‘׳, ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳©׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳—׳” ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳–׳׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳’׳¨׳©׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳—׳©׳“׳• ׳‘׳• ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳•. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳™׳¨׳©׳• ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳—׳” ׳‘׳• ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ [׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳”, ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›"׳› ׳›׳©׳׳•׳—׳•, ׳•׳׳׳• ׳”׳:
BB׳. ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳§׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳ ׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳”׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳–, ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳¨ ׳—׳“׳© ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳• ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳×, ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳”.
׳‘. ׳•׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳¨"׳× ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳•. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›"׳› ׳›׳©׳׳•׳—׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ [׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳“׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳©׳׳•׳—׳• ׳›׳׳.  ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳“, ׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳›"׳” ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳™ ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳¨׳”.
׳’. [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳•׳“, ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳©׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳§׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳©׳׳•׳—׳• ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳¨ ׳“׳•׳׳§].</small></small> [׳׳• ׳׳—׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳—׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳—. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’, ׳”' ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳¦"׳–.</small></small>].
׳“. ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳׳§ ׳ ׳–׳§ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳“׳׳™׳§׳”] <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳›׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳“׳£ ׳§׳›׳‘. ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳, ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳›"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳‘׳“׳• ׳’"׳› ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>.
׳”. ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• [׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳] ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳©׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨.</small></small>.
׳•. ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳›׳§"׳–</small></small> [׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'- ׳‘'.</small></small>]. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“, ׳“' ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳©׳¨׳§ "׳˜׳•׳‘" ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“.  ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳—׳׳•׳§ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳‘׳¡׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳•׳§ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳׳•׳§ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳¡ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳׳ ׳•׳× [׳‘׳׳—׳™׳¨ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢] ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳©׳“׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳¡ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳.</small></small>.
׳–. ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳.</small></small>. EE

<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›׳– - ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™</h2>
XX ׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳™׳• ׳•׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳×׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳”, ׳•׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳˜׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳–"׳”.
׳•׳™׳© ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳‘ ׳©׳”׳›׳•׳×׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳—׳׳˜׳™׳, ׳׳׳ <b>׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳</b> ׳”׳׳ ׳׳¦׳‘ ׳₪׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳.  GG
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳'- ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳, ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳—׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳‘, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳– ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳©׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳׳•׳.</small></small> ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳§׳¦׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘.</small></small> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳¡ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' "׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳”" ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳©׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳׳’"׳.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳, ׳‘' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳’ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳›׳,  ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×.</small></small>.
׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳©׳׳—׳× ׳—׳×׳ ׳•׳›׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳—׳׳•׳× ׳•׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳—׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” [׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳‘'], ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳ ׳— ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳™׳–׳” ׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳¢"׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳׳§ ׳”׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢].</small></small> ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳• ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳” <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳› ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳–, ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳©׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳©׳׳—׳× ׳—׳×׳ ׳•׳›׳׳” ׳”׳•׳™ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”.  ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘ ׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳§׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨.</small></small>.
׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳”׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳“׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳›׳ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳—׳–"׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳“׳£ ׳¡׳. ׳‘׳“׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™"׳£ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳”. ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–.
׳•׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳™"׳– ׳׳׳“ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳,  ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳ ׳§׳”"׳› ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¦"׳— ׳¡׳™"׳— ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳§׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳”׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳“׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” - ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳—׳׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳¢׳“:, ׳•׳›׳©׳§׳•׳¦׳¥ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳§׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳׳—׳•׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳” ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳” ׳•׳›׳‘׳¨׳”. </small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳” ׳•׳›׳‘׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“] ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳” ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ [׳₪"׳• ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳‘] ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳”׳’׳¨"׳™ ׳–׳™׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨. </small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳›׳©׳׳—׳“ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳™׳—׳“ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳™׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳”'], ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳׳”׳™׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳“׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳”. ׳©׳•"׳× ׳‘׳׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳˜' ׳•׳׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳₪"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘'- ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳• <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× <b>׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨</b> [׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳–׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×] <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳“' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“׳•׳× ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨.</small></small>. ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳“ 11 ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳‘' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳”׳׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳› 13.5 ׳“׳§׳•׳×, [׳©׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ 18 ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳ "׳˜, ׳‘' ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳', ׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳˜, ׳•' ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳“], ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳“ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳’' ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× [׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳’ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳, ׳•׳×׳׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳“ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳’' ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳¨"׳© ׳©׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳×] ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳•׳׳¨' ׳™׳•׳¡׳™ ׳¦׳׳”"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳£ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳•׳–׳” ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳•׳–׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳–׳׳ ׳• ׳“׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’׳™׳× ׳”׳’׳' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳׳“:- ׳׳”., [׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳׳”: ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§׳• ׳׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳¨' ׳™׳•׳¡׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳–׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳׳• ׳׳×׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳•], ׳•׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳×׳¨׳•׳™׳™׳”׳• ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳, ׳›׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳¨' ׳™׳•׳¡׳™ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳×׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳¨"׳© ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨' ׳™׳•׳¡׳™ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳׳™׳™׳× ׳’' ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳₪"׳˜, ׳‘' ׳׳©"׳› ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳©׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳•׳׳™ ׳ ׳™׳¡׳ ׳•׳×׳©׳¨׳™ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳‘׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳’' ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳.
׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳¢׳˜ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳₪׳—׳™׳× ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳©׳ 13.5 ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳“ 13.5 ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳‘'], ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' [׳•׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™].</small></small>.
׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳™׳, ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳¨' ׳™׳•׳¡׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳’׳¢ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳–׳׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳’׳׳•׳¨.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳׳ ׳–׳§</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’'- ׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳׳ ׳–׳§</b>. ׳׳ ׳₪׳•׳¨׳¦׳× ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳ ׳–׳§ [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ! <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳¢ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳×׳™׳§׳•׳”׳• ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳“׳׳ ׳₪׳©׳™׳˜׳ ׳׳”׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”. [׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳’׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳”׳₪׳¡׳“- ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×].  ׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳—׳©׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳׳ ׳–׳§, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳©׳׳•׳—׳•.</small></small>], ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳—׳ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™ ׳•׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳׳ ׳–׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳—׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳¢׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳©׳›׳— ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”"׳‘׳•׳™׳׳¨", ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• "׳›׳ ׳”׳׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳“" ׳׳• "׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¢ ׳”׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳“" <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳›"׳• ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳™"׳˜, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳™׳, ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘' ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳™ ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳׳ ׳–׳§ [׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳׳§׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳׳ ׳–׳§, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳”].</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• "׳׳ ׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳¡׳™׳“", ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳–׳§ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳¢ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳—. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳™׳© ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳•.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳– ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳¡׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳׳– ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳׳׳•׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ [׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳¢ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳–׳”], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜.</small></small>. [׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳×׳ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳•, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨].
<h3> ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳•</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳“'- ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳•.</b> [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨]. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳× ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳‘׳“׳• <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¢׳‘׳“׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳—׳©׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›'.</small></small> ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳“. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳׳ ׳• [׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳] ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳“'.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳©׳. <b>׳•׳׳›׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳, ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”.</b>
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳× ׳›׳ ׳›׳</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”'- ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳× ׳›׳ ׳›׳.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳– ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳§׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•. [׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳׳™׳¨׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳›׳©׳’׳׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨, ׳©׳׳– ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳“].</small></small> ׳׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳—׳ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳“׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳׳“׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳˜, ׳•׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳™׳. ׳•׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳¨׳£ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳׳׳• ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳§׳¨ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™.</small></small> ׳׳• ׳׳—׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳—׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳– ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳–׳” <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳™׳“׳׳§ ׳’׳ ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳• ׳™׳© ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›"׳› ׳›׳©׳׳•׳—׳• ׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨.</small></small> ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳×׳׳•׳¨׳× ׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× [׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”] ׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳•׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳, ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ [׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳›׳‘׳• ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨] ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳›. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳™׳§׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳.</small></small>.  <b>׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳• ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳•' ׳”׳™׳׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳©׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳– ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳•: "׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×"] ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•.</small></small>.</b>
<h3> ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•'- ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳—׳” ׳׳”׳“׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳”, ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳¢׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© [׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳×׳ ׳׳™׳, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'- ׳‘'] ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘, ׳“' ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— [׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘] ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ [׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳’], ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳“׳”"׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳”׳• ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳˜׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳¢׳׳•׳× ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳§׳•׳׳” ׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳” [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳×] ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳¢׳׳™׳× ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•, <b>׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™</b> ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳׳” ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳’׳׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳‘׳’׳׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳•׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳”׳• ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳¢׳” ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳×], ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳¡׳§"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳™׳— ׳׳–׳”.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳׳• ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳¢׳׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳“ ׳׳§׳•׳׳” ׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳” ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳], ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳. ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳ ׳•׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. </small></small>.
<b>׳—.</b> ׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳׳™׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳›׳¨׳™׳—׳” ׳׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳¨׳—׳•׳§׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳¨׳—׳•׳§׳” ׳©׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳•ײ¹ ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳₪׳•. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨- ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳׳ ׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¡׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳‘, ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳™׳¡׳¢ ׳׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳•׳–׳• ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ [׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳›׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳₪׳×׳—׳ ׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳¢׳׳•׳× ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳” ׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳›׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳׳™׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳×׳• ׳©׳™׳¡׳¢ ׳‘׳׳¢׳׳™׳×, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳¡׳‘׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳– ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳—׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•. [׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳•, ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳].</small></small>, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× !.
׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳”׳׳“׳•׳‘׳¨׳× ׳׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳–. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳” ׳׳—׳“׳¨ [׳—׳©׳•׳] ׳•׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳”׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small> [׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳§׳™׳™׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–']. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳, <b>׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™</b> ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳©׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳׳›׳™׳׳ ׳•׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳¡׳•׳’׳¨ ׳•׳¦׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳“׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳ "׳, ׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳›׳׳•׳‘ ׳”׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳׳× ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳“.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳§׳˜׳</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–'- ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳§׳˜׳</b>. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–.</small></small> [׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳×׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳–], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™ [׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘].
׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳' ׳™׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳“'. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳–' ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳“׳”, ׳©׳¢׳“ ׳’' ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳“׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳•׳׳’' ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳–' ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳”.</small></small> [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'].
׳§׳˜׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳׳© [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳—] ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳§׳˜׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳—׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳©׳], ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳, ׳•׳”׳¢׳“׳¨ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳• ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳”. ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳§׳˜׳.</small></small> ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ [׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳›׳], ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨ <b>׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™</b> ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ <b>׳¨׳§</b> ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳§׳˜׳.
׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳—׳“ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳™׳׳“ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳₪׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳—׳•׳©׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳—] ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳™׳׳“ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳₪׳—׳“ ׳©׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳׳•, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳× ׳₪׳—׳“ ׳–׳” ׳›׳©׳׳‘׳•׳’׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“׳• ׳׳₪׳—׳“ ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳“׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳—׳“ ׳‘׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳”׳ ׳—׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳§׳˜׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳—'- ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳§׳•׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳.</b> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳׳©, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳§׳•׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳׳™׳.
׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳’׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳˜. ׳•׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳׳׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳” ׳•׳©׳¨׳©׳™ ׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳¢׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳§׳¦׳×. ׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳₪"׳§ ׳“׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳ "׳‘ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳•, ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳"׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳›׳“׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ [׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳¡.] ׳’׳•׳ ׳— ׳™׳•׳ ׳§ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳‘׳”׳׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳›' ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳›׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳›"׳—], ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳™. ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘' ׳×׳™' ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳™ [׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳] ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳— ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳’׳•׳ ׳— ׳™׳•׳ ׳§ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳‘׳”׳׳”. (׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳§׳¦׳× ׳›׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳”׳’׳¨"׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳” ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳§׳ ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳. ׳•׳"׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳™׳•׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳•׳×׳™' ׳“׳—׳•׳§ ׳›׳–׳” ׳ ׳’׳“ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳). ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“] ׳•׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ [׳₪׳›"׳” ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”'].
׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳׳׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳”׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳–׳¨׳ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™ ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳•, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨. [׳•׳‘׳׳–׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳ ׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳×׳ ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢].</small></small>, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜'- ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳’׳“׳•׳.</b> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳• ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳›׳•"׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ ׳©׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳›׳•"׳.</small></small> [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'- ׳™"׳’].  ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳§׳₪׳™׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦"׳© <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳×׳›׳•׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳–׳”. </small></small>, ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳₪׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳’׳׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳’׳׳™׳“׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳¢ ׳”׳₪׳©׳¨׳×׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳™'- ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•. ׳•׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳׳™׳×׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳•׳׳¨׳—׳™׳§ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳–׳”, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳›׳™ ׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳‘׳”] ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳•׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳›׳ "׳.</small></small>.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳’׳¨׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳’׳ ׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳׳™׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳©׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•. ׳׳׳©׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳' ׳•׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳]. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳™׳× ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳‘׳¨׳– ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳ ׳›׳©׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳›׳ ׳¡׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳×׳—׳׳׳•, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳•׳™׳” ׳”׳׳¢׳¨׳›׳× ׳•׳›׳©׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳׳©.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢
