(׳‘׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳׳×׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳™"׳–]),</small></small>.
׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳©׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳§׳¨׳¨, ׳•׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳₪׳×׳—׳• ׳’׳™׳׳” ׳©׳©׳›׳— ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳¨"׳©, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳– ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳›׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳—׳©׳׳׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳”, ׳©׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳׳ ׳›׳¡׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳ ׳–׳§. [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳—].</small></small>, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™, ׳•׳׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳×׳›׳•׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳—. ׳•׳‘׳˜׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳ '. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳™"׳- ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳™׳.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳”.</small></small> [׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳¡׳× (׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳¡׳×) ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <b>׳׳</b> ׳™׳×׳‘׳˜׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳×׳•, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳™׳ <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳™׳ [׳•׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¦"׳¢ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳]. </small></small>].  ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳–׳’׳ ׳™׳×׳‘׳˜׳׳• ׳׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘.  </small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳¢ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳™׳™׳’׳¨׳ ׳‘׳˜׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳–׳” <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳§׳¨׳׳• ׳”׳₪׳™׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳ ׳¢׳™׳׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳›"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳’], ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳₪׳׳׳• ׳‘׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• [׳•׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳׳—׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳׳׳“ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳§׳•׳©׳™ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳” ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳’, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳₪"׳• ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳– ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳₪׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳§׳›"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳“׳•׳¨׳ ׳• ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳¢׳•׳•׳”"׳¨ <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳™"׳‘- ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳.</b> ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳– ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳—׳₪׳– ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳‘׳§ ׳׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳•.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳₪׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳: ׳. ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳- ׳×׳₪׳׳¨׳× ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳›׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳. ׳‘. ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳—׳–׳§׳” ׳›"׳› ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳¡׳•׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳™ ׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳™"׳’- ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳—. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™ ׳©׳¨׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳©׳×׳׳”׳• ׳׳”׳• "׳—׳•׳׳¨׳"].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳™"׳“- ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳‘'.
<h3> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> <b>׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜"׳•- ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳.</b> ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳. <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳”, ׳›' ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳˜.</small></small> 
׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳×, ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳—׳׳•׳‘ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳.
<h3> ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳›׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•, ׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳’"׳ <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳.</small></small>: "׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳“׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳— ׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨", ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳¦׳•׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳¢׳–"׳” ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•.
BB׳. ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳'. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳‘׳“. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳¦׳™׳“׳“ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳׳” ׳׳¦׳. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳” ׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳›.</small></small>.
׳‘. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳˜׳¨ ׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳™"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳– ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>.
׳’. ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳”׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳™"׳—. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳©׳׳£ ׳’׳׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>.
׳“. ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳×, ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳§׳—׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳™׳§׳—׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳£ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳™׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'] ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳§׳™׳– ׳“׳ ׳׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳׳•׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳”׳₪׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳׳•׳×׳• [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳›"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳—, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳¢].</small></small>.
׳”. ׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳§ ׳׳• ׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳™׳‘׳© ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳“׳• <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×.</small></small>.
׳•. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳‘׳§ ׳׳‘׳’׳“, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>.
׳–. ׳™׳•׳׳“׳×, ׳׳• ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳©׳׳‘׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™׳× ׳›׳׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳—׳•׳§ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳™׳¨׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳׳” ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™׳× ׳©׳•׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳§׳¨׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳©׳₪׳—׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳©׳₪׳—׳” ׳©׳©׳•׳”׳” ׳¢׳׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳¨׳‘ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] ׳•׳׳₪׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳”׳¢׳“׳¨ ׳׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳§׳©׳×׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× [׳’׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳] ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳“׳¢׳×׳ <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳₪׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ [׳©׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳—'. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“.</small></small>.
׳—. ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘.EE
<h3> ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ - ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳•׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’, ׳”' ׳“"׳” ׳׳”׳—׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳›׳ <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳¡"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘ ׳©׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳”, ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳’.</small></small>.
׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“, ׳׳• ׳׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™] ׳•׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳™׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳™׳— ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳©, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳• <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳›׳©׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳׳×׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳], ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳•׳׳•׳©׳™׳˜ ׳™׳“׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳• <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳©׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳§׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳™׳“.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳‘' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳›׳™׳¨׳× ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳›׳©׳¨, ׳”׳׳•׳›׳¨ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳™׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳§׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳× ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳× ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¡׳•׳›׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳׳• ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳•׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳§׳™׳׳” ׳©׳•׳‘ <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳›"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳›. ׳›׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘, ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳‘׳•׳¡׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳‘׳׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳×׳•׳¡' [׳©׳‘׳× ׳¦׳”.] ׳™׳© "׳׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳×׳¨׳”" ׳•׳›׳•' ׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳•׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳׳¦׳¨׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳' ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”,  ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳›"׳• ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳™׳•"׳˜, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳›"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳—] ׳©׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳׳׳© [׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳“, ׳'], ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳’ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳”, ׳', ׳•׳"׳› ׳›׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳₪׳©׳¢ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳’׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳ "׳,  ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳§׳©׳” ׳”׳—׳׳“׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳– ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳© [׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘"׳׳×׳•׳" ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳™׳‘. ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳׳‘], ׳"׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳’׳™׳“׳•׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳™.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳ ׳׳• ׳₪׳׳˜׳” ׳—׳©׳׳׳™׳× ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ <b>׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜</b> ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳₪׳׳˜׳” ׳—׳©׳׳׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳—׳©׳׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳–׳’׳] ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳”, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳׳© ׳—׳“׳©׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳. ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳, ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳”׳׳‘׳•' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳§׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳•׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳¨,  ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳₪׳׳˜׳” ׳—׳©׳׳׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳© ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¦׳“ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳’ ׳׳–׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳™׳•"׳˜, ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳—] ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳₪׳׳˜׳” ׳—׳©׳׳׳™׳× ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜, ׳•׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳©׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳–׳”. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳‘׳›׳‘׳™׳© ׳›׳©׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳¢׳¦׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳•׳’׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳׳׳” ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳•׳׳×׳ ׳™׳¢ ׳©׳•׳‘ <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳‘׳ ׳”׳’ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ [׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™] ׳“׳¢׳× ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳–׳”"׳™ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“], ׳•׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• [׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳›"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳’], ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳”׳•׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳×׳• ׳•׳¢׳¦׳™׳¨׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳˜׳×׳• ׳•׳—׳™׳©׳•׳‘׳™ ׳¨׳•׳•׳— ׳•׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳©׳׳•. ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¨׳™׳•׳— ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳›׳׳•׳, ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳”.</small></small>.
RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›׳— - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳¡׳§</h2>
<h3> ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳• ׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳׳‘׳¢׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳‘׳¢׳” ׳×׳ ׳׳™׳:
BB׳. ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳×׳׳•׳¨׳× ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳‘׳§׳‘׳׳ ׳•׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳”׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳• ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳”.</small></small>], ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳—׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳˜׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳ ׳׳” <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¦׳™׳¢ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳˜׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳– ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳¨׳•׳™׳— ׳˜׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳§׳¦׳¥. ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳–, ׳“' ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳.</small></small> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small> <b>׳׳•</b> ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳–, ׳', ׳‘', ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“, ׳'.</small></small>.
׳‘. ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳×׳™ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳›.</small></small>.
׳’. ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳©׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“, ׳', ׳‘', ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘, ׳’'. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳¨׳׳™׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳—׳©׳“׳•׳”׳• ׳©׳©׳›׳¨׳• ׳׳₪׳™ ׳™׳׳™׳. ׳©׳ ׳¨׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳׳©"׳› ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳‘׳™׳›׳ "׳¡.</small></small> ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳“׳”] ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳—. ׳•׳¡׳™׳×׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¨׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳›"׳› ׳׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳©׳ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳”].</small></small>.
׳“. ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳•׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳–.</small></small>.EE
׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳™׳׳™׳ [׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳§׳‘׳׳ ׳•׳×] ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳—׳™׳ ׳ ג€“ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳× ׳'.
<h3> ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳• ׳×׳₪׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” [׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳], ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳• ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳” <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳”׳©׳•׳›׳¨ ׳§׳‘׳׳ ׳•׳”׳§׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳•׳›׳¨ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳¡׳§׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳‘׳׳ ג€“ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳§׳‘׳׳ ׳•׳×.
׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳©׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳”, ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳“׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳. 
<h3> ׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳“׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”, ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦', ׳©׳‘׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳.</small></small> ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳“׳• ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳•׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“ ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳–׳” ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳‘׳—׳™׳¨׳×׳• ׳•׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳׳¨׳׳™׳× ׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’] ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳•׳× ׳¡׳׳•׳™׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨, ׳׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳–] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳×׳₪׳¨׳¡׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳©׳•׳×׳£ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳₪׳¨׳¡׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©.</small></small> [׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳™׳•׳׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳—׳¦׳™ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳], ׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳×׳ ׳™׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳– ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳”, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>.
׳‘׳¢׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳׳•׳§׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳–׳”, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳¨׳™׳•׳•׳—׳™ ׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳‘׳׳¦׳‘ ׳›׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳¨׳™׳•׳•׳—׳™ ׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•. ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦' ׳•׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳”.</small></small> ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳“׳” ׳©׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳ ׳§׳˜׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳×׳§׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳©׳”׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳׳’׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳×׳§׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳׳•׳©׳›׳× ׳©׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• [׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳§], ׳™׳§׳‘׳¢׳• ׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳˜׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳×׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳’׳“׳• ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳•׳˜׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳‘׳“׳• ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳×׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳’.</small></small>.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳£ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳™׳© ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳•׳— ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳”, ׳' ׳‘׳¨׳"׳. ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳” ׳©׳‘׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳©׳™׳© ׳₪׳•׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳›׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳™׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳¢׳‘׳“׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳›׳ "׳, ׳׳ ׳׳—"׳› ׳ ׳×׳¨׳¦׳” ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳—׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳©׳•׳•׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳” ׳©׳•׳•׳”.</small></small>. ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳—׳©׳‘׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳’׳™׳׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳•׳™׳— ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳• ׳©׳™׳©׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳₪׳¨׳©- ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>.
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳“׳• ׳׳× ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳™׳×׳—׳׳§׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§ ׳©׳•׳” ׳‘׳©׳•׳” <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳”, ׳', ׳•׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳×׳” ׳×׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳¢׳׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳¢׳׳׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳“׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳”, ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳– ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳—׳• ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small>.
׳׳׳ ׳, ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳•׳× ׳‘׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳©׳×׳×׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳•׳— ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳× ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× [׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳¨] ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳›׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳“ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳׳ ׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ [׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™]</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ [׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™] <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜.</small></small> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳, ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳•׳× ׳©׳׳”׳ ׳©׳©׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳•׳¦׳׳•׳× [׳›׳•׳׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳׳§׳•׳] ׳•׳”׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳‘׳“׳•, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳׳‘׳“, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳×׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳˜.</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳×׳£ ׳¢׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳’.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳”׳¢׳¡׳§׳× ׳₪׳•׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳‘׳¢׳׳•׳×׳• ׳¢׳¡׳§, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳‘׳“׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¡׳§.
׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨: 
BB<b>׳.</b> ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳•׳×׳£ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳׳©׳׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳¦׳•׳‘ [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳¦׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳×׳•] <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳›׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
  <b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳“׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳׳• ׳—׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳©׳•׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳ "׳ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳’, ׳' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳” ׳•׳‘׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳§"׳”, ׳•׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳™׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳—׳©׳“׳•׳”׳• ׳©׳׳§׳— ׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳“׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳. ׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳‘׳׳™׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳•׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small>, ׳׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳©׳”׳׳©׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳›׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳–׳” <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘'.</small></small>.EE
׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳—׳–׳¨ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳™׳©׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳×׳₪׳¨׳¡׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ [׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™] ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳.
<h3> ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳—׳–"׳ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳׳ ׳•׳× [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳¡׳ ׳׳—׳•׳–׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳×] ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳©׳©׳•׳›׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳§׳‘׳ ׳¡׳ ׳׳—׳•׳–׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳¨׳•׳•׳— ׳”׳‘׳ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳‘, ׳•׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳©׳© ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳“ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¨׳›׳•׳© ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳–׳”. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳©׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳׳” ׳•׳›׳׳” ׳¢׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳©׳׳– ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳ "׳].</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳©׳•׳×׳£ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳—׳׳•׳§ ׳¢׳׳• ׳›׳ "׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳™׳×׳™׳× ׳›׳ "׳ <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳” ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳›"׳’ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳ "׳• ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¦"׳‘ ׳•׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• (׳‘).</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳•.
<h3> ׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳›׳•׳© ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳׳₪׳¢׳ ׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳”, ׳“', ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳•׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳—.</small></small>. 
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¡׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ["׳‘׳¨׳•׳§׳¨"] <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳’'.</small></small>, ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¡׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳™׳§׳ ׳”, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳× ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳™׳¡׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳§ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ "׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳§" ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳¡׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×- ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳–׳” ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳×׳¨׳¦׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳˜' ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳˜ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳¡"׳– ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™' ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳©׳׳׳× ׳•׳”׳©׳›׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳׳™׳ <b>׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳”</b> ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨</b> ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ <b>׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳•, ׳'. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¨׳•׳•׳— ׳׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳×. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“.</small></small></b>, [׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳©׳›׳™׳¨ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳] <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳‘"׳— ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳•׳§׳— ׳©׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳›׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳‘׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳’ ׳•׳”׳׳׳™׳” ׳¨׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳• ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳™ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳¡׳§"׳’] ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳—, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳׳© [׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳•]. (׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳•׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳™ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳— ׳׳•׳× ׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳© ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳¢"׳™ ׳—׳©׳׳] ׳’׳ ׳׳‘"׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳‘׳¢׳ ׳ ׳₪׳©).</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳‘׳׳™׳¢ ׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳•׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳©׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳™׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳• ׳׳›׳׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳•, ׳'. ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳”׳‘׳׳¢׳” ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳˜ ׳¡׳˜"׳•. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳©׳׳׳× ׳•׳”׳©׳›׳¨׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ [׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™]</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™] <b>׳¨׳§ ׳׳</b> ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>[׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳•׳˜׳ ׳•׳”׳—׳˜׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳”׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳—׳•׳˜׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳™׳’ ׳׳’׳•׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ [׳•׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳™׳’ ׳׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨- ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳” ׳•׳׳•׳” ׳₪"׳‘ ׳”"׳‘ ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳•׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›"׳™ ׳—׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡', ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳’ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳¨], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳‘ ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳›׳×"׳¡ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳—. [׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨ ׳—׳ ׳•׳×]. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳ ׳•.</small></small>.

<h3> ׳©׳׳™׳—׳× ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳™׳©׳׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳•׳— ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳“׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳§׳¦׳¥ ׳©׳›׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—], ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳–, ׳'. </small></small>.
׳׳©׳׳•׳— ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳™׳¨ ("׳׳§׳¡׳₪׳¨׳¡"), ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳×׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳’׳™׳¢ ׳×׳•׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¢׳“׳• ׳•׳׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳”, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳›׳׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×] <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳•׳׳•׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳©׳•׳׳—׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳•׳— ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳›׳׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small> [׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳×׳ ׳”׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳• ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳, ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›'.</small></small>], ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳×׳‘, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳—, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳“׳•׳׳¨ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳— ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳“׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳×׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳”. </small></small>. 
<h3> ׳׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳•׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳¡ ׳•׳׳©׳׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳©׳”׳—׳•׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¨׳׳–] ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳, ׳׳ ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳” ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳—׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳—׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳’׳¨׳©׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳—׳©׳“׳•׳”׳• ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳¢׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳•׳׳¢׳× ׳׳• ׳•׳©׳•׳׳—׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳©׳׳•׳— ׳׳•, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳“׳¢׳” ׳¢׳ ׳×׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳“׳•׳׳¨- "׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳™ ׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×" ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳©׳“׳•׳”׳• [׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳›׳–׳” ׳”׳׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×] ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳—׳׳§ ׳•׳™׳‘׳§׳© ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.
׳•׳‘׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳׳—׳׳§ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨. </small></small> [׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳], ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳•׳˜׳•׳׳˜׳™׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳¨ ׳׳–׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳•׳˜׳•׳׳˜׳™׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳¨ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳©׳×׳™׳” ׳”׳₪׳•׳¢׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳’׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳›׳–׳”.
׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳›׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳”׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” ׳׳•׳˜׳•׳׳˜׳™׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳›׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳׳›׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳–׳׳, ׳•׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳׳ ׳›׳].
׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳§׳— ׳•׳׳׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•"׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳ ׳¡׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳§׳ ׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¡׳—׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳§׳ ׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳§׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳”, ׳”'] ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•"׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳§׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳”, ׳“', ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳§׳ ׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳—׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳©׳§׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳•׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•"׳.  ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳©׳™׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳"׳› ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨.  ׳•׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳"׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳׳•׳§׳— ׳׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳׳•"׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳¢׳•׳¡׳§ ׳¢׳׳•. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳•׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳• ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳].</small></small>.
׳•׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳›׳׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳§׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳›׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳ ׳•׳× <b>׳©׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™</b>- ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”'], ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳- ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳˜׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• [׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳•] ׳›׳×׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳“׳ ׳”׳¨׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳›׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳.  ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳” ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ [׳¢׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳•׳“׳’׳"׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳•] ׳•׳ ׳˜׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳© ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳•׳ ׳” ׳₪׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ "׳.  ׳•׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”'.</small></small>.

RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›׳˜ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳×</h2>
<h3> ׳”׳§׳“׳׳”</h3>
XX ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳ ׳‘׳™׳ [׳™׳©׳¢׳™׳”׳• ׳ ׳—, ׳™׳’-׳™׳“] ׳•׳›׳™׳‘׳“׳×׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨, ׳•׳ ׳׳׳“׳• ׳׳–׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳™׳™׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳×׳” ׳•׳”׳‘׳“׳׳×׳” ׳׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳, ׳׳£ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳"׳˜ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳׳× ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳׳¢׳¡׳§׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¡׳§׳™ ׳§׳•׳“׳©, ׳׳׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳׳”׳×׳¢׳¡׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳‘׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳× ׳׳¢׳׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳£ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨׳• ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳“׳¨׳©׳• ׳—׳–"׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳–׳™׳׳–׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.
׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳"׳© ׳§׳•׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ [׳‘׳—׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“׳© ׳¢׳"׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳–.] ׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳— ׳•׳׳׳›׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘. ׳•׳”׳§' ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳£ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳™׳›"׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳’׳ ׳™׳, ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•"׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳–׳” ׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳›' ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳’"׳› ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳. ׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳©׳‘ ׳©׳׳•"׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳–׳™׳׳–׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳–׳׳–׳•׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳– ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳׳” ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳׳¦׳¢׳™ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳–׳׳–׳•׳ ׳›"׳›.
׳•׳–׳” ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳ ׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳, ׳•׳”׳§' ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳–׳™׳׳–׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳¢׳¡׳•׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳•׳.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳—׳¡׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳¦ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳™ ׳›׳— ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳–׳” ׳–׳™׳׳–׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–.</small></small>.  GG
<h3> ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳¦׳‘ ׳ ׳›׳¡׳™׳• ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳׳•׳׳ ׳•׳× ׳›׳©׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳׳•׳׳ ׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳× ׳׳—׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳ ׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳” ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳–׳•׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳¡׳™׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¨׳×׳• ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳× ׳׳¦׳‘ ׳—׳ ׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¨׳¦׳” <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳• [׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳©׳¡׳§"׳• ׳§׳׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳’׳™׳”׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳™׳£].</small></small> [׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳’׳ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳’׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳•׳×׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳.</small></small>].
׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳×׳¦׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳©׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳”. ׳•׳›׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳™"׳’ ׳©׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳¨׳•׳•׳— ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ [׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳₪"׳› ׳”"׳–].</small></small>.
׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳›׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳›׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¡׳™׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳™׳.</small></small>. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳’׳¨׳׳× ׳׳• ׳˜׳¨׳“׳× ׳”׳׳‘ ׳•׳“׳׳’׳” <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳”׳”</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳× ׳¨׳“׳‘"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳¦ ׳•׳©׳¢"׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳.</small></small> ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳”׳•, ׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳” [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳¦׳ ׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳”], ׳׳•׳×׳¨.
<h3> ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳—׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳”</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳—׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳›׳• ׳›׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳×׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳×׳ ׳‘׳—׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳¨׳׳•׳” ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•, <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳˜ ׳”׳¢' ׳›"׳’] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳׳”], ׳•׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳×׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳•׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳¢ ׳׳׳›׳™׳¨׳”, ׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳ ׳ ׳’׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳˜׳¨׳“׳× ׳”׳׳‘ ׳•׳“׳׳’׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small> ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳¡׳—׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳§׳ ׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳, ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳˜׳¨׳“׳” ׳•׳“׳׳’׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳×.
׳—׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳×׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳”׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¡׳§׳™׳• [׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳™׳’ ׳”׳׳•׳₪׳™׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳’ ׳׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳—׳׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳ ׳§ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳” ׳©׳ ׳“׳•׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳© ׳•׳›׳“׳•'].
<h3> ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳”׳‘׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳” <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳’, ׳¢׳™"׳© ׳”׳˜׳¢׳.</small></small>], ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳—׳•׳©׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳“"׳” ׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳•׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ [׳”׳׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳-׳“] ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳’׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳’׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳”. <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳—. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳˜ ׳׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳•׳— ׳׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳. <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘"׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨" ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳§׳ ׳™׳” ׳•׳׳×׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳§׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳§׳— ׳•׳׳׳›׳¨. <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳’, ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ [׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•] ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳‘׳₪"׳’] ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘. ׳•׳׳¨׳©"׳™ [׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳–.] ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳›׳–: ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳—׳׳™׳” ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳™"׳’ ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳— ׳•׳׳׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳]. ׳•׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”"׳–] ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳•׳”׳׳•׳›׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳©׳“׳ ׳• ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™.</small></small>
׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳§׳ ׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳¨ [׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦] <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳‘׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘.</small></small> '׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳₪׳׳•׳ ׳™' ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳—׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳§׳ [׳׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳“׳”], ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳§׳ ׳•׳×.  ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳§׳ ׳׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳©׳§׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳׳—׳•׳‘ ׳™׳©׳, ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳§׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™ ׳׳¦׳׳ ׳—׳׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳§׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¢׳×׳” ׳—׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳” ׳©׳§׳.
׳•׳”׳׳™׳§׳ ׳׳§׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳©׳§׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳׳“׳™׳“׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳ ׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳—׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳׳”׳•׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳“׳”. <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’, ׳, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳§׳— ׳•׳׳׳›׳¨ ׳•׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳§׳— ׳•׳׳׳›׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”. <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳•"׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘. ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳"׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—. [׳‘׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳– ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳•'] ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳ [׳©׳ ׳¡"׳’] ׳‘׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳× ׳¡׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳— ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳¦׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'], ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨. ׳•׳–׳” ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳“׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳–.
׳›׳¨׳˜׳™׳¡׳™׳ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳™׳¢׳•׳“ ׳”׳›׳¨׳˜׳™׳¡ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ (׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳–׳” ׳›׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨ ׳›׳¡׳£), ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳—׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳¨׳˜׳™׳¡ ׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳˜׳™׳¡ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• (׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳‘׳• ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳• ׳¡׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•'). ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳—׳–׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳”. <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•' ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ "׳׳‘׳ ׳׳©׳•׳›׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¡׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨" ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳©׳•׳›׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¡׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳¦"׳ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳•"׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳•׳›׳¨׳• ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳•׳›׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳–׳›׳¨׳× ׳¡׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳—, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳₪"׳” [׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳“׳§׳׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳–׳›׳¨׳× ׳׳¢׳•׳×].</small></small>
׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳׳—׳•׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳” ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳™׳•"׳˜, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳•׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳“׳•׳•׳§׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳. <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳§׳— ׳•׳׳׳›׳¨ [׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳”].
׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳×, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳¥ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳₪ ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳›"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳¡ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳§׳׳— ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳׳™׳. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳×׳ ׳™' ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳˜. ׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳×׳ ׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳”׳§׳©׳” ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳¦׳“׳§׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳×׳™' ׳©׳‘׳₪׳¡׳™׳§׳× ׳¦׳“׳§׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳™ ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳— ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳ ׳“׳‘ ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳©׳׳§׳“׳™׳©׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡, ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳ ׳›׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳— ׳•׳׳׳›׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”.
׳•׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳”׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳¦"׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳¡׳•: ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳” ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳© ׳©׳” ׳׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¡׳— ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳₪ ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳¥ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳₪ ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳§׳׳— ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳‘ ׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳׳™׳. ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳© ׳•׳—׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§׳× ׳¦׳“׳§׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳, ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳ ׳׳—׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳›׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳ ׳—. ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳™.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳›׳™׳¨׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳×׳׳•׳¨׳× ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳. <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳’. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳•"׳ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳— ׳•׳׳׳›׳¨.</small></small>
<h3> ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳׳׳×׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳‘׳—׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳×׳”׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘"׳׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳ ׳™׳"</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳‘׳¨׳× ׳×׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘"׳׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳ ׳™׳", ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳׳׳×׳§, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳׳×׳ ׳”. <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳—, ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳”׳׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳׳×׳§ ׳©׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳˜"׳–, ׳' [׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳›׳׳], ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳”.</small></small>
<h3> ׳—׳׳•׳× ׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳™׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳” [׳׳£ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳“׳”׳×׳ ׳”׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳§׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳©׳™׳›׳”], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳˜ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” [׳׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳] ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳', ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳©׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳¨׳׳™׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳•׳"׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™׳•.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”. <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳“׳׳׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜' ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘. ׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳“׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳ [׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳₪ײ¸׳“׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×] ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳©׳™׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳“׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳•׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳• ׳©׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳©׳™׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳₪׳“׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳©׳™׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳
