׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳—׳׳¥ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳•"׳ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳–' [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳”׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳–].
׳¢׳. ׳•׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳×׳ ׳” ׳©׳”׳׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳• ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳‘׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳¡׳’׳™ ׳"׳› ׳”׳׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳”׳¢׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳™ײ·׳§׳ ׳” ׳׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳•׳™׳–׳›׳” ׳׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳×׳ ׳”. ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳₪׳™׳§׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳₪׳™׳§׳“׳•׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳™׳–׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳×׳ ׳”. <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳”׳¨"׳™ ׳׳¡׳׳“ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳’. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳’ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•.</small></small>
<h3> ׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳•׳׳—׳™׳׳× ׳—׳•׳‘</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳×׳•׳¡' ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳”. <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳•. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳“׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳.</small></small>
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳׳”].</small></small>
<h3> ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳•׳–׳›׳™׳” ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳“. ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳ ׳”׳' ׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳₪"׳— ׳”"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳–׳›׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳˜׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳›. ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳”׳•׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳׳"׳” ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳•׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳›"׳› ׳©׳ ׳׳•"׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳”.</small></small> ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳×׳ ׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳” ׳”׳™׳•׳, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳—׳׳¥ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ["׳׳™׳‘׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳™׳”׳•׳™ <b>׳”׳₪׳§׳¨</b> ׳›׳¢׳₪׳¨׳ ׳“׳׳¨׳¢׳"- ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳] ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳¢׳¨ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳. <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳“. ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳©׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳—׳׳¥ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳–. ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳—׳׳¦׳• ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™׳•"׳˜, ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳, ׳"׳› ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳©׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳’׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳”׳§׳“׳© ׳•׳¢׳¨׳ ׳•׳—׳¨׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳¨׳” ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳׳›׳¨, ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¨ ׳׳’׳' ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳. ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳•. ׳“׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳”׳×׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳“׳׳׳™ - ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳¨ ׳ ׳›׳¡׳™׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳™ ׳׳›׳ ׳—׳–׳™ ׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.
׳¢׳”. ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳“ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳‘׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳¢׳₪׳¨׳ ׳“׳׳¨׳¢׳. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳”׳•׳™ ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳›׳¢׳₪׳¨׳ ׳“׳׳¨׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳” ׳׳›׳•"׳¢, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳₪ ׳”׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳–׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳›׳ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳¦׳™ "׳‘׳ ׳×׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳”׳׳›׳”" 1-2 ׳ ׳™׳¡׳ ׳•׳׳™׳™׳¨ ׳×׳©׳¡"׳—, ׳•׳”׳‘׳׳×׳™ ׳©׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳], ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳׳¥ ׳›׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳” ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳“׳© ׳•׳—׳¨׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳—. ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳”"׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳©׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳. ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳’׳' ׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳' ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳–. ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳™׳•׳©׳‘ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¨׳‘׳• ׳•׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¢׳™׳¡׳” ׳©׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳×׳—׳׳™׳¥ ׳™׳‘׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳‘׳• ׳•׳¡"׳ ׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳׳›׳× ׳•׳׳‘׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¡׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳—׳׳¥ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳™׳¡׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳“].</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳™׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’, ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>
׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳“׳₪׳•׳¡׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳©׳™׳.</small></small> ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳–׳›׳•׳× ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳–׳›׳•׳× ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳–׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳“׳׳™׳§׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳›׳™׳” ׳׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳˜׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳›׳™׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳”׳₪׳§׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳” ׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳¨׳׳™׳•׳×׳™׳•. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳§׳”"׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳–׳•׳›׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳–׳•׳›׳” ׳‘׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳§׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳“׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳×׳™ ׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳–׳•׳›׳”, ׳•׳"׳ ׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳•"׳, ׳•׳™׳"׳¢. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘"׳ ׳™׳‘. ׳“"׳” ׳–׳¨׳§ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳‘ ׳׳”׳' ׳ ׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳™"׳“].</small></small>
<h3> ׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳§׳— ׳•׳׳׳›׳¨, ׳•׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳”׳©׳˜׳¨. <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳–.</small></small>
<h3> ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳§׳— ׳•׳׳׳›׳¨ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small>. ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳›׳¨׳× ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳™׳‘׳™׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳’. ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¨׳™׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳‘׳ ׳§ ׳׳₪׳§"׳ ׳™׳•׳׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳ ׳§ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳©׳¢׳” 12 ׳‘׳׳™׳׳”. ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳˜] ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳§׳— ׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳— ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳™׳×׳ ׳”׳• ׳׳¦׳“׳§׳”, ׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳’׳׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§ [׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳“:] ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳— ׳“׳׳"׳  ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳” ׳׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳˜"׳•], ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳˜"׳– [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¢׳™ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳׳¢׳”].</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¨׳™׳‘׳™׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳§׳“׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳ ׳§]. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳–׳§ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳₪׳©׳•׳˜, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳ ׳•׳‘׳™"׳× ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳•.</small></small>
׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳×׳”׳"׳“ [׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳’] ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×.
<h3> ׳”׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳”׳©׳•׳›׳¨ ׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳•׳“׳© ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳™ ׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳™׳—׳“, ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳•׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳‘׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳”׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳›׳¨׳• ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳›׳¨ ׳׳•׳‘׳׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¢׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳”׳—׳•׳“׳©׳™׳×, ׳•׳”׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳“' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>
׳•׳׳›׳, ׳”׳©׳•׳›׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳‘׳¦׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ [׳›׳׳ ׳¡' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'] ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳¢׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳‘׳׳¢׳× ׳‘׳×׳§׳•׳₪׳× ׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳×׳™׳™׳׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× "׳©׳׳¨׳˜׳£" ("׳‘׳™׳™׳‘׳™׳¡׳™׳˜׳¨") ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳×, ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳× ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”"׳©׳׳¨׳˜׳£" ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¢׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳—׳•׳“׳©׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳™׳•׳׳™ ׳•׳›׳ "׳.
<h3> ׳”׳—׳׳₪׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳×׳׳•׳¨׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳£ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳” ׳×׳׳•׳¨׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳”, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳›׳ ׳•׳‘׳×׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳•. <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳™'.</small></small>
<h3> ׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨] <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳–׳׳, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳›׳¨ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳–׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳׳›׳¡ ׳׳–׳׳ [׳׳• ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳•׳™׳— ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳×] ׳©׳׳– ׳”׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳ ׳•׳‘"׳™ ׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳• (׳‘׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™) ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳•. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b>  ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳˜.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳¢׳•׳×. <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳”' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳₪"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'.</small></small>
׳•׳׳›׳ ׳—׳–׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳©׳×׳“׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳, ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳•׳׳׳× ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳™׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳—׳“ - ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳™׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢] ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳¨׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳–"׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳. ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳×׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳×׳ ׳‘׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳•׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳™׳§׳— ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳•׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳׳•׳‘׳׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳›׳¨ ׳”׳”׳›׳ ׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳™׳“׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳•׳–׳•׳›׳¨ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳©׳¢׳‘׳¨׳” [׳•׳׳”׳™׳₪׳, ׳׳™ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“׳© ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳×] ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ (׳׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳) ׳©׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳›׳¨׳• ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳“׳¢ ׳”׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳׳“ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”.</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”]. ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳– ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳×׳ ׳”. <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳¢"׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“. ׳•׳׳”׳׳•׳•׳× ׳׳—׳–׳ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳—"׳› ׳™׳ ׳›׳” ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳• ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳׳×׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳×׳”׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳”׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳×׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳. <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳©׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳›׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳“׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳×׳×׳ ׳”׳’ ׳™׳₪׳” ׳×׳§׳‘׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳“׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳“ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳”, ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳׳×׳ ׳”].
<h3> ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳™׳׳“׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳™׳׳“׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳×׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳–׳›׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳™ ׳”׳•׳˜׳ ׳¨ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳׳׳—׳ ׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳• ׳׳¨׳₪׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳׳˜ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳"׳– ׳׳׳¦׳¨ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¦"׳‘ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳–׳”].</small></small>
<h3> ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳׳©׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳₪׳”. <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜, ׳“'. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳‘׳™' ׳“׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳—׳•׳₪׳” ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳§׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳×׳” ׳•׳׳׳¦׳™׳׳×׳” ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳™׳“׳™׳” [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳›. ׳‘׳“׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™"׳£ ׳›׳¢׳™"׳–]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳©׳‘׳׳‘׳ "׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳•׳‘׳¡׳"׳¢ [׳—׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳¦] ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳“׳׳™׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳׳©׳” ׳©׳•׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳•׳˜׳” ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳”׳¡׳"׳¢ ׳©׳–׳” ׳’׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳¡׳£ ׳©׳™׳•׳•׳™. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳’׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳˜: ׳“"׳” ׳•׳§׳.</small></small> ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳” ׳•׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳₪׳” ׳•׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳™׳©׳ ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳”׳׳׳•׳. <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¦׳™׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳˜׳¨ ׳—׳׳™׳¦׳”. ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳›. </small></small> ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳™׳‘׳׳™׳. <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳§׳•׳ ׳” ׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳”. ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳©׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳’׳˜ ׳©׳›׳™׳‘ ׳׳¨׳¢ ׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳.
<h3> ׳”׳§׳“׳© ׳•׳₪׳“׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳”׳§׳“׳©, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳“׳©, ׳•׳׳ ׳₪׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳’׳‘׳•׳”, ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳©׳•׳™. <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳—.</small></small>
<h3> ׳”׳×׳¨׳× ׳•׳”׳₪׳¨׳× ׳ ׳“׳¨׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳ ׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳“׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳] ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳“׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳], ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳• ׳™׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳“׳¨. <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳, ׳', ׳‘' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳˜׳™׳¨׳—׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳›"׳—, ׳’' ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>
׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨ ׳ ׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳ ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳˜׳׳™ ׳•׳׳›׳׳™ ׳˜׳׳™ ׳•׳©׳×׳™ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘. ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳™׳¢ ׳׳‘׳¢׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳“׳¨׳•. <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“.</small></small>
<h3> ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳“׳™׳ "׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨" ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳” ׳—׳׳§׳™׳:
BB<b>׳.</b>  ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳₪׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳₪׳” ׳—׳©׳‘׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳¢׳¡׳§׳™׳•, <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳”.</small></small> ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳” ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳•׳¨׳™׳•׳— ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳˜׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢ ׳׳׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳” ׳¢׳׳” ׳׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳. <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳–, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>
 <b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳, <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳™׳’: ׳₪׳™׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳§׳— ׳•׳׳׳›׳¨ ׳•׳—׳©׳‘׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳–׳” ׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳—׳” ׳‘׳˜׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳׳™ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳“׳•׳—׳§ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳§ [׳©׳, ׳'] ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳×׳•׳¡'.
׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳˜: ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳׳× ׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳׳“׳• ׳׳¢׳ ׳׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳—׳× ׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳¨׳‘׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× !.</small></small> ׳•׳׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’ ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳”׳¡׳™׳₪׳•׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢, <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳•. ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳•׳׳¥ ׳׳”׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳ ׳× ׳—׳¡׳™׳“׳™׳ [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘׳”"׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳–׳•׳”׳¨ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ '׳׳—׳׳׳™׳”' [׳©׳׳•׳× ׳׳, ׳™׳“] ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>].
 <b>׳’.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳– ׳׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳§׳©׳” ׳‘׳₪׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• '׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳×׳”׳™׳” ׳₪׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘'? ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳•׳›׳¨׳•]. <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳‘', ׳—' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small> ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳”, ׳©׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳•: "׳™׳© ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳׳•׳ ׳™" ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨: "׳™׳© ׳׳•׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳₪׳׳•׳ ׳™׳×", ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳– ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¡׳¢ ׳׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳¡׳¢ ׳׳©׳ <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ '׳™׳© ׳׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳–׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳₪׳׳•׳ ׳™', ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳, ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳¨׳׳–, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳•.</small></small>. <h3> ׳’׳“׳¨ ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨, ׳•׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳•</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳• ׳”׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳™׳©׳׳¢, <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳•, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳₪׳¨׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳•, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¢׳¡׳§׳™׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳ ׳ ׳’׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳˜׳¨׳“׳× ׳”׳׳‘ ׳•׳“׳׳’׳” ׳׳›׳. <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳˜.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳–.</b> ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳ "׳. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨, ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”. <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳’.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳—.</b> ׳׳“׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳’׳© ׳׳× ׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• "׳©׳‘׳×׳ ׳˜׳‘׳" ׳׳• "׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳•׳" ׳׳• "׳’׳•׳˜ ׳©׳‘׳×" ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳׳” ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•', ׳•׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳“׳©׳•. <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small>
<h3> ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳˜.</b> ׳׳“׳ ׳”׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳›׳— ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳–׳׳–׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳•׳׳׳™׳” ׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳׳©"׳› ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳‘׳—׳ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳–׳׳–׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳. ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳- ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'.
<h3> ׳©׳׳™׳׳” ׳•׳”׳׳•׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳”׳©׳•׳׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳׳” ['׳×׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™'] ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳” ['׳×׳׳•׳” ׳׳™'], ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳“׳’׳™׳© ׳©׳׳•׳•׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨. [׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳©׳׳™׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳”, ׳¦"׳¢]. <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳™"׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳” ׳›' ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳•׳™׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘.
׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢"׳– ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳׳ ׳™ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳×׳ ׳׳™, ׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¡׳"׳’ [׳׳׳•׳™׳ ׳¡׳” ׳›"׳‘, ׳¢"׳’] ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢"׳– ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳׳ ׳™, ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳•׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳•׳׳” ׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳™׳׳” ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳.</small></small>
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›׳˜* - ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳×</h2>

׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳. <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳׳” ׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳×, ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳˜׳–: ׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳—׳©׳‘׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳™׳’׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳׳•׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳×, ׳“׳₪׳™ ׳×׳©׳׳•׳׳™׳ [׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳, ׳׳—׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳˜׳׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”], ׳×׳׳•׳©׳™ ׳”׳ ׳—׳”, ׳׳—׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳•׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳₪׳¨׳¡׳•׳׳×, ׳›׳×׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳¡׳—׳¨ ׳•׳›׳׳›׳׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”. <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳¡׳—׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× [׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”] [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳™"׳‘, ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳›]. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳׳׳× ׳™׳¢׳‘׳¥ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳‘. ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳›׳×׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳¡׳—׳¨ ׳•׳›׳׳›׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳¨׳©׳™׳׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳¨׳©׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳×, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§. <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳– ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳“.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳¨׳©׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳©׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳. <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳¨׳©׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳׳—׳•׳§] <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳¡, ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” [׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳›], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳™"׳‘ ׳–׳™׳׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳•' ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳•׳”׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳©׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳¨׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳–׳• ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳“׳•׳—׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳–׳• ׳“׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳¨׳§׳—׳× ׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¡׳¢׳“׳• ׳׳§׳•׳“׳.  ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳׳—׳•׳§ [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳׳¦׳].</small></small> [׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳—], ׳‘׳¨׳©׳™׳׳× ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳™׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•] ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”.
׳¨׳©׳™׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× [׳›׳¨׳©׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳”], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨. <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳”, ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳"׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳©׳™׳׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳× ׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× (׳׳•׳׳ ׳₪׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”) ׳׳• ׳¨׳›׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳¢"׳’ ׳׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳–׳” [׳•׳›׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳©׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳ "׳¢׳¡׳§" ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳]. ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳¡׳×׳׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳׳’.</b> ׳׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳¡׳—׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳•׳ [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳”] ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£, <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳™"׳’, ׳™"׳“. ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳“׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳©׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£, ׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳›׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳©׳˜"׳”, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳›' ׳©׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳×׳•׳¡' ׳•׳›׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳¨׳•׳—׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳’׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳›׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳” ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳” [׳•׳‘׳”׳׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳ ׳˜׳• ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™] ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳¡׳¨.
׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳’׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§ [׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳§] ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳©׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳ [׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳“׳׳”"׳˜ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳›׳™ ׳©׳ ׳“׳™׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”].</small></small> ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳•׳›׳×, <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳¢"׳  ׳׳™ ׳ ׳×׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳₪׳¨׳•׳›׳×.</small></small> ׳¨׳›׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳•׳¦׳¨, ׳׳•׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳×, <sup>׳¢׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳“׳¢׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳׳—׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳’׳•׳© ׳׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳׳—׳”, ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳.</small></small> ׳©׳׳•׳× ׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳×, ׳׳•׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳, ׳”׳ ׳¦׳—׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”.
׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳“׳¢׳” ׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳₪׳’׳•׳© ׳׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳׳—׳” ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳׳—׳ ׳׳• ׳׳–"׳˜. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳© ׳׳׳¨׳›׳™׳‘ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳›׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳¨. <sup>׳¢׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳¨׳©׳™׳׳× ׳¨׳›׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳, ׳"׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳” ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™׳’׳¨׳× ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳×׳” [׳©"׳–, ׳™"׳’, ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳’], ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳”׳›׳×׳‘.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳× ׳©׳׳•.
<h3> ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳“.</b> ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳׳• <sup>׳₪</sup><small><small>׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳׳˜. ׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳•׳¢׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳©׳˜"׳”].
׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳’׳ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳•׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳©׳˜"׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”, ׳"׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳“׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳”׳׳ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳˜. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳˜׳–:, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳” ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳’׳ ׳ ׳˜׳• ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳•׳›׳ ׳¡"׳ ׳׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳•׳”׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳¢׳₪"׳› ׳¡"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳”׳׳ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳—׳׳£ ׳‘׳©׳˜"׳”, ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“׳¢ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳×׳™ ׳׳׳™׳—׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™׳“׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳׳×׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳“׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳×׳™ ׳׳׳™׳—׳׳£ ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳׳×׳. [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳].</small></small>, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳”. <sup>׳₪׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳©׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳• ׳׳× ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳׳×׳™׳¨. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳׳£ ׳©'׳•׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨' ׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳'] ׳•׳›׳ '׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳¨׳›׳™׳' ׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳©׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳‘'], ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳˜"׳” ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’.  ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳₪"׳— ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳“ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳”, ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳—׳׳£ ׳‘׳©׳˜"׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳׳™׳“׳¢ [׳׳”׳¡׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳”] ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳₪"׳‘, ׳©׳©׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳—׳׳£ ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳×.  ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳¢׳¦׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳• ׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳©׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳“ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳׳×׳• ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳×׳—׳× ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳¦׳“׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳, <sup>׳₪׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¨׳§ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳™׳¨׳׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳ "׳—], ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳׳—׳•׳§ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳–], ׳•׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳¦׳“׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳–׳”. [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳™׳¨׳׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳“׳¢ ׳׳™ ׳”׳¦׳“׳™׳§ ׳׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳–׳” ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳™].
׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳×׳—׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳™׳¨׳׳× ׳©׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳›׳ "׳.</small></small> [׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳™׳¨׳׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ - ׳•׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳™.
׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ <sup>׳₪׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳© [׳¢׳' ׳¡׳— ׳•׳¢׳' ׳¡׳˜] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳׳™"׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳¨׳•׳, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳” <sup>׳₪׳“</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨"׳™׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳˜׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©"׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳—׳׳•׳×" ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳¡׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳׳—׳׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳˜׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” (׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳) <sup>׳₪׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ [׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“, ׳’׳¨"׳– ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'] ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳' ׳•׳”׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳™׳•׳§׳ ׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳©׳‘׳×.  ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳”, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳—"׳’ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳׳— ׳‘׳©׳׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳’׳™׳”׳</h3>
<b>׳׳”.</b> ׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™ ׳—׳“׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳, <sup>׳₪׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£. ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¢׳§׳‘ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳”׳׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳×׳¨׳•׳×].
׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳׳—׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳— ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳—׳” ׳׳”׳, ׳•׳׳–׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳”׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳§׳• ׳”׳׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳™׳“׳•׳¢.</small></small> ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳’׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳¡׳—׳¨ ׳•׳›׳׳›׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳“׳©׳•׳×. <sup>׳₪׳–</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¢׳‘׳¥ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳‘] ׳•׳ ׳–׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳–], ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳”׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳—׳“.</small></small>
׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳©׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳—׳“׳©׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳›׳×׳‘׳•׳× ׳¡׳×׳׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳™׳¨׳׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳׳×׳, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳, <sup>׳₪׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳, ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳•׳—׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳₪׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳׳×׳• ׳“׳—׳” ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳–] ׳׳× ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ [׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳•׳”׳“׳¢"׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–] ׳”׳׳™׳§׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘, ׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳’׳ ׳×׳•׳¡' [׳§׳˜׳–:] ׳•׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳¡׳‘׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳—׳׳•׳× [׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳˜.], ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳• ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳” ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳—׳׳•׳§ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳“׳¢ ׳“׳׳×׳™ ׳׳׳™׳—׳׳£ ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳™׳“׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳׳×׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳›׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳], ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳׳ [׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–]. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳—׳–׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£, ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳›׳×׳‘ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳©׳˜"׳” ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳™׳“׳¢ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳™ ׳׳׳™׳—׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™׳“׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳׳×׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’. ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳•"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳"׳” ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’, ׳•׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ [׳”׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¢׳‘׳¥ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳‘ ׳•׳”׳ ׳–׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳–] ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳×׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳׳×׳.
׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳•׳—׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳• ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳×׳.</small></small> [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳”], ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳×׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳.  ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳׳•׳“׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳¡׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳¡׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳¦</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳—׳–"׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳™׳©׳₪׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳• ׳•׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳׳¨׳•׳׳׳ ׳׳“׳¨ ׳×׳©׳¡"׳’] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳' ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳×].</small></small> [׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳—׳•׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳¡׳•׳׳•׳×].
׳›׳×׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳׳›׳׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳—׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳. <sup>׳¦׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳׳×׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳׳©. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>
׳›׳×׳‘׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳. <sup>׳¦׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳×׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳¡׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳×׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳¡׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“.</small></small>
׳›׳×׳‘׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳—׳›׳׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳.
<h3> ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳—׳›׳׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳•.</b> ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳—׳›׳׳•׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳—׳›׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”], ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳“׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳×, ׳•׳™׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳™׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳₪"׳“. <sup>׳¦׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳”.</small></small>
׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳”. <sup>׳¦׳“</sup><small><small>׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳—׳›׳׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳׳™׳—׳׳£ ׳‘׳©׳˜"׳” ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳— ׳•׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳©׳¢"׳‘. ׳•׳”׳ ׳¡׳•׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳׳׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳—׳›׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳ "׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳›׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳¡׳•׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳—׳›׳׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳™׳—׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳×. ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳׳•׳׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳–.</b> ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳×׳— ׳•׳¢׳׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¢׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳©׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳—׳“׳©׳•׳× [׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳”], ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳—׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳“׳¢ [׳›׳׳• ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¡׳˜׳•׳¨׳™׳”], ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”. <sup>׳¦׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳˜"׳–. ׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳© [׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳“] ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳₪׳× ׳”׳¢׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳× ׳‘׳—׳׳§׳” ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳˜׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳׳“ ׳›׳™׳“׳•׳¢, ׳•׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳–׳׳×, ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳–׳™׳•׳× ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳׳•׳“ ׳“"׳× ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳˜׳¢׳”. [׳’׳ ׳ ׳¡׳×׳₪׳§׳×׳™ ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳× ׳”׳“׳¨׳›׳™ ׳׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ "׳•׳׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”" ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳“"׳× ׳׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳׳©׳ ׳׳׳¢׳׳× ׳”׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳©׳׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨].</small></small>
׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳׳“׳•׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¨׳׳× ׳©׳׳™׳. <sup>׳¦׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳ "׳—.</small></small>
׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢' ׳₪"׳“ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳׳.
<h3> ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳—.</b> ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳¦׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”. ׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳“ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§.</small></small> ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳•׳× ׳”׳¦׳“׳§׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳”׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ <sup>׳¦׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳—׳™׳§׳”, ׳•׳׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳˜ ׳•׳׳“׳”׳›׳™ ׳׳™׳“׳›׳¨, ׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳¨׳“׳‘"׳– ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳¦ ׳•׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳•׳“׳¢׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳™׳¨׳× ׳“' ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳₪׳¨׳¡׳•׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳—׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳¨.
׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳“ ׳©׳™׳§׳ ׳” ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳• ׳“' ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳“ ׳׳§׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳• ׳”׳“' ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, <sup>׳¦׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳—׳׳£ ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳׳׳• ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳¨׳©׳™׳׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳ ׳”], ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳׳™׳•, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳—׳׳£ ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳×, ׳“׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳—׳׳£ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳•׳©׳™ ׳©׳¨׳“ ׳©׳.</small></small> ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”. ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© <b>׳©׳׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳</b> ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳§</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳×.</small></small>. 
׳׳׳ ׳, ׳’׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”. <sup>׳§׳</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§, ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳“, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳¦׳™׳“׳“ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§.</small></small> ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳©׳™׳׳× ׳׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳•׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¨׳©׳™׳׳× ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳¨׳©׳™׳׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳’׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳×׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳¡׳׳•׳›׳•, <sup>׳§׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§"׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳“׳‘"׳– ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳¢׳˜ ׳•׳׳–׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳©׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘. ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳“׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳× ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳§׳• ׳׳¡׳׳ ׳׳× ׳׳—׳™׳§׳×׳” ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳”.</small></small> ׳׳‘׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§.
׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§: ׳. ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳׳—׳•׳§] ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ <sup>׳§׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳–.</small></small>. ׳‘. ׳׳ ׳™׳׳ ׳” ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§. <sup>׳§׳“</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳™׳‘ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳˜.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳˜.</b> ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳”. <sup>׳§׳”</sup><small><small>׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳”, ׳™"׳‘.</small></small> ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳—׳×׳ ׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳™׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳”. <sup>׳§׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¡"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small> ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳” [׳©׳‘׳× "׳׳•׳™׳₪׳¨׳•׳£"] ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳” <sup>׳§׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳ "׳ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳•׳“׳’׳"׳¨ ׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳©׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳¡׳×</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳¨׳©׳™׳׳× ׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳¨׳˜׳¡׳× ׳©׳ ׳’׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”, <sup>׳§׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳©׳™׳׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳‘׳׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¡׳׳ ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳¨׳©׳ ׳׳× ׳¨׳©׳™׳׳× ׳”׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳–׳• ׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳׳—׳•׳§ ׳•׳™׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳©׳™׳׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳—, ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳.
<h3> ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳”׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳”׳”, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳”, <sup>׳§׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳× ׳¨׳“׳‘"׳– ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳¦ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳¢׳•׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳¡׳§׳™׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳, ׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢"׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small> ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳’׳™׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳×. <sup>׳§׳™</sup><small><small>׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳‘] ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§"׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳• ׳—׳§׳•׳§ ׳‘׳›׳•׳×׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳˜׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳×׳‘ ׳—׳§׳•׳§ ׳‘׳›׳•׳×׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳×׳, ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳׳׳•׳“, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳•. <sup>׳§׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳—׳§׳•׳§ ׳‘׳›׳•׳×׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳™ ׳׳׳—׳׳•׳₪׳™ ׳‘׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳§, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳•׳×׳ ׳׳×׳™ ׳׳׳—׳׳•׳₪׳™ ׳‘׳©׳˜"׳”. ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜.</small></small>

RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳ - ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ - ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳</h2>
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’, ׳•' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.  ׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳— ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳•׳¨׳—. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳˜"׳–, ׳‘' ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳˜׳•׳¨׳— ׳•׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳•׳, ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳•׳¨׳—, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳™׳© ׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳₪׳™' ׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳• ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳— ׳׳₪׳™' ׳™' ׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳׳—׳× ׳׳”׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳© ׳˜׳•׳¨׳— ׳‘׳”׳“׳—׳”, ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳”׳›׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳¦"׳© [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’'].  ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳— ׳”׳›׳׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳©׳׳“׳™׳— ׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳׳—׳× <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ [׳›׳׳•׳×׳], ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳•׳×׳•"׳© ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳— [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳“׳”׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳›׳ ׳”].</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳‘׳™׳© ׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳–'׳׳” ׳׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳©׳×׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳˜׳¨׳•׳— ׳•׳׳”׳׳‘׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳”, ׳’'. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳‘׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳₪׳™׳–'׳׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳׳• ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳×׳׳›׳׳›׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳”׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳—׳–׳¨׳× ׳”׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳•</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳”׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳©׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳׳™׳×׳•, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳•׳™׳×׳¢׳˜׳£ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳•׳™׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳ ׳” ׳›׳ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳‘׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳"׳”׳›׳ ׳”". ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳ ׳×׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳, ׳©׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳×׳׳‘׳“ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳•, ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’'.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳×׳׳‘׳“ ׳©׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳™׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨.
<h3> ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳: 
BB<b>׳.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳“׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳–׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¡"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳“׳¨. ׳•׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳’׳׳¨ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳–׳׳ ׳׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¡׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳¢׳×׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳׳¨ ׳׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳• ׳•׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳’׳׳¨ ׳׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳• ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳™׳¡׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳— ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳×, ׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳—׳ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳×. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“.</small></small>. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳׳§׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳—׳.
 <b>׳‘.</b> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳“' ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳’׳ ׳‘, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳•. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳–׳§. ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳“ ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳–׳§.   </small></small>.  ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳©׳›׳¨׳•׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳›׳ ׳”. ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳©׳™ ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“.</small></small>.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳©׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“.
׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳₪׳¡׳“׳• ׳•׳™׳×׳§׳׳§׳׳• ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳ ׳–׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳•׳׳׳›׳™׳׳”.
׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳• <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳“׳ [׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳] ׳•׳›׳©׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳׳§׳₪׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳₪׳™׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¢ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳£ ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳.
׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳©׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳©׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳׳§׳₪׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳• [׳›׳׳• ׳—׳׳•׳×] ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳₪׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳.EE
<h3> ׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳׳׳‘׳—׳</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳‘׳—׳ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳–׳™׳׳–׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳׳“ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳¢"׳—, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳›"׳‘ ׳”׳¢' ׳¨"׳¦ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳ ׳—. </small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳—׳, ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£, ׳©׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳׳›׳™׳ ׳˜׳¢׳׳™ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳׳’׳™׳׳” ׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳. ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳¨"׳›] ׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳•׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳¦׳׳—׳” ׳‘׳׳‘׳—׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳”.</small></small>. [׳•׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳—׳›׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳”.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳‘"׳×׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳™׳׳™׳" ׳•׳׳׳™׳¨׳× "׳׳•׳¨׳™׳“ ׳”׳˜׳"</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳‘"׳×׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳™׳׳™׳" ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳‘׳© ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳‘׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳ "׳ ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳׳׳¢׳׳”.</small></small>. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳§׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳×׳• ׳™׳׳‘׳© ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳ ׳§׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¦' ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ "׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳”" ׳׳• "׳׳•׳¨׳™׳“ ׳”׳˜׳" ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳— <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ "׳”׳›׳ ׳”" ׳›׳׳, ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳₪׳×׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳©׳™׳©׳›׳— ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳•']. </small></small>. 
<h3> ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳×, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳׳•׳ ׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳×׳׳” ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳™׳•"׳˜, ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳—], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳₪׳›"׳’ ׳”"׳–] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ "׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳×׳” ׳©׳‘׳×", ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳”׳׳” ׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•' ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳₪׳– ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳— ׳–׳•׳ ׳ ׳₪׳׳“ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳’"׳›, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳¢׳ ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× [׳©׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳¦׳‘], ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳•׳׳•׳ ׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳§׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳™' ׳¨"׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳’:.
׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳¡׳›׳× ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳™ ׳›׳— ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£, ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳×׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳™׳•׳©׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳™׳ <b>׳׳•׳׳¨</b> ׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
XX ׳‘׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳“' ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳: ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳—׳׳™׳, ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ [׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳§׳¨׳™׳], ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳—׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳”.  GG
<h3> ׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳—׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• [׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳‘׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“] ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳—׳׳• <b>׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×</b> ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳• ׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“.</small></small>.
׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳—׳׳• <b>׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳”</b> ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳—׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳“. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳”׳¨׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳•, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳—׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳—׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳§"׳”, ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>
׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳—׳׳• <b>׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</b> ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <b>׳׳׳׳™׳”׳</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ [׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳’׳•׳₪׳•] ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳—׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×. <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳]. [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳— ׳•׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳•׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳•׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘, ׳©׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳•׳×].</small></small>
<h3> ׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳”׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳” [׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳], ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳›׳׳” ׳׳›׳©׳•׳׳•׳× ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳•׳× ׳•׳©׳—׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳. <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳.</small></small>
׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳׳§׳׳—׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳. <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳•׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳•׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳ ׳•׳—׳” ׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳™ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳׳§׳׳—׳× ׳§׳¨׳”. <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳’ ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small>
<h3> ׳©׳—׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳” ׳›׳×׳׳™׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳“ ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳. <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳“׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳˜׳™׳. ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳•, ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜, ׳‘' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳‘׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳” ׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳₪׳•׳©׳¨׳× <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳•׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳¨׳¦׳• ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳–] ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳] ׳©׳‘׳₪׳•׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳׳׳ ׳©׳™ײµ׳¦׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳”] ׳•׳‘׳₪׳•׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳• ׳©׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳¡"׳‘ ׳׳ ׳ ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™ ׳›׳ "׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳" ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳‘׳•׳.</small></small> ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳˜׳”׳¨ ׳׳˜׳•׳׳׳×׳•. <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳“׳.</small></small>
׳׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳‘׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳”, <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳׳×׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳˜׳”׳•׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳׳˜׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜', ׳›"׳› ׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳–] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳§׳ ׳” ׳‘׳•׳©׳ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“] [׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳”].</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”. <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳—"׳•, ׳•׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨'.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳©׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳‘׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳”. ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳‘׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳” ׳—׳׳” <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳ ׳•׳‘׳™"׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳”, ׳©׳•"׳× ׳—׳›׳ ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳, ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ [׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳”] ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳.
׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳—׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳—׳׳• ׳׳׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—', ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳”, ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳” ׳—׳׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳• ׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§. <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳©׳”׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳“׳™ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳.  ׳•׳‘׳¡׳“"׳˜ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¦"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳“׳” ׳—׳•׳׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳× ׳¢׳–׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳”. ׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳–׳¨ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳›"׳• ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳—׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳–׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳¥ ׳—׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳׳¨׳—׳¥ ׳—׳ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳¢ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳•, ׳™"׳‘. </small></small>. ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳¥ ׳—׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳¢ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳–׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳– ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳˜׳‘׳™׳׳× ׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳–׳™׳¢׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳©׳׳¢׳× ׳§׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¢ ׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳ ׳›׳£ ׳׳ ׳›׳£ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳“׳₪׳•׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳§׳¦׳‘ ׳”׳©׳™׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¢ [׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™] ׳§׳•׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳¢׳•. <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳¨. ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳—, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜, ׳' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳•׳ ׳›׳£ ׳׳ ׳›׳£ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳©׳׳¢׳× ׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™. <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜, ׳' ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳₪׳§.</small></small> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¢ ׳§׳•׳ ׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳¨׳•׳§ ׳‘׳₪׳”, ׳©׳׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳₪׳”. <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳’.</small></small>
<h3> ׳”׳©׳׳¢׳× ׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¢ ׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳¨ ׳•׳ ׳¢׳™׳׳”, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳“׳₪׳•׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳©׳™׳₪׳×׳—׳• ׳׳• ׳׳• ׳׳”׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳“׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳•. <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘, ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳‘׳.</small></small>
׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ <b>׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¢ ׳§׳•׳</b>, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜׳™׳© ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳”׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§"׳–.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳™׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳׳¢׳× ׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳§׳©׳” ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳•׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¢ ׳‘׳• ׳§׳•׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™. ׳•׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳–׳” <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳•׳׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳¢׳× ׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳ ׳×׳§׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳, ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳‘׳”׳, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳×׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳™׳©׳׳™׳¢׳• ׳§׳•׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳¢׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¢ ׳§׳•׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¢׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¢ ׳§׳•׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳׳׳¢׳׳”. ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳׳•׳× ׳₪׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¢ ׳§׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳¢׳× ׳§׳•׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳, ׳׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳’"׳› ׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¢׳• ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳™׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳›׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳, ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳׳׳¢׳׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳—׳™׳׳× ׳›׳£</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳•׳ ׳›׳£ ׳׳ ׳›׳£ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¢ ׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™. ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳ ׳›׳£ ׳׳ ׳›׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳×׳•׳¢׳™׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳˜. ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳— ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳›׳•'.</small></small> ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳— ׳׳”׳ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳•׳˜׳‘ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳©׳•׳’׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳׳–׳™׳“׳™׳. <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>
<h3> ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳¢׳× ׳§׳•׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳: ׳¨׳¢׳©׳, ׳₪׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳©׳¨׳•׳§׳™׳×] ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳¨׳׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳×׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¢ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¨ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳' ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“] ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ [׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨] ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳© ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¢ ׳‘׳• ׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ [׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳—' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¦׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳˜׳׳₪׳•׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳׳¨׳™ ["׳₪׳׳׳₪׳•׳"] ׳׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳, ׳•׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳‘׳• ׳”׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳”. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳§׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳˜׳׳₪׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳•׳™׳© ׳§׳•׳, ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳”׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳₪׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳©׳“ ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳§׳©׳¨׳• ׳׳׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳”׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” [׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳׳×׳§׳©׳¨ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳’׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳•"׳]. </small></small> [׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳׳•- ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¢׳™׳¨׳ ׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳•, ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳” ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ (׳‘׳׳™ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨) ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳׳• (׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳– ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•), ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳” ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳₪'.
<h3> ׳¨׳™׳§׳•׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳§׳•׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳§׳•׳“ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳§׳•׳“ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳— ׳׳”׳ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳›׳•' ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳– <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳•׳׳“׳× ׳¨׳™׳—</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳₪׳™׳’ ׳׳׳—׳˜׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳™׳—. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’.</small></small>.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳×׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳• ׳¨׳™׳— ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳”׳¨׳™׳— ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳' ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳₪"׳“ ׳”"׳•, ׳•׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳•, ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳–׳” [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳•׳•׳׳“ ׳¨׳™׳—, ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳™"׳˜ ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳].</small></small>, ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳ <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small>.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳– ׳׳˜׳”׳¨ ׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨.
׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳¡׳׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳׳™׳ <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳¡׳›"׳˜, ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳™׳¦׳” ׳•׳§׳₪׳™׳¦׳”</h3>
