<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳•׳›׳‘׳“׳×׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳¨׳›׳™׳, ׳•׳“׳¨׳©׳• ׳—׳–"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳”׳™׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳. ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳’׳¡׳” ׳©׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳× ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳—׳׳© ׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳“׳. ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳₪׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳’׳¡׳” ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳׳” [׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳׳׳” <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳›-30 ׳¡"׳ ׳•׳׳’׳¨"׳— ׳ ׳׳” ׳›-25 ׳¡"׳.</small></small> ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¨׳’׳ ׳׳¨׳’׳]. ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳©׳” ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨: ׳. ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳”. ׳‘. ׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳¥. ׳’. ׳׳ ׳¨׳¥ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’ ׳‘׳• <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳, ׳', ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳“׳™׳“׳” ׳•׳©׳§׳™׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳§׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳›"׳’ ׳”׳™"׳’ ׳•׳”׳' ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳₪"׳“ ׳”׳›"׳ ׳•׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳•.</small></small>.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳׳“׳™׳“׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳–'. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳›"׳› ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳, ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳“׳™׳“׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳•.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳¦׳™׳“׳“ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳›"׳˜ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§"׳’], ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳’׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳§ ׳¡׳§"׳—, ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨׳• ׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳’ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳”׳•׳׳™׳.</small></small> ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳¨׳•׳¨ [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ! <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™ ׳׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳ ׳׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳ ׳₪׳— ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳©׳§׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳›׳׳” ׳׳©׳§׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳–׳” ׳›׳׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳.</small></small>]. [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳§׳™׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’.</small></small>].
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳. <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳× ׳›"׳› ׳›׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳, ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳— ׳•׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳• ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”.
<h3> ׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳“׳” ׳§׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳, ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳“], ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳“׳•׳×] ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ [׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳׳•׳“] ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳– ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳•. ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳₪׳"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳“׳” ׳”׳׳“׳•׳™׳§׳×- ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳׳׳© <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¨׳—"׳, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳‘׳’׳׳׳• ׳”׳ ׳”׳’ ׳™׳¢׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳•׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.  ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳”׳™׳₪׳, ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳¢׳¦׳•׳¨, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳׳×׳ ׳™׳¢ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳׳• ׳•׳”׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳”׳¨׳™"׳ ׳“׳™׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳₪׳’׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳¦׳׳׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳•׳˜׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳×׳•׳׳• ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳”׳©"׳ ׳•׳”׳“׳’׳"׳¨ [׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳•] ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳—׳•׳˜׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳×. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳™׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ [׳•׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳¢׳“׳•׳×] ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳’, ׳•׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳: ׳. ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳‘, ׳‘. ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳—׳” ׳׳›׳, ׳•׳׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳×׳‘׳¢׳¨׳• ׳׳© ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳©׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× - ׳׳›׳׳ ׳׳‘׳×׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳• ׳“׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. </small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳”׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳© ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳—, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳•׳— ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳¢׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳₪׳¡׳• ׳•׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳”׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳¢׳“׳•׳× ׳׳׳“׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳•׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳” ׳©׳׳× ׳‘׳¢׳ <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳׳˜׳” ׳׳• ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳§׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳˜׳™׳™׳₪ ׳”׳§׳׳˜׳” ׳׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳, <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳”, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳‘' ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳: ׳”׳’׳‘׳¨׳× ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳‘׳˜׳¨׳™׳”, ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳׳¢׳× ׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳¨, ׳׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳“׳©, ׳—׳©׳“ ׳©׳”׳¨׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳”׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small> ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳”׳§׳׳˜׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳§׳׳˜׳”. <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳§׳׳˜׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳™"׳˜.</small></small>
׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳•׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳ ׳•׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳–. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳” ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳—.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳׳’׳©׳× ׳©"׳¥ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳§׳”׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.
<h3> ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳×׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳—.</b> ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳×׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳‘׳¢׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳‘׳• ׳©׳›׳—׳×׳• ׳•׳׳§׳“׳© ׳”׳©׳‘׳™׳¢׳™ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”, ׳•׳™׳׳¢׳˜ <b>׳‘׳›׳</b> ׳”׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳×׳§׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳©׳•׳‘ <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳“"׳, ׳' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“׳”"׳” ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳×׳™ ׳™׳•"׳˜. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳₪׳- ׳¨׳₪׳’ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳—׳׳׳™׳× ׳©׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳›׳“׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥].</small></small>.

RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳•׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h2>
<h3> ׳”׳§׳“׳׳”</h3>
XX ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳×׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳×: ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” [׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳”׳•׳], ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳׳™׳‘׳¨, ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™, ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳™׳—׳•׳© ׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳.
׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳¢"׳™ ׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳•׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳, ׳”׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳×, ׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳ "׳™׳×׳•׳‘׳™ ׳“׳¢׳×׳".
׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳׳™ - ׳”׳©׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳’׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳׳, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳׳׳™׳“ ׳—׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳•׳© ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳“׳¢׳• ׳”׳¢׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳©׳׳•׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳˜: ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳׳“׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¢׳, ׳—׳¨׳‘׳” ׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳.</small></small>.  GG
<h3> ׳¢׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳© <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳“', ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳˜, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳™"׳—, ׳‘'. ׳“׳›׳×׳™׳‘ '׳•׳—׳™ ׳‘׳”׳' ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳”׳. ׳•׳©׳ ׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨: ׳. ׳—׳׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳”, ׳‘. ׳•׳—׳™ ׳‘׳”׳ - ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳₪׳˜׳™ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳ ׳§׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳—׳׳™׳ ׳•׳—׳¡׳“ ׳•׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳. ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳' ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳—׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳›׳¨׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳‘׳• ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳¢׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪"׳‘ ׳”"׳’. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳.</small></small>, ׳׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳×׳™׳׳‘׳•׳ <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳˜, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small> ׳•׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳” <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳‘' ׳¡׳§׳›"׳—.</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳¢׳™׳¡ ׳׳• ׳׳›׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳” - ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳”׳•׳“׳™׳¢׳•׳”׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳”׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳] ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ <b>׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</b> ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳×׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳‘׳” <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳—. ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳•׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳‘׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳• ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳•' ׳•׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳– ׳₪"׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳”׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦ ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳›׳¢׳™׳¡ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳×׳™׳׳‘׳•׳ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× [׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳™׳., ׳¢"׳– ׳›׳•:, ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳’.] ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳×׳™׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳©׳¨] ׳׳ ׳™׳׳›׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳›׳©׳¨, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳©׳—׳•׳˜׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳–׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳: ׳׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳–׳”, ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳•׳”׳׳—׳™׳¨ ׳©׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳›׳©׳¨] ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳¢׳™׳¡, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” "׳׳”׳›׳¢׳™׳¡" ׳›׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳• ׳׳׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳˜׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳›׳©׳׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳•׳” ׳׳—׳˜׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳§ ׳™׳¢׳§׳‘ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳›׳™ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳‘' ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’, ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳§׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳›׳™ ׳׳©׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳— ׳•׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘'. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳˜ ׳©׳”׳¦׳ ׳–׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳™׳ ׳×׳” ׳•׳¢׳¨׳‘׳‘׳” ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳¦"׳ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳¢"׳– ׳›׳•. ׳•׳’׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳¦׳ ׳–׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳™׳ ׳×׳” ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳•].  ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳˜׳ ׳›׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳”׳›׳¢׳™׳¡. </small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳” ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳™׳¢׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳¡׳§"׳•] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳•׳–"׳ '׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳”, ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳”׳©׳×׳“׳׳• ׳¢׳׳• ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳–׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳‘, ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨. ׳•׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳©׳×׳“׳׳•׳× ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳×׳‘׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳™׳•׳₪׳™׳¢׳• ׳‘׳¨׳•׳— ׳§׳“׳©׳ ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳•'. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳” ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳“׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳”׳׳¦׳•׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳“׳™׳¢׳•׳”׳• ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳׳ ׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳•׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳“׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳”׳׳¦׳•׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳§׳‘׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳¢׳™׳¡ ׳•׳›׳ "׳. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳“.  ׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳©׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳“ ׳¨׳—׳•׳§ ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳›׳ ׳”"׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳" ׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳›׳¢׳™׳¡ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”, ׳•׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳“ ׳¨׳—׳•׳§ ׳›"׳› ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳“׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳™ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳¢׳™׳¡. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.
׳•׳¢׳™' ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳‘' ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳©׳›' ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳׳™׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳•׳¨׳¢׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳˜׳ [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›' ׳©׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳©׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨].</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳˜] ׳•׳‘׳©׳©"׳› [׳₪"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳¢"׳˜] ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›' ׳•׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳“] ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳¢׳–׳¨ [׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳• ׳₪"׳•] ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳×׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳¡׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳›׳•' ׳"׳› ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳©. ׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳₪׳© ׳›׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳˜ ׳׳–׳” ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳£ ׳×׳•׳¨׳ ׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳© ׳¨׳—׳•׳§. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳× ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳×׳¡"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳×׳¢"׳].
׳׳׳×׳ ׳“׳‘׳™ ׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳™׳© ׳¦׳“ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳˜׳׳• [׳•׳’׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳•]. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.
׳׳×׳ ׳“׳‘׳™ ׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳׳• ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳—׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳™׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳–׳׳× ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳‘׳׳×׳ ׳“׳‘׳™ ׳”׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳׳•׳ ׳”, ׳™׳© ׳¦׳“ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳˜' !.
׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳“׳¢׳× <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¢׳ ׳׳” ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳™ ׳©׳¢׳” ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳—׳™׳•׳× ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳˜, ׳“' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“' ׳׳׳, ׳•׳”׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳‘', ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳‘׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳—׳“׳ ׳׳•׳—׳• ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳×׳¨׳• ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™ ׳—׳™׳•׳×, ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳—׳™ ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨׳™׳, ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳¡׳™׳›׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳›׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳¢׳×׳” ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳×׳×׳₪׳×׳— ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳™׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳‘׳©׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳¨׳•׳—׳ ׳•׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳”, ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳©׳׳“ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳–, ׳'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳’׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” !] <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳• ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳] ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳™"׳– ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™׳—׳” ׳׳׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳×׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳•׳׳“ ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳ ׳”׳׳”׳¨׳™"׳˜ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳–, [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳' ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳׳ ׳“׳£ ׳₪׳‘. ׳׳•׳× ׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳' ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳‘׳”"׳’ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳' ׳™׳•׳]. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ [׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳‘׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ (׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳–׳›׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳’׳¨"׳™ ׳׳‘׳¨׳׳¡׳§׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳). ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳” ׳•׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳ "׳˜, ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳©׳¦׳™׳“׳“׳• ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳' ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳—׳™׳¢׳–׳¨ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳‘].</small></small>.  ׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳₪׳’ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>[׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳–'] ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳’, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳₪׳’ ׳׳’׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ [׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳• ׳•׳¦׳₪׳¨׳ ׳™׳•, ׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳₪׳’ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳’׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳• ׳•׳¦׳₪׳¨׳ ׳™׳•].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳×</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳— ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳•' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳¦׳“. ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳ ׳” ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳™</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳ ׳׳׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳™"׳—, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳–. </small></small>, ׳•׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳•, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳™"׳—, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“.</small></small>.
׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳ ׳׳׳, ׳•׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳•׳׳™, ׳©׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳₪׳, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳˜׳‘׳¢ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳”׳×׳¨׳₪׳׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳₪׳׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳©׳׳– ׳©׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳” [׳׳• ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳×׳™׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•] <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳”', ׳™', ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳¨׳•׳₪׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳™"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™, ׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳׳׳” ׳¨׳•׳₪׳׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳—׳–"׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢׳• ׳©׳”׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳¨׳•׳₪׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳, ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳©׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳׳”׳§׳. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳׳’ ׳‘׳—׳›׳׳”, ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳— ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳§' ׳¢׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳•׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳. [׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳™"׳—, ׳‘' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳ ׳›׳, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©].</small></small>.
׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳, ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳—׳“ ׳׳•׳₪׳׳’ ׳‘׳—׳›׳׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳, ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳›׳׳•׳×׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳™"׳—, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳₪׳</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳₪׳, ׳¡׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦ ׳©׳׳›׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳—׳׳” ׳–׳• ׳•׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳× <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳©׳׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳”׳׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳׳” ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳ ׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳ ׳×, ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳₪׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳§׳™ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳‘, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳§׳•׳ ׳˜׳¨׳¡ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳׳•"׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” 1.</small></small> !], ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×.
[׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳×׳’׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳™׳׳×׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳¦"׳©, ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳•]
<h3> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b>
BB ׳. ׳׳›׳” ׳׳• ׳׳•׳’׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳׳—׳׳” ׳₪׳ ׳™׳׳™׳×, ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳¢׳×׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳×׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳–׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳”].
׳‘. ׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳—׳© ׳׳• ׳¢׳§׳¨׳‘ <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳ ׳©׳¨׳˜ ׳¢"׳™ ׳›׳׳‘ ׳׳• ׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳›׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳¡׳•׳ ׳ ׳’׳“ ׳›׳׳‘׳×. [׳¨׳¦׳•׳™ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳× ׳׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳” ׳”׳ ׳•׳©׳›׳×]. </small></small>.
׳’. ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳׳׳›׳” (׳׳• ׳׳—׳™׳×׳•׳) ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳–' ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳—׳׳×.</small></small>.
׳“. ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳׳• ׳—׳×׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳§׳™ ׳•׳™׳© ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦׳©"׳§ [׳›׳©׳”׳₪׳¦׳•׳¢ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳—׳™׳¡׳•׳ ׳ ׳’׳“ ׳˜׳˜׳ ׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳—׳׳© ׳”׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳×].
׳”. ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳§׳• ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳“.
׳•. ׳—׳•׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳” <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳§׳©׳” ׳׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳›׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳• ׳—׳•׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳”, ׳©׳›׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳—׳•׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳’׳•׳‘׳” ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳”׳›׳׳׳™.</small></small> <b>׳•׳’׳</b> ׳—׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳×׳™׳₪׳§׳•׳“ ׳›׳׳׳™ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'-1, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳’׳¨׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳ ׳™׳׳“׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳©׳‘ ׳ ׳×׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳”׳×׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳×׳•׳₪׳¢׳•׳×. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳“, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳].</small></small>.
׳–. ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳˜׳ ׳™׳׳ ׳™׳× ׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳”- ׳•׳‘׳˜׳ ׳§׳©׳” [׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™ ׳“׳׳§׳× "׳׳₪׳ ׳“׳™׳¦׳™׳˜"] <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳™ ׳”׳‘׳˜׳ ׳§׳©׳” ׳‘׳’׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳¥ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳›׳™, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳׳“ ׳¨׳’׳•׳¢.</small></small>.
׳—. ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳—׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳–׳”- ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳׳׳- ׳׳׳•׳•׳” ׳‘׳–׳™׳¢׳” ׳§׳¨׳” [׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™ ׳”׳×׳§׳£ ׳׳‘].
׳˜. ׳§׳•׳©׳™ ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨- ׳›׳׳‘׳™ ׳¨׳׳©- ׳׳×׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳×׳—׳•׳©׳× "׳©׳™׳×׳•׳§" ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ [׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳•׳—׳™].
׳™. ׳×׳’׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳¨׳’׳™׳•׳× <b>׳—׳¨׳™׳₪׳•׳×</b>- ׳×׳’׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳¨׳’׳™׳•׳× ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳§׳©׳™׳™ ׳ ׳©׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” [׳”׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳ ׳₪׳™׳—׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳™׳—׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳™׳, ׳׳• ׳™׳¨׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳׳—׳¥ ׳“׳ ׳•׳—׳•׳׳©׳” ׳›׳׳׳™׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£].EE
<h3> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳‘׳™׳׳“׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™.</b>
BB ׳. ׳—׳•׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳” <b>׳•׳’׳</b> ׳”׳™׳׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳§׳“ ׳›׳¨׳’׳™׳ [׳™׳©׳ ׳•׳ ׳™, ׳׳₪׳׳˜׳™, ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳•׳×׳”].  ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳•׳”׳™׳׳“ ׳׳×׳₪׳§׳“ ׳›׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳׳¦׳ ׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳•׳™׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳§׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘ ׳”׳›׳׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳׳“.</small></small> [׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳‘ ׳©׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳”׳¨׳‘׳”].
׳‘. ׳—׳ ׳§ ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” [׳׳–׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳§׳¢ ׳‘׳’׳¨׳•׳].
׳’. ׳™׳׳“ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳₪׳—׳“ ׳׳׳•׳“ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳—. [׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳—"׳ ׳¢׳' ׳§׳׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳•׳’ ׳׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳₪׳—׳“׳• ׳׳׳ ׳•, ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳₪׳—׳“ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳׳“ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨].</small></small>.
׳“. ׳§׳•׳©׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳©׳™׳׳”- ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳׳“ ׳׳×׳§׳©׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ [׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳׳•׳§׳•׳× "׳•׳׳—׳•׳¦׳•׳×" ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳₪׳”, ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳¦׳₪׳¦׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳©׳™׳׳”]. EE
- ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳¦׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳×, ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳™׳•׳׳“׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳‘'].
<h3> ׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳₪׳•׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳–׳§ ׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳”, ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳: ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳™׳”] ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳×׳• ׳×׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳“ ׳—׳׳™׳• ׳•׳™׳¡׳×׳›׳ [׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳’], ׳׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳• ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”] <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘. ׳•׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–, ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳•׳” ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳§׳™׳¥ ׳׳©׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳•׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳— ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳™׳” ׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳, ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳§׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳¨׳•׳×׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳§׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳• <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘. ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§"׳  [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳ "׳’]. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳”, ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳’׳¢׳× ׳”׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳—.</small></small>. ׳׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳’׳¨׳×׳™׳•׳× [׳›׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳×׳׳©׳₪׳– ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦ ׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳×׳• ׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳’׳™׳˜׳׳™ ׳›׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳₪׳™׳§׳•"׳  ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳׳—׳¥ ׳“׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘׳×׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳•׳×׳™׳” ׳¨׳—"׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳¢"׳™ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳’׳¨׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳—׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳” ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳•׳’ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳×׳™ ׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳” ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳—׳×, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳§׳© ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳” ׳¢׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳— ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳׳–׳׳–׳ ׳‘׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳‘׳•. </small></small>] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳• ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳–׳•, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳›׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳•.
<h3> ׳”׳¨׳’׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ["׳™׳×׳•׳‘׳™ ׳“׳¢׳×׳"]</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳×׳™׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳׳• ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳–׳•, ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳¨׳•׳₪׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳׳× ׳“׳¢׳×׳•, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳׳•׳׳—׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳—׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳‘׳™ ׳“׳¢׳×׳ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳—: ׳“"׳” ׳§׳"׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳“׳ ׳§׳˜ ׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡].</small></small>.
׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳‘׳§׳©׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳“׳¢׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳‘׳§׳©׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳¢"׳₪ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳‘"׳‘ ׳§׳ ׳•: ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳›׳™׳‘ ׳׳¨׳¢ ׳”׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳©׳™׳§׳¨׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳•, ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳•, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳—'] ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳׳™׳×׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳§׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳×׳•׳‘׳™ ׳“׳¢׳×׳, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳–.
׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳¦׳“׳™׳§ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡, ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜, ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳— ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳§׳©.</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”]. [׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© <b>׳‘׳׳׳×</b> ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳• ׳׳× ׳‘׳§׳©׳×׳•- ׳›׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>[׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳¨׳•׳₪׳] ׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳׳™׳×׳™.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳§׳˜׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳—׳•׳™ [׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳™׳—׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳×], ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳”: ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨ ׳׳• ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳”׳¨, ׳׳• ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳–׳“׳¨׳– ׳•׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳”׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳”- ׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳•׳”- ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳׳” ׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳׳˜׳¨׳•׳— ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳–׳¨׳™׳§ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳–׳¨׳™׳§׳” ׳׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳—׳₪׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳™׳•.</small></small> [׳׳¨׳"׳].
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳• ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳©׳׳™׳‘׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳›׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳—׳© ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳™׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳©׳×׳“׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳©׳‘׳• ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳• ׳׳—׳₪׳©׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡, ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳•׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳“׳™׳—׳•׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳×׳¢׳¦׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳•׳×׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳™ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳™׳–׳¨׳– ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳”׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳• ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳“׳™׳—׳•׳™ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳˜"׳–, ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳™׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳™׳–׳¨׳– ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳“׳™׳—׳•׳™ ׳׳• ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳“׳™׳—׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ [׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘]. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳›׳©׳׳™׳¨׳¢], ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳— ׳•׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳׳•׳× ׳“.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳¢׳•׳˜ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳›׳›׳ ׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ !] ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳“׳ ׳׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳× ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳›׳›׳ ׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳¨׳— <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ [׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳׳• ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳×׳•׳¦׳׳”], ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳—, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳™׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳”׳¨׳¦׳•׳™׳” <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳—: ׳“׳›׳׳” ׳“׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳™׳™ ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™"׳‘, ׳•׳”"׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳× ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>.
׳›׳׳• ׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳™׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¨׳₪׳§ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” [׳׳¨׳"׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™"׳‘. ׳׳ ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™.</small></small>]. ׳›׳׳• ׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳¢׳׳• ׳™׳¢׳©׳• ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳”, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳₪׳© ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳₪׳• ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳– ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳—׳“ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳׳– ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳.</small></small>.
׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳–׳”, <b>׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳‘׳”׳•׳</b> ׳׳׳×׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳—. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—׳•"׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳˜ ׳׳•׳× ׳’].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳ [׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳©׳§׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•] ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳, ׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳ ׳”׳₪׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳"׳ ׳•׳׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳¡"׳›, ׳›"׳› ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳¢׳׳™ ׳©׳§׳¦׳‘ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¦׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳™׳•"׳˜, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.  ׳•׳"׳› ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳©׳₪׳™׳§׳•"׳  ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳—׳•׳™׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨׳” [׳¢׳™' ׳‘"׳™ ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜] ׳"׳› ׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳§׳•"׳  ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳©, ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳"׳› ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳›"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳. [׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳§׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳₪׳©׳™׳˜ ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳₪ ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳›'].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳׳‘׳¨</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳’׳¢ ׳—"׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳×׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™, ׳•׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳–. ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳₪׳“ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳¡׳•׳“׳™ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳ [׳›׳׳• ׳¨׳’׳] ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳©׳‘׳׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳׳—׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳§׳•"׳  ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳–'] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳—׳–׳§ ׳•׳׳‘׳˜׳•׳— ׳‘׳”' ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳.</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”].
<h3> ׳’׳“׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳׳©׳›׳‘ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳• [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳‘ ׳”׳—׳–׳§ ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳›׳‘] ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳™׳—׳•׳© ׳•׳›׳׳‘ ׳©׳׳—׳׳×׳• ׳׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳—׳•׳׳” ׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™"׳–. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳׳¨"׳™ ׳‘׳›׳׳›׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳•׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳’. [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳—׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¨׳"׳].</small></small> [׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳׳©׳›׳‘ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳–׳”], ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳‘ ׳—׳–׳§ [׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™] ׳‘׳׳™׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳–. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳§׳˜׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳™׳׳“ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳‘׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳’׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳™׳- ׳•׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳׳© <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳”׳¨׳™"׳ ׳©׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳§׳•׳©׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳• ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›' ׳©׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ [׳›׳׳‘׳•׳’׳¨] ׳©׳–׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳׳©, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳× ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–] ׳©׳¢׳“ ׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳© ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳—׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳¢׳“ ׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳׳© ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ [׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¢׳“ ׳’׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢] [׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳’. ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳¡׳.].</small></small>, ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳‘׳©׳ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳”׳¨׳™"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳˜"׳•, ׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳– [׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§] ׳•׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳™ ׳׳©׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳׳•׳× ׳™ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳  [׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§], ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳× ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳’׳¢׳’׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳•׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™ [׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳: ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'].  ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳©׳—׳” ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳¨׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳©׳—׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳“, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳ ׳׳“׳•׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳׳©׳—׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳¨׳—.</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳]. (׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳¢׳“ ׳’׳™׳ ׳×׳©׳¢ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳׳© ׳”׳•׳ <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳—].</small></small>).
׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳“ <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small> ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳• <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳›׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳—׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡, [׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ (׳¡׳§"׳•) ׳›' ׳©׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳"׳” ׳׳]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳“׳׳] ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳× ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳×׳—׳×׳™׳• ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳×׳¨׳˜׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳‘׳•׳¡׳• ׳׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳›׳—׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳¦"׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳˜, ׳' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳‘, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳”. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’].
׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳“] ׳©׳׳–׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳§׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳›׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳©. ׳׳‘׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳× ׳׳• ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡. ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳§ ׳›׳¨׳™׳¡׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳¢׳™ <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳‘. ׳•׳”"׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳§ ׳›׳¨׳™׳¡׳• ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳’׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳™׳¨ [׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳© !]. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳©׳• ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳“׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳”׳›׳¨׳¡ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳—׳•׳§ ׳¡׳׳׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳ ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ [׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳›׳—׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“, ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳›׳¨׳™׳¡׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳¢׳™.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳׳” ׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳“' ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳:
BB׳. ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳–. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳”. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”.</small></small>.
׳‘. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× <b>׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</b> ׳‘׳׳‘׳“, ׳•׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳–.</small></small>.  ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳“׳“ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳— ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’. ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™.</small></small>.
׳’. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳›"׳.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳§׳›"׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳™׳—׳× ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™, ׳"׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”: ׳. ׳‘׳¡׳§׳§"׳‘ ׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳’׳™׳׳•׳¢ ׳—׳•׳׳¥ ׳•׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳©׳ ׳›׳•׳׳‘׳× [׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™]. ׳‘. ׳‘׳¡׳§׳§"׳ ׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳¢׳׳׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳–׳™׳¢ ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”. ׳’. ׳‘׳¡׳§׳§׳ "׳– ׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳™׳׳× ׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳₪׳™ ׳”׳˜׳‘׳¢׳×.  ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳™׳—׳× ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳—׳§ ׳¡׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳›׳”׳×׳¢׳׳׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳• ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳׳× ׳׳–׳ ׳™׳™׳ [׳•׳׳¡׳×׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳’׳¨׳™׳“׳], ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™.</small></small>.
׳“. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳׳™ ׳¢׳›׳•"׳, ׳׳£ ׳©׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳’.</small></small>.EE
<h3> ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳×, ׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳׳×׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳׳”].</small></small>, ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳׳—׳׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ [׳•׳‘׳׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳] <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳’. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳”׳׳•׳§׳— ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳”, ׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳§ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×. ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳¡׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳׳•׳׳” ׳•׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳‘׳” ׳‘׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳©׳×׳•׳×׳” ׳›׳ <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳×, ׳•׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳׳• ׳׳›׳‘"׳₪, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳–׳§ ׳›׳’׳׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳× ׳¢׳™׳¡׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳¡"׳“.</small></small>.
׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳•, ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳׳™׳˜׳׳, ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳•. ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳’׳• ׳“׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳×׳§׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳›׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳•׳׳ [׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳— ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–], ׳•׳׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™ ׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳©׳™"׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–. </small></small>. ׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳’׳"׳— ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳• ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳׳—׳“ ׳׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” <b>׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</b> ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳•, ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳”'. [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳—׳•׳׳™, ׳•׳‘׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ (׳•׳“׳•"׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳), ׳׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳׳’"׳ (׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳— ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳—). ׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ (׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳”׳¢׳•׳§׳¦׳•) ׳•׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳•. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳¡. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳“.</small></small> [׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳›׳”- ׳׳‘] ׳•׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”.
<h3> ׳׳™׳—׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳‘׳“</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳—׳•׳© ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳”', ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳ "׳‘.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”.
<h3> ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳›׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳׳•׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳¢׳×׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳׳” <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳§"׳›.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳›"׳–, ׳›"׳—.
<h3> ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳§׳—׳×׳” ׳›׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳—׳•׳© ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳‘ ׳׳•׳×׳” <b>׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×</b> ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳׳›׳ ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳§׳׳§׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳”, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳‘׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳” ׳–׳”] <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳”'] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳• <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳‘׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳×׳” ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳” <sup>׳¢׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” <sup>׳¢׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳—. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳‘ [׳׳£ ׳©׳©׳ ׳‘׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳‘׳—"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›' ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳›׳׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳›׳׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳×׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.
׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳§׳—׳×׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳¨׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳”׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳×׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳₪</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳—׳׳×׳™׳× ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳›׳ ׳” [׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳. ׳•׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳—], ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳ ׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳—׳•׳§ ׳¡׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳—"׳¨ [׳׳ ׳›׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” !] ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳׳•׳× ׳‘. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳™ ׳™׳•׳©׳¨ ׳׳•׳¢׳“ ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳– ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳.</small></small> [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ! <sup>׳₪׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳”׳™׳׳× ׳׳‘׳§׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳˜׳™׳‘׳™׳•׳˜׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳”. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>], ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳₪׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳’, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳¢"׳– ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳׳” ׳©׳•׳‘, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳₪׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳• ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳¨׳˜׳™׳” ׳”׳׳©׳׳¨׳× ׳׳›׳” ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳×׳¨׳₪׳׳” [׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳›"׳› ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳©׳›׳— ׳•׳™׳©׳—׳§ ׳¡׳׳׳ ׳™׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳×׳¢׳׳׳•׳× ׳•׳¨׳™׳¦׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳–.</b> ׳”׳×׳¢׳׳׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳¢ ׳׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳–׳§ ׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳£ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳₪׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳§"׳› ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳–. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳×׳׳‘ ׳׳׳›׳•׳].</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳׳”׳–׳™׳¢ ׳׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳“׳™׳׳˜׳” <sup>׳₪׳”</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳ "׳, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳©׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§"׳› ׳•׳¡׳§׳§"׳ [׳•׳׳©"׳› ׳׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳• - ׳׳׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳, ׳׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳•׳×׳™ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳]. ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳׳˜׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳•. ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳“׳™׳׳˜׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳¨׳–׳”, ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳•.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳¢׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳׳×׳• [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳§׳ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳¥ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳”] ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳×׳• <sup>׳₪׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳—׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳×׳ ׳•׳§׳₪׳™׳¦׳×׳. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳˜"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳• ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳“', ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳‘"׳¦ ׳₪׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳×׳¢׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳׳×׳• <sup>׳₪׳–</sup><small><small>׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳.
׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳׳׳˜׳¨׳× ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳×, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳₪׳—</sup><small><small>׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳˜.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳§׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳—.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳”׳’׳•׳£, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳§׳— ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳₪׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳™"׳‘] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳׳”] ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳׳— ׳•׳‘׳¡' ׳§׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳"׳“ ׳¡׳˜"׳–, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“ ׳©׳׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳• ׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳. [׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳§׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳•׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳×׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳©׳× ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳¢׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳׳©׳›׳‘ ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳›׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™׳–, ׳׳•׳×׳¨].  ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳§׳— ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳׳§׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳•׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳× ׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳—׳›׳׳× ׳©׳׳׳” [׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳›"׳•] ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳— ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳₪"׳” ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳ ׳˜׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳§׳— ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳×׳—׳׳™׳£ ׳׳׳•׳›׳.  ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨׳™׳™׳× ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳§׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳™ ׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨׳™׳” ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳”. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳×׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳¦</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳’] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳׳“׳ ׳—׳׳© ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳—׳–׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳© ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳–׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳• ׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳•׳×׳• ׳™׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳“.</small></small>, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳×.
<h3> ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳׳©׳›׳›׳™ ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳˜.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳׳•׳¢ ׳’׳׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳”׳§׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳—׳•׳©׳™׳ ["׳׳§׳׳•׳" ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] <sup>׳¦׳</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳•׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳•׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳“ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳‘׳”׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳“׳© ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳₪׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳›׳׳‘׳™׳.  ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳•׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳›"׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳", ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳›׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳”.
׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳׳•׳× ׳• ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳›׳•׳׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳—׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳ ׳׳׳©׳›׳‘.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳—׳•׳, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳– ["׳¨׳™׳˜׳׳™׳"]</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳– ["׳¨׳™׳˜׳׳™׳"], ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¦׳‘</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳– ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳” ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳’׳¢׳”] ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳•׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×, ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™. [׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳§׳™׳—׳” ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳”]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳• ׳”׳׳•׳™׳¨</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳§ ׳›׳¨׳™׳¡׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳•׳™׳¨ <sup>׳¦׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳‘. ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳"׳› ׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳¡׳׳׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳׳™׳— ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳׳™׳— ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¡׳™׳•׳¢, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳¦׳“</sup><small><small>׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳©׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳׳׳×, ׳•׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳™׳¦׳׳™׳— ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳¢׳™ ׳׳• ׳”׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳–׳™׳¨׳•׳– ׳”׳×׳”׳׳™׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳¨׳™׳—׳× ׳™׳•׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¦׳¢</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳¨׳•׳— ׳™׳•׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¦׳¢ [׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳₪׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳ ׳¢ ׳–׳™׳”׳•׳] <sup>׳¦׳”</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳” ׳”׳¢' ׳›'].</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳¨׳•׳— ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¦׳¢ <sup>׳¦׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳•׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳–' ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> [׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳¦׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳—׳×׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¢׳–׳”"׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳“].
<h3> ׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳× ׳›׳•׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳׳’.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳›׳•׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳”׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳–׳•׳”׳™ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳×׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳™׳” <sup>׳¦׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳“, ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳©׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳™׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¡"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§"׳“, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳–׳” ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳©׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳’׳׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¡׳•׳’׳™ ׳”׳’׳׳•׳׳•׳× <sup>׳¦׳—</sup><small><small>׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳’׳׳•׳׳•׳×, ׳™׳© ׳’׳׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳•׳§׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳• [׳׳ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳©׳]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳’׳׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳•׳§׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•"׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—׳™"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳–. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳’׳׳•׳׳× ׳׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳§׳—׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳• ׳•׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳£ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳’׳׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳¦׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳— ׳•׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳–, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. ׳׳ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳’׳׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳×׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳×׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳§</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳”.</b> ׳׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳× ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳•׳•׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§, ׳×׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳” ׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳§׳</sup><small><small>׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳—, ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳”׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳•. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›"׳› ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳“׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳׳‘</h3>
<b>׳׳•.</b> ׳׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳× ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳׳‘, ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳§ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳¨׳× ׳׳¢׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳—׳׳‘ [׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳×] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳˜׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳§׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳• ׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳• ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¡׳™׳•׳¢ ׳׳׳¢׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳—׳׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳£ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳—׳–׳§׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳›׳•׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳˜׳׳, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳§׳’</sup><small><small>׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳•׳™׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳—. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳‘׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳–</b>. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳•׳— ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¡׳“׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳׳™׳•׳‘׳©, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳•׳— ׳©׳׳ [׳ ׳•׳–׳׳™ ! <sup>׳§׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳—, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳—.
׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳‘׳׳’"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳— ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳‘׳׳™׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳•׳§ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳—׳׳§׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳— ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳׳©׳—׳” ׳×׳×׳₪׳©׳˜ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳—"׳› ׳×׳™׳‘׳׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳•׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳×׳₪׳©׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳•׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳‘׳׳¢ ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳§׳¢, ׳•׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳›׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳›"׳•] ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳] ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳›'] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳¡"׳“], ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳§ ׳™׳₪׳” ׳”׳׳©׳—׳” ׳•׳׳– ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳׳¨׳— ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™'.  ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳, ׳™"׳˜ ׳“"׳” ׳×׳¢"׳‘] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳— ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳™׳©׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ["׳¨׳™׳‘׳× ׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳˜׳•׳¨׳”"] ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳—׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳¨׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳—׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳׳׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳¨׳•׳—], ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳׳©׳—׳” ׳×׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳›׳ ׳₪׳™׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳—׳׳§׳×׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳₪׳™ [׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳—׳” ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳©׳×׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳׳©׳—׳” ׳—׳׳§׳” ׳•׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳˜׳•׳×].  ׳׳‘׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳׳• ׳”׳׳¡׳× ׳©׳•׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳§׳¨׳— [׳¢׳™' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳¡׳›"׳ ׳•׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳‘], ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳¡׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳•, ׳™'], ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳׳¡׳× ׳©׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳ ׳§׳˜ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳™׳“ [׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳] ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳‘ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ [׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳•' ׳”׳¢' ׳¢"׳“, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©], ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳•׳— ׳©׳•׳׳ ׳•׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳›׳”׳¨׳"׳, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¨׳•׳— ׳”׳׳©׳—׳” [׳’׳] ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳™׳“, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳›"׳‘ ׳©׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳›׳.  ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳•׳‘׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”, ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳©׳—׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳׳¨׳— ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳— ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳§׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳¨׳—, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳•׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘.
[׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳”׳“׳’׳©׳× ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳–"׳” ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢ [׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳"׳“], ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳¡׳™׳›׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳©׳—׳™׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳’׳©׳× ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳].</small></small>] ׳¢׳ ׳©׳₪׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¡׳“׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳₪׳¦׳™׳¢׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳‘׳© <sup>׳§׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳¨׳˜׳™׳” ׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳ ׳×׳¨׳₪׳׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¨׳” [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳–].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳—</b>. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳¨׳˜׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¡׳™׳•׳¢ ׳׳™׳׳“ ׳׳”׳×׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳‘׳™׳•. [׳•׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳© ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×, ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳•].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳˜.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳™׳•׳¢ ׳׳”׳™׳¨׳“׳ <sup>׳§׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳"׳”, ׳‘', ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳₪"׳™ ׳¡׳˜"׳• ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳• ׳₪׳˜"׳• ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳“ ׳•׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳– ׳₪"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳’׳׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳• ׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¨׳₪׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳”׳׳©׳׳©׳׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳”׳׳©׳׳©׳׳•׳× <sup>׳§׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳™"׳—.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳×׳” ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳¢ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳₪׳¢׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳“.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳׳™׳¢׳× ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳—׳™׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳—׳™׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳ <sup>׳§׳™</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳›"׳‘. ׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳”׳§׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳• ׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×:
BB׳. ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳. ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳• ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ <sup>׳§׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳"׳–. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳›"׳›.</small></small>.
׳‘. ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳¡׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳©׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳¡׳׳׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳, ׳"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳§"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳₪׳׳˜׳” ׳׳™׳™׳©׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳•׳¨ ׳”׳’׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳§׳¨׳— ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳§׳™׳¦׳× ׳“׳‘׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳—׳–׳§׳” ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳™׳—׳•׳× <sup>׳§׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳“ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳§"׳“. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳©׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”, ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳©׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳¡׳׳׳ ׳™׳.  ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳׳× ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳¢׳§׳™׳¦׳× ׳׳“׳•׳–׳” [׳”׳׳‘׳•׳¡׳¡׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¥] ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¥ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳”. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳”׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳× ׳¨׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳¢׳™׳, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳•.</small></small>.EE
<h3> ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§׳” ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳’.</b> ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳§׳” ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳׳™׳‘׳¨, ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳” <sup>׳§׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳”. ׳•׳‘׳“׳¢"׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳"׳–] ׳›' ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>. [׳™׳׳“ ׳¢׳“ ׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳׳© ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳—].
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳</h3>
<b>׳׳“.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×, ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳:
BB׳. ׳™׳©׳˜׳•׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳׳”׳“׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳›׳ ׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳׳• ׳™׳¡׳₪׳•׳’ ׳”׳“׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳• <sup>׳§׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳‘׳§׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘, ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳׳©׳” ׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳×׳” [׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳“:], ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳–׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳”] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳›׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳•. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳×׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳×׳—׳™׳׳• ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳©׳ "׳˜׳™׳©׳•". </small></small> [׳›׳׳• ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ "׳˜׳™׳©׳•", ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”], ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳—׳§ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳׳™׳— ׳׳¢׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳] ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳• ׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳× [׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳“׳•׳] <sup>׳§׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳ "׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳• [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳§"׳—]. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳‘׳”׳™׳¨ ׳©׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳×׳׳›׳׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳. [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳—׳•׳¨ ׳›׳”׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳”׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳•׳‘׳¢. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳].</small></small>.
[׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳˜׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳•׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ "׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ <sup>׳§׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳–׳” ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳“׳׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳׳©׳” ׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳×׳”, ׳•׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’.</small></small>.]
