׳‘. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”, [׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ <sup>׳§׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳˜׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳§׳׳•׳× ׳׳–׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳¨׳•׳— ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳”].  ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳©׳—׳” ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳—׳” [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳“ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¨׳•׳—].
׳’. ׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳©׳—׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¨׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳©׳—׳”, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳¨׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳©׳—׳”. ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳–׳׳×, ׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳•׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳”. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳”ײ¼ ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳₪׳¦׳¢, ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳”׳¨׳˜׳™׳” ׳•׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ <sup>׳§׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳›"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳× ׳©׳©׳׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳©׳—׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳§׳›</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳¢׳–׳¨ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳• ׳₪׳™"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳’ [׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳׳›׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳—׳” ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳”׳•׳™ ׳”׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳¨׳—] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.  ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳§"׳“ ׳׳” ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¨׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳׳©׳—׳”.</small></small>].
׳“. ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳˜׳׳׳™ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳× ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¦׳¢, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳׳—׳¨  <sup>׳§׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳›"׳’. ׳•׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳©׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳”. ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'.</small></small>.
׳•. ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳• ׳—׳×׳, ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳¨, ׳׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳× ׳•׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§׳• <b>׳׳’׳•׳£</b> ׳‘׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ [׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳§׳¦׳” ׳”׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳§׳¦׳”׳• ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£], ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ <sup>׳§׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳׳•׳–׳›׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳›"׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳× ׳•׳׳׳₪׳£ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳“ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳§׳©׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨׳™׳ [׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™', ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳–, ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳©׳¨].</small></small>.
׳–. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳§׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨, ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳›"׳•.</small></small>.  ׳₪׳¦׳¢ <b> [׳©׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨] </b> ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳₪׳¨׳•׳”׳• [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳–׳™׳”׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘] ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳•׳›׳¨׳— [׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳¦׳׳§׳×], ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦"׳©, ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳›׳¨׳’׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ [׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳] ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” [׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳].  [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳’] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳§׳•"׳  ׳•׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳×׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳¦׳׳§׳× ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳©׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳, ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳].  ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳–׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳”' (׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¢, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳ ׳©׳׳× ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳–-1), ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳—] ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳–. </small></small>. EE
<h3> ׳§׳•׳¥ ׳”׳×׳—׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳©׳¨</h3>
<b>׳׳”.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳×׳§׳•׳¢ ׳׳• ׳§׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳‘׳©׳¨׳• ׳•׳”׳§׳•׳¥ ׳׳›׳׳™׳‘ ׳׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳“׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳.
׳•׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳”׳§׳•׳¥ ׳×׳§׳•׳¢ <sup>׳§׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳— ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳§׳•׳¥ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳“ ׳׳©׳” [׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳¥] ׳©׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳¥ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳•׳“׳” ׳׳•.</small></small>.
׳׳•׳’׳׳” ׳”׳׳›׳׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳•׳§׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳’׳׳” ׳×׳¦׳ ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳“׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳’׳׳” <sup>׳§׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳›"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“, ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳“׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’. </small></small>. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳“׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳¢ ׳•׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳’׳׳” <sup>׳§׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳˜.</small></small>. [׳•׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳•׳’׳׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳§׳‘׳”].
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳£ ׳’׳׳“ ׳©׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳›׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳×׳¦׳ ׳˜׳™׳₪׳× ׳“׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳•׳׳›׳•׳•׳¥ ׳₪׳¦׳¢ ׳›׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳×׳¦׳ ׳˜׳™׳₪׳× ׳“׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳׳©׳—׳” ׳׳• ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳”׳©׳•׳׳‘׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” <sup>׳§׳</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳“׳. ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳¦ ׳•׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳˜.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳—׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳™׳’׳˜׳׳™ ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳§׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳•, ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳—. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳”, ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳©׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” <sup>׳§׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳“, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳׳©׳” ׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳§׳™׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳₪׳•"׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳” ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳¡׳₪׳™׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳©׳•׳‘ (׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳) <sup>׳§׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳–.</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳’׳™׳˜׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”.
׳׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳—׳™׳˜׳•׳™ ׳ ׳•׳–׳׳™ ׳•׳™׳§׳ ׳— ׳‘׳׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳™׳‘׳©׳” <sup>׳§׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳”. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳§׳— ׳׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳ ׳•׳–׳ ׳™׳™׳¡׳₪׳’ ׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳™׳¡׳—׳˜.</small></small>.

<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳‘ - ׳”׳“׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳– ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h2>
XX ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳׳• ׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳• ׳‘׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳׳©׳₪׳– ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳©׳׳×׳™ ׳“׳’׳© ׳‘׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳׳׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳. ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳₪׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳•׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳˜ ׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“.
׳©׳™׳׳‘׳×׳™ ׳’׳ ׳׳™׳“׳¢ ׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳×׳׳©׳₪׳– ׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳›׳•׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳¨׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳׳©.  GG
<h3> ׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳× ׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳— ׳׳™׳׳™׳ ׳“', ׳”', ׳•'</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳— ׳׳•׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳‘׳¢׳• ׳׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳©׳™׳©׳™, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳™׳© ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳— ׳׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳—, ׳‘' ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳׳¦׳‘ ׳›׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳”׳¦׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳“', ׳”', ׳•' ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳– ׳—׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳”׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳” ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•, ׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳', ׳‘', ׳’' ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳• ׳•׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳—.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳© ׳×׳©׳™׳¢׳™ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳©׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳© ׳×׳©׳™׳¢׳™ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳× ׳׳“׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¡׳׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳׳׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳›׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳“׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳“׳× ׳—׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳× <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’. ׳•׳‘׳’׳' ׳ ׳“׳” ׳“׳£ ׳׳— ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳—׳¡׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳׳©׳×׳“׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳“׳• ׳ ׳©׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳›׳™ ׳”׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳” ׳׳׳׳™׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳˜׳¦׳“׳§׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳] ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳© ׳˜' ׳×׳–׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳–׳“׳׳ ׳׳™׳“׳×׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳×׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳×׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳©, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘׳× ׳׳“׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳©׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳© ׳×׳©׳™׳¢׳™ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳ ׳” ׳×׳›׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳” <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳×׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳׳”׳™ ׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳˜׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳›׳ [׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳›׳׳׳™ - ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ג€“ ׳”׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳”׳•׳:
BB1. ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ (׳׳¨׳"׳),
2. ׳¢"׳™ ׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳™' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'. ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳¡׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳ ׳¡׳₪"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳”׳’׳¨"׳₪ ׳׳₪׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳™' ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳‘'.</small></small>, 3. ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳׳ ׳¡, 4. ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳•׳ ׳™׳× <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳‘׳“׳¨"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳×׳©׳׳•׳ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳”, ׳׳•"׳], ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳•׳׳׳‘׳•׳׳ ׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳ (׳•׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳–׳• ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳). ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳׳•׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳׳‘׳•׳׳ ׳¡ [׳›׳׳• ׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳] ׳™׳© ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳׳•׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳ ׳™׳× [׳›׳׳• ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳—׳ ׳× ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳“׳₪׳¡׳× ׳—׳©׳‘׳•׳ ׳™׳×] ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳’ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•. </small></small>. ׳•׳›׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳¡׳¢ ׳‘׳׳׳‘׳•׳׳ ׳¡ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳×׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳• ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳•׳] ׳•׳׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳¨׳"׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳•׳׳׳‘׳•׳׳ ׳¡ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳₪׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳§׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳§׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳’, ׳•׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳“].  [׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳“׳׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳×].</small></small>], ׳•׳’׳ ׳×׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳˜׳׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳©׳׳ ׳•׳׳©׳§׳¢ ׳”׳§׳• <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢׳₪"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ "׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳”", ׳©׳”׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳‘'.  ׳‘׳’׳׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳—׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳×׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳—׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳.</small></small>.
EE
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳׳•׳” ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳׳“׳× <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳׳•׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳•׳׳–׳¨׳–׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™ ׳׳˜׳₪׳ ׳‘׳”. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳™׳×׳™ [׳׳¡׳™׳•׳¢ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™] ׳‘׳׳׳•׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£- ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳™׳×׳™ .</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳” ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳—׳™׳ ׳” ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳—׳§ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳’.
<h3> ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳×׳—׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ [׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳×׳—׳] <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳›׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳, ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳§׳™׳£ ׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳™׳© ׳“׳™׳ ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳×, ׳©׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳×׳— ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳” ׳•׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'].  ׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳•׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳׳™ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳×- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳, ׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳× ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳, ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳׳¦׳ ׳¨׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳¡׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳“׳¢׳” ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳. [׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳₪׳¨׳¡׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳×].
׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳: ׳׳•׳¨׳— ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳' ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳¢, ׳—'], ׳׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳׳•׳©׳₪׳–׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳' ׳™׳•׳ [׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳₪׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳–׳§׳ ׳™׳. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳₪׳’׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳₪׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳], ׳׳•׳¨׳— ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳' ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳§׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ [׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳₪"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳¢ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳, ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦' ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳"׳‘], ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¨׳— ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳§׳• ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ [׳¢׳™' ׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¢"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳“], ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ [׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳¢ ׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳•׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦' ׳¡׳§"׳], ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳›׳•׳—׳• ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳¢׳׳”׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦' ׳¡׳§׳"׳—],  ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳¢, ׳“'] ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳׳—׳׳§׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳˜׳‘׳— ׳׳—׳“ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳¢ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳•], ׳׳ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳§׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳׳©׳₪׳—׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“׳ ׳' ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳”׳›׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳¨ ׳•׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳˜׳‘׳— ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳¨׳©׳•׳×׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳›׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳©׳›׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳”׳׳›׳” ׳•׳©׳•׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳- ׳•׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳• ׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳•׳© ׳“׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳.  
׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳, ׳’׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳, ׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳×, ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§׳• ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” [׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳], ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳•, ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳© ׳“׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ [׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳¨׳¦׳•׳₪׳” ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳] ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳”׳‘׳׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳§ ׳׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳¢׳–׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ [׳”׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳₪"׳×], ׳•׳׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳ ׳׳‘"׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳“ ׳’׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳₪׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳×׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳׳™׳›׳×׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳’׳‘׳¢׳× ׳©׳׳•׳׳ - ׳¨׳—' ׳‘׳™׳׳׳™׳§ ׳¨׳—' ׳”׳–׳™׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳•' ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳.
׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳§ ׳׳×׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳.
׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳™׳›׳™׳׳•׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳.
׳׳”׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳›׳–׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳¡׳” ׳¢׳™׳ ׳›׳¨׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳ [׳׳׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳›׳•׳× ׳׳”, ׳›׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳] ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳¨׳™ ׳¦׳“׳§ ׳•׳›׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳, ׳•׳׳”׳“׳¡׳” ׳”׳¨ ׳”׳¦׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳™׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳”. [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳×׳§׳›׳-׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳© ׳“׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳•׳× ׳“׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳˜׳•׳×].
׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳–׳›׳•׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳¢ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳™"׳’, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳™"׳“, ׳'. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳— ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳‘׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳×׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦</b>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳”׳׳×׳׳©׳₪׳– ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦, ׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳• ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳“׳™׳’׳™׳˜׳׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳׳“׳™׳“׳” ׳”׳©׳’׳¨׳×׳™׳× ׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳”׳”׳׳›׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦ ׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳’׳™׳˜׳׳™ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳” ׳©׳’׳¨׳×׳™׳× ׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳’׳¨׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳© ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳× ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳×׳•׳¦׳׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳’׳¨׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳“, ׳”, ׳•, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳—, ׳“'], ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳›׳׳׳• ׳׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳›׳™׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳”׳, ׳•׳›׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳¨׳‘ ׳׳”׳™׳‘׳“׳§ ׳׳—"׳›.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳‘׳§׳© [׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳›׳” !] ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳’׳¨׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× [׳׳•׳ ׳™׳˜׳•׳¨, ׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳׳—׳¥ ׳“׳ ׳•׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳׳•, ׳׳“׳™׳“׳× ׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳׳•, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳׳•] ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳“', ׳”', ׳•', ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳—, ׳“'], ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳›׳׳׳• ׳׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>. ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳‘׳×׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳, ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳•׳© ׳›׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳×׳— ׳׳• ׳׳׳™׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳₪׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳׳—׳™׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳–׳” ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳©.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳¢׳ ׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳- ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ [׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳×׳—׳‘׳•׳©׳×, ׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳¦׳׳¨ ׳’׳₪׳, ׳×׳׳™׳©׳× ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”].
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳׳•׳©׳₪׳– ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦ ׳•׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳׳×׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳“׳ ׳”׳¨׳ [׳•׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳©"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳•, ׳•׳’׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳›׳׳].</small></small> ׳©׳™׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳™׳›׳‘׳”׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳” <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳” ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳׳•׳§ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳™ ׳–׳™׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. </small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳§ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×.
<h3> ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳”׳ ׳¢׳¨׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳—׳׳§׳•׳× [׳׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳”] ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¢׳“ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳™׳§׳“׳© ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳›׳ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳׳¨"׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳ ׳—׳•"׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ [׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳•, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳¦ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳•׳– ׳”׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳’׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳•׳§׳£ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳©׳•׳¨׳™׳× ׳•׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳’׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳¢"׳– ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳©׳•׳¨׳™׳×], ׳•׳‘׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳– ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳•׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ "׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨".</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳׳׳•׳©׳₪׳– ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳’', ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳©׳₪׳– ׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳™"׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”] ׳•׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳. ׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳™ ׳©׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳“, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳×׳¨׳×׳™ ׳“׳¡׳×׳¨׳™ ׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳–׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳”׳׳×׳׳©׳₪׳–׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳× ׳׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳•׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳×], ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳”, ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳•׳›׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’'.  ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳• ׳׳׳•׳©׳₪׳–׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳’ ׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳™׳£.</small></small>.
[׳”׳׳©׳›׳ ׳–׳™׳ ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳•׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳ - ׳׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳”] <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳—', ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“.</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳• ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” [׳¨׳§ ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳- ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳׳©׳›׳ ׳–׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳›׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳›׳©׳׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>] ׳•׳×׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳©׳ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳×, ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳].</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨׳” ׳•׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳©׳ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳×׳‘׳¨׳ <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳™׳© ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳, ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ [׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳׳—׳“׳©, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳ ׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳˜׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳]. ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳ ׳¡ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳×.</small></small> ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳–׳• ׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳” [׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳˜' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳, ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'].  ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳×׳׳׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳"׳› ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳—] ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<b>׳׳×׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳•׳’׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳©׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳•.</b>
׳”׳׳×׳׳©׳₪׳– ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ [׳•׳׳©׳×׳• ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳ ׳¨׳•׳×] ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳©׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳׳©׳×׳• ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨׳• ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳•' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳¨׳™׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳].</small></small>. ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳” [׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳], ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ "׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳×׳׳©׳₪׳–׳× [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×].
<h3> ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳¨׳’׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳׳׳“׳× ׳׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ "׳•׳›׳‘׳“׳×׳•", ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳‘, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳”], ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳¨׳’׳™׳.</small></small> [׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳” ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™׳×].
<h3> ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳׳§׳“׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳”׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳׳§׳” ׳׳׳—׳׳§׳” ׳•׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳©׳₪׳–׳™׳. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳§׳“׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳›.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳©׳” ׳”׳׳׳•׳©׳₪׳–׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳™׳§׳“׳©׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳§׳“׳© ׳›׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳•, ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳• ׳׳׳§׳“׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳₪׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳₪׳× ׳׳• ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× [׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ "׳’׳׳•׳˜׳" ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”] ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳• ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳§׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳”׳§׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜.</small></small>.
׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳“׳© ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¨׳›"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳‘ ׳•׳©׳¢"׳× ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳׳•׳× ׳›׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳׳•׳× ׳” ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳¡ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. </small></small>. [׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳׳—׳¨- ׳™׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>].  
<h3> ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳×׳• ׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳© ׳©׳ [׳•׳‘׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳‘].</small></small>], ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’, ׳' ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳›׳.</small></small> [׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳© ׳©׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳¨, ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ [׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳, ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“] ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳–], ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳›׳׳.</small></small>], ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™ײµ׳¦׳ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳™ײ¸׳¦׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳–׳׳× - ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’, ׳'. ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§. ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳–.</small></small>.
׳›׳׳• ׳›׳, ׳™׳© ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳“׳•׳© ׳׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳–׳׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳׳§׳“׳© ׳•׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨ [׳›׳–׳׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳׳¨׳’׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳›׳•', ׳•׳™"׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳×׳›׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳¢׳™׳•] ׳•׳’׳ ׳©׳”׳” ׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳§׳“׳©, ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳”׳™׳™׳×׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳ ׳׳ ׳¡ ׳•׳©׳”׳” ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳–׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳׳§׳“׳©. ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳“׳•׳© ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳—׳•׳§ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳•׳‘</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳” ׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳” ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ [׳׳• ׳׳©׳§׳™׳¢ ׳•׳׳×׳׳׳¥ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨] ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳¨׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳”, ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳—׳“׳× ׳׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳” ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳” ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳ ׳™ "׳™׳×׳•׳‘׳™ ׳“׳¢׳×׳" [׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳“׳¢׳×׳•] ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳×׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳™׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳. ׳›׳’׳•׳, ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳™׳׳“׳× ׳׳¡׳×׳“׳¨׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳—], ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳—׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳×׳™׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳₪׳—׳“, ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳™׳¢׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳׳—׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳–׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳׳• ׳”׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳₪׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳.</small></small>.
׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳” ׳׳‘׳—׳™׳ ׳” ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳‘׳—׳™׳ ׳” ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™׳×, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¢ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳§ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳•׳׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦ ׳•׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ "׳™׳×׳•׳‘׳™ ׳“׳¢׳×׳", ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳” ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳—׳•׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳§׳•׳׳™ ׳ ׳•׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳× ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳”׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ [׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳׳•׳” ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ! <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳”׳’ ׳‘׳• ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨, ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳¨ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳©׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳• ׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳§׳¥ ׳‘׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳•׳™׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳"׳› ׳’׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳×׳׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳¨, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳—׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳×׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳•׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳•׳‘׳©׳—׳™׳˜׳” ׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳©׳‘׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳”׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳©׳ [׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“], ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳”׳ ׳”׳’ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳”׳׳׳•׳” ׳”׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳.  </small></small>.
׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ [׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳”׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳¡׳¢ ׳׳׳˜ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳™׳¡׳¢ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳׳•, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳.
- ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳”׳׳•׳¢׳“׳£- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’'.
<h3> ׳׳§׳™׳—׳× ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳¨׳’׳™׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¦"׳’, ׳’' ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳× ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳©׳‘׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳- ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳“׳ ׳׳׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳¢׳× ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”, ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳™׳§׳•"׳  ׳”׳•׳×׳¨׳• ׳’׳ ׳›׳׳™׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳“׳ [׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳¡"׳‘ ׳•׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳–, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳¢׳' ׳׳”], ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“ ׳˜׳₪׳ ׳׳׳“׳ [׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳¢"׳₪ ׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳¢׳' ׳׳’ ׳“׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳׳×׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳].  </small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳”׳¢׳“׳¨׳•, ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳’ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳“׳™׳ "׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳× ׳›׳׳™׳" <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¦"׳–, ׳’'.</small></small>.
[׳›׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳™׳×׳• ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳¢׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢, ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳¢׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳׳׳‘׳•׳׳ ׳¡ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳].
<h3> ׳”׳§׳‘׳׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳–׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳׳” ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜.
׳”׳׳“׳‘׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳’׳׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳– ׳”׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳׳׳—׳׳§׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳©׳”׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳—׳× ׳׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳×׳׳™׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳“׳‘׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳• ׳©׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳§׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳›׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳©׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳‘׳§׳•׳×.</small></small>.
׳”׳“׳‘׳§׳× ׳׳“׳‘׳§׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳¡׳¨׳˜ ׳׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳– ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¦׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳– ׳”׳׳§׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳×׳₪׳¡ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ ׳—׳–׳§ [׳›׳׳• "׳׳–׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳" ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳×׳₪׳•׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳“׳§׳™׳] <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳ ׳©׳׳× ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳׳”׳“׳•"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳— 2 ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳–׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳×׳•׳₪׳¨. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪"׳ ׳¡׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.  ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳¦׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳– ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– ׳©׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳×׳ ׳›׳©׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳, ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳’׳‘׳™׳¢ ׳׳‘׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳§׳§ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™׳§.</small></small>.
׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× "׳₪׳×׳—-׳•׳¨׳™׳“" ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ [׳׳×׳§׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳“׳, ׳׳§׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳• ׳‘׳–׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳×׳׳©׳₪׳– ׳׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳–], ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳. ׳•׳׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳׳×׳׳©׳₪׳– ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳‘׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳× ׳“׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳™] ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳×׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳׳×׳׳©׳₪׳– ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳›׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳₪׳•׳™, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳™׳©׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳—].</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳©׳₪׳– ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳’׳“ <b>׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳</b> ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳”׳׳×׳§׳.
<h3> ׳”׳×׳™׳™׳¢׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳™׳¢׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™, ׳׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳•׳׳₪׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳“׳× ׳׳• ׳׳’׳©׳× ׳׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳™׳¢׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳‘׳¦׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳”. ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳™׳×׳•׳‘׳™ ׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳” ׳•׳‘׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳× ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢׳•׳× ׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳׳§׳˜׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳׳×׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳ ׳₪׳×׳—׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳׳§׳˜׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳× [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”] <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳’, ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳—, ׳¡"׳˜.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳”, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳§׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳§׳§ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳. ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳—.  [׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳§׳©׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳׳• ׳׳–׳™׳“, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”].</small></small> ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳• ׳›׳©׳”׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳•׳—׳•׳× [׳•׳׳ ׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳¡׳’׳¨׳• ׳”׳“׳׳×׳•׳×] <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳™', ׳™"׳]. ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳” "׳©׳ ׳§׳׳˜" ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳ ׳’"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” [׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳•׳׳•׳ ׳¢ ׳׳× ׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳§׳׳˜ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳•׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳’׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳×, ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳©׳¨׳’׳¢ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳™׳×׳—׳™׳׳• ׳”׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳׳”׳™׳¡׳’׳¨ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳×׳• ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳] ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳›׳×׳• ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳’, ׳•׳’׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳‘׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳›׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳“׳ ׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳“ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳׳׳”- ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§"׳˜.</small></small>, <b>׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™</b> ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳©׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳•׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳§׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳×׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳•׳× ׳₪׳×׳•׳—׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ "׳ ׳§׳׳˜" ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳׳× ׳–׳–׳” ׳׳¢׳˜ <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳’ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳©׳”׳•׳׳›׳× ׳׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©"׳§ ׳•׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳×׳‘׳•׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳§ ׳™׳×׳§׳©׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳—׳׳§׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳—׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳×׳” [׳›׳₪׳™ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳‘׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳™׳, ׳‘׳¢׳•׳•׳”"׳¨], ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳× ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳§, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳™׳” ׳•׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳©׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳–׳• ׳׳™׳“׳× ׳—׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳•׳× ׳׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳“׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳©׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳˜׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳™׳” ׳•׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳—׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳×׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳׳§׳” ׳׳• ׳׳˜׳׳₪׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳™׳“׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳©׳¨. [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳”׳¨׳™"׳ ׳“׳™׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳—׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳•׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳’׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳˜׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳¦׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳‘ ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨]. </small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳×׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” [׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× - ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳׳• ׳—׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡] ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳×׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳›׳’׳•׳, ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×] ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳•׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨].
׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳–׳”׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳§׳™׳“׳× ׳”׳§׳‘׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ "׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨" <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳” ׳׳§׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳¡' ׳•- ׳¡"׳’. ׳•׳”׳׳×׳׳©׳₪׳– ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳¢׳ ׳•׳× ׳™׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳™׳¦׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳₪׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳“׳—׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳©.
<h3> ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳¨׳•׳©׳ ׳–׳׳×</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳›׳׳, ׳©׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳”׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳—׳“׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳¨׳•׳©׳ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ [׳©׳ ׳•׳×׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳–׳”׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳–׳”], <b>׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</b> ׳׳׳ ׳×׳ ׳™׳§ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳©׳ <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳™׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¨׳©׳׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳© ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳©׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳˜׳•׳ ׳¨׳—"׳, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳‘׳• ׳’"׳› ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳—׳׳₪׳• ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳—׳˜׳₪׳• ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳×, ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳¡׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳§ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳×׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳׳• ׳×׳—׳׳™׳£ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳•׳׳ ׳×׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳™׳” ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳§ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳×׳—׳׳™׳₪׳™ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳˜׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳§׳׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'], ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳’׳“׳¨ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳§ [׳•׳’׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳”׳₪׳¡׳§׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳§׳” ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×] ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳•׳©׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡.</small></small>.
[׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳ ! <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳ "׳©׳™׳‘׳" ׳‘׳×׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳”׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•׳׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳•׳•׳™ ׳׳—׳•׳×, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳“׳¨׳•׳© ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳×׳׳•׳”׳•. </small></small>].
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳₪׳™׳§׳•"׳ </h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳¦׳¢ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳›׳¨׳•׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳–׳”׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳© ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳‘׳§׳©׳×׳•, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳׳•׳×׳• ׳"׳×׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳“׳ ׳”׳¨׳" [׳”׳•׳©׳˜׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳–׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳¨] ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳§׳©׳× ׳”׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦. ׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳. ׳•׳‘׳§׳”"׳™ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳–' ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳ ׳• ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳©׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳” <b>׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”</b> ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳£ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳©׳•׳, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳— ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳” ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳‘׳” <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳– [׳•׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳׳¦׳׳׳× ׳•׳™׳“׳׳•</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳¦׳׳׳× ׳•׳™׳“׳׳• ׳”׳׳×׳¢׳“׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ [׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳ ׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳—׳ ׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳׳׳” ׳׳›׳™׳•׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳•׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳˜ <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳¢׳§׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—. ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳׳” ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳©׳”"׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳•׳׳¨׳” ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳’. ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳׳˜׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳—׳‘׳™׳•׳× ׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳” ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳•' ׳“"׳” ׳׳ [׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳•: ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳ ׳¢׳™׳׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳”׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳’"׳› ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳•]. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳‘׳”׳¨׳—׳‘׳” ׳¨׳׳™׳•׳× ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳”׳”׳©׳׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳™"׳˜.
׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳˜ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳–׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳•׳”׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™ ׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳].</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳˜ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳׳׳” [׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳], ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳§׳“ ׳•׳‘׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¡׳ ׳•׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳׳׳” [׳׳• ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™] <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳×׳• ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳¦׳׳׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¨׳׳•׳”׳• ׳›׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳¦׳׳׳× ׳”׳”׳¡׳¨׳˜׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¡"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳”] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡'.  ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳×׳™׳§׳” ׳©׳”׳”׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳•׳×׳§׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳׳׳” ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳“׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¡׳. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳× ׳׳•׳“׳‘׳§׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” [׳•׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳×׳¢׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳‘׳— ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳₪׳•, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳—, ׳–', ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳©׳¨. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳₪׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳›׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳. ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳™'.  ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳”׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳, ׳"׳› ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳×׳“׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳], ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳§ ׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳“׳›׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳™׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳©׳¨. [׳”׳—׳©׳© ׳׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳׳™׳₪׳• ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳’ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳×]. </small></small>], ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳§׳¨׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳§ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳”] <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳§ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳ ׳׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳- ׳¢׳™' ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳™"׳’, ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳—' ׳“"׳” ׳—׳•׳×׳׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳‘׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢"׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳¢"׳ ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳›׳ ׳›׳™ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳§׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳”׳“׳‘׳™׳§׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳—׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳—׳™׳ ׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳—׳׳™׳ ["׳˜׳©׳•׳׳ ׳˜"] ׳׳¡׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳×׳¢׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳£ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳£, ׳•׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳‘׳—׳׳™׳₪׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳×׳¢׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳, ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳—, ׳™' [׳•׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳” ׳‘׳׳›׳¡׳”].</small></small>.  ׳•׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳§׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳©׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳™׳¡ ׳׳• ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳•׳’׳’, ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳׳¦׳“ ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳•- ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”, ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳’׳™׳¡, ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳¢׳” ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’- ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳–.</small></small>]. 
׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳—׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳׳© ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳—"׳› [׳•׳׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳ ׳—׳× ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳׳˜׳” ׳©׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳™׳–׳™׳– ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳׳ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳“ ׳¡׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳•] ׳•׳™׳§׳— ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳™׳—׳–׳™׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳© ׳’׳¨׳•׳₪׳” ׳•׳§׳˜׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳— ׳’׳ ׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳˜׳ ׳. ׳•׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳•׳ ׳—׳× ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳’'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳“׳—׳•׳™׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳™׳§׳•"׳  ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨׳” [׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳™"׳“, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜], ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳×׳“׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳"׳› ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳›׳™ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳“׳•׳—׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳™ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳›"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳׳™ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¨׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’. ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳×׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¨׳•׳₪׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳–.</b> ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳×׳• <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳”. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳–׳›׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳™ ׳”׳•׳˜׳ ׳¨ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳׳׳—׳ ׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳• ׳׳¨׳₪׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳×. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳׳˜ ׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨׳"׳– ׳׳׳¦׳¨ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¦"׳‘ ׳©׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳’׳“׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳™׳§׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳—.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳§׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳– ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳, ׳©׳׳ ׳׳- ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳”׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¦׳׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳’׳•׳, ׳›׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳›׳©׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§ ׳׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳£, ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳“ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ [׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳], ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳•, ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳ ׳™׳™׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳’׳©׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳˜ "׳’׳¨׳˜׳" ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©׳™ ׳׳‘׳’׳“. </small></small>.  ׳›׳׳• ׳›׳, ׳׳™ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳׳© ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳˜.</b> ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳–׳™׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳•׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳•׳׳• ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳]. ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’, ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳•׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳•׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© <sup>׳¢׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳©׳™׳׳×׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳”] ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳—׳•׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳• ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳•׳¨ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳ ׳©׳™׳. ׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© [׳©׳•"׳× ׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳¢׳–׳¨ ׳—׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳— ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳] ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳—׳•׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳’׳•׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳›"׳› ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ [׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳•׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳–].  ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳•, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”' [׳›׳©׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳©׳•׳׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳•, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳׳—׳׳” ׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳× ׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳×.  ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳•׳‘׳§׳”"׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳§׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳–'.  </small></small>, ׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳¢׳¨׳”] ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ [׳©׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳“׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨] ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳.
<h3> ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳’׳¨׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳‘ ׳•׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳‘׳™׳¦׳•׳¢ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳’׳¨׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳” ׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳™׳× ׳׳“׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳׳׳•׳¦"׳©, ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ <sup>׳₪</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳”. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳׳ ׳“׳•׳—׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳¨׳©"׳§ ׳׳©"׳§ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳‘׳¦׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳©.</small></small>. [׳•׳–׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳©׳‘׳×]. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳׳×׳׳©׳₪׳– ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳•׳"׳¦ ׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳”׳™׳‘׳“׳§ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳₪׳</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳‘׳׳™׳–׳• ׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳” ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳“׳—׳•׳×׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳©׳›׳—׳• ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳–׳׳–׳׳• ׳‘׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳׳©׳” ׳×׳©׳×׳“׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳• ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳© ׳׳—׳¨ [׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳׳“ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳¢׳ ׳’׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳] ׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳×׳¦׳ ׳׳׳ ׳•. ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳™׳© ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳×׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳” <sup>׳₪׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳•, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳”].</small></small> ׳•׳×׳©׳×׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳₪׳’</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳×׳×׳ ׳׳׳™׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳“ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”, ׳•׳׳׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“, ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳©׳” ׳×׳©׳×׳”.</small></small>].
׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳©׳”, ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ <sup>׳₪׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳•, ׳—' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳.</small></small> ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§, ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ <sup>׳₪׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳›' ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—׳•"׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳׳•׳× ׳‘] ׳•׳‘׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© [׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.</b>
RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳’ - ׳”׳“׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳× ׳•׳™׳•׳׳“׳×</h2>
 <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳׳¦׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳§׳¦׳×׳: 
׳. ׳–׳¨׳™׳§׳” ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳×׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳“׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳“׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳.
׳‘. ׳׳™׳“׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳×׳§׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘"׳×׳- ׳§׳•׳׳™"], ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳“׳™׳¢ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© [׳•׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳], ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳¦׳‘ ׳›׳–׳” ׳•׳׳“׳¨׳•׳© ׳”׳•׳“׳¢׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”' ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳“׳•׳¨׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳׳—׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳—.
׳’. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳“.
׳“. ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳× ׳׳•׳₪׳¨׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳‘׳—׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳–]. </small></small>
XX ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳©׳•׳׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳: ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳© ׳”׳×׳©׳™׳¢׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘', ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’', ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳‘׳™ ׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“]. ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳•׳׳“׳×. <h3> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳¦׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳×</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳¦׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳×, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳”׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳‘ ׳׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳¨׳—׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳׳. ׳”׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳: ׳›׳׳‘ ׳—׳–׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳“ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳×׳₪׳©׳˜ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳˜׳ [׳”׳›׳׳‘ ׳׳×׳’׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳₪׳¢׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳], ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳•׳” ׳‘׳“׳™׳׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳“ ׳׳• ׳“׳•׳₪׳§ ׳—׳׳© ׳•׳׳”׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¨׳˜׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳§׳¨׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳×׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳¦׳•׳¦׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳– ׳ ׳©׳§׳₪׳× ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳׳©׳™׳× ׳׳—׳™׳™ ׳”׳׳.
׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳”׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳‘ ׳׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳¢׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨. [׳”׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳: ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳ ׳׳”׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳“׳™, ׳›׳׳‘׳™ ׳¨׳׳© ׳—׳–׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳•׳׳₪׳™׳, ׳˜׳©׳˜׳•׳© ׳‘׳¨׳׳™׳”, ׳”׳×׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳”׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳’׳₪׳™׳™׳, ׳׳—׳¥ ׳“׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳׳¢׳ 140/90].
׳“׳™׳׳•׳ [׳׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳” ׳“׳׳™׳× ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳×] ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳”׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”. [׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳¡׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳”׳™׳₪׳¨׳“׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳” (׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳•׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳˜׳) ׳•׳¢׳•׳“].
׳™׳¨׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳×׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ 24 ׳•׳׳™׳׳ [׳™׳© ׳׳¡׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳¢׳©׳¨ ׳×׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”. ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳×׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳×׳•׳§, ׳׳©׳›׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳“ ׳©׳׳׳ ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳”, ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳– ׳׳ ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳×׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳׳׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”].
׳™׳¨׳™׳“׳× ׳׳™׳ [׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳‘ ׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨].
׳׳—׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳׳₪׳™ ׳׳˜׳” ׳׳• ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳‘ ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳×׳₪׳©׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¨׳’׳׳™׳ [׳׳—׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳§׳™׳]. ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳“׳׳” ׳©׳”׳׳—׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳’׳׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳˜׳, ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳•׳׳₪׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ [׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳¨׳¦׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ !].
׳׳™׳¢׳•׳˜ ׳׳• ׳”׳₪׳¡׳§׳” ׳‘׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳©׳×׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳©׳.
׳›׳׳‘ ׳׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳‘׳” ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳©׳×׳, ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳•׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳¦׳׳¨׳׳•׳¨׳× ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳™ ׳’׳‘.
׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳ ׳“׳׳™ ׳׳• ׳“׳™׳׳•׳.
׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¡׳“׳™׳¨׳™׳ [׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳•׳§׳“׳׳™׳. ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™ ׳“׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳•׳—׳•׳׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨].
׳—׳•׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳” ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳”׳¨׳™׳•׳ [׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳‘׳™׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳׳§׳× ׳‘׳¨׳—׳].</small></small>.
׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳¦׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’'.</small></small> !
<h3> ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳× ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§, ׳×׳™׳˜׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳—׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳׳–׳’׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳ [׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§"׳› ׳•׳¡׳§׳§"׳], ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳›׳“׳•׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳× ׳׳•׳׳˜׳¨׳” ג€“ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳“</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳™׳‘׳“׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳׳˜׳¨׳” ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳“, ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳©׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳•׳ ׳” [׳”"׳׳×׳׳¨"] ׳‘׳§׳©׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳׳׳׳¨׳— ׳‘׳”׳–׳–׳× ׳”׳׳×׳׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳–׳™׳– ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳™׳₪׳•׳© ׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳—׳” ׳”׳׳×׳׳™׳׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳–׳•׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳× ׳.׳¡. ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘"׳¡ [׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'], ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳¦׳׳׳” ׳•׳”׳¡׳¨׳˜׳”.</small></small>. ׳‘׳’׳׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳”, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳—׳×׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ [׳•׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳×׳], ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳×׳, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳–׳™׳“ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳ ׳™׳™׳¨ ׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳—׳×׳. </small></small>.</b> 
<h3> ׳–׳™׳¨׳•׳– ׳׳™׳“׳”</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳–׳™׳¨׳•׳– ׳׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳•׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“', ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳”.  ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳™׳¨׳•׳– ׳׳™׳“׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳•]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ "׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳—׳ ׳׳×׳” ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨" ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳™׳×"׳© ׳׳× ׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳™׳“׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳–׳™׳¨׳•׳– ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳— ׳§׳™׳¡׳¨׳™ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳— ׳§׳™׳¡׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”. ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳¢ ׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳׳—׳׳× ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳—׳™׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳—׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳— ׳§׳™׳¡׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳›׳•"׳¢. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳"׳“.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳׳×׳™ ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳׳“׳×</h3>
