<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳–׳׳ ׳©׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¡׳“׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳“׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ [׳׳•׳ ׳™׳˜׳•׳¨, ׳׳•׳׳˜׳¨׳” ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳“, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳–׳”], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳“׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳˜. ׳•׳”"׳” ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳“׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳”. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳–׳¨׳™׳§ ׳–׳¨׳™׳§׳× "׳׳₪׳™׳“׳•׳¨׳" ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳‘׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳×׳§׳“׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳“׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨ ׳׳“׳™ ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳–׳¨׳™׳§ ׳›׳‘׳¨.</small></small>.  [׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳׳›׳× ׳׳©׳›׳‘ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳‘׳™׳, ׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳” ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳•׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳¢׳׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳”׳§׳׳× ׳”׳›׳׳‘׳™׳].
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳“׳™׳ "׳™׳•׳׳“׳×" ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳ ׳₪׳© [׳›׳׳• ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳—׳™׳׳•׳], ׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳”׳•׳₪׳™׳¢ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳™׳: ׳. ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳”׳“׳ ׳©׳•׳×׳× ׳•׳™׳•׳¨׳“ [׳׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳׳•׳ ׳§׳]. ׳‘. ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳¨׳’׳׳™׳” ׳•׳—׳‘׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳©׳׳× ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳–׳¨׳•׳¢׳•׳×׳™׳”. ׳’. ׳׳©׳×׳©׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳©׳‘׳¨ - ׳›׳¡׳ [׳׳• ׳׳˜׳”] ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳“׳” <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳’'.</small></small> - ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳›׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳™׳“׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ - ׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳”׳×׳—׳™׳׳• "׳¦׳™׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳¥" ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳›"׳˜.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳׳“׳×, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ [׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘] ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳›"׳› ׳¡׳›׳ ׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳›׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳.</b>
<h3> ׳¢׳“ ׳׳×׳™ ׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳—׳•׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳•׳©׳× ׳”׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳”׳׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳©׳•׳‘ ׳¢"׳₪ "׳׳§׳¦׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳›׳•׳׳•" ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳‘׳¨׳• ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳™׳׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳¢"׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳“׳” [׳’' ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳× ׳׳¢׳×].
׳׳ ׳ ׳¡׳¢׳” ׳׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳” ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳™׳׳“׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳¨׳• 72 ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳¨׳• ׳’' ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳× ׳׳¢׳× [׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳•׳×׳¨], ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳’' ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳× ׳׳¢׳×.
׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳×, ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳—׳™׳©׳•׳‘ ׳”׳’' ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳× ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳§׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳™׳“׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳”, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>] ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳• ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳׳™׳׳“׳× ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳. ׳•׳׳©׳׳©׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳” ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳” "׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳ ׳™" ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳©׳‘׳¢׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” [׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜] <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳“'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳׳™׳‘׳× ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳•׳‘ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳©. ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳“. ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳’- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'.
׳—׳׳‘ ׳”׳׳¦׳˜׳‘׳¨ ׳‘"׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳×" ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳•׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳“] ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳–׳‘׳•. ׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳” ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳•׳‘ [׳‘׳׳©׳׳‘׳” ׳™׳“׳ ׳™׳× <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳©׳׳‘׳” ׳—׳©׳׳׳™׳× ׳¢׳׳•׳׳” ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳©׳׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳₪׳¢׳׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳”׳¦׳׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳©׳׳‘׳” ׳•׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳׳” [׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳™׳“׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳›׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳“- ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳—׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳¢׳–׳•׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳¢׳–׳•׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¨׳’׳¢], ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳₪׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳©׳ ׳˜׳” ׳’"׳› ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳“ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳˜׳•- ׳¨׳™׳— ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨.  </small></small>] ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ [׳›׳’׳•׳, ׳׳©׳׳•׳‘ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳§׳”] ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳‘ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳‘.</small></small> ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳©׳× ׳©׳™׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳” ׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳×׳©׳׳‘ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳™"׳] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ [׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳—׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•].</small></small>, ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳•׳‘ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳×׳× ׳׳• ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳”׳©׳׳•׳‘ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳“. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳×.
׳›׳™׳•׳, ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳— ׳׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳ ׳₪׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳§ <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳”. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳ ׳˜׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳§, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳—׳׳™׳₪׳™ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨. ׳•׳¦"׳¢ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳›׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳×, ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳ ׳§׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳—׳׳™׳₪׳™ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳˜׳•׳‘׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳§ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳׳›׳™׳׳ ׳• ׳‘׳×׳—׳׳™׳₪׳™ ׳—׳׳‘ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳¢׳–׳¨ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳—' [׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳× ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳×׳—׳׳™׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳©].</small></small> [׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳¨׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳].</b>
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳’׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳’׳™׳: 
BB׳. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳‘׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳˜׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳’, ׳’׳ ׳׳׳׳• ׳©׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳™׳™׳¢ ׳׳¨׳™׳₪׳•׳™׳• ׳©׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳“' ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳׳׳© ׳•׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳–׳” ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳•׳§׳¨׳™׳˜׳™ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳×׳• ׳•׳׳—׳™׳™׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳’. [׳§׳©׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳¨׳׳•׳¡׳˜׳˜ ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳© ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳”׳©׳₪׳¢׳” ׳§׳˜׳ ׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳׳• ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳–׳’׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳₪׳¢׳” ׳§׳˜׳ ׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳” ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳ ׳“׳׳§ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨].</small></small>.
׳‘. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳•׳‘ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳‘׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳”׳₪׳’ [׳•׳©׳׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“], ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳©׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳” ׳׳©׳׳•׳‘ ׳’׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳¦"׳© <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳₪׳’׳™׳, ׳•׳×׳—׳׳™׳£ ׳—׳׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳©, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳׳•׳§׳“׳ ׳׳׳•׳“.</small></small>.
׳’. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳׳©׳׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳¨׳’׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳” ׳©׳”׳‘׳¨׳’׳× ׳₪׳§׳§ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳׳—׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳§׳§, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳•׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳©, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳”׳•׳“׳§׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳×׳§׳•׳¢׳™׳.
׳“. ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳’ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳™׳›׳•׳™, ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳§׳˜׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳׳• [׳¢׳™' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’']EE.</b>
<h3> ׳׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳—</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳§ ׳¨׳§ ׳-35 ׳“׳§' ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳•׳‘׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¦׳׳”"׳› ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳×׳׳—׳¨׳× (׳©׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳׳© ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳”)]. ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳-25 ׳“׳§' ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™"׳ ׳-32 ׳“׳§'. ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳- 32 ׳“׳§' ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳ ׳– ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳”. </small></small>], ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳ <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳“׳×׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳"׳› ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳–׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳“׳•׳—׳” ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×, ׳™׳© ׳׳׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳.</small></small>.
׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳— ׳§׳™׳¡׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳׳×׳• ׳“׳•׳—׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™׳•׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳©׳™׳©׳™</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳‘׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳™׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳“׳—׳™׳× ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳©׳™, ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳— ׳§׳™׳¡׳¨׳™ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳׳’׳™׳“ ׳׳©׳ ׳” [׳₪"׳ ׳׳”׳' ׳׳™׳׳” ׳”"׳–] ׳©׳׳™׳׳× ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳“׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ [׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳‘ ׳׳¡׳™ ׳©׳׳׳¨ (׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳”.) ׳”׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳×׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳׳•׳׳•], ׳׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳׳•׳׳• ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™ [׳¢׳™' ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳›׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳’], ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳׳•׳׳•, ׳׳£ ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳₪׳§, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳©׳™׳©׳™, ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”.</small></small>, ׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳’. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳”, ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳—. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳”, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳• ׳›' ׳׳ ׳›׳].</small></small>

<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳’* - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳”</h2>
<h3> ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳₪׳¨׳¦׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—"׳•, ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳‘׳™ ׳׳© ׳›׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳’.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳×׳₪׳•׳¦׳¥ ׳׳™׳›׳ ׳’׳– ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳×׳₪׳•׳¦׳¦׳• ׳–׳›׳•׳›׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳›׳™׳ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳×׳×׳₪׳©׳˜ ׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳›׳™׳.</b>
<h3> ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳›׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳₪׳•׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳™׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳×, ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× [׳׳׳ ׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳׳§׳׳], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳×:
BB׳. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳›׳©׳×׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳‘׳§׳¢׳• ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳”׳׳© ׳×׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳›׳‘׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳›"׳“. ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳׳›׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳‘. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳– ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳¨׳׳– ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳•׳™ "׳›׳ ׳”׳׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳“", ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳׳”׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳›׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳›"׳• ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳¢. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨, ׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳™׳” ׳׳×׳™ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳™׳™ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳•.</small></small>.EE</b>
<h3> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳ ׳¢ ׳ ׳–׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳”׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳• [׳©׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳§׳‘׳ ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳–׳”], ׳׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳‘׳”׳×׳ ׳“׳‘׳•׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳‘׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳.</small></small>.</b>
<h3> ׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳•׳׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳“. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳•, ׳•' ׳“"׳” ׳”׳’"׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳‘׳ ׳• ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳ ׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳×׳” ׳•׳‘׳ ׳].</small></small>.</b>
<h3> ׳”׳¦׳׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳•׳׳–׳•׳–׳•׳× ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳“׳¨׳ ׳¨׳”"׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳¨׳₪׳•, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” [׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳] ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳™"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳˜. ׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳.</small></small>.
׳™׳© ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳‘׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳™׳©׳¨׳£ ׳”׳׳–׳•׳–׳” ׳”׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳” ׳‘׳“׳׳×, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳–׳•׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳¨ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳–׳•׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳¡׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳—׳•׳§׳” ׳‘׳—׳¨׳™׳¥ ׳©׳‘׳§׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳“׳‘׳•׳§׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳§ "׳₪׳׳¡׳˜׳™" ׳׳§׳™׳¨ (׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳§ "׳¡׳׳•׳˜׳™׳™׳₪")] ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳–׳•׳–׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳™ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳–׳•׳–׳” ׳׳׳©׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳' ׳¡׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳–] ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳׳–׳•׳–׳” ׳׳”׳§׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨׳× ׳©׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳ ׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¡׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳“׳‘׳§ ׳¡׳׳•׳˜׳™׳™׳₪ ׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳×׳• ׳•׳©׳•׳•׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳×. [׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳].</small></small>.</b>
<h3> ׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳₪׳¨׳¦׳” ׳‘׳• ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳’׳–׳¨׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳¨׳™׳₪׳” ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳©׳›׳— ׳•׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳©, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳•׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×׳•, ׳•׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳¢׳׳•׳×׳• <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳'. ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳ ׳׳‘׳”׳׳×׳•.</small></small> [׳•׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘' ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳×, ׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳—׳×] <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳“ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳–׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳›׳׳” ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳—׳“. ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–.</small></small> ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ <b>׳‘׳™׳“׳•</b> ׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳×׳• ׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳¦׳¨ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳׳—׳¦׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳”.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳׳—׳¦׳¨ ׳”׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘׳× [׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳×] ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳×׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳”׳’׳‘׳׳•׳× ׳”׳ "׳, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× [׳׳• ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳™׳–׳•׳¨] <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜.</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ <b>׳©׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳</b> ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳‘׳׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳•.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳© [׳׳–׳•׳–׳•׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳׳•], ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ [׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳–׳•׳¨] <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳• ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>.</b>

<h3> ׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳¦׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ [׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳], ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳, ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳›.</small></small>.  ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳• ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳׳™׳, ׳•׳©׳›׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳”׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“.</small></small>.
RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳“ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳×</h2>
<h3> ׳›׳™׳¦׳“ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× "׳–׳›׳•׳¨"</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳ ׳¦׳˜׳•׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳•׳× [׳›, ׳—].</small></small> '׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳“׳©׳•', ׳•׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳×׳” [׳•׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳×׳”] <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳›"׳˜ ׳”"׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳§׳ "׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳׳›׳×׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳”׳•׳. ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳§׳™׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× "׳–׳›׳•׳¨" ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×.
BB׳. ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳§׳™׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, [׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×].
׳‘. ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳, ׳©׳₪׳™׳¨׳© '׳–׳›׳•׳¨', ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳ ׳• ׳׳‘ ׳׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳–׳“׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳™׳₪׳” ׳×׳”׳ ׳׳–׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳©׳׳׳™ ׳”׳–׳§׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳–׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× [׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳˜׳–.]. ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳׳™׳“׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳ ׳”' ׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳, ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳  ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳˜׳—׳•׳ ׳• ׳—׳–׳§ ׳׳‘׳ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳©׳׳׳™.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳–׳” ׳”׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳• ׳₪׳¨׳™ ׳—׳“׳© ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳× "׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳“׳©׳•" <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳  ׳¡׳§"׳‘. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳”׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳”׳™׳ [׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳˜, ׳‘'] ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨, ׳•׳”׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳׳™ [׳ ׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳₪"׳— ׳”"׳ (׳›"׳” ׳”׳’׳™' ׳©׳ ׳©׳¦׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳¢׳™' ׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳”׳¢׳“׳” ׳©׳)] ׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳’"׳› ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳˜ [׳¡׳§"׳–] ׳“׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳¦׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳–׳›׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳’׳' ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨, ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳©׳” ׳“׳–׳›׳•׳¨.</small></small>.
׳’. ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳, ׳©׳”׳¡׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳׳× ׳™׳׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳•'] ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳¡׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳• ׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳—׳•׳•׳× ׳™׳׳™׳¨, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳”׳' ׳§׳¨"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¡'. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳” ׳¢׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳¡"׳’ ׳©׳›"׳› ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳¨"׳— ׳•׳׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳•׳›׳“׳•', ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳׳׳¨׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳ "׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳₪׳׳•׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×" ׳•׳׳§׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳ ׳–׳›׳•׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳ "׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳“׳©׳•" <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳–׳” ׳™׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳’׳¨׳¢ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™"׳¦ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳©׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳׳• ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳” ׳׳• ׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡' ׳¡׳§"׳–], ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”. ׳•׳‘׳¡' ׳”׳׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳׳”, ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”, ׳₪׳™"׳ ׳¡׳™"׳“ ׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳ "׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳“׳©׳•" ׳•׳›׳•'. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳›׳¢׳™"׳–, ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳׳•׳›׳—׳× ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳”.
׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳–׳›׳¨׳• ׳׳§׳™׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳•׳›׳™׳— [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×].</small></small>.
׳“. ׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳“ ׳•׳¨"׳© ׳•׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳›׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳₪' ׳‘׳—׳•׳§׳•׳×׳™.</small></small> ׳”׳׳•׳׳“ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳×׳׳׳•׳“ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”.
׳”. ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨, ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳• ׳—"׳• [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳”ײ¶׳¨׳’׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳›׳¡׳™׳¡׳× ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•'] ׳©׳™׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳©׳” ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳“׳©׳• <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳’׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳˜׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳˜ (׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳—׳¡׳“).</small></small>.
׳•. ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨, ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× "׳’׳•׳˜ ׳©׳‘׳×" ׳׳• "׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳•׳" ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ "׳׳™׳׳” ׳˜׳•׳‘" ׳׳• "׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘", ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small>. EE
<h3> ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳›׳ ׳•׳× <b>׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×</b> ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ [׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳›׳ ׳•׳×], ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳”׳©׳›׳׳” ׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳•. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳”׳›׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳ , ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳™׳©׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ [׳׳£ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¨׳™ ׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳׳¨׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳] ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳”. ׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” [׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳].
׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨, ׳“׳’׳™׳, ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ "׳‘׳•׳¨׳§'׳¡" ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳׳׳₪׳×׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳”׳₪׳× ׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳‘׳¢. ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳§׳•׳ ׳” - ׳–׳”׳• ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳  ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>. ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪"׳ ׳”"׳‘.</small></small> ׳׳™׳–׳”׳• ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳•' ׳•׳™׳•׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳•׳‘׳“ ׳¨׳׳© ׳׳™׳™׳—׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳¦׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳– ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳—׳™' ׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳™׳×׳¨׳• ׳“"׳” ׳•׳™׳’׳“, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’]. ׳•׳‘׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳—׳™׳™ [׳©׳׳•׳× ׳׳, ׳˜׳–] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ "׳•׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳×", ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¦׳₪׳•׳×, ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ [׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳™׳× ׳׳–, ׳™׳] ׳•׳›׳₪׳™׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳¦׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳”. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™</h3>
<b>׳’</b>. ׳¢׳–׳¨׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳¡׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘"׳§ ׳₪׳‘., ׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳‘.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳§׳ ׳×׳•, ׳”׳׳—׳“ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳¡׳• ׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳¡׳• ׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳›' ׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”' ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳"׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳”], ׳•׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳›' ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳‘׳¡׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳•' ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳₪׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳׳"׳¨ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳”' ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳₪׳¨׳¢ ׳׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳׳’"׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳•' ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”' ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳•' ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳‘׳¡. ׳•׳׳”׳׳›׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳"׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘].  ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳¨ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–], ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳”׳™׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳¡׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”' ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳•', ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳¡׳• ׳׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳¡׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳•' ׳׳›׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳¡׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”', ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳•' ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳” ׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳”, <b>׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳›׳•׳ ׳× ׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳™' ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳—׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳׳•' ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳׳×׳‘׳˜׳׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳›׳‘׳™׳¡׳” [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳₪"׳” ׳”"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳ ׳•׳©׳׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳›"׳—], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳ "׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘, ׳•׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳–׳”].</small></small>.</b> ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳’. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜"׳– ׳׳•׳× ׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳ ׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳¡ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳•' ׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳.
<BR>
<h3> ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳•׳§׳¦׳™׳¦׳× ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳©</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳™׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳¡, ׳'. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳’׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳”׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳›׳¨ ׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©.</small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳–׳•, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳—׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳—׳¥ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳™׳¨׳—׳¥ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳™׳.
׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳§׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳”׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳§׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™. ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳ ׳¨"׳— ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳¦׳•׳•׳׳× ׳¨"׳™ ׳”׳—׳¡׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳•׳¦׳¦׳™׳ ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨"׳—, ׳™׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§"׳•. 
JJ ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳›׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™ ׳”׳׳¢׳׳“׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳׳• ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳•' ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”'. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳—׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳˜ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳§׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”' ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”', ׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳©׳, ׳“׳”׳×׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳×׳¡׳₪׳•׳¨׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”', ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳˜"׳– ׳“׳¡"׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳×׳¡׳₪׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”' ׳™׳© ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳—׳₪׳•׳£ ׳”׳¨׳׳© ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×.
<h3> ׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳˜, ׳‘'] ׳₪׳™' ׳©׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳׳‘ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳–׳” ׳”׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ [׳¡׳§"׳™] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳₪׳™' ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳©׳׳×׳•׳ ׳˜׳¨׳“׳× ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳¢׳¡׳§׳• ׳‘׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳–׳׳–׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳©׳•׳” ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳™׳׳™׳. ׳•׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳₪׳™' ׳§׳˜׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳•׳—׳•׳× ׳”׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳׳‘ ׳׳׳›׳•׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨: ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳§׳˜׳ ׳” <b>׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳×</b> ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳–׳• ׳‘׳—׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳–׳׳–׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳•׳×</b> ׳‘׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳”׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳×׳™׳׳‘׳•׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳×׳׳¨׳— ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳” ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳–׳•.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳™ ׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳–׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳›׳ ׳¡׳• ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳×׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳˜, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳×׳©׳¢ ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳׳• ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳¡׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳₪׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳•׳›׳“׳•' ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’.</small></small>, ׳•'׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳' ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳—׳¦׳•׳× <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¦"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳›׳ ׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳•׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳–</b>. ׳™׳© ׳׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳›׳ ׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳: [׳”׳”׳›׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳׳•׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ <b>׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳—</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×]
BB׳. ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳§׳•׳₪׳¡׳׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳§׳™׳•׳× [׳—׳׳‘] ׳•׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳—׳˜׳™׳₪׳™׳] ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳’׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳” ׳׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳’. ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳©׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳“ ׳׳× ׳’׳‘׳™׳¢׳™ ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳”׳׳¢׳“׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳”.
׳‘. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳×׳¨׳•"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳©׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳×׳¨׳•"׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳• ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳© ׳×׳¨׳•"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳˜' ׳¡׳™"׳‘.</small></small>.
׳’. ׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳¡׳׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳§׳™׳ [׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳©׳₪׳›׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳™ ׳׳›׳׳™] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳×׳§׳׳§׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳¡׳׳˜׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳™׳] ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳׳×׳ ׳¢׳‘׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳—' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳- ׳™"׳‘.  </small></small>.
׳“. ׳¨׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳’׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳›׳•׳׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳, ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳¨׳•׳§׳ ׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳“ ׳›׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳™"׳‘. </small></small>] [׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳׳§׳₪׳™׳, ׳׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳¡׳›׳•"׳ ׳•׳׳’׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳“׳”].
׳”. ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳¡׳‘׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳׳” ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳•' ׳¡׳›"׳—.</small></small>.
׳•. ׳”׳›׳ ׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳ [׳׳ ׳׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳—׳“׳•׳×] <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳§׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™"׳ ׳¡׳˜"׳•.</small></small>.
׳–. ׳ ׳™׳×׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳¨.
׳—. ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳ ׳¡׳™"׳’ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳•.</small></small> [׳׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¡׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘].
׳˜. ׳”׳©׳—׳׳× ׳—׳’׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳—׳׳× ׳©׳¨׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'.</small></small>.
׳™. ׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳™ײ·׳§׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳•׳™׳–׳›׳” ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳˜ ׳¡׳™"׳.</small></small>.
׳™׳. ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳×׳—׳•׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳ ׳¡׳™"׳— ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳›׳- ׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳×׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳© ׳“׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳.</small></small>.
׳™׳‘. ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳‘׳” <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳”'.</small></small>.
׳™׳’. ׳”׳™׳“׳•׳§ ׳—׳•׳˜׳™ ׳”׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳× ׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳•׳×׳™׳• <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳™"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'.</small></small>.
׳™׳“. ׳”׳¡׳¨׳× ׳×׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳”׳.
׳˜׳•. ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× [׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳×- ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™׳¡ ׳׳₪׳׳•׳˜׳•׳× <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳–- ׳"׳—.</small></small>].
׳˜׳–. ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small>. EE
<h3> ׳׳©׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳׳©׳׳© ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳™ ׳©׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳©׳׳© ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳×.
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× "׳¢׳™׳©׳¨׳×׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳×׳ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨"</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳›׳” ׳©׳™׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨. ׳•׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳¨ ׳™׳©׳׳׳• ׳”׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳©׳¨׳• ׳”׳›׳. ׳•׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳—- ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳×- ׳™׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳• ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳¡, ׳‘'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳×׳” ׳•׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳×׳”</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳•׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳×׳• ׳•׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳×׳• <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳‘'] ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳©, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳™׳×. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳’, ׳‘' ׳©׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳’' ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small>. [׳‘׳’׳“׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¡']. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× <b>׳׳</b> ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳ ׳• <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳“׳׳•׳˜׳‘ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳©׳•׳’׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳׳–׳™׳“׳™׳, ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳. ׳•׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳—, ׳‘'. ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳ ׳•.</small></small>.
׳”׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳׳”, ׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳” <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳—, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳ "׳’, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳” ׳‘׳׳‘ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳§׳‘׳׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳•׳© ׳‘׳₪׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> "׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳™ ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳× ׳©׳‘׳×" ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳”"׳—, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳–׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳–׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳•׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳™׳•"׳› [׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳™׳•"׳› ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳–׳›׳”] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳–׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳©׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳× ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳•׳™׳•"׳› <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳›׳ ׳•׳¨׳›׳’ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘׳× ׳—׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳—׳• ׳"׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳₪׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡' ׳׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳›"׳’ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡' ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳– ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳₪׳™"׳— ׳׳•׳× ׳‘ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳¢׳™"׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳•׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳‘'. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳” ׳•׳¨׳‘׳¢ [׳–׳׳ ׳™׳×] ׳׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳׳”"׳›, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳•׳¨׳‘׳¢ [׳–׳׳ ׳™׳×] ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳”. </small></small>.
׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳. ׳“"׳” ׳•׳”׳ ׳•׳¨׳"׳© ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× [׳₪"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳•'] ׳•׳‘׳™׳•׳׳ [׳₪"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳—'], ׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳— ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳‘' ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳–׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›-13 ׳“׳§׳•׳× <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘. </small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ [׳•׳©׳ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳—׳¡ ׳-13.5 ׳“׳§׳•׳×], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳©׳”׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” 20 ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›"׳“ ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳™"׳— ׳“׳§׳•׳×. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳•] ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳ 2-3 ׳“' ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳”. ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳–׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” [׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ 3 ׳“׳§׳•׳×] <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳׳” ׳©׳”׳©׳׳© ׳׳•׳¡׳×׳¨׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳™ ׳”׳”׳¨׳™׳. ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳–.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳™׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳©׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳׳” ׳”׳™׳ 13.5 ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳©׳׳© ׳ ׳›׳¡׳™׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•, ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•, ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳‘' ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×, ׳•׳‘׳‘"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳§׳”׳™׳׳•׳×. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳¦׳׳”"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳”׳׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳–׳” (׳•׳׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ 18 ׳“׳§' [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’]). ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳׳“׳¢׳×׳• <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳' ׳§׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳₪׳—׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳—׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳—׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳׳׳© ׳¢׳“ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳׳” ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳—׳• ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳—׳׳§׳× ׳™׳•׳׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳', ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳”׳₪׳—׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳—׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳—׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳—׳•, ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳© ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” 13 ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳”.
<h3> ׳©׳׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳”׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳• ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳•׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ [׳›"׳› ׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳— ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳” ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘']. </small></small>. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳×׳§׳•׳¢ ׳׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳• ׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳× ׳©׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳”] ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳• ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳™"׳. </small></small>. [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳§׳‘׳׳” ׳‘׳˜׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳ <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳¨ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳ ׳•׳”׳§׳‘׳׳” ׳‘׳˜׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳•"׳ ׳׳”׳“׳•"׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’. ׳•׳ "׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳©׳›׳— ׳׳¡׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳₪׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳”"׳—, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ "׳ ׳׳׳•׳”׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳‘׳™׳§׳©׳• ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳™׳•׳ ׳—' ׳©׳׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™.</small></small>]. 
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳™"׳–. ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳“], ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” [׳•׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×]. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳™"׳“ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳‘׳×. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳“׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×- ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳. ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳, ׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳• ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳×.
׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳™׳׳” ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳”, ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳–. ׳“"׳” ׳“׳׳¡׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡"׳˜. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳' ׳׳• ׳–' ׳“׳–"׳  ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¢"׳” ׳¡׳™"׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳× ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳–׳” ׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳–' ׳™׳׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳×׳™ ׳“׳¡׳×׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳©׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳–׳” ׳›"׳™׳•׳" ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳׳• ׳׳™׳׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳×׳¨׳×׳™ ׳“׳¡׳×׳¨׳™, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡"׳˜ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳™׳׳™ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳›"׳™׳•׳" ׳׳׳ ׳¡׳’׳™ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳׳ ׳” ׳–"׳  ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳¡׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳—' ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳” [׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳¢׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳' ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳©׳].
׳•׳׳¢׳×׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳' ׳“׳–"׳  ׳׳—׳¨ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳›׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳‘׳•׳“׳§ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳× ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳¦"׳¢.
׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳–׳׳ ׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳• [׳׳• ׳©׳”׳§׳‘׳׳” ׳׳ ׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳•׳›׳“׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳’], ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳₪׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳• [׳׳• ׳©׳”׳§׳‘׳׳” ׳׳ ׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’] [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳”].  </small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳” ׳׳”׳¢׳“׳™׳£ - ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳• ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳”׳‘׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳”׳›"׳  ׳©׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳™׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳§׳‘׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳©׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳׳× ׳׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳ ׳™׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳™׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×- ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳§׳‘׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳×׳™׳, ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳׳•, ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳׳× ׳׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳— ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳• ׳“"׳” ׳©׳ [׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳—׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳×] ׳׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨. ׳•׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™ ׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× [׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳¨׳¥ ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡' ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳]. ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳›' ׳©׳”׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳׳”, ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”, ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳™׳—׳™׳“ [׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳”׳×׳׳׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”]. </small></small> ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳× ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳–׳” ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳•׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳—"׳›, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳׳×׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×. (׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳ <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳¢׳–׳¨ [׳—׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘].</small></small>).
<h3> ׳׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳¢׳׳” ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳¢׳׳” ׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳•׳§׳“׳ ׳•׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳§׳“׳ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳–׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳›׳• ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳’׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳—׳” <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳ ׳’׳¨׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳™׳×, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> [׳•׳׳׳™׳׳, ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳’׳¨׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳• ׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳—׳]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳—.</small></small> ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳“׳•, ׳׳• ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳”׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳•׳§׳“׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳’׳׳• [׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳“׳] ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳›׳¨׳—׳” ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳׳” ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ [׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳–׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳”׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳×׳• ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳ ׳’׳¨׳¨׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳×].
<h3> ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳™׳©׳×׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳×, ׳“׳›׳×׳™׳‘ '׳•׳›׳‘׳“׳×׳•' ׳•׳“׳¨׳©׳• ׳—׳–"׳ <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳’.</small></small> ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨, ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳’׳ ׳˜׳׳™׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳‘, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small>.
׳‘׳׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳“׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳—׳׳× ׳©׳—׳ ׳׳•, ׳׳• ׳׳—׳׳× ׳©׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳׳›׳׳›׳• ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳™׳©׳×׳ ׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳•׳™׳•׳¨׳™׳“׳.</small></small> ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳•, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× <b>׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨</b> [׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳–׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×] <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳“' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“׳•׳× ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨.</small></small>. ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳—. ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳”, ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳‘׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳"׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳•׳”"׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳©׳• ׳׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳’׳¨׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳•׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳׳—׳“.</small></small> ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¢׳“ 10-12 ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳‘' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳”׳׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳› 13.5 ׳“׳§׳•׳×, [׳©׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ 18 ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳ "׳˜, ׳‘' ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳', ׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳˜, ׳•' ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳“], ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳“ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳’' ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× [׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳’ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳, ׳•׳×׳׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳“ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳’' ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳¨"׳© ׳©׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳×] ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳•׳׳¨' ׳™׳•׳¡׳™ ׳¦׳׳”"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳£ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳•׳–׳” ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳•׳–׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳–׳׳ ׳• ׳“׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’׳™׳× ׳”׳’׳' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳׳“:- ׳׳”., [׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳׳”: ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§׳• ׳׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳¨' ׳™׳•׳¡׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳–׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳׳• ׳׳×׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳•], ׳•׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳×׳¨׳•׳™׳™׳”׳• ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳, ׳›׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳¨' ׳™׳•׳¡׳™ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳×׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳¨"׳© ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨' ׳™׳•׳¡׳™ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳¦"׳], ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳׳™׳™׳× ׳’' ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳₪"׳˜, ׳‘' ׳׳©"׳› ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳©׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳•׳׳™ ׳ ׳™׳¡׳ ׳•׳×׳©׳¨׳™ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳‘׳.
׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳¢׳˜ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳₪׳—׳™׳× ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳©׳ 13.5 ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳“ 13 ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳‘'], ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳ ׳›׳¨׳™.</small></small>.
׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳¡׳§׳ ׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳™׳, ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳¨' ׳™׳•׳¡׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳’׳¢ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳–׳׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳“׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳’׳׳•׳¨.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¢׳“ 10-12 ׳“׳§׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳¨ ׳“׳׳׳™ ׳•׳׳”׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘׳™ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳” - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳×</h2>
<h3> ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
 <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ [׳¨׳¡"׳“ ׳‘׳׳©׳‘"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳¦׳׳— ׳¦׳“׳§ ׳©׳›' ׳©׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳“׳”׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳“׳—׳” ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳“׳¨׳§ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳•׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳“׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳‘ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳  ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳“׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳“׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳§׳‘׳׳” ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™'.</small></small>
<b>׳.</b> ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳–׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳‘'. [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳•].</small></small>.
׳•׳׳£ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳¡׳£ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳. JJ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ "׳©׳–׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳". ׳•׳¦׳¢"׳’, ׳“׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳” ׳•׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳•׳ [׳›"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳•"׳© ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳] ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳‘׳’׳' [׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳’:] ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳×, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳§׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳“׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳] ׳•׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳›׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳, ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳]. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳§ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳”׳—׳™׳–׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳–׳”, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™, ׳•׳¦"׳¢.</small></small>AMP.
<h3> ׳”׳™׳“׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ "׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¨"</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳’׳׳¨׳ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳’:.</small></small> ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳×׳׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳• ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳×׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳™׳–׳›׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳. ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳–׳›׳” ׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ [׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×], ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳© "׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¨" ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳™׳₪׳” <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳•׳‘"׳— ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳ ׳¨ [׳•׳₪׳׳•׳˜] ׳™׳₪׳” ׳•׳׳”׳•׳“׳¨.
׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳₪׳™׳¨׳©׳• ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳–׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳§׳“׳•׳§׳™ ׳”׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳ ׳‘׳—"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳–׳”׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳©׳” ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳”׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳׳•׳˜׳׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳•׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳— ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳¡׳’׳™ ׳ ׳”׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳“ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳×"׳— ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳–׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳•׳“׳§׳“׳•׳§׳™ ׳”׳”׳׳›׳•׳×.</small></small>.
׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¨׳‘, ׳•׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳“ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳“ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳ ׳¨, ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳–׳›׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳£.</small></small>.
׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳©׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳“, ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳—. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳׳•׳× ׳›׳׳׳• ׳©׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳”׳‘׳”׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳ ׳×׳™׳×׳₪׳¡ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳”׳•׳‘ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳© ׳×׳™׳×׳₪׳¡ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳׳”.</small></small>.
׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳‘׳• ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳©׳׳•׳—׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳” ׳˜׳•׳‘׳” ׳©׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳©׳×׳• ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳’: ׳“"׳” ׳”"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳׳©׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳ ׳×"׳—, ׳•׳”׳™׳• ׳׳™׳© ׳•׳׳©׳” ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳×"׳—. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳•'. ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳₪׳™"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳’]. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳•. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•' ׳©׳›' ׳©׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳׳©"׳› ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳¨ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳—׳“׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳. ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳×].
<h3> ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳”</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳© ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×: ׳. ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳‘'. ׳•׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳” ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳“׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳‘' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳”. ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳₪"׳ ׳”"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳ ׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳©׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳, ׳•׳‘׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳¢׳' ׳§׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳—׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳¡׳˜׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘' ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳”"׳  ׳’׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳].</small></small>. ׳‘. ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳’: ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳–׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳“', ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳”. </small></small>. ׳’. ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳’:, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳.</small></small> ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳™' ׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳׳¨"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳™' ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳›׳”:, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¢"׳— ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳. ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳™' ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳© ׳׳׳©׳×׳• ׳•׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳•׳˜׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳©׳” [׳•׳׳ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳×׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳“׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳׳”], ׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳” ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳”.
׳•׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳“׳׳§ ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳•, ׳©׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§, ׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳” ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳“׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳"׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳¡׳’׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳“׳•׳׳§ ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳“, ׳•' ׳“"׳” ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳©׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳˜׳¢׳׳™ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳”׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳¦׳•׳”] ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳׳”.</small></small>.
׳›׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ <b>׳©׳׳•׳›׳</b> ׳‘׳•, ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳×, ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳– ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳“׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳•"׳› ׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’, ׳–' ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳•׳›׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳‘' ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳”, ׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳”:.</small></small>, <b>׳•׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳×, ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳‘׳“.  ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳˜׳‘׳—- ׳¢׳™' ׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳.</small></small></b>, ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ <b>׳’׳</b> ׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳. ׳•׳›׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳”, ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳”.</small></small>.
׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳—׳“׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳.</small></small>. 
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳—'.</small></small> ׳”׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳”. ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳” ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“, ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳, ׳•׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳›׳׳” ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“. ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳, ׳•׳”׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳‘׳• ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳‘׳¨׳›׳×׳• ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳”. ׳•׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳” [׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳], ׳•׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“.
׳’׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳” ׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” [׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳’׳© ׳׳—׳“ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳™׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳], ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳× [׳׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳×] <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳–.</small></small>. 
<h3> ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳׳</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳׳© ׳׳¢׳₪"׳› ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×. ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳”, ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳¡׳•׳’ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳•׳‘׳“ ׳•׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳©׳׳—׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳׳.
׳¢׳•׳“ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳”׳¨"׳™ ׳׳‘׳•׳”׳‘ ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳•׳“׳׳§ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳׳™׳¨, ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳›׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳“׳׳§ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳"׳› ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳‘"׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳“׳׳§ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳”"׳  ׳‘׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳“׳•׳׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳© ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ [׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳] ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳“׳׳§ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳£ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨ ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•'.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳“׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× [׳׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”] ׳•׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× [׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳] ׳•׳׳– ׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳×׳‘׳¨׳. [׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳×׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳•׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳×׳‘׳§׳© ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ [׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳” ׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳™"׳–] ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳—] ׳"׳› ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ [׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳] ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳”׳׳§׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳“׳•׳׳§׳•׳× ׳׳—׳™׳ ׳ [׳•׳׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳” ׳¢׳•׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳×].</small></small>].  ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳”׳“׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳›׳ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳׳”׳“׳¨ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳©׳׳]. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳™׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨</h3>
