<b>׳•.</b> ׳’׳ ׳׳¨׳"׳, ׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ <b>׳”׳׳•׳›׳</b> ׳©׳׳– ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.
׳•׳›׳׳” ׳¨׳׳™׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳›׳: ׳. ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳¨ [׳׳׳” ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳”׳“׳¨׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳˜] ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳×׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—', ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳”׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳ ׳“׳”׳ ׳‘׳׳"׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳›׳©׳׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳” ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳׳—׳” ׳•׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’. ׳‘. ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳“׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳ [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳“׳•׳׳§׳™׳] ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳“׳¢׳‘׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳“׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳§׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳– ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨׳™׳ [׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳•] ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳₪׳©׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳‘'].
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘"׳— ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳•׳‘׳¢׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳™ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳™׳•"׳› ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳“׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳¢׳•׳ ׳’, ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳×׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳© ׳™׳•׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳“׳‘׳™׳•"׳› ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳•' ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳”.
׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳׳– ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨.</small></small>.
<b>׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳ ׳—׳׳™׳• ׳•׳›׳“׳•' ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳• <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳”.  ׳•׳׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳”- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘.</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳§׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳×׳׳¨׳— ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳׳¨׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳₪׳˜׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳•, ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳˜׳¨ ׳"׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳”׳“׳”"׳  ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳›׳™׳•׳.</small></small>], ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳• ׳•׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳• <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’', ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳™׳×׳™׳× ׳׳׳•׳“.
׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳׳– ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳§"׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳” ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳–׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳•׳.</small></small> ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨</b> [׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳׳”׳“׳¨׳× ׳×׳׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳™׳— ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳×, ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳©׳ ׳× ׳×׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳•׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳•׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳×׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× [׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳•, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳–׳”]. </small></small>], ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳×׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳– ׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳›׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳©׳•׳ [׳•׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¢׳¦׳” ׳–׳• ׳©׳”׳׳©׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳”.</small></small> (׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¦"׳—) ׳•׳›׳ "׳] ׳•׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳™׳›׳×׳•.
׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳™׳•׳›"׳₪ ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™׳•"׳›.
<h3> ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ [׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳©׳׳]</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳©׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳× ׳׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳©׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳” [׳׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳₪׳¡׳§׳™ ׳”׳¨׳"׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”].  ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳× <b>׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳</b> ׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¥ ׳•׳׳‘׳. ׳•׳‘׳¢׳•"׳” ׳™׳© ׳”׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘] ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳”.
<b>׳׳×׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳›׳׳, ׳•׳’׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳©׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳•.</b>
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳¦׳” ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳—׳©׳׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳•׳¡׳’׳•׳׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳˜׳” ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳”׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳’] ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳×.</small></small>, ׳©׳×׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨׳” ׳•׳×׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳–׳•, ׳•׳×׳׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳”"׳  ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳× ׳©׳. </small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳—׳©׳׳ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳₪׳ ׳¡ ׳”׳׳•׳₪׳¢׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳‘׳˜׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳×׳—׳“׳© ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¨׳’׳¢, ׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳ ׳¡ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳¨.
׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳• ׳₪׳ ׳¡ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳¨.</small></small>.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳‘׳×׳™ ׳׳׳•׳.
<h3> ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳• ׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™"׳— <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳™׳•׳׳“׳× ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”, ׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳”׳›׳™, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳׳• ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳™׳“׳×׳ ׳•׳›׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” [׳•׳¢' ׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳‘ ׳₪׳¨׳ ׳§׳ ׳׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳׳˜׳” ׳׳©׳”].</small></small> ׳•׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳©׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳×׳• [׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳] ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳•', ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳— ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳¨׳™׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳™׳×׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳• ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳׳• <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳›׳©׳‘׳¢׳׳” ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳©׳, ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳׳“׳׳§׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳—, ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳‘׳—׳•׳¨׳™׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳”׳׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.  ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳"׳¦ ׳”׳›׳”׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳¨׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳”] ׳©׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳¨ ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳” ׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳"׳› ׳”׳׳™׳© ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳©׳©׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳•׳”׳׳©׳” ׳׳ ׳×׳‘׳¨׳.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳” ׳©׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳” ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳, ׳׳׳ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳•, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳‘׳—׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳”, ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳×׳• <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳™׳§׳— ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳”, ׳׳• ׳™׳§׳— ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™ײ°׳–ײ·׳›ײ¼ײ¶׳” ׳׳•׳×׳ [׳¢"׳™ ׳׳—׳¨] ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳”׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳”. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳׳™׳— ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳© ׳׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳×׳• ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳›׳™׳. ׳“׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳–'], ׳“׳ ׳™׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳× ׳•׳¡׳’׳™ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳׳–׳›׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘AMP. JJ ׳•׳‘׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳× ׳׳”׳“׳”"׳  ׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ [׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳¨׳¢׳§"׳] ׳•׳׳‘׳•' ׳“׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳—׳•׳× ׳׳–׳”, ׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳™׳“ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ [׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳₪׳™' ׳›׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳•], ׳•׳™׳"׳¢.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳’׳ ׳©׳ <b>׳‘׳׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳• ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳׳”׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨׳.</small></small></b> ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳—׳“׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨ [׳׳”׳׳¡׳“׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•'] ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳›׳׳.
׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳×׳• ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ [׳•׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”] ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳׳× ׳׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳—׳“׳¨׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• [׳׳ ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳] ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× [׳•׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨]. </small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨׳•.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳×׳׳¨׳— ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳‘׳—׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳×׳׳¨׳— ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ <b>׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳×</b> ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳׳¨׳—׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳׳¨׳—׳• <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳–, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“.
׳•׳”"׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳×׳׳¨׳— ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳•׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳“׳”"׳  ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳׳¨׳—׳• ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳—׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳” ׳‘׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳•.</small></small>.
׳׳×׳׳¨׳— ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳׳¨׳—׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ <b>׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™</b> ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳©׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× [׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× 30 ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳”׳• ׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳×] ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳©׳×׳×׳£ ׳¢׳׳• ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳•׳˜׳” ׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳”׳§׳ ׳” ׳׳• <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳–׳›׳” ׳‘׳”׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳¨׳— [׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳. ׳“"׳” ׳׳ ׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳—, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳™"׳’, ׳'].</small></small> ׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳• <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>, ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳׳•, ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳“׳”"׳  ׳׳׳ ׳• <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳"׳ [׳‘׳•׳˜׳©׳׳˜׳©] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳” ׳׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳¨׳— ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳“׳”"׳  ׳©׳׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳— ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳£ ׳”׳׳×׳׳¨׳— <b>׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”</b> ׳׳—׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳˜].  ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨׳— ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳. </small></small>.
׳‘׳—׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳™׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳–׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳×], ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳• ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•', ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳– ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳™׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳"׳› ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨׳• ׳•׳׳– ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥, ׳•׳׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳™׳–׳›׳” ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳׳• ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳™ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳‘׳•׳.</small></small> [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳”].
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳—׳×׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳׳™׳•</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳¢׳•׳“׳• ׳׳׳•׳¨׳¡ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳¨׳— ׳•׳›׳ "׳. ׳•׳׳›׳ <b>׳׳׳•׳¨׳¡ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳׳™׳• ׳™׳©׳×׳×׳£ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳•׳˜׳” ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳׳™׳• ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳</b> ׳׳• ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳׳– ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳”. ׳•׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'.</small></small>, ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳×׳£ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳•׳˜׳” ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳—׳×׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳•׳¨׳— ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳‘׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳¨׳— ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳—׳¨.
<h3> ׳”׳׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ "׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”" ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳₪׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ <b>׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳×</b> ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳©׳ [׳׳¨׳"׳] ׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳—׳©׳׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳×. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳¦׳™׳“׳“׳• ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× "׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”" ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳“] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¨ ׳©׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳×׳׳¨׳— ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳™׳ ׳” [׳›׳©׳—׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳] ׳׳• ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳™׳ ׳” ׳•׳™׳׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳¨׳•׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳©׳ ׳©׳, <b>׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳</b>, ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳¨׳›׳×׳• ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳” <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳˜] ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳× ׳©׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳”׳“׳¨׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳”. ׳•׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳¨׳×׳™׳₪׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳׳© ׳•׳׳•׳©׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳, ׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳§׳—׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳׳“׳׳™׳§, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳› ׳•׳׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳—׳¦׳¨ [׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳•׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳“׳•׳׳§׳•׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳׳”] ׳•׳©׳ ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳™׳© ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳©׳” ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳×׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳×׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳×׳”, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳× ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳“. ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳‘׳”"׳’ ׳•׳¨"׳× [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳™׳©׳¨] ׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘' ׳”׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢. ׳•׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳©׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳”"׳ , ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳”"׳  ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳, ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>.
׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳• [׳›׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳] ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳, ׳”׳׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ <b>׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳”</b> ׳׳• ׳‘׳–׳׳ <b>׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳›׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳©׳–׳”׳• ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳›׳©׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳×׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳—"׳› ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳×- ׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳‘׳• ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳•׳“׳׳§ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳"׳› ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” "׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳×" ׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳"׳› ׳›׳©׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳׳– ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳”.</small></small></b>- ׳•׳”׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳• ׳׳׳¨׳¥ [׳©׳׳– ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳“׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳™'], ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳”.</small></small>], ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳‘׳”.
׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳–׳׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳” <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳¢"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳©׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡' ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳¨׳₪׳׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳׳• ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳›׳• ׳׳׳¨׳¥ ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳›׳‘׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳™׳—׳• <b>׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳¦׳₪׳” ׳©׳׳– ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳”.</small></small></b> ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳׳׳™׳•. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳”׳‘"׳™ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨"׳£ ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳©׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳” ׳‘׳–׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳–׳•, ׳•׳”׳§' ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳“׳"׳› ׳”׳™׳׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳×׳™' ׳“׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳›׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳“׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳‘׳׳” ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳›׳ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳—׳“ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳™. ׳•׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳” ׳“׳׳™׳”׳• ׳§׳׳׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳×׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳”, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¨׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳”.
׳׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳¦"׳ ׳“׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” [׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳×] ׳§׳•׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳‘׳¢׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ [׳“׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳—׳“׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳—"׳› ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳׳›׳©׳•׳, ׳•׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳¨"׳ ׳“׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳¡"׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳”"׳’ ׳©׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳”"׳  ׳“׳”׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳×] ׳•׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳›׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳×.  ׳•׳׳£ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳›׳¨׳— ׳©׳—׳׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™, ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳¡׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳”׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳‘׳¢׳•׳× ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§, ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳• ׳׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳£ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¢׳. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳©׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳’׳׳¨ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”.
׳•׳”׳׳“׳§׳“׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳©׳”׳§' ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳׳׳׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳”, ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳›׳׳” ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳“׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳’"׳› ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳• ׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳›׳׳” ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× [׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳’׳ ׳׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™׳”].</small></small>.
׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳£ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳×׳ ׳™׳— ׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’׳© ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳׳׳™׳•. ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳©, ׳©׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳–׳¨׳™׳§׳×׳• ׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳×׳₪׳׳¨׳× ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳“׳׳׳™ ׳₪"׳– ׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳. ׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳”. ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¨</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳™׳©׳™׳¨׳•׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳§׳™׳¡׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳. ׳•׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ <b>׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳</b> ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” !] <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳©׳×׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¨׳"׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ [׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳—'] ׳©׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳”׳•׳©׳׳׳” ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳•׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳“׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳“"׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨׳•.  ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳”׳׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳’׳× ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳” ׳©׳•׳•׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳”, ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳×׳™׳×׳₪׳¡ ׳”׳׳”׳‘׳” ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳– ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳׳“׳׳™׳§ <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳“, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳¡׳×׳¨׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳–׳” ׳”׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×, ׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳’׳׳•׳×׳ ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳×׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳ [׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×].
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳× <b>׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×</b> ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” [׳•׳׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳ ׳™׳], ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳”'] ׳•׳׳©׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳“ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳“. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳©׳”׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳›׳”: ׳׳•׳× ׳“, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳©׳™׳”׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳. ׳•׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳ ׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳™ ׳•׳™׳–׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨׳, ׳•׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳™׳›׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳“' ׳׳•׳× ׳“.  ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳”׳¨"׳™ ׳•׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳˜ ׳©׳׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳”׳׳”׳¨"׳™ ׳•׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ (׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳™"׳ ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳”׳“׳•׳¨׳•׳×). ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳׳׳׳•"׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳×׳¨׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳׳” ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳×׳›׳¡׳” ׳׳× ׳₪׳ ׳™׳” ׳"׳› ׳‘׳¢׳׳” ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳•׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳•׳™׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳—׳׳§׳™ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳—</b>. ׳׳–׳׳ ׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” [׳©׳¢׳” ׳•׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳”]. ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳” ׳•׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¦׳׳”"׳› ׳“׳¨"׳×, ׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳"׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳›- 3 ׳“׳§' ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>] ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× <b>׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳×׳•</b>. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳×׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳¨׳© ׳׳”׳• ׳–׳׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳“'.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳-30-40 ׳“׳§' ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳–׳׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳•׳׳–׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
[׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳¨"׳× ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳™׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ 47 ׳“׳§' ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘"׳— ׳”׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳× ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳‘'] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳¢׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳“"׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳›' ׳“׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳‘"׳—, ׳•׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳›-48 ׳“׳§' ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳”׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•.</small></small>]  [׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ 40 ׳“׳§' ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳¡"׳’. ׳•׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳©׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳× ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨"׳× ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§ ׳›׳¨"׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳] ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳¨"׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳”.</small></small>].
׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳”, ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳–׳׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳“"׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳›' ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳‘"׳— ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳¢׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¦׳׳”"׳›, ׳׳ ׳”׳‘"׳— ׳“׳™׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳׳”"׳› ׳“׳¨"׳×, ׳•׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” 13.5 ׳“׳§' ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳©׳׳© ׳ ׳›׳¡׳™׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳•, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳•. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳׳”"׳› ׳©׳׳ ׳•.</small></small>.
׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳–׳׳ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳–׳–׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳×׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳©׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳×׳ ׳•׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳ ׳©׳•׳‘.
׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳•׳‘, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳–. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳¡׳™"׳“.</small></small>. 
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳×׳™ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× 40 ׳“׳§' ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” [׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳¨"׳™] <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ [׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¡"׳—] ׳©׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳—׳•׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳©׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳“׳§' ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳, ׳“׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ [׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳–] ׳—׳™׳׳§ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¦׳ ׳¢׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™׳”, ׳•׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨"׳› ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳"׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳™׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× 20 ׳“׳§' ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ 20 ׳“׳§' ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳›"׳› ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳׳׳• ׳©׳’׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“.</small></small>. ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ 40 ׳“׳§' ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳™-׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ 20 ׳“׳§' ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳•.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳”׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ 40 ׳“׳§' ׳‘׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳•׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡' ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳] ׳©׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳– ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳“׳׳™׳§ 40 ׳“׳§' ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳¢ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳•</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳. ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳¢׳™"׳–, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳›׳– ׳•׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳›"׳› ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳©׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳•׳¢׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳•׳×׳• ׳•׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳–׳• ׳™׳©׳›׳— ׳©׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳׳”׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨.</small></small>. ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳”׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳–, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳•׳׳™׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨ <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳•׳׳§ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳¢׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳˜ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳’׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳˜ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳” ׳”׳©׳¢׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳•׳.
׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳•׳¦׳§ ["׳©׳¢׳•׳”"] ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳•׳—׳–׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳” <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳ ׳¨ ׳׳•׳¦׳§ ׳©׳ ׳׳¡ ׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳ ׳•׳–׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¢׳—</sup><small><small>׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳, ׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳×׳™ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳×׳™ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳›׳” ׳”׳©׳•׳׳‘׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳’׳ ׳׳”׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳•׳—׳–׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳” <sup>׳¢׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳” ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨. ׳•׳”׳׳”׳“׳¨ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳”׳׳×׳’ ׳•׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ "׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳©" ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳. [׳•׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳¨׳•׳¡׳ ׳˜ ׳©׳”׳—׳©׳© ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳‘׳”].</small></small>.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳”׳‘ ׳׳• ׳¨׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳” ׳•׳™׳˜׳₪׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳×׳׳™׳¨ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ <sup>׳₪</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳—׳“׳©׳” ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳—׳–"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳¢ ׳׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳£ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳—׳•׳˜ ׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳׳”.</small></small>, [׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳¨׳•׳¡׳ ׳˜ ׳׳• ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳¨׳•׳¢׳“׳× ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳“׳¨׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳¦"׳¢]. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳•׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳׳™׳• "׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳©", ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳₪׳</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨.</small></small>.
[׳•׳׳•׳׳, ׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳×׳—׳׳© ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨. ׳•׳׳£ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳¨׳•׳¡׳ ׳˜ ׳•׳”׳׳×׳’ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• <sup>׳₪׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳. ׳•׳©׳׳׳×׳™ ׳׳’׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳×׳’ ׳•׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳׳•׳¨׳•׳¡׳ ׳˜ ׳•׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳©, ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳¦׳” ׳–׳• ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳¦׳™׳¢ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳¡׳׳ ׳˜׳¨ ׳•׳”׳¡׳›׳™׳׳• ׳¢׳׳” ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ [׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳•׳×׳¨], ׳׳•׳׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳–׳• ׳•׳¢׳™׳•׳ ׳• ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳׳‘ ׳׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ "׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳©" ׳•׳™׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳›׳¡׳” ׳•׳™׳˜׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳׳© ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳×׳•.</small></small>].
׳׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨, ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳” <sup>׳₪׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳” ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳’׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳¡׳˜׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳˜׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳“׳• <sup>׳₪׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳”, ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳“.</small></small>. [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ <sup>׳₪׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small> ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳”].
<h3> ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳× ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳›׳ "׳׳•׳§׳¡" ׳©׳ ׳’׳– ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨, ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳’׳” ׳”׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳”, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳—׳™׳× ׳׳”׳©׳׳ ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳¨, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳©"׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳’׳” ׳”׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨.
׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳’׳” ׳ ׳׳•׳›׳” ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳”. ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ [׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳’׳” ׳”׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨] ׳׳׳׳•׳“ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳•׳“׳• <sup>׳₪׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳” ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳’׳” ׳”׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳”.
׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳”׳’׳“׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳•.
׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳—׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳—׳–"׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳¢ ׳׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳׳—׳•׳˜ ׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” [׳”׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳“].</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳–׳• ׳“׳׳•׳§׳” ׳׳¢׳¨"׳©. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳׳×׳’ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳’׳” ׳ ׳׳•׳›׳” <sup>׳₪׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳” ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨].</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨, ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳” <sup>׳₪׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳” ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳’׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳¡׳˜׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳›׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳˜׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳“׳• <sup>׳₪׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳”, ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳›׳, ׳•׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳“.</small></small>. [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ <sup>׳¦</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small> ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳”].
<h3> ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳׳ <b>׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳©</b> ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨.
׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ <sup>׳¦׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳”, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘. ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳™׳, ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”. ׳©׳.</small></small>, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ "׳‘׳׳” ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳" ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•"׳› ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳’׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳•, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳’׳“׳” ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳— <sup>׳¦׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘'-׳˜', ׳•׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳“׳׳“׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳•׳¦׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳× ׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳׳”׳’׳“׳׳×׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳©׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳” ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳×׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳׳• ׳™׳×׳¨׳—׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳©׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳× ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳×׳•, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¦׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' [׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›: ׳×׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳ ׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳×׳•׳“"׳” ׳₪׳•׳×׳—] ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳—׳©׳© ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¨׳—׳§׳• ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳× ׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳”׳’׳“׳׳×׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳©, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳׳• ׳™׳×׳¨׳—׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳׳”- ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳§׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳׳” ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳₪' ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳× ׳•׳”׳’׳“׳׳× ׳”׳©׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳”׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳•׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨.  </small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ <b>׳™׳›׳‘׳•</b> ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¨׳•׳—.
<h3> ׳©׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳¢׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳–׳•׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳” <sup>׳¦׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳”, ׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳–.</small></small>.

<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳• - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×</h2>
<h3> ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳”</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳§׳“׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳׳§׳“׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳, ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳ ׳©׳—׳¨ ׳•׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳”׳§׳˜׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳×׳¢׳›׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳ ׳“׳›׳×׳™׳‘ [׳‘׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳—, ׳™] ׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳“׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳™׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳‘"׳— ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳׳§׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× [׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳”"׳—] ׳•׳׳– ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳¦׳׳”"׳› ׳•׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”. </small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳.
׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳”׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳₪׳׳׳• ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— [׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨], ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳¡׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳×׳™ ׳“׳¡׳×׳¨׳™ <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳•. ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳¨"׳™ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳”, ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳¡"׳ ׳›׳¨"׳™ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ ׳”׳×׳₪׳׳׳• ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳”. ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳×׳׳¡׳₪׳• ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳•׳§׳©׳” ׳׳׳•׳¡׳₪׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳×] ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳׳׳• ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¦׳׳”"׳›, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳׳×׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳׳׳• ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳”.
׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳• [׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳’׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳¨"׳™ ׳•׳¨׳‘׳ ׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳”</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳–. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳•.</small></small> ׳©׳׳£ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳”, ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳׳›׳׳• ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳₪׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳›׳×׳™׳‘ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳•׳× [׳˜׳–, ׳›׳”].</small></small> "׳׳›׳׳•׳”׳• <b>׳”׳™׳•׳</b>" ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳©׳׳© ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳₪׳× ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳•. [׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳§׳”"׳—] <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳”׳’׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳”, ׳"׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳™׳׳›׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳›׳×׳™׳‘ ׳׳›׳׳•׳”׳• ׳”׳™׳•׳. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳© ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳©׳׳– ׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘"׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳•" ׳©׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳›׳©׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”.</small></small>. [׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳׳׳ ׳–׳§׳ ׳•, ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳‘׳ ׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× "׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳•" ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ [׳¨׳¢"׳, ׳' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳“]. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”, ׳"׳› ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳¢׳• ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳׳׳ ׳–׳§׳ ׳•. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳¦׳¢׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™'.</small></small>].
׳•׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳™׳© ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳× ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©.
<h3> ׳”׳˜׳•׳¢׳” ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
 <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳“'-׳•' ׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳—, ׳'-׳•', ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳˜׳¢׳” ׳•׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳¢׳©׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳, ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳’׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳™׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳×.
׳©׳›׳— ׳©׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳×׳™׳‘׳× "׳׳×׳”" [׳׳׳×׳” ׳—׳•׳ ׳] ׳•׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳©׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳׳×׳” ׳—׳•׳ ׳ [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳›׳ "׳] ׳•׳™׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳™׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳’׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳׳¨ ׳×׳™׳‘׳× "׳׳×׳”" ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳™׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳™׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳×.
<h3> ׳”׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳˜׳¢׳” ׳•׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳©׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳ [׳©׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳•׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳—׳•׳×: ׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳×׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳™׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£.</small></small>], ׳׳ ׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳¢׳§׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳×׳—׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳§׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳”׳©"׳¥ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” [׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©"׳¥ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”], ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳”׳©"׳¥ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳©׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳™׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳”׳©"׳¥ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳—׳׳™׳£ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳–׳• ׳‘׳–׳•</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳˜׳¢׳” ׳•׳”׳—׳׳™׳£ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳–׳• ׳‘׳–׳•, ׳׳ ׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳”׳׳×׳׳™׳׳”.
׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳£ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳•׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳–׳• ׳‘׳–׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳•׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳™׳׳׳¨ '׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£', ׳•׳™׳׳©׳™׳ "׳¨׳¦׳”" ׳•׳›׳•'.
׳׳ ׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳¨׳¦׳” - ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳£ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳•׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳–׳• ׳‘׳–׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳•׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳×׳›׳ ׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳•', ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳§׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• [׳‘׳׳•׳¡׳£] ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”. ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳•׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳×- ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳§׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” [׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳‘׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳©׳•׳‘].
׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ "׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”", ׳׳ ׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳”׳©"׳¥ [׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×] ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳”׳©"׳¥ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳˜, ׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳—.</small></small> .
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳•</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳×. ׳•׳—׳•׳–׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳© <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳—, ׳', ׳–'.</small></small>.
׳”׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳© ׳™׳׳”׳¨ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳×׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳©׳¨׳”, ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳¢׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳׳” ׳×׳¢׳™׳“ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳•׳¢׳“׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳©׳¨׳” <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳— [׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳], ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳˜"׳– [׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜] ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳©׳¨׳”.</small></small>.
׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳— ׳•׳‘׳¡' ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳›׳×׳‘׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳˜' ׳•׳—"׳‘ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›"׳’].
׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳‘ ׳¨׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳—׳•׳׳§, ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small> ׳©׳”׳׳•׳—׳– ׳‘"׳׳׳•׳§׳™, ׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨" [׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× "׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳׳¨׳¦׳•׳" ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳׳•׳§׳™ ׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳"׳› ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳›׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳©׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳©׳¨׳”, ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳“׳”</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳©׳¨׳”, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳©׳¨׳” ׳׳– ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳—׳₪׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.</small></small>, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳– ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“, ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳¢׳“׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳›׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳”.
׳•׳™"׳ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small> ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳©׳¨׳” ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳׳”׳™׳₪׳, ׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳•׳‘, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳™׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳ [׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳•׳ ׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳“׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳–׳” ׳›׳¢׳“׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳™׳× ׳"׳› ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳•׳ ׳¨׳ ׳›׳¢׳“׳•׳× <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳"׳‘.</small></small> ׳•׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳×׳• ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>].
- ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳¢׳™' ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’'.
<h3> ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳”׳©׳׳™׳— ׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳—, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳›. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×׳™ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳“׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳™׳• ׳™׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳׳‘׳“, ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳–׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳×׳¢׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳×׳.</small></small>.
׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ [׳›׳׳• ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳‘׳׳™׳].
׳•׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳›׳׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳. ׳•׳¢"׳© ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳›' ׳‘׳׳•׳— ׳׳¨"׳™.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳׳’׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳× <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳˜ (׳’) ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳–' ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳ ׳¡"׳× ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¡"׳× ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢, ׳׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳ ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳¢׳׳׳ ׳›׳”׳"׳¨ ׳•׳›׳”׳"׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡"׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳–׳•</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳׳’׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳¡"׳× <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳© ׳—׳™ ׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘' ׳₪׳¨' ׳•׳™׳¨׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™', ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳•׳— ׳׳¨"׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳˜׳™׳§׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳¡׳§׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳§׳‘׳׳”, ׳™׳¢׳•׳™׳™"׳©.
׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳–׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳׳‘׳, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳”׳¨׳™"׳ ׳“׳™׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳§׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳”' ׳§׳¦"׳˜, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳©׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳₪׳"׳• ׳”׳¢' ׳¦"׳•.</small></small>. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳¡"׳” ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳ "׳—. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳˜] ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳™ ׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳×׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳©׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳“׳©׳•׳×.</small></small> ׳©׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳×׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨.
<h3> ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳×</h3>
 <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳• ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© [׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳§:] ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳§׳”׳™׳׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳—׳•"׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›"׳ . ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳™ ׳×׳׳” ׳”׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳₪׳©׳˜ ׳–׳” ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳“׳”׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳”׳׳™׳“׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳¨׳›׳™׳, ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨"׳ ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳©׳ ׳“׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳• ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳× ׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳©׳“׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳—׳–׳¨׳• ׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳׳–׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢׳” ׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳× ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’, ׳•׳”׳›׳™ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ [׳—"׳ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳"׳–] ׳•׳”׳"׳ [׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳›"׳˜ ׳”"׳—]. ׳•׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳–׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳—"׳ ׳×' ׳×׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳™׳© ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳•"׳– ׳”׳' ׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳›' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” [׳׳–׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳× ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳•׳׳¨׳₪׳•׳׳”], ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳•׳–"׳: ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳’׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳¡׳“׳•׳”׳• ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳.</small></small>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳˜, ׳'.</small></small> ׳©׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳©׳›׳ ׳–׳™׳ ׳©׳§׳“׳©׳• ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳‘׳§׳”׳™׳׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳, ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ "׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳—׳¡׳“" ׳‘׳‘"׳‘ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳›׳ ׳‘׳§׳”׳™׳׳•׳×׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳—׳•"׳ ׳•׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳“׳™׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢. ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳”׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳’] ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳•׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳’׳, ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳–׳• ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳•.</small></small>.
׳׳׳ ׳, ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳“׳©׳• ׳’׳ ׳‘׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳©׳›׳ ׳–, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳‘"׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳›"׳› ׳©׳™׳§׳“׳©׳•, ׳׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳‘׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳₪׳™׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳×׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳’ ׳׳׳•׳׳¨׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳ ׳’׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳©׳›׳ ׳– ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳‘׳•׳×׳ ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳׳×׳ ׳× ׳’' ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳‘ [׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳”׳•׳׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳ ׳׳©׳].</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳›׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳—׳–׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳‘׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳₪׳™׳•׳˜ "׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳›׳" ׳•"׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳׳™׳"</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳–׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳›׳ ׳‘׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳•' ׳’"׳₪, ׳•׳›׳ "׳׳©׳× ׳—׳™׳" ׳•׳›׳•'. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳׳—׳¦׳™׳× ׳”׳©׳§׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳¢׳¨׳™ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳‘] ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳׳¨ ׳—׳¨׳•׳– "׳¦׳׳×׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳" [׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¨׳¥ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳“׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳”׳¨"׳™ ׳•׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳׳׳›׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¦׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳˜׳•׳‘.] ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳׳׳¨׳• ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳©׳™׳¦׳׳•. ׳•׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¨׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳©׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳׳׳›׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳’׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳“׳׳’ "׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳™ ׳¨׳—׳׳™׳", ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳”׳¨"׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳ ׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳“] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳׳׳׳›׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳•׳” ׳•׳©׳₪׳׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳×׳‘׳™׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳׳”׳׳׳ ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳‘, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•.
׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳' ׳§׳– ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳•' ׳¢׳׳™׳›׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳—, ׳‘' ׳“"׳” ׳“׳–׳” ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¨׳‘׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳§׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳™׳׳׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳×׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳‘׳— ׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳׳©׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳׳™׳׳× ׳™׳¢׳‘"׳¥ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳©׳¢"׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳‘. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™'. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳–, ׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳˜] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” [׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳” ׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳§׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳”]. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳© ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳—׳•׳”׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳›׳.].</small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳׳•׳—׳– ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳•׳’׳™׳ ׳ ׳’׳“ ׳”׳”׳׳›׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳‘׳”׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳¦ ׳¡׳™"׳–, ׳"׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳’׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳˜׳¦׳“׳§׳™ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳• ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× [׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳–, ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳×׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳–׳”], ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳“ ׳“׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳×׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳¨׳•׳× ׳§׳™׳™׳׳•׳× [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳¡׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳™ ׳•׳›׳•' ׳•׳©׳×׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳—׳×׳™] ׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳’ ׳׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳“׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳’ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳׳™׳, ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳×׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳•. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳§׳₪׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ "׳׳©׳× ׳—׳™׳" <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳—׳›׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳–׳•. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳“"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳‘] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳–׳•.
׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳”׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳™׳׳¦׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳×׳™ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳™׳ ׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳×׳™ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳׳¢׳™׳“ ׳׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳©׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳¦׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳©׳׳© ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳•׳¡׳™, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳–׳›׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳•', ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨ "׳•׳™׳׳ ׳" ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳•׳“׳₪׳¡׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ "׳׳›׳• ׳ ׳¨׳ ׳ ׳”" [׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳¡׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” "׳•׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳›׳“׳× ׳›׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳•׳"], ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳›׳׳” ׳§׳”׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳§׳‘׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳×. </small></small>.

RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳– - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”</h2>
<h3> ׳׳×׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳“׳›׳×׳™׳‘ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳•׳× [׳›, ׳—].</small></small> ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳§׳“׳©׳•, ׳•׳“׳¨׳©׳™׳ ׳ ׳–׳•׳›׳¨׳”׳• ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ [׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳] <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳›"׳˜ ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”"׳• ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳“׳£ ׳׳—. ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳™ ׳•׳›"׳› ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳ ׳–׳™׳¨ ׳“׳£ ׳“. ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳™. ׳•׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳›: ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳”׳¨"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳’:, ׳•׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳.</small></small>.  ׳׳ ׳• ׳”׳׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳×, ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳¢׳¨׳¢׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳¢׳¨׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳׳׳ ׳–׳§׳ ׳• <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳© ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳¢׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳™"׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳™"׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”. ׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳‘׳ ׳™"׳’ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳׳׳ ׳–׳§׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳”׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳§׳˜׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳–׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳•׳׳™׳׳, ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳™׳“ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳”AMP <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳–, ׳‘', ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳. JJ ׳•׳™׳"׳¢, ׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳•׳, ׳”׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• [׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳‘' ׳“"׳” ׳™"׳] ׳•׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳"׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳׳© ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳”. ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳£ ׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳. ׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳‘' ׳“"׳” ׳™׳© ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳].
׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳‘׳׳’׳™׳׳” [׳׳•׳× ׳×׳©׳¦׳—] ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳׳£ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳”׳§' ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳"׳› ׳׳׳׳™ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳”׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳׳£ ׳׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳×׳™' ׳”׳׳ "׳— [׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳™] ׳“׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳™׳© ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳׳—׳ ׳›׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳׳£ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳.
׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳›"׳› ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳׳—. ׳“"׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳׳. ׳•׳”׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳™׳׳” ׳›., ׳"׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳‘׳“"׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳•, ׳’' ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§ ׳©׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳™ ׳ ׳™׳׳ ׳©׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳›׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳§' ׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳’׳׳™׳•׳].
׳•׳©׳׳ ׳™"׳ ׳“׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳“׳™׳ "׳™׳•׳" ׳©׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¨׳• ׳“׳׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳¨׳•׳™ "׳™׳•׳", ׳•׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳¨׳• ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳“"׳”׳™׳•׳" ׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳§׳˜׳ ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳•׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳’׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳’׳“׳•׳, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳—׳“׳© ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳ "׳— ׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳–׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×. JJ.</small></small> [׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳׳¢׳¨׳™׳‘ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳, ׳“' ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳£ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳¢׳¨׳™׳‘, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¨׳‘ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳§׳™׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳’.</small></small>], ׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳“׳›׳×׳™׳‘ ׳׳›׳׳•׳”׳• <b>׳”׳™׳•׳</b> ׳•׳"׳› ׳™׳© ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘'.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳¢׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳¨"׳© ׳•׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳¢׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳§׳¨"׳© ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨ ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳” ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳§׳× ׳—׳׳¥, ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳¢׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳“.</small></small>.
׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳₪׳׳’ ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳” <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳, ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳›׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳©׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳×, ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳©׳׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳–׳“׳¨׳– ׳›׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳“. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳¢׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¢׳‘ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳×, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳׳• ׳׳•׳¨׳— ׳¨׳¢׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳§׳“׳© ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳›׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳×׳™׳׳‘׳•׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳׳ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©</h3>
