<b>׳’.</b> ׳‘׳׳—׳‘׳¨ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳, ׳™'. ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳ ׳˜, ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳›׳ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳׳” ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳•, ׳•' ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳™׳•׳©׳‘ ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©.</small></small> ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳™׳© ׳׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳™׳©׳‘ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳§׳¦׳× ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳©׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳– ׳‘׳¨"׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳׳™׳ "׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳©׳™ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳”׳©׳׳™׳". ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© [׳•׳™׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× "׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳•"] ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳–׳” ׳›׳׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳˜׳¢׳ ׳. ׳©׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”. ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳‘. ׳›׳©׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳™׳—׳“ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳–, ׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳˜, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳™׳—׳“ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳•׳‘׳‘ ׳׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳•׳–׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳“׳™׳. ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳•. ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” [׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳ ׳˜], ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳›׳ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳׳” ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳•, ׳•' ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳™׳•׳©׳‘ ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳’׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳“׳•׳¨׳•׳× <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳•׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳’ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small> ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳.
׳•׳׳£ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳×׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳×"׳— ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳¢׳•׳׳“ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳•, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳›׳”"׳— ׳•׳‘׳׳˜׳” ׳׳©׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳׳¨"׳™.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳©׳™ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳• ׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳•' <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳, ׳™'.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳™׳ ׳'׳•׳™׳”׳™ ׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳•׳™׳”׳™ ׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳©׳™'. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳• <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ [׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳”] ׳“׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§׳™ ׳“׳׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳™׳” ׳׳©׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳"׳•׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳™׳”׳™ ׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳•׳›׳•'', ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳’ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳‘׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳›׳×׳‘ [׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳™'] ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳™׳”׳™ ׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳•׳™׳”׳™ ׳‘׳§׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳“׳¨׳©׳• ׳—׳–"׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳–׳” ׳”׳׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳©׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳§, ׳•׳›׳©׳׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳©׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳©, ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳×׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳ ׳¨׳•׳× <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳§׳“׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳™׳×׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡ ׳•׳›׳“׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'-8.</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳'׳›׳™ ׳©׳©׳× ׳™׳׳™׳' ׳•׳›׳•' ׳•׳׳ ׳'׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳' ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳–׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳‘׳“׳™ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳‘. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳"׳›׳™ ׳©׳©׳× ׳™׳׳™׳" ׳›׳”׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳], ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳˜׳¢׳ "׳׳×׳ ׳—׳×׳" ׳•׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳₪׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳˜. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© [׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳”]</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>. ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳- ׳×׳©׳¢׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳- ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳—׳“, ׳•׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳§׳‘׳׳”- ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳—׳“ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳ ׳. ׳¢׳©׳¨׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳˜׳¢׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳—׳”, ׳•׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳”, ׳—׳™, ׳•׳׳׳, ׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳£, ׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳×׳™ ׳™׳“׳™׳, ׳׳•׳—׳–׳• ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™׳”׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳˜׳₪׳—, ׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳•, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳©׳’׳¨׳• ׳‘׳׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×׳•. ׳׳׳¨ ׳¨' ׳™׳•׳—׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳׳ ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳‘׳“, ׳”׳“׳—׳”, ׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳”, ׳—׳™ ׳•׳׳׳.  ׳•׳‘׳˜׳•׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳’] ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳¨' ׳™׳•׳—׳ ׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¨' ׳™׳•׳—׳ ׳ ׳‘׳ ׳׳׳¢׳˜ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳£ ׳©׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳• ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™. ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳§ [׳©׳] ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳£, ׳•׳›׳”׳˜׳•׳¨. ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳¨' ׳™׳•׳—׳ ׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳—׳” ׳•׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳” ׳—׳™ ׳•׳׳׳ ׳׳¢׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ [׳›׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳£] ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¢׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳©׳•"׳¢, ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳™׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳£ ׳‘׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳•׳. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳’"׳ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳”] ׳©׳”׳׳§׳•׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳• ׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳¨. </small></small>.
׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳›׳‘׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>[׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳×] ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳›׳‘ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ [׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳’׳¨"׳], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳—׳™, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳. [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§"׳› ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¢׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳”׳“׳—׳” ׳•׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳” ׳—׳™ ׳•׳׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳›׳‘׳™׳, ׳•׳¦"׳¢]. </small></small>.
׳•׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳ ׳‘׳׳¨ ׳”׳×׳©׳¢׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢, ׳•׳׳׳• ׳”׳: 
BB
<b>1-2. ׳”׳“׳—׳” ׳•׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳”</b>- ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳“׳—׳” ׳׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳” ׳׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳© ׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳“׳™׳—׳• ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳§׳™ ׳•׳¦׳— ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳—׳” ׳•׳©׳˜׳™׳₪׳” <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳’, ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳§׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳—׳• ׳‘׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©. ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳¨׳ ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳”׳™׳” ׳ ׳§׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳“׳™׳—׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©.</small></small>.
<b>3. ׳—׳™</b> - ׳׳׳–׳•׳’ ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳¨׳§ ׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳׳© ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳ ׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small>, ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳© ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ <b>׳—׳™</b>, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳—׳™ ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳’׳ ׳•׳¡׳“׳§ ׳•׳׳₪׳™' ׳©׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳—׳×׳™׳× ׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳¢ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳’, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>. [׳™׳© ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳© ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳•׳–׳’׳• ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡ ׳׳—׳¨ [׳™׳© ׳₪׳™' ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳–].</small></small>].
<b>4. ׳׳׳-</b> ׳›׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳•, ׳©׳™׳”׳ ׳׳׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳›"׳› ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳₪׳ ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳’, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳˜. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳–׳›׳•׳× ׳–׳” ׳–׳•׳›׳” ׳׳ ׳—׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳›׳×׳™׳‘ "׳׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”' ׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳¨׳©׳”".</small></small> [׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳• ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳‘ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳, ׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳.</small></small>].  
<b>5-6</b>. <b>׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳×׳™ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳• ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳-</b> ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳˜"׳–- ׳׳§׳‘׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳×׳™ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳—׳‘׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳•׳—׳–׳• ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳›׳׳©׳•׳™ <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳’, ׳”'] ׳©׳׳™׳˜׳¨ ׳™׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small> ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳©׳"׳” ׳׳”׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳£ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳•׳”׳׳¦׳‘׳¢׳•׳× ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳–׳§׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳›׳₪׳₪׳•׳× ׳™׳¡׳™׳¨׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳ ׳˜׳™׳׳× ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳”. 
<b>7. ׳׳’׳‘׳™׳”׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥ [׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳] ׳˜׳₪׳— <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳׳™ [׳₪"׳– ׳”"׳”] ׳©׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳•׳— ׳˜׳₪׳— ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳“ ׳׳©׳•׳׳—׳.</small></small></b>- ׳›׳“׳›׳×׳™׳‘ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳™׳©׳•׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳©׳. ׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳’׳‘׳”׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳¨׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small>, ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ 
[8.] "<b>׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳•"</b>- ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳©׳• ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>, ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳—׳• ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳”׳›׳•׳¡, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳₪׳™' <b>׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳•</b> ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳— ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳₪׳™׳• ׳¦׳¨ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳•, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳™׳’ ׳‘׳§׳׳•׳× ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳•׳›׳•', ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳©׳• ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳• ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡, ׳•׳›׳ "׳.</small></small>.
9. <b>׳•׳׳©׳’׳¨׳• ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳×׳ ׳”</b>- ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳×׳‘׳¨׳›׳•, ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳×׳‘׳¨׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳— ׳׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳׳׳©׳×׳• ׳•׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳×׳‘׳¨׳›׳•, ׳•׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.</small></small>. [׳”׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳¢׳׳× ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳ ׳‘, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳›׳׳•׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳×׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳”׳• ׳׳©׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•].
EE
׳™׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳’׳ <b>׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳£</b> ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳× ׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳™׳₪׳” ׳•׳׳‘׳™׳©׳× ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳.</small></small>.
׳”׳׳§׳•׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳• <b>׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳¨</b> ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳™׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳• <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳”. ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳•. ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• [׳¢׳' ׳§׳™] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳¢׳˜׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳©׳” ׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ [׳‘׳׳¢"׳¨ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳•']. [׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳›"׳].</small></small> [׳׳• ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳¢׳׳“׳• ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡].
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘׳” <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¢׳×׳” ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳׳” ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘׳”, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳¢׳–׳¨ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’]. ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳™׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳, ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳©׳”׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳”׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳—׳•׳–׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳›׳׳¢׳˜ ׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳׳×.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳× <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳˜], ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳©׳‘׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳˜׳•׳׳׳” ׳•׳׳•׳›׳— ׳“׳׳ ׳׳™׳§׳¨׳™ ׳›׳׳™. ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™.</small></small>, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳×.
׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳׳—׳× ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳׳©׳×׳™ ׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳•׳× ׳–׳• ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳–׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳—׳“ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳.
<h3> ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳₪׳’׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳₪׳’׳•׳, ׳•׳₪׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳©׳×׳• ׳׳׳ ׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳₪׳’׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳₪׳’׳•׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳‘, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳’, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳™׳§׳— ׳₪׳’׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳™׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳’׳™׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳”׳₪׳’׳•׳, ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳’׳™׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳©׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳₪׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳•. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳”׳₪׳’׳™׳׳” ׳’׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ [׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳• ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”] <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•', ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳”׳₪׳’׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳‘׳—׳™' ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳–׳” ׳"׳ ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳₪׳’׳•׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳™׳–] ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳›׳.</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳©׳₪׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳”׳₪׳’׳•׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳’׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳‘׳™׳¢, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳׳’׳‘׳™׳¢ ׳•׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳”׳₪׳’׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳”׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳—. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳×׳™׳× ׳”׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳”׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳›׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳’׳׳™׳• <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳•׳˜׳¨׳×].</small></small> ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳©׳×׳™׳™׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳₪׳¨׳¡. ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳—.</small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©] ׳©׳×׳” ׳›׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳’׳׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳›׳׳” ׳©׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳×׳• ׳™׳—׳“ ׳›׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ [׳©׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳₪׳¨׳¡], ׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳, ׳™"׳’, ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳˜. ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳×׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳›׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳’׳׳™׳• ׳׳£ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳׳•.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳›׳•׳׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳©׳×׳™׳” ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳’׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳’׳•׳, ׳›׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳©׳×׳• ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳’׳•׳ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳– ׳•׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳’.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳¢ ׳©׳©׳×׳” ׳”׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳₪׳’׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳. ׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳©׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳×׳• ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳’׳•׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳׳©׳× ׳”׳¢׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳•׳×: ׳. ׳™׳×׳§׳ ׳”׳₪׳’׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳¢ ׳©׳©׳×׳” ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳™׳, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ! <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳¢׳׳× "׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳”" [׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳]. [׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳›׳׳•׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳” ׳"׳› ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳– ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳”]. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳—, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳ ׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳—׳™׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳, ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳¢׳•׳“.</small></small>. ׳‘. ׳™׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳¢ ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳–׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳’׳•׳ ׳™׳—׳׳§ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳™׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳˜ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳©.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳‘׳™׳¢ ׳©׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳.</small></small>. ׳’. ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳¢ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳©׳• ׳‘׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳©׳₪׳›׳• ׳׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳¢, ׳׳– ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳©׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳’׳•׳ <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳. ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– [׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳©׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳¨׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳©׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳₪׳’׳•׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳] ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳©׳©"׳› [׳₪׳"׳— ׳¡׳™"׳].</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳¢׳ ׳›׳, ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳™ ׳”׳©׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳׳–׳” <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳¨׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳¢ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳–, ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳–׳”, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳¢׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳ ׳•"׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳¢ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¨׳¢".</small></small>.  [׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳–׳•׳’ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳©׳׳”׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳׳– ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳”׳, ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳™׳— ׳’׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳—׳׳§ ׳׳›׳•׳׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳‘׳’׳' ׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ [׳§׳•.] ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳—׳–"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳ ׳’ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳™׳.</small></small>].
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳™׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳• ׳¨׳™׳— ׳¨׳¢, ׳©׳׳– ׳₪׳•׳¡׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳‘, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳™׳— ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳§׳׳˜ ׳‘׳• ׳¨׳™׳— ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳— ׳‘׳•.</small></small>.
׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳£ ׳×׳›׳•׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ [׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳] ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳‘׳—, ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳˜.</small></small>.
׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳׳” ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳ [׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳‘׳— ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳] <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳ - ׳©׳ ׳‘].</small></small>.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳©׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¡׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳“׳‘׳© ׳׳• ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳"׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳‘, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳]. ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳– ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¡׳§ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳“׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳“׳¨ ׳›׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳™׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨. ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳”- ׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳” ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳©׳›׳©׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳” ׳‘׳¡׳×׳ ׳•׳“׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™"׳ ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳™"׳ ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¢"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳—. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳• ׳׳•׳× ׳’.</small></small>. (׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳”׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨).
<h3> ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳’׳•׳׳” <b>׳–׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜</b>, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳’׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—"׳ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳§׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳’׳™׳׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳× ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳׳’׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜, ׳"׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳§׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳”׳₪׳©׳•׳˜׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳–׳•׳׳™׳. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳׳” ׳׳₪׳™' ׳©׳¢׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳˜׳× ׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳•. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳–'.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳‘׳–׳” "׳׳©׳”׳•", ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳, ׳׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳›"׳› <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¨׳‘ ׳”׳׳¨׳•׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳–] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳•׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘. ׳•׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳ ׳–׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳§׳“׳•׳© ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳׳• [׳"׳¨]. ׳•׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳•׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳.</small></small>.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳’׳•׳׳” <b>׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳—׳×׳• ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳ ׳₪׳’׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳›׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳§׳— ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳’׳•׳׳” ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳ ׳₪׳’׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳.
<h3> ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳•</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳¦׳™ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳–׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ [׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳- 50% ׳׳™׳ ! <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳–׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳•׳‘׳ ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳, ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳›"׳› ׳₪׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳“'.</small></small>] ׳•׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¨׳’׳© ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳”, ׳׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳— ׳׳™׳׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳×׳׳¦׳™׳× ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ [׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳™׳“׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳¥]. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳ ׳₪׳’׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳׳•׳×׳§ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳›׳×׳• <b>"׳©׳”׳›׳"</b> ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳“' ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳–׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳•׳‘׳ ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳, ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳›"׳› ׳₪׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳˜׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳•׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳.
׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳”׳׳×׳׳¨׳— ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳• ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳• ׳›׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” - ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳©׳”׳ "׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳ ׳˜ ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¨׳’׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¥ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳•, ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳•׳—׳•׳׳¨׳™ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳˜׳ <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳¢׳“ 20% ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳˜׳™׳₪׳•׳× (׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳¨׳™׳–"׳).</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳›׳™׳¦׳“ ׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳׳‘׳“׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¥ 100% ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳™].
׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳•׳’׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ [׳׳• ׳׳™׳¥ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳] ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳¢׳•׳˜, ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳’׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¥ [׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳—׳“] ׳׳• ׳׳ <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳. ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨"׳› ׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳‘׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳׳—׳¦׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳’׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¥.</small></small>.
׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳•׳₪׳’׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳₪׳”"׳’, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳— ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳— ׳©׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳”׳©׳’׳—׳× ׳”׳‘׳“"׳¥ ׳©׳ ׳”׳¢׳“׳” ׳”׳—׳¨׳“׳™׳× ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳™׳¥. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳₪׳” ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>.
׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳‘׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© <b>"׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ 100% ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳™"</b> ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳—׳׳˜ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ [׳׳ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ "׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳™" ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳—׳”] ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ "׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳™" ׳׳§׳•׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳–׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳. ׳•׳›׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ "׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ 100% ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳™" ׳׳§׳•׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳× ׳™׳© ׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳- 100% ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳. ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳× ׳׳¢׳× ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳¦׳™ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™.</small></small>.
׳¢׳•׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳׳׳• ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳‘׳₪׳”"׳’ ׳×׳©׳׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳”, ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳©׳ <b>׳™׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳“</b>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳׳—׳•׳–׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳” <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳ "׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳¦׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳׳™׳¦׳™ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳×׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳™ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳§׳¨׳ "׳‘׳™׳¡׳•׳׳₪׳™׳˜", ׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳ ׳¢ ׳׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳§׳¨׳¨. ׳’׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳×׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳©׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳˜, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳׳•׳¢׳“׳•׳× ׳”׳›׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳§׳׳§׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳§׳¨׳¨ [׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳—׳‘׳¨׳” ׳•׳—׳‘׳¨׳”, ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳¡׳•׳׳₪׳™׳˜ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳—׳•׳§ (׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳™׳× ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§)]. ׳•׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳×׳¡׳•׳¡ ׳•׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳™׳™׳, ׳©׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳©׳׳—, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳¡׳•׳ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳¡׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳’׳' ׳‘"׳‘ ׳¦׳–: ׳׳™ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳¡׳¡ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳›׳¨ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳©׳›׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳׳’׳™׳×׳• ׳©׳›׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© [׳©׳ ׳¦׳–.] ׳“׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳©׳›׳¨ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳˜]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳§׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳• ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳׳™׳ [׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳§׳‘׳•׳§ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©] ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳™׳×׳¡׳•׳¡ ׳•׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳™׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳¡׳•׳׳₪׳™׳˜ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©.
׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳, ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳™׳¦׳™ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳×׳”׳׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳¡׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳׳• ׳•׳”׳›׳ ׳×׳•, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳•׳•׳§ ׳׳¡׳ ׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳•׳׳—׳¨ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¥. ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳‘] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳’׳₪׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳§׳׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳›׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳’׳™׳׳×׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳’׳₪׳¨׳™׳× [׳׳׳ ׳©׳§׳©׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳™׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳™׳× ׳‘׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳׳–׳”].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳“</b>. ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳₪׳×.
׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳×. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳‘, ׳˜' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳•, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳—.</small></small>.
׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳§׳¨ ׳•׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳©׳×׳™׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳©׳™ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”. ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳©׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳˜׳•׳¨ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳‘, ׳˜' ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳˜, ׳‘'], ׳•׳‘׳׳׳™׳” ׳¨׳‘׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳˜׳•׳¨.  ׳•׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜] ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳§׳¨ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳¦׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳׳”׳"׳¨ ׳”׳ "׳ [׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳•], ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳›׳”׳׳’"׳. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳§׳•׳‘׳¥ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳–. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳• ׳©׳׳¦׳ ׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳–׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳×׳™׳™׳×׳•, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳–׳›׳•׳× ׳–׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small> [׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳•׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”], ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳׳”׳• ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳’' ׳×׳ ׳׳™׳: [׳. ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨]. ׳‘. ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳—׳©׳•׳‘. ׳’. ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×׳• ׳›׳׳©׳§׳”. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×׳• ׳׳׳©׳§׳” <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳×.</small></small>.
׳׳©׳§׳” ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳ "׳§׳•׳׳”" ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳”] ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳• ׳׳• ׳׳™׳, ׳’׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳›׳×׳• ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳”.
׳׳™׳¥ ׳×׳₪׳•׳–׳™׳ ׳˜׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳—׳׳¨ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳§׳•׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳׳¦׳™׳•׳× ׳˜׳¢׳, ׳•׳׳™׳¥ ׳×׳₪׳•׳–׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳©׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳©׳§׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳ ׳×׳₪׳•׳–׳™׳- ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳× ׳׳׳™׳¥ ׳×׳₪׳•׳–׳™׳. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳–. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳ ׳—- ׳©׳ ׳˜.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳×׳™ ׳™׳™׳ ׳₪׳•׳˜׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳™׳™׳ ׳₪׳•׳˜׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳§׳׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳“, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’. ׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳₪׳•׳˜׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳›"׳› ׳§׳‘׳™׳¢׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©.
׳”׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳׳¢׳˜ [׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳’׳׳™׳•] ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳©׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳×׳” ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳’׳׳™׳• ׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳‘׳§׳© ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳×׳” ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳’׳׳™׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳˜ [׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳×׳¢"׳‘] ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳₪׳•׳˜׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳˜׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳•] ׳™׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳×׳™׳” ׳©׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳ <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ <sup>׳¢׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳‘, ׳™'. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳“, ׳•'.</small></small> ׳©׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳׳–׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳˜׳¨׳× ׳׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ <sup>׳¢׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳“, ׳•' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳—, ׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳‘׳.</small></small> ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳₪</sup><small><small>׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳₪׳•׳˜׳¨ ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳׳–׳•׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳—, ׳™"׳–.</small></small> [׳׳• ׳©׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”].
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¡׳•׳¢׳“ ׳”׳׳‘ ׳›׳׳• ׳׳—׳ <sup>׳₪׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳• ׳©׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳˜׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳ ׳•׳¡׳•׳¢׳“ ׳”׳׳‘ ׳›׳׳• ׳׳—׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳”׳×׳׳‘׳•׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳”"׳” ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳“] ׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¢׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳•׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳¦׳” ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ <b>׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©</b> ׳©׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” <sup>׳₪׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳™׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™, ׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳™׳™׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳ ׳₪׳˜׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳‘׳₪׳”"׳’ ׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳׳™׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳׳– ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳₪׳•׳˜׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳©׳×׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” (׳•׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳©׳×׳” ׳׳§׳•׳“׳ <sup>׳₪׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳•׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳©׳×׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳– ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳’׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳–, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳˜׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳’׳ ׳™׳—׳•׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳©׳׳™"׳¦ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©.</small></small>).
<h3> ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳—׳‘׳™׳¨׳• ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳§׳“׳© ׳™׳¦׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳”׳©׳•׳׳¢ [׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳© ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳”] ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳‘׳“׳•, ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳©׳”׳©׳•׳׳¢ ׳™׳§׳“׳© ׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳”׳׳§׳“׳© <sup>׳₪׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳›.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳©׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳¢׳׳” ׳§׳™׳“׳© ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳×׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳‘׳“, ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳‘׳“׳•.
׳•׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <b>׳”׳™׳•׳</b> ׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳‘׳“׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳₪׳”"׳’ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳₪׳”</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳§׳¦׳× ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳’׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳”׳‘׳§׳™ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳§׳“׳© ׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳׳¢ ׳’׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©.</small></small>, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳₪׳”"׳’ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• [׳•׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳©׳•׳‘] ׳׳– ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳™׳§׳“׳©׳• ׳׳‘׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢׳™׳.
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> '׳•׳§׳¨׳׳× ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’' <sup>׳₪׳•</sup><small><small>׳™׳©׳¢׳™׳” ׳ ׳—, ׳™׳’.</small></small> - ׳“׳¨׳©׳• ׳—׳–"׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳“ ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳₪׳–</sup><small><small>׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳’"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳] ׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳˜ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳] ׳”׳׳ ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳¢׳§׳¨׳• ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳• ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”, ׳•׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳“׳•׳© ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳§׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳¦"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳©׳AMP.
JJ ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳— ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳”׳§׳©׳” ׳“׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳׳”׳×׳¢׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳›׳׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳§׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳–׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳™׳×׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳.
׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳׳™ ׳§׳•׳“׳© [׳¨"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨"׳” ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳©׳׳–׳™׳ ׳’׳¨ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳¢׳ ׳׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳‘׳¨׳™] ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳×׳§׳•׳¢ ׳׳– ׳‘׳©׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳ ׳” ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳§׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳¦"׳₪ ׳₪׳¨׳׳ ׳§ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳×׳§׳™׳¢׳×׳• ׳“׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳×׳§׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳¨"׳” ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™ ׳©׳×׳•׳§׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳”׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳“׳•"׳— ׳׳¢׳¨׳›׳” ׳—' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳×׳§׳•׳¢ ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳× [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳”׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳–].
׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳‘׳’׳' ׳‘׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳ . ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨' ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳¦׳“׳§׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳ ׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳, ׳•׳׳×׳• ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳׳•׳©׳ ׳•׳”׳×׳§׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳׳‘׳–׳‘׳– ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳–׳‘׳– ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳׳©, ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳׳• ׳©׳ "׳׳ ׳×׳§׳₪׳•׳¥ ׳׳× ׳™׳“׳" ׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“׳§׳”, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳‘׳–׳‘׳– ׳›׳ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳• ׳"׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢׳• ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳׳© ׳׳¦׳“׳§׳” ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳׳©, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳×׳§׳₪׳•׳¥ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳ "׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳×׳₪׳×׳—" ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳›׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳•.</small></small>.
׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳”׳׳—׳“ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ <b>׳‘׳׳§׳•׳</b> ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳•׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ <b>׳׳™׳“</b> ׳׳—׳¨ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” <sup>׳₪׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳’.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳§׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳”׳׳§׳“׳© <b>׳‘׳₪׳™׳ ׳”</b> ׳׳—׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨, ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳£ ׳׳₪׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳”.
׳”׳׳§׳“׳© <b>׳‘׳—׳“׳¨</b> ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳™, ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳“׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳׳× ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳©], ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳™׳§׳“׳© ׳©׳•׳‘.
׳”׳׳§׳“׳© <b>׳‘׳‘׳™׳×</b> ׳׳—׳“ ׳•׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳™, ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳׳§׳“׳©. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ [׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“ (׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳—׳™׳“) ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳] ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳“׳—׳§ <sup>׳₪׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨, ׳•׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ <sup>׳¦</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳׳§׳“׳© ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”. ׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳”, ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳¨] ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” <sup>׳¦׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳•׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳© ׳•׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳–׳” ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳© ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳’׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳©׳• ׳‘׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” <sup>׳¦׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳•׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳’ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.  [׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳×׳׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳• ׳§׳™׳“׳©׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳—"׳— ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳“׳¢׳× ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳•׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳“׳¢׳×, ׳•׳₪׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳©׳•׳›׳—׳™׳ (׳׳•׳׳™ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳©׳•׳›׳—׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳“׳׳›׳׳•' ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳™"׳¦ ׳׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳× ׳‘׳׳—׳©׳‘׳×׳•, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳©׳• ׳‘׳• ׳•׳—׳•׳–׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—"׳›)].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘.</b> ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳× [׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳׳•׳§׳£ ׳×׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳×], ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳§׳“׳© ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳¦׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳—"׳‘ ׳₪׳ "׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳›"׳–] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨].</small></small>.
׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳×, ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳“׳¨, ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳× <sup>׳¦׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳§׳•׳, ׳•׳׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳§׳•׳. ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ ׳©׳. </small></small>.
׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳¨׳—׳•׳‘ ׳׳• ׳“׳¨׳ ׳—׳¦׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳× <sup>׳¦׳”</sup><small><small>[׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳–] ׳©׳‘׳•"׳™ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳¨׳₪׳¡׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳“׳¨, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳¨׳₪׳¡׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳× <sup>׳¦׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳¨׳₪׳¡׳×, ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳¨׳₪׳¡׳× ׳˜׳₪׳׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳”. ׳©׳‘׳•"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳•׳•׳–׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳•'. ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳¨׳₪׳¡׳× ׳•׳—׳–׳¨׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳© ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳™׳¦׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳—׳“׳¨, ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳¢].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ <b>׳׳™׳“</b> ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳–׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” <sup>׳¦׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘. ׳•׳‘׳›׳׳•׳× ׳–׳׳ ׳”׳©׳”׳™׳”, ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”, ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™׳. ׳‘׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨ ׳™׳¢׳‘׳¥ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳ ׳›"׳‘ ׳׳׳” [׳›׳—׳׳© ׳¢׳©׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳×- ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“], ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳” ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳™ ׳”׳©׳¨׳× ׳•׳¨׳’׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳›׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳•׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳£ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳›׳“׳•', ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢"׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳× ׳•׳¨׳“׳™׳ [׳׳•"׳— ׳›׳׳ ׳’' ׳¡׳™' ׳›'] ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳§"׳© ׳©׳¢׳“ ׳©׳×׳›׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳™׳§׳“׳©, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳– ׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳™׳§׳“׳©.</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳©׳”׳”, ׳׳–׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳×׳”׳” ׳׳—"׳› ׳׳—׳׳× ׳׳•׳ ׳¡ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳¦׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳”׳” ׳–׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳˜, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳”׳” ׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳£ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳§׳“׳© [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳•], ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>]. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳§׳“׳© [׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳”׳™׳™׳×׳• !], ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳§׳“׳© <sup>׳¦׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“.</small></small>.
<b>׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”</b> - ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” <b>׳׳™׳“</b> ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳•׳׳– ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳×׳”׳” ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳×, ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳™׳“. ׳•׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳”׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳. [׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳”׳•׳× ׳–׳׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳”׳©׳×׳”׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“].
׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳©׳×׳”׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳©׳×׳”׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳׳– ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳¡ ׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳™׳§׳“׳©, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ <sup>׳§</sup><small><small>׳¡׳§׳™"׳’.</small></small> ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳›"׳›, ׳•׳¦"׳¢ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”.
[׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳×׳™׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳§׳”׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳׳×׳§׳™׳ [׳”׳ ׳§׳¨׳ "׳’'׳¢׳׳”"] ׳–׳׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳§׳</sup><small><small>׳•׳×׳׳”׳• ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳ ׳¡, ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳›׳׳׳ [׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™' ׳¢׳¥ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳”׳¨׳™"׳¥] ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳× ׳•׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳׳›׳׳•' ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳× ׳•׳¨׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳‘׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“, ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳’׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳¨׳"׳¢ ׳׳₪׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” [׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳] ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳©, ׳׳‘׳ ׳’׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳“׳”׳¨׳"׳¢ ׳׳₪׳׳ ׳• ׳“׳™׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”.
׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳’] ׳©׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳׳–׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳₪׳•׳˜׳¨׳× ׳’׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳”׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳׳¢׳™׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳”"׳” ׳”׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳×׳™׳§׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳¢׳™׳• ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳"׳› ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳©׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳₪׳× ׳¢"׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳¢׳™׳• ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳©׳”׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳×׳™׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳”׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”.</small></small>.]
<h3> ׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× "׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”" [- ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”]</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳₪׳× ׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳₪׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳§׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳×, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳‘׳§׳¦׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳©׳¢"׳× ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳˜. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳– ׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳• ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳. </small></small>] ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” [׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳₪׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳×].
׳”׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© [׳‘׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳©׳×׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©], ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳—׳§ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”.
׳׳ ׳©׳×׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¢׳¦׳׳•, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳—׳§ [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳™׳™׳] ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳”.
׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳“׳’׳™׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© [׳•׳׳ ׳—׳׳© ׳׳™׳‘׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳© ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ <b>׳‘׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳×</b> ׳•׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳—׳©׳‘ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”] <sup>׳§׳’</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳˜, ׳‘' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳₪׳× ׳׳• ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳₪׳× ׳׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳© ׳"׳’׳׳•׳˜׳"], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳• ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” <sup>׳§׳“</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳“׳© <sup>׳§׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¨׳›"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳©׳¢"׳× ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳₪׳¨"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¢"׳— ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳׳•׳× ׳›׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳׳•׳× ׳” ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳¡ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳–׳׳× ׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳§׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳”׳—׳׳•׳× ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳₪׳” ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳” [׳•׳’׳ ׳׳׳׳˜׳”] ׳•׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳’׳׳•׳×׳ <sup>׳§׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳© ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳•׳×: ׳. ׳©׳™ײµ׳™׳¨ײ¸׳׳” ׳©׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳‘. ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳₪׳× ׳‘׳•׳©׳×׳• ׳©׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳•. ׳’. ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳” ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳׳׳׳˜׳”, ׳•׳©׳ ׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× [׳¢"׳₪ ׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳, ׳˜' ׳•׳"׳¨ ׳©׳].  ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳”׳₪׳× ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳” ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳™ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳•׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳’ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. </small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳”׳—׳׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳•' ׳¡׳™"׳’, ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳' ׳§׳—].</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳—׳–׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳×׳—׳× ׳׳׳₪׳” <sup>׳§׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳–, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳₪׳× ׳‘׳¢׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳‘׳¢׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳¦׳™׳¦׳”, ׳•׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳–׳” ׳”׳"׳¨ ׳•׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳, ׳˜'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳—׳ ׳§׳₪׳•׳ ׳•׳׳—׳ ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳§׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳–.</b> ׳׳—׳ ׳§׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳©׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” <sup>׳§׳™</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳™׳¦׳—׳§ [׳—"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘] ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳¢] ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳ [׳₪׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳], ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳¢׳–׳¨ [׳—׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳']. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” <sup>׳§׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳], ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳, [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳©׳“׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳× ׳›׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳₪׳× ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳× ׳¢׳›׳•"׳, ׳•׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳₪׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳×], ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¦׳•׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳©׳™׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳ ׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ <sup>׳§׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳ "׳” ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳˜].</small></small>, ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳ ׳§׳₪׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳–׳™׳§].
<h3> ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳§׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳—.</b> ׳׳—׳ ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— [׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ <sup>׳§׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳§׳©׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¢"׳’ ׳§׳©׳¨. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳” [׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“, ׳—' ׳“"׳” ׳—׳•׳×׳׳•׳×, ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘, ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳•'. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳›], ׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳¢׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳™׳׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳”׳•.</small></small>] ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳× <sup>׳§׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳× ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳©׳”׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳—׳ ׳©׳‘׳©׳§׳™׳×.
<h3> ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳˜.</b> ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳ ׳׳—׳“, ׳™׳©׳׳ ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳›׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳™׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳• <sup>׳§׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳™׳¢׳–׳¨ ׳—׳™"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’ ׳•׳—׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳–. ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳•׳“׳¨ ׳›׳, ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳‘׳§׳© ׳׳”׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳‘׳§׳© ׳׳”׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳©׳” ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳—׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” [׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¢׳] <sup>׳§׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳ "׳” ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳’ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¦׳•׳¢ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’׳–׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¦׳•׳¢, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¦׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¢׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘׳—׳¦׳™ ׳׳—׳</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳׳—׳ ׳™׳§׳— ׳”׳׳—׳ ׳”׳©׳׳ ׳•׳™׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳׳׳™׳• ׳”׳—׳¦׳™ ׳׳—׳ <sup>׳§׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳—׳•׳×.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳×׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳™׳‘׳¦׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” <sup>׳§׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳”.
׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳׳¨׳•׳™׳— ׳׳¢׳׳× "׳©׳׳" ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¨׳•׳™׳— ׳׳¢׳׳× ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳”, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳ ׳©׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳—׳×׳›׳ ׳•, ׳©׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳›"׳› ׳›׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳×. [׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳×׳›׳ ׳• ׳׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳§׳© ׳©׳™׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”].
JJ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› [׳₪׳ "׳” ׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳–] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳”, ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳›׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳”. ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳• ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳©׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳×׳™ ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳•׳× ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳—׳×׳›׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>AMP.
׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳—׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳¦׳׳™ ׳׳—׳, ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳¡׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳‘׳¨׳•׳”׳• ׳›׳ <sup>׳§׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳—, ׳‘'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳¦׳” ׳׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳— ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳₪ ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳§׳— ׳׳¦׳” ׳׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳¨׳₪׳” ׳׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” <sup>׳§׳›</sup><small><small>׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳“ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳₪׳× ׳׳—׳¨, ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳§׳— ׳׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• [׳•׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳₪ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳”], ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳§׳— ׳׳•׳×׳•. [׳׳‘׳ ׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳—׳, ׳׳׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳ ׳›׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳•]. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—׳™"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳’.
׳¢׳•׳“ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳™, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳™׳“: ׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ [׳•׳™"׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳”׳™׳•׳] ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳׳•׳×׳• ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳₪ ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳‘׳¦׳™׳¢׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳—׳</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™׳¨׳©׳•׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳—׳ <sup>׳§׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳‘׳¦׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳×׳™ ׳›׳™׳›׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳™׳, ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳ [׳•׳׳£ ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳•׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×׳• !], ׳׳™׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳‘׳¨׳›׳×׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳׳“׳• ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳×׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳›׳• ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§ <sup>׳§׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳–, ׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳©׳™׳© ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳›׳• ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”.</small></small>.
׳”׳‘׳•׳¦׳¢ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” "׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳•׳×׳™" ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳›׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ "׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳›׳”׳", ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳׳• ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳¦׳¢ ׳׳– ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¨׳§ "׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳•׳×׳™" ׳•׳׳ "׳‘׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳›׳”׳" <sup>׳§׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳” ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳‘.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¦׳¢ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳×׳›׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳׳׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳׳׳‘׳¦׳•׳¢ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳“׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳ ׳˜׳•׳¢׳” <sup>׳§׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳– ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳”.</small></small>.
׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳‘׳¦׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳׳” ׳”׳×׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳™׳§׳¨׳™׳‘ ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳׳׳™׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳, ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳§׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳” ׳׳׳˜׳” ׳•׳™׳‘׳¦׳¢ ׳¢׳׳™׳”, ׳•׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳™׳•׳׳• ׳™׳‘׳¦׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳׳” ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳•׳ ׳”. [׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳•׳¦׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳׳•׳×] <sup>׳§׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳“, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small>.
׳”׳‘׳•׳¦׳¢ ׳™׳‘׳¦׳¢ ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳•׳“ <b>׳•׳׳׳ ׳”</b> [׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳—׳׳”] ׳™׳—׳׳§ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳™׳ <sup>׳§׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳× "׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳" ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡׳” <sup>׳§׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳–, ׳™"׳—.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳•׳¨׳§׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳•׳“ <sup>׳§׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¢"׳, ׳'.</small></small>.
׳”׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳•׳”׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¡׳™׳§׳• ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳‘׳׳¢׳• ׳׳× ׳—׳×׳™׳›׳× "׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳" ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳›׳׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳™׳‘׳¨׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳–׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳. ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳׳×׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳׳›׳׳• ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳—׳ <sup>׳§׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳’.</b> ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳¢׳ ׳’ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳’׳“׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳¨׳™׳— <sup>׳§׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳¦, ׳'. ׳•׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳›' ׳©׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳§' ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳–' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'.</small></small> ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ <sup>׳§׳׳</sup><small><small>׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳¦, ׳'.</small></small> [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¦׳”׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳].
׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳¨׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <b>׳׳”׳×׳¢׳ ׳•׳×</b> ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨ [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳×׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳] <sup>׳§׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳©׳׳—׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳›"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳¢׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳©׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳“׳™׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳” ׳•׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳”, ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳¢׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳׳“.</b> ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳₪׳™ ׳¢׳™׳¡׳” ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳” ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳׳׳׳˜׳”, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ <sup>׳§׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳‘ [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳¨׳“ ׳׳ ׳›׳׳- ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”].</small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳• <sup>׳§׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳•, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳›׳•׳¡׳” ׳‘׳׳₪׳” ׳׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳׳׳׳˜׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳£ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”</h3>
<b>׳׳”.</b> ׳”׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳¡׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳• ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳£ ׳׳׳© ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳ ׳˜"׳™, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳›׳•׳¡׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳׳™ ׳¨׳’׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳˜"׳™ <sup>׳§׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’.</small></small>.
RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳— - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳©׳׳•"׳× ׳•׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×</h2>
<h3> ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳©׳” ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳‘׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘"׳§ ׳₪׳‘. ׳•׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳™"׳‘ ׳׳”׳' ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳”"׳, ׳©׳ ׳׳׳¨ [׳©׳׳•׳× ׳˜׳•, ׳›׳‘] ׳•׳™׳׳›׳• ׳©׳׳©׳× ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳׳׳• ׳•׳”׳×׳¢׳™׳™׳₪׳•.</small></small>, ׳¢׳׳“׳• ׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘' ׳”' ׳•׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳¢׳–׳¨׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳§׳ ׳” ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳‘׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳’׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳•׳¢׳©׳¨׳” ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§׳™׳ <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳™׳׳” ׳›׳., ׳•׳¡׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳׳” ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳—׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳™׳¨׳“ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¨׳” (׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳‘"׳§ ׳©׳).</small></small>.
׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳™׳’., ׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳‘. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳₪"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳‘. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳ ׳•׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳—' ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳™ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳”].</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳׳›׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳™׳© ׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳™׳’., ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳‘"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳₪"׳” [׳•׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳×׳׳׳ ׳–׳§׳ ׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ "׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳©׳¡׳₪׳™׳§׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳•׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳¡ ׳•׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳” [׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳¨"׳” ׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳›, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳©׳¨׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”. [׳•׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳›׳׳•' ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳¦׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¡"׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳—׳¨, ׳“׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳¡"׳× ׳’׳ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳§׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳©׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳• ׳§׳¨׳”"׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳’ ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳₪׳—׳•׳×]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳§׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳§׳¨׳”"׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳¡' ׳§׳"׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳׳• ׳׳•׳¦׳™׳׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳™׳—׳™׳“. [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳—. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳˜ ׳¡׳™"׳“ ׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳], ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳׳™׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳–, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳”׳' ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳₪׳™"׳‘], ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳•׳‘, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳©׳•׳׳¢ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳• ׳“"׳” ׳•׳™׳©. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳—׳™׳“, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳•׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ [׳•׳¢' ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳].</small></small> !.
׳•׳׳›׳, ׳‘׳ ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳¨׳¥ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳׳׳¨׳¥ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳•׳× ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳₪׳¨׳©׳”, ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳” ׳©׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳•׳˜׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳•׳™׳—׳™׳“, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳“׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳—׳•"׳ ׳•׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳”׳—׳¡׳™׳¨ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳ "׳.  [׳•׳“׳¢, ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳—׳•"׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳ ׳™].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳₪׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳• <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳¨׳™׳–"׳ ׳©׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳•׳¡׳£. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳¨׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳׳§׳₪׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳¨"׳™ ׳–"׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳™׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳¡"׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳’׳• <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“] ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳–] ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡"׳× ׳”׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳¨"׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ [׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨].
׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳›׳׳” ׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳•׳׳¢ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳¡"׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”, ׳. ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳¢ ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”. ׳‘. ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳¨׳™׳”"׳× ׳׳£ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡"׳× ׳₪׳¡׳•׳. [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳’', ׳•׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳' ׳׳— ׳•׳¢׳' ׳¢׳‘, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳׳].</small></small>.
