׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳ ׳©׳׳¢ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× "׳–׳›׳•׳¨" ׳‘׳¡"׳× ׳‘׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳¡ ׳׳׳¨"׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳©׳•׳‘ <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳©׳•׳‘, ׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳–׳¨ ׳•׳©׳׳¢ ׳’׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳™' ׳§׳¨׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳₪׳¡׳•׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳™' ׳׳”׳' ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳”"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳›׳¡"׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡"׳× ׳₪׳¡׳•׳ ׳‘׳¨׳‘׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳‘"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳˜ ׳©׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳£ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳₪׳”, ׳•׳"׳ ׳‘׳ ׳•"׳› ׳׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳׳©"׳›, ׳’׳ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳₪׳™' ׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.  ׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳’ ׳‘׳׳©׳‘"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳§׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳˜׳¢׳•׳×, ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳§׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳©׳׳– ׳”׳•׳™ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳¡׳₪׳™׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳›׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳¢׳™"׳©.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳§׳₪׳“׳” ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳›׳”׳׳›׳×׳”</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳”, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳§׳¨׳”"׳× ׳‘׳”׳‘׳¨׳” ׳©׳•׳ ׳” <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳”' ׳•׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳” [׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳”׳§׳•׳¨׳], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳– ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¡׳§ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳‘׳¨׳” ׳©׳•׳ ׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳׳™ ׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳”׳' ׳׳¨׳‘׳¢ ׳₪׳¨׳©׳™׳•׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳‘' ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳.  ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳— ׳•׳‘׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳– ׳•׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳•׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳•׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳ ׳•׳¡׳—׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳•׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳•׳¡׳— ׳׳ ׳•׳¡׳—.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳׳¨׳¢ [׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳”׳“׳’׳™׳© ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ (׳‘׳—׳•׳׳©׳™׳, ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳”)] ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳§׳¨׳”"׳× ׳׳‘׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳”׳“׳’׳©׳× ׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳] <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳‘"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳”׳¨"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¥ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳’ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳•׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳׳¨׳¢ ׳©׳–׳” ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳׳™׳×׳™, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳’"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳” ׳•׳”׳‘׳׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•"׳‘.</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳‘׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳§׳™ ׳‘׳׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳¨׳¢ ׳•׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳₪׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳׳”. ׳•׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳•׳™׳’׳© [׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳™׳× ׳׳, ׳›׳•-׳›׳–] ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳₪׳© ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳¢׳§׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳” ׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳©׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳©, ׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳₪׳© ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳¢׳§׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳” ׳׳¦׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳©׳‘׳¢׳™׳. ׳•׳™׳×׳׳” ׳”׳©׳•׳׳¢, ׳›׳׳” ׳‘׳׳•, ׳©׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳© ׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳¢׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳”׳”׳‘׳“׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳’׳©׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳, ׳›׳©׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳” ׳‘׳׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳›׳©׳”׳”׳“׳’׳©׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘'] ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳‘׳׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳–׳” ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳׳× ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳‘׳ ׳™׳• ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳‘׳¢׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳©׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳” ׳‘׳׳׳¨׳¢ [׳›׳©׳”׳”׳“׳’׳©׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳'] ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳‘׳׳” ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳׳× ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳‘׳ ׳™׳• ׳©׳‘׳׳• ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳© [׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳₪׳™׳¨׳© ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳], ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳§׳™ ׳‘׳׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳¨׳¢ ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳‘׳©. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳•׳™׳©׳׳— [׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳™׳× ׳׳“, ׳›׳˜] "׳•׳׳× ׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳‘׳• ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳–׳•" ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ <b>׳©׳‘׳™׳”</b> ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳׳׳¨׳¢ [׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳], ׳•׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳©׳‘׳•] ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ <b>׳—׳–׳¨׳”</b>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳§׳”"׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳— ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳¢ ׳©׳׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳™"׳– ׳•׳›׳׳• "׳•׳™׳§׳¥ ׳™׳¢׳§׳‘ ׳׳©׳ ׳×׳•" ׳›׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳ ׳×׳• - ׳׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳¢, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳—. ׳•׳›׳ "׳׳©׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳˜׳”׳•׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳׳”" [׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳’, ׳™׳].
׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳© ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳›׳׳• [׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳™׳× ׳׳˜, ׳˜] "׳׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳׳™׳×" ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳ "׳׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳‘׳ ׳™, ׳¢׳׳™׳×" ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳’׳ "׳׳˜׳¨׳£, ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳׳™׳×" ׳”׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳›׳ "׳”׳›׳ ׳£, ׳₪׳×׳™׳ ׳×׳›׳׳×" [׳‘׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳˜׳•, ׳׳•] ׳•׳׳ "׳”׳›׳ ׳£ ׳₪׳×׳™׳ ׳×׳›׳׳×" ׳©׳×׳™׳‘׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳£ ׳׳×׳™׳™׳—׳¡׳× ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ - ׳•׳ ׳×׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳£, ׳₪׳×׳™׳ ׳×׳›׳׳× <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳˜׳™ ׳”׳¦׳™׳¦׳™׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳£ ׳”׳‘׳’׳“ - ׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳₪׳×׳™׳ ׳×׳›׳׳×.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ "׳׳¦׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳, ׳¢׳ ׳׳‘׳‘׳", [׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳•, ׳•] ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳׳×׳™׳™׳—׳¡ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳׳‘׳‘׳ ׳—"׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” "׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳—׳” ׳¨׳‘׳”, ׳•׳׳׳¨׳• ׳›׳•׳׳", "׳•׳”׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳™׳, ׳׳׳׳•׳§׳™׳›׳", "׳׳¦׳׳™׳—, ׳§׳¨׳ ׳™׳©׳•׳¢׳”" ׳•׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× "׳׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳ ׳• ׳׳", ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳¨ ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳₪׳™׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳•, ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳–׳”׳™׳¨׳• ׳—׳–"׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨"׳© ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳–׳”׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ! <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳§׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳, ׳”, ׳¢, ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳•׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳“ ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳•׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳×, ׳•׳›׳’׳•׳ "׳׳¢׳‘׳¨׳” ׳ ׳" ׳‘׳₪' ׳•׳׳×׳—׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳‘ ׳©׳”׳¢' ׳׳ ׳•׳§׳“׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳•׳ (׳ ׳—) ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳’׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ "׳•׳™׳¢׳ ׳ ׳•׳™׳¨׳¢׳™׳‘׳" ׳‘׳₪' ׳¢׳§׳‘ ׳©׳”׳™' ׳׳ ׳•׳§׳“׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳—, [׳©׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳׳” !] ׳•׳›׳ "׳•׳”׳™׳” ׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳§׳¨" ׳‘׳₪' ׳›׳™ ׳×׳©׳ [׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳×׳¢׳ ׳™׳× ׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨] ׳”׳”' ׳׳ ׳•׳§׳“׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳’׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳•׳§׳™ ׳“׳–׳׳¨׳” "׳™׳¢׳׳–׳• ׳—׳¡׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳•׳“" ׳”׳¢' ׳׳ ׳•׳§׳“׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳—, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳ ׳“׳¡׳™׳“׳¨׳ "׳™׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳™׳׳“׳™׳¨" ׳”׳' ׳‘׳©׳•׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳— [׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳— ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳¢], ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳׳”, ׳"׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳‘׳© ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳”</b>. ׳§׳¨׳ ׳•׳˜׳¢׳”, ׳׳ ׳˜׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ <b>׳©׳׳©׳×׳ ׳”</b> ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳׳” [׳¨׳׳” ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'] ׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳•׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳“. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳₪׳™"׳‘ ׳©׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳’׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳ ׳’׳™׳ ׳”.</small></small>, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳’׳׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”"׳¢׳׳™׳”" [׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳” ׳™׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳˜׳¢׳” <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳‘, ׳' ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳™׳.</small></small>]. ׳•׳׳ ׳˜׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ <b>׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳”</b> ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳• ׳—׳™׳¡׳¨ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳˜׳¢׳” ׳‘׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳“ ׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳˜׳•׳¢׳” ׳׳¢׳×׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳’׳•׳¢׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳• <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳•׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳‘. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘"׳— ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳•. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳•׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳׳ ׳›׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳–] ׳“׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳“ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳ ׳’׳™׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳, ׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳“׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™"׳¦ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳›׳™ ׳×׳¦׳</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳›׳©׳§׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳›׳™ ׳×׳¦׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨׳× ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳©׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳¨׳׳• "׳–׳›׳•׳¨" ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳₪' ׳–׳›׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳•׳׳¢׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳× ׳”׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳׳•"׳— ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳— ׳•׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳×"׳¡.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳×׳•׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨׳” [׳•׳׳ ׳©׳×׳™ ׳”׳“׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳•׳× ׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳] ׳•׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳–׳¨׳™׳–׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳׳” <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳, ׳–' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>, ׳™׳₪׳×׳— ׳”׳¡"׳× ׳•׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳•, ׳™׳¢׳¦׳•׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳¢׳•׳“ ׳”׳¡"׳× ׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳™׳‘׳¨׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¡"׳× ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳˜, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳¨׳•׳׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳™׳׳—׳– ׳‘׳¡"׳× ׳•׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳ <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳, ׳‘'.</small></small> ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳™׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳”׳¡"׳× ׳•׳™׳‘׳¨׳. ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳ ׳©׳§ ׳”׳¡"׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳” <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳—׳¨ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳׳© ׳”"׳¢׳׳™׳”" ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳” <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳’, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳§׳•׳. ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳“׳׳—׳׳× ׳–׳” ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•"׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳₪׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳׳•׳”׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳× ׳׳×׳•׳¨׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳©׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳›׳” [׳׳• ׳‘׳¦׳“ ׳©׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳•׳×] ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳§׳•׳׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳”׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳• ׳™׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳×׳• <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳•, ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳©׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳›׳”׳•׳’׳, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳׳×׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳™ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳”׳’׳‘׳”׳”</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳”׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳•, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳™׳©׳‘ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳“׳” ׳‘׳¢׳©׳¨׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳•׳×, ׳¢׳™' ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳”] ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“, ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳›׳‘׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳”] ׳™׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳–׳•, ׳׳ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳‘ ׳›׳©׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳“.</small></small> [׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳— ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳—׳–׳¨׳× ׳”׳©"׳¥ ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ - ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳™׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳—׳–׳¨׳× ׳”׳©"׳¥ ׳•׳™׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳”׳׳›׳” ׳”׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳©׳×, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳׳–׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳©׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳’׳‘׳”׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳§׳“׳•׳ [׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳₪׳׳׳’'׳™], ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳“, ׳‘'] ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳›׳¨׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳’׳‘׳”׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳©׳”׳›׳×׳‘ ׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• [׳•׳׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳¦׳“ ׳”׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™ ׳›׳©׳”׳¡"׳× ׳›׳ ׳’׳“׳•], ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳”׳. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳”׳’׳‘׳”׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳•׳”׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳©׳”׳©׳×׳¨׳©.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳™׳“׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” - ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳™׳©׳‘. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳™׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳₪׳™׳•׳˜׳™׳ [׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“] ׳•׳™׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳—׳–׳¨׳× ׳”׳©"׳¥ ׳©׳׳– ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ [׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳“, ׳“'].
׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳‘׳‘ ׳¨׳׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳” ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳•׳§׳¨׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳¢ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳–׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳”] ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳¨׳׳©׳• ׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳× "׳§׳“׳•׳© ׳§׳“׳•׳© ׳§׳“׳•׳©" ׳•׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳”, ׳•׳¢"׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>] ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳×.
׳”׳׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳™׳₪׳×׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳’' ׳¢׳׳•׳“׳™׳ [׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳›׳•׳—׳• ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳¡"׳× ׳›׳], ׳™׳’׳‘׳™׳”, ׳•׳™׳₪׳ ׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳“׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳•׳¦׳₪׳•׳, ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳×׳‘ <b>׳•׳׳›׳¨׳•׳¢</b> ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳”׳›׳×׳‘ ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳©׳”׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳’׳“׳• ׳•׳–׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳©׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳©׳” ׳•׳›׳•' ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳”' ׳×׳׳™׳׳” ׳•׳›׳•' ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳׳• <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳“, ׳‘' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>, [׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳×׳‘], ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳×.
׳”׳’׳•׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳”׳×׳₪׳¨ [׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳•׳“׳™׳] ׳‘׳׳¨׳›׳– ׳”׳’׳׳™׳׳” <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳–, ׳’'.</small></small>.
׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳₪׳˜׳™׳¨ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳₪׳˜׳¨׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳’׳׳¨ ׳’׳׳™׳׳× ׳”׳¡"׳× <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳”׳₪׳˜׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳₪׳˜׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳¡׳™׳™׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳₪׳˜׳™׳¨ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ "׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳׳£ ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳’׳ ׳”׳©׳׳•׳× ׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳“׳•׳©׳” ׳׳©׳"׳› ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳™׳’ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳§׳”׳™׳׳×׳• ׳•׳›׳¢׳× ׳ ׳×׳₪׳©׳˜ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳§׳”׳™׳׳•׳× ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳׳©׳¨׳™ ׳—׳׳§׳" ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“. ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ (׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳׳“) ׳©׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳˜"׳– ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳₪׳•׳¡ ׳™׳“׳ ׳™ ׳•׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳“׳₪׳¡׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳₪׳•׳¡׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳˜׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳“, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳” ׳¢׳©׳• ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳₪׳™׳–׳¨׳• ׳׳׳•׳ ׳¨׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳™׳•׳“ ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳•׳›׳“׳•' ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳§׳ ׳•׳× ׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳›׳”׳׳›׳×׳” ׳“׳”׳©׳×׳ ׳–׳”׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳” ׳׳©"׳› ׳¢׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳”׳₪׳˜׳¨׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳׳© ׳•׳׳×׳•׳ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳ ׳“׳׳₪׳˜׳¨׳×׳.</small></small> [׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳§׳¨׳׳• ׳‘׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳›"׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳©׳‘׳¢׳” ׳§׳¨׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§׳™׳].
׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘. ׳•׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ "׳™׳×׳§"׳§" [׳©׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳“' ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳›׳׳׳•, <b>׳™</b>׳©׳¢׳™׳” <b>׳×</b>׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳©׳¨ <b>׳§</b>׳”׳׳× ׳•<b>׳§</b>׳™׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳”׳₪׳˜׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¨"׳—, ׳”׳₪׳˜׳¨׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳, ׳§׳”׳׳× ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳™׳›׳” ׳‘׳×׳©׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳‘]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳˜׳¨׳× ׳•׳™׳¦׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳§׳™׳ '׳•׳׳›׳׳×׳ ׳׳›׳•׳ ׳•׳©׳‘׳•׳¢... ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳©׳• ׳¢׳׳™ ׳׳¢׳•׳׳' [׳™׳•׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳‘], ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳˜׳•׳‘ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳×׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘] ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳•׳׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳₪׳• ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳•, ׳•׳›׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳ ׳×׳₪׳©׳˜ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳•׳×.</small></small>.
׳‘׳”׳₪׳˜׳¨׳× ׳•׳™׳©׳׳— ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳˜׳™׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳׳™ ׳×׳׳•׳׳™׳ [׳”׳•׳©׳¢ ׳™׳] ׳׳• ׳—׳–׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳” [׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳”], ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳₪׳˜׳™׳¨ ׳—׳–׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳”, ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳‘׳–׳”.
<h3> ׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳–.</small></small>, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¢ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳׳ ׳—׳” <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳¡' ׳”׳׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”.</small></small>.
׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳׳•"׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳—, ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳ (׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¨׳‘). ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳¨׳™ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳” ׳©׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳§׳‘׳׳” ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳•' ׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳¨ ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳–׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳•' ׳׳—׳¨ ׳—׳¦׳•׳×.</small></small>. ׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳™׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳¢׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳›׳‘ ׳׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳–, ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳”. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳–, ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳›׳•׳׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳’'. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳׳–, ׳™"׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳׳—׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳”, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳”׳©׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳“' ׳•׳׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—"׳›, ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳§׳¨׳”"׳× ׳–׳” ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳©׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¢, ׳•׳׳– ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳˜׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳¨׳׳©׳™׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳™׳•׳×.</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳™׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳©׳‘׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳ ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳”, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳©׳‘׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳–, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™׳” ׳‘׳§׳™׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳©׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳”. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳™׳"׳¢ ׳”׳™׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳™׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳“ ׳™׳•׳ ׳’' ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™ ׳•׳׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳×׳׳•׳™׳” ׳‘׳§׳™׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳•׳™׳"׳¢. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳§׳ ׳” ׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳—"׳. ׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ [׳¡׳§׳™"׳—] ׳©׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳•׳–׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳©"׳¨ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳—"׳× ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳”׳•׳©"׳¨ [-׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¡"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳—"׳×].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳©׳׳•"׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•"׳×. ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳—׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳©׳¢"׳× ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳¨"׳™, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳§׳˜׳• ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳›׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳—׳™׳™׳, ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳—׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳¨׳©׳” ׳₪׳¨׳©׳” [׳₪׳×׳•׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳×׳•׳׳”] ׳‘' ׳׳§׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳"׳” [׳›׳₪׳™' ׳”׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•] ׳•׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳ ׳•׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳“׳¢׳‘׳™׳“ ׳›׳׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳™׳“ ׳•׳“׳¢׳‘׳™׳“ ׳›׳׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳™׳“.
׳”׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳₪׳¨׳©׳” ׳₪׳¨׳©׳” ׳•׳™׳© ׳¡׳™׳•׳ ׳₪׳¨׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ [׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳₪' ׳•׳™׳©׳׳— ׳•׳‘׳₪' ׳₪׳ ׳—׳¡], ׳™׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳” ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳—׳¦׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳”, ׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳§׳¦׳©׳•"׳¢.</small></small>. (׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳׳©׳™׳ ׳₪׳¨׳©׳” ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳•׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳‘' ׳₪׳¨׳©׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>).
<h3> ׳”׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳©׳׳•"׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳©׳׳•"׳× ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳˜ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳¨׳• ׳—׳–"׳ [׳—׳’׳™׳’׳” ׳™׳‘:, ׳¢"׳– ׳’:] ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳¢׳•׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳—׳” ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳’׳—׳׳™ ׳¨׳×׳׳™׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳©׳×׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳˜. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳”׳׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳₪׳™"׳‘ ׳”׳¢' 105.</small></small>. ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳•׳™׳₪׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳‘׳“׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳” ׳•׳¢׳“ ׳¡׳•׳₪׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳¢׳ ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×.
<h3> ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳” ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳© ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳›׳׳• ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ [׳•׳‘׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳© ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳©׳” ׳’' ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳], ׳•׳™׳¨׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳’׳ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳”, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳•, ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳.  ׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳•׳”׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳, ׳׳¨׳"׳© ׳•׳׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳›׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳’׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ [׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳™׳•׳¡׳£] ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳ ׳™. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳•׳׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳׳” ׳”׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳ ׳׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳×׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢"׳™ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¨׳₪"׳”, ׳’', ׳•׳׳’׳׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳׳¢׳׳×׳• ׳•׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳×׳• ׳©׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳ ׳™.  ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳©׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳"׳› ׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳, ׳¢"׳› ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳›׳©׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳© ׳•׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳, ׳•׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳›׳‘ ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳—׳–"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳‘׳ ׳× ׳”׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳”׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳§׳•׳¨׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳© ׳•׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳”׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“, ׳•׳¦"׳¢ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳× ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳—׳©׳•׳‘ ׳›׳׳• ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳.
׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳§׳•׳˜׳™ ׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳₪׳¨׳§ ׳”', ׳•׳–"׳: ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳™"׳– ׳™׳×׳‘׳•׳ ׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳§׳¨׳ ׳•׳™׳×׳ ׳׳‘ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳. ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳’ ׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳” ׳¢׳™"׳– ׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳×׳‘׳•׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳•׳׳– ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳׳“ ׳׳§׳¨׳, ׳“׳‘׳׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳׳¨ ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳׳“ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳›׳׳. ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳™ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳—׳“ ׳×׳¨׳’׳•׳ ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳›׳׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳©׳׳•"׳× ׳›׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳©׳׳•"׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳–׳›׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'] ׳›׳׳• ׳׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳¨׳¢, ׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳¢ ׳•׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳— ׳•׳›׳“׳•' ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳™׳׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳׳™׳¢ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳“׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳ ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳§׳“׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×׳™׳” <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳, ׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳”.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳©׳×׳‘׳© ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳׳×׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳”׳¢׳ ׳™׳, ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳©׳׳•"׳×.
<h3> ׳˜׳¢׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳•׳׳¨ "׳ ׳©׳׳×" <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳ ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳‘׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳™׳©׳×׳‘׳— ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳ ׳©׳׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳”', ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ [׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳].</small></small> ׳׳• '׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳•׳' ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳×. ׳©׳›׳— ׳׳•׳׳¨ "׳׳§׳ ׳׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×", ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳©, ׳•׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳"׳©׳‘׳— ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•".
׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳׳—׳© ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳׳’ "׳׳§׳ ׳׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳×" ׳׳• "׳”׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳•׳" ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨׳ ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“׳•׳× <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’. ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳˜׳•׳¢׳” ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳׳—׳© ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'- ׳•'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳”׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¨׳§׳, ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳™ <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳›׳©׳©׳•׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳¦׳” ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳™ [׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳–׳§׳§׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳™. ׳‘׳׳”"׳˜ ׳©׳], ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳™ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳” ׳•׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳§׳‘"׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳×׳. ׳•׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳©׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳”׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¨׳§׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳"׳¨ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳₪"׳ ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳. ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳§׳™׳¦׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¨׳§׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳”׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¡׳׳™׳—׳•׳× ׳™׳“׳׳’ ׳”׳׳™׳׳™׳ "׳׳—׳™ ׳•׳׳¡׳™" ׳•׳›׳•' ׳©׳”׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳׳™ <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳₪"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳•"׳– ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳–'.</small></small>.
׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳׳¢׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳“׳™׳‘׳¨׳• ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳–׳›׳¨ ׳©׳ "׳”׳§׳”׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳•׳© ׳”׳–׳”" ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳›׳¨׳™׳— ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ "׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳" ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“׳•׳× [׳•"׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•" ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳¢׳‘׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”], ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳“׳”׳›׳ ׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳× ׳׳§׳”׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳–׳”, ׳•׳™׳"׳¢.
׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳™׳©׳׳‘ ׳‘׳• ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳§׳”׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳§׳”׳׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳”׳ ׳ ׳§׳”׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳, ׳"׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳“׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳”׳–׳׳×, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳§׳”׳׳ ׳§׳“׳™׳©׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳”׳ ׳ ׳§׳”׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘׳•, ׳“׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳•, ׳“׳©׳₪׳™׳¨ ׳׳¦׳™ ׳׳׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳›׳™ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳©׳¨ ׳ ׳§׳”׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳©׳›׳—׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳×׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳”׳ ׳”׳–׳” ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳“׳׳׳• ׳’׳‘׳™׳”׳• ׳”׳•׳• ׳§׳™׳™׳™׳׳™, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ "׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳•׳" ׳©׳‘׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳“׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳•, ׳¢׳›׳×"׳“. ׳•׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳₪׳•׳¨׳§׳ ׳•׳›׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳"׳› ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳•' ׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳§׳”׳ ׳”׳§׳“׳•׳© ׳”׳–׳” ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳§׳”׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳—׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳•׳׳¦׳ ׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳™׳׳”׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳›׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳—.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳—׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦' ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳©׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳• ׳׳•׳×׳” ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¦' ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳›׳©׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨AMP.
JJ ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳' ׳‘׳¢"׳– ׳“׳£ ׳“: ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳© ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳– ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳›׳–׳• ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“׳•׳× ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳׳•׳¡׳£</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳׳•׳¡׳£, ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳× <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳• ׳‘׳§"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ "׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¦׳"׳— ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳ ׳’׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳×", ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳©׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘' ׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ "׳׳‘׳" ׳׳• "׳׳›׳" ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳”׳©׳ ׳™׳” ׳”׳׳›׳” ׳›׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳”׳©׳ ׳™׳” [׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳] ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳׳•׳¡׳£, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳“׳•"׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳׳•׳¡׳£, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳–. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳‘.  ׳•׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳§׳׳• ׳׳—׳¦׳™׳× ׳”׳©׳§׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳•׳× ׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳™׳₪׳˜׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳"׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳• ׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳§׳‘׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳×׳™׳” <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¢׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”.</small></small>.
׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳×׳• <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳˜ ׳“"׳” ׳—׳•׳‘׳×. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳—׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳— (׳’). ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳¨׳₪"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small> ׳•׳™׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳’׳“׳¨ "׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”" ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳“.
׳׳©׳” ׳”׳׳§׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”, ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳§׳¦׳× ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳–׳” ׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳” <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳ (׳‘) ׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳§׳¦׳× ׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳”. ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳™׳§׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳•, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳¡׳’. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™"׳’.</small></small>, ׳׳• ׳׳©׳” ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳‘׳™׳×׳• <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳”׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳ ׳—׳׳© ׳׳™׳‘׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳©׳׳™ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©. ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳˜. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳₪׳× ׳׳• ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳•, ׳’' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳˜, ׳‘' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳©׳›׳©׳׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳—׳‘׳•׳¨׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳›׳‘׳™׳¦׳”, ׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳׳–׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳‘׳”. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳§׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳–׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳• ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳ "׳‘ ׳”׳¢' ׳ "׳‘]. ׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳ ׳™, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ [׳›"׳› ׳‘׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳׳•׳׳™׳] ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳© ׳–׳׳ ׳§׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳׳×׳₪׳™׳׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳›׳—׳• ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£ [׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳•׳׳¨, ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’', ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳“׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳׳¡׳™׳₪׳× ׳—׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳—׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳׳×] ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳•׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳©׳›׳— ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳©׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳©׳•׳׳¨ [׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳˜], ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳× ׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳׳׳× ׳”׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳©׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳£, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¢׳™׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳•.</small></small>.
