<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳˜ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳×</h2>
<h3> ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘"׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©" ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳•׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳™׳׳›׳׳• ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳×׳™׳׳‘׳•׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳˜ ׳“"׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳–, ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳©׳”׳׳•"׳– ׳•׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳“"׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳׳׳¢׳׳”. ׳•׳›' ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳×׳™׳›׳£ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳ ׳•׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳₪׳×. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳¡' ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳¢׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳˜׳™׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳•׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳™׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳₪׳×. [׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• "׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”" ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳₪׳× <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¨׳‘. ׳•׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳“"׳” ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>].  ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳© ׳׳§׳•׳“׳] <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳, ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳“׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™׳¡׳• ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳”׳₪׳× <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳˜, ׳‘' ׳“"׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>.
[׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳“׳¢׳× ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳‘׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• "׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨" <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳”׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳׳©, ׳"׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳©׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳, [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”] ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳₪׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”', ׳׳׳ ׳©׳›׳©׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳‘׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨"׳› ׳‘׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'].
<h3> ׳”׳׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳’׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳”׳•׳ <b>׳׳‘׳¨׳</b> ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ <b>׳—׳•׳‘׳”</b> ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳© <b>׳׳¦׳•׳”</b> ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'.</small></small>, ׳׳›׳ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳×׳” ׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ [׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘'] ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳–, ׳›' ׳•׳¡׳§׳¦"׳•.
׳•׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳׳‘. ׳“"׳” ׳“׳’׳•׳¨׳, ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳©׳ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳: ׳“"׳” ׳—׳•׳¥ ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳•׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳—׳×׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳“׳¡"׳ ׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳׳§ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳—׳–׳™׳ ׳ ׳“׳¡"׳ ׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳“׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳. [׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳– ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳₪' ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳– ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™"׳¦ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×].</small></small>. 
(׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳– ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¡׳§ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳• ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳‘.</small></small> ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳×׳” ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” [׳•׳›׳׳• ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”]).
׳•׳”׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳™׳™׳, ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳™׳“׳¢ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳˜׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ "׳©׳”׳›׳" ׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳©׳§׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳–.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳•׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳"׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳" ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳"׳•׳©׳׳¨׳•" ׳׳• ׳"׳–׳›׳•׳¨" <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳‘. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳¡׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳"׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳" ׳¢"׳₪ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳˜ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳•׳”׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳] ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳"׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳" ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳ "׳׳×׳ ׳—׳×׳". ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳©׳›׳ ׳–׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳•׳§׳™׳‘׳׳• ׳׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨"׳› ׳׳¦׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳‘׳•׳×, ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳©׳×׳¨׳©׳” [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨"׳¦ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳– ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳ ׳’׳“ ׳”׳”׳׳›׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳ ׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳׳—׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳™׳“׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’]. </small></small>. ׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™׳‘׳¦׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳›׳™׳›׳¨׳•׳×, ׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳–, ׳™"׳ ׳•׳¡׳§׳¡"׳”.</small></small>.
- ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳™׳“׳© ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳§׳“׳© ׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×׳•, ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳¡׳™"׳—.
- ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳—׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳•׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳₪׳™׳ ׳›"׳•- ׳"׳”.
<h3> ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳™׳© ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳₪׳× ׳“׳•׳§׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳, ׳”'.</small></small>.
׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳₪׳× [׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳₪׳×]. ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳₪׳× <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳§׳”"׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳”] ׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳‘׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× [׳׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳×] ׳•׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳₪׳×, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳₪׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳¡׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳×, ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳₪׳× ׳•׳©׳›׳— "׳¨׳¦׳”" ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳–׳•, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©, ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳—"׳’ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳•׳§׳¨ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳•׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳˜׳• ׳׳©׳׳™׳” ׳“׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¡׳§.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ [׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳•] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳×. ׳•׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳ ׳₪׳× ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳¡׳₪׳™׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳×, ׳•׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳‘׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳×. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”. ׳•׳׳₪׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— "׳¨׳¦׳”" ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¡׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳×.
[׳™׳© ׳©׳¨׳¦׳• ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳ ׳™׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳₪׳× ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳×. ׳׳‘׳ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳• ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳× ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳— ׳¡"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳ ׳™׳” ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳, ׳׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳׳– ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳ ׳™׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨. ׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳”׳—׳™׳“"׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳˜׳¢׳׳•].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳“׳”"׳ </h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳× ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳—, ׳˜', ׳™'.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳׳׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳—׳׳™׳ [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳— ׳ ׳₪׳© ׳”׳“׳•׳—׳” ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳©׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳§׳¨ ׳›"׳› ׳›׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳• ׳”׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳™׳], ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳›׳–׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳”׳™׳•׳. ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳¨׳—׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳•׳׳™׳₪׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳•׳"׳ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳•.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳” <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳’׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¢׳›׳©׳™׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳׳›׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳™׳§׳•׳˜׳™ ׳׳”׳¨׳™"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳“׳”"׳  ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳• ׳×"׳— ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳¨׳•׳× ׳§׳™׳™׳׳•׳× ׳•׳–׳• ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳×.
׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳”׳©׳"׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳— ׳¡׳™׳•׳, ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳™ ׳¨׳•׳—׳ ׳™׳•׳× [׳‘׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳×] ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳–׳• ׳•׳™׳“׳׳’ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳•׳—׳ ׳™׳•׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨"׳” ׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳› ׳©׳—׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨"׳” ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳› ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¢׳×׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳•׳”׳×׳—׳ ׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳¨"׳” ׳“׳£ ׳׳‘: [׳‘׳¨׳™"׳£ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳“׳£ ׳˜.] ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳›׳ ׳• ׳‘׳™׳•"׳› ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳×׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳” ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳×׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨]. [׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¨"׳” ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ "׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳›׳ ׳•", ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳‘׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨"׳” ׳©׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳—׳™׳“ ׳•׳™׳—׳™׳“]. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳”.</small></small>.
[׳•׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳©׳ ׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳¡׳׳ ׳˜׳¨ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳’׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳¡ [׳ "׳”] ׳•׳‘׳¡' ׳§׳“׳•׳© ׳׳׳•׳ [׳¢׳' ׳¢׳’], ׳©׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳–׳•׳”׳¨ ׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳‘׳§׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳—׳™׳™ ׳•׳׳–׳•׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳•׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳›׳›׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳‘ ׳”׳‘, ׳"׳ ׳‘׳“׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳©׳§׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳” ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳§׳˜׳¨׳•׳’ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳—׳¡ ׳•׳©׳׳•׳, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳’׳” ׳›׳–׳• ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳™ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳§׳‘"׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳—׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳—"׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳’׳™׳© ׳©׳¢׳×׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳•. ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨"׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳©׳ ׳”. ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳׳™"׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨"׳”. ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳¢ ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳’׳©׳׳™׳•׳×. ׳•׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳–׳›׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳׳¢׳׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¨׳•׳—׳ ׳™׳•׳×.</small></small> ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳• ׳‘׳“׳¨׳’׳” ׳©׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳›׳× ׳”׳©׳™"׳× ׳׳ ׳׳™׳›׳₪׳× ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳• ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳¨"׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳×׳”׳™׳” ׳©׳™׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳™׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳“ ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳™"׳× ׳‘׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳˜׳¨׳“׳•׳×].
- ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× "׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳׳™׳" ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳׳©׳× ׳—׳™׳, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘.
<h3> ׳”׳©׳׳׳× ׳׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳•׳. ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳׳’׳“׳ ׳•׳× <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳"׳•, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳›׳£ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳”.
JJ ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳§׳©׳”, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳"׳› ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳©׳™׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳©׳—׳¨ ׳׳›׳׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳¢׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ [׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳‘׳™"׳˜ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳– ׳׳¢׳“׳ ׳™ ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳"׳© ׳₪"׳˜ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳“ ׳׳•׳× ׳›], ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳“ ׳•׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳‘׳¡' ׳¢"׳• ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¢"׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳× ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳׳׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳¦"׳¢. ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳‘ ׳¨׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳“׳™"׳ ׳“׳”׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”.</small></small>AMP. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳™׳¢׳׳• ׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳™׳‘׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳”׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢׳• ׳•׳™׳•׳›׳׳• ׳׳¢׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳ <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳₪"׳“, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳› ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳™׳—.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳—׳“׳© ׳—׳™׳“׳•׳©׳™ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“׳© ׳™׳׳׳“ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳—׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳“׳ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳–׳•׳”׳¨. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳, ׳‘' ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳׳•׳“ ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳×"׳— ׳•׳׳‘"׳‘ ׳•׳׳₪׳•׳¢׳׳™׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳©׳×׳™׳™׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× [׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×] <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳, ׳‘'. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳¨׳©׳¢׳™׳ ׳©׳©׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳×׳ ׳׳’׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳•׳–׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ [׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳₪' ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳]. </small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳– [׳׳׳•׳×׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳•׳×] <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳“׳‘׳׳™׳¦׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳¨׳™, ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳§׳•׳“׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳©׳§׳׳•׳× ׳§׳ ׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¡"׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳” ׳–׳• ׳“׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳×, ׳•׳™׳"׳¢.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨.
׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳˜׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳© <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳“׳‘׳׳¦׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳’׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
- ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳”׳×׳—׳׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳×, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳.
<h3> ׳©׳×׳™׳™׳× ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳“׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳” ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳, ׳׳—׳•׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳. ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳™ ׳’׳ ׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳ ׳™׳“׳™׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳”, ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳. ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳×, ׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳¡׳™׳™׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳׳–׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳’"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳–] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳–. ׳•׳‘׳—׳›׳׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳–' ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡, ׳"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳• ׳׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳–. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳– ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¡׳§ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—"׳“ ׳׳§׳˜ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳׳•׳× ׳׳“.  ׳•׳׳©׳™׳˜׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳‘׳₪׳”"׳’ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳“׳ ׳׳׳¢׳˜ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” [׳©׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳× ׳”׳¢' ׳§׳¦"׳’].
׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳' ׳§׳׳ ׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”, ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳” ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳׳§ ׳”' ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳•׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳”׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”.</small></small>. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳“׳¢׳× ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳—׳×׳ ׳•׳”׳›׳׳” ׳™׳©׳×׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳©׳‘׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳– <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳›"׳› ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳˜] ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ [׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳’] ׳•׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× [׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳–].</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳’׳“׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳•׳‘׳§׳•׳ ׳˜׳¨׳¡ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳—׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳× ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳–׳¦׳•׳§"׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×. ׳•׳‘׳©׳•׳‘׳¢ ׳©׳׳—׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳™"׳‘ ׳׳•׳•׳׳׳•׳–'׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳”׳—׳×׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳–׳׳ ׳•׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳›׳׳׳ ׳׳•׳’׳׳™׳•, ׳•׳”׳›׳׳” ׳׳ ׳×׳©׳×׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”. ׳•׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳”׳׳–׳׳ ׳”׳—׳×׳ ׳•׳”׳›׳׳” ׳™׳©׳×׳• ׳›׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳.
[׳•׳׳ ׳”׳—׳×׳ ׳•׳”׳›׳׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳•׳×׳™׳ [׳׳”׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳×] ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳™׳©׳×׳• ׳”׳—׳×׳ ׳•׳”׳›׳׳” ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳–' ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳×, ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳×׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳–' ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳×, ׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜].
<h3> ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳₪ ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳‘׳©׳ ׳” ׳©׳—׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳”׳©׳›׳™׳ ׳•׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳›׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳¢׳” <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳›, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳—. </small></small> ׳•׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳—׳׳¥, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳© ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳׳—׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳•׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳© ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳׳—׳¦׳” ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳“׳’׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳™׳׳›׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳, ׳‘'. ׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™"׳ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳•׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”. ׳•׳–׳׳ ׳©׳© ׳•׳׳—׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳₪׳™׳¢ ׳‘׳׳•׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳” ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳” ׳’׳“׳•׳׳”. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳£ ׳©׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳© ׳•׳׳—׳¦׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳•׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳©׳×׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳•׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳–׳׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳—׳׳¥ ׳©׳׳₪׳™ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳“] ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳” ׳׳£ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳—׳¦׳•׳×.</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳©׳¢׳” ׳¢׳©׳™׳¨׳™׳× <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳©׳¢׳” ׳¢׳©׳™׳¨׳™׳× [׳¡׳•׳£ ׳©׳¢׳” ׳×׳©׳™׳¢׳™׳×] ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™, ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¢"׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳›.</small></small>, ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ "׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳“׳׳" ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳©׳¢׳” ׳¢׳©׳™׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳›. ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳’׳ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳™׳¡׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳¦׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳“ ׳¡"׳— ׳©׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× "׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳“׳׳" ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳–׳•. ׳•׳›"׳› ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¢"׳ ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳›. ׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳”׳¨"׳™ ׳׳¡׳׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳“׳׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¨"׳₪ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳—׳¦׳•׳×.  ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳¦׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳© ׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳•׳׳—׳¦׳” ׳׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳™׳©׳™׳× ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳“, ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳. ׳•׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳©׳¢׳” ׳¢׳©׳™׳¨׳™׳× ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳, ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳×׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳›.  ׳•׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳–׳•׳”׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳–׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳’' ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳×׳•׳¨׳”</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨"׳— ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳ ׳—׳ ׳¨׳׳© ׳—׳•׳“׳© ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳˜"׳– ׳›׳™׳¦׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’, ׳׳׳’"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳’׳ "׳¨׳¦׳”" ׳•׳’׳ "׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳" ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳›׳” ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳¨׳×׳™ ׳“׳¡׳×׳¨׳™ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳›׳” ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳¨׳§ "׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳" ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳׳׳¨ "׳¨׳¦׳”", ׳•׳׳˜"׳– ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳›׳” ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳™׳׳׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳. ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳”, ׳•׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳”׳׳“׳§׳“׳§׳™׳ [׳•׳ ׳×׳₪׳©׳˜ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’] ׳©׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳₪׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳›׳©׳—׳ ׳¨"׳— ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳©"׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳’׳™׳¢׳• ׳׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ "׳¨׳¦׳”" ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳–, ׳•׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳›׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳₪"׳— ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳’. ׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳™׳© ׳©׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳, ׳•׳"׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳›׳, ׳׳׳ ׳›׳₪׳©׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳›׳” ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳×׳• ׳¢׳“ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳—. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳™׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳׳” ׳•׳׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳–. ׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳× ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳©׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳•׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳™"׳¦ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳™׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳× ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳•׳›׳׳™׳ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳•׳™׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳"׳› ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳–׳™׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳”׳"׳–.</small></small>.
- ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'-׳•'.

RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳ - ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳•׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×</h2>
<h3> ׳–׳׳ ׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳–׳׳ ׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳–׳׳ ׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳׳ ׳¦׳׳”"׳› ׳¨׳‘׳• ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳×, ׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳‘׳×׳™ ׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳׳×׳₪׳׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× 20 ׳“׳§' ׳׳• 30 ׳“׳§' ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳¡׳׳ ׳˜ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳’, ׳‘', ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳›- 30 ׳“׳§' ׳׳• 40 ׳“׳§' ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳—. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳§ ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳₪׳׳ 40 ׳“׳§' ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳©"׳§ 45 ׳“׳§' ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳’' ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳¨׳¦׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳× [׳•׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳’"׳› ׳©׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳§׳™׳¢ ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳–׳”׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳ ׳’' ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳—׳©׳© ׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳ (׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳) ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳‘׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳›"׳› ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳×׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳¡׳×׳׳§ ׳”׳׳“׳׳•׳׳™׳× ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¦׳“ ׳©׳©׳§׳¢׳” ׳‘׳• ׳”׳—׳׳”].</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳ <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳‘' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳ [׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›- 14-18 ׳“׳§', ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳] ׳׳ ׳‘׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳’ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳•׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳×׳׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳“׳•׳¢ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳׳× ׳’' ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳׳× ׳’' ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳׳× ׳’' ׳›׳•׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳•. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™"׳˜ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳×.
׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳¨"׳× ׳©׳¦׳׳”"׳› ׳”׳•׳ 72 ׳“׳§' ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳•׳•׳×׳™׳” [׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳‘'], ׳ ׳”׳’׳• ׳‘׳׳¨"׳™ ׳›׳”׳’׳׳•׳ ׳™׳. ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ [׳×׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳”׳§' ׳¢׳ ׳¨"׳× ׳©׳”׳—׳•׳©׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¨"׳™ ׳‘׳–׳׳ 72 ׳“׳§' ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳¨׳•׳₪׳” [׳׳ ׳’׳׳™׳”, ׳•׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳“] ׳›׳—׳“׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳ ׳›"׳› ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳©׳™׳ ׳׳׳•, ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳¨"׳× ׳—׳“׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳§׳”׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳׳¨"׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳¨"׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” [׳›׳§׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳©׳׳¢ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘], ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳“׳¢׳× ׳¨"׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳“ ׳–׳׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳©׳©׳• ׳׳–׳” <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳' ׳§׳›׳• ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳.  ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¢׳“ 72 ׳“׳§' ׳©׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳×׳™ ׳׳™׳“׳™ ׳§׳•׳׳ ׳©׳׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳” ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨. ׳•׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳' ׳§׳›׳– ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳©׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳¨"׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳” ׳™׳—׳׳™׳¨׳• ׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳ ׳•׳›׳”, ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳©׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳¨"׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳’ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳™׳“׳׳™׳§׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳ ׳׳•׳¦"׳©</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳©.
׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳׳׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳‘"׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳—׳•׳" ׳•׳‘"׳‘׳¨׳›׳•" ׳‘׳׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳—׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳©, ׳•׳׳׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳‘"׳•׳™׳”׳™ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳" ׳•׳‘"׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳" ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳—׳–׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳©׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳’׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳׳׳¨׳™׳›׳™׳ ׳§׳¦׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳¢׳›׳‘ ׳”׳—׳–׳¨׳× ׳”׳¨׳©׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳’׳™׳”׳ ׳, ׳•׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ "׳•׳™׳”׳™ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳" ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™׳“׳”, ׳•׳׳—׳¨ "׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳•׳" ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳¡׳“׳¨ "׳•׳™׳×׳ ׳׳" ׳©׳”׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳§׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳™׳׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳¢, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳× "׳¨׳‘׳©"׳¢, ׳”׳—׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•" ׳•׳›׳•' <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳’, ׳', ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§"׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”</h3>
 <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳, ׳₪׳›"׳˜ ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¦׳•׳× "׳–׳›׳•׳¨" ׳׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳×׳• ׳•׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳׳×׳•, ׳•׳׳‘׳•' ׳©׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳‘׳׳׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳›: ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳§׳•. ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳] ׳׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳׳›׳¨׳™׳¢. ׳•׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳©׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳׳׳ ׳–׳§׳ ׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳©׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™'.</small></small>
<b>׳’.</b> ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳§׳¦׳× ׳§׳“׳•׳©׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳—׳¨ ׳¦׳׳”"׳› ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳—׳–"׳ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳¨׳¦"׳˜, ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳’], ׳•׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳].</small></small>. ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡, ׳׳• ׳©׳׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳“׳© ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳”.  ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳›׳— ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” [׳׳×׳” ׳—׳•׳ ׳ ׳×׳ ׳•] ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡- ׳™׳×׳₪׳׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳¨׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳™׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳×׳• [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳“, ׳'].</small></small>. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳˜׳•׳¨׳— ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× ׳‘׳¨׳•׳ ׳”׳׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳™׳™׳, ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳ ׳¨, ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”, ׳©׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳•׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳›׳׳• ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¢"׳’, ׳' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳—.</small></small> [׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳].
׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳•׳× ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× "׳׳™׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳”" ׳•׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’. ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳׳¡׳₪׳§, ׳•׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳× ׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳©׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳׳™׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” [׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜, ׳©׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳• ׳›׳×׳‘, ׳©׳׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳‘׳׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™' ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳•]. </small></small>.
׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳‘׳×׳©׳¢׳× ׳”׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳׳¨׳"׳ ׳™׳×׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳׳‘׳ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳ "׳, ׳™'. ׳•׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨.</small></small>.
׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳”׳—׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳‘, ׳™׳¢׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳•׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳׳©׳” ׳×׳©׳×׳“׳ ׳׳©׳׳•׳¢ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳׳™׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳• ׳׳׳™׳© ׳׳—׳¨ [׳•׳×׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳¢׳”].
׳׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳©׳” ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳©׳” ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳– ׳”׳׳©׳” ׳×׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳”. ׳•׳׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳׳‘׳“׳™׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳‘׳˜׳׳” ׳—"׳• ׳׳ ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳׳• ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳׳§׳•׳“׳, ׳׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳“׳™׳׳• ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ [׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳] ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳׳• ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”, ׳•׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳©׳׳¢׳•.
׳’׳ ׳׳©׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳׳™׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳, ׳"׳ ׳×׳©׳×׳“׳ ׳׳—׳₪׳© ׳׳™׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳•׳׳– ׳×׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳™ ׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳׳—׳“ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳׳©׳” ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”, ׳•׳׳׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳™׳¡׳ ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡- ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“, ׳•׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳©׳” ׳×׳©׳×׳”.</small></small>], ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳×׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳•׳×׳©׳×׳” <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳•, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳—.</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳©׳” ׳׳‘׳“׳™׳׳”, ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳¡׳₪׳§ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳. ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳.</small></small>. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳—׳•"׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳׳•׳× ׳‘] ׳•׳§׳¦׳•׳”"׳© [׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳‘], ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳׳™׳™׳×׳• ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™׳˜׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳ ׳“. ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳• ׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳×׳§׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”, ׳•׳׳“׳׳ ׳—׳™׳׳§ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨.</small></small>.
׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳‘, ׳׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳׳©׳×׳• ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳–׳›׳¨׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳©׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡.
<h3> ׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳¡׳“׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳: <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳•, ׳', ׳•' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳.</small></small>
BB׳.  ׳›׳•׳¡ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳˜׳¢׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳¨׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳•׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'.
׳‘. ׳©׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳©׳₪׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳”׳—׳•׳¦׳”, ׳׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳”.
׳’. ׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™׳”׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳¥ ׳˜׳₪׳—, ׳•׳׳×׳—׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” [׳”׳ ׳” ׳§׳ ׳™׳©׳•׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳‘׳˜׳— ׳•׳›׳•'].
׳“. ׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳₪׳”"׳’ [׳•׳›׳•׳¡ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳”].
׳”. ׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳׳׳• ׳•׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¨׳™׳— ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳—׳.
׳•. ׳׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳©׳׳׳׳•, ׳•׳׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™ ׳™׳“ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳¨׳×׳™ ׳©׳™׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳׳׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳— ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳” ׳©׳׳‘׳¨׳, ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳© ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳— ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ [׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳— ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘], ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small> ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳© [׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳™׳ <b>׳’׳</b> ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” - ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳”].
׳–. ׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳¡׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”.
׳—. ׳©׳•׳×׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” [׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳׳“ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”], ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳§׳” ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳™׳×׳•, ׳•׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳©׳×׳• ׳׳›׳•׳¡ ׳”׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”.
׳˜. ׳׳”׳ ׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳₪׳›׳• ׳•׳׳›׳‘׳” ׳‘׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳¨׳•׳—׳¥ ׳‘׳• ׳׳× ׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• [׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳‘׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳”]. EE
<h3> ׳¢׳׳™׳“׳” ׳׳• ׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” ׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳©׳׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳™׳•׳©׳‘, ׳•׳׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳. ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳•, ׳•' ׳•׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳. ׳”׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” - ׳”׳•׳“׳₪׳¡ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳ ׳- ׳¨׳ ׳‘.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳£ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳©׳™׳‘׳” <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>.
׳׳™ ׳©׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳׳ ׳”׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” [׳©׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳ ׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳—"׳› ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“] ׳•׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”, ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳™"׳’. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳¨׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳• ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳</h3>
 <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳' ׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳§׳‘: ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳—׳ ׳׳”׳™׳•׳× ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳§׳ ׳”"׳– ג€“ ׳™׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳–׳׳. ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳™׳© ׳׳ ׳• ׳ ׳©׳׳” ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳ ׳©׳׳” ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳”. [׳•׳”׳§' ׳©׳ ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳"׳› ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳ ׳©׳׳” ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳™׳•"׳˜, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳” ׳™׳×׳™׳¨׳”, ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳©׳—׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳©׳׳—׳× ׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳•׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳©׳×׳™׳” ׳׳•׳¢׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳£ ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳׳’: ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳'.</small></small>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳–, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳•, ׳'.</small></small>, ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳™׳׳×׳ [׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳ ׳’׳“׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳₪׳›׳] ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳׳• ׳“׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳™׳׳×׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳ <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳”׳¨"׳™ ׳•׳•׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳–, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳›׳”"׳— ׳©׳.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳₪׳™׳¨׳©׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ "׳¢׳¦׳™" ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳’ ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ "׳׳™׳ ׳™" ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳•׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳™׳׳×׳ ׳“׳•׳§׳ <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳׳—׳¦׳™׳× ׳”׳©׳§׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳‘׳׳™ ׳›׳•׳¡ <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳•, ׳•' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>.
׳׳™ ׳©׳׳¨׳’׳™׳© ׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳׳—׳׳§׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳×] ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¨׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳™׳— ׳׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳׳׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳™׳— ׳©׳ ׳§׳׳˜ ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨, ׳•׳–׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳™"׳–, ׳’' ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳] ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳’׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳ ׳§׳׳˜ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳×׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳™׳— ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳™׳— ׳©׳ ׳§׳׳˜ ׳‘׳׳•׳™׳¨.  </small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳×׳¨׳•׳’ ׳•׳¢׳©׳‘׳™ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳×׳¨׳•׳’ ׳”׳׳¨׳™׳— ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳–. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳¨׳™׳— ׳׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳©׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳¡׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¢׳“׳• ׳׳”׳¢׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳—׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¨׳™׳—, ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳’, ׳–'.</small></small> ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳—׳™׳.  ׳•׳׳׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳×׳¨׳•׳’ ׳׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳׳”׳§׳.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳—׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳”׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳ ׳׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳¢׳‘׳“ ׳™׳¦׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” [׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small> ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳›׳׳].
<h3> ׳׳™ ׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳׳™ ׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳™׳—׳™׳, ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳”׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳© <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳•.</small></small>. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳׳׳™׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳§׳׳˜׳• ׳¨׳™׳— ׳׳¦׳׳—׳™ ׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™ ׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳×׳˜׳™ ׳”׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳ ׳×׳˜׳™׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¢׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ [׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳¡"׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳‘].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳¨ - ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳• ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳”?</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳”׳™׳ <b>׳׳₪׳ ׳™</b> ׳”׳”׳ ׳׳”, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳— ׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳— <b>׳•׳׳—"׳›</b> ׳׳‘׳¨׳ [׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳¨׳§ ׳•׳¨׳¢׳ ׳•׳§׳©׳× ׳•׳›׳•'].
׳•׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳— <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳' ׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳ ׳“. ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳–׳• ׳©׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳ ׳×׳ ׳”׳§׳‘"׳” ׳“׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳“׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳“׳•׳’׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳¢׳׳” ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳˜׳—׳ ׳ ׳–׳• ׳‘׳–׳• ׳•׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳ ׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨.</small></small> ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳•׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳₪׳¡׳—׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳ ׳’: ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳© ׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳© [׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳, ׳–׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳’׳•׳₪׳• ׳ ׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳–׳”, ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳], ׳׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳— ׳–׳›׳¨ ׳׳׳© ׳©׳׳“׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳•׳”׳˜"׳– ׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳™׳¡׳×׳›׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳™׳‘׳¨׳.
׳•׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳¡׳§׳™ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳“"׳” ׳׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳©׳” ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¦"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳© [׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳©׳¢"׳× ׳©׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳—"׳¦ ׳©׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳§׳˜׳™׳ ׳ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳–׳• ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳‘׳"׳”]. </small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ <b>׳§׳•׳“׳</b> ׳™׳© ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳”׳¢׳™׳¨׳ ׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳‘ ׳¨׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳× ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳׳ ׳¡׳’׳™ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳›׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳‘׳¢ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳–׳• ׳׳׳˜׳‘׳¢ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳© ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳•׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳—"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳’, ׳•׳”׳”׳‘׳˜׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳’.</small></small> <b>׳•׳׳—׳¨ ׳›׳</b> ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨, ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ <b>׳¢׳“</b> ׳©׳™׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳׳•׳¨׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳” [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳•] ׳•׳”׳˜"׳– [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳—"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳•׳”׳₪׳"׳’ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳•] ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳׳©׳ "׳‘ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳] ׳©׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳™׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳™׳‘׳¨׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™ ׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳¨ <b>׳’׳</b> ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳ ׳”׳’ ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳˜׳¢׳׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳©׳¢׳¨׳™ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳¦"׳’ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳—"׳¦ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳“׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳”"׳– ׳‘׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳” [׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳׳”.] ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳“׳¡׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳˜ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”. ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳’"׳› ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳© [׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳—׳©׳׳- ׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳] ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”, ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘.
׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳, ׳׳׳ ׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•, ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”.</small></small>.
׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳¨, ׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳–׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳•׳§׳¦׳©׳•"׳¢, ׳•׳׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳—׳׳™׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳‘׳"׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳—"׳¦ ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳“׳׳”׳©׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳§׳˜ ׳™׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳•] ׳©׳™׳”׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳”.</small></small>.
׳‘׳–׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳—׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳©׳׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™ ׳™׳“ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳ ׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳•׳¡ <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳—"׳¦, ׳’' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳¢׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳–׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳”׳. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳–׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳‘׳׳¢׳“׳™׳”׳, ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳™׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳–, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳”, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳™׳§׳— ׳׳•׳×׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡' ׳¨׳¦"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳•׳›׳”"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳©׳”׳׳“׳§׳“׳§׳™׳ ׳׳—׳–׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¨.</small></small>. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
<h3> ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳” ׳–׳›׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳, ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳ ׳¨ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳¢"׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳—"׳¦ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳›׳™ ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳“׳”"׳—, ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳•.</small></small>. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳–.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳•׳”׳¡׳™׳— ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳©׳•׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳™׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳©׳׳™׳. ׳•׳׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳• ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳”׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳”׳ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳× ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳©</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳© ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳× "׳₪׳׳•׳¨׳•׳¡׳ ׳˜". ׳•׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳¦׳”׳•׳‘׳” ׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'] ׳©׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳’׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳ ׳¡. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳”׳“׳׳§׳× ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳©׳׳•' ׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳‘׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳‘׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳©. ׳•׳׳›׳, ׳₪׳׳•׳¨׳•׳¡׳ ׳˜ ׳”׳׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳”׳’׳– ׳©׳‘׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳׳© ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳"׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳© ׳׳›׳•"׳¢.  ׳•׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳¦׳”׳•׳‘׳” ׳”׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳—׳©׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳” ׳•׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳׳© ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳¢ ׳’׳¨׳•׳“׳–'׳™׳ ׳¡׳§׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳© ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳—׳•׳˜ ׳׳•׳”׳˜ ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳. ׳׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳ ' ׳¡׳§"׳˜] ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳‘׳•׳ ׳¦׳”׳•׳‘׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳׳© [׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳, ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳¨׳”], ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳¨׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳¨׳›׳× ׳‘׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳©.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳ ׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳׳•׳¦"׳©</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ [׳›׳’׳•׳: ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳׳•׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳©׳™׳¦׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳©׳׳™׳¢׳× ׳×׳—׳–׳™׳× ׳׳–׳’ ׳׳•׳™׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳¨׳§׳•׳× ׳©׳ ׳§׳˜׳₪׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×, ׳§׳ ׳™׳™׳× ׳׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×], ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳—.
׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳׳•׳˜׳•׳‘׳•׳¡ ׳©׳”׳ ׳•׳”׳’ ׳‘׳• ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳•׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳™] ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳–, ׳•׳©׳•"׳× ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳× ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳¡"׳. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳ "׳— ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳–׳”׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>. ׳׳׳™׳¨׳× "׳©׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳˜׳•׳‘" ׳׳¦׳“ ׳”׳ ׳”׳’ ׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳¦׳™"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳—׳™"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳“ ׳•׳©׳©"׳› ׳©׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜"׳•.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳™ ׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©"׳§</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳”׳׳“׳§׳“׳§׳™׳ ׳׳–׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳•׳׳–׳›׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳”׳• ׳”׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳•׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳ ׳¨׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳•׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¦"׳”, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳–.</small></small>.  ׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡ ׳׳₪׳” ׳•׳¢׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳•׳׳—׳ ׳• ׳׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳׳•׳” ׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳”׳׳”׳“׳¨ ׳™׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳™ ׳×׳‘׳©׳™׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳׳•׳” ׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳™׳׳›׳׳ ׳” ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳—׳¦׳•׳×, ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳׳” ׳©׳×׳”׳™׳” ׳¡׳׳•׳›׳” ׳׳™׳¦׳™׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳ ׳›׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳¡׳•׳§ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳§׳‘׳¢ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳™׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳” ׳–׳• <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©' ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳©׳¢"׳× ׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳‘׳™׳©׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳•׳¦׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳‘׳’׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳˜' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”, ׳•׳׳׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳© ׳•׳׳–׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳ ׳•׳”׳’ ׳”׳—׳×׳ ׳¡׳•׳₪׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳’׳•׳“׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳©׳׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳׳•׳” ׳׳׳›׳” <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳›׳£ ׳”׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©' ׳¡׳§"׳•.</small></small>, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳׳•׳” ׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳¨׳—׳•׳× ׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳' ׳§׳– ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳₪׳•׳©׳˜ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳׳•׳” ׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳, ׳׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳— ׳§׳ ׳™׳‘׳¡׳§׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳§׳”"׳™ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳׳•׳” ׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳׳•׳” ׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳¡׳¢׳•׳“׳× ׳׳׳•׳” ׳׳׳›׳”. </small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳–׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳“׳׳”, ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳™׳©׳׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳” ׳›׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¦"׳©, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳•׳¨׳™׳“ ׳—׳׳™׳₪׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳׳• ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳©׳‘׳×] ׳™׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳‘׳’׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳—׳–׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳׳‘׳•׳© ׳׳× ׳—׳׳™׳₪׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳“ ׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳” <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.


RRR
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳ - ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳×</h2>

<h3> ׳”׳§׳“׳׳”</h3>
XX ׳”׳׳•׳׳“ ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳‘׳›׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳× ׳—׳–"׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ [׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“, ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳”] ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳ ׳•׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•"׳‘ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳—׳’׳™׳’׳” ׳“׳£ ׳™. ׳©׳”׳¨׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳•׳׳§׳׳§׳, ׳•׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳₪׳™ ׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳–"׳” ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳, ׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳”׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳—׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳›׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳”, ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×, ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳• ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳₪׳¨׳” ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳¨׳—"׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×.
׳•׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳–׳” ׳™׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳—׳׳§׳™׳: <b>׳.</b> ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳©׳׳¨ ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳×, <b>׳‘.</b> ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, <b>׳’.</b> ׳˜׳™׳¨׳—׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳, <b>׳“.</b> ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× - ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳₪׳¨׳” ׳׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¨׳—"׳. {{{׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</small></small>}
<h3> ׳”׳§׳“׳׳” ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
XX ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳׳©׳ ׳™ ׳—׳׳§׳™׳, ׳”׳׳—׳“ ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳× ׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳• ׳•׳‘׳ ׳•׳×׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳׳©׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳§ "׳׳ ׳×׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳×׳” ׳•׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳‘׳×׳" ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ <sup>׳‘</sup><small><small>׳•׳ ׳₪׳§"׳, ׳“׳׳£ ׳׳"׳“ ׳“׳¡"׳ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳‘׳‘׳× [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳׳¨׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳™׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳‘'], ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳” ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳ ׳™, ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳§"׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳×׳” ׳•׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' [׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳•, ׳•' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳¦"׳¢] ׳•׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”, ׳¨׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘.</small></small>.  GG
<h3> ׳§׳˜׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳§׳˜׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” <b>׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳</b>, ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳¢׳• ׳•׳׳’׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳•׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× <sup>׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳• ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¡"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“.</small></small>. ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳™׳₪׳×׳— <b>׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳•</b> ׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳¢׳ [׳׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳¢׳] ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳•׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳–׳”, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳, ׳•׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳§׳© ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳₪׳×׳—, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳×.
<h3> ׳§׳˜׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•</h3>
<b>׳‘.</b> ׳§׳˜׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” <b>׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳•,</b> ׳׳×׳—׳׳§ ׳׳©׳׳©׳” ׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳× ׳’׳™׳ <sup>׳“</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢"׳₪ ׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳’.</small></small>: 
BB<b>׳.</b> ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳• "׳׳¡׳•׳¨" ׳•׳׳”׳• "׳׳•׳×׳¨" ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳• '׳׳¡׳•׳¨' ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳•. <b>׳“׳™׳ ׳•</b>: ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ [׳׳׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳•׳›׳“׳׳™ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳‘], ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳›׳©׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳™׳™׳, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳• ׳•׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳©׳™׳׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳•, ׳׳• ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳׳₪׳¢׳™׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳ ׳•׳›׳“׳•' ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳© ׳¡׳‘׳™׳¨ ׳©׳™׳׳—׳¥ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳›׳₪׳×׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳”׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳•׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳’׳•׳ <sup>׳”</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳›' ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳’.</small></small>.
 <b>׳‘.</b> ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳• "׳׳¡׳•׳¨" ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¨ ׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ <b>׳׳“׳•׳¢</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳. <b>׳“׳™׳ ׳•</b>: ׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳•</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳•, ׳׳–׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳‘׳™"׳“ ׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳׳£ ׳‘׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳–׳”, ׳•׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳—׳•׳™׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳‘׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳–׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳”׳• ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳, ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳.  ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳›׳–׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳‘ ׳׳• ׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳”׳. ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <b>׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳©׳ ׳”׳§׳˜׳</b> [׳•׳™׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“'].
 <b>׳’.</b>  ׳§׳˜׳ ׳©׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳. <b>׳“׳™׳ ׳•</b>: ׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳• ׳׳ ׳¨׳•׳׳”׳• ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳” ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳©׳•.EE
<h3> ׳”׳§׳¨׳‘׳× ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳׳×׳’ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳׳—׳¥ ׳¢׳׳™׳•</h3>
<b>׳’</b>. ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳‘ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳×׳’ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳©׳™׳׳—׳¥ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳™׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳׳• ׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¦: ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳׳×׳× ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳—׳’׳‘ ׳—׳™ ׳©׳™׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳׳›׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳’ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳“, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳ ׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳׳ ׳§׳©׳” ׳׳”׳’׳' ׳‘׳™׳‘׳׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳™׳“. ׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳“׳• ׳׳₪׳×׳—׳•׳× ׳•׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳”׳×׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳—׳§׳• ׳©׳ ׳•׳™׳׳¦׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳×׳—׳•׳× ׳•׳™׳‘׳™׳׳•׳, ׳•׳׳•׳›׳— ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳™׳© ׳©׳×׳™׳¨׳¦׳• ׳©׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳. ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜, ׳©׳‘׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳—׳’׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳• ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳“ ׳—׳’׳‘ ׳"׳› ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳¡׳₪׳™׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳—׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳–׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳”׳•׳׳ ׳•׳׳•׳¦׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳₪׳×׳—׳•׳× ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳¡׳₪׳™׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳•. ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳‘ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳×׳’ ׳—׳©׳׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳ ׳™׳— ׳׳• ׳׳”׳¡׳×׳•׳‘׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳׳×׳’ ׳•׳™׳׳—׳¥ ׳¢׳׳™׳•.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¡׳₪׳™׳” ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳•</h3>
<b>׳“.</b> ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳—</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳’ ׳“"׳” ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳¢׳•׳’׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳§׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳¨׳§ ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨"׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳’.</small></small> [׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳” ׳׳–׳”]. ׳•׳‘׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳›׳•"׳¢: ׳. ׳‘׳©׳×׳™׳™׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳×. ׳‘. ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳¢׳“׳¨ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳˜</sup><small><small>׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳”׳§' ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨"׳ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳¡׳₪׳™׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳™ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳"׳› ׳׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳›׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳›׳׳• ׳•׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳“׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳• ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳ ׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳’ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳•] ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳—׳•׳׳© ׳•׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳”׳›׳ "׳¡ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳• [׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳] ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¡׳™׳“׳•׳¨ ׳•׳—׳•׳׳© ׳•׳’׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳”׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳•׳“׳•׳—׳§ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳”׳–׳׳ ׳“׳©׳‘׳× ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨] ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’.
׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳©׳×׳•׳× ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳×.</small></small>.
׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳©׳›׳—׳• ׳‘׳• ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳“׳׳•׳§׳”, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳›׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ <sup>׳™</sup><small><small>׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳•׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳›׳•"׳¢. ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳›׳׳×׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳›׳©׳•׳’׳’, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳× ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳“׳׳§׳× ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳•׳“ ׳©׳–׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳™ ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳—׳©׳•׳© ׳׳›׳, ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳©׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳•׳¢׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳™׳</sup><small><small>׳׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳¢׳•׳‘׳“, ׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳× ׳–׳¨׳ ׳—׳©׳׳ [׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳] ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳¡׳•׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳₪׳•׳× ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳¨׳›׳•, ׳•׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳™׳׳ ׳¢ ׳׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¡׳₪׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳•׳×׳•</h3>
<b>׳”.</b> ׳§׳˜׳ ׳”׳¨׳¢׳‘ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳×, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳•׳×׳• <sup>׳™׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳.</small></small>. ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳¦׳‘ ׳›׳–׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳™׳׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳©׳ ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳™ <sup>׳™׳’</sup><small><small>׳׳£ ׳©׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳׳™׳׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳¢׳‘ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§, ׳"׳ ׳©׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳₪׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳›׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳¢׳‘ ׳¢׳“ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳× ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳’"׳› ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳“ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳©׳ ׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳×.</small></small>, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳–׳׳× ׳¨׳¢׳‘ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳‘׳™׳• ׳—׳•׳–׳¨ ׳׳׳•׳—׳¨ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳”׳›׳ ׳¡׳× ׳•׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳—׳›׳•׳×, ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳“׳•׳—׳§ <sup>׳™׳“</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳.</small></small>.
׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§׳×׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳¨׳™׳‘ ׳™׳׳“ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳’׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” [׳•׳—"׳• ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ !] ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳›׳” ׳•׳¡׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳׳•׳“ ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳•׳›׳ "׳ <sup>׳˜׳•</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳˜ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳© ׳‘׳©׳—׳¨׳™׳×. ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳—׳™׳׳§ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳–׳׳ [׳›׳׳• ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©] ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳×׳ ׳• ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳׳›׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳” ׳׳§׳˜׳, ׳"׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳›' ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳©׳¡׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳¡׳₪׳™׳™׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳–׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳§׳™׳“׳•׳©, ׳•׳™׳"׳¢ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳¢׳• ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳©׳—׳§׳™׳ ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.
<h3> ׳”׳§׳₪׳“׳× ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳§׳˜׳</h3>
<b>׳•.</b> ׳׳¦׳•׳× ׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳×׳× ׳׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳›׳›׳ ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳“׳§׳“׳•׳§׳™׳”׳ <sup>׳˜׳–</sup><small><small>׳¨׳™׳˜׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳‘:, ׳•׳›"׳” ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳– ׳“"׳” ׳›׳“׳™. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¨׳ "׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳“׳¡"׳ ׳©׳™׳•׳¦׳׳™׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳—׳•׳‘׳× ׳—׳™׳ ׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳”׳׳•׳׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳§׳ ׳•׳™ ׳©׳₪׳¡׳•׳ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳”. ׳•׳׳•׳׳™ ׳™׳© ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳“' ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳¢׳׳•׳ ׳”׳§׳˜׳ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳©׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳— ׳“' ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳™׳׳©׳™׳ ׳׳§׳—׳×׳ ׳›׳”׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳“' ׳׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳‘׳’׳“׳׳•׳×׳•, ׳•׳™׳"׳¢.</small></small>, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
- ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳ ׳§׳˜׳, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳˜.
