{{{׳›׳׳׳™ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳×</small></small>}
<h3> ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳”</h3>
<b>׳–.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳‘׳¢׳× ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳’׳•׳£ ׳×׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× <sup>׳™׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¦׳“. ׳•׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳•., ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳ ׳§׳˜ ׳›׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳” ׳–׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳’, ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳“"׳” ׳׳׳›׳•׳] ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳’ [׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳¦׳™׳“׳” ׳׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳׳” ׳‘׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳•], ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳˜' ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'.</small></small>, ׳ ׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳”.
׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳™׳—</sup><small><small>׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳¨' ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳‘. ׳•׳©"׳ , ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳: ׳“"׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳™' ׳“׳¢׳× ׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳”]. ׳•׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ [׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪"׳ ׳”"׳–], ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳“ ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¨"׳— ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳׳”׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ג€“ ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—' ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳“. ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳— ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳•, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¢׳¨"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳׳£ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳£ ׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳].
׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳”, ׳' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳•׳§׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳₪׳™ ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳”׳ ׳ ׳•׳˜׳£ ׳‘׳×׳•׳›׳• ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳׳ ׳• ׳•׳™׳×׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳”. ׳•׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳›' ׳“׳”׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳“׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳•׳"׳› ׳¦"׳¢ ׳׳׳׳™ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳“׳¢׳” ׳–׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳ ׳›' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ "׳ ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳“׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳ ׳•׳˜׳ ׳‘' ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳—׳™׳™׳‘, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳"׳ ׳ ׳§׳˜ ׳׳™׳©׳ ׳ ׳“׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳×׳׳™׳©׳× ׳¦׳™׳₪׳•׳¨׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳—׳׳§׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳•"׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳•׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳¡׳×׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ [׳©׳] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳“׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳¨׳™׳‘"׳© [׳”׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳©"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳] ׳©׳’׳ ׳×׳׳™׳©׳× ׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳׳ ׳™׳§׳•׳™ ׳”׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳©׳›׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳×׳—׳©׳™׳ [׳•׳›׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳’. ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳׳—׳§] ׳•׳"׳› ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳›׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳¦׳"׳’ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳›׳ ׳¢׳©׳• ׳‘׳׳©׳›׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ [׳©׳] ׳›' ׳“׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳¨׳ ׳•׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳”׳¦׳"׳’.</small></small>.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳”׳—׳•׳׳‘ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¦׳¢׳¨׳• ׳©׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳• <sup>׳™׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳‘.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳× ׳׳¨׳”"׳™ ׳׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳× ׳׳׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳™׳¡׳× ׳›׳”׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳× ׳׳ ׳™׳¡׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× <sup>׳›</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳¦׳’: ׳•׳“׳£ ׳¦׳“:.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳›׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳—.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳×׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳™׳¨׳•׳™׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” <sup>׳›׳</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳—׳₪׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳‘׳•׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳ ׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳׳˜׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳ ׳₪׳˜ ׳׳• ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳¡ ׳׳©׳“׳”׳•] ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳¦׳"׳’, ׳›"׳› ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳•. ׳“"׳” ׳”׳—׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳₪׳¨׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳”: ׳“"׳” ׳׳“׳ [׳©׳׳¨"׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳¦׳"׳’ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¨׳׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳“׳₪׳™׳• ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳׳˜׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳•׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳”׳¦׳"׳’ [׳׳£ ׳©׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨].  [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳“, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳©׳ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”]. [׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳"׳© ׳§׳•' ׳”׳¨׳™׳˜׳‘"׳ ׳•׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳–. ׳׳׳׳™ ׳‘׳׳ ׳§׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨, ׳”׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’, ׳•׳™"׳ ׳“׳”׳×׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳”׳₪׳©׳˜׳” ׳׳׳ ׳׳׳˜׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳•׳”׳ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳›׳׳©׳ "׳×].
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳׳•׳— ׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳©׳™׳׳׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳•׳§ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳¦׳"׳’ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳× ׳׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳×׳™׳– ׳׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳›׳ ׳’׳“ ׳¨׳•׳— ׳¨׳¢׳” ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳§׳™"׳’, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳—׳׳‘ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳”.</small></small>. ׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳”׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳©׳×׳׳© ׳‘׳׳₪׳¨׳ <sup>׳›׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳©׳׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳• ׳׳”׳¦׳"׳’ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳•׳‘׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳. ׳•׳׳”׳׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳₪׳™"׳‘ ׳”"׳ ׳•׳‘׳₪"׳— ׳”"׳– ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳”] [׳•׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳›׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳׳—׳׳× ׳©׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘, ׳"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨"׳© ׳©׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨].</small></small>, ׳”׳—׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳‘׳׳¨ ׳ ׳₪׳˜ ׳•׳׳§׳—׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳₪׳˜, ׳”׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳•׳“׳™׳• ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳§׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ [׳׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' <sup>׳›׳’</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳™׳“׳•׳ <b>׳¨׳§</b> ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳©׳‘׳–׳”].
<h3> ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳ ׳¨</h3>
<b>׳˜.</b> ׳”׳׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳”, ׳׳׳ ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳₪׳—׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳. ׳׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳₪׳—׳׳™׳ ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳"׳¦ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” <sup>׳›׳“</sup><small><small>׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳¡׳. [׳‘׳“׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™"׳£] ׳“"׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳•׳׳’"׳ ׳₪׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–. ׳•׳”׳˜׳¢׳, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳›׳ ׳‘׳§׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳• ׳׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳”׳¢' ׳–' ׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳× ׳”׳¨"׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳›׳©׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳”</h3>
<b>׳™.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳¨׳×׳• ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” [׳•׳›׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳×׳” ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–'], ׳׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” [׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳–׳• ׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳”], ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳"׳¦ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳”, ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳׳›׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳׳˜׳¨׳×׳• ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ <sup>׳›׳”</sup><small><small>׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ [׳‘׳’׳׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©"׳¡] ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳’:, ׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳“"׳” ׳“׳׳ [׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳₪׳"׳’ ׳׳ ׳›׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳•׳׳׳× ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳, ׳׳—׳“ ׳׳”׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳‘׳“, ׳׳ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” <sup>׳›׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳–, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳— [׳›׳¨׳‘׳™ ׳©׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳©׳׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳: ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳—׳ ׳•׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳׳’: ׳“"׳” ׳׳•׳“׳” ׳•׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳›׳: ׳“"׳” ׳׳₪׳™, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳¦׳”. ׳“"׳” ׳”׳׳›׳‘׳“. ׳•׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳׳’. ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳›' ׳©׳׳¨' ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳™׳׳”].  ׳•׳‘׳§׳•׳‘"׳© ׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳•. ׳—׳§׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳©׳×׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳• ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳×׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳"׳› ׳”׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳–׳”] ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳©׳•׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳×׳•. ׳•׳ "׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳"׳› ׳’׳ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳›׳׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳©׳×׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳"׳› ׳›׳©׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳©׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳×׳• ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳–׳” ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳—. ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳©׳–׳”׳• ׳©׳•׳¨׳© ׳”׳׳—' ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳—"׳.</small></small> ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” <sup>׳›׳–</sup><small><small>׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳׳ ׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳"׳¦ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳”. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ [׳¢׳' ׳§׳׳•] ׳©׳”׳§' ׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳•׳™׳™׳. ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳”. ׳“"׳” ׳˜׳₪׳™ ׳™"׳ ׳“׳׳”"׳  ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳›׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳—"׳ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳, ׳׳ ׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳ [׳“"׳” ׳˜׳₪׳™] ׳©׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳›׳₪׳× ׳׳™׳” ׳’"׳› ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳• ׳•׳׳×׳ ׳’׳“ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳– ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳"׳› ׳¦"׳¢ ׳׳׳׳™ ׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳›׳₪׳× ׳׳™׳” ׳׳ ׳™׳₪׳˜׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’.
׳•׳‘׳›׳¡"׳ ׳₪"׳ ׳”"׳– [׳”׳•"׳“ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳”׳™׳˜׳‘ ׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳©׳] ׳‘׳™' ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳‘׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳¨׳•׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳“, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳™׳© ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳. ׳•׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳” ׳”׳₪׳•׳›׳” ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨.</small></small> [׳•׳–׳”׳• "׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳" <sup>׳›׳—</sup><small><small>׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳›׳©׳—׳•׳×׳ ׳׳× ׳¨׳׳© ׳”׳₪׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳©׳—׳§ ׳‘׳¨׳׳© ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳™׳” ׳©׳™׳׳•׳×.</small></small>].
׳•׳׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳’׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ג€“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳¨׳™׳¥ ׳‘׳׳“׳׳” <sup>׳›׳˜</sup><small><small>׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳•, ׳‘׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳ ׳” ׳•׳‘׳—׳•׳¥ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳¨׳© [׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳”׳§׳“׳׳×׳• ׳׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳–].</small></small> ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳’׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳—׳₪׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳—׳¨׳™׳¥, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳¨׳™׳¥ ׳‘׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳–, ׳' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳‘׳™׳“׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ [׳•׳¢׳“׳™׳£ ׳׳™׳™׳—׳“ ׳׳›׳ "׳׳‘׳¨׳©׳× ׳©׳‘׳×" ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳× <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳– [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳—] ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>] ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳”׳©׳™׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳§׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳×, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨. ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¢"׳“ ׳‘׳™' ׳“׳׳¨׳™׳‘"׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳×׳׳•׳© ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳"׳› ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳©׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳”׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢"׳™ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“ ׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳¨, ׳•׳׳ ׳“׳׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¨ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳—"׳ ׳“׳”׳×׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳‘׳•. [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳ "׳].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× "׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳"</h3>
<b>׳™׳‘.</b> ׳”׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡ ׳׳—׳¦׳׳× ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳•׳¨׳× ׳•׳”׳“׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳”, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳׳—׳¦׳׳× ׳—׳•׳¨ ׳§׳˜׳ ׳•׳”׳“׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳׳× ׳׳׳ ׳•, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳•׳¨׳¡׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳׳“׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳¨, ׳©׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• "׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳" ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳•׳“׳׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳“׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳™׳™׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳©׳ <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳—, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳“"׳” ׳©׳׳. ׳•׳–"׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳˜׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳”: '׳“׳›׳ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳¦׳“ ׳¨׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳™׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳©׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳™׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳›׳'. ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳ ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳›׳׳” ׳¨׳׳™׳•׳×, ׳¢׳™"׳©.</small></small>.
׳”׳׳¡׳×׳¨׳§ ׳•׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳•׳¡׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳×׳•׳׳© ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳‘׳›׳׳׳•׳× ׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ "׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳" ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘ <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳ "׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ [׳•׳׳©"׳› ׳•׳¦"׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳ ׳›"׳› ׳₪׳¡"׳§ ׳©׳™׳×׳׳©׳•, ׳•׳‘׳׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳¨]. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳× ׳¨׳™׳‘"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳¦"׳“] ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•"׳¡ ׳©"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¡׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳•׳¨׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳×׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳›׳ ׳¡׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳¢׳” ׳’׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳¡׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳× ׳•׳‘׳׳”׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳¦׳” ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”</h3>
<b>׳™׳’.</b> ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳”׳׳׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”'] ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳¢׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳”. ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× ׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳“׳׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳×׳•׳¡' ׳“׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳›׳₪׳× ׳׳™׳” ׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”. ׳•׳›"׳” ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳– ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳˜ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜ ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳–.</small></small>, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳–׳™׳§ ׳׳• ׳•׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳] ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳”׳¨"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳₪' ׳©׳׳•׳ ׳” ׳©׳¨׳¦׳™׳ [׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳׳. ׳‘׳“׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™"׳£] ׳•׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳•. ׳“"׳” ׳”׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳—' ׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳•׳¨"׳× ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳—"׳, ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳™"׳—, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›' ׳¡׳×׳ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳›׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳™׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳’' ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳‘"׳™ ׳•׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳—"׳. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳ [׳׳’"׳ ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳’], ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳“ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ [׳׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳’. ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳׳¨׳¢׳ ׳•׳‘׳“׳£ ׳¢׳”. ׳“"׳” ׳˜׳₪׳™] ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳§׳׳§׳ [׳׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳, ׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–], ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳׳•׳× ׳“ ׳“"׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳—׳”"׳© [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘] ׳“׳—׳™׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳™׳›׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳×׳¢׳¡׳§.</small></small>, ׳•׳–׳”׳• "׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”".
<h3> ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳“.</b> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳ - ׳©׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳×׳™׳¢׳©׳”- ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳”, ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ [׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳–׳• ׳׳—' ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳©׳] ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳–, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳“׳’׳•׳ ׳׳¨׳‘׳‘׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ - ׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ "׳”׳‘׳”׳™׳¨"].
׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳›' ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳₪׳™' ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳’׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳”׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳—׳¨׳™׳¥, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳•׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳©׳×׳™' ׳›׳ ׳׳× ׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳’׳' [׳”׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳˜].  ׳•׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ [׳‘׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳—] ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳” ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳©׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳•׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳׳׳ ׳™"׳ ׳›׳׳©׳ "׳× ׳©׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳©׳ ׳”׳ ׳§׳‘ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳•׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“. [׳׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳ ׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳“׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳, ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳• ׳©׳“׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“, ׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¨׳“׳›׳™ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳, ׳•׳"׳ ׳’׳ ׳”׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳¡"׳ ׳׳—׳׳§ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳ "׳].</small></small> [׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” !].
׳•׳׳£ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳– ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳”׳§׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳–׳” <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–, ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳— ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×.</small></small>.
׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ג€“ ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳×׳™ ׳¡׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳ ׳׳—׳× ׳׳”׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳׳× ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ג€“ ׳׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳ [׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”] <sup>׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳›' ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳ ׳׳”׳׳›׳”, ׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳£ ׳׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳“׳¢׳•׳ ׳’ ׳©׳‘׳×, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳‘ ׳›' ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”.</small></small>, ׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳₪׳§׳₪׳§׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” <sup>׳׳</sup><small><small>׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳ ׳₪׳§׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳• ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳', ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳˜"׳• ׳©׳¡׳×׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳.  ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳¢׳] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳•׳§׳¨ ׳¢׳׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳•׳׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳׳׳׳™׳” [׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳], ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’, ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳’׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳•׳¡׳₪׳¡׳ ׳“׳”׳×׳ ׳׳™׳™׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳—׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳§׳׳§׳ ׳•׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ (׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳•: ׳•׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳) ׳•׳׳¢׳₪"׳› ׳׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.  ׳•׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳׳•׳ ׳ ׳¨ ׳“׳•׳׳§ ׳›׳©׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳×׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳ ׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳–, ׳'] ׳•׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳—׳׳™׳ ׳"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ [׳•׳©׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳™׳׳]. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨</h3>
<b>׳˜׳•.</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳©׳×׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨, ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ <sup>׳׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳•׳¡׳§"׳” ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳™. ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳›׳׳ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳ ׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳׳‘׳“ ׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳•׳’׳¢׳™׳ ׳׳›׳׳׳™ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳×. ׳•׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳•.</small></small>.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳¡׳¨׳§ ׳׳• ׳׳× ׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳¢"׳™ ׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳©׳¢׳¨׳•׳×, ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳׳–׳” <sup>׳׳’</sup><small><small>׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳©׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳×׳™׳“׳׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳”׳“׳׳×, ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳©׳–"׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳™׳× ׳‘׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳©׳•׳™ ׳”׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳×׳—׳™׳׳×׳• ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳” ׳–׳•, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘. </small></small>.
<h3> ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳©׳¢׳‘׳¨ [׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳”׳§׳™׳™׳]</h3>
<b>׳˜׳–.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳× ׳”׳׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳™׳’׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳ ׳™׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳”, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳”, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” <sup>׳׳“</sup><small><small>׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳›׳. ׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳”׳ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳¨׳׳™׳™׳× ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳׳˜"׳– ׳”׳™׳ ׳׳׳¦׳¨׳£ ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳©׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™', ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•' ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳˜"׳– ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳—׳׳‘ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™', ׳•׳’׳ ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳’׳¨ ׳“׳׳× ׳›׳©׳׳¡׳•׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳—׳“׳¨ ׳׳›׳— ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳׳£ ׳©׳¦׳™׳“׳× ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™', ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳§׳˜"׳– ׳”׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳× ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳˜"׳–.</small></small>.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳”׳¨׳•׳׳” ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳•׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳’׳™׳¨׳”, ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳”׳₪׳¨׳™׳— ׳”׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ <sup>׳׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳“ ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳™׳“׳×׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳’'].</small></small> ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳©׳ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳•, ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳—׳₪׳© ׳‘׳׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳׳¨׳• ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳. ׳•׳–׳”׳• "׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳¨׳™׳©׳™׳” ׳“׳׳©׳¢׳‘׳¨", ׳›׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳• ׳׳ <sup>׳׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳₪"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳•', ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳“׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳™׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳™' ׳׳•׳× ׳˜. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳˜' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¨׳—׳•׳¥ ׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳™׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳¢׳¨, ׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' [׳›׳”׳¨׳™׳‘"׳© ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳] ׳"׳› ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳¨, ׳•׳׳™ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳¦"׳ ׳‘׳' ׳׳’' ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳™׳: ׳. ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳£ ׳”׳˜"׳– ׳׳¡׳¨, ׳•׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳‘׳˜ ׳©׳˜׳—׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳–׳‘׳•׳‘׳™׳. ׳‘. ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳–׳™׳׳•׳×׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳”. ׳’. ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳×׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ [׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳"׳ ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳”]. ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳“׳׳× ׳׳§׳¨׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳“׳׳§ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳¨׳׳•׳¡׳˜׳˜ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳›׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳× ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳” ׳”׳׳¦׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳•׳¢, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳×׳§׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳×׳¢׳¡׳§</h3>
<b>׳™׳–.</b> ׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳“׳¨׳’׳•׳× ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳¡׳§:
BB׳. ׳ ׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳—׳×׳•׳ ׳™׳¨׳§ ׳×׳׳•׳© ׳©׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳•׳—׳×׳ ׳™׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳׳• ׳ ׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳™׳¨׳§ ׳×׳׳•׳© ׳©׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳•׳¢׳§׳¨ ׳™׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ <sup>׳׳–</sup><small><small>׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳•׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘:, ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳×׳™ ׳›׳ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳₪׳™' ׳›׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳‘׳©׳’׳’׳•׳× ׳₪"׳‘ ׳”"׳–]- ׳›"׳› ׳”׳¨׳׳© ׳™׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳”׳¦׳"׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘: ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳"׳  ׳‘׳›׳¨׳™׳×׳•׳× ׳“׳£ ׳™׳˜: ׳“"׳” ׳׳”׳’׳‘׳™׳” ׳•׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳©׳” ׳—"׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳¡' ׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳”' [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡' ׳”׳׳₪׳×׳— ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳].</small></small>, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳—׳˜׳׳× <sup>׳׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘: ׳•׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳ ׳”"׳— ׳•׳‘׳”׳' ׳©׳’׳’׳•׳× ׳₪"׳‘ ׳”"׳– ׳•׳‘׳₪"׳– ׳”׳™"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜.</small></small>, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳ <sup>׳׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ [׳—"׳ ׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳—'] ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳—׳•׳•׳× ׳“׳¢׳× ׳©׳”׳׳×׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳•׳¡"׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳§׳¨׳‘׳ [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳¨׳©"׳™ ׳“׳£ ׳¦׳–. ׳“"׳” ׳“׳׳“׳׳™ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳׳™׳׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳ ׳₪׳™׳׳× ׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳™׳›׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳—׳˜׳׳× ׳“׳׳×׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳”]. ׳•׳‘׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳. </small></small>. 
׳‘. ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳“׳¢ ׳•׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳׳• ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳×׳¢׳¡׳§ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳—׳˜׳׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳“׳¢ ׳׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳×. ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳›׳׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳ ׳©׳¢׳ ׳¢׳ ׳§׳™׳¨ ׳•׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳׳×׳’ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳–׳” <sup>׳ </sup><small><small>׳©׳•"׳× ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳©׳.</small></small>.EE
׳–׳¨׳§ ׳›׳“׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳§׳™׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳˜׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳×׳’ ׳—׳©׳׳ ׳•׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳•, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳™׳” ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳©׳”׳›׳“׳•׳¨ ׳™׳₪׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳׳×׳’ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳¨׳™׳§׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳–׳׳× ׳₪׳’׳¢ ׳‘׳׳×׳’ ׳׳ ׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳©׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ [׳”׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳].
<h3> ׳׳§׳׳§׳</h3>
<b>׳™׳—.</b> ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳”׳•, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳§׳׳§׳•׳ ׳™׳© ׳‘׳›׳ [׳׳• ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳¨׳§ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™], ׳׳– ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳™"׳¦ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™', ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳׳§׳ <sup>׳ ׳</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳ ׳”׳™"׳–. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳’׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳•׳׳£ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳‘׳’׳”"׳© ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳’:].  ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳¨׳§ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™ ׳’"׳› ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳×׳‘׳›׳• ׳§׳©׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳¨׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳• ׳›׳©׳”׳ ׳¢׳ ׳¨׳’׳׳• ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳§׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳”׳©׳¨׳•׳›׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳¨׳’׳, ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™, ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳”׳׳©׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳›׳׳‘׳•' ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳•׳—׳§ ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳“"׳” ׳“׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳×׳™׳¨.</small></small>.
׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳—׳₪׳¥ [׳׳£ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳”׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳”] ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳.
׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳׳§׳•׳, ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳ ׳‘</sup><small><small>׳׳•"׳© ׳₪"׳’ ׳׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳•׳§׳”"׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳•׳׳’"׳˜ ׳—׳•׳¨׳© ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳•׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳¡׳§"׳™.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳™׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳©׳ "׳׳׳׳›׳”"</h3>
<b>׳™׳˜.</b> ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳×׳¨׳” ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳×׳’׳¨׳•׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” !], ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳—׳¡׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳ "׳׳׳׳›׳”", ׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳₪׳—׳™׳×׳•׳× ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳”׳¢׳“׳¨ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳¢׳™׳ ׳™ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳× ׳©׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳×׳• ׳׳×׳™׳™׳—׳¡׳× ׳•׳׳©׳×׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳©׳×׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳•׳׳×׳™׳™׳—׳¡׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ [׳›׳׳•׳׳¨, ׳©׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” <b>׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳”</b> ׳׳©׳×׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳×, ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳‘׳” ׳¦׳“׳“׳™׳× ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳•׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳•׳×׳¨׳×].
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳× ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳©׳•׳׳¨׳” ׳׳׳›׳׳•׳, ׳׳£ ׳©׳¢"׳™ ׳”׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳ ׳•׳¦׳¨׳× ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳ ׳©׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳–׳¨ ׳—׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳§ ׳©׳‘׳׳¨׳¥ ׳›׳“׳™ ׳׳›׳¡׳•׳×׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳₪׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳£ ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳™׳™׳׳—׳§׳• ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳¢"׳’ ׳”׳‘׳™׳¦׳” <sup>׳ ׳’</sup><small><small>׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“. ׳“׳™׳ ׳₪׳™׳–׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳§ ׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳•׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳”. ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳₪׳׳₪׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“ [׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳“׳¡"׳ ׳”׳›׳™] ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳™"׳’ ׳“׳•׳¨׳¡ ׳©׳׳’ ׳‘׳¨׳’׳׳™׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳•׳©׳© ׳•׳‘׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳‘׳™' ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳›׳, ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳’׳¨׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳¢׳₪"׳› ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳.  ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳׳’. ׳×׳•׳“"׳” ׳׳׳׳˜׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳”׳ ׳—׳× ׳—׳‘׳™׳•׳× ׳–׳” ׳¢"׳’ ׳–׳” ׳›׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳׳•׳”׳, ׳•׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳”׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳•, ׳•' ׳“"׳” ׳׳. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳•׳”׳ [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳׳’. ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳–׳”. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳• ׳¡׳§׳™"׳] ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳›׳— ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳“׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳₪׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳™. ׳•׳“׳£ ׳™׳: ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳“׳•׳¨׳›׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳’׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳‘׳•׳“׳•.
׳•׳‘׳§׳”"׳™ [׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳‘'] ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”׳•, ׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳’: ׳“"׳” ׳•׳¦׳¨׳™׳, ׳¢׳™"׳©, ׳•׳׳”׳׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳—׳•׳˜ ׳›׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳©׳׳§׳•׳× ׳›׳©׳¡׳•׳—׳˜׳ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳ [׳׳¨׳•׳§׳ ׳׳× ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳] ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳” ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳™׳¦׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳™ ׳’׳ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳¡׳—׳˜׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳׳›׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳‘׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳™׳˜: ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳‘׳¡׳•׳›׳” ׳“׳£ ׳׳’. ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳¢׳˜׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™ ׳”׳”׳“׳¡ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳×׳§׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳™ ׳׳™׳× ׳׳™׳” ׳”׳•׳©׳¢׳ ׳ ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳×׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳”׳¢׳¨׳•׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›' ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳•׳”׳¨"׳ ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳›׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳©ײµ׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳׳™׳¢׳•׳˜ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™ ׳”׳”׳“׳¡ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳–׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳”׳“׳¡ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳”׳“׳¡ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳"׳› ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳׳× ׳׳™׳¢׳•׳˜ ׳”׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳– ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳”׳’׳“׳¨׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳. ׳•׳‘׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳©׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳–׳׳–׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳¢׳ ׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳›׳ ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳™"׳‘ ׳”"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳—"׳ ׳©׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳•, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©.
׳•׳”׳ ׳”, ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳›׳ ׳”׳§׳•׳©׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳׳˜׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳’׳‘׳× ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳₪׳׳₪׳׳™׳ ׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳— ׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳. ׳•׳‘׳¨"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳: [׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳”׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳–, ׳‘'] ׳׳—׳¨׳™ ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳”, ׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘ ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳“׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳׳׳₪׳•׳× ׳¢"׳’ ׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳₪׳׳ ׳׳“׳™"׳© ׳•׳›׳™׳•׳¦׳ ׳‘׳” ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳—׳׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳׳§ ׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳׳• ׳©׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳×׳—׳׳.
׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳“׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳©׳×׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳›׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳©׳”׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳©׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳•׳¢"׳› ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳”׳˜׳׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳₪׳׳ ׳׳“׳™"׳© ׳׳¦׳ ׳”׳׳©, ׳•׳›׳¢׳™"׳– ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳₪׳׳₪׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳₪׳׳₪׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳•׳׳“׳× ׳¨׳™׳— ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳¢׳•׳׳ ׳”׳׳•׳׳™׳“ ׳¨׳™׳— ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳”. ׳׳ ׳‘׳’׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳•׳¡׳₪׳¡׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳© ׳׳• ׳׳’׳¨׳™׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳× ׳—׳¨׳™׳¥ ׳¨׳§ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ [׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳•׳¨׳©׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳˜׳” ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳¨׳’׳™׳, ׳"׳ ׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳© ׳׳—׳¨׳™׳©׳” ׳׳• ׳׳’׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳ ׳׳¡׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳—׳™׳¦׳•׳ ׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳’׳¨׳™׳¨׳”, ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳—׳•׳¨׳© ׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳’׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳–׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳׳”, ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳©׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳׳׳©׳׳© ׳‘׳¦׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳₪׳™ ׳”׳˜׳‘׳¢׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳‘, ׳–'] ׳׳£ ׳©׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳¢׳•׳¡׳§ ׳¢׳×׳” ׳‘׳”׳©׳¨׳× ׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳"׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳© ׳’׳ ׳׳׳©׳׳•׳© ׳‘׳¢׳׳׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳”׳©׳¨׳× ׳ ׳™׳׳™׳ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳׳ ׳¢"׳’ ׳§׳¨׳— ׳׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳§׳¨׳— ׳"׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳© ׳‘׳”׳›׳¨׳— ׳›׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳™׳›׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳¨׳™׳¡׳•׳§ ׳”׳§׳¨׳— ׳•׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳₪׳¡"׳¨. ׳•׳›׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳₪׳™׳–׳•׳¨ ׳—׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳§׳¨׳§׳¢ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳© ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳"׳› ׳׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳–׳”.
׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳• ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳£ ׳©׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳׳—׳§׳• ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× [׳׳£ ׳׳™ ׳ ׳™׳׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳ ׳™׳—׳ ׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ (׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳’׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳ ׳¢"׳ ׳׳›׳×׳•׳‘)] ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳׳£ ׳׳—׳“ ׳‘׳׳—׳™׳§׳× ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳© ׳׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨׳—"׳§ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳›׳™׳׳× ׳׳©׳›׳•׳׳™׳× ׳‘׳›׳₪׳™׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳¡׳—׳˜ ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳׳™׳¥ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳×׳• ׳”׳™׳ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳×׳₪׳¨׳©׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳׳›׳™׳׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳©׳×׳™׳™׳ ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳¡׳—׳™׳˜׳× ׳”׳₪׳¨׳™. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳“ ׳•׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳– ׳•׳—"׳™ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡'.
׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳™׳©"׳ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳¨׳—׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳₪׳×׳—׳™ ׳‘׳ ׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳¦׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳•׳¡׳¨׳˜ ׳›׳©׳”׳•׳׳ ׳©׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳™׳׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳₪׳¥ ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳, ׳׳׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳›׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳›׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳ ׳׳¦׳׳׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳׳¡׳ [׳›׳׳• ׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳”׳¢׳×׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¢׳”"׳‘ ׳”׳׳¡׳¨׳™׳˜ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳—׳©׳© ׳’׳ ׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳›׳™׳•"׳‘] ׳›׳™ ׳׳– ׳¨׳¦׳•׳ ׳• ׳‘׳”׳¡׳¨׳˜׳”. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳›׳׳•' ׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳–׳” ׳׳¢׳©׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳£ ׳©׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳׳—׳§׳• ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳”׳¢' ׳"׳“] (׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳¡׳¨׳• ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳©).
[׳•׳™׳© ׳׳”׳§׳©׳•׳× ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳©׳׳¡׳¨ ׳׳¨׳•׳¥ ׳¢"׳’ ׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳’׳‘׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳“׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳×׳׳©׳• ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¦׳×׳•, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳× ׳¨׳™׳¦׳” ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳ ׳׳©׳×׳™׳™׳›׳× ׳׳×׳׳™׳©׳”, ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳ ׳”׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳"׳¨ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳©׳ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳×׳׳™׳©׳× ׳”׳¢׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳›׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳׳¨׳•׳¥. ׳•׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳"׳— ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳•׳¡ ׳ ׳׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳›׳• ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳׳“׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳›׳•].
׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳™׳™׳©׳‘ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳•: ׳©׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳ ׳¢׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳× ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳™׳•׳“׳¢ ׳©׳™׳© ׳¦׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×, [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳—' ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳˜׳׳× ׳"׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳› ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“].
׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳§׳׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳¨׳׳™׳•׳× ׳׳–׳”.</small></small>.
[׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳‘׳׳• ׳›׳׳” ׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳•׳‘׳¢׳•׳× ׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳–׳”, ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳”, ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳§׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳׳©׳׳•׳ ׳׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳”׳•׳¨׳׳”, ׳©׳‘׳§׳ ׳׳©׳×׳ ׳” ׳׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳•׳׳—׳™׳•׳‘ !].
<h3> ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™</h3>
<b>׳›.</b> ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳™׳×׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳—׳“ ׳׳©׳×׳™ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳™׳•׳×: <b>׳</b>. ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳₪׳¢׳•׳׳” ג€“ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” <b>׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳”</b> ׳‘׳׳¨׳₪׳§׳• ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ <sup>׳ ׳“</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳™"׳‘ ׳”׳™"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–' ׳“"׳” ׳›׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳–, ׳•׳¢׳¢"׳© ׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳”׳¡"׳§. ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳”׳—"׳ ׳•׳”׳‘"׳© ׳‘׳׳”"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳›"׳’ ׳©׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳¨׳” ׳×׳•׳¨׳” [׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳™׳’: ׳—׳’׳™׳’׳” ׳“׳£ ׳™:] ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳’"׳˜ ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳”.</small></small>, ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳” ׳•׳›׳‘׳¨׳” ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ [׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ <sup>׳ ׳”</sup><small><small>׳׳”׳¨"׳— ׳׳•"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳˜׳¢׳׳, ׳©׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳”, ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳׳• ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ [׳•׳›׳ ׳›׳™׳•"׳‘] ׳©׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳– ׳”׳•׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳.</small></small>]. <b>׳‘</b>. ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¢׳¦׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ג€“ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳§׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳׳—׳•׳™ ׳׳• ׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳• ׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳—׳™׳ ׳” ׳•׳›׳“׳•׳׳” <sup>׳ ׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳’. ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳¢׳©׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™, ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳§׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“.</small></small>.
׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳׳©׳¨ ׳™׳© ׳©׳׳© ׳׳₪׳©׳¨׳•׳™׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳׳›׳”: ׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳”׳¨׳’׳™׳׳”, ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳” [׳•׳׳– ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳] ׳•׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳£ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳׳– ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳’׳׳¨׳™ <sup>׳ ׳–</sup><small><small>׳‘"׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'.</small></small> ׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳: ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳‘׳™׳“׳• (׳•׳’׳ ׳׳׳׳×׳¨, ׳•׳׳•׳›׳ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳•׳׳×) ׳©׳•׳—׳§ ׳₪׳׳₪׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳§׳× ׳”׳¡׳›׳™׳ [׳•׳‘׳§׳¢׳¨׳”], ׳•׳‘׳“׳•׳׳” ׳׳–׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳§׳©׳™׳¨׳× ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳”׳“׳™׳•׳˜ ׳׳™׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“.
׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ <b>׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</b> ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” <sup>׳ ׳—</sup><small><small>׳”׳›׳¨׳¢׳× ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳ "׳–.</small></small>.
׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” <sup>׳ ׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳’. ׳•׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“, ׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳.</b> ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳” ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳׳× ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳¡</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳™"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳“' ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳—.</small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳§׳™׳•׳ ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳, ׳™"׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳”׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳•׳™"׳ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳” ׳׳”׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳×׳׳™׳“ <sup>׳¡׳</sup><small><small>׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳— [׳•׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳‘׳™׳׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳©׳ ׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳×׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳׳× ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳“׳£ ׳§׳‘:].
׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳"׳– ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳׳₪׳¨׳•׳›׳× ׳¢׳ ׳¡׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳•׳׳›׳׳•' ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳›׳׳, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳›'.</small></small>.
׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳׳× ׳׳׳ <b>׳©׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳”</b> ׳©׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“׳× ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨׳× <sup>׳¡׳‘</sup><small><small>׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳›׳×׳•׳‘׳•׳× ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳•׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳“׳׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳ ׳•"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳’' [׳¢׳™' ׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳˜"׳– ׳©׳] ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳– [׳׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳—׳׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳“׳™׳׳•׳™ ׳“׳׳× ׳׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳¡׳₪׳¨] ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳× ׳₪׳™ ׳”׳×׳ ׳•׳¨ ׳”׳©׳¨׳•׳§ ׳‘׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳§׳"׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳›׳™׳¡׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳–' ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳©׳›' ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳¨׳׳•׳™ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳™׳׳•׳© ׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳›׳‘׳×׳•, ׳¢׳™"׳©, ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳”׳’׳¨"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›'.
׳׳ ׳™׳"׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳”׳' ׳›׳•׳×׳‘ [׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳—] ׳”׳‘׳׳ ׳• ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳“׳•׳“ ׳—׳•׳ ׳‘׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×׳™׳• ׳ ׳¦׳‘׳¢׳•׳× ׳›׳©׳׳•׳“׳“ ׳—׳•׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳©׳”׳׳“׳—׳•׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“, ׳•׳׳£ ׳©׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳©׳™׳¦׳‘׳¢׳• ׳”׳׳•׳×׳™׳•׳×, ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳“׳׳× ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳”׳™׳₪׳×׳— ׳•׳׳”׳™׳¡׳’׳¨ ׳¨׳•׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳× ׳”׳‘׳™׳× ׳•׳׳¢׳₪"׳› ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“׳× ׳׳›׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳׳× ׳׳׳ ׳©׳”׳׳“׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳—׳•׳©׳‘ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳” ׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳§׳¦׳¨, ׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳‘׳—׳׳§ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳¡׳’</sup><small><small>׳₪׳©׳•׳˜ ׳©׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳§׳™׳•׳׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳×׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳‘׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳¢"׳ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳• ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳¢"׳ ׳׳”׳—׳–׳™׳¨ ׳׳×׳¢׳¨׳•׳‘׳× (׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳‘׳•׳¨׳¨ ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳”׳¨׳©"׳’ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳– ׳•׳‘׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳§"׳˜ ׳׳•׳× ׳— ׳•׳‘׳¦׳™"׳ ׳—"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳” ׳׳•׳× ׳“, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳)]. ׳•׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳×׳ ׳ ׳׳“׳“׳× ׳‘׳§׳™׳•׳׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳•׳׳”"׳˜ ׳‘׳§׳•׳©׳¨ ׳×׳׳•׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳×׳• [׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳‘׳ ׳™ ׳׳“׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳“"׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳©׳¨] ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳§׳¨׳™׳¢׳× ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨׳"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳’' ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¢"׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳•.
׳•׳‘׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳©׳¢׳” ׳›' ׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳׳™ [׳‘׳₪' ׳›׳׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳‘׳₪' ׳”׳‘׳•׳ ׳”] ׳©׳׳ ׳—׳•׳©׳‘ ׳׳₪׳¨׳§׳• ׳׳—"׳› ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳•׳”׳¨׳׳™׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳§ ׳”׳׳©׳›׳, ׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳, ׳‘׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳¢"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳×׳₪׳׳¨"׳™ ׳‘׳›׳׳›׳׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳•׳”׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳™ ׳׳•׳× ׳™׳’ ׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳©׳”׳‘׳‘׳׳™ ׳—׳•׳׳§ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳׳™ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳"׳ ׳›׳•׳•׳×׳™׳” ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳•"׳© ׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪"׳™ ׳”׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳”"׳© ׳‘׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳‘׳”׳' ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳׳×׳§׳™׳׳× ׳›' ׳©׳›׳ ׳’׳ ׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳‘׳‘׳׳™ ׳•׳›׳×׳‘׳• ׳“׳”׳›׳™ ׳§׳™׳™׳"׳ ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳‘׳ ׳•׳‘"׳™ ׳×׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳' ׳©׳›' ׳©׳”׳₪׳•׳×׳— ׳׳˜׳¨׳™׳” ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳§׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™׳׳”.
׳•׳‘׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳•׳׳—׳™׳§׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳‘׳×׳©׳•׳‘׳” ׳§׳™"׳˜ ׳©׳”׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳—׳•׳“׳™ ׳”׳“׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳›׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳—"׳› ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳£ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳›׳™ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳₪׳×׳™׳—׳” ׳•׳¡׳’׳™׳¨׳” ׳×׳׳™׳“׳™׳™׳, ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳›׳™ ׳—׳•׳©׳‘ ׳׳₪׳•׳×׳—׳• ׳׳—"׳›, ׳•׳“׳™׳™׳§ ׳”׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳™ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳™׳© ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” [׳•׳’׳ ׳‘׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” ׳׳₪׳©"׳ ׳©׳§׳™׳•׳ ׳”׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” - ׳׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳¦׳₪׳ ׳× ׳₪׳¢׳ ׳— ׳‘׳”׳©׳׳׳” ׳¢׳' 12 ׳©׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳›׳™ ׳”׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳—׳׳™׳׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳‘׳¨׳× ׳”׳›׳×׳‘, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳“׳•׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳”׳׳‘׳ "׳–], ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¡"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳‘׳₪׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳¢"׳ ׳׳׳—׳•׳§ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳‘׳›׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳§׳™׳™׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳¡"׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳"׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳₪׳×׳•׳— ׳•׳׳¡׳’׳•׳¨ ׳×׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳×׳—׳™׳׳” ׳¨׳¦׳” ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳”׳׳™ ׳˜׳¢׳׳ ׳•׳׳‘׳¡׳•׳£ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳׳.
׳•׳‘׳×׳•׳¡' ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¦׳“: ׳“"׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳׳•׳¨׳’ ׳‘׳§׳•׳׳¢׳× ׳©׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳”, ׳•׳₪׳¡׳§׳• ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳’, ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳ ׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳׳¡׳×׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¦׳“ ׳¢׳¦׳׳• [׳•׳›"׳› ׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳׳–׳], ׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳©׳׳× ׳׳“׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳›"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳‘׳ "׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳¨"׳™ ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳×׳¡׳×׳•׳¨ ׳”׳§׳׳™׳¢׳”, ׳•׳׳₪׳™"׳– ׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳©׳’׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳›׳™ ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳§׳™׳•׳׳• ׳—׳׳§ ׳׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳¨׳•׳’ ׳•׳׳—׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳•׳¢׳•׳׳“ ׳›׳. [׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳’"׳˜ ׳׳•׳₪׳” ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳׳•׳× ׳™].
׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳׳ "׳— ׳׳•׳¡׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳–׳¨׳™׳¢׳” ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳–׳•׳¨׳¢ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳™׳˜׳׳• ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳©׳™׳©׳¨׳™׳© ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳©׳—׳™׳™׳‘, ׳¢"׳© ׳׳©"׳› ׳׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳׳”׳™׳¨׳•׳©׳׳׳™ ׳”׳ "׳ ׳•׳“׳ ׳‘׳–׳”.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨</h3>
<b>׳›׳‘</b>. ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳× ׳׳• ׳×׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳©׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳—׳˜׳׳× <sup>׳¡׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳¢׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳¡׳§"׳’. ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳§"׳.  ׳•׳‘׳₪׳"׳’ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳• [׳‘׳"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ [׳¡׳§׳›"׳’] ׳¦׳™׳¨׳£ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳׳™׳ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳” ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳›׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳•׳‘׳©׳׳¨ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳.  ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳׳•׳× ׳׳—׳× ׳•׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳₪׳¨, ׳×׳₪׳¨ ׳×׳₪׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳•׳”׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳—׳˜׳׳× <sup>׳¡׳”</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳™"׳ ׳”"׳˜ ׳•׳₪"׳˜ ׳”׳™"׳—, ׳•׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳, ׳'. ׳•׳‘׳™' ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳¢"׳₪ ׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳™׳ [׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳˜ ׳•׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳©׳] ׳©׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳•׳ ׳—׳™׳¡׳¨׳•׳ ׳‘׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳¢"׳› ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳—׳©׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳‘"׳‘ ׳“׳£ ׳ ׳”: ׳©׳‘׳™' ׳©׳—׳¦׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳₪׳˜׳•׳¨ ׳“׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳¡׳¨׳” ׳×׳•׳¨׳”, ׳•׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳׳׳›׳× ׳׳—׳©׳‘׳×. </small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳’׳•׳–׳– ׳©׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳‘׳ ׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳—׳•׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳×׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘.
<h3> ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳”</h3>
<b>׳›׳’.</b> ׳©׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳©׳• ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳׳” ׳׳”׳™׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳”׳™׳” ׳׳—׳“ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳”׳©׳ ׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳, ׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳•׳–׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳¡׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳–, ׳”' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳“.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ <sup>׳¡׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳›"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳“׳’׳¨׳ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳”. ׳•׳¦"׳¢ ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳"׳ ׳©׳¦׳™׳“׳“ ׳“׳׳¨׳•׳‘ ׳”׳׳—׳¨׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳ ׳₪׳¡׳™׳“׳, ׳׳ ׳¢׳›"׳₪ ׳’׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳›׳¨׳™׳¢ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳“׳׳™.</small></small>. [׳•׳‘׳™׳•"׳˜ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ <sup>׳¡׳—</sup><small><small>׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳§׳"׳.</small></small>].
׳•׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳ ׳–׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳׳׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” <sup>׳¡׳˜</sup><small><small>׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳׳”׳©׳׳¢׳× ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳›׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳–׳¨ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—] ׳•׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳׳’"׳ [׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘] ׳©׳”׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳—׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳₪׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳׳׳׳™׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳¨׳׳. ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳ ׳•׳×׳ ׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳•׳”׳™׳ ׳׳×׳‘׳©׳׳× ׳׳׳׳™׳” ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳¨׳׳. ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳–׳•׳¨׳” ׳•׳¨׳•׳— ׳׳¡׳™׳¢׳×׳• [׳‘׳‘"׳§ ׳“׳£ ׳¡.] ׳©׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳•׳•׳ ׳×׳• ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳×. [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳™׳—. ׳׳•׳× ׳¨ ׳•׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳‘׳”׳’׳”׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳“׳׳ ׳›׳”׳׳‘׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳–׳¨, ׳׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳›׳ ׳¦׳•׳¨׳×׳ ׳‘׳׳©׳›׳]. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳×׳‘׳•׳׳” ׳•׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳×׳‘׳•׳׳” ׳ ׳˜׳—׳ ׳× ׳׳™׳“ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳–׳׳ ׳”׳׳ ׳׳– ׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳׳• ׳”׳•׳™ ׳’׳¨׳׳. ׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳‘ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳’׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳¢"׳₪ ׳©׳’"׳› ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳’׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™, ׳©׳ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨ ׳”׳©׳™׳™׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳”׳• ׳׳×׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳׳– ׳”׳•׳™ ׳’׳¨׳׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳–׳” ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳–: ׳“"׳” ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳‘׳™' ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳₪׳¡׳™׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳© ׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳׳™׳, ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳—׳”"׳© ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™' ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳‘׳™׳‘ ׳׳“׳׳™׳§׳”, ׳•׳™"׳ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳׳¢׳׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳×׳—׳× ׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳׳§׳‘׳ ׳ ׳™׳¦׳•׳¦׳•׳× ׳”׳ ׳™׳×׳–׳™׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳¨ ׳©׳™׳›׳‘׳• ׳©׳, ׳׳‘׳ ׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳—׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳׳¨׳™׳—׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳˜׳•׳—׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳׳™׳”׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳™׳“ ׳›׳©׳׳›׳ ׳™׳¡ ׳”׳ ׳ ׳˜׳—׳ ׳™׳ ׳›׳“׳¨׳ ׳˜׳—׳™׳ ׳×׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳–׳•׳¨׳” ׳—׳™׳˜׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳׳•׳¥ ׳•׳”׳¨׳•׳— ׳׳₪׳¨׳™׳“׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘ <sup>׳¢</sup><small><small>׳¡׳•׳£ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘"׳§ ׳“׳£ ׳¡. ׳•׳”׳ ׳” ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳’"׳› ׳‘׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳©׳”׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳™׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳‘׳§׳¢ ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳×׳™׳ ׳× ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳›' ׳“׳”׳•׳™ ׳’׳¨׳׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳×׳”׳"׳“.</small></small>, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳•׳“׳£ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳ ׳—׳™ ׳¢׳“ ׳©׳›׳׳‘׳• ׳¦׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳• ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘ <sup>׳¢׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳™. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳©׳‘׳™׳׳¨ ׳”׳˜׳¢׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳“׳¨׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳™׳“׳™׳.  ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳©׳׳˜׳™ ׳’׳™׳‘׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳£ ׳§׳›. [׳“׳£ ׳׳”. ׳‘׳¨׳™"׳£] ׳©׳”׳¡׳×׳₪׳§ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳׳. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳‘.</small></small>.
׳”׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳׳× ׳¡׳›׳¨ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¨׳™׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳–׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳“ ׳•׳’׳•׳¨׳׳™׳ ׳׳˜׳—׳™׳ ׳” <sup>׳¢׳‘</sup><small><small>׳”׳׳¡׳™׳¨ ׳¡׳›׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳ ׳›׳— ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳¨׳׳, ׳§"׳• ׳׳”׳ ׳“׳¡׳ ׳”׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳¢׳–: ׳•׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳“׳£ ׳˜׳–. ׳©׳›׳— ׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳”"׳’ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳•׳—׳™׳™׳‘, ׳•׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳ ׳˜"׳™ ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳›׳— ׳’׳‘׳¨׳ ׳׳׳© ׳›׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳”"׳’ [׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳˜, ׳˜', ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳©׳—׳™׳˜׳”], ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳—׳׳•׳¨ ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳ ׳–׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳›׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¨"׳ ׳“׳£ ׳¡., ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳׳”׳©׳׳¢׳×. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳׳ ׳—"׳™ ׳—"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳” ׳‘׳’׳“׳¨׳™ ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳”׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳׳›׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳”.</b> ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳’׳¨׳™׳׳× ׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳•׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™, ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳׳, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳©׳¢׳•׳× ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳”׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳₪׳™ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳›׳ ׳•׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳•׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳׳ (׳•׳™׳© ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× <b>׳׳׳—׳¨</b> ׳”׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳• ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳§׳“׳™׳׳, ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” !) <sup>׳¢׳’</sup><small><small>׳’׳¨׳ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳•׳’׳¨׳ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳•׳׳™׳—׳•׳¨ ׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳•׳’׳¨׳ ׳׳ ׳™׳¢׳× ׳•׳׳™׳—׳•׳¨ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳¨׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳’׳¨׳©"׳– ׳׳•׳™׳¨׳‘׳ ׳–׳¦"׳ ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳”׳“׳׳§׳” ׳׳• ׳”׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× [׳©׳©"׳› ׳₪׳™"׳’ ׳¡׳›"׳—], ׳•׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“׳™׳ [׳¢׳™' ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳—'], ׳׳ ׳׳׳’׳¨׳•"׳ [׳™׳•"׳“ ׳—"׳’ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳• ׳׳•׳× ׳“] ׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳”׳•׳™ ׳”׳‘׳¢׳¨׳” ׳•׳›׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳׳׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳’׳¨׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳›׳ ׳•׳”׳›׳׳™ ׳׳™׳•׳¢׳“ ׳׳–׳”. [׳•׳׳”׳’׳¨"׳  ׳§׳¨׳׳™׳¥ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳₪׳˜׳™׳©].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳•.</b> ׳”׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳‘׳§׳“׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳—׳× ׳›׳׳•׳× ׳’׳“׳•׳׳”, ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳’׳¨׳•׳’׳¨׳× ׳•׳›׳’׳¨׳•׳’׳¨׳×, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳—׳“ ׳”׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ <sup>׳¢׳“</sup><small><small>׳¨׳©׳‘"׳ [׳—׳•׳׳™׳ ׳˜׳•.] ׳•׳¨"׳ [׳‘׳™׳¦׳” ׳“׳£ ׳˜: ׳‘׳“׳₪׳™ ׳”׳¨׳™"׳£ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳™׳”׳]. ׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳× ׳©׳×׳™ ׳”׳©׳™׳˜׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳”׳›׳¨׳™׳¢, ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳’ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨׳• ׳׳”׳‘׳× ׳—׳¡׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳”׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳›׳“׳¢׳” ׳©׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳¢׳ ׳›׳ ׳×׳•׳¦׳׳× ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳¢׳¦׳׳” ׳©׳ ׳›׳ ׳›׳’׳¨׳•׳’׳¨׳× ׳•׳›׳’׳¨׳•׳’׳¨׳× ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳›׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳—׳“.</small></small>.
׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳•׳”׳•׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳₪׳¨׳™, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳§׳˜׳•׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳¢׳¥, ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳§׳˜׳•׳£ ׳¢׳ ׳£ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳›׳׳” ׳₪׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳‘׳•׳©׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳‘׳©׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳¨ ׳׳׳” ׳©׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” [׳•׳׳ ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳₪׳™׳“ ׳›׳׳] <sup>׳¢׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳˜"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳‘.</small></small>.
׳•׳‘׳¡׳₪׳¨ ׳׳—׳ ׳” ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳—"׳— ׳׳—׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳׳× ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳’׳ ׳׳§׳—׳× ׳”׳×׳₪׳™׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳×׳” ׳™׳“ ׳©׳ ׳•׳©׳ ׳‘׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳•׳›׳¨׳—, ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳–׳” ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳”׳™׳” ׳׳• ׳×׳₪׳™׳׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳”׳—׳•׳׳§׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳•׳“׳¢׳×׳ ׳©׳—׳₪׳¦׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳ ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳¨׳™׳‘׳•׳™ ׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳׳ ׳”׳•׳¦׳׳” ׳ ׳₪׳¨׳“׳× ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ <sup>׳¢׳•</sup><small><small>׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ [׳‘׳“׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳¢׳' ׳¨׳¡׳˜].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳•׳¢׳©׳׳” ׳”׳׳“׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳–.</b> ׳›׳©׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳”׳™׳×׳” ׳ ׳¢׳©׳™׳× ׳’׳ ׳‘׳׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳“׳ ׳•׳”׳׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¢׳׳× ׳‘׳׳¢׳©׳”׳•, ׳™׳© ׳׳•׳׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ <sup>׳¢׳–</sup><small><small>׳׳ ׳—׳× ׳©׳׳׳” ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳ ׳׳•׳× ׳™. ׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳•, ׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳’׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳¨׳™׳© ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳©׳”׳•׳¦׳¨׳ ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳”׳₪׳ ׳‘׳’׳—׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳‘׳™׳©׳•׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳׳¦׳“ ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳“׳, ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳” ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳‘׳’׳“ ׳”׳©׳¨׳•׳™ ׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳׳™׳, ׳•׳׳“׳‘׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳• ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳’׳¨׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳¦׳™׳¥ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳™׳ ׳™׳§׳” ׳”׳—׳“׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳” ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳“׳, ׳•׳׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘ ׳”׳”׳¨ ׳¦׳‘׳™ [׳‘׳©׳•"׳× ׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳"׳”] ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¡׳™׳£ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳׳™׳× ׳׳™׳.</small></small>.
׳׳“׳•׳’׳׳, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳¢׳ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳׳׳•׳›׳׳ ׳”׳©׳¨׳•׳™ ׳›׳•׳׳• ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳׳™׳. ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳©׳₪׳•׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳׳™׳׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳¦׳ ׳‘׳×׳•׳ ׳©׳׳•׳׳™׳× ׳׳™׳. [׳•׳ ׳¨׳׳” ׳©׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¦׳‘׳•׳¢ ׳‘׳’׳“ ׳©׳—׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳׳©׳§׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳“׳ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳”׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳”׳¦׳‘׳¢ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳× <b>׳›׳׳</b> ׳‘׳‘׳’׳“].
<h2> ׳¡׳™׳׳ ׳׳* - ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</h2>
<h3> ׳›׳׳׳™ ׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳”׳©׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳›׳—.</b> ׳—׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×] ׳©׳•׳” ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳, ׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳‘׳”׳׳›׳•׳× ׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳”׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳” ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳”׳’׳“׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳” ׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳•׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳”׳¨׳‘׳” ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳”׳¢׳׳™׳“׳• ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳”׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳׳¦׳•׳•׳× ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' <sup>׳¢׳—</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ [׳•׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳›׳’, ׳›׳“] ׳•׳¨׳™׳˜׳‘"׳ ׳‘׳¨"׳” ׳“׳£ ׳׳‘: ׳“"׳” ׳•׳‘׳¨׳. ׳•׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳©׳, ׳•׳×׳•"׳“ ׳©׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳¦׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳•׳׳ ׳•׳— ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳×׳”׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳›׳—׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳’׳“׳¨׳• ׳’׳“׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳×׳™ ׳׳×׳‘׳˜׳ ׳”׳—׳™׳•׳‘ ׳׳ ׳•׳— ׳•׳׳©׳‘׳•׳×. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳©׳•"׳× ׳—׳×"׳¡ ׳—"׳• ׳¡׳™' ׳¦"׳–.</small></small> [׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳׳™׳׳” ׳©׳•׳₪׳¨ ׳•׳׳•׳׳‘], ׳•׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳™׳¡׳•׳“ ׳×׳§׳ ׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳©׳×׳”׳ ׳ ׳™׳›׳¨׳× ׳”׳©׳‘׳™׳×׳” ׳•׳”׳׳ ׳•׳—׳” <sup>׳¢׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¨׳׳‘"׳ ׳₪׳›"׳“ ׳׳”׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳”׳™"׳‘. ׳•׳׳£ ׳‘׳¡׳₪׳™׳§׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳–׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳ ׳›׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™', ׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳¡׳₪׳§ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳– ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳§"׳™ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§׳"׳‘. ׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳©׳•"׳× ׳©׳‘׳˜ ׳”׳׳•׳™ ׳—"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳"׳”.</small></small>.
׳׳׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳׳™׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳, ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳₪׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳¨׳—"׳ ׳©׳•׳ ׳” ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳§׳׳” ׳™׳•׳×׳¨, ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳§׳¨׳‘׳ ׳—׳˜׳׳×. ׳•׳›׳׳ ׳™׳•׳‘׳׳• ׳‘׳¡"׳“ ׳›׳׳” ׳“׳•׳’׳׳׳•׳× ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳“׳™׳ ׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳›׳₪׳¨׳” ׳¢׳ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳.
׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳›׳׳” ׳¡׳™׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳’׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳§׳׳§׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳ ׳× ׳׳×׳§׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳׳™׳–׳” ׳˜׳¢׳, ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• [׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳] ׳•׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” <sup>׳₪</sup><small><small>׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳©׳×׳§׳¦׳•׳¥ ׳¦׳₪׳¨׳ ׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳™׳” ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳—׳•׳×׳›׳• ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳›׳׳™, ׳׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳ "׳— ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳¦׳•׳“ ׳¦׳™׳“׳“ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳”׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳¦׳™׳¨׳£ ׳©׳ ׳˜׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳”׳§׳, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©.</small></small>, ׳•׳¨׳׳” ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳”.
[׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳×׳›׳•׳™׳ ׳•׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“].
<h3> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳›׳˜.</b> ׳‘׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” <sup>׳₪׳</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳'.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳§׳™׳‘׳׳• ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳§׳™׳‘׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¦׳™׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳×׳₪׳™׳׳” ׳׳™׳ ׳©׳™׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳” <sup>׳₪׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳“"׳” ׳׳™׳. </small></small>. ׳•׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳—׳¨׳™ 13 ׳“׳§' ׳׳©׳§׳”"׳— ׳׳• ׳׳¢׳˜ ׳₪׳—׳•׳× <sup>׳₪׳’</sup><small><small>׳©׳–׳” ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳™׳׳•׳ ׳’' ׳¨׳‘׳¢׳™ ׳׳™׳, ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳, ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳›"׳’ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳¡׳™׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳׳©׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳׳¨׳. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳“"׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳׳¢׳˜ ׳§׳•׳“׳ ׳–׳׳ ׳–׳” ׳›׳‘׳¨ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳×׳•׳¡׳₪׳× ׳©׳‘׳×.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×</h3>
<b>׳.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳׳™ ׳©׳׳ ׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” <sup>׳₪׳“</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳×׳§׳˜"׳•, ׳' ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳”, ׳—' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳. ׳’׳ ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳’ ׳¡׳§׳¦"׳• ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳׳™ ׳©׳ ׳¢׳©׳×׳” ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳©. ׳׳ ׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳ "׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳“' ׳“"׳” ׳©׳”׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳”׳•׳“׳™.</small></small>. ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” ׳׳• ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳§׳¦׳× ׳—׳•׳׳™ <sup>׳₪׳”</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳–, ׳”'. ׳•׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¨׳•׳‘׳” ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳›"׳‘ ׳“׳ ׳׳§׳•׳׳ ׳•׳›' ׳©׳”׳"׳¨ ׳׳•׳¡׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳•׳›׳•׳×׳‘ ׳©׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳׳ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳– ׳¡׳§׳›"׳” ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘ ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳¡׳§"׳¡ ׳›' ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳’׳“׳•׳. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳™' ׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳™׳•"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳§׳ "׳– ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳׳•׳.</small></small>.
׳•׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳”׳ ׳׳• ׳›׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳׳• ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳"׳¦ ׳׳’׳•׳₪׳”, ׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ג€“ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳” <sup>׳₪׳•</sup><small><small>׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜׳™ ׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳™׳ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘'.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳‘"׳¡</h3>
<b>׳׳.</b> ׳—׳•׳׳” ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¡׳›׳ ׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨׳• ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ [׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“] ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳¡׳›׳ ׳× ׳׳‘׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳ ׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ <sup>׳₪׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳™"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳ "׳–.</small></small>.
<h3> "׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×" ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</h3>
<b>׳׳‘.</b> ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×, ׳׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳ ׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳׳• ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳׳™׳ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳₪׳—</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§"׳™. ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×, ׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳"׳“.
[׳•׳׳” ׳©׳”׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳›׳©׳”׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳”׳•׳ ׳‘׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳¦׳•׳¨׳× ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳׳”׳™׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¢"׳™ ׳›׳׳™ ׳•׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳©׳׳• ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳׳‘׳ ׳›׳©׳¢׳©׳” ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳›׳×׳™׳§׳•׳ ׳” ׳׳׳ ׳‘׳׳¨׳₪׳§׳• ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×. ׳•׳”׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳§׳ ׳•׳ ׳•׳×׳׳—׳•׳™ ׳׳‘׳¨׳™׳¨׳” ׳‘׳ ׳₪׳” ׳•׳›׳‘׳¨׳” ׳‘׳׳¨׳₪׳§׳• ׳‘׳¨׳•׳¨. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳›"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳‘' ׳—׳™׳׳•׳§ ׳›׳¢׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×].
׳•׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳•׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳‘ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳§"׳– ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳› ׳׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳™׳ ׳•׳— ׳©׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳׳•׳×׳¨, ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳•׳–׳›׳¨ ׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳ ׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳ ׳•׳׳ ׳›׳ ׳”׳¨׳׳©׳•׳ ׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳₪׳•׳¡׳§׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳‘׳™׳׳• ׳“׳™׳ ׳–׳” [׳•׳‘׳₪׳¨׳˜ ׳©׳‘׳”׳׳©׳ ׳”׳’׳' ׳¢׳•׳¡׳§׳× ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳•׳’׳™׳ ׳–׳• ׳׳ ׳”׳•׳–׳›׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳–׳”], ׳׳׳ ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳™׳“ ׳"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳¨׳— ׳™׳©׳¨ ׳‘׳©׳•׳” ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳›׳׳ ׳׳׳¨׳— ׳›׳׳ ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳©׳ ׳›׳×׳™׳©׳” ׳›׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳׳” ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳™ ׳׳–׳›׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳×׳•׳© ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳˜׳—׳•׳.  [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨"׳ ׳¢׳ ׳”׳¨׳™"׳£ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× ׳¡׳. ׳“"׳” ׳•׳‘׳׳§׳•׳, ׳•׳™׳© ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳×׳™׳¨׳¥ ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“, ׳×׳“׳¢ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳₪׳™' ׳¢"׳™ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳›׳‘׳•׳×].
׳•׳‘׳¢׳™׳§׳¨ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×, ׳¢׳™' ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳¡"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳‘ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™' ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳” ׳‘' ׳•׳¡׳§׳"׳— ׳•׳¡׳§׳™"׳‘ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳¦. ׳•׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳”׳"׳‘ ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳ ׳¡׳§׳ "׳– ׳׳”׳©׳×׳™׳ ׳¢"׳’ ׳˜׳™׳˜ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳“׳׳ ׳—"׳ ׳‘׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳•׳‘׳“׳¨"׳› ׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳׳¢׳™׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“], ׳¦׳™׳¨׳£ ׳׳–׳” ׳’׳ ׳׳” ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×, ׳•׳׳¦׳׳×׳™ ׳©׳›"׳› ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ [׳׳•"׳— ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳— ׳¡׳§"׳— ׳•׳‘׳©׳‘׳™׳¢׳™׳× ׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳‘] ׳׳”׳“׳™׳ ׳‘׳“׳¢׳× ׳”׳"׳‘, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨ ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳×"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳˜ ׳©׳”׳©׳×׳ ׳× ׳"׳¨ ׳׳™"׳– ׳—׳©׳™׳‘ ׳›"׳› ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×.  ׳©׳׳¢׳×׳™ ׳׳”׳’׳¨׳™"׳© ׳׳׳™׳©׳™׳‘ ׳©׳׳™׳˜"׳ ׳©׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳׳—׳•׳§ ׳׳™׳₪׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳•׳׳˜ ׳©׳‘׳₪׳ ׳™׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× ׳׳£ ׳׳—׳™׳™ ׳׳“׳ ׳©׳“׳¢׳×׳• ׳׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳–׳” ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳©׳׳›׳©׳™׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳׳›׳×׳™׳‘׳” [׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳” ׳©׳›׳×׳‘׳ ׳• ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳™"׳“ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›"׳•.</small></small>. ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳©׳”׳™׳” ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳“׳׳•׳’ ׳׳¢׳¨"׳© ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳’׳™׳¢ ׳׳–׳” ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳× <sup>׳₪׳˜</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳‘ ׳¡׳§׳™"׳“ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳׳‘׳, ׳•׳׳§׳•׳¨׳• ׳‘׳’׳' ׳©׳‘׳× ׳₪׳:.</small></small>.
[׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳“ ׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳‘׳•׳“ ׳”׳‘׳¨׳™׳•׳×].
<h3> ׳”׳™׳–׳§ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</h3>
<b>׳׳’.</b> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳™׳–׳§ <b>׳“׳¨׳‘׳™׳</b> ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳•׳‘׳×׳ ׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳”׳”׳™׳–׳§ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳¨ <sup>׳¦</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳›"׳– ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳“ ׳•׳¡׳§׳₪"׳‘. ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳“׳”"׳” ׳‘׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳”׳¨׳‘׳™׳. ׳•׳‘׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳׳”׳§׳ ׳׳£ ׳‘׳—׳©׳© ׳”׳™׳–׳§ ׳׳™׳—׳™׳“ [׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳•'].</small></small>.
<h3> ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</h3>
<b>׳׳“.</b> ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳, ׳׳ ׳™׳© ׳׳§׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳”׳¦׳˜׳¨׳£ ׳¦׳“׳“׳™ ׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳ ׳•׳¡׳₪׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳’׳“׳•׳ ׳•׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ <sup>׳¦׳</sup><small><small>׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳§׳™"׳— ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳•, ׳•׳׳˜׳¢׳ ׳–׳” ׳ ׳×׳‘׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳˜"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™' ׳›"׳- ׳›"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳—׳© ׳•׳¢׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳”׳׳–׳™׳§׳™׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳¢׳™׳§׳¨׳” ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™׳™׳×׳ ׳׳׳ ׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳©׳ ׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’, ׳׳‘׳ ׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳”׳¢׳•׳§׳¥ ׳׳™׳ ׳‘׳• ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳›"׳› ׳•׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳•׳¨׳’׳• ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¦׳•׳“׳• ׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳§׳¥ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¢׳ [׳׳׳’"׳ ׳©׳], ׳•׳§׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¡׳׳§׳• ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳–׳™׳§ ׳’׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳ ׳™׳–׳•׳§ ׳‘׳₪׳•׳¢׳ ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳™׳© ׳‘׳• ׳”׳™׳–׳§ ׳’׳“׳•׳.
׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳ ׳—׳׳§׳• ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳”׳“׳׳™׳§ ׳—׳™׳׳•׳ ׳›׳©׳™׳© ׳¨׳§ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳§׳•׳¨ ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳—׳©׳© ׳׳—׳•׳׳™, ׳‘׳׳’"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳¨׳™ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳– ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳”' ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳©׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳•׳׳¨ ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳× ׳¨׳§ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×, ׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳•׳”׳•׳›׳™׳— ׳›׳ ׳׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳—, ׳›"׳—.
׳•׳”׳"׳‘ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳›׳׳‘ ׳•׳›׳” ׳׳§׳•׳׳•׳× ׳©׳׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨, ׳•׳׳¢׳ ׳™׳ ׳׳₪׳™׳¡ ׳׳•׳¨׳¡׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳© [׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳›׳“׳™] ׳©׳”׳”׳™׳×׳¨ ׳¨׳§ ׳›׳©׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳›׳ ׳‘׳™׳“ ׳•׳׳ ׳‘׳›׳׳™ ׳©׳׳™׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳›׳“׳¨׳›׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ [׳׳׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳׳”׳¢׳™׳¨, ׳©׳׳›׳— ׳–׳” ׳”׳×׳™׳¨ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳₪"׳— ׳•׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳—, ׳™"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳§׳•׳¥ ׳׳”׳•׳¦׳™׳ ׳§׳•׳¥ ׳׳£ ׳›׳©׳₪׳¡"׳¨ ׳©׳™׳™׳¦׳ ׳“׳ (׳׳ ׳"׳ ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳¨) ׳•׳”׳¨׳™ ׳׳›׳׳•׳¨׳” ׳ ׳—׳©׳‘ ׳›׳“׳¨׳]. ׳•׳›׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳’ ׳”׳‘׳™׳ ׳”׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳‘' ׳×׳™' ׳×׳•׳¡' ׳׳ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳•׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳”׳"׳‘ ׳©׳¨׳§ ׳׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳©׳ ׳—׳•׳׳™ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳ [׳•׳”׳’׳¨"׳ ׳©׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳©׳׳›׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳×׳™׳¨׳™׳, ׳›׳©׳™׳˜׳×׳•], ׳•׳›"׳› ׳‘׳©׳¢׳”"׳¦ ׳¡׳™' ׳×׳¦"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳˜, ׳•׳›׳ ׳‘׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¢"׳— ׳“"׳” ׳”׳—׳•׳׳” ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳›׳, ׳•׳›׳ ׳׳‘׳•׳׳¨ ׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳"׳ [׳©׳”׳¦׳¨׳™׳›׳• ׳“׳•׳§׳ ׳₪׳™׳¨׳©׳• ׳•׳§׳¨׳•׳‘׳™׳ ׳׳”׳™׳ ׳×׳§ ׳•׳‘׳׳"׳” ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳£ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨, ׳¢׳™׳™"׳© ׳‘׳¡׳§׳¦"׳•], ׳•׳¨׳§ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳׳™׳•׳—׳“ ׳›׳§׳•׳¥ ׳‘׳¨׳”"׳¨ ׳׳• ׳›׳₪׳¨׳¢׳•׳© ׳”׳¢׳•׳§׳¥ ׳׳• ׳›׳—׳©׳© ׳ ׳©׳™׳›׳× ׳ ׳—׳© ׳•׳¢׳§׳¨׳‘ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳”׳×׳¨׳× ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳’׳‘׳™ ׳§׳©׳¨ ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳§׳™׳™׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳–, ׳'] ׳‘׳¦׳™׳¨׳•׳£ ׳”׳“׳¢׳•׳× ׳”׳׳×׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳£ ׳©׳׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨, ׳׳‘׳ ׳‘׳©׳‘׳•׳× ׳¨׳’׳™׳ ׳•׳‘׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳¨׳’׳™׳, ׳׳¡׳•׳¨.
׳•׳¢"׳¢ ׳‘׳×׳”׳"׳“ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳›"׳— ׳¡׳§׳"׳˜ ׳©׳“׳ ׳׳×׳™ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳— ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</h3>
<b>׳׳”.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳, ׳׳׳ ׳ ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳•׳—׳•׳׳¨׳•׳× ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ [׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳›׳©׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳׳© ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳™׳] ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳‘׳₪׳¢׳׳™׳ ׳׳¡׳•׳™׳™׳׳•׳× ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳¨ ׳‘׳¢׳׳™ ׳—׳™׳™׳ <sup>׳¦׳‘</sup><small><small>׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳” ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳›' ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳׳™׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳׳¦׳•׳¨׳ ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳— [׳•׳¢׳™' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳•׳£ ׳“"׳” ׳•׳׳] ׳•׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳©׳ [׳¡׳•׳¡׳§׳¢"׳’] ׳›' ׳©׳˜׳•׳‘ ׳©׳™׳—׳׳‘׳• ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳׳•׳›׳, ׳׳ ׳׳ ׳׳¦׳™׳ ׳• ׳©׳ ׳©׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳—׳׳•׳‘ ׳¢׳ ׳™׳“׳™ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳—׳•׳׳‘ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“ ׳©׳”׳•׳ ׳׳©׳׳¦׳"׳’, ׳•׳׳׳ ׳ ׳”׳—׳–׳•"׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳ "׳• ׳¡׳§"׳“ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¦׳ ׳¢׳›׳•"׳ ׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳—׳׳•׳‘ ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳›׳׳™ ׳׳׳•׳¡ ׳©׳”׳—׳׳‘ ׳™׳׳ ׳׳׳™׳‘׳•׳“. ׳•׳©׳ ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳™"׳— ׳׳ ׳§׳ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳׳ ׳׳™׳¨׳“ ׳׳‘׳”׳׳” ׳׳£ ׳׳ ׳¢׳׳” ׳¢׳׳™׳” ׳‘׳׳–׳™׳“, ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳— ׳©׳ ׳”׳‘׳”׳׳”, ׳•׳›׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳׳™׳©׳¨׳׳ ׳׳”׳׳¨׳•׳× ׳”׳׳•׳–׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳׳™׳ ׳• ׳׳•׳¦׳ ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳©׳™׳¢׳©׳” ׳›׳ [׳©׳ ׳¡׳§׳"׳].
׳•׳׳׳™׳“׳ ׳’׳™׳¡׳, ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ ׳©׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳”׳¢׳׳•׳×׳” ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳™׳ ׳•׳׳£ ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳— ׳׳ ׳׳”׳ ׳™ ׳׳”׳×׳™׳¨ [׳•׳›׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳”׳׳•׳‘׳ ׳׳׳¢׳׳”], ׳•׳‘׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳' ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳¨׳§ ׳׳“׳—׳•׳× ׳‘׳¢"׳— ׳׳©׳•׳ ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳— ׳•׳׳ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳. ׳•׳׳₪׳©׳¨ ׳©׳›׳ ׳”׳™׳›׳ ׳©׳™׳© ׳”׳™׳›"׳× ׳׳׳ ׳•׳¢ ׳”׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳— ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳׳—׳¨ ׳׳ ׳”׳×׳™׳¨׳• ׳˜׳׳˜׳•׳ ׳‘׳™׳“׳™׳™׳, ׳׳ ׳”׳׳’"׳ ׳›׳×׳‘ '׳”׳›׳׳ ׳”׳¢׳•׳׳” ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳–׳”' ׳•׳›׳׳• ׳©׳”׳¢׳×׳§׳ ׳• ׳‘׳’׳•׳£ ׳”׳¡׳¢׳™׳£. ׳•׳¢׳™' ׳¨׳¢׳§"׳ ׳©׳ ׳‘׳׳©"׳› ׳¢׳™' ׳”׳׳’"׳.</small></small>. [׳•׳‘׳׳’"׳ (׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳” ׳¡׳§׳™"׳˜) ׳›׳×׳‘: '׳•׳׳©׳׳¢ ׳“׳׳¢"׳’ ׳“׳׳™׳›׳ ׳¦׳¢׳‘"׳— ׳׳¡׳•׳¨, ׳“׳׳™׳ ׳׳ ׳• ׳׳“׳׳•׳× ׳’׳–׳™׳¨׳•׳× ׳—׳›׳׳™׳ ׳–׳” ׳׳–׳”, ׳“׳™׳© ׳“׳‘׳¨׳™׳ ׳©׳”׳¢׳׳™׳“׳• ׳׳₪׳™׳׳• ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳›׳¨׳×'].
<h3> ׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳‘׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</h3>
<b>׳׳•.</b> ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ <sup>׳¦׳’</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳§"׳– [׳©׳׳›׳¨׳׳׳™׳× ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳‘׳›׳ ׳׳•׳₪׳] ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳— ׳¡׳§׳›"׳— ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳‘' ׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳“"׳” ׳“׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳•׳¡׳™' ׳©"׳— ׳¡׳§׳§׳"׳•. ׳•׳¢׳™׳™׳ ׳¢׳•׳“ ׳‘׳”׳¢׳¨׳” ׳”׳‘׳׳”.</small></small>, ׳׳ ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳˜׳׳˜׳ ׳׳•׳§׳¦׳” ׳‘׳׳§׳•׳ ׳”׳₪׳¡׳“ ׳׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳™׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™' ׳•׳ ׳׳׳“ ׳׳׳©"׳› ׳‘׳’׳' [׳§׳ ׳’.] ׳׳™ ׳©׳”׳—׳©׳™׳ ׳•׳׳™׳ ׳׳• ׳ ׳›׳¨׳™ ׳׳• ׳§׳˜׳ ׳™׳˜׳׳˜׳׳ ׳• ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳₪׳—׳•׳× ׳׳“"׳, ׳•׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳©׳•"׳¢ ׳¡׳™' ׳¨׳¡"׳• ׳¡׳¢׳™׳£ ׳–', ׳•׳”׳™׳™׳ ׳•, ׳׳₪׳ ׳™ ׳©׳׳“׳ ׳‘׳”׳•׳ ׳¢׳ ׳׳׳•׳ ׳• ׳•׳׳ ׳׳ ׳ ׳×׳™׳¨ ׳׳• ׳‘׳׳•׳₪׳ ׳–׳” ׳™׳¢׳‘׳•׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳“׳׳•׳¨׳™', ׳•׳›׳ ׳ ׳₪׳¡׳§ ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“ ׳¡׳§"׳•, ׳•׳›' ׳©׳ ׳‘׳¡׳§"׳” ׳©׳׳ ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳‘׳‘׳™׳×׳• ׳•׳“׳׳™ ׳׳¡׳•׳¨ ׳©׳׳ ׳™׳›׳‘׳” ׳”׳“׳׳™׳§׳” ׳׳×׳•׳ ׳‘׳”׳™׳׳•׳×׳•. ׳•׳‘׳¡׳—׳•׳¨׳” <h3> ׳׳¢׳©׳” ׳©׳‘׳× ׳‘׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳</h3>
<b>׳׳–.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’ <sup>׳¦׳”</sup><small><small>׳©׳•׳’׳’ ׳”׳•׳ ׳›׳’׳•׳ ׳©׳©׳›׳— ׳©׳”׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳׳• ׳©׳—׳©׳‘ ׳©׳“׳‘׳¨ ׳–׳” ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳¢׳©׳•׳×׳• ׳‘׳©׳‘׳× [׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳˜ ׳¡׳§׳"׳]. </small></small>, ׳׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳™׳”׳ ׳•׳× ׳׳ ׳”׳׳׳׳›׳” ׳‘׳• ׳‘׳™׳•׳ <sup>׳¦׳•</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳™"׳— ׳¡׳§"׳’ ׳•׳‘׳׳”"׳ ׳©׳ ׳“"׳” ׳”׳׳‘׳©׳.</small></small>.
<h3> ׳›׳₪׳¨׳” ׳׳¢׳•׳‘׳¨ ׳¢׳ ׳©׳‘׳•׳×׳™׳</h3>
<b>׳׳—.</b> ׳”׳¢׳•׳©׳” ׳׳™׳¡׳•׳¨׳™ ׳©׳‘׳× ׳“׳¨׳‘׳ ׳ ׳‘׳©׳•׳’׳’, ׳›׳₪׳¨׳×׳• ׳׳”׳×׳¢׳ ׳•׳× ׳' ׳™׳•׳ ׳©׳ ׳™ ׳•׳—׳׳™׳©׳™, ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳׳›׳ ׳‘׳©׳¨ ׳•׳׳ ׳™׳©׳×׳” ׳™׳™׳ ׳‘׳׳™׳׳” ׳׳׳—׳¨ ׳”׳×׳¢׳ ׳™׳×, ׳•׳™׳›׳•׳ ׳׳₪׳“׳•׳× ׳׳× ׳”׳×׳¢׳ ׳™׳× ׳‘׳׳׳•׳ <sup>׳¦׳–</sup><small><small>׳¡׳™' ׳©׳"׳“, ׳›"׳•, ׳•׳¢׳™"׳© ׳‘׳"׳‘ ׳¡׳§"׳₪ ׳‘׳©׳™׳¢׳•׳¨ ׳”׳׳׳•׳ ׳”׳ ׳¦׳¨׳, ׳•׳‘׳¡׳§׳₪"׳ ׳›' ׳©׳”׳¢׳©׳™׳¨ ׳™׳×׳ ׳™׳•׳×׳¨ ׳׳₪׳™ ׳¢׳©׳¨׳•.</small></small>.

<h3> ׳˜׳™׳¨׳—׳” ׳•׳¢׳•׳‘׳“׳™׳ ׳“׳—׳•׳</h3>
